The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 107 - 96 , at TD_Garden on Friday . Boston desperately needed a win here and a double - digit victory shows just how important it was . They did all their damage in the first and fourth quarters , outscoring Washington , 55 - 35 . That allowed the Celtics to lead for 45 minutes of this 48 - minute game . The Celtics defense was critical , as they held the Wizards to 40 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range while recording 12 steals . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with Boston recording six more assists than Washington while committing six fewer turnovers . The Wizards ( 25 - 37 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 29 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jeff Green totaled 15 points and four boards . Tomas Satoransky accrued 15 points , five rebounds and five assists while Bobby Portis amassed seven points and 11 boards . Jabari Parker led the bench with 12 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Celtics ( 38 - 25 ) were led by Al Horford , as he finished with 18 points , six rebounds and three assists . Kyrie Irving tallied 13 points , six rebounds and 12 assists . Marcus Morris generated 17 points and nine boards while Jayson Tatum accumulated 10 points , eight rebounds , three assists and five steals . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Washington playing host to the Minnesota Timberwolves and Boston welcoming the Houston Rockets to TD_Garden .
The Los_Angeles Clippers blew out the Washington Wizards 136 - 104 at Staples_Center on Sunday . The Clippers had nine players finish in double figures and had no trouble looking back after posting 41 points in the second quarter to improve to 4 - 2 on the season . The rebound battle and ball movement on the Clippers end resulted in the blowout as unselfish basketball and the strength of their bench all factored into stifling the Wizards , who fell to 1 - 4 on the season . Tobias Harris led all scorers with 22 points to go with 11 rebounds , while Patrick Beverley and Avery Bradley combined for 26 points on 19 shots . One of the most productive bench players early in this season has been Montrezl Harrell , who pitched in 13 points and six rebounds on 6 - of - 7 shooting in just 16 minutes of action . Harrell also blocked two shots and entered the game averaging just over two swats per game . Rookie Shae Gilgeous-Alexander added 10 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting , alongside eight rebounds and seven assists in 28 minutes . The Wizards starters could not muster enough offense to pace with Los_Angeles , as Bradley Beal and John Wall combined for 38 points on 36 shots . Ian Mahinmi was getting bullied around the glass and grabbed just seven rebounds in his 29 minutes . Kelly Oubre Jr also struggled to find a rhythm off the bench as he scored nine points on 2 - of - 12 shooting . Both teams are on the road Tuesday , as the Clippers take on the Oklahoma_City Thunder , while the Wizards will face the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 116 - 11 , at Staples_Center on Thursday . The Clippers ( 9 - 5 ) have made a statement over the last week , with Thursday 's win serving as their third straight win after the team knocked off both the Bucks and Warriors within the last seven days . Thursday night , Los_Angeles let the Spurs ( 7 - 7 ) remain within striking distance , but it never allowed the visiting team to breakthrough . This was thanks in large part to Lou Williams in the closing moments , as his game - winning three - pointer with 40 seconds left put the Clippers up for good . Williams finished with 23 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting in 28 minutes off the bench to lead the way for the Clippers . Danilo Gallinari was close behind with 19 points , while Tobias Harris put together a great all - around performance with 18 points , eight rebounds and assists in 28 minutes . For the Spurs , it was all about DeMar Derozan , who scored a game - high 34 points on 14 - of - 30 shooting to go along with six rebounds , five assists and three steals in 41 minutes . Unfortunately for DeRozan , when the Spurs had a chance to tie the game down three points in the closing moments , their star turned the ball over , and the game was officially out of reach . DeRozan still did n't get much help Thursday night , however , as LaMarcus Aldridge shot a miserable 3 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring just 10 points in 38 minutes , but he did have a game - high 16 rebounds . Rudy Gay posted 19 points off the bench in what was the team 's third straight loss .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the visiting Phoenix Suns , 115 - 99 , on Wednesday evening . It was a battle of first meets last on Wednesday , as the top - ranked Clippers ( 14 - 6 ) hosted the 15th - place Suns ( 4 - 17 ) . The game went accordingly , as LA earned a blowout win to maintain its first - place standing . With 11 made three - pointers and 18 offensive rebounds , the Clippers were able to overcome some struggles with ball management . It was an easy win for the team despite committing 21 turnovers on the night . LA has now won eight of its last nine games and is showing no signs of slowing down . Danilo Gallinari led the Clippers with 28 points and grabbed 10 rebounds in the win . His fellow forward , Tobias Harris , added another 10 rebounds to go with 18 points on the night . Big man Boban Marjanovic , in just 19 minutes on the court , secured 12 rebounds , including eight on the offensive end . All three stellar frontcourt performances contributed to LA 's comfortable victory . Phoenix , on the other hand , struggled mightily on the offensive end . The team shot just 31 percent from three - point range and 43 percent overall . Devin Booker led the team with 23 points . It was an off night for rookie big man DeAndre Ayton , who committed five fouls and finished with just four points in 30 minutes of play . The Clippers visit the Kings on Thursday , while Phoenix will host the Orlando Magic on Friday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 132 - 111. at Staples_Center on Saturday . This marks the Nuggets worst loss of the season , as the Clippers dominated throughout . In fact , they won all four individual quarters , as a 34 - 26 first quarter really set the tone . Rebounding was huge for Los_Angeles , as they won that battle , 56 - 37 . Much of that came on the defensive end , winning that differential , 43 - 24 . The Clippers ended up shooting 58 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range while holding the Nuggets to 42 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range . The Nuggets ( 21 - 10 ) leading scorer was actually ejected in the third quarter , as Nikola Jokic tallied 19 points , six rebounds and three assists before being handed two technicals for arguing . Jamal Murray totaled 18 points , three rebounds and two assists . Monte Morris led the bench with 15 points and five assists while Malik Beasley amassed 11 points , four rebounds and five steals . The Clippers ( 19 - 13 ) were led by Danilo Gallinari , as he accrued 21 points , four rebounds and two assists against his former team . Tobias Harris matched those 21 points , adding seven rebounds and three assists to his tally . Shai Gilegous-Alexander collected 14 points , two rebounds , six assists and two steals . Montrezl Harrell was huge off the bench , providing 20 points and 10 boards on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Both these teams have time off before their next game , as they both do n't play again until Wednesday . Denver will travel to face the San_Antonio Spurs while Los_Angeles will play host to the Sacramento Kings .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 122 - 111 , at Staples_Center on Saturday evening . The Spurs got out to a good start on the road as they led by two after one quarter . The Clippers evened things up through the second and the teams ended up tied at 56 by halftime . The Spurs came out on another level in the third , as they outscored the Clippers by 20 in the quarter , to bring a 20 - point lead into the final frame . The Clippers made a solid push in the fourth , outscoring the visitors by nine , however it was not enough to complete the comeback . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 38 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 36 minutes . DeMar DeRozan followed up with 25 points , 13 rebounds , six assists , four steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Derrick White and Rudy Gay added 12 points each , while Marco Belinelli added 11 points off the bench . Meanwhile , Danilo Gallinari led the Clippers with 21 points , nine rebounds and two assists , in 28 minutes . Montrezl Harrell finished with 21 points , five rebounds , four steals and one assist , while Tobias Harris and Lou Williams finished with 16 points each . The Clippers ( 21 - 15 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the 76ers on Tuesday . The Spurs ( 20 - 17 ) play host to the Celtics on Monday .
The visiting Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 119 - 113 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . The 76ers ( 24 - 14 ) staved off a fourth - quarter comeback by the Clippers ( 21 - 16 ) , who cut a 15 - point deficit to as little as four points . However , the lead proved insurmountable for LA , as the team was unable to close the gap by the end of regulation . Things got testy between the two teams in the fourth quarter , as Jimmy Butler and Avery Bradley were each ejected following a spat midway through the period . The Sixers managed to close out the game without their All-Star wing , who had 16 points prior to his ejection . Philly was led by a monumental 28 - point , 19 - rebound performance from Joel Embiid . Embiid added three assists and three blocks . Ben Simmons scored 14 points and flirted with a triple - double , grabbing nine rebounds and dishing eight assists . The win brings Philadelphia to 2 - 2 over the course of its current road trip . LA , meanwhile , saw four different players score at least 20 points . Lou Williams led the team with 22 points off the bench , while the duo of Tobias Harris and Danilo Gallinari scored 21 points each . Ultimately , though , sub - par shooting sank the Clippers ' chances . LA went just 5 - of - 25 from beyond the arc in the loss . Both the Sixers and Clippers will be playing their next game in Phoenix . Philly continues its road trip with a visit to Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday , while the Clippers will visit the Suns for a divisional matchup on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 128 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . Los_Angeles ( 24 - 16 ) hopped out to an early lead , going up by as much as nine in the first half . While Charlotte ( 19 - 21 ) kept the game close for much of regulation , the Clippers ' offense exploded for 42 fourth - quarter points and a double - digit win . LA 's dominant bench unit helped lead the charge , as Lou Williams and Montrezl Harrell combined to score 50 points in the win . The Clippers finished the night shooting over 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range . In addition to a team - high 27 points , Williams contributed 10 assists in the win . Harrell , the Clippers ' breakout big man , added 11 rebounds and five assists . The team also saw an impressive defensive effort from rookie point guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander , who grabbed three steals and blocked four shots in just 21 minutes of play . Charlotte , meanwhile , relied heavily on its own bench for production . Shots were n't falling for All-Star guard Kemba Walker , who went just 6 - of - 18 for 13 points . Sophomore Malik Monk picked up some of the slack , though , delivering a team - high 24 points off the bench . Ultimately , however , Charlotte 's offense could not match LA 's top - notch production , shooting just 40 percent from the field . The Hornets will visit Portland on Friday , while the Clippers have a trip to Denver on Thursday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 109 - 104 , at Staples_Center on Saturday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for Detroit , they held the lead for the final 45 - plus minutes . A 37 - 24 first quarter in advantage of the Pistons really set the tone , as the Clippers could n't recover from that . Rebounding was key for Detroit , as they outrebounded Los_Angeles , 48 - 38 . The Pistons also recorded 12 steals while the Clippers recorded just seven thefts . Detroit 's starters really dominated the game as well , outscoring Los_Angeles ' starters , 93 - 48 . The Pistons ( 18 - 23 ) got a spectacular performance from Blake Griffin , as he abused his former team with 44 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three steals on 13 - of - 23 from the field . Andre Drummond finished with 20 points , 21 rebounds and three steals . Reggie Bullock amassed 17 points , seven rebounds and four assists . The Clippers ( 24 - 18 ) two - best players came off the bench , as Lou Williams led the team with 22 points , two rebounds and three assists . Montrezl Harrell was just as good , providing 21 points , nine rebounds , six assists and four steals . Danilo Gallinari led the starters with 23 points , six rebounds and two assists . Tobias Harris totaled 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals . The New_Orleans Pelicans took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 121 - 117 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . It was shaping up to be an easy win for New_Orleans ( 21 - 23 ) , as the team led by as much as 20 points midway through the third quarter . The Clippers ( 24 - 19 ) , however , had other plans , and mounted a furious comeback late in the fourth . LA cut the lead to as little as two points by the end of the fourth quarter , thanks in large part to a 13 - 2 run in the third quarter . Lou Williams , Montrezl Harrell , and Tobias Harris all scored for LA during the run . Unfortunately for the Clippers , though , Anthony Davis and the Pelicans were able to hold off the comeback . Davis delivered a monster performance to help protect his team 's lead . The superstar big man scored 46 points to go with a game - high 16 rebounds and three steals . It was Davis 's seventh 40 - point outing of the season . The Pelicans also saw impressive outings from Julius Randle and Jrue Holiday . Holiday scored 19 points and dished out eight assists . Randle , meanwhile , had 27 points and grabbed six rebounds . LA saw its own fair share of strong performances despite coming up short . Danilo Gallinari delivered 25 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , adding five rebounds and six assists . Bench big man Montrezl Harrell led the second unit with 26 points and also had 10 rebounds . On Wednesday , the Pelicans will visit Golden_State while the Clippers will host the Utah Jazz .
The Utah Jazz took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 129 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . It was a comfortable win for the Jazz ( 25 - 21 ) , who held a double - digit lead for the majority of regulation . Utah played a remarkably efficient game , shooting 52 percent from the field and reaching the free - throw line 37 times . Los_Angeles ( 24 - 20 ) , on the other hand , was unable to make a dent in Utah 's impressive defense . Despite boasting one of the league 's highest - scoring offenses , the Clippers shot only 45 percent from the field and tallied just 49 first - half points . Utah saw an incredible 23 - points , 22 - rebound performance from star center Rudy Gobert . The reigning Defensive Player of the Year set a new season high on the boards and also blocked four shots . The Jazz also enjoyed a team - high 28 points from sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell . The Clippers , meanwhile , were not themselves in Wednesday 's loss . LA 's combo of star forwards , Tobias Harris and Danilo Gallinari , shot just 9 - of - 28 from the field for 26 points . Big man Montrezl Harrell , fresh off consecutive 20 - point performances , scored only 11 points off the bench on the night . On Friday , Utah will host the Cleveland Cavaliers , while Los_Angeles will square off with the Golden_State Warriors .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 112 - 94 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The Warriors took the early advantage on the road , with a 28 - 25 lead after one quarter . However , the Clippers stayed with it and cut the deficit to just one , as they trailed 52 - 51 at the half . The Warriors regained control through the third , where they outscored the Clippers by eight , to take a nine - point lead into the fourth . They maintained the upper hand through the final quarter , outscoring the Clippers by nine , to walk away with their seventh straight win . Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 28 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting , five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes . Kevin Durant followed up with 24 points , seven rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks , while DeMarcus Cousins tallied 14 points , six rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 15 minutes of action . Meanwhile , Tobias Harris led the Clippers with 28 points , nine rebounds and two assists , in 35 minutes . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander followed up with 24 points , five assists , three rebounds and three steals , while Marcin Gortat chipped in six points and four rebounds . The Warriors ( 32 - 14 ) take on the Lakers in Los_Angeles on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 122 - 108 , at Staples_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Clippers ( 28 - 22 ) have now won four out of their last five games and seem to be leaving behind an ugly five - game losing run that complicated their position in the standings , and they looked like the better side against the Kings ( 25 - 25 ) right from the beginning of the contest . The Clippers quickly jumped to a huge 34 - 21 lead following the first 12 minutes of action , and they never looked back from there . Los_Angeles also won the second quarter ( 33 - 30 ) and while Sacramento showed some signs of life in the third quarter , period they won 25 - 20 , it was n't enough to put the Clippers ' win in any sort of danger . Los_Angeles won the final quarter as well , 35 - 32 , and closed things out rather comfortably . Six Clippers scored in double digits in this one and surprisingly , the top scorer came off the bench since Montrezl Harrell had 25 points and seven rebounds while going 11 - 13 from the field . Tobias Harris had 18 points , and Patrick Beverley delivered a strong double - double since he finished the contest with 16 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had 17 points , five assists and four rebounds . De'Aaron Fox led the way for the Kings since he finished with 21 points , four rebounds and three assists . Marvin Bagley III had 14 points off the bench , while Bogdan Bogdanovic also impressed off the bench with 19 points in 31 minutes .
The Atlanta Hawks took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 123 - 118 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . Hawks point guard Trae Young set the bar high the last time these two teams met , delivering a season - high 17 assists against the Clippers in November . On Monday , he once again left an impression on LA , scoring a team - high 26 points to help his team earn a much - needed win . The Hawks ( 16 - 33 ) went up early thanks to strong play from Young and John Collins , who scored seven points each in the first quarter . While LA ( 27 - 23 ) fought its way back and evened the game at 71 - 71 , a late third - quarter run helped Atlanta maintain control of the game . Big man Alex Len helped spark the run by scoring eight points in under three minutes of action . The win brought Atlanta to 3 - 3 in its last six games , as the team continues to distance itself from its slow start to the season . Young has been a big part of that , averaging 18 points per game since the start of January . In addition to his strong scoring on Monday , he dished out eight assists and committed only one turnover . Collins finished the game with 22 points , while Len contributed another 19 off the bench . As a team , Atlanta shot over 50 percent from the field . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , was led by 30 points from star forward Tobias Harris . Harris also flirted with a triple - double , grabbing eight boards and dishing out seven assists . Off the bench , Lou Williams and Montrezl Harrell combined for 39 points and five steals , with Williams also recording nine assists . However , the team could not quite match Atlanta 's efficient production , shooting 48 percent from the field . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Clippers . Next on the agenda for Atlanta is a trip to Sacramento on Wednesday . The Clippers , meanwhile , will shift their focus to their tilt with their crosstown rival , the Lakers , on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 123 - 120 , in overtime at Staples_Center on Thursday . After missing the Lakers ' ( 27 - 25 ) last 17 games with a groin injury , superstar forward LeBron James made his return to the court on Thursday . Things started quietly for the four - time MVP , as he notched only two points in the first quarter and finished the first half with just five points under his belt . James delivered when it counted , though , scoring nine points in the fourth quarter and scoring or assisting on nine of the team 's points in overtime . The Clippers ( 28 - 24 ) , meanwhile , fought hard to force the game into overtime . They ended regulation on a 70 run , tying the game on a three - pointer from Tobias Harris . Victory , however , eluded the team 's grasp in overtime , as the Lakers went up by five points quickly and never looked back . James finished the game with a team - high 24 points for the Lakers . He flirted with a triple - double , tallying 14 rebounds and nine assists . His play was complemented by fellow veteran Rajon Rondo , who finished with 14 points , 13 rebounds , and seven assists . The Clippers , meanwhile , saw 15 points , eight rebounds , and eight assists from Harris . The team also got a gem from Lou Williams , who scored 24 points and dished out six assists while committing only one turnover . Next on the agenda for the Clippers is a trip to Detroit on Saturday . The Lakers will also hit the road on Saturday , as they pay a visit to the Warriors at Oracle_Arena .
The Los_Angeles Clippers rolled past the Phoenix Suns , 134 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . The Suns ( 11 - 48 ) entered Wednesday 's contest having lost 14 in a row , and it became apparent early in the game that their streak was going to continue . The Clippers ( 32 - 27 ) grabbed a quicklead and never looked back . LAC shot a blistering 60 percent in the win , taking advantage of Phoenix 's 29th - ranked defense . As always , the Clippers relied heavily on their strong second unit in the win . LA 's bench scored 70 points , with the tandem of Lou Williams and Montrezl Harrell doing much of the heavy lifting . Williams and Harrell contributed 49 points and 13 assists in the blowout win . LA also saw a 20 - point night from Danilo Gallinari , who was wildly efficient in just 19 minutes on the court . New Clipper Ivica Zubac also impressed , scoring 16 points to go with seven rebounds . Phoenix , meanwhile , saw a promising night from forward Kelly Oubre , who scored 28 points to lead the team . Star guard Devin Booker went cold in the loss , though , shooting just 2 - of - 10 en route to 10 points . Both teams will head into the All-Star break after Wednesday 's lopsided contest .
The Houston Rockets cruised past the Los_Angeles Clippers , 135 - 103 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday evening . Just one night after blowing out Sacramento by 25 points , the Rockets ( 51 - 28 ) won by an even wider margin against Los_Angeles ( 47 - 32 ) . While the Rockets did not match their record - setting three - point barrage from Tuesday night , Houston did knock down a whopping 18 three - pointers en route to the win . It was a wildly efficient night for the Rockets , who shot over 53 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . Houston jumped out to a double - digit lead in the first quarter and only cemented it with a commanding second half . James Harden was the team 's leading scorer with 31 points . The Rockets ' `` big three `` of Harden , Chris Paul , and Clint Capela combined to score 84 points , as Paul put up 29 points and seven assists while Capela finished with 24 points and 15 boards . Six Houston players scored in double figures in total . Rookie guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the Clippers with 20 points . LA was clearly outmatched from three - point range , making only eight shots from beyond the arc . The normally lights - out bench duo of Lou Williams and Montrezl Harrell had a relatively slow night , combining for just 27 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting . On Friday , Houston will host the New_York Knicks while the Clippers will play the Lakers .

The Grizzlies ( 3 - 2 ) had some solid momentum coming into Saturday 's game , and they finished the contest even hotter than when they started . Memphis jumped on the Suns ( 1 - 4 ) early by building a 26 - 18 first - quarter lead , and they extended their advantage to 25 points by halftime . That essentially decided the contest , and the home squad closed things out in decisive fashion with a 30 - point fourth quarter . Both teams shot well overall , but the Grizzlies managed to coax 19 turnovers from the visitors while only committing 12 themselves . Deandre Ayton paced the Suns with 24 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , five assists and one steal . Elie Okobo followed with 12 points and two assists . The second quarter played a big part of that , with the Grizzlies outscoring the Kings , 33 - 23 . The Grizzlies ended up shooting 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range while holding the Kings to 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from long range . Memphis also dominated the turnover differential , forcing 21 turnovers from Sacramento while committing just 13 on their end . While Memphis came into this matchup as the heavy favorite , Brooklyn prevailed with yet another victory . It was close throughout though , as there were seven lead changes , with neither club leading by more than 12 points . The Nets actually tied or won all four individual quarters , as they held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Three-point shooting was huge , with Brooklyn connecting on 13 - of - 34 while holding Memphis to just 5 - of - 24 . Free-throw shooting was also critical , with the Nets hitting 24 - of - 26 and the Grizzlies connecting on just 11 - of - 15 . Bench production was also key for the Nets , as they outscored the Grizzlies bench , 51 - 20 . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 96 - 86 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . The recent form of these teams would indicate an easy win for San_Antonio but Memphis is the one who cruised to victory . In fact , the Grizzlies led for all but a few minutes , as a 42 - 31 first half really set the tone for this defensive struggle . It was Memphis ' defense who was better though , as they forced San_Antonio to shoot 36 percent from the field while winning the turnover differential , 13 - 9 . The eight blocks recorded by the Grizzlies was huge as well , as the Spurs picked up just two . Ball movement was also critical for Memphis , as they out - assisted San_Antonio , 22 - 14 . In addition , the Grizzlies doubled up the Spurs in points in the paint , 48 - 24 . The Spurs ( 24 - 18 ) had no player reach 15 points scored , as Bryn Forbes led the starters with 14 points and four rebounds . LaMarcus Aldridge went 4 - of - 12 from the field to total 13 points and seven rebounds while DeMar DeRozan went just 4 - of - 15 from the field to amass nine points , five rebounds and four assists . Marco Belinelli led the bench with 14 points . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 22 ) got a vintage performance from Marc Gasol , as he collected 26 points , 14 rebounds and three assists . Mike Conley accrued 15 points , two rebounds and six assists . JaMychal Green was huge off the bench , as he provided 12 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Shelvin Mack also played well off the bench , tallying 10 points , three rebounds and seven assists . San_Antonio will have to play again on Thursday , as they play host to the Oklahoma_City Thunder . As for Memphis , they 're off until Saturday when they travel to face the Miami Heat .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 105 - 85 , at FedEx Forum on Monday evening . The Grizzlies got out to a good start at home , with a 28 - 21 lead after on quarter . However , the Pelicans turned it up in the second , where they outscored the home team by 11 , to take a 54 - 50 lead into halftime . The Pelicans kept it up in the third , as they outscored the Grizzlies by 10 in the quarter , to expand their lead to 14 by the start of the final frame . The Pelicans held on to a double - digit cushion through the fourth , as they cruised to a much - needed win , ending a two - game slide , despite missing Anthony Davis ( finger ) . This marks the sixth straight loss for the Grizzlies . Jrue Holiday led the Pelicans with 21 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and two steals , in 38 minutes . Julius Randle followed up with 20 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and two steals , while Jahlil Okafor tallied 20 points , 10 rebounds , two blocks and one steal . The Pelicans shot 53 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Marc Gasol led the Grizzlies with 22 points , eight rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . Mike Conley followed up with 20 points , eight assists , four rebounds and four steals , while Jaren Jackson Jr. added 14 points , two rebounds , one assist and one block . The Grizzlies shot 38 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 35 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 28 ) will look to get back on track as they play host to the Hornets on Wednesday . The Pelicans ( 22 - 25 ) play host to the Pistons on Wednesday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 118 - 107 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , as the Hornets led 23 - 22 after one quarter . They kept the edge through the second , where they outscored the Grizzlies by three points , to take a 58 - 54 lead into halftime . The Hornets carried the momentum into the third quarter , where they pushed their lead to 15 , before settling on a 10 - point lead by the start of the fourth . The Grizzlies kept battling through the fourth , but the Hornets maintained a good cushion , as they held on for their seventh road win of the season . This marks the seventh straight loss for the Grizzlies . Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 22 points , seven assists , four steals and two rebounds , in 38 minutes . Nicolas Batum followed up with 18 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block , while Jeremy Lamb added 17 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Hornets shot 53 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Marc Gasol led the Grizzlies with 22 points , 17 rebounds , 10 assists and three steals , in 38 minutes . The Denver Nuggets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 95 - 92 , at FedExForum on Monday . With Monday 's contest being their third game in four days , the Nuggets ( 34 - 15 ) predictably came out flat in Memphis . As a result , it took the the home team opened on an 18 - 4 run and maintained that 14 - point through the remainder of the first quarter . The Grizzlies ( 20 - 31 ) ended up taking a 19 - point lead into halftime and still maintained a 17 - point advantage as they entered the final period . And that 's when everything went south , as the Nuggets decided to wake up and put together a huge fourth quarter . After a Justin Holiday three - pointer with just under 40 seconds left put the Grizzlies up one , All-Star Nikola Jokic countered with a 7 - foot jumper with 29 seconds left that would end up being the game - winner and cap off a brilliant comeback effort . Jokic finished with a game - high 24 points in 35 minutes , while Will Barton , who was back in the starting lineup due to the absence of Jamal Murray ( ankle ) , was close behind with 20 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting . The Nuggets ' bench as a whole did n't provide much , but Malik Beasley did have a quality night off the bench with 18 points in 24 minutes . As for Memphis , only two players managed to score in double figures in the disappointing loss , and it happened to be the team 's two veteran stars . Mark Gasol was dominant for most of Monday 's game , scoring a game - high 28 points to go along with nine rebounds in 38 minutes . Mike Conley came through with a double - double of 23 points and 11 rebounds in 37 minutes , but unfortunately for the Grizzlies , the next highest scorers were Kyle Anderson and Holiday with just nine points . On top of all that , Memphis got just 15 points from its second unit Monday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 110 - 105 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . While Memphis held the lead for the final three quarters , this game was close throughout . In fact , the Grizzlies largest lead was 11 points , as it stayed within an eight - point margin for the whole of the fourth quarter . Bench production was the difference in the game , with Memphis outscoring Los_Angeles ' bench , 33 - 7 . Rebounding was also decisive for the Grizzlies , as they won that battle , 57 - 46 . The Lakers ( 29 - 31 ) were led by Brandon Ingram , as he tallied 32 points , six rebounds and four assists . LeBron James finished with 24 points , 12 rebounds , 11 assists and three steals . Kyle Kuzma amassed 22 points , four rebounds and two assists . Reggie Bullock was the only other player on the roster with more than six points , as he totaled 14 points and four assists . The Grizzlies ( 24 - 28 ) were led by Mike Conley , as he accumulated 30 points , two rebounds and five assists . Jonas Valanciunas generated 20 points , 13 rebounds and two blocks . Avery Bradley accrued 15 points , six rebounds and three assists . Joakim Noah was huge off the bench , providing 14 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Los_Angeles playing host to the dysfunctional New_Orleans Pelicans and Memphis welcoming the Chicago Bulls to FedEx Forum .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 112 - 99 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday . While there were 12 lead changes in the first 27 minutes of this game , Memphis took control in the second half . In fact , the Grizzlies rode a 35 - 18 third quarter to victory , as that allowed them to hold a double - digit lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Defense was key for the Timberwolves , as they held the Grizzlies to 38 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . Minnesota ended up shooting 48 percent from the field and 46 percent from long range . Rim protection was also key , with the T'Wolves winning the defensive rebounding battle , 36 - 27 , while out - blocking the Grizzlies , 10 - 4 . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 115 - 103 , at FedEx Forum on Monday evening . The Grizzlies got out to a good start at home and took a 31 - 23 lead after one quarter . The Thunder responded to start the second as they rallied to take a slight lead early on . However , the Grizzlies closed the quarter strong and rebuilt to a six - point lead by halftime . The Grizzlies carried the momentum into the third , where they pushed their lead to 13 , just minutes into the quarter . The Thunder managed to stop the bleeding , and cut the deficit to eight by the end of the quarter . In the end , the home team remained in control , as the Grizzlies held a near 10 - point cushion through the fourth quarter to secure their 20th home win of the season . Bruno Caboclo led the Grizzlies with 24 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , 11 rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , in 35 minutes . Delon Wright followed up with 18 points , 13 assists , four steals and three rebounds , in 35 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas added 18 points , 14 rebounds , two blocks and an assist , while Tyler Dorsey totaled 21 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Meanwhile , Paul George led the Thunder with 30 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 38 minutes . Dennis Schroder added 25 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , in 36 minutes off the bench . Russell Westbrook finished with 16 points , seven assists and five rebounds , in 36 minutes . The Thunder shot 40 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 36 from deep . The Thunder ( 43 - 31 ) will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Pacers on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 30 - 44 ) play host to the Warriors on Wednesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 118 - 103 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies got out to a great start at home , as they were able to put together a 37 - 31 lead after one quarter . The Warriors responded in a big way in the second , as they had the game tied at 47 halfway though the quarter , and went on to outscore the hosts by six the rest of the way , to take a 66 - 60 lead into halftime . The Grizzlies did not back down and came out strong in the third to keep it a close game . The Grizz outscored the visitors by one in the quarter , to make it a five - point game going into the fourth . The Grizzlies kept pressing and tied it up at 91 , just minutes into the fourth . However , the Warriors picked it up and did not look back from there , as they went on to earn their 25th road win of the season . Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 28 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists , two blocks and a steal , in 33 minutes . Kevin Durant tallied 28 points , nine rebounds , five assists and two steals , while DeMarcus Cousins added 16 points , nine rebounds , six assists , three steals and three blocks . The Warriors shot 54 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 31 from deep . Meanwhile , Jonas Valanciunas led the Grizzlies with 27 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 32 minutes . Mike Conley tallied 22 points , eight assists and one rebound , while Bruno Caboclo added 17 points , 13 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and a steal . The Grizzlies shot 39 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 31 from deep . The Grizzlies ( 30 - 45 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Suns in Phoenix on Saturday . The Warriors ( 51 - 23 ) take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Friday .

The Warriors ( 57 - 25 ) had nothing to play for and plenty of incentive to rest key players after a more challenging - than - usual regular season . Golden_State did play both Kevin Durant and Klay Thompson after both sat out Tuesday 's game , but they were committed to keeping each under 20 minutes . The rag - tag squad fielded by the defending champs helped the Grizzlies ( 33 - 49 ) accumulate a whopping 86 first - half points . Memphis continued pouring it on in the third quarter , and only some points by the visitors in garbage time helped the final score look somewhat respectable . Durant led the way for the Warriors with 21 points , adding six assists and one steal over just 18 minutes . Thompson followed with 19 points , three assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . The Warriors now enter the Western_Conference playoffs as the top seed and face the No . 8 - seeded Los Angeles Clippers , while the Grizzlies are out of the postseason picture altogether .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 104 , at State_Farm_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Hawks ( 2 - 2 ) found themselves in some dire straits early , falling behind by a 42 - 22 margin after one quarter . While they sliced that deficit in half during a second quarter where they thrived on both ends of the court , they still faced a double - digit halftime deficit . However , Atlanta continued to have the hot hand throughout the third quarter , posting 32 points and chipping off another three points from the Mavericks ' ( 2 - 2 ) advantage . Their persistence culminated in a dominant final 12 minutes in which they outscored Dallas by a 31 - 17 margin to secure the comeback win . While neither club shot particularly well , a 10 - point advantage in free - throw accuracy for the Hawks ( 71 percent - 62 percent ) was key to the home squad 's success . Wesley Matthews paced the Mavericks with 23 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds and two assists . Luka Doncic followed with a near double - double of 21 points , nine boards , two assists , one steal and one block . Dennis Smith , Jr. contributed 16 points , seven rebounds and six assists , while DeAndre Jordan and Maxi Kleber had matching 11 - point tallies , Jordan notably also hauled in 16 rebounds . Kent Bazemore 's 32 points , which he supplemented with seven assists , three rebounds and three steals , led the Hawks . Taurean Prince mustered 24 points , four rebounds and three assists . Tre Young shot 3 - for - 12 from the field , but a 10 - for - 13 showing from the charity stripe helped lead to 17 points for the rookie . He added five assists and four rebounds . DeAndre ' Bembry pitched in an 11 - point , 16 - rebound double - double off the bench . The Mavericks remain on the road and tangle with the Toronto Raptors on Friday night , while the Hawks remain home and face the Chicago Bulls on Saturday evening .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 97 - 85 , at State_Farm_Arena on Saturday evening . The Hawks got out to a slow start , as it took them three minutes to score their first bucket , while thankfully for them , they only trailed 50 . However , the Bulls stayed strong and pushed their lead to 10 - 1 . Nonetheless , the Hawks responded with 24 - 12 run , to take a 25 - 22 lead by the end of the quarter . Things tightened up from there , as the teams stayed within two or three possessions for the length of the quarter , matching each other 's 19 points , so that the Hawks still led by three at halftime . It remained a one - possession game for most of the third quarter , until the Bulls pulled away with a 9 - 6 run , which allowed them to take a four - point lead into the fourth . The Bulls kept up the momentum and pushed their lead to 10 , just minutes into the quarter . They guarded their lead heavily from there , and did not let the Hawks get too close , as they closed out their first road win of the season . Zach LaVine led the way for the Bulls with 27 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . Jabari Parker followed up with 18 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 34 minutes off the bench . The Hawks ( 2 - 3 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Sixers in Philly on Monday . The Bulls ( 2 - 4 ) play host to the Warriors on Monday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 124 - 109 , at State_Farm_Arena on Friday . This was a dominating effort from Detroit , as they won this game in wire - to - wire fashion . The first quarter really set the tone , with Detroit outscoring Atlanta , 40 - 20 . The Pistons actually held a double - digit lead for the final three quarters , as a late run by Atlanta made the scoreline look closer than it actually was . The assist - to - turnover differential was key , with Detroit recording 13 more assists ( 30 - 17 ) than Atlanta while committing six fewer turnovers ( 16 - 10 ) . That allowed Detroit to take 18 more shots than Atlanta . Three-point shooting was also critical , with the Pistons connecting on 20 - of - 47 from long range while the Hawks hit just 7 - of - 28 . The Pistons ( 6 - 5 ) were led by Andre Drummond , as he collected 23 points , 11 rebounds and four blocks on 10 - of - 15 from the field . Reggie Bullock accrued 13 points , three rebounds and four assists . Stanley Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 22 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three steals . Blake Griffin scored just six points but still accumulated nine rebounds , nine assists and two steals . The Hawks ( 3 - 9 ) had no player reach 20 points , as Jeremy Lin led the team with 19 points , three rebounds , four assists and three steals off the bench . Trae Young led the starters with 16 points , four rebounds and five assists . Omari Spellman totaled 14 points and 10 boards . Dewayne Dedmon also played well off the bench , tallying 14 points and nine boards . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Detroit playing host to the Charlotte Hornets and Atlanta traveling to face the Los_Angeles Lakers .

The Wizards ( 11 - 14 ) came into the contest seemingly building some momentum after a forgettable start to their season . The rest of the roster helped ensure that his absence would be made up for , however , starting with Wall 's backcourt mate Bradley Beal . The sharpshooting two - guard racked up a game - high 36 points and supplemented them with nine assists , six rebounds and one steal . In fact , the Magic won each of the final three quarters by at least six points apiece , outscoring the Hawks , 94 - 72 . Orlando ended up shooting 51 percent from the field , 38 percent from three - point range and 91 percent from the free - throw line while holding Atlanta to 45 percent from the field , 30 percent from long range and 70 percent from the charity stripe . Ball movement played a big factor in that , with the Magic out - assisting the Hawks , 29 - 23 . Rim protection was also huge , with Orlando recording eight blocks and Atlanta picking up just three . The Magic ( 20 - 27 ) got another spectacular effort from Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 29 points , 14 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 119 - 101 , at Phillips Arena on Thursday . It was n't the prettiest start for the Raptors ( 40 - 16 ) , who were without star Kawhi Leonard , on Thursday , as the team came out rather flat in the opening moments and fell behind 33 - 22 after the first quarter . The Hawks ' lead grew to as much as 17 points in the first half , but Toronto was able to trim it down to eight before heading into the locker room . From there , the Raptors just poured it on the lowly Hawks , outscoring them 59 - 33 in the second half and taking home the easy victory . The young Raptors were sensational in Thursday 's game , with Pascal Siakam scoring a game - high 33 points to go along with 14 rebounds , four assists and two steals in 40 minutes . Fred VanVleet , meanwhile , was close behind with 30 points of his own on top of five rebounds and six assists . Kyle Lowry could n't get much going from the field , hitting just three of his 13 field goal attempts , but he still managed to finish with a double - double of 13 points and 13 assists on top of eight rebounds . As for the Hawks ( 18 - 36 ) , they were very efficient from downtown , going 16 - of - 35 ( 46 percent ) from behind the arc , but they just were not able to put together a strong enough defensive effort down the stretch . Trae Young and Taurean Prince led the way for Atlanta , each scoring a team - high 19 points , while John Collins was the next highest scorer with just 12 points , but he did add 12 rebounds . Dewayne Dedmon was the only other Hawks player to score in double figures with 10 points in 24 minutes .

The Hawks ( 23 - 45 ) opened the game in less than ideal form on the defensive side of the ball , allowing the Pelicans ( 30 - 39 ) to forge an early 33 - 26 first - quarter lead . However , Atlanta gathered itself from that point forward and went on to outscore New_Orleans in each of the subsequent three periods . The visitors did get to within six at the 8:1 mark of the fourth quarter , but the home squad finished on a 25 - 19 run from that point forward to secure the win . The Houston Rockets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 121 - 105 , at State_Farm_Arena on Tuesday evening . While Atlanta ( 24 - 48 ) hung tight for much of the game , Houston ( 45 - 26 ) ultimately gained an edge thanks to its superior offensive play . After knocking down 21 three - pointers in their last outing , the Rockets impressed with another 19 makes from deep in Tuesday 's win . For the second straight game , too , both James Harden and Chris Paul tallied double digits in the assist column . Everything seemed to be going right for the Rockets , making it difficult for the Hawks to keep up despite their 15 made three - pointers . On top of his 10 assists , Harden scored a game - high 31 points . With that , Harden is the first player since Michael Jordan in 1987 to score 30 points against every team in a single season . It was just another notch in the belt of an already historic season for Harden , who is leading the league in scoring at 36 points per game . The Rockets also saw 26 points and 11 rebounds from Clint Capela . Danuel House pitched in another 19 points in a true top - to - bottom effort for the surging team . Budding star Trae Young led the way for Atlanta , scoring 21 points while dishing out 12 assists . It was Young 's fourth straight game scoring 20 or more . John Collins added another 20 points and 10 rebounds for the Hawks . Houston faces the second half of a back - to - back as it visits Memphis on Wednesday . The Hawks , meanwhile , will host the Utah Jazz on Thursday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 117 - 114 , at State_Farm_Arena on Thursday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , as the teams traded the lead through the first quarter , before the Hawks took a 29 - 28 lead into the second . The Hawks turned it up in the second , as they started the quarter on a 13 - 5 run . The Hawks led for the entire quarter and took an 11 - point lead into halftime . The Jazz turned the tables in the third quarter , as they rallied to tie it up at 71 , halfway through the quarter . The Jazz went on to outscore the Hawks by 16 points in the quarter , to take a five - point lead into the fourth . The Hawks started chipping away to start the fourth and made it a one - point game with just over seven minutes to go . The Jazz responded and pulled ahead by a couple of possessions , however , the Hawks outscored the visitors 19 - 8 through the final five minutes , to snap a three - game losing streak . For the Jazz , it marks the end of a five - game winning streak . Trae Young led the Hawks with 23 points , 11 assists and two rebounds , in 34 minutes . Dewayne Dedmon followed up with 18 points , nine rebounds , three blocks and two assists , while Kevin Heurter added 14 points , two assists and a rebound . The Hawks shot 47 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 40 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 34 points , four rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal , in 35 minutes . Derrick Favors added 15 points , 15 rebounds , two steals , a block and an assist , while Ricky Rubio tallied 17 points , seven assists , five rebounds and two steals . The Jazz shot 43 - of - 94 from the field , including 10 - of - 32 from deep . The Jazz ( 42 - 30 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Saturday . The Hawks ( 25 - 48 ) play host to the 76ers on Saturday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 118 - 98 , at State_Farm_Arena on Friday evening . The Trail_Blazers ( 48 - 27 ) have n't been anywhere near the same team on the road this season , but early indications Friday were that things would be different versus the Hawks ( 27 - 49 ) . Portland amassed 60 first - half points and held a nine - point advantage at halftime . Their steady play throughout the second half ensured Atlanta would be kept at bay , as the visitors tacked 11 more points onto their lead over the final two periods . The Blazers ' most impressive edge may have been on the boards , as they out - rebounded the home squad by a 55 - 41 margin . Damian Lillard led the way for the Trail_Blazers with 36 points , adding seven assists and three rebounds . Al-Farouq Aminu generated a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a block . Enes Kanter furnished 14 points , eight rebounds and one block . Seth Curry poured in 12 points to lead the bench . Jake Layman and Zach Collins posted matching nine - point tallies , with Collins also hauling in nine boards . Trae Young paced the Hawks with 26 points , supplmenting them with nine rebounds , seven assists and one steal . John Collins collected 20 points , three assists , two rebounds and two blocks . Kyle Huerter totaled 11 points , four rebounds and four assists . Vince Carter led the second unit with nine points and also brought down three rebounds and recorded one steal . The Trail_Blazers next pay a visit to the Detroit Pistons on Saturday night , while the Hawks remain home and tangle with the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday afternoon .
The Miami Heat defeated the New_York Knicks , 110 - 87 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Wednesday evening . Despite the lopsided final score in favor of the home squad , it was the Knicks ( 1 - 4 ) that looked like the early favorite for a blowout win . New_York held a 27 - 16 lead after one quarter , but the Heat ( 2 - 2 ) quickly erased their deficit with a 31 - 18 advantage in the second period . Their dominance only expanded coming out of intermission , as they compiled 45 points while limiting their visitors to 20 in a decisive third period that essentially put the game away . As the final score implies , Miami won the battle on the stat sheet in the majority of categories , and they out - shot the Knicks by a 48 percent - 36 percent margin . Dewayne Dotson paced the Knicks with 20 points from the bench , a total he supplemented with 10 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Tim Hardaway , Jr. poured in 14 points and added three rebounds and two assists . Mario Hezonja was the only other double - digit scorer with 13 points . Enes Kanter logged only 19 minutes on his way to an eight - point , five - rebound night . Hassan Whiteside led the Heat with a 22 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks . Josh Richardson supplied 21 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . Rodney McGruder drew another start and posted 19 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal . Goran Dragic pitched in 13 points , five rebounds and three assists . Kelly Olynyk poured in 11 points , dished out six assists , hauled in three rebounds and recorded one steal . The Knicks head back home and await a visit from the Golden_State Warriors on Friday night , while the Heat are also home for their next game , a Saturday night matchup versus the Portland Trail_Blazers .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the host Miami Heat , 123 - 113 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Monday . While Miami came into this game as a sizable favorite , Sacramento rode some elite offense to a road win . In fact , the Kings connected on 50 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range while recording 28 assists . Despite the fact the Heat led by 11 points after the first quarter , the Kings ended up outscoring them , 77 - 55 , in the second and third quarters . Sacramento absolutely dominated down low , outscoring the Heat in the paint , 68 - 38 . Turnovers were also key for the Kings , as they forced 19 turnovers from the Heat while committing just 12 on their end . The Kings ( 4 - 3 ) were led by Willie Cauley-Stein , as he tallied 26 points and 13 rebounds . Buddy Hield finished with 23 points , eight rebounds , five assists and two steals . De'Aaron Fox accrued 20 points , four rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Nemanja Bjelica generated 19 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Heat ( 3 - 3 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he collected 31 points , three rebounds , two steals and three blocks . Goran Dragic accumulated 20 points , five assists and two steals . Hassan Whiteside finished with 16 points , 24 rebounds , two steals and five blocks . Tyler Johnson led the bench with 11 points , four rebounds and four assists . Both teams play road games on Tuesday for their next outing , with Sacramento playing the Orlando Magic and Miami facing the Charlotte Hornets .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Miami Heat , 110 - 102 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Friday evening . The game was a tale of two halves , with the short - handed Heat ( 5 - 6 ) forging a 59 - 51 first - half lead despite playing without Goran Dragic ( knee ) . However , the Pacers ( 8 - 5 ) turned it on coming out of intermission despite seeing Thaddeus Young get ejected for elbowing Kelly Olynyk after playing just 17 minutes . Indiana outscored Miami by a 59 - 43 margin over the final 24 minutes and excelled on both ends of the floor . The Pacers shot a stellar 54 percent from the floor while also eliciting 23 turnovers from their hosts . Both benches thrived in the contest , with the Indiana second unit generating 44 points and the Miami reserves posting 48 . Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 22 points , a total he supplemented with 10 assists , five rebounds and four steals . Darren Collison and Domantas Sabonis turned in 17 points each , with the latter also supplying 11 rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 16 points , while Cory Joseph turned in 14 points , five rebounds and two assists in 32 minutes . Olynyk paced the Heat with 20 points and added four boards and two assists . Josh Richardson shifted to point guard with Dragic out and produced 18 points , six assists and two steals . Tyler Johnson supplied 15 points , five assists , two rebounds and one block . Hassan Whiteside posted an 11 - point , 20 - rebound double - double . Justise Winslow and Rodney McGruder managed 11 points and five assists apiece . The Pacers remain on the road and head to the Lone Star State , where they 'll tangle with the Houston Rockets on Sunday night . The Heat remains home and faces the Washington Wizards on Saturday evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Miami Heat , 105 - 90 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Tuesday . While Miami led for the majority of the first half , Orlando dominated in the second half . The third quarter was the difference , as the Magic outscored the Heat , 30 - 12 . That allowed Orlando to lead by at least five points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . The Magic 's defense was key , as they held the Heat to 42 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range . Orlando was lights out from long distance , hitting 14 - of - 28 of their three 's . Getting to the free - throw line was also critical , with the Magic hitting 15 - of - 20 and Miami connecting on just 2 - of - 5 . The Magic ( 12 - 12 ) were led by Aaron Gordon , as he collected 20 points , 13 rebounds and five assists . Nikola Vucevic finished with 19 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Terrence Ross was a huge spark off the bench , as he provided 19 points , three rebounds and three assists . Evan Fournier , Jonathan Isaac and D.J . Augustin all scored between 11 and 13 points as well . The Heat ( 9 - 14 ) had no player score more than 14 points , as Justise Winslow led the team with 14 points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks off the bench . Hassan Whiteside led the starters with 12 points , nine rebounds and three blocks on 6 - of - 7 shooting . Kelly Olynyk also played well off the bench , totaling 13 points , six rebounds and two assists . Josh Richardson had a nightmare game , as he accrued six points , four rebounds and five assists on 2 - of - 14 from the field . On deck for Orlando is a home matchup versus the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday . As for Miami , they 'll travel to play the Phoenix Suns on Saturday for their next outing .
The Miami Heat defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 112 - 108 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday . While there were only seven ties and five lead changes in this game , it came down to the wire . In fact , this game was within a four - point margin for the final eight minutes of play . With that said , Miami either held the lead or were tied for the entirety of the second half . The Heat 's offense was on point , as they shot 50 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range while holding the Grizzlies to 48 percent from the field and 31 percent from long range . Ball movement played a huge factor in that , with Miami out - assisting Memphis , 25 - 18 . Bench production was also big , with Miami having four bench players reach double figures in scoring while Memphis had just two . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 23 ) were led by Mike Conley , as he tallied 22 points , three rebounds , seven assists and three steals . JaMychal Green was huge off their bench , providing 24 points and 11 rebounds . Marc Gasol finished with 15 points , five rebounds , five assists and two blocks while Jaren Jackson accrued 13 points , five rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks . The Heat ( 21 - 20 ) were led by Justise Winslow , as he collected 26 points , seven rebounds and four assists on 10 - of - 16 from the field . Josh Richardson accumulated 14 points , six rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Bam Adebayo started and totaled 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Tyler Johnson , Kelly Olynyk , Derrick Jones Jr. and Dwyane Wade all reached double figures in scoring off the bench . On deck for Memphis is a road matchup versus the scorching - hot Houston Rockets on Monday . As for Miami , they 're off until Tuesday when they travel to face the equally hot Milwaukee Bucks .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Miami Heat , 105 - 89 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Wednesday . While Miami came into this game as a sizable favorite , Chicago dominated them in this surprising upset . What 's even more shocking is the fashion of the win , with the Bulls leading for nearly 40 minutes of this game . They did most of their damage in the first , third and fourth quarters , outscoring Miami , 86 - 62 . The shooting disparity was key , with Chicago shooting 51 percent from the field while holding Miami to just 38 percent shooting . Much of that can be attributed to scoring down low , with the Bulls outscoring the Heat in the paint , 48 - 36 . The Bulls ( 12 - 40 ) were without Zach LaVine ( ankle ) for this game but picked up just their second win in their last 16 games . Bobby Portis was their best player , as he provided 26 points and four rebounds on 10 - of - 17 shooting off the bench , Wayne Selden Jr. led the starters with 20 points , two rebounds and eight assists . Kris Dunn accrued 14 points , five rebounds , eight assists and two steals while Lauri Markkanen finished with 14 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . The Heat ( 24 - 25 ) were led by Tyler Johnson , as he provided 15 points , three rebounds and two assists off the bench . Justise Winslow led the starters with 14 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . On deck for Miami is a home matchup versus the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Friday . As for Chicago , they return to action on Saturday when they play the Charlotte Hornets on the road .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Miami Heat , 118 - 102 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Friday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for Oklahoma_City , they won this game in dominating fashion . In fact , a 31 - 24 first quarter really set the tone , with a 41 - 29 second quarter sealing the victory . The Thunder actually led by at least 15 points for the entirety of the second half . Three-point shooting was the key difference , with Oklahoma_City hitting 16 - of - 30 and Miami connecting on 11 - of - 36 . The Thunder also dominated in transition , winning the fastbreak differential , 23 - 8 . The Thunder ( 33 - 18 ) were led by Paul George , as he tallied 43 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Russell Westbrook collected 14 points , 12 rebounds and 14 assists . Steven Adams accrued 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder was huge off the bench , as he provided 28 points on 11 - of - 13 from the field . The Heat ( 24 - 26 ) were led by Kelly Olynyk , as he provided 21 points , seven rebounds and two assists off the bench . Josh Richardson led the starters with 18 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Hassan Whiteside amassed 12 points and 16 rebounds . Justise Winslow finished with 10 points , two rebounds and five assists . Oklahoma_City returns to action on Sunday , as they travel to face the Boston Celtics . As for Miami , they play host to the struggling Indiana Pacers on Saturday for their next outing .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Miami Heat , 124 - 121 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Monday . The Heat ( 26 - 32 ) headed into halftime with a fairly comfortable 11 - point lead after scoring 63 points over the first 24 minutes , but the visiting Suns ( 11 - 50 ) wasted no time making their comeback in the second half . And after scoring 40 points in the final quarter and some timely free throws in the closing minutes , Phoenix was able to walk away with the upset victory . Seven different Suns players would score in double figures Monday , and the team managed to torch Miami 's defense , shooting 41 percent from behind the arc and 51 percent from the field overall . Devin Booker , who hit what ended up being the game - winning free throws with 17 seconds remaining , led the way with a team - high 20 points and nine assists in 33 minutes , while former Heat player Tyler Johnson , who was traded to Phoenix at the trade deadline , was close behind with 18 points of his own . In the end , it was just a complete team effort from the Suns , who recorded 30 assists on their 45 made field goals to just 14 turnovers . As for the Heat , their shocking home struggles continue , as they dropped to 11 - 17 on their home floor this season and have now lost five of their last six games . Miami did , however , get stellar play out of their starting frontcourt , with Hassan Whiteside scoring a game - high 29 points to go along with 11 rebounds in 27 minutes and Kelly Olynyk posting 28 points and 10 rebounds of his won in 41 minutes . However , for the Heat , offensive production was not the problem , as they simply could not string together stops in the second half against this lowly Suns team . It was the second game in a row that Miami gave up more than 115 points in a game .
The Miami Heat defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 114 - 113 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Monday . Neither team won any individual quarter by more than a single point , as this game was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , there were 12 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . Atlanta actually nearly came back , as they finished the game on an 11 - 3 run but Miami ran out the clock in the final seconds thanks to some smart passing . The shooting disparity was key , with Miami shooting 56 percent from the field while holding Atlanta to just 42 percent shooting . Rim protection was key for the Heat , as they out - blocked the Hawks , 7 - 2 . Miami ended up outscoring Atlanta in the paint , 56 - 38 while outscoring them in fastbreak scoring , 16 - 4 . The Hawks ( 22 - 43 ) were led by Kent Bazemore , as he tallied 18 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Dewayne Dedmon accrued 14 points , six rebounds , two assists and three steals . Trae Young tallied 14 points , three rebounds and eight assists . Vince Carter led the bench with 21 points and four rebounds . The Heat ( 29 - 34 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he accumulated 19 points , five rebounds and five assists . Justise Winslow collected 18 points , five rebounds , three assists and three steals . The Miami Heat defeated the Detroit Pistons , 108 - 74 , on Wednesday at AmericanAirlines Arena . From start to finish Wdnesday night , it was a dominate defensive effort from the Heat ( 32 - 35 ) , as they did n't give an already - struggling Detroit team an inch on that end of the floor and held them to a season - low 75 points . They were able to do so primarily with turnovers , with five different players recording two steals . Miami still , however , put up a complete offensive performance to go along with it . Seven different Heat players scored in double figures , with Justise Winslow 's 16 points leading the way . Dion Waiters was close behind with 14 points of his own , while Hassan Whiteside and Josh Richardson each added 13 . As a team , Miami shot a respectable 39 percent from behind the arc and 46 percent from the floor overall . The Pistons ( 34 - 33 ) , on the other hand , could n't put anywhere near a complete performance on offense , and it was the second straight game the team failed to score more than 75 points . It was n't off to a horrible start for Detroit , as the team scored 49 points in the first half , but the offense shut down over the final 24 minutes , scoring eight points in the third quarter and 17 in the fourth . The Pistons shot an abysmal 36 percent from the floor and turned the ball over 17 times . Blake Griffin was the team 's high scorer with just 13 points and only two others reached double digits .
The Miami Heat defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 122 - 99 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Tuesday night . The Heat ( 39 - 42 ) had no shortage of motivation coming into Tuesday 's contest , needing a victory to keep their faint playoff hopes alive and also knowing that the contest would serve as Dwyane Wade 's last home game if the postseason did end up out of their reach . Meanwhile , the short - handed 76ers ( 50 - 31 ) were sitting Joel Embiid ( knee/rest ) and J.J. Redick ( back ) . With all of those factors lining up in their favor , Miami took full advantage , building a 61 - 42 halftime advantage that essentially made the second half a formality . The home squad shot an impressive 53 percent , with Wade fittingly leading the way with 30 points . Greg Monroe led the way for the 76ers with 18 points , adding five rebounds and two assists . Ben Simmons registered 16 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Jonathon Simmons furnished 14 points , eight assists , two rebounds and three steals . Boban Marjanovic delivered 12 points , five boards , two assists and two steals . Zhaire Smith finished with 11 points , two rebounds and two assists . Bam Adebayo followed Wade with 19 points and complemented them with nine rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Justise Winslow totaled 16 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block . Hassan Whiteside pitched in 15 points , nine rebounds , four blocks and two steals . Goran Dragic mustered just six points but dished out 13 assists , brought down three rebounds and recorded one steal . The 76ers head back home to face the Chicago Bulls in their season finale on Wednesday night , while the Heat travel to Brooklyn to try and secure one more victory against the Nets on Wednesday evening as well .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 113 - 102 , at Spectrum_Center on Tuesday evening . The Hornets ( 6 - 5 ) and the Hawks ( 3 - 7 ) locked horns for the first time this season and while the Hawks looked surprisingly good during the first two quarters , eventually the Hornets tightened things up on defense and that was enough to give them their sixth win of the 2018 - 19 season , while moving them up one game over .500 . Atlanta jumped to a 25 - 23 lead after the first quarter and finished the first half on top by three points ( 54 - 51 ) , but the Hornets delivered an impressive second - half effort to secure a strong win in front of their crowd . A 30 - 23 third quarter put Charlotte up by four heading into the final 12 minutes of action , and they did n't look back since a 32 - 25 win during the final 12 minutes was enough to close the game out with ease . Kemba Walker was the biggest scoring threat for the Hornets in this game since he finished with 29 points , but he also added seven assists , three rebounds and three steals . Marvin Williams contributed with 20 points and eight boards , Jeremy Lamb added 13 points , and Nicolas Batum filled the stat sheet with 10 points , five rebounds and four assists . Jeremy Lin led all Hawks in this game with 19 points coming off the bench , and he also added two assists and two steals in only 18 minutes of action . Trae Young had a double - double of 18 points and 10 assists , but he went 0 - for - 7 from three - point range . Kent Bazemore contributed with 16 points and Alex Len added 12 with three boards .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 122 - 119 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday evening . The 76ers got out to a great start on the road , with a quick 12 - 4 lead , and went on to pour in 42 points in the first quarter , while holding the Hornets to 30 . The Hornets picked up the defense in the second , as they held the 76ers to 21 points , and outscored the visitors by five in the quarter . The Hornets carried the momentum into the third , where they jumped ahead with a 12 - 3 run , to take the lead . The Sixers stayed tough , but the Hornets outscored them by 11 in the quarter , to take an 86 - 82 lead into the fourth . The 76ers remained relentless , as they fought their way to take a one - point lead , five minutes into the quarter . They kept pressing and pushed their lead to 10 , with four minutes left . However , the Hornets rallied back as Kemba Walker hit two free throws just in time to tie it up at 110 , and send the game to overtime . Walker was on fire for the Hornets as he finished the night with 60 points , however his performance was negated by a wild sequence of events in overtime , where Jimmy Butler decided the game with a block , followed by the game - winning three , with 0 seconds left . Joel Embiid led the 76ers with 33 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and a steal , in 40 minutes . Ben Simmons followed up with 23 points , 11 rebounds , nine assists and two steals , while J.J. Redick tallied 23 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting . Butler finished with just 15 points , but they came at just the right time Meanwhile , Walker 's 60 points came on an impressive 21 - of - 34 shooting effort , in 45 minutes of action . Jeremy Lamb followed up with 20 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Cody Zeller tallied 10 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . The Hornets ( 7 - 8 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Celtics on Monday . The 76ers ( 11 - 7 ) play host to the Suns on Monday .

The shooting disparity really decided things , with the Hornets shooting 47 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range while holding the Bucks to 41 percent from the field and 35 percent from long range .
