The New_York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 126 - 124 , in overtime at Spectrum_Center on Friday evening . Knowing the track record of the two teams , the Hornets ' ( 14 - 14 ) body of work on their home court and the fact Charlotte jumped out to a 33 - 16 first - quarter lead , the final outcome would have been extremely difficult to envision after the first 12 minutes . However , the Knicks ( 9 - 21 ) refused to lay down , beginning their comeback with a 37 - point haul in the second quarter and continuing with a 48 - 31 second - half advantage that sent the game into overtime . In the extra period , New_York managed to pull ahead by a 126 - 121 margin with 17 seconds remaining , and a Kemba Walker misfire on a jumper at the buzzer sealed the win for the Knicks . Emmanuel Mudiay paced the Knicks with 34 points , a total he supplemented with eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . Kevin Knox provided 20 points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Noah Vonleh generated a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that included seven assists and one block . Enes Kanter matched Vonleh 's scoring total and hauled in eight boards . Luke Kornet led the bench with 13 points and added six rebounds . Tim Hardaway , Jr. turned in 12 points . Nicolas Batum and Cody Zeller co - led the Hornets with 21 - point efforts . Batum also dished out seven assists and hauled in six rebounds , while Zeller hauled in 13 rebounds . Marvin Williams posted 20 points and five boards . Walker delivered 16 points , 10 assists , seven rebounds and one steal . Jeremy Lamb matched his scoring total and also managed nine rebounds and five assists . The Knicks next pay a visit to the Indiana Pacers on Sunday afternoon , while the Hornets remain home to face the Los_Angeles Lakers on Saturday evening .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 99 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . This was a tale of two halves , as Cleveland held the lead for the entirety of the first half while Charlotte held the lead for the majority of the second half . In fact , the Cavaliers rode a 25 - 16 first quarter to that lead but the Hornets responded with a 41 - 29 third quarter to take control . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Charlotte outrebounding Cleveland , 51 - 35 . The Hornets ended up shooting 51 percent from the field while holding Cleveland to 48 percent shooting . The Hornets did a ton of damage down low , outscoring the Cavaliers in the paint , 60 - 42 . The Cavaliers ( 8 - 24 ) leading scorer came off the bench , as Jordan Clarkson led the team with 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Cedi Osman led the starters with 13 points , two rebounds and two assists . Larry Nance Jr. was their best player , collecting 10 points , 15 rebounds , seven assists and two steals . The Hornets ( 15 - 15 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 30 points , three rebounds , six assists and two steals . Marvin Williams amassed 18 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Jeremy Lamb accrued 18 points , 12 rebounds and five assists . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist was a nice spark off the bench , providing 12 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . On deck for Charlotte is a home matchup versus the Detroit Pistons on Friday . Cleveland also returns to action on Friday , as they travel to play the Toronto Raptors .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 101 - 92 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday . While Charlotte came into this game as a sizable favorite , it took five ties and 10 lead changes to determine a winner . The Hornets took control in the fourth quarter though , outscoring the Knicks , 30 - 21 . Offensive rebounding was huge for Charlotte , as they outrebounded New_York , 14 - 7 . Ball movement was also decisive , with the Hornets out - assisting the Knicks , 25 - 19 . Charlotte 's bench was probably the difference though , as they outscored New_York 's bench , 53 - 37 . The Knicks ( 10 - 39 ) were led by Kevin Knox , as he amassed 19 points and three rebounds . Tim Hardaway Jr. finished with 17 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Noah Vonleh accrued five points , 12 rebounds and two assists . No other player on the roster reached double figures in scoring , rebounding or assists . The Hornets ( 24 - 25 ) were led by Jeremy Lamb , as he collected 15 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Kemba Walker amassed 14 points , five rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Four players reached double figures in scoring off the bench , with Tony Parker leading the way with 15 points and four assists . Wily Hernangomez tallied 11 points and 11 rebounds off the bench as well . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Charlotte traveling to face the surging Boston Celtics and New_York playing host to the Dallas Mavericks .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 100 - 92 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday evening . The Grizzlies ( 20 - 33 ) came into the contest with a significant personnel shortage , as Mike Conley ( knee ) , Garrett Temple ( shoulder ) , Kyle Anderson ( shoulder ) , Jaren Jackson , Jr. ( quadriceps ) and Omri Casspi ( knee ) were all out of action . However , that did n't stop Memphis from surprisingly ambushing the home - court Hornets ( 25 - 26 ) by a 29 - 17 margin over the first 12 minutes . Charlotte did bounce back in strong form in the second , leading to a 45 - 45 halftime deadlock . After both teams virtually matched each other bucket for bucket in the third , the hosts went on a 30 - 19 run over the final 12 minutes to clinch victory . Shelvin Mack paced the Grizzlies with 19 points , adding nine assists , one rebound and two steals . Ivan Rabb and Justin Holiday contributed matching 15 - point efforts while hauling in five and four rebounds , respectively . Joakim Noah contributed a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double off the bench that also featured two assists and one block . JaMychal Green matched Noah 's scoring tally and also posted three rebounds . Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 23 points while also supplying four assists and three rebounds . Malik Monk poured in 20 points and added three boards and one block . Marvin Williams registered 16 points , four rebounds and one steal . Tony Parker turned in 15 points and dished out seven assists . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist delivered 10 points , four rebounds , one steal and one block . The Grizzlies remain on the road and pay a visit to the New_York Knicks on Sunday afternoon , while the Hornets remain home and face the Chicago Bulls on Saturday night .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 121 - 110 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday evening . The Warriors ( 43 - 17 ) came into the contest looking to bounce back from a rather surprising home loss to a James Harden-less Rockets squad on Saturday night . They got off to a solid start in that regard , racking up 68 first - half points on their way to an eight - point halftime advantage . Golden_State then turned on their defense in the second half , holding the Hornets ( 28 - 32 ) to 22 points in the final 12 minutes to ensure the victory . The visitors outpaced their hosts in both shooting ( 50 percent to 44 percent ) and rebounds ( 49 to 38 ) . Klay Thompson led the way for the Warriors with 26 points , supplementing them with five assists and two rebounds . DeMarcus Cousins generated a 24 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , three blocks and one steal . Kevin Durant contributed 20 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . Stephen Curry endured a rough shooting night , draining just five of 18 attempts on his way to 16 points . He added six assists , five rebounds and four steals . Draymond Green overcame a mild ankle sprain that he 'd suffered Saturday to post a 14 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included eight rebounds , three blocks and one steal . Cody Zeller paced the Hornets with 28 points , adding nine rebounds , two assists , three steals and three blocks . Kemba Walker supplied 23 points , six assists and three rebounds . Jeremy Lamb paced the second unit with 16 points and also pitched in seven assists , five rebounds , four steals and one block . Nicolas Batum turned in 14 points , six assists , five rebounds , three steals and one block . Marvin Williams tallied 11 points , four boards and one block . The Warriors remain on the road and tangle with the Miami Heat on Wednesday night , while the Hornets remain home to tangle with the Houston Rockets on Wednesday evening as well .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 118 - 108 , at Spectrum_Center on Sunday . The Trail_Blazers ( 39 - 24 ) and the Hornets ( 29 - 34 ) played a surprisingly tight encounter although judging how the game happened , the Blazers always looked on top of the game . Portland jumped to a 32 - 25 lead in the first quarter and they were set to cruise their way , but Charlotte responded and won both the second and third quarters , 25 - 24 and 30 - 25 , so the fourth quarter began with a one - point differential . But the Blazers stepped it up and closed things out with a strong 37 - 28 period that gave the Western_Conference franchise their sixth win in their last seven games . Damian Lillard had a strong game for the Blazers and filled the stat sheet admirably , since he ended with 23 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . However , the best player was Jusuf Nurkic since he ended with 26 points , 15 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Al-Farouq Aminu had 14 points with six rebounds and four dimes . Rodney Hood impressed and was the top scorer despite coming off the bench thanks to his 27 points . Kemba Walker delivered a double - double thanks to 18 points and 12 rebounds in this game , but it was n't enough for the Hornets . Miles Bridges was the only other starter who scored in double digits since he had 10 points , but most of the offense came through the bench . Jeremy Lamb led the way with 23 points , while Frank Kaminsky had 18 points with seven boards . Tony Parker added 14 points with five assists .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 113 - 106 , at Spectrum_Center on Thursday evening . The Timberwolves ( 32 - 40 ) came into Thursday 's contest looking to essentially play spoiler to a Hornets ( 32 - 39 ) squad still hanging on to hopes of an eighth seed in the Eastern_Conference . Minnesota was effective in its mission , matching Charlotte bucket for bucket in the first and trailing by only three at the half . After another deadlock in the third , the Hornets finally opened up a 10 - point lead with 1:42 remaining . Despite a modest late surge by the visitors , the hosts were able to hold off them off for the win . Karl-Anthony Towns paced the Timberwolves with a 21 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , two blocks and one steal . Andrew Wiggins delivered 20 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Dario Saric posted 15 points , seven rebounds and one assist . The Timberwolves next pay a visit to the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday night , while the Hornets remain home to face the Boston Celtics on Saturday evening as well .

The second stayed close until Jazz turned up the heat with an 18 - 8 run , to take an 81 - 69 lead into halftime . Utah was able to maintain a good cushion through most of the third , but the Warriors closed the quarter strong and cut the deficit to just six , heading into the fourth . The Jazz pushing their lead back to double digits early in the fourth , however the Warriors used an 110 run midway through the quarter to take a 112 - 111 lead . The game went back and forth down the stretch , until the Jazz led 123 - 122 with 6 seconds left and Warriors ball . The Warriors went to Kevin Durant who missed a foul - line jumper , but Jonas Jerebko was right there for a put - back layup to help the Warriors steal one in Utah . Kevin Durant led the way for Golden_State , with 38 points , nine rebounds , seven assists , one steal and a block , in 39 minutes . The Sacramento Kings defeated the Utah Jazz , 119 - 110 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday evening . Two of the league 's more notable second - year players squared off in Wednesday 's contest , as both Donovan Mitchell and De'Aaron Fox delivered impressive performances to lead their respective teams . For Sacramento ( 10 - 8 ) , Fox was at the center of the win , dishing out 13 assists and scoring 17 points . His strong facilitation helped contribute to an excellent offensive night for the Kings . They finished the game shooting 53 percent from the field . Utah ( 8 - 10 ) , on the other hand , shot only 43 percent in the loss , but kept the game close by making it to the free - throw line 31 times on the night . While Fox 's double - double helped propel the Kings to victory , a number of other players also had big performances . Willie Cauley-Stein shot 11 - of - 15 on his way to a team - high 23 points . Nmanja Bjelica finished with 18 points and seven rebounds , while rookie big man Marvin Bagley III impressed on the defensive end , blocking two shots and grabbing two steals . Utah , meanwhile , saw 35 points from Donovan Mitchell . Mitchell shot 13 - of - 22 , but his big night was not enough to earn his team a win . Rudy Gobert added 13 points and 15 rebounds , while Joe Ingles had 12 points and seven assists . The Jazz will visit the Los_Angeles Lakers on Friday , while the Kings will take a short trip to face the Golden_State Warriors at Oracle_Arena on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz blew out the Houston Rockets , 118 - 91 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Thursday Evening . Utah ( 13 - 13 ) seemed unhindered by the ejection of its star player in the first quarter . Reigning Defensive Player of the Year Rudy Gobert was ejected less than three minutes into the game after he slapped a water cup off the scorer 's table in frustration following a foul call . Despite Gobert 's absence , Utah earned its most commanding win of the season . In addition to a strong offensive night , the Jazz held Houston ( 11 - 13 ) to just 56 points through three quarters . The Rockets looked like a different team than the one that boasted the number one offense in basketball last season . Houston shot just 40 percent from the field on the night . The Jazz were led by a stellar performance from Derrick Favors , who scored 24 points and pulled down 10 rebounds . Six players scored in double figures in the win , and the team as a whole shot 51 percent from the floor . Joe Ingles dropped 18 points and grabbed two steals to help in what was an overall dominant night for the Jazz . Houston , meanwhile , saw an uncharacteristically poor night from reigning MVP James Harden . Harden shot 4 - of - 15 from the field , tallying just 13 points and committing seven turnovers . Chris Paul , too , struggled to make anything work , committing five turnovers while notching only four assists . All in all , it was a night that the Rockets will surely hope to soon forget . Next up for the Jazz is a trip to San_Antonio on Sunday evening . Houston , meanwhile , will return to Texas to square off with the Mavericks in Dallas on Saturday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Utah Jazz , 107 - 106 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . The Jazz got out to a strong start at home with a six - point lead after one quarter . They pushed their lead to double digits early in the second , but the Thunder were able to rally back and cut the deficit to just three , as they trailed 61 - 58 at halftime . The Thunder carried the momentum into the third , where they outscored the home team by 15 , to take a 93 - 81 lead into the final frame . The Jazz kept fighting and managed to make it at four - point game with two minutes remaining . The Thunder did not score in the final two minutes of the game but were able to slip away with the one - point win . This marks the fourth straight win for the Thunder and the end of a two - game winning streak for Utah . Paul George led the Thunder with 43 points , 14 rebounds , six assists , five steals and one block , in 40 minutes . Steven Adams followed up with 15 points , 10 rebounds , one steal and one block , while Jerami Grant added 15 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and a steal . Russell Westbrook finished with eight points , 12 rebounds , nine assists and three steals . Meanwhile , Rudy Gobert tallied 20 points , 10 rebounds and one block , in 34 minutes for the Jazz . Donovan Mitchell added 20 points , nine rebounds , six assists and one steal , while Ricky Rubio finished with 12 points , 14 assists , seven rebounds and three steals . The Jazz shot 45 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range . The Jazz ( 16 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Trail_Blazers on Tuesday . The Thunder ( 21 - 10 ) play host to the Timberwolves on Sunday .

The Sixers carried the momentum into the third , where they outscored the Jazz by 11 to expand their lead to 16 at the start of the fourth quarter . The Jazz put up a fight in the fourth but it was not enough to make a dent in the deficit , as the 76ers held on for their seventh road win of the season . The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 129 - 97 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday . Results like this can usually be deceiving by the lopsided scoreline but that was n't the case here with this dominating effort by the Jazz . In fact , Utah set the tone with a 39 - 17 first quarter , as they led by at least 20 points for the final three quarters in their wire - to - wire win . Rebounding was a huge factor , with Utah winning that battle , 60 - 35 . The Jazz also connected on 55 percent of their shots while holding the Knicks to 37 percent shooting . Ball movement played a big factor in that , with Utah recording 30 assists and New_York handing out just 17 . Not to mention , the Jazz outscored the Knicks in the paint , 70 - 26 . The Knicks ( 9 - 28 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr , as he totaled 18 points and two rebounds . Luke Kornet was their best player , as he collected 14 points , six rebounds and five assists . Noah Vonleh finished with 13 points , nine rebounds and three steals . Emmanuel Mudiay amassed 13 points and five assists . The Jazz ( 18 - 19 ) got a gem from Rudy Gobert , as he accrued 25 points and 16 rebounds on 10 - of - 12 from the field . Donovan Mitchell provided 15 points , five rebounds and three assists . Dante Exum got a rare start and matched his 13 points with a career - high 13 assists . Derrick Favors generated 12 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Thabo Sefolosha led the bench with 10 points , 10 rebounds and three steals . Both teams are off until Tuesday when they face elite competition , with New_York traveling to face the Denver Nuggets and Utah playing the Toronto Raptors on the road as well .

The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 118 - 108 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday . Utah ( 50 - 31 ) secured its 50th win of the season and its 13th in its last 15 games with Tuesday 's comfortable victory . Utah shot 53 percent from the field in its final regular season home game of the season . The strong offensive showing gave the Jazz a lead for the final 18 minutes of action , making Tuesday 's win a relatively safe one for the playoff - bound team . Denver ( 53 - 28 ) was short - staffed for most of the game after big man Nikola Jokic fouled out early on in the going . Jokic had two points on 1 - of - 6 shooting before his early exit . With their loss , the Nuggets are now tied for second in the Western_Conference with the Houston Rockets . The Jazz were led by a season - high 46 points from sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell . Mitchell shot 14 - of - 26 from the field to lead Utah 's scalding - hot offensive attack . Star big man Rudy Gobert finished with 20 points and 10 rebounds , while Joe Ingles recorded another double - double with 10 points and 13 assists . Denver , meanwhile , saw 64 points from its bench unit in the tough loss . Malik Beasley recorded a team - high 25 points off the bench , while sixth man Monte Morris pitched in another 22 . Neither showing was enough for the Nuggets , who struggled at the free - throw line for the second straight game . Denver went just 14 - of - 22 at the stripe on Tuesday . Both teams will close out their regular seasons on Wednesday . Denver will host the Minnesota Timberwolves , while the Jazz will visit the Clippers in LA .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 116 - 112 , at Golden_1_Center on Friday evening . The Kings got out to a good start at home , leading , 16 - 9 , mid way through the first quarter . The Wizards pushed back , but still trailed by one , 28 - 27 , entering the second . The Wizards kept up the push in the second quarter , where they took the lead early on and held on to outscore the Kings by seven , to take a 61 - 55 lead into halftime . The Kings came out strong in the third and initiated a series of lead changes between the two teams , which ultimately led to them matching each other point - for - point in the quarter , and the Wizards carrying an 85 - 79 lead into the fourth . However , the Kings started the fourth on a 70 run to take a one - point lead just 2:30 into the quarter . After a couple more lead changes , the Kings took a one - point lead with 6:18 remaining , and quickly pushed the lead to five . Although the Wizards got within one point in the final seconds , the Kings were able to stay on top and earn the impressive home win . Nemanja Bjelica led Sacramento with 26 points , 12 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Buddy Hield followed up with 22 points , five rebounds , two assists and a block , while De'Aaron Fox tallied 18 points , nine assists , one rebound and one steal . Meanwhile , John Wall led the Wizards with 26 points , eight assists , three steals , three blocks and two rebounds , in 36 minutes . Kelly Oubre Jr. followed up with 22 points , nine rebounds , two assists , one block and a steal , while Bradley Beal tallied 21 points , five rebounds and two steals , in 39 minutes . The Kings ( 3 - 3 ) visit Miami to take on the Heat on Monday .
The visiting Toronto Raptors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 114 - 105 , at Golden_1_Center on Wednesday evening . Toronto ( 11 - 1 ) continued its early - season roll on Wednesday , comfortably defeating the Kings ( 6 - 5 ) in Sacramento . Toronto capped off a sweep of its four - game West Coast road trip with Wednesday 's win , extending its conference - best record to 11 - 1 . The Raptors saw Kawhi Leonard return to action in the game . Leonard had missed the team 's previous contest with a foot injury . Leonard took some time to find his groove in Wednesday 's win , but still managed to lead the team with 25 points . He added 11 rebounds in what was a relatively smooth win for the Raptors . All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry had another strong showing , finishing with 16 points and seven assists in the win . Serge Ibaka shot 6 - of - 10 , blocked three shots , and had a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double - double . In sum , the Raptors were firing on all cylinders , knocking down 11 three - pointers and shooting a comfortable 47 percent from the floor in the win . Sacramento was led by 24 points from big man Willie Cauley-Stein . Cauley-Stein added eight rebounds and four assists . De'Aaron Fox scored another 20 points , while rookie big man Marvin Bagley added 13 . Despite shooting 49 percent from the field , the Kings could not make it happen from three - point range , where they shot just 8 - of - 23 . Sacramento will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while Toronto will see the New_York Knicks on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 101 - 86 , at Golden_1_Center on Saturday evening . Both teams started their respective seasons heading in opposite directions , with the LeBron James-led Lakers ( 6 - 6 ) surprisingly opening with an 0 - 3 mark and the previously lowly Kings demonstrating a level of offensive efficiency that surprised the rest of the league . However , each club appears to be slowly coming back to their expected mean , with Los_Angeles now having won four out of their last five contests . Saturday , they jumped out to a 50 - 44 halftime lead with some strong first - half shooting . They were even sharper in the second half , outscoring the Kings ( 7 - 6 ) by a 51 - 42 margin on their way to a double - digit win . The Lakers limited Sacramento to 35 percent shooting and elicited 19 turnovers from them , and they also won the rebounding battle by a 59 - 50 margin . James led the way with 25 points and added seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Brandon Ingram provided 12 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Kyle Kuzma , Kentavious Caldwell-Pope and Josh Hart contributed matching 11 - point tallies . JaVale McGee supplied 10 points , eight rebounds , two blocks and one steal . De'Aaron Fox paced the Kings with 21 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Marvin Bagley III followed with a bench - leading 13 points . Buddy Hield and Willie Cauley-Stein had matching 12 - point efforts , with the latter also hauling in 12 boards . Iman Shumpert and Nemanja Bjelica underwhelmed with seven and two points , respectively . The Lakers head back home and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday evening , while the Kings remain home and take on the San_Antonio Spurs on Monday night .
The Sacramento Kings took down the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 117 - 113 , at Golden_1_Center on Monday . For much of the fourth quarter , it seemed as though Sacramento ( 9 - 8 ) had the game locked up . That changed in the final minute , though , when a last - ditch Thunder ( 10 - 6 ) run closed the gap to just one possession . After leading 113 - 104 with 37 seconds remaining , a 70 run brought OKC to within two points with just five seconds remaining . Paul George capped off the run with a heavily - contested three - pointer , but it proved to be too little too late . Sacramento was able to hit its free - throws to close out the game on the final possession . Sophomore guard De'Aaron Fox scored only six points , but made up for it with a game - high 13 assists . The bulk of Sacramento 's scoring came from Buddy Hield , who poured in 25 points , and Iman Shumpert , who had a season - high 23 in the win . Rookie big man Marvin Bagley also impressed , scoring 15 points , grabbing 11 rebounds , and blocking three shots . For the Thunder , former MVP Russell Westbrook took the floor despite a lingering ankle injury . The injury did not seem to hold him back , as he led his team with 29 points , 13 rebounds , and seven assists . George , meanwhile , scored 27 points . The team as a whole , though , was relatively inefficient , shooting just 42 percent including 29 percent from three - point range . Both teams will take to the road , with the Thunder visiting Utah on Wednesday and the Kings heading down the road to Oakland to take on Golden_State .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 117 - 113 , at Golden One Center on Thursday . This was a true tale of two halves , as Denver role a big second half to victory . In fact , Sacrament blew a 13 - point halftime lead , as the Nuggets tied the game with a 31 - 18 third quarter . The Nuggets then held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter , as they made their final five shots of the game . Rebounding was the difference for Denver , as they outrebounded Sacramento , 54 - 33 . Getting to the free - throw line was also critical , with the Nuggets hitting 21 - of - 30 and the Kings connecting on just 10 - of - 15 from the charity stripe . This win gives Denver their best start in franchise history , as they maintain the top - seed in the Western_Conference . The Nuggets ( 25 - 11 ) were led by Jamal Murray , as he scored 34 of his 36 points in the second half , adding seven rebounds and six assists to his impressive line . Nikola Jokic was just as valuable , collecting 26 points , 13 rebounds and six assists . Mason Plumlee accrued 12 points , 10 rebounds and four assists while Gary Harris led the bench with 14 points and three boards . The Kings ( 19 - 19 ) were led by Buddy Hield , as he tallied 29 points , two rebounds and two assists . Nemanja Bjelica amassed 17 points , six rebounds and three assists . De'Aaron Fox finished with 16 points , two rebounds and eight assists while Bogdan Bogdanovic led the bench with 14 points , five rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Denver playing host to the shorthanded Charlotte Hornets and Sacramento welcoming the Golden_State Warriors to Sac Town .
The Sacramento Kings blew out the Orlando Magic , 111 - 95 , at Golden Once Center on Monday evening . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Kings ( 20 - 20 ) , who jumped out to a double - digit lead in the second quarter . Only one Sacramento player logged more than 27 minutes , as the benches were emptied early in Monday 's blowout . Interior play was the key for the Kings , as they outscored the Magic ( 17 - 23 ) by a total of 64 - 24 in the paint . Sacramento shot 56 percent on shots inside the arc in the win . The Kings were led by a brilliant performance from sophomore guard De'Aaron Fox , who scored a team - high 20 points in just 23 minutes on the floor . Fox was also a menace on the defensive end , tallying five steals . It was truly a team effort for Sacramento , though , as 11 players scored and six Kings scored in double digits . Orlando , meanwhile , saw 20 points from veteran wing Terrence Ross . Ross went 5 - of - 10 from three - point range while playing just 23 minutes off the bench . Big man Nikola Vucevic also impressed , delivering an 18 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . Their best efforts were not enough , however , as the Magic shot just 37 percent from the floor as a team . The Kings will travel to Phoenix on Tuesday , while the Magic visit Utah on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 104 - 97 , at Golden_1_Center on Saturday evening . The Kings got out to a solid start at home wit a 35 - 29 lead after one quarter . The Hornets bounced back in the second , where they outscored the Kings 30 - 22 , to take a two - point lead by halftime . However , the Kings regained control in the second half , as the outscored the visitors 25 - 17 in the third quarter , to take a six - point lead into the fourth . Despite a strong push from the Hornets in the final frame , the Kings managed to stay one step ahead , and held on for their second straight win . This marks the third straight loss for Charlotte . Bogdan Bogdanovic led the Kings with 22 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , six rebounds and two assists , in 29 minutes off the bench . Buddy Hield tallied 21 points , four rebounds and three assists , while De'Aaron Fox finished with 21 points , seven rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block . The Kings shot 41 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 31 points on 11 - of - 24 shooting , four assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 33 minutes . Nicolas Batum followed up with 13 points , eight rebounds , five assists , two blocks and two steals , while Michael Kidd-Gilchrist added 11 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . The Hornets shot 41 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 36 from distance . The Hornets ( 19 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Spurs in San_Antonio on Monday . The Kings ( 22 - 21 ) play host to the Trail_Blazers on Monday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 135 - 113 , at Golden_1_Center on Wednesday . The Kings ( 26 - 25 ) let their visitors stick around for one quarter Wednesday before deciding to start pouring it on in the second quarter and never look back . After holding a one - point lead after the first 12 minutes , Sacramento went on to win the next two quarters by a total of 24 points , making for light work for one of the NBA 's most promising young teams on a Wednesday night . The most impressive part about the Kings ' win , however , was the play of their second unit , which continues to be one of the league 's best . With the starters getting a light workload in the blowout , the bench took full advantage . Seven of the eight players who saw work off the bench scored and the unit combined to score 80 of the team 's 135 points . Harry Giles lead the way off the bench with a career - high 20 points , while rookie Marvin Bagley III scored 17 and Bogdan Bogdanovic added 16 of his own . As for the Hawks ( 16 - 34 ) , they were unable to replicate the performance that lead to an impressive victory over the Clippers on Monday night . The team did shoot a respectable 35 percent from behind the arc , but Atlanta hit just 44 percent of its shots from the field overall . The biggest downfall for the Hawks , however , was their inability to take care of the basketball , as they recorded 20 turnovers Wednesday night . Trae Young was responsible for five of those turnovers , but he did have yet another impressive offensive performance , finishing with a game - high 23 points and eight assists in 29 minutes . Six other Hawks players managed to score in double figures , but none scored higher than John Collins ' 14 points in 25 minutes .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 115 - 108 , at Golden_1_Center on Saturday evening . The Kings got out to a good start at home , as they built a 32 - 26 lead after one quarter . The Sixers managed to tie it up a few times through the second quarter , but the Kings kept a step ahead , before they pulled away to lead 62 - 52 at halftime . The Kings led through the entire third quarter , however , the 76ers chipped away and cut the deficit to seven by the start of the fourth . The 76ers kept the momentum going until they held a one - point lead with 2:34 left in the game , but the Kings outscored the visitors 11 - 3 from there , to earn their second consecutive win . Buddy Hield led the Kings with 34 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . De'Aaron Fox finished with 19 points , eight assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 34 minutes , while Marvin Bagley III came up big off the bench , with 14 points , 13 rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Kings shot 46 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Jimmy Butler led the 76ers with 29 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 38 minutes . Joel Embiid tallied 29 points , 17 rebounds , four blocks , one assist and one steal , while Ben Simmons added 22 points , eight rebounds , four assists and a steal . The 76er shot 44 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 33 from long range . The 76ers ( 34 - 19 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Raptors on Tuesday . The Kings ( 27 - 25 ) play host to the Spurs on Monday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 127 - 112 , at Golden_1_Center on Monday evening . The Kings ( 28 - 25 ) wasted no time in this one , jumping out to a double - digit lead in the first quarter . Buddy Hield contributed nine points in the period , while rookie sensation Marvin Bagley III came in halfway through the quarter and put up seven quick points . Bagley 's dominance continued into the second quarter , where he made an impact with a pair of blocked shots . His absence was felt when he returned to the bench , as San_Antonio ( 32 - 23 ) briefly regained the lead at the end of the second . All-Star LaMarcus Aldridge had seven points in the final five minutes of the quarter to help close the gap . However , the Kings reopened their big lead once again in the third quarter , going on a 16 - 4 run to retake control of the game . Bagley , Hield , and star point guard De'Aaron Fox all contributed multiple baskets over the course of the run . Sacramento never gave this lead up , holding on for the duration of the game . The win made it three straight for the Kings , who now sit just 0 games back of eighth place in the Western_Conference standings . Sacramento 's young core was superb in Monday 's win , with Bagley scoring a team - high 24 points off the bench . The rookie big man added 12 rebounds and three blocks . Fox finished the game with 20 points , six assists , and six rebounds , while Hield added another 18 points to go with eight rebounds . In total , the Kings shot a blistering 56 percent from the field and knocked down 13 three - pointers . The Spurs , meanwhile , saw 22 points from Aldridge , who was a perfect 10 - of - 10 at the free - throw line . Fellow All-Star DeMar DeRozan scored a team - high 24 points . All five Spurs starters scored in double digits in the loss . As a whole , though , the team still struggled with efficiency , shooting just 43 percent from the field overall . Next up for Sacramento is a tilt with the Rockets on Wednesday . The Spurs , meanwhile , will continue their California road trip with a visit to the Warriors at Oracle_Arena this Wednesday .

The Kings picked it up in the second quarter , but could only make a small dent in the deficit , as they trailed by nine at the half . The Heat came out strong in the third , and held a 17 - point lead with three minutes left in the quarter , but the Kings rallied back to make it an eight - point game by the start of the final frame . The Kings carried the momentum into the fourth , where they outscored the visitors by 14 , to steal the win at home . Buddy Hield led the Kings with 23 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and an assist , in 34 minutes . Bogdan Bogdanovic followed up with 16 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals , while Harrison Barnes added 12 points , seven rebounds and two assists . The Kings shot 41 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . Josh Richardson led the Heat with 21 points , four assists , three blocks and two rebounds , in 37 minutes . Hassan Whiteside followed up with 17 points , 19 rebounds , three steals , two blocks and an assist , while Dwyane Wade added 15 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Heat shot 43 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 33 from long range . The Heat ( 25 - 28 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Sunday . The Kings ( 29 - 26 ) play host to the Suns on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 117 - 104 , at Golden_1_Center on Sunday . A 33 - 23 first quarter really set the foundation for Sacramento in this game , as they won in wire - to - wire fashion . The Kings defense was critical , as they recorded 12 steals and 11 blocks while holding the Suns to 42 percent from the field and 22 percent from three - point range . Sacramento ended up shooting 45 percent from the field . The Kings also recorded four more assists than the Kings while winning the turnover differential , 17 - 12 . Sacramento 's bench also outscored Pheonix 's bench , 53 - 25 . The Suns ( 11 - 47 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he tallied 27 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Josh Jackson accrued 18 points , five rebounds and three blocks . DeAndre Ayton amassed 16 points and nine boards . Richaun Holmes led the bench with 10 points and nine boards while Tyler Johnson totaled nine points , five rebounds and three assists in his first start . The Kings ( 30 - 26 ) were led by Marvin Bagley III , as he provided 32 points and seven rebounds on 10 - of - 15 shooting off the bench . Bogdan Bogdanovic also played well off the bench , accumulating 14 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Buddy Hield led the starters with 18 points and six boards while De'Aaron Fox collected 17 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Phoenix traveling to face the Los_Angeles Clippers and Sacramento facing the Denver Nuggets on the road as well .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 116 - 109 , at Golden_1_Center on Friday evening . The Clippers got out to a solid start on the road , as they led for almost the entire first quarter , before settling on a three - point lead heading into the second . The Kings responded in the second by pulling ahead in the first couple minutes and then holding the edge to take a 56 - 52 lead into halftime . The third quarter featured almost the same pattern of scoring , except that it was the Clippers that outscored the Kings , to reclaim the advantage , with a five - point lead entering the final . The Clippers stayed strong in the fourth and while the Kings managed to make it a three - point game with four minutes left , the Clippers came up clutch to seal the road win . This marks the third straight loss for Sacramento . Landry Shamet led the Clippers with 20 points , four rebounds , two assists , and a block , in 32 minutes . Danilo Gallinari tallied 19 points , nine rebounds and three assists , while Lou Williams chipped in 17 points , four assists , three rebounds and a steal , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Clippers shot 44 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Buddy Hield led the Kings with 23 points , seven rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 35 minutes . Willie Cauley-Stein added 16 points , 12 rebounds , four blocks and one assist , while De'Aaron Fox finished with 12 points , 12 assists , five rebounds and one steal . The Kings shot 44 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 21 from long range . The Kings ( 31 - 31 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Knicks on Monday . The Clippers ( 35 - 29 ) play host to the Knicks on Sunday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Sacramento Kings , 111 - 109 , on Wednesday at Golden_1_Center . Fresh off a night where he shot 12 - of - 16 from the floor and scoring a game - high 30 points in a statement win over the Warriors , Gordon Hayward was the hero yet again Wednesday night . He may have only had 12 points , but after Hayward fouled the Kings ' Buddy Hield on a three - point attempt that led to game - tying free throws , the former All-Star marched down the floor and put up the game - winning fadeaway jumper with just a couple seconds left . Without Kyrie Irving ( thigh ) , Jayson Tatum led the way scoring for the Celtics ( 40 - 26 ) , posting a game - high 24 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . Al Horford was close behind with a terrific all - around game , as the big man recorded 21 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists 31 minutes . Irving 's replacement , Terry Rozier , performed admirably as a starter , putting up 16 points and six rebounds in 32 minutes . As for the Kings ( 32 - 32 ) , the battled all fourth quarter but could n't get over the hump despite keeping the game within six and tying it late . Hield came up with some clutch shots down the stretch and finished with 23 points and eight rebounds across 38 minutes , but it was Harrison Barnes who led the way for Sacramento , scoring 24 points on 8 - of - 16 shooing and grabbing eight rebounds of his own . As a team , the Kings put together as efficient an offensive performance you could ask for , shooting 45 percent from three and 50 percent from the field overall , but Boston ended up making just one more play .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 123 - 121 , at Golden_1_Center on Tuesday . It 's extremely rare to see a team blow a 25 - point fourth quarter lead but that was the case here . Brooklyn ended up outscoring Sacramento , 45 - 18 , in the fourth quarter to pull off their comeback victory . Their only lead after the first quarter came with 1 seconds left in the game , as Rondae Hollis-Jefferson hit a game - winning lay - up to break a tied game . The Kings simply could n't shoot in the fourth quarter , as they went 0 - of - 15 on shots outside of three feet . The Nets countered that by going 7 - of - 10 from three - point range in the fourth quarter to cap off their epic comeback . The Nets ( 37 - 36 ) got a career performance from D'Angelo Russell , as he finished with 44 points , four rebounds , 12 assists and four steals . Jarrett Allen amassed 13 points and seven boards . Hollis-Jefferson led the bench with 14 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Caris LeVert started and accrued six points , three rebounds and six assists . The Kings ( 34 - 36 ) were led by Marvin Bagley III , as he provided 28 points , seven rebounds and two assists on 12 - of - 15 from the field . De'Aaron Fox led the starters with 27 points , four rebounds and nine assists . Harrison Barnes totaled 17 points and seven rebounds . Nemanja Bjelica generated 14 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . On deck for Sacramento is a home matchup versus the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday . As for Brooklyn , they 're off until Friday when they travel to face the Los_Angeles Lakers .

The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Sacramento Kings , 133 - 129 , at Golden_1_Center on Sunday evening . New_Orleans ( 33 - 48 ) ran a shallow eight - man rotation on Sunday , giving most of its usual starters the night off . The Pelicans ' young core thrived in a featured role , though , with the team 's starting five combining for 106 points . Sacramento ( 39 - 42 ) knocked down 16 three - pointers while putting up a valiant contest . However , the Pelicans ' wildly efficient 52 percent shooting proved too difficult for the Kings to overcome . Ian Clark recorded a team - high 31 points in a game that featured a number of impressive performances . Elfrid Payton stuffed the stat sheet for New_Orleans , recording 24 points , 14 assists , and three blocks in Sunday 's win . Former third overall pick Jahlil Okafor added another double - double with 23 points and 14 rebounds . For Sacramento , Harrison Barnes scored a team - high 29 points . Barnes , who was acquired by the Kings at the trade deadline this season , shot an efficient 10 - of - 19 from the floor en route to the high scoring total . De'Aaron Fox matched Payton 's double - double with one of his own , tallying 24 points , 11 assists , and three steals in 35 minutes on the floor . New_Orleans will host the Golden_State Warriors on Tuesday , while the Kings will close out their season with a trip to Portland on Wednesday .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 126 - 107 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday . While the first quarter was competitive , New_York was able to dominate this game thanks to a monster second quarter . In fact , the Knicks rode a 49 - 25 second quarter to victory , as the Hawks never got the game within a single - digit margin for the entirety of the second half . Bench production was the difference for New_York , as they outscored Atlanta 's bench , 56 - 39 . Defense was also critical for the Knicks , as they recorded 12 steals and six blocks while winning the turnover differential , 24 - 15 . The Hawks ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Taurean Prince , as he tallied 21 points , six rebounds and six assists . Trae Young accumulated 14 points , six rebounds and five assists . Kent Bazemore provided 14 points , six boards and two steals . Vince Carter was the only other Hawk in double figures , as he dropped 12 points . The Knicks ( 10 ) got a gem out of Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he led the way with 31 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Enes Kanter totaled 16 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Trey Burke started at point guard and provided 15 points , three rebounds and four assists . Mario Hezonja , Allonzo Trier , Noah Vonleh and Kevin Knox all reached double figures in scoring off the bench . Both teams play road games on Friday for their next outings , with Atlanta facing the Memphis Grizzlies and New_York facing off with the Brooklyn Nets .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the New_York Knicks , 116 - 115 , after two overtime periods at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday night . Two of the weakest teams in the Eastern_Conference ended playing one of the most entertaining , intense games of the 2018 - 19 NBA season thus far , as the Bulls ( 3 - 8 ) and the Knicks ( 3 - 8 ) both entered this game under .500 and playing some sloppy basketball by most standards . But this game ended being extremely intense , to the point that 58 minutes of basketball were needed to find a winner .. and the differential was only one point . In the end , Zach LaVine 's clutch free - throw with less than two seconds on the clock gave the Bulls a huge win on the road . LaVine was the game 's top scorer with 41 points , although he also committed eight turnovers , while Jabari Parker had 15 points with eight rebounds and Wendell Carter Jr. delivered 11 points , 13 boards and two assists . Antonio Blakeney contributed with 17 points in 20 minutes coming off the bench , as he filled the `` absence `` of Justin Holiday , who only scored six points while going 2 - for - 10 from the field in 47 minutes . Allonzo Trier carried the Knicks with a strong 21 - point performance , but Enes Kanter stole the show for the Knicks since he came off the bench and posted a huge double - double of 23 points and 24 rebounds , while also adding seven assists . Emmanuel Mudiay had 16 points and Mario Hezonja added 15 , both off the bench . Two starters , Frank Ntilikina and Mitchell Robinson , failed to score .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host New_York Knicks , 115 - 89 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Sunday . It 's rare to see a home team dominated so thoroughly in the NBA but that 's just what the Magic did here to the Knicks . In fact , Orlando took advantage of a 30 - 10 first quarter , as they held a double - digit lead for the final three quarters . In addition , the Knicks never got the game within a 20 - point margin in the second half . Orlando 's defense was stifling , as they held New_York to just 35 percent from the field and 18 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was also huge , with the Magic recording 31 assists to nine turnovers while New_York committed 19 turnovers to 13 assists . The 10 steals recorded by the Magic was a big part of that , as the Knicks recorded just two steals on their end . The Magic ( 6 - 7 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he totaled 21 points and 14 boards on 10 - of - 17 from the field . Evan Fournier collected 12 points , two rebounds and four assists . Terrence Ross led the bench with 22 points , three assists and two blocks . Mo Bamba also played well off the bench , amassing 15 points and eight boards . The Knicks ( 4 - 10 ) had no starters reach double figures in scoring , as Tim Hardaway Jr. led them with seven points and six boards on 2 - of - 12 shooting . Kevin Knox led the team in scoring off the bench , as he tallied 17 points and three boards . Enes Kanter was their best player , as he provided 16 points and 15 rebounds off the bench as well . On deck for Orlando is a road matchup versus the Washington Wizards on Monday . As for New_York , they travel to play the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday for their next outing .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the New_York Knicks 118 - 114 at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday . CJ McCollum and Damian Lillard were too much to handle for the Knicks at home as they fell for a sixth straight game . New_York paced the game well and entered the half up two points , but their very small lineup that consisted of four guards late failed to secure a defensive rebound down two points . Evan Turner 's timed a missed Lillard shot perfectly which gave him the easy two point put back shot , and Enes Kanter missed a skyhook in the waning seconds of the fourth quarter , which secured the win for the Blazers ( 11 - 5 ) . McCollum finished with 31 points and four rebounds on 13 - of - 23 shooting , which included five made threes . Lillard added 29 points , eight assists and six rebounds , while Jusuf Nurkic pitched in 13 points , 10 rebounds and four dimes . The Knicks ( 4 - 13 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr , who has now scored 29 - plus points in his last three outings , and finished Tuesday with 32 points , to go with five rebounds and four assists on 10 - of - 21 shooting . Rookies Kevin Knox and Mitchell Robinson were quiet off the bench and combined for eight points . Robinson did add two blocks in his 18 minutes of action . Both teams play the second game of a back - to - back on Wednesday , as the Knicks visit the Boston Celtics and the Blazers visit the Milwaukee Bucks .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the New_York Knicks , 119 - 117 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Sunday evening . Charlotte ( 13 - 13 ) brought its record back to .500 with the relatively painless win on Sunday . The Hornets jumped out to a quick lead in the second quarter and brought it to double - digits with a run to start the third . While the Knicks ( 8 - 20 ) chipped away at the lead throughout the fourth quarter , Kemba Walker and the Hornets continued their strong 48 percent shooting night to earn the win . The Hornets overcame a career night for Knicks rookie Kevin Knox , who scored 26 points to go with 15 rebounds . Knox 's standout performance was accompanied by similarly strong play from Frank Ntilikina . Ntilikina had seen multiple DNPs in the last two weeks after his slow start to the season , but on Sunday , he looked ready to go . The sophomore point guard shot 7 - of - 11 from the field en route to 18 points . Still , Charlotte was able to earn the win with ease , thanks , as usual , to a strong night from Kemba Walker . Walker scored 25 points to go with six assists and four steals in the win . It was also a big night for Tony Parker . The former San Antonio Spur delivered a gut - punch to the Knicks off the bench , scoring 16 points in just 16 minutes of action . On Wednesday , Charlotte will host the Detroit Pistons while the Knicks will travel to Cleveland to face the Cavaliers .

The Mavs got out to a good start on the road , as they held a four - point advantage after one quarter of action . The Knicks pushed to take a small lead around the mid - way point in the second , but the visitors pulled back ahead to reclaim the advantage , and took a 55 - 47 lead into halftime . The Mavericks came out strong in the third and outscored the Knicks by 12 in the quarter , to bring their lead 20 by the start of the final frame . The Mavs were able to cruise from there and hang on for just their fifth road win of the season . This marks the 11th straight loss for the Knicks .
