The Toronto Raptors defeated the host New_York Knicks , 104 - 99 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday . While Toronto came into this game as a sizable favorite , New_York made it closer than most expected . In fact , there were nine ties and eight lead changes in total , as is stayed within a seven - point margin for the final 15 minutes of action . Free-throw shooting was the difference in the game , with the Raptors connecting on 24 - of - 29 while the Knicks hit just 11 - of - 19 . Ball movement was also key , with Toronto recording 27 assists and New_York handing out 22 . The Raptors ( 41 - 16 ) were led by Kyle Lowry , as he tallied 22 points , four rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Serge Ibaka totaled 15 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . Kawhi Leonard finished with 11 points , five rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol made his debut and provided seven points and six rebounds off the bench . The Knicks ( 10 - 45 ) lost their 16th - straight game here , as Kevin Knox led the way with 20 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . DeAndre Jordan accumulated 10 points , 18 rebounds and three assists . Dennis Smith Jr. collected 13 points , four rebounds , six assists and three steals . Kadeem Allen led the bench with 14 points , four rebounds and six assists . Both teams return to action on Monday , with New_York traveling to face the struggling Cleveland Cavaliers and Toronto playing host to the Brooklyn Nets .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the New_York Knicks , 102 - 94 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday afternoon . The Kings ( 33 - 32 ) eventually hit their stride in the East Coast matinee matchup , shrugging off some body clock challenges to forge a 48 - 46 lead by halftime after a slow start in the first quarter . Sacramento then made it back - to - back dominant periods by outscoring the Knicks ( 13 - 53 ) by a 10 - point margin in the third . New_York made one last surge and actually owned an 89 - 87 lead at the 6:6 mark of the fourth quarter , but the visitors finished on a 15 - 5 run over the final 5:54 to seal the win . De'Aaron Fox paced the Kings with 30 points , adding eight assists , five rebounds and one steal . Buddy Hield produced 19 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . Nemanja Bjelica furnished a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and two blocks . Harrison Barnes posted 11 points , eight rebounds and one steal . Bogdan Bogdanovic turned in nine points , four rebounds and three assists , while Willie Cauley-Stein mustered seven points and hauled in 12 rebounds . Dennis Smith , Jr. led the Knicks with 18 points and supplemented them with five rebounds and five assists . Deandre Jordan generated a 14 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . Lance Thomas and Allonzo Trier pitched in 10 points apiece , with Thomas notably adding seven boards . John Jenkins and Emmanuel Mudiay each poured in nine points . The Kings remain on the road and next visit the Washington Wizards on Monday night , while the Knicks pay a visit to the Minnesota Timberwolves on Sunday night .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host New_York Knicks , 137 - 116 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wedneday . It 's rare to see a home team dominated so thoroughly but that was the case here for the Knicks . In fact , the Jazz led by 14 points after the first quarter and carried a 27 - point lead into the half . That allowed Utah to lead by at least 20 points for the entirety of the second half . The Jazz had one of their best offensive games of the season , as they shot 57 percent fron the field and 48 percent from three - point range . Ball movement played a huge factor in that , with Utah out - assiting New_York , 38 - 23 . The Jazz also went 21 - of - 25 from the free - throw line while the Knicks connected on just 13 - of - 21 . The Jazz ( 42 - 29 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he tallied 30 points , three rebounds and five assists . Rudy Gobert went 7 - of - 7 from the field to finish with 18 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Joe Ingles accrued 18 points , five rebounds and seven assists while Ricky Rubio collected 12 points , three rebounds and nine assusts . Jae Crowder led the bench with 15 points , three rebounds and two steals . The Knicks ( 14 - 58 ) were led by Kevin Knox , as he amassed 27 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Mario Hezonja got a start and totaled 23 points and two boards . Damyean Doston finished with 21 points and three assists . Mitchell Robinson led the bench with 14 points , 12 rebounds and three blocks . Utah will have to play again on Thursday , as they travel to face the Atlanta Hawks . As for New_York , they 're off until Friday when they play host to the Denver Nuggets .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the New_York Knicks , 117 - 92 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Thursday evening . The Raptors ( 53 - 23 ) came into Thursday 's game looking to avoid a trap against the hapless Knicks ( 14 - 61 ) . Toronto made sure that would n't be the case with a strong start , jumping out to a 55 - 36 halftime lead . The visitors would n't take their foot off of the gas in the second half , either , as they `` won `` the final two quarters as well by a 62 - 56 margin . As the final score implied , New_York faltered in all aspects , as they shot just 36 percent and committed 16 turnovers . Pascal Siakam led the way with 31 points , adding five rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Danny Green supplied 15 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Fred VanVleet and Jeremy Lin generated matching 12 - point tallies while dishing out eight assists and bringing down five rebounds , respectively . Norman Powell poured in 11 points . Serge Ibaka contributed a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and two blocks . Mitchell Robinson paced the Knicks with a 19 - point , 21 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks and one steal . Kadeem Allen totaled 18 points , two assists , one rebound and one block . Emmanuel Mudiay delivered 11 points , four boards and one assist . Dewayne Dotson and Kevin Knox pitched in nine points apiece and hauled in five and three rebounds , respectively . The Raptors next pay a visit to the Chicago Bulls on Saturday night , while the Knicks remain home and take on the Miami Heat on Saturday evening .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host New_York Knicks 115 - 89 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Pistons got down to business right away in an important game for them , as they needed to win in order to ensure a playoff spot . Despite the importance of the game , Blake Griffin ( knee ) was forced to remain sidelined . Nonetheless , the Pistons outscored the Knicks 36 - 22 in the first quarter , and added another 10 points to their lead by halftime . They carried on in the third , to build a 33 - point lead heading into the fourth and cruise to a win and guarantee themselves a playoff spot . Luke Kennard led the Pistons with 27 points , five rebounds and two assists , in 24 minutes off the bench . Andre Drummond finished with 20 points , 18 rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 27 minutes , while Reggie Jackson added 21 points , seven assist and four rebounds . The Pistons shot 48 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 33 from deep . John Jenkins led the Knicks with 16 points , three rebounds and three assists , in 27 minutes off the bench . Kadeem Allen tallied 13 points , eight assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block , while Henry Ellenson added 12 points , four rebounds and two blocks . The Knicks shot 40 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 30 from long range . The Pistons are set to face the Bucks in the first round of the playoffs .
The visiting San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 143 - 142 , at Staples_Center in overtime on Monday evening . San_Antonio ( 2 - 1 ) seemingly put the nail in the coffin with just under 90 seconds remaining in regulation , as a put - back basket from LaMarcus Aldridge gave the Spurs an eight - point lead . The Lakers ( 0 - 3 ) , though , did what seemed impossible and launched an 80 run in the final 88 seconds of game time to force overtime . The run was capped by a deep , game - tying three - pointer from superstar forward LeBron James . Despite the momentum shift at the end of regulation , overtime saw plenty of back - and - forth . James had a chance to help LA seal at least a second overtime at the free - throw line , but missed both shots with 11 seconds remaining in OT . The Spurs ultimately gained the lead on a Patty Mills jumper in the final seconds of overtime . In addition to his clutch put - back , Aldridge scored a game - high 37 points in the tense win . He added 10 rebounds and five assists . His fellow All-Star , the newly - acquired DeMar DeRozan , scored 32 points and dished out a whopping 14 assists to lead the team . Rudy Gay contributed another 16 points . LA , meanwhile , was without starters Brandon Ingram and Rajon Rondo , who are currently serving suspensions for their involvement in an altercation in Saturday 's game against Houston . In their absence , James picked up the slack , scoring 32 points , grabbing eight rebounds , and matching DeRozan 's game high of 14 assists . Sophomore forward Kyle Kuzma added a whopping 37 points in the loss . The loss extended the Lakers ' losing streak to three games . The new - look team is still in search of its first win of the 2018 - 19 season . On Wednesday , San_Antonio will host the Indiana Pacers while the Lakers will travel to Phoenix to face the Suns .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 114 - 110 at Staples_Center on Wednesday . The Lakers and Timberwolves battled all four quarters , wrestling with lead changes throughout . The Lakers came out with a run and gun style offense that saw Lonzo Ball push the pace , along with JaVale McGee finding some easy dunks down low . Minnesota entered the half with a two point lead , but the Lakers kept within striking distance all second half before taking the lead behind LeBron James ' leadership . Derrick Rose had the hot hand all night , but when it mattered most , Rose 's three point shot to take the lead in the waning seconds bounced off the rim after a great look at the top of the arc . The Lakers ( 5 - 6 ) were given three possessions with just under a minute left in the fourth quarter after new addition Tyson Chandler swatted back two rebounds towards Lebron James after a missed three pointer from himself and Kyle Kuzma . Chandler , who joined the team this week , made a massive impact with his nine rebounds . The Timberwolves set a new franchise record with 20 three pointers , seven of which came from the 2011 MVP Derrick Rose . Rose has seen a resurgence in his game and scored 31 points 11 - of - 17 shooting . Down 111 - 104 late in the fourth quarter , Rose hit back - to - back threes to single handedly keep his team alive . All five Minnesota starters finished in double figures scoring and all five also logged at least 37 minutes . LeBron James fell one assist shy of triple - double after he finished with 24 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists . Both the Timberwolves and Lakers will face the Sacramento Kings next , as the Kings will host a back - to - back with both teams starting with the Wolves on Friday and the Lakers Saturday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 108 - 104 , at Staples_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Lakers ( 11 - 8 ) and the Magic ( 10 - 10 ) played a very intense game and while Orlando seemed ready to cruise their way in the final minutes , Los_Angeles mounted a furious comeback in the final 12 minutes that saw them tie the game into the final 60 seconds of the contest . But the Magic executed better down the stretch , and that was enough to get them a huge win playing on the road as they moved back to .500 . The score for each quarter read : 19 - 29 , 32 - 23 , 35 - 19 , and 22 - 33 . The Lakers came quite close to turn things around following a dismal third quarter , but they fell short and were forced to settle with a huge home loss . Nikola Vucevic was the best player for the Magic in this one since he finished with 31 points , 15 rebounds , seven assists , three blocks and two steals , making a huge impact on both ends of the court . Aaron Gordon added 17 points with four boards , and D.J . Augustin delivered 12 points , nine assists and five rebounds . Terrence Ross ( 16 points , six rebounds ) and Jonathon Simmons ( 10 points ) had solid outings off the bench as well . LeBron James filled the stat sheet nicely for the Lakers since he finished the game with 24 points , seven assists and four boards , but also committed six turnovers . Kyle Kuzma had 21 points with five assists and four rebounds , and Brandon Ingram chipped in with 17 points and six rebounds . JaVale McGee had 12 points , seven rebounds , and seven blocks .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 104 - 96 , at Staples_Center on Thursday evening . The Lakers ( 12 - 9 ) came out of the gates seemingly intent on eradicating a two - game skid in short order , as they exploded for 38 first - quarter points while limiting the Pacers ( 13 - 9 ) to 15 . However , Indiana almost turned the tables completely on Los_Angeles in the second quarter with their own 35 - point haul , and they entered halftime with a manageable 56 - 50 deficit . It was a much tighter game in the second half , but LeBron James helped ensure the win by scoring the Lakers ' final six points . It was a particularly impressive defensive performance for the home squad , which limited Indiana to a 37 percent figure from the field and forced them into 17 turnovers . James led the way for the Lakers with 38 points , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Brandon Ingram followed with 14 points , three assists , one rebound , three blocks and one steal . Josh Hart contributed a bench - leading 13 points . Kyle Kuzma produced a near double - double with 11 points and nine rebounds while also adding two assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope matched Kuzma 's scoring total over 18 minutes off the bench . Domantas Sabonis led the Pacers with a 20 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , one steal and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 14 points while adding three rebounds and two assists . Thaddeus Young supplied 11 points , five boards , one assist and five steals . Doug McDermott and Cory Joseph had matching 10 - point tallies off the bench . The Pacers remain on the road and tangle with the Sacramento Kings on Saturday night , while the Lakers remain home and face off with the Dallas Mavericks on Friday evening .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 118 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The Clippers got out to a strong start as they led 28 - 23 after on quarter . The Lakers turned the tables in the second , as they outscored the Clippers by eight in the quarter , to take a three - point lead by halftime . However , the Clippers came out strong in the second half and regained control through the third , where they outscored the Lakers by five , to take an 82 - 80 lead into the final frame . They kept the pressure on through the fourth and outscored the Lakers by nine in the quarter , to secure their second straight win . This marked the second straight loss for the Lakers as they carry on without LeBron James ( groin ) . Lou Williams led the Clippers with 36 points , seven rebounds and three assists , in 30 minutes off the bench . Danilo Gallinari finished with 19 points , 10 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , while Tobias Harris tallied nine points , 10 rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Clippers shot 44 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyle Kuzma led the Lakers with 24 points , eight rebounds and five assists , in 41 minutes . Lonzo Ball tallied 19 points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal , while Brandon Ingram added 17 points and seven rebounds . The Lakers shot 41 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range . The Lakers ( 20 - 16 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Kings on Sunday . The Clippers ( 21 - 14 ) play host to the Spurs on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 113 - 100 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday evening . It was LA 's eighth straight game without LeBron James ( groin ) , but the team fared well without its star on Wednesday . The Lakers ( 23 - 19 ) jumped out to a double - digit lead in the second quarter and never looked back . The team went on a quick 90 run near the end of the first half , fueled by five straight points from point guard Lonzo Ball . The Pistons ( 17 - 22 ) , meanwhile , continued to struggle with efficiency , shooting just 44 percent overall and 31 from three - point range . The story of the night was LA 's Kyle Kuzma , who tallied a career - high 41 points in just 29 minutes of play . Kuzma was remarkably efficient , shooting 16 - of - 24 from the field and knocking down five three - pointers . The second - year forward was one of six double - digit scorers for the Lakers . Lonzo Ball , meanwhile , led the team with 11 assists . Detroit , meanwhile , struggled to produce any offense in the blowout loss . All-Star big man Blake Griffin scored just 16 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , while star center Andre Drummond added only six points . In total , Detroit 's starting five scored only 58 points and accounted for eight of the team 's nine turnovers . The Pistons will visit Sacramento on Thursday , while the Lakers will take on Utah on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 101 - 95 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . As the Lakers ( 23 - 21 ) continued to forge ahead without LeBron James ( groin ) in the lineup , they found an unlikely obstacle in his former team . Cleveland ( 9 - 35 ) owns the league 's worst record and had dropped 12 straight heading into Sunday 's matchup . Sunday 's tilt with the Lakers ended the Cavaliers ' skid , though , as all five starters scored in double figures en route to the win . The Cavaliers held a multiple - possession lead for much of the second half and managed to stave off a late - game comeback effort from LA . For the Lakers , the loss dropped the team to just 3 - 6 without James . Forward Cedi Osman showed flashes of the talent he showcased early in the season , scoring a team - high 20 points to lead the Cavaliers . Big man Tristan Thompson , recently returned from injury , finished with 15 points and 14 rebounds . Nearly matching Thompson 's effort on the boards was Alec Burks , who tallied 13 rebounds to go with 18 points in Sunday 's bounce - back win . LA , meanwhile , saw 29 points from sophomore forward Kyle Kuzma . The Utah product continued to excel in LeBron 's absence , improving upon his season average of 19 points per game . As a team , though , the Lakers were not as impressive . LA shot just 40 percent and hit only seven threes in a loss that put the team in a tie with Utah for eighth in the Western_Conference . LA will host another of the Eastern_Conference 's struggling teams when the Chicago Bulls come to town on Tuesday . Cleveland , meanwhile , will continue its West Coast trip with a visit to Portland on Wednesday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the visiting Chicago Bulls , 107 - 100 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . The Lakers ( 24 - 21 ) continue to press on without LeBron James ( groin ) in the lineup . The team had dropped six of its previous nine games , but on Tuesday , they earned a comfortable win over Chicago ( 10 - 34 ) . Despite recent struggles , sophomore point guard Lonzo Ball led the team with 19 points and also grabbed eight rebounds . Chicago , meanwhile , saw its offensive struggles continue , shooting just 40 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . The Bulls entered Tuesday 's matchup ranked last in the league in scoring at 101 points per game . In addition to Ball 's strong showing , the Lakers enjoyed stellar play from forwards Brandon Ingram and Kyle Kuzma . Ingram scored 16 points and dished seven assists , while Kuzma added an additional 16 points to go with 11 rebounds . Chicago , meanwhile , saw six different players score in double digits . Unfortunately for the Bulls , no player contributed more than 18 points in the loss . Forward Jabari Parker , whose play had seen him benched in recent games , led the way with 18 points in just 16 minutes on the court in the loss . On Thursday , the Bulls will visit Denver while the Lakers will travel to Oklahoma_City .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 130 - 111 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . The Warriors ' ( 33 - 14 ) win evened the season series after the Lakers ( 25 - 23 ) trounced them on their home court on Christmas Day . Of course , that game saw the Lakers take a significant blow , as superstar LeBron James went down with a groin injury . James has been out of the Lakers ' lineup ever since , and did not suit up for Monday 's tilt . The Warriors , on the other hand , added one more All-Star to their already loaded lineup , as big man DeMarcus Cousins made his second appearance since returning from his Achilles tear . In characteristic fashion , the Warriors blew Monday 's game wide open in the third quarter , where they outscored LA 45 - 25 . Golden_State already held a 10 - point halftime advantage , thanks in large part to a white - hot 21 - point first - half from Klay Thompson . The Warriors did not take their foot off the gas , however , as they racked up another 65 second - half points . Thompson in particular remained on fire , knocking down his first 10 three - point attempts in a row . He exited the game with 44 points on 17 - of - 20 shooting . On top of Thompson 's impressive night , the Warriors saw 20 points from Kevin Durant , who shot 8 - of - 13 from the field . Steph Curry , meanwhile , had an off shooting night , going just 3 - of - 12 from the floor . He did , however , tally 12 assists . The Lakers , meanwhile , were without LeBron James , Rajon Rondo , or Lonzo Ball , each of whom was sidelined by an injury . In their absence , the team struggled , with only two starters scoring in double digits . Kyle Kuzma tallied 16 points , while Ivica Zubac led the team with 18 off the bench . On Thursday , the Warriors will visit the Wizards in DC , while the Lakers will host the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 125 - 119 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . The Lakers ( 30 - 31 ) fought hard late in the game to avoid dropping three in a row , including another against New_Orleans ( 27 - 36 ) . After the Pelicans cut the deficit to only one point in the final minute , Brandon Ingram put the Lakers back up three by knocking down a contested floater . From there , it was the LeBron James show , as the four - time MVP sealed the win with a turnaround three - pointer to give the Lakers a six - point advantage with just over 30 seconds remaining . The win comes as revenge after the Pelicans trounced the Lakers this past Saturday . James led the Lakers with 33 points and 10 assists . Veteran Rajon Rondo notched another double - double , scoring 11 points while dishing out a team - high 16 assists . Ingram also impressed with his play , scoring 23 points to continue his hot stretch since the All-Star break . New_Orleans ' Julius Randle , a former Laker , led all scorers with 35 points . Jrue Holiday finished the night with 19 points and 10 assists , while Elfrid Payton pitched in another 10 rebounds and nine assists . Anthony Davis , still on a minutes restriction following his highly - publicized trade request , had 22 points and eight rebounds in 21 minutes on the floor . Los_Angeles will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Pelicans will visit Denver on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down their rival Los_Angeles Lakers , 113 - 105 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . The Lakers ( 30 - 34 ) entered Monday 's contest in desperate need of a win . The LeBron James-led team had dropped its previous two contests and was five games out of the playoff picture heading into Monday 's crosstown clash . While the Lakers seemed ready to play initially , putting up 34 points in the first quarter , the team 's energy quickly began to wane . The Clippers ( 37 - 29 ) were able to regain the lead by halftime before building up a comfortable cushion in the second half . LAC started the fourth quarter with a quick 80 run to push the lead to 12 , and over four minutes of scoreless basketball from the Lakers allowed the Clips to maintain their advantage . The outcome lifts the Clippers to seventh in the Western_Conference while moving the Lakers to 6 games out from eighth place and the coveted final playoff spot . Early on , the Clippers saw a massive spark from Patrick Beverley . The veteran embraced the mismatch with his coverage of LeBron James and finished the first half with five steals . Danilo Gallinari , meanwhile , helped to fuel the Clippers ' offensive outburst in the second half . He finished with a team - high 23 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting . The Lakers , meanwhile , saw a triple - double from veteran Rajon Rondo . Rondo , who has added a three - point shot recently , knocked down four triples on the night . James also delivered a gem , scoring 27 points to go with eight rebounds and six assists . Next on the agenda for the Lakers is a tilt with the Denver Nuggets at Staples_Center on Wednesday . The Clippers , meanwhile , will host the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Friday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Sacramento Kings , 111 - 106 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . LeBron James recorded his 81st career triple - double to help the Lakers ( 32 - 41 ) earn a narrow win over Sacramento ( 36 - 37 ) . The Kings jumped out to a quick lead in the second quarter , but the Lakers responded with a 39 - point third quarter after the halftime break . Sacramento was able to make it a close game after Bogdan Bogdanovic knocked down a three - pointer to cut the deficit to just two with under 20 second remaining . However , James knocked down a pair of free - throws to make it a two - possession game , giving the Lakers the cushion they needed to close out the win . James finished with 29 points , 11 rebounds , and 11 assists . Kyle Kuzma delivered another 29 points while knocking down five three - pointers . The win comes on the heels of a 1 - 9 stretch for the Lakers , who currently occupy 11th place in the Western_Conference . For the Kings , Marvin Bagley III scored 25 points and grabbed 11 rebounds off the bench . Five of Bagley 's boards came on the offensive end in what proved to be a nice night for the rookie . Bogdanovic contributed another 17 , but the Kings shot a dismal 38 percent from the floor as a team in the loss . Both teams will suit up again on Tuesday , with the Kings visiting Dallas and the Lakers hosting the Washington Wizards .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Utah Jazz , 113 - 109 , at staples Center on Sunday evening . It was the second straight win for the Lakers ( 37 - 44 ) against a playoff team , as LA managed to upset the Jazz ( 49 - 31 ) despite its slough of injuries . Operating without four members of their opening day starting five , the Lakers shot over 51 percent against a typically ironclad Utah defense . LA was tenacious on the glass , grabbing 16 offensive rebounds and outrebounding Utah 49 - 35 overall . Recent G-League callup Jemerrio Jones stood out after earning a start on Sunday . Jones grabbed 16 rebounds and dished out five assists while playing a whopping 38 minutes . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope logged a game - high 42 minutes and scored a team - high 32 points in the win . LA also saw 22 points from veteran center JaVale McGee . Utah was led by 21 points and 10 rebounds from Rudy Gobert . Donovan Mitchell scored another 19 points for the Jazz . The loss comes at an inopportune time for the Jazz , who are fighting for playoff seeding in a crowded Western_Conference . With the loss , they now sit two games behind the fourth - place Portland Trail_Blazers . Utah will host the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Lakers will clash with Portland .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 104 - 101 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . Drama surrounding the Lakers ' organization overshadowed the team 's final game of the season on Tuesday , as Lakers ( 37 - 45 ) president Magic Johnson unexpectedly stepped down from his role this evening . Johnson held a press conference that lingered past the start time of the team 's game to address his decision to move forward . On the court , though , the Lakers put up a tough fight against Portland ( 52 - 29 ) , but the playoff - bound Blazers ultimately got the last laugh . Maurice Harkless came up in the clutch for Portland , scoring the team 's last 10 points , including a game - winning three - pointer with just one second remaining . Harkless led the Trail_Blazers with 26 points . He was also active on the defensive end , blocking four shots . Enes Kanter contributed a double - double for Portland in the win , finishing with 22 points and 16 rebounds . With the win , Portland sits at fourth in the Western_Conference . However , a win on Wednesday coupled with a loss by Denver could move Portland into third place . The Lakers , meanwhile , saw 32 points from Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . It was the second straight game in which Caldwell-Pope tallied 32 points . Jemerrio Jones grabbed 15 rebounds , and all five Lakers starters scored in double figures in the narrow loss . Portland will visit Sacramento for its final game of the season on Wednesday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the host Orlando Magic , 120 - 88 , at Amway_Center on Friday . A 22 - 10 first quarter in advantage of Charlotte really set the tone in this game , as they held their lead for the final three quarters while winning each individual quarter . In fact , the Hornets held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . Defense was the difference for Charlotte , holding Orlando to just 38 percent from the field and 19 percent from three - point range . Free-throw shooting was a huge factor as well , with Charlotte connecting on 17 - of - 20 and Orlando hitting just 10 - of - 14 from the charity stripe . The Hornets also dominated from long range , hitting 17 - of - 38 while the Magic connected on just 6 - of - 31 from three - point range . The Hornets ( 1 - 1 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 26 points , two rebounds and five assists . Nicolas Batum accumulated 15 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Miles Bridges led the bench with 15 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist also played well off the bench , providing 12 points , nine rebounds , five assists and two blocks . The Magic ( 1 - 1 ) had no player score more than 14 points , as Nikola Vucevic led their starters with 12 points , eight rebounds , four assists and four blocks . Evan Fournier totaled 12 points and two boards while Aaron Gordon collected five points , 10 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . Terrence Ross led the team in scoring off the bench , dropping 14 points . Both teams play road games on Saturday for their next outings , with Orlando facing the Philadelphia 76ers and Charlotte playing the Miami Heat .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Orlando Magic , 107 - 99 , at Amway_Center on Tuesday evening . The Kings ( 4 - 3 ) came into the contest relishing in their newfound reputation as one of the fastest - paced and most offensively proficient teams in the NBA . However , they were also on the second game of a back - to - back swing through the Sunshine State after a big win in Miami on Monday , so it remained to be seen how they 'd respond . The Magic ( 2 - 5 ) appeared to catch the visitors a bit flat early , jumping out to a 31 - 26 first - quarter lead . However , Sacramento turned it on from that point , flashing the impressive offense that 's defined the early portion of their season by outscoring their hosts , 59 - 41 , over the second and third periods . That left them in the driver 's seat heading into the final 12 minutes , which eventually resulted in their second straight road victory . The Kings enjoyed a particularly expansive advantage in the shooting front , as they drained 49 percent of their attempts while limiting the Magic to a 40 percent success rate . Buddy Hield led the way for Sacramento with a 25 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . Nemanja Bjelica supplied 21 points , eight rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Willie Cauley-Stein generated a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double of his own , while De'Aaron Fox matched the big man 's scoring total and added five assists , two rebounds and two steals . Troy Williams ( 12 points , five rebounds , one assist , two blocks ) and Marvin Bagley III ( 10 points , nine rebounds , two rebounds , one steal , one block ) were very productive off the bench . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 18 points , and he added 10 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Terrence Ross came off the bench to pour in 17 points . Nikola Vucevic contributed 15 points and a game - high 15 rebounds . He also dished out five assists . Jonathon Simmons supplied 12 points , five assists and three rebounds . Jonathan Isaac and Evan Fournier pitched in nine points apiece . The Kings remain on the road and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Thursday night , while the Magic remain home and tangle with the Los_Angeles Clippers on Friday evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 102 - 100 , at Amway_Center on Monday . It 's rare to see a game with just seven ties and five lead changes come down to the last shot but that was the case here . Evan Fournier played the hero , as he hit a game - winning jumper at the buzzer to break a tied game . Orlando rode a big fourth quarter to victory , outscoring Cleveland , 32 - 21 , in the final quarter . The Magic won despite being dominated in shooting , as Orlando shot just 45 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range while Cleveland hit 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from long range . Transition offense was the only notable advantage for Orlando , as they won the fastbreak scoring , 21 - 11 . The Cavaliers ( 1 - 9 ) were led by George Hill , as he tallied 22 points , four rebounds , six assists and four steals . Tristan Thompson amassed 19 points , 16 rebounds and four assists . Cedi Osman totaled 11 points and 10 boards . J.R. Smith and Jordan Clarkson scored 14 points apiece to lead the bench . The Magic ( 4 - 6 ) were led by Aaron Gordon , as he accrued 23 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Evan Fournier collected 15 points , five assists and three steals to go along with his game - winner . Nikola Vucevic accumulated 14 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . Terrence Ross led the bench with 15 points and two boards . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Orlando welcoming the Detroit Pistons to Amway_Center and Cleveland hosting the Oklahoma_City Thunder .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 111 - 106 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday night . The 76ers ( 9 - 7 ) featured Jimmy Butler for the first time since acquiring him from the Minnesota Timberwolves , but that was n't enough to secure the win on the road as the Magic ( 7 - 8 ) used a huge comeback to secure the win following their Monday loss against the Washington Wizards . But in reality , this game shifted leads time and time against . Philadelphia jumped to a 30 - 27 lead in the first quarter , but Orlando came back and finished the first half up by one ( 53 - 52 ) . Philly recovered control of the game with a 35 - 23 third quarter , but the Magic flipped the script in the fourth quarter and with a 35 - 19 lead in the final 12 minutes ( including a 210 scoring run ) and secured a huge win against one of the top contenders in the Eastern_Conference . Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic with an impressive performance of 30 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Aaron Gordon had 17 points , six rebounds and six assists , while Wesley Iwundu contributed 11 points and two steals . Two bench players made a big impact , as Jonathon Simmons had 12 points and Terrence Ross added 15 , including a decisive three - pointer with less than 10 seconds on the clock . J.J. Redick was the top scorer for the 76ers with 22 points , but he also added six assists and four rebounds . Joel Embiid had a triple - double since he contributed with 19 points , 13 rebounds and 10 assists . Wilson Chandler had 14 points , and debutant Jimmy Butler chipped in with 14 points in 33 minutes . Ben Simmons only had nine points , six assists and three rebounds .
The Orlando Magic defeated the New_York Knicks , 131 - 117 , at Amway_Center on Sunday evening . The Magic ( 9 - 8 ) have shown a penchant for some prolific tallies on the scoreboard this season , and Sunday shaped up as a possible scenario for another big offensive night . That much was confirmed from the opening tip , as Orlando racked up 44 first - quarter points and held a 67 - 66 halftime lead on the Knicks ( 4 - 13 ) . They tightened up their defense in the second half , limiting New_York to under 30 points in each of the final two periods while compiling another 64 to secure the victory . As their final point total implies , the home squad enjoyed a sharp shooting night , draining 57 percent of their attempts . The bench played a pivotal role for the Knicks , but it was Tim Hardaway , Jr. who led the way with 32 points . He added two rebounds , two assists and three steals . Trey Burke followed with 31 points in 29 minutes on the second unit . Enes Kanter provided a 21 - point , 19 - rebound double - double while playing 38 minutes off the bench . Emmanuel Mudiay was the only other double - digit scorer with 12 points . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 31 points , a total he supplemented with two assists , one rebound and one steal . Nikola Vucevic had a near triple - double with 28 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists . Evan Fournier totaled 19 points , six assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Jonathan Isaac delivered 16 points , four boards , three assists , two steals and one block . D.J . Augustin generated 12 points , seven assists and three rebounds . Terrance Ross poured in 10 points off the bench . The Knicks return home to take on the Portland Trail_Blazers on Tuesday night , while the Magic remains home and tangles with the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday evening as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 112 - 90 , at Amway_Center on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 15 - 10 ) jumped out to a 57 - 45 halftime lead , and that proved to be enough cushion to for a comfortable win . Indiana prevailed in every quarter and won both the shooting and turnover battles over the Magic ( 11 - 13 ) by healthy margins . They drained a solid 47 percent of their attempts while limiting Orlando to a 40 percent figure , including 24 percent from three - point range . They also took the ball from their hosts on 14 occasions while only committing nine turnovers themselves . The Pacers ' bench saw some extended run due to the sizable second - half advantage and contributed 49 points . Bojan Bogdanovic led the Pacers with 26 points and added three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Cory Joseph followed with a bench - leading 15 points . Thaddeus Young supplied 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Kyle O'Quinn generated a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and two blocks over 27 minutes off the bench . Tyreke Evans poured in 11 points , while Myles Turner registered 10 points , six rebounds and one block . Nikola Vucevic paced the Magic with a 22 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists . Aaron Gordon posted a 20 - point , 14 - rebound double - double and added four assists , one steal and one block . Terrence Ross mustered 11 points to lead the second unit . Evan Fournier finished with nine points . The Pacers head back home and face the Sacramento Kings on Saturday evening , while the Magic pay a visit to the Dallas Mavericks on Monday night .
The San Ajntonio Spurs defeated the Orlando Magic , 129 - 90 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Spurs ( 17 - 15 ) came into the contest running hot , having claimed wins in five of their prior six times on the court . San_Antonio 's chances of extending that streak exponentially grew when it was revealed that star big man Nikola Vucevic would miss the game for the Magic ( 14 - 16 ) due to personal reasons . San_Antonio set the tone by forging a 66 - 44 halftime lead that essentially sealed the win for them in just two quarters . However , they put the final nail in the coffin in the third quarter by compiling 38 points , a prolific amount they accomplished with excellent shooting up and down the roster . The Spurs finished with a 64 percent success rate from the floor , including 63 percent from three - point range . They were just as effective on the other end by limiting Orlando to a meager 38 percent figure . LaMarcus Aldridge paced the Spurs with 20 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Marco Belinelli poured in 18 points to lead the bench . DeMar DeRozan and Bryn Forbes contributed matching 17 - point tallies . DeRozan added seven rebounds , six assists and one steal , while Forbes posted four boards . Rudy Gay supplied 14 points , six rebounds , three assists and one block . D.J . Augustin led the Magic with 17 points and added two assists and one steal . Aaron Gordon contributed 12 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Evan Fournier matched Gordon 's scoring total and also collected two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jonathan Isaac delivered 10 points , five rebounds and one assist . Mo Bamba drew the start for Vucevic and contributed seven points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . The Spurs head back home and take on the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday night , while the Magic pay a visit to the Chicago Bulls on Friday evening as well .

The Magic tightened up in the second and cut the deficit to nine by halftime . However , the visitors showed no mercy , as they came storming out in the third to outscore the Magic by 10 in the quarter and take a 19 - point lead into the final frame . The Magic had no answer as their state rivals cruised to the 24 - point win . This marks the fifth straight win for the Heat , and the third loss in a row for the Magic . The Heat had six players score in double digits , led by Tyler Johnson , who finished with 25 points , 20 of which he scored in the third quarter alone . Justise Winslow added 22 points , six rebounds , five assists and four steals , while Josh Richardson tallied 15 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . The Heat shot 51 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Evan Fournier led the Magic with 17 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal , in 26 minutes . Aaron Gordon added 14 points , six rebounds , four assists , one steal and a block , while the only other player to score in double digits for Orlando was Jonathan Simmons , with 11 points . The Magic ( 14 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Suns on Wednesday . The Heat ( 16 - 16 ) play host to the Raptors on Wednesday .

The Magic leveraged strong rebounding and defense , winning the battle of the boards by a 50 - 43 margin while forcing 15 turnovers and holding Cleveland to 41 percent shooting . The Orlando Magic defeated the New_York Knicks , 114 - 100 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday . The Magic ( 39 - 40 ) are on the verge of the playoff bubble and they had their backs against the wall entering this game against a Knicks ( 15 - 63 ) team that keeps both eyes on the Draft Lottery and just want the season to end . The first quarter ended with a 26 - 26 score , but the Magic would pull away in the second quarter and they 'd never look back thanks to a 32 - 19 score . Even though the Knicks kept things close the rest of the way ( 29 - 27 win in the third and 26 - 29 loss in the fourth ) , they just could n't bounce back and ended losing deservedly . Meanwhile , Orlando kept themselves alive for one more day on the playoff race . And that 's all they could ask for at this stage . As it has been the trend during the entire season , Nikola Vucevic once again was Orlando 's best player since he finished with 29 points , 13 rebounds and three assists . Evan Fournier chipped in with 19 points , while Aaron Gordon filled the stat sheet with 19 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Terrence Ross delivered a strong performance off the bench since he scored 23 points while adding four rebounds and five assists in only 24 minutes . Only four Knicks scored in double digits although all of them were part of the starting lineup . Mario Hezonja led the way with 29 points , nine rebounds and five assists , while Kevin Knox chipped in with 21 points and four boards . Mitchell Robinson contributed 12 points , nine rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Emmanuel Mudiay had 13 points with 10 assists .
The visiting Utah Jazz defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 113 - 104 , at American_Airlines_Center on Sunday . Utah withstood a tough comeback effort from the Mavericks , re - establishing a strong lead in the third quarter after having given away an 11 - point advantage in the second . The Jazz went on an 18 - 6 run in the late third and early fourth quarters , rebuilding a lead after the Mavericks tied it at 73 - 73 . Dallas cut the lead to as little as six in the fourth , but Utah was able to hold firm until the final buzzer . Rudy Gobert led the Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) with 23 points and 16 rebounds in the win . Six of Gobert 's rebounds came on the offensive end , and he shot 9 - of - 13 from the field . The reigning Defensive Player of the Year also tallied two steals and three blocks on the defensive end . Sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell also made a big contribution , scoring 20 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting . Dallas ( 2 - 4 ) saw a similarly impressive night from its own All-Star center , DeAndre Jordan . Jordan flirted with a triple - double , as he scored 12 points , grabbed 19 rebounds , and dished out nine assists in the loss . Dennis Smith , Jr. led the team with 27 points and hit 3 - of - 4 three - point attempts on the night . As a whole , though , the Mavericks could not find their rhythm offensively . The team shot just 42 percent on the night . The Mavericks will travel to San_Antonio to take on the Spurs on Monday , while the Jazz have three days of rest before taking on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Wednesday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 111 - 96 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday evening . The Mavericks ( 4 - 8 ) have n't exactly enjoyed a smooth start to their season , but the little success they have had , they 've found on their home floor . Dallas had secured all three of their wins at American_Airlines_Center , and Saturday , they were facing a short - handed Thunder ( 7 - 5 ) squad once again playing without Russell Westbrook ( ankle ) . To their credit , OKC matched Dallas basket for basket in the first quarter , but the Mavs created space in the second period with some sharp shooting , leading to a 34 - point haul . That proved to be enough , as the home squad was able to keep pace with whatever the visitors threw at them in the second half . Dallas shined on both ends of the floor , shooting 56 percent from the floor ( including 48 percent from three - point range ) while limiting the Thunder to a 39 percent success rate . Paul George and Steven Adams co - led the Thunder with matching 20 - point , 13 - rebound double doubles . Dennis Schroder drew another start for Westbrook and posted 19 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jerami Grant provided 13 points , two rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Luka Doncic paced the Mavericks with 22 points and added eight assists , six rebounds and one steal . J.J. Barea followed with 21 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal in 22 minutes off the bench . Harrison Barnes and Dorian Finney-Smith posted matching 11 - point tallies , while Dennis Smith , Jr. turned in 10 points , five assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block . The Thunder heads back home and takes on the Phoenix Suns on Monday night , while the Mavericks hit the road and tangle with the Chicago Bulls on Monday evening as well .

The Mavericks got out to a solid start at home , with an early 12 - 6 lead , which they were able to evolve into a 26 - 22 lead after one quarter . The Warriors made a push to start the second and took the lead within the first four minutes . However , the Mavericks hung around and trailed by just two , 59 - 57 , at halftime . The Warriors pulled ahead by six early in the third , but the Mavericks quickly closed the gap to just two again . Nonetheless , the Warriors kept pressing and took an 86 - 82 lead into the final frame . The Mavericks simply would not back down , as they stayed within reach through the fourth quarter , before they overtook the Warriors thanks to solid defense and some clutch play in the final minutes . This marks the fourth straight win for the Mavericks , and the fourth loss in the last six games for Golden_State . Luka Doncic led the way for Dallas , with 24 points , nine rebounds and four assists , including a couple super clutch plays down the stretch . Harrison Barns had a solid outing , with 23 points , eight rebounds and one assist , in 36 minutes , while DeAndre Jordan tallied 13 points , 10 rebounds , one steal and one block . The Mavericks ( 7 - 8 ) take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Monday .

Getting to the free - throw line was huge as well , with the Mavericks connecting on 21 - of - 25 while the Magic hit just 4 - of - 5 . Ball movement was also critical , with Dallas out - assisting Orlando , 28 - 18 . The Mavericks did a ton of damage down low too , outscoring the Magic in the paint , 44 - 30 . Dallas made the run that mattered most though , as they finished the game on a 10 - 2 spurt to turn a six - point deficit into a two - point victory . There were 11 ties and 18 lead changes though , as neither club led by more than 11 points . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for the Mavericks , they dominated the final three quarters . In fact , a 33 - 18 first quarter really set the tone , as Phoenix could never get the game within four from there . Rebounding was a clear difference , with Dallas outrebounding Phoenix , 64 - 38 . The Mavericks ( 33 - 48 ) were led by Dirk Nowitzki , as he tallied 30 points , eight rebounds and three assists on 31 shots . Luka Doncic picked up another triple - double , collecting 21 points , 16 rebounds , 11 assists and three steals . Dwight Powell amassed 11 points and 11 boards while Dorian Finney-Smith led the bench with 15 points and 10 boards . This marked the season finale for the Suns , who finished with the second - worst record in the league . The Mavericks will have to play again on Wednesday when they travel to face the San Antomio Spurs .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 107 - 105 , at Barclay 's Center on Friday . Nine ties and 13 lead changes show just how close this game was , as this crosstown rivalry was n't decided until the final shot . Caris LeVert played the hero , as he hit the game - winning lay - up with one second left to break a tied game . Rebounding was the difference in the game for Brooklyn , as they won that battle , 55 - 36 . Ball movement was also critical , with the Nets handing out 22 assists and New_York recording just 14 dimes . Brooklyn was lucky to win looking at the turnover differential though , as they recorded 22 turnovers while the Knicks turned the ball over only three times . The Nets ended up hitting 49 percent of their shots while the Knicks connected on just 41 percent from the field . The Knicks ( 1 - 1 ) were led by Enes Kanter , as he amassed 29 points and 10 boards on 12 - of - 19 shooting . Tim Hardaway Jr. matched those 29 points , adding two rebounds and three steals to his line . No other starter reached double figures in scoring . as Kevin Knox led the bench with 17 points and six boards . The Nets ( 1 - 1 ) got a fantastic performance out of Caris LeVert , as he collected 28 points , six rebounds and five assists on 8 - of - 13 shooting . D'Angelo Russell totaled 15 points , five rebounds and six assists . Jarrett Allen generated 15 points , 11 rebounds and four blocks . Spencer Dinwiddie was their best bench player , providing 10 points , three rebounds and six assists . Both teams play again on Saturday , with Brooklyn facing the Indiana Pacers on the road and New_York playing host to the Boston Celtics .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 120 - 114 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday evening . The Warriors ( 6 - 1 ) looked in absolute control of the game in this contest , the second of their three - game road trip , although things ended being far tighter than expected since the Nets ( 2 - 4 ) mounted a charge in the fourth quarter and came quite close to force an overtime . Golden_State jumped to a 32 - 29 lead in the first quarter , and were pretty consistent the rest of the way since they also won the subsequent two quarters , 31 - 20 and 30 - 28 , so they entered the final 12 minutes of action up by 16 points ( 93 - 77 ) . However , Brooklyn woke up in the fourth and improved drastically , but it was n't enough . The Nets won the final quarter 37 - 27 , but Golden_State held on and secured a tough win on the road . Stephen Curry was the top scorer for the Warriors with 35 points , seven rebounds and three assists , while Kevin Durant contributed with 34 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Klay Thompson chipped in with 18 points , and Draymond Green did an excellent job of filling out the stat sheet since he posted a line of eight points , four rebounds , 13 assists and five steals . Alfonzo McKinnie added with nine points and five boards . D'Angelo Russell was the best player for the Nets since he finished with 25 points , six rebounds and six assists , while Caris LeVert chipped in with 23 points and seven assists . Jarrett Allen had 11 points , three rebounds and four assists . Two players thrived off the bench , as Allen Crabbe finished with 14 points , and Spencer Dinwiddie added 12 of his own .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons in overtime , 120 - 119 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . While Detroit led for the majority of the second half , this game was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , the Nets missed four three - pointers in the final minute of regulation , with all of those attempts to either tie or take the lead . They eventually hit one with 20 seconds left to send the game into overtime , as Detroit scored just five points in the final three minutes of regulation . Spencer Dinwiddie was the one who nailed that three , as he also hit the game - winning three - pointer with 7 seconds left in overtime . Ball movement really decided the game for Brooklyn , as they out - assisted Detroit , 26 - 16 . In addition , the Nets really dominated down low , outscoring the Pistons in the paint , 62 - 38 . The Pistons ( 4 - 3 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he collected 25 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Andre Drummond totaled 24 points , 23 rebounds and two blocks . Reggie Jackson finished with 21 points , four rebounds and two assists . Stanley Johnson accrued six points , 12 rebounds and two assists . The Nets ( 3 - 5 ) got a spectacular bench performance from Spencer Dinwiddie , as he led the team with 25 points , four rebounds and four assists . Ed Davis also played well off the bench , amassing 10 points and 10 boards . Joe Harris led the starters with 23 points and five boards . Caris LeVert accumulated 19 points , six rebounds and six assists . On deck for Brooklyn is a home matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Friday . As for Detroit , they travel to play the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday for their next outing .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 127 - 119 , at Barclays_Center on Saturday evening . The Nets got out to a good start at home , as they kicked things off with an 11 - 4 lead . The Clippers pushed back , but the Nets held on to take a , 37 - 32 , lead into the second quarter . The Nets stepped it up with a 14 - 4 run to start the quarter , and once again held off the Clippers , who continued to chip away . The Nets led 67 - 60 at halftime . Both teams came out strong in the third and matched each other bucket for bucket , until the score was settled at 97 - 90 , with the Nets ' advantage heading into the final frame . The tides turned in the fourth quarter , as the Clippers hit a quick 70 run to tie it up . The game was tied at 110 , with 4:36 to go , when the Clippers mounted a 9 - 2 run , to take a seven - point advantage with 2:13 remaining . The Clippers held on to earn their fourth straight win . Danilo Gallinari led the Clippers with 28 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , in 32 minutes . Tobias Harris followed up with 27 points , eight rebounds and three assists , while Montrezl Harrell added 16 points , 10 rebounds , one assist and a block , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Clippers shot 51 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Jarrett Allen led the Nets with 24 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and a block , in 28 minutes . D'Angelo Russell followed up with 23 points , 10 assists , three rebounds , two steals and a block , while Joe Harris tallied 19 points , four rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Nets shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 28 from long range . The Nets ( 7 - 10 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Heat in Miami on Tuesday . The Clippers ( 10 - 5 ) head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Monday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 112 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday . Things were looking bleak for the visiting Thunder ( 16 - 7 ) , as they fell behind in the first half and faced an 18 - point deficit heading into the final quarter . Then , Paul George decided it was time to take over . The All-Star forward scored 24 points in the fourth quarter , including the Thunder 's final seven points and a game - winning three - pointer with 3 seconds left on the clock . In the end , George finished with a game - high 47 points ( 15 - 27 FG , 6 - 13 3Pt ) , 15 rebounds and four assists across 37 minutes . As a team , it was a poor shooting night in all facets of the game , as Oklahoma_City shot 34 percent from three , 43 percent from the field overall and just 58 percent from the free throw line . Fortunately , George came through to save the day over the final eight minutes . The Thunder 's next highest scorer was Russell Westbrook , who did n't score a single point in the fourth quarter but finished with 21 points , 15 rebounds and 17 assists in 40 minutes . As for the Nets ( 8 - 18 ) , they were on cruise control for 36 minutes Wednesday and looked to be well on their way to putting an end to their seven - game losing streak . However , just 19 points in the fourth quarter and failing to score in the final two and half minutes was not enough to get the job done . As a team , Brooklyn shot a fairly impressive 15 - of - 36 ( 42 percent ) from behind the arc , but shot just 43 percent from the field overall . Allen Crabbe led the way with a team - high 22 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting from behind the arc , while Joe Harris added 19 points of his own . Point guards D'Angelo Russell and Spencer Dinwiddie each dropped 17 points but combined for just six assists .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 144 - 127 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Nets ( 13 - 18 ) entered this game on the heels of a four - game winning streak , and managed to extend that positive run against a Hawks ( 6 - 23 ) squad that looked overmatched from start to finish . Brooklyn jumped to a 19 - point lead after the first quarter ( 42 - 23 ) and they never looked back in this one . Atlanta tried to turn things around and reduced the deficit to six points after a 43 - 30 second quarter . It seemed as if Atlanta were set to continue their push in the second half , but the Nets won the next two quarters ( 39 - 30 and 33 - 31 , respectively ) and secured a comfortable win by a 17 - point margin . Now Brooklyn have won their last five in a row , while Atlanta have now lost seven of their past eight . D'Angelo Russell was the star of the game for the Nets since he finished with 32 points , seven assists , six rebounds and two steals in only 29 minutes of action . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson filled the stat sheet as well thanks to 18 points , four boards , three assists and two steals , while Jeff Harris added 16 points with six assists . Jarrett Allen and Rodions Kurucs had 11 points , while Jared Dudley ( 16 points ) , DeMarre Carroll ( 15 points ) and Spencer Dinwiddie ( 15 points , five assists ) all reached double - digit scoring off the bench . Jared Collins was the best player for the Hawks since he finished with 29 points and eight rebounds . Trae Young had a double - double with 13 points and 10 assists , while Dewayne Dedmon also had one thanks to his 24 points and 12 rebounds , as well as three assists and one block . Kent Bazemore delivered 20 points and seven assists .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 111 - 103 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday evening . The Nets ( 16 - 19 ) came into Sunday 's contest with a couple of built - in advantages , one of which was the fact they were on their home floor . The other was that they were catching the feisty Suns ( 8 - 26 ) less than 24 hours removed from a triple - overtime defeat against the Wizards . However , to its credit , Phoenix came out and stayed close in the first quarter , trailing just 38 - 31 after 12 minutes . By the third quarter , fatigue apparently was settling in , as they scored just 18 points while Brooklyn added 10 more points to what had been a 63 - 56 halftime edge . Deandre Ayton showed he still had plenty of life left in his legs by leading the Suns with a 26 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , three blocks and two steals . Devin Booker followed with 25 points , nine assists and two rebounds . Josh Jackson led the bench with 11 points , three rebounds and one assist . Malik Bridges mustered nine points , four assists , three rebounds , five steals and one block . T.J. Warren had just four points on 2 - for - 11 shooting . Spencer Dinwiddie paced the Nets with 24 points and added seven assists and two rebounds . D'Angelo Russell supplied 18 points , eight assists , six rebounds and two steals . Rodions Kurucs followed with a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Eric Davis posted 15 points , nine boards , three steals and one block . Joe Harris offered 13 points , three boards and two assists . Jarrett Allen just missed a double - double with 11 points , nine boards , two assists and one steal . The Suns remain on the road and visit the Orlando Magic on Wednesday evening , while the Nets remain home to face the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday night as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 114 - 110 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . In one of the tightest games of the evening , it took 17 ties and 15 lead changes to determine a winner . In addition , neither club led by more than 10 points , as none of the four quarters were decided by more than three points . The shooting disparity was huge , with Brooklyn connecting on 48 percent of their shots while holding Orlando to 43 percent from the field . The Nets also won the points in the paint differential , 58 - 44 while outscoring the Magic in fastbreak points , 15 - 7 . The Magic ( 20 - 28 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 21 points , 14 rebounds , five assists , two steals and four blocks . D.J . Augustin finished with 19 points , three rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jonathan Isaac totaled 16 points , four rebounds and three blocks while Jonathon Simmons led the bench with 13 points , two rebounds and three assists . The Nets ( 26 - 23 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he collected 25 points , seven rebounds , 10 assists and two steals . Joe Harris accumulated 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie was huge off the bench , as he provided 29 points , three rebounds and three assists . DeMarre Carroll also totaled 19 points and four rebounds off the bench as well . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Orlando playing host to the Washington Wizards and Brooklyn welcoming the New_York Knicks to Barclay 's Center .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 135 - 130 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . While Denver made this game competitive late , Brooklyn rode the second and third quarters to victory . In fact , the Nets outscored the Nuggets , 78 - 52 , in the middle quarters . That allowed Brooklyn to lead by 21 points at times in the second half , as they led by at least five points for the final 28 minutes . The Nets bench came up big , as they outscored the Nuggets bench , 53 - 42 . Brooklyn 's offense was unstoppable , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range while recording 36 assists . The Nuggets ( 37 - 17 ) were led by Nikola Jokic , as he tallied 25 points , 14 rebounds and 10 assists en route to a triple - double . Jamal Murray returned from an ankle injury to total 19 points , three rebounds and 11 assists . Mason Plumlee finished with 24 points , six rebounds and three blocks while Monte ' Morris led the bench with 18 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Nets ( 29 - 27 ) got a spectacular performance from D'Angelo Russell , as he collected 27 points , six rebounds and 11 assists . Joe Harris accrued 17 points , five rebounds and two assists . DeMarre Carroll was huge off the bench , providing 18 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and four steals . Shabazz Napier also amassed 10 points and 11 assists off the bench . On deck for Denver is another tough road game , as they face the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday . As for Brooklyn , they play host to the Chicago Bulls on Friday as well .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 125 - 116 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . This was a rather dominating road victory for the Wizards despite the final scoreline , as they held the lead for the entirety of the second half . In fact , a 33 - 19 third quarter allowed Washington to lead by at least nine points for the whole of the fourth quarter , as a late run by Brooklyn made it look closer than it actually was . Rebounding was key for Washington , as they outrebounded Brooklyn , 57 - 41 . Ball movement was also huge , with the Wizards out - assisting the Nets , 34 - 20 . The Wizards ( 25 - 36 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 31 points , two rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Trevor Ariza finished with 23 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and two steals . Bobby Portis amassed 10 points , 12 rebounds and two steals while Thomas Bryant led the bench with 18 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Nets ( 32 - 31 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he collected 28 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Jarrett Allen totaled 12 points , six boards and three blocks . Shabazz Napier was the only other Net in double figures , as he provided 22 points off the bench . Caris LeVert had a game to forget , as he went scoreless in 20 minutes and grabbed just two rebounds with no other statistics . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Washington traveling to face the struggling Boston Celtics and Brooklyn playing host to the Charlotte Hornets .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 113 - 107 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . Brooklyn came into this matchup as a sizable favorite but Cleveland made it close late . A 31 - 20 first quarter really set the tone for the Nets , as they capped off their victory with a 33 - 22 fourth quarter . With that said , there were six ties and eight lead changes in total , as Brooklyn overcame an eight - point third quarter deficit to win . The shooting disparity was key , with the Nets shooting 47 percent from the field and the Cavaliers connecting on just 40 percent of their shots . Brooklyn did most of their damage down low , outscoring Cleveland in the paint , 58 - 38 . The Cavaliers ( 16 - 49 ) were led by Kevin Love , as he tallied 24 points , 16 rebounds and four assists . Larry Nance Jr. finished with 17 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and four steals . Collin Sexton amassed 12 points , five assists and two blocks while David Nwaba led the bench with 22 points . The Nets ( 34 - 33 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he accrued 25 points , four rebounds , five assists and three steals . Jarrett Allen amassed 15 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie was huge off the bench , providing 28 points , four rebounds and five assists . Ed Davis led the team with 12 rebounds off the bench as well . On deck for Cleveland is a road matchup versus the Miami Heat on Friday . As for Brooklyn , they return to action on Saturday when they travel to face the Atlanta Hawks .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 115 - 105 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday night . The Raptors ( 56 - 23 ) jumped on the Nets ( 39 - 40 ) quickly , opening a 34 - 22 lead through the first 12 minutes despite Brooklyn needing the win to keep itself in postseason contention . The home squad did start to show more urgency in the second quarter and had cut their deficit to seven by halftime . However , it was back to 12 by the time the final period began , and although the Nets got as close as 110 - 105 with 1:24 remaining , Toronto 's 50 run to finish off the contest sealed the win . Pascal Siakam led the way for the Raptors with 28 points , adding 10 rebounds and five assists . Kawhi Leonard furnished 26 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Serge Ibaka turned in a 23 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Kyle Lowry delivered 10 points , five boards and four assists . Marc Gasol filled out the stat sheet with eight points , nine rebounds , six assists and four steals . D'Angelo Russell paced the Nets with 27 points and complemented them with seven rebounds , six assists and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie totaled 14 points , five assists and four rebounds . Jarrett Allen and DeMarre Carroll generated matching 12 - point tallies while also bringing down nine and five rebounds , respectively . Rodions Kurucks managed 11 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . The Raptors remain on the road and take on the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night , while the Nets pay a visit to the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday afternoon .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 115 - 107 , at Pepsi_Center on Monday evening . The Celtics got out to a great start on the road , with a quick 10 - 2 run , before going on to build a 34 - 19 lead by the end of the quarter . The Nuggets answered in the second , as they kicked things off with a 90 run , just minutes into the quarter , to cut the deficit to six . The Celtics managed to push their lead back to 10 , but the Nuggets did not back down , as they outscored the Celtics , 19 - 11 , through the rest of the quarter , to trail by just two at halftime . Both teams came out strong in the third , as they went back - and - forth to keep the score within one or two possessions , however , the Nuggets took over in the final minutes , where they outscored the Celtics 11 - 4 , to take a seven - point lead into the fourth . The Nuggets did not look back from there , as they managed to stay one step ahead throughout the fourth , to earn their fifth straight win , and move to 60 at home . Jamal Murray went off for a career - high 48 points on 19 - of - 30 shooting , in 38 minutes , to lead the Nuggets . Gary Harris and Trey Lyles chipped in 13 points each , while Nikola Jokic tallied eight points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . The Nuggets shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 31 points on 13 - of - 17 shooting , five rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block , in 33 minutes . Jayson Tatum and Jaylen Brown tallied 15 points each , while Al Horford finished with 12 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 32 minutes . The Celtics shot 51 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from deep . The Celtics ( 6 - 4 ) will look to avoid a third straight loss , as they take on the Suns in Phoenix on Thursday . The Nuggets ( 9 - 1 ) take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 105 - 99 , at Pepsi_Center on Monday . Injuries have continued to plague the Nuggets ( 18 - 9 ) this season , but they fought through the absence of two starters Monday to earn a key victory over the Grizzlies after dropping back - to - back games to the Hornets and Hawks . They were led by a stellar outing from Nikola Jokic , who contnues to show how he 's one of the best all - around players in the NBA . Jokic posted a game - high 27 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting to go along with 12 rebounds and six assists in 38 minutes . The most important performance from a Nuggets players Monday night , however , was from reserve point guard Monte Morris . Morris came off the bench to score 20 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting on top of five rebounds and six assists in 28 minutes . As for the Grizzlies ( 15 - 11 ) , they have now dropped two games in a row , and Monday 's loss can be chalked up to a lack of production from the starting unit . Mike Conley shot just 5 - of - 14 from the field , but he was the only Memphis starter to reach double figures , scoring a team - high 19 points in 32 minutes . Marc Gasol was just 2 - of - 6 from the field and scored just seven points , while rookie sensation Justin Jackson Jr. played just 20 minutes and managed to post only seven points in the process . The Grizzlies ' bench , however , did everything it could to keep the team in the game . Led by Shelvin Mack 's 14 points , the five Memphis reserves scored 51 of the team 's 99 points , outscoring the five starters .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 109 - 98 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday evening . The Nuggets got out to a solid start at home as they outscored the visitors , 39 - 32 , through the first quarter . The game tightened up in the second , but the Nuggets were able to keep the edge , as they took a 60 - 52 lead into halftime . The Thunder came out strong in the third and made it a one - point game halfway through the quarter , but the Nuggets bounced back to reclaim a six - point lead by the end of the quarter . The Nuggets pushed their lead to 11 in the fourth , but the Thunder cut it back down to three with 3:20 remaining . However , the Nuggets closed the contest on a 10 - 2 run , to secure their second straight win , and hand the Thunder their second straight loss . Nikola Jokic had a monster night for the Nuggets , with 24 points , 15 rebounds , nine assists and three steals , in 35 minutes . Jamal Murray followed up with 19 points , nine assists and one rebound , while Juancho Hernangomez added 16 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 33 minutes . The Nuggets shot 50 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Paul George was the high - point man for the Thunder , with 32 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 39 minutes . Russell Westbrook tallied 13 points , 14 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , while Steven Adams finished with 26 points , 14 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . The Thunder ( 17 - 10 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Clippers on Saturday . The Nuggets ( 19 - 9 ) play host to the Raptors on Sunday .
In a battle of the Western_Conference 's top two teams , the Golden_State Warriors took down the Denver Nuggets , 142 - 111 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday . Things got off to a historic start as Golden_State ( 30 - 14 ) scored a whopping 51 first - quarter points . Despite their opponent 's scoring surge , the Nuggets ( 29 - 14 ) held close behind , trailing by only 13 points at the end of the first . However , an incredible first half from Kevin Durant kept Golden_State far ahead . Durant finished the first half with 20 points on blisteringly hot 8 - of - 10 shooting . Durant and the Warriors never slowed down , finishing the night shooting 62 percent from the field and 21 - of - 40 from three - point range . 18 of the team 's three - pointers came from the trio of Durant , Steph Curry , and Klay Thompson . The three All-Stars combined to score 89 points , including a team - high 31 from Curry . Draymond Green , meanwhile , scored only four points but added 13 assists and two steals while committing only one turnover . On the other side of the court , it was a fairly pedestrian night for Nikola Jokic , who tallied just 17 points and three rebounds . The elite big man did , however , lead the team with eight assists . Denver saw a team - high 22 points from Malik Beasley , while Jamal Murray notched another 21 . Golden_State will host the New_Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday , while Denver next faces a tilt against the Chicago Bulls this Thursday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 126 - 110 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday evening . The contest got out to a high - paced start , as the Nuggets led 41 - 37 after one quarter . The Sixers battled through the second , but the Nuggets closed the quarter strong , to extend their lead to nine by halftime . The Nuggets stayed in control through the third and managed to push their lead to double digits by the start of the fourth . They pushed their lead to 16 mid way though the fourth and cruised to their second straight win . Nikola Jokic led the Nuggets with 32 points on 12 - of - 22 shooting , 18 rebounds , 10 assists and one steal , in 33 minutes . Mason Plumlee followed up with 17 points , six rebounds , four assists and one block , while Torrey Craig added 15 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Nuggets shot 52 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , J.J. Redick led the 76ers with 22 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting , three assists and two rebounds , in 27 minutes .
