Corey Brewer followed up with 20 points , six rebounds , four steals and two assist , while Ben Simmons finished with 19 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . The Sixers shot 42 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 36 from long range . The 76ers ( 32 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Lakers in L.A. on Tuesday . The Nuggets ( 33 - 15 ) take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Monday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Sacramento Kings , 120 - 118 , in a last - second thriller at Pepsi_Center on Wednesday . All eyes were on former Celtics star Isaiah Thomas , who made his debut with Denver ( 39 - 18 ) on Wednesday . Thomas had not seen NBA action in 11 months , as he had been sidelined by a hip injury . The diminutive All-Star made an impact in 13 minutes on the court , scoring eight points on 3 - of - 6 shooting . His Nuggets debut was overshadowed , though , by a back - and - forth game that culminated in a thrilling final sequence . Down two late in the game , Sacramento ( 30 - 27 ) tied it up at 118 on a layup from shooting guard Buddy Hield . Hield could not force overtime , though , as the Nuggets capitalized on their last possession with a buzzer - beating floater from superstar Nikola Jokic . On top of his late - game heroics , Jokic led his team with 18 rebounds and 11 assists . The standout showing marked Jokic 's 12th triple - double this season . Paul Millsap also delivered a gem for Denver , scoring 25 points to go with 12 rebounds . The win marked the second straight for the Nuggets after the team suffered a three - game losing streak last week . Hield was Sacramento 's leading scorer with 25 points . The Kings also saw 11 assists from star point guard De'Aaron Fox . Newly-acquired forward Harrison Barnes had his best night since joining the team , tallying 19 points and 11 rebounds . Wednesday 's contest carries both teams into the All-Star break .
The Denver Nuggets took down the Detroit Pistons , 95 - 92 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday evening . The Pistons ( 37 - 37 ) fought back from a double - digit deficit and trailed by just two late in the fourth quarter on Tuesday . However , Denver ( 50 - 23 ) closed out the game in style with a clutch step - back two from Jamal Murray . The jumper capped off a 31 - point night from Murray , whose performance helped Denver move back into a tie for first in the Western_Conference . Nikola Jokic also had a big night in what proved to be an exciting big man duel . Jokic scored 23 points and grabbed 15 rebounds while squaring off against Detroit 's own All-Star bigs . Paul Millsap grabbed another 13 boards for the Nuggets , though he shot only 2 - of - 10 from the floor . As a whole , it was a less - than - stellar offensive night for the Nuggets , who shot just 42 percent overall . However , their defense got the job done , holding Detroit to just 35 percent shooting . Blake Griffin led the way for the Pistons with 29 points and 15 rebounds . Griffin attempted a game - high 31 shots , making 12 . His strong performance was complemented by Andre Drummond , who added 18 rebounds and 13 points . Detroit will host the Orlando Magic on Thursday evening , while the Nuggets will visit OKC .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 119 - 110 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a good start on the road , as they owned a 29 - 22 lead after one quarter . However , the Nuggets awoke in the second , where they outscored the visitors by 13 , to take six - point lead into halftime . The Trail_Blazers kept pushing and chipped away through the third quarter , to reclaim three - point lead heading into the final frame . Fittingly , the fourth quarter featured another swing , as the Nuggets immediately took the lead back and stayed in front the rest of the way for their second straight win . Paul Millsap led the Nuggets with 25 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a steal , in 30 minutes . Nikola Jokic tallied 22 points , 13 rebounds , nine assists , two steals and a block , while Jamal Murray added 23 points , six assists , four rebounds and a steal . The Nuggets shot 51 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from deep . Enes Kanter led the Trail_Blazers with 24 points , seven rebounds and four assists , in 38 minutes . Al-Farouq Aminu finished with 12 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block , while Rodney Hood chipped in 17 points , three steals , two rebounds and an assist . The Blazers shot 49 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 29 from long range . The Nuggets ( 53 - 26 ) and Trail_Blazers ( 50 - 29 ) will got at it again on Sunday in Portland .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 98 - 94 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday night . The Rockets ( 4 - 5 ) and the Pacers ( 7 - 4 ) played a very interesting game on Monday , as neither club gave an inch to the other and the game had to be decided in the final minutes thanks to an impressive comeback from the visiting team . Houston was up 29 - 22 following the first quarter , but Indiana flipped the script and won the second quarter 33 - 24 , as well as the third one 20 - 16 , to put themselves ahead by six points entering the final 12 minutes of action . But the Rockets did n't give up , and won the final quarter 29 - 19 to pull away for good . Both teams struggled with their shooting percentages , as Houston shot 44 percent from the field and 32 from three - point range , as opposed to Indiana 's 44 and 29 , respectively . James Harden led the Rockets offensively with 28 points , but he also added six assists , four rebounds and three steals , while Clint Capela back him up with a double - double of 18 points and 10 rebounds . Chris Paul only had nine points , but contributed with 13 assists and five boards . James Ennis III had 13 points , while Carmelo Anthony chipped in with eight points and five rebounds off the bench . Victor Oladipo paced the Pacers offensively with 28 points , six rebounds and two assists , while Bojan Bogdanovic contributed with 11 points . Thaddeus Young and Myles Turner disappointed , however , since they combined for only 15 points while going 6 - of - 17 from the field between them . Domantas Sabonis ( 17 points , eight rebounds , five assists ) and Tyreke Evans ( 11 points in only 16 minutes ) looked solid coming off the bench , though .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 99 - 91 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Friday . While Miami got out to an eight - point lead after the first quarter , Indiana dominated from there . The second quarter was key , with the Pacers outscoring the Heat , 32 - 16 . Indiana held the lead for the entirety of the second half , as there were only three ties and two lead changes in total . The shooting disparity was also critical , with Indiana connecting on 44 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range while holding Miami to just 38 percent from the field and 39 percent from long range . The Heat ( 6 - 9 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he tallied 28 points , four rebounds and two assists on 10 - of - 16 from the field . Hassan Whiteside finished with 12 points , 17 rebounds and two blocks . Rodney McGruder totaled 11 points and five rebounds while Tyler Johnson led the bench with 10 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Pacers ( 9 - 6 ) were led by Tyreke Evans , as he scored a season - high 23 points to lead the bench . He also provided 10 rebounds and went 5 - of - 7 from three - point range . Bojan Bogdanovic led the starters with 16 points and six boards . Myles Turner accrued 12 points , seven rebounds , four assists and three blocks . On deck for Indiana is a home matchup versus the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday . As for Miami , they 're off until Sunday when they play host to the Los_Angeles Lakers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 97 - 89 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Saturday . There were six ties and 14 lead changes in this game , as it took a big second half for Indiana to pull away . In fact , the Pacers outscored the Hawks , 50 - 33 , in the second half . Defense was key for Indiana , as they held Atlanta to just 36 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was also a huge factor , with the Pacers outrebounding the Hawks , 54 - 41 . These teams combined for 39 combined steals and blocks , which is one of the highest totals of the season . The Hawks ( 3 - 13 ) had just one starter reach double figures in scoring , as Kent Bazemore collected 13 points , five rebounds , four assists and four steals . Jeremy Lin led the team in scoring off of the bench , providing 16 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . John Collins made his season debut , as he amassed 12 points and two rebounds in 12 minutes of action . The Pacers ( 10 - 6 ) lost their leading scorer in this game , as Victor Oladipo left after eight minutes due to a sore knee . Bojan Bogdanovic stepped up in his absence , leading the way with 22 points and four rebounds . Darren Collison accumulated 12 points , two rebounds , five assists and two steals . Myles Turner generated 10 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Domantas Sabonis was huge off the bench , providing nine points , 16 rebounds and six assists . Both teams play home games on Monday for their next fixture , with Indiana welcoming the Utah Jazz and Atlanta facing off with the Los_Angeles Clippers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Utah Jazz , 121 - 94 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 11 - 6 ) ended their three - game homestand on a strong note , destroying the Jazz ( 8 - 9 ) right from tip - off and they never gave the Western_Conference team a chance to re - group themselves . Indiana quickly jumped to a 13 - point lead following the first quarter ( 32 - 19 ) and while Utah offered some degree of resistance in the second quarter ( 28 - 25 ) , they were never in the game long enough to make this a tight contest . Indiana cruised their way in the second half and won both remaining quarters ( 29 - 23 and 35 - 24 , respectively ) , securing their third straight win and leaving Indiana on a strong note . On the other hand , Utah lost again and now they have dropped three of their last four games . They ended their five - game road trip with a 2 - 3 record . The Pacers did n't have Victor Oladipo , but that did n't seem to matter and six Indiana players ended scoring in double digits . Bojan Bogdanovic led the way with 21 points , while Myles Turner and Thaddeus Young each contributed 12 points coming off the bench . Most of the scoring damage came off the bench , though . Domantas Sabonis and Aaron Holiday each had 19 points , while Doug McDermott added 12 points . Ricky Rubio was by far the best player on Utah and he did an admirable job of filling the stat sheet since he ended the contest with 28 points ( 10 - of - 13 from the field ) but also added six assists , four rebounds and three steals . Rudy Gobert had 12 points with 11 rebounds , and Jae Crowder added 14 off the bench . Donovan Mitchell struggled and only finished with seven points .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 107 - 97 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Saturday . This was a tale of four quarters , as Indiana rode the second and fourth quarters to victory . In fact , the Pacers outscored the Kings , 64 - 48 , in those 24 minutes . Indiana really finished strong , ending the game on a 23 - 14 run across the final eight minutes . Rebounding was key for the Pacers , as they out - rebounded the Kings , 52 - 43 . They also dominated scoring down low , as they outscored the Kings in the paint , 56 - 46 . Bench production was also huge , as Indiana had three bench players reach double figures in scoring while Sacramento had just one player reach that threshold . The Kings ( 13 - 12 ) were led by Buddy Hield , as he tallied 20 points and four rebounds . De'Aaron Fox accrued 18 points , six assists and two blocks . Willie Cauley-Stein totaled 14 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Bogdan Bogdanovic started and finished with 11 points , three rebounds , six assists and three steals while Nemanja Bjelica amassed six points and 12 boards . The Pacers ( 16 - 10 ) were led by Thaddeus Young , as he generated 20 points and nine rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic accumulated 18 points , four rebounds and two assists . Darren Collison finished with 14 points , three rebounds and six assists while Myles Turner provided nine points , 13 rebounds and four blocks . Domantas Sabonis , Cory Joseph and Doug McDermott all reached double figures in scoring off the bench . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Indiana playing host to the Washington Wizards and Sacramento traveling to face the Chicago Bulls .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 92 - 91 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Tuesday . The Cavaliers ( 8 - 23 ) were one of the worst teams in the Eastern_Conference entering Tuesday 's action , so there 's no question that this win against the Pacers ( 20 - 11 ) , who were riding a seven - game winning streak , should qualify as quite an upset . The game was tight and sloppy during most of the game , as both teams struggled from the field during the entire contest , but they saved the best for last . With Indiana up by only one point , Victor Oladipo missed two pivotal free throws , and that gave Cleveland a chance they would n't waste away . Rodney Hood missed a mid - range jumper , but Larry Nance Jr. tipped it home on the rebound to give the Cavs a huge win on the road , and their first one this season when they are trailing after three quarters . The final score in each quarter was : 21 - 19 , 24 - 25 , 22 - 24 , 25 - 23 . Larry Nance Jr. might have been the hero for Cleveland , but he also filled the stat sheet admirably in this game since he finished with 15 points , 16 rebounds , six assists , and three steals . Rodney Hood was the leading scorer with 17 points , and rookie Collin Sexton had 12 points . Cedi Osman chipped in with 13 points and seven rebounds , while Matthew Dellavedova ( 10 points , four assists ) and Alec Burks ( 14 points ) looked solid off the bench as well . Six Indiana players scored in double digits and Domantas Sabonis was the leading scorer thanks to a 17 - point , eight - rebound performance off the bench . Victor Oladipo had 12 points , but struggled from the field ( 4 - 15 ) and missed two clutch free throws . Bojan Bogdanovic added 14 points , and Myles Turner had a double - double of 12 points and 10 rebounds .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Washington Wizards , 105 - 89 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday evening . The Pacers ( 22 - 12 ) came into the contest with a well - earned reputation for suffocating defense , and they 'd use it frequently in their dominating win . The third quarter made all the difference , as Indiana outscored the Wizards ( 13 - 21 ) by a 31 - 18 margin during the period . Washington was clearly dealing with some fatigue in the second half , which was reflected in their 37 percent success rate from the field and 22 turnovers . They were also significantly out - hustled on the boards , losing the rebounding battle by a 57 - 37 margin . Markieff Morris paced the Wizards with 16 points and added six rebounds , one assist and one steal . Thomas Bryant produced 11 points and seven rebounds . Jeff Green tallied 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . Chasson Randle contributed 10 points off the bench . Bradley Beal ( seven points , five assists , four rebounds , one steal ) and John Wall ( seven points , five rebounds , five assists , one steal ) had underwhelming performances . Myles Turner led the Pacers with an 18 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two blocks and one steal . Domantas Sabonis followed with 15 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Bojan Bogdanovic finished with 14 points , three rebounds , two assists and three steals . Darren Collison and Victor Oladipo generated matching 12 - point tallies , with Oladipo also dishing out nine assists . Aaron Holiday poured in 12 points off the bench as well . The Wizards are back in action at home on Wednesday night against the Pistons , while the Pacers visit the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday evening as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 125 - 88 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 24 - 12 ) set the tone for what would be a dominant win early , forging a 32 - 21 first - quarter lead . The Pistons ( 16 - 17 ) could n't make any serious inroads into their deficit after that point , and Indiana 's pinpoint shooting had a lot to do with it . The home squad shot an eye - popping 60 percent overall , with seven players hitting double digits in the scoring column . They were nearly as impressive on the defensive end , as they limited Detroit to 37 percent shooting - - including 25 percent from three - point range - - and forced them into 22 turnovers . Blake Griffin led the way for the Pistons with 18 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds and five assists . Luke Kennard followed with a bench - leading 14 points and added two rebounds and one steal . Reggie Bullock poured in 13 points and added three boards , one steal and one block . Andre Drummond generated a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks and one steal . Reggie Jackson mustered eight points , six assists and four rebounds . Darren Collison co - led the Pacers with 19 points and also provided seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Domantas Sabonis matched Collison 's scoring total and also pulled down 12 rebounds , dished out three assists and recorded one block . Myles Turner and Thaddeus Young had matching 17 - point tallies . Bojan Bogdanovic supplied 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . Doug McDermott had 12 of his own and also posted three boards . The Pistons remain on the road and tangle with the Orlando Magic on Sunday afternoon , while the Pacers remain home and face the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday afternoon as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 131 - 97 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Tuesday . Indiana came into this game as a huge favorite and a 131 - 97 scoreline vindicates that thought . A 38 - 19 first quarter really set the tone , as the Pacers won in wire - to - wire fashion . In addition , they won the first , third and fourth quarters by at least 11 points apiece . Defensive rebounding was big for Indiana , as they won that battle , 43 - 33 . The assist - to - turnover differential was also decisive , with the Pacers recording five more assists than the Suns while committing five fewer turnovers . Indiana shot 52 percent from the field , 48 percent from three - point range and 75 percent from the free - throw line while Phoenix hit just 42 percent from the field , 30 percent from long range and 50 percent from the charity stripe . The Suns ( 11 - 34 ) were led by T.J. Warren , as he amassed 19 points and three boards . Devin Booker returned to provide eight points , five rebounds and five assists . DeAndre Ayton totaled 14 points and eight rebounds while Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Pacers ( 29 - 14 ) were led by Bojan Bogdanovic , as he tallied 20 points , five rebounds and three assists . Myles Turner accrued 18 points , six rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Darren Collison finished with 15 points , four rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Thaddeus Young totaled 12 points , seven rebounds and four assists while Victor Oladipo generated eight points , six rebounds and five assists . Tyreke Evans led the bench with 20 points and four rebounds . Both teams return to action on Thursday , with Pheonix traveling to face the Toronto Raptors and Indiana playing host to the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 99 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Saturday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , as the Mavs led for most of the first quarter , before the Pacers pulled ahead by one , to take a 24 - 23 lead into the second quarter . The Pacers carried the momentum and outscored the visitors by 15 in the second , to take a 58 - 42 lead into halftime . Things tightened up again in the third , but the Mavs could not do much , as they only cut into the deficit by one point , entering the final frame down by 15 . The Mavericks kept chipping away through the fourth and cut the lead to single digits , however the Pacers were able to hold their position and walk away with the home win . Tyreke Evans led the Pacers with 19 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting , and two assists , in 25 minutes off the bench . Domantas Sabonis followed up with 16 points , 11 rebounds and two assists , in 27 minutes off the bench , while Darren Collison tallied 16 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 20 points on 6 - of - 15 shooting , three rebounds and two assists , in 32 minutes . DeAndre Jordan followed up with 15 points and 16 rebounds , while Wesley Matthews tallied 17 points , three rebounds and two assists . Luka Doncic finished with eight points , five rebounds , six assists and three steals . The Mavs ( 20 - 25 ) will look to avoid a fourth straight loss as they take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Monday . The Pacers ( 30 - 15 ) play host to the Hornets on Sunday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 116 - 92 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Thursday . The Pacers ( 36 - 19 ) and the Clippers ( 30 - 26 ) were expected to be involved in a tight contest , but Indiana did n't have problems to dominate the game entirely and cruise to a huge win over Los_Angeles . The Pacers quickly jumped to a five - point lead in the first quarter ( 36 - 31 ) , but they ran away with the game in the second quarter where they opened up the gap to 18 points following a 35 - 22 run . Adding insult to the injury , the Clippers won the third quarter 27 - 20 and the game was essentially over from there . The Clippers won the final quarter 19 - 18 , but they could n't mount any sort of a comeback and Indiana cruised their way to a solid win . Bojan Bogdanovic was the top scorer for the Pacers since he finished with 29 points and seven rebounds . Myles Turner added 17 points with four blocks , and Darren Collison contributed 14 points and five assists . Thaddeus Young filled the stat sheet nicely since he ended the contest with 14 points , five rebounds , five steals and four assists . Cory Joseph chipped in with 13 points , nine boards and six assists off the bench . Montrezl Harrell was the top scorer for the Clippers since he contributed 19 points and four assists , but he also committed six turnovers . Danilo Gallinari had 12 points and also added five rebounds . No other Clipper in the starting lineup topped the 10 - point mark , but two bench players did it since both Lou Williams and Johnathan Motley had 10 points each .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Indiana Pacers , 117 - 112 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Saturday . There were 10 ties and 12 lead changes in this tightly - contested game , as neither club led by more than 11 points . Orlando won in comeback fashion , as they outscored Indiana , 34 - 25 , in the fourth quarter . Offensive rebounding was the difference for the Magic , as they won that battle , 11 - 3 . That allowed the Magic to outscore the Pacers in the paint , 54 - 48 . Both offenses were on point , with Indiana connecting on 55 percent of their shots while Orlando shot 51 percent from the field . The Magic ( 30 - 34 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 27 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals . Evan Fournier accrued 19 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Jonathan Isaac totaled 12 points and eight boards while Aaron Gordon tallied 11 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Terrence Ross led the bench with 23 points and three boards . The Pacers ( 41 - 23 ) were led by Bojan Bogdanovic , as he amassed 25 points , three rebounds and three assists . Darren Collison accumulated 23 points , three rebounds and 10 assists . Thaddeus Young finished with 13 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals while Cory Joseph led the bench with 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Indiana playing host to the surprising Chicago Bulls and Orlando traveling to face the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 108 - 106 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . While there were only a handful of ties and lead changes in this game , it came down to the wire . In fact , Oklahoma_City took a 12 - 11 lead halfway through the first quarter and did n't surrender that lead until late in the fourth quarter . Indiana actually overcame a 13 - point halftime deficit by riding a 58 - 43 second half to victory . Wesley Matthews played the hero , as he made a putback lay - up with less than two seconds remaining to break a tied game . Free-throw shooting was the difference , with the Pacers hitting 27 - of - 32 and the Thunder connecting on just 16 - of - 20 . Indiana 's bench came up big too , outscoring Oklahoma_City 's bench , 31 - 25 . Assists , steals , blocks and turnovers were all decided within one in this tightly - contested game . The Thunder ( 42 - 27 ) were led by Paul George , as he tallied 36 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Russell Westbrook collected 19 points , 14 rebounds , 11 assists , four steals and two blocks en route to a triple - double . Steven Adams amassed 17 points and eight boards while Dennis Schroder provided seven points , five rebounds and five assists off the bench . The Pacers ( 44 - 25 ) were led by Domantas Sabonis , as he accrued 26 points , seven rebounds and four assists off the bench . Bojan Bogdanovic led the starters with 23 points , four rebounds and five assists . Darren Collison totaled 17 points , six rebounds , seven assists and four steals while Matthews finished with 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Saturday against the top teams in the west , with Indiana traveling to face the Denver Nuggets and Oklahoma_City playing host to the Golden_State Warriors .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 124 - 88 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday afternoon . The Pacers got out to a good start at home and brought a four - point lead into the second quarter . They carried the momentum in the second and would outscore the visitors by 12 in the quarter to take a 16 - point lead by halftime . The Nuggets could not get anything going as they started slow in the third and the Pacers pulled ahead again , outscoring them by nine in the quarter , to take a 25 - point lead into the final frame . The Pacers held strong through the fourth to earn an impressive home win over one of the leagues top teams . Bojan Bogdanovic led the Pacers with 35 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 26 minutes . Myles Turner added 17 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal , while Domantas Sabonis tallied 15 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . The Pacers shot 56 percent from the field including 8 - of - 18 from long range . Nikola Jokic led the Nuggets with 19 points , 11 rebounds , eight assists , four blocks and one steal , in 30 minutes . Will Barton followed up 15 points , three rebounds and one assist , while Monte Morris added 12 points , one rebound and one assist , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Nuggets shot 36 percent from the field including 7 - of - 29 of from deep . The Nuggets ( 49 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Pistons on Tuesday . The Pacers take on the thunder in OKC on Wednesday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 111 - 102 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 46 - 32 ) entered this game losing seven of their last eight matchups and things did n't start on a positive note for them since the Pistons ( 39 - 38 ) quickly jumped to a 10 - point lead following the first 12 minutes of action ( 33 - 23 ) . However , Indiana would n't stop fighting and recovered the lead by half - time thanks to a 36 - 22 second quarter that saw them jump on top by four points at the break . Detroit tried to turn things around in the second half , but the Pacers kept extending their lead and they 'd never look back : scores of 28 - 25 and 24 - 22 , respectively , allowed the Pacers to secure a huge nine - point win in front of their own crowd . Seven Indiana players scored in double digits and Thaddeus Young paved the way with 19 points , nine rebounds and five assists , while Bojan Bogdanovic filled the stat sheet thanks to 19 points , seven rebounds , six assists and three blocks . Myles Turner had 17 points with six boards , while Tyreke Evans added 13 . Domantas Sabonis chipped in with a double - double off the bench ( 18 points and 12 rebounds ) while Aaron Holiday ( 10 points ) and Doug McDermott ( 11 points ) also topped the 10 - point mark despite not starting . Blake Griffin was unavailable for the Pistons in this one , but Wayne Ellington picked up the slack and led the way for the Pistons with 26 points while Reggie Jackson contributed 22 points , six rebounds and four assists . Andre Drummond had a strong outing as well and finished with 18 points , 17 rebounds , five assists , and four steals . Thon Maker had 14 points with four blocks .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Indiana Pacers , 108 - 96 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . This game meant much more to Brooklyn than Indiana and that was evident in the result . In fact , the Nets led for all but a few minutes , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Rebounding was the clear - cut difference , with the Nets outrebounding the Pacers , 52 - 33 . Much of that came on the offensive end , with Brooklyn winning that battle , 17 - 5 . Getting to the free - throw line was also huge , with the Nets hitting 17 - of - 22 and the Pacers hitting just 4 - of - 7 . The Nets ( 41 - 40 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he tallied 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Joe Harris amassed 19 points , four rebounds and two assists . Jarrett Allen totaled 12 points and eight boards while Caris Levert led the bench with 18 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Pacers ( 47 - 34 ) were led by Domantas Sabonis , as he provided 17 points , 12 rebounds and three assists off the bench . Thaddeus Young led the starters with 16 points , two rebounds and four assists . Bojan Bogdanovic generated 13 points , four rebounds and two assists while Cory Joseph accrued 12 points , three rebounds and four assists . Both these teams only have one game remaining , with Indiana traveling to face the Atlanta Hawks and Brooklyn playing host to the Miami Heat on Wednesday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 149 - 129 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday evening . The Pelicans took control early on as they led for almost all of the first quarter and amassed a 40 - 32 advantage heading into the second . The Kings battled back to tie it up at 48 , midway through the quarter and kept it close for a few minutes , but the Pelicans pulled away to take a nine - point lead by halftime . The Pelicans turned it up a notch in the third and pushed their lead to 20 , 110 - 90 , heading into the fourth . They were able to cruise to the finish from there , earning their second straight win . Nicola Mirotic led New_Orleans with 36 points , nine rebounds and two assists , in 31 minutes . Anthony Davis came up large with 25 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks , in just 27 minutes of action . Jrue Holiday had a solid night with 15 points , 11 assists , six rebounds and three steals , in 27 minutes . The Pelicans shot 59 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Willie Cauley-Stein was the high - point man for the Kings , with 20 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , in 26 minutes . Marvin Bagley III came up big in 33 minutes off the bench with 19 points , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . De'Aaron Fox chipped in 18 points , six rebounds and six assists , in 27 minutes . The Kings shot 52 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 23 from distance . The Kings ( 0 - 2 will look to bounce back as they take on the Thunder in OKC on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 20 ) have a few days off before they play host to the Clippers on Tuesday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 116 - 109 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Tuesday night . The Pelicans ( 30 ) and The Clippers ( 2 - 2 ) played a back - and - forth game , but in the end the hosts came through and used a big second half to keep their undefeated streak alive . New_Orleans jumped to a 27 - 26 lead after the first quarter , but the Clippers stormed back with a 36 - 32 second quarter that lifted them to a 62 - 59 lead at the break . However , the Pelicans did n't want to lose their undefeated record and flipped the script in the second half : a 32 - 22 third quarter pushed them ahead into the final 12 minutes , and they closed things out with a 25 - 25 fourth quarter that secured them a seven - point win while keeping their winning run alive to start the 2018 - 19 season . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 34 points and 13 rebounds , but he was n't the only Pelican who posted a double - double since Nikola Mirotic contributed with 18 points and 12 rebounds . Elfrid Payton had 20 points , six rebounds and six assists , while E'Twaun Moore added 14 points . Julius Randle chipped in with 18 points and five rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench . Tobias Harris was the best player for Clippers since he finished with 26 points and nine rebounds , while Patrick Beverley came close to a triple - double since he contributed with 12 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . Danilo Gallinari had 24 points with six rebounds , while Lou Williams ( 17 points ) and Montrezl Harrell ( 12 points , six rebounds ) contributed off the bench .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 125 - 115 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . While there were eight ties and eight lead changes in the first half , New_Orleans held the lead for the entirety of the second half . In fact , the Pelicans either won or tied all four quarters , as a 28 - 21 third quarter allowed them to control the second half . New_Orleans dominated from the free - throw line , hitting 31 - of - 34 while holding Denver to just 8 - of - 13 . Transition offense was also critical for New_Orleans , as they outscored Denver , 20 - 10 , in fastbreak points . The Nuggets ( 11 - 5 ) were led by Nikola Jokic , as he tallied 25 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . Gary Harris finished with 24 points , five rebounds and four assists . Juancho Hernangomez totaled 20 points , 11 rebounds and two assists . Monte Morris went 6 - of - 7 from the field to lead the bench with 13 points , three rebounds and five assists . The Pelicans ( 9 - 7 ) got another monster game from Anthony Davis , as he went 20 - of - 21 from the free - throw line to collect 40 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Nikola Mirotic amassed 20 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and three block . Jrue Holiday accrued 19 points , three rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Julius Randle led the bench with 21 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and three steals . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Denver traveling to face the Milwaukee Bucks and New_Orleans welcoming the San_Antonio Spurs to The Big Easy .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 140 - 126 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday . It was all Spurs ( 8 - 8 ) in the early going on Monday 's contest , as the visitors managed to open up a nine - point lead after the first quarter . But from there , San_Antonio was unable to keep pace with the high - powered Pelicans ( 10 - 7 ) offense , as it was all New_Orleans for the final three periods . Anthony Davis led the way in the 140 - point effort , scoring a game - high 29 points on 13 - of - 22 shooting to go along with nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks in 32 minutes . The Pelican 's starting backcourt was n't too far behind , with E'Twaun Moore scoring a very efficient 24 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting , while Jrue Holiday added 21 points and nine assists of his own . Julius Randle , however , might have had the key performance off the bench , notching a triple - double of 21 points , 14 rebounds and 10 assists in just 25 minutes . In the end , New_Orleans hot shooting was simply too much for the Spurs to handle , as the home team shot a scorching 58 percent from the field Monday night . As for San_Antonio , its offensive performance was nothing to scoff at , as the Spurs shot 50 percent from three and 48 percent from the field overall . The team just did n't put together a strong enough defensive performance to keep the game close . DeMar DeRozan led the way with 21 points , while Bryn Forbes was close behind with 20 points on an efficient 7 - of - 8 shooting . Dante Cunningham was perfect from the field ( 7 - 7 FG , 5 - 5 3Pt ) on his way to a surprising 19 points , while Rudy Gay added 17 of his own . What really killed the Spurs on Monday was their inability to take care of the basketball , committing an uncharacteristic 15 turnovers .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Houston Rockets , 125 - 104 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . Fresh off a blowout loss to the Celtics , the Pelicans ( 11 - 11 ) bounced back in impressive fashion Wednesday to get back to .500 . Jrue Holiday got back to his scoring ways after starting at shooting guard , pouring in a game - high 29 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting to go along with seven rebounds and five assists , while Anthony Davis was close behind with 28 points and 15 rebounds in 34 minutes . Tim Frazier , who got the start at point guard as a result of a lineup switch from head coach Alvin Gentry , was very impressive as the team 's floor leader , posting 12 points and 12 assists in 37 minutes . Where the Pelicans really managed to separate themselves was on the glass , as they out - rebounded Washington 64 - 38 Wednesday night . As for those Wizards ( 8 - 13 ) , it was a bit of a letdown for them after a very impressive comeback overtime win against the Rockets on Monday . They shot just 43 percent from the field as a team and could n't take advantage of their limited trips to the free throw line , going just 9 - of - 16 from the charity stripe . The superstar backcourt of John Wall and Bradley Beal combined to go just 2 - of - 11 from behind the arc , as neither could get anything going offensively . Wall would finish with 17 points , while Beal posted just 16 . Kelly Oubre and Markieff Morris would lead the way for Washington , each scoring 22 points and going a combined 8 - of - 17 from three - point range .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Houston Rockets , 103 - 91 , at Target Center on Monday . Things did n't go as smoothly as the final score would suggest for the Timberwolves ( 12 - 12 ) , as after drawing even with the Rockets ( 11 - 12 ) in the first quarter , Houston dominated the second period , 38 - 24 . From there , however , it was all down hill for the visiting team . Minnesota , while leaning on their improved defense , went on a 35 - 11 over the course of the third and fourth quarters to seal the deal and earn its fifth win in the last six games . All five Timberwolves starters scored in double figures , with Karl-Anthony Towns leading the way with a team - high 24 points to go along with 11 rebounds , three assists and three steals in 33 minutes . Andrew Wiggins 16 points of his own , while Taj Gibson posted a double - double of 15 points and 11 rebounds in 27 minutes . Robert Covington scored just 13 points in 39 minutes , but her was a terror on defense , recording two steals and two blocks and forcing a couple timely jump balls in the final stretch of the game . As for the Rockets , it was a disastrous second half , as the team scored just nine points in the fourth quarter and 29 total points over the last 24 minutes . It ended up being a horrible shooting night for the team , as they shot 3 - of - 22 from three in the second half and 11 - of - 39 ( 28 percent ) from deep for the game . James Harden led the way with a game - high 29 points , four rebounds and eight assists across 37 minutes , but Houston needed more out of fellow All-Star Chris Paul . Paul had just five points in 36 minutes Monday night and did n't make his first field goal until there was just over three minutes left in the game . The only other productive Rocket was Clint Capela , who went 11 - of - 14 from the field en route to posting 24 points and eight rebonds .
The Orlando Magic trounced the New_Orleans Pelicans , 118 - 88 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Tuesday . It was a full - fledged blowout , as Orlando ( 26 - 32 ) never let New_Orleans ( 25 - 33 ) come especially close . Four Orlando starters scored at least 20 points in the win , including a team - high 25 points from Nikola Vucevic . The newly - minted All-Star added 17 rebounds in the win and out - dueled Pelicans superstar Anthony Davis . Davis , who has had a rocky month since requesting a trade and then not being dealt , went just 1 - of - 9 from the field in 24 minutes of play . Forwards Jonathan Isaac and Aaron Gordon contributed another 20 points apiece for Orlando . In general , the team saw stellar offensive play , knocking down 13 three - point shots and shooting 21 - of - 22 at the free - throw line . The Magic also held a substantial advantage on the glass , outrebounding New_Orleans 57 - 41 . The Pelicans , meanwhile , were limited to just 38 percent shooting in the loss . What 's more , New_Orleans could not seem to get to the line , attempting only eight free - throws on the night . E'Twaun Moore led the team with only 19 points in the loss . Both teams will suit up once more before the All-Star break , with Orlando hosting the Charlotte Hornets on Thursday and New_Orleans hosting the red - hot Oklahoma_City Thunder .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 131 - 122 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Thursday . The Pelicans ' ( 26 - 33 ) Anthony Davis , who has seen his minutes dwindle since his trade request , and Thursday night , the All-Star big man played 16 minutes in the first half before being ruled out for the rest of the game with a shoulder injury . Whether the injury was a legitimate concern or not did not matter to New_Orleans , as they managed to fend off one of the Western_Conference 's best teams in the last game before the All-Star break . Julius Randle was unstoppable in the winning effort , playing 39 minutes and posting a team - high 33 points , 11 rebounds and six assists in that time . Jrue Holiday was very close behind , scoring 32 points to go along with five rebounds and seven assists . As a team , it was a very efficient night offensively against a stout Oklahoma_City defense , as New_Orleans shot 46 percent from three and 54 percent from the field overall . As for the Thunder ( 37 - 20 ) , Russell Westbrook came through with his most efficient performance of the regular season , but it still was n't enough . Westbrook shot 18 - of - 30 from the field en route to scoring a season - high 44 points to go along with 14 rebounds and 11 assists across 39 minutes . It was his 11th straight triple - double . Paul George was not as efficient , going a miserable 3 - of - 17 from behind the arc , but he still finished with 28 points , seven rebounds and six assists . The only other Thunder player to reach double figures was Nerlens Noel , who posted 22 points and 13 rebounds in just 22 minutes off the bench . Now , heading into the All-Star break , the Thunder sit comfortably in third place in the Western_Conference standings , while the Pelican own the third - to - worst record in the conference .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 128 - 115 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . While there were four ties and nine lead changes in the opening quarter , New_Orleans actually held the lead for the final three quarters . In fact , the Pelicans held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as they led by 16 heading into the fourth . Bench production was the difference in the game , with New_Orleans outscoring Los_Angeles ' bench , 42 - 24 . The Pelicans defense was also critical , with New_Orleans recording 14 steals while winning the turnover differential , 23 - 17 . The Lakers ( 29 - 30 ) were led by Brandon Ingram , as he tallied 29 points , five rebounds and three assists . LeBron James finished with 27 points , seven rebounds , 12 assists and four steals . Kyle Kuzma accumulated 16 points , eight rebounds and seven assists while JaVale McGee totaled 10 points and two boards . The Pelicans ( 27 - 34 ) played this game without Anthony Davis ( rest ) , as Jrue Holiday led the way with 27 points , three rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Julius Randle accrued 24 points , three rebounds and five assists . Elfrid Payton collected 14 points , five rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Kenrich Williams amassed 11 points , seven rebounds , five assists and three steals while Cheick Diallo led the bench with 18 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Monday , with New_Orleans playing host to the Philadelphia 76ers and Los_Angeles traveling to face the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 130 - 113 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Tuesday . Milwaukee came into this game as a sizable favorite , as they really took control in the middle quarters . In fact , the Bucks rode a 33 - 25 second quarter to grab the lead and took control thanks to a 45 - 41 third quarter and a 29 - 24 fourth quarter . That allowed them to hold the lead for the entirety of the second half while leading by at least eight points for the final 20 minutes . Defensive rebounding was the difference for the Bucks , as they won that battle , 47 - 37 . Their defense was also key , as they held the Pelicans to 43 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range . Free-throw shooting was also huge , with Milwaukee hitting 24 - of - 28 and New_Orleans connecting in just 11 - of - 16 The Bucks ( 51 - 17 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 24 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Khris Middleton accrued 23 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Malcolm Brogdon finished with 18 points and two assists while Eric Bledsoe collected 14 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . The Pelicans ( 30 - 40 ) were led by Julius Randle , as he amassed 23 points , six rebounds and four assists . Anthony Davis played just 21 minutes but provided 21 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Elfird Payton picked up another triple - double , as he accumulated 14 points , 15 rebounds and 11 assists . Both teams return to action on Friday , with New_Orleans playing host to the Portland Trail_Blazers and Milwaukee traveling to South Beach to play the Miami Heat .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 113 - 102 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Monday evening . Both teams started off well , while the Pistons led , 14 - 13 , halfway through the quarter . However , the Pistons outscored the visitors 24 - 14 , through the remainder of the quarter , to take a 38 - 27 lead into the second . They continued to dominate as they expanded their lead to start the quarter , and went on to outscore the Cavs by nine in the quarter , to take a 66 - 46 lead by halftime . The third quarter was not friendly to Cleveland either , as the Cavs could hardly get within 20 points of the tie , however , the managed to make it a 14 - point game early in the fourth . Despite their best efforts , the Pistons would not succumb , and cruised to their second consecutive win . This marks the second straight loss for the Cavs . Andre Drummond led the Pistons with 23 points , 15 rebounds , three assists and three blocks , in 38 minutes . Blake Griffin added 21 points , 12 rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block , while Reggie Bullock tallied 21 points , four assists and one rebound . The Pistons shot 47 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 38 from long range . Meanwhile , Collin Sexton led the Cavaliers with 18 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal , in 23 minutes . Jordan Clarkson tallied 16 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 25 minutes off the bench , while Rodney Hood added 12 points , three assists , two steals and one rebound . The Cavs shot 44 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 21 from long range . The Cavaliers ( 2 - 13 ) look ahead to Wednesday , when they play host to the Lakers . The Pistons ( 8 - 6 ) head to Houston to take on the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 107 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Pistons ( 10 - 7 ) have now won two straight in the midst of a five - game homestand , and they did it while playing at a stellar level during the final 12 minutes of action against a Suns ( 4 - 15 ) team that simply could n't hold on to their slim advantage . Phoenix jumped to a three - point lead after the first quarter ( 30 - 27 ) , but the Pistons were in front at half time by a two - point margin ( 62 - 60 ) . The Suns restored their lead and were by up by one after three ( 84 - 83 ) and it seemed as if they were going to pull the upset . However , Detroit sealed the deal with an impressive fourth - quarter performance ( 35 - 23 ) to win comfortably by an 11 - point differential . Six Detroit players scored in double digits in this game . Andre Drummond led the way with 19 points , 16 rebounds and five steals , while Reggie Jackson also contributed 19 points while adding eight assists . Blake Griffin posted a double - double with 16 points and 11 assists , and Reggie Bullock added 13 points . Langston Galloway ( 15 points ) and Stanley Johnson ( 14 points ) impressed off the bench as well . Devin Booker carried Phoenix 's offense with a stellar 37 - point performance that also included five assists and four rebounds , but he did n't have a lot of help from his teammates . DeAndre Ayton chipped with a strong double - double of 25 points and 13 rebounds , while Jamal Crawford did his part with 12 points and five assists coming off the bench . Trevor Ariza disappointed with only five points in 36 minutes of action .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 113 - 104 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Saturday . Boston came into this matchup in the midst of an eight - game winning streak but Detroit snapped that here . The shooting disparity was critical , with the Pistons hitting 48 percent of their shots while holding the Celtics to 41 percent from the field . That can be attributed to the ball movement , with Detroit out - assisting Boston , 25 - 19 . Defensive rebounding was also huge , with the Pistons winning that battle , 38 - 32 . The Celtics really struggled from long range , connecting on just 9 - of - 33 of their three - pointers . The Celtics ( 18 - 11 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he tallied 26 points , eight rebounds , four assists and three steals . Marcus Smart accrued 21 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Jayson Tatum totaled 17 points , eight rebounds and two assists . No other player scored more than 10 points or recorded more than four rebounds or three assists . Reggie Bullock started and generated 15 points and three boards while Reggie Jackson accumulated 12 points , two rebounds and four assists . Langston Galloway led the bench with 14 points . Detroit will return to action on Monday when they play host to the Milwaukee Bucks . As for Boston , they 're off until Wednesday when they host the Phoenix Suns .

The Pacers ( 47 - 32 ) wanted to earn a second - consecutive win over the Pistons ( 39 - 39 ) and that 's exactly what they accomplished , although they far more dominant in this one . Indiana quickly jumped ahead to a 18 - 15 lead in the first quarter , and they would never relinquish that advantage . In fact , the Pacers won every single quarter in this one so they managed to destroy Detroit completely . The Pacers won the remaining three quarters by 26 - 21 , 34 - 26 and 30 - 27 , respectively , on their to a comfortable 19 - point win away from home . Five Indiana players scored in double digits in this one , and the top scorer was Thaddeus Young who finished with 21 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . The Detroit Pistons defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 100 - 93 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Tuesday night . The Pistons ( 40 - 41 ) came into the contest with the utmost urgency , knowing they 'd need to win their last two games to control their own destiny and hang on to the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern_Conference . It was therefore rather surprising to see Detroit get off to a poor start , as they were behind by a 32 - 20 margin after one quarter and 57 - 38 at halftime . They finally seemed to awaken to the reality of their circumstances coming out of intermission by cutting four points in the Grizzlies ' ( 32 - 49 ) advantage during the third quarter , but it was a monumental 21 - 4 run over the first 5:58 of the final period that finally gave them a lead for the first time since 11:44 mark of the first quarter . Although it held Detroit to just 40 percent shooting , Memphis hurt its cause by committing 21 turnovers . Delon Wright and Bruno Caboclo co - led the Grizzlies with 15 points , with Wright notably pulling down nine rebounds . Tyler Zeller totaled 13 points , six rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Tyler Dorsey generated 12 points , four rebounds and three assists . Ivan Rabb , Chandler Parsons and Jevon Carter had matching nine - point tallies off the bench . Ish Smith led the Pistons with 22 points , adding four assists and three rebounds . Andre Drummond posted a 20 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , five steals and three blocks . Luke Kennard contributed 15 points , two rebounds and one assist . Reggie Jackson supplied 12 points , five assists , one rebound and one steal . Blake Griffin , whose workload is being managed due to knee soreness , posted just five points , two rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block while logging 18 minutes . The Grizzlies wrap up the season by hosting the Golden_State Warriors on Wednesday night , while the Pistons visit the New_York Knicks on Wednesday evening in another must - win game .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 112 - 105 , at Scotiabank_Arena on Wednesday night . The Raptors ( 50 ) are showing early in the season why they should be considered as one of the top teams in the Eastern_Conference and they had no problems to dismantle a combative Timberwolves ( 2 - 3 ) squad that fought this game until the very end . However , the Raptors were in control early on and they never let it go : they jumped to a 26 - 19 lead in the first quarter and increased their lead to nine points at the break following a 31 - 29 second quarter . Minnesota showed some fight in the third quarter ( 26 - 26 ) and they won the final 12 minutes of action ( 29 - 31 ) , but it was n't enough . The Canadian franchise closed things out when they needed to , and remained undefeated through their first five games of the season . Kawhi Leonard led the way for Toronto with 35 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , while Kyle Lowry once again posted a double - double with 13 points and 10 assists , while also adding six rebounds and four steals . Serge Ibaka contributed with 15 points , while Jonas Valanciunas came close to post another double - double off the bench with 16 points and nine rebounds in 20 minutes . Norman Powell added 10 points . Jimmy Butler once again led the Timberwolves with 23 points but he also filled the stat sheet with six steals , five assists and four rebounds . Taj Gibson had 13 points with six rebounds , and Jeff Teague finished with 12 points and nine assists . Karl-Anthony Towns disappointed , though , since he only had 12 points and eight boards .

The Raptors ( 60 ) had proven invincible at home coming into Friday 's contest , and their level of play in the first quarter was a good example of why . Both shooting and rebounding were keys to victory , as the Raptors enjoyed a 48 percent - 41 percent advantage from the field and a 50 - 44 edge on the boards . The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 131 - 128 , at Air Canada Center on Thursday . While Golden_State only held the lead for a couple minutes of this game , it took an overtime session to determine a winner . In fact , Golden_State ended regulation on a 15 - 5 run to send the game into an extra session . With that said , the Raptors never trailed in the overtime , as their only deficit in the game came in the first five minutes of the first quarter . Toronto 's offense was on point , as they went 47 - of - 90 from the field and 15 - of - 38 from three - point range . They also dominated at the free - throw line , hitting 22 - of - 24 while Golden_State connected on 17 - of - 20 . It was a team effort from Toronto , as they had six players reach double figures in scoring while the Warriors had just three guys reach that threshold . The Warriors ( 15 - 8 ) got another gem from Kevin Durant , as he tallied 51 points , 11 rebounds and six assists . This was the first time in his career that he 's scored at least 40 points in three - straight games . Klay Thompson was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 23 points , three rebounds and three assists . Jonas Jerebko led the bench with 20 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Kevon Looney also played well off the bench , amassing seven points and 10 boards . Serge Ibaka finished with 20 points and four boards . Kyle Lowry accumulated 10 points , eight rebounds , 12 assists and three steals . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Golden_State traveling to play the Detroit Pistons and Toronto facing the Cleveland Cavaliers on the road .

In addition , the Bucks won the points in the paint battle , 38 - 32 , and the fastbreak scoring , 12 - 7 . However , their task was made significantly less daunting when they found out Kawhi Leonard would sit out the contest for rest purposes . A seemingly buoyed Orlando squad jumped out to a 25 - 15 first - quarter lead and still held a three - point advantage at halftime . The Magic would go on to outscore their hosts by a 50 - 35 margin the rest of the way , leading to the double - digit victory . The Raptors ( 45 - 17 ) have mostly dominated on their home court this season , but they figured to get a stiff challenge from the division - rival Celtics ( 37 - 24 ) . Accordingly , Boston built a slim two - point lead through the first quarter , but Toronto ensured that would be the last highlight the visitors would enjoy . The hosts won the second quarter by a 36 - 13 margin , giving them a 21 - point halftime lead that they 'd expand to 27 by the end of the third . Among the Raptors ' numerous statistical triumphs was a 49 percent - 38 percent edge in shooting and a 14 - 8 advantage in turnovers committed . Marcus Morris paced the Celtics with 17 points , adding six rebounds and one assist . Jayson Tatum and Terry Rozier generated matching 11 - point tallies , with Tatum notably bringing in seven boards . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 111 - 98 , on Thursday at Air Canada Centre . The Raptors ( 49 - 20 ) came into Thursday 's contest without two key players , with Kyle Lowry ( ankle ) and Serge Ibaka ( suspension ) both sidelined , but that did n't have much of an impact when it came to beating up on the lowly Lakers . Mostly because they still had star player Kawhi Leonard , who scored a team - high 25 points to go along with eight rebounds , four assists and two steals in the wire - to - wire victory . Pascal Siakam struggled mightily from the floor , going just 3 - of - 16 , but he still managed to finish with 16 points thanks to his ability to get to the free throw line . Lastly , Normal Powell came up with a huge performance off the bench , scoring 20 points and grabbing eight rebounds in 24 key minutes as a reserve . It was n't the most efficient offensive performance for the Raptors , however , as they shot 40 percent from the field , but the 16 threes they hit helped overcome that and propel them to victory . As for the Lakers ( 31 - 37 ) , they have now lost six of their last seven games , and injuries have left them with a real lack of quality depth . Los_Angeles only had three guys who played double - digit minutes off the bench , and only one , Alex Caruso , scored in double figures with an impressive 16 - point outing . LeBron James , of course , scored a game - high 29 points to go along with four rebounds and six assists across 32 minutes , while Rajon Rondo 's 13 points made him the third and final Laker player to score in double figures . As a team , what killed Los_Angeles was its inability to hit a shot from behind the arc , as the team shot a miserable 7 - of - 31 ( 23 percent ) from three Thursday night .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 112 - 103 , at Air Canada Centre on Tuesday . Toronto came into this game as a sizable favorite and a wire - to - wire win justifies that notion . In fact , Toronto got out to a 15 - point lead at the half , as they led by at least nine points for the entirety of the second half . Ball movement was the difference for the Raptors , as they out - assisted the Bulls , 28 - 20 . Transition offense was huge as well , with Toronto doubling up Chicago in fastbreak points , 24 - 12 . The Raptors also won the points off turnover differential , 25 - 14 . The Bulls ( 21 - 54 ) were led by Wayne Selden Jr. as he tallied 20 points , two rebounds , two assists and three steals . Shaquille Harrison accrued 15 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Ryan Arcidiacono totaled 13 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Antonio Blakeney led the bench with 11 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Raptors ( 52 - 23 ) were led by Norman Powell , as he provided 20 points , three rebounds and three assists off the bench . Serge Ibaka also played well off the bench , amassing 16 points , eight rebounds and two blocks . Kyle Lowry led the starters with 14 points , two rebounds and six assists . Kawhi Leonard accrued 14 points , four rebounds , five assists and six steals . The Bulls have to play again on Wednesday , as they host the Portland Trail_Blazers . As for the Raptors , they return to action on Thursday when they travel to face the New_York Knicks ,
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Miami Heat , 117 - 109 in OT , at Air Canada Centre on Sunday . While the Raptors ( 57 - 24 ) have already secured their postseason berth , the Heat ( 38 - 42 ) remain on the bubble and needed a win here to keep their playoff chances alive . However , Miami could n't deliver here and while they forced an overtime , in the end Toronto were just too strong for them . The Canadian franchise struggled in the first half , however , as they lost the first two quarters 26 - 25 and 31 - 25 respectively , but they turned things around in the second half with 28 - 22 and 25 - 24 scores . The Raptors were dominant in OT , though , and a 14 - 6 win over the extra five minutes was enough to give the Raptors a huge comeback win in front of their fans . Surprisingly , Norman Powell co - led the Raptors offensively with 23 points in only 21 minutes , while Pascal Siakam also added 23 points with 10 rebounds . Kawhi Leonard had 22 points , four rebounds and four assists , while Danny Green chipped in with 21 points . Serge Ibaka had 12 points off the bench , and Marc Gasol filled the stat sheet with eight points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . Dwyane Wade went vintage in this game and even though he came off the bench , he still led the team offensively with 21 points , five assists and three boards . Justise Winslow had 15 points with seven rebounds and six assists . Dion Waiters delivered 17 points , and Bam Adebayo contributed just seven points but 13 rebounds . James Johnson had 18 points and five assists off the bench .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 115 - 103 , at Toyota_Center on Sunday . It 's rare to see a team score 13 points in the fourth quarter and win by a double - digit margin but that was the case here for Houston . In fact , they rode a 44 - 23 second quarter to victory , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of the second half . Three-point shooting was the difference for the Rockets , as they connected on 20 - of - 47 from long range while holding the Pacers to 11 - of - 29 . Points off turnovers was also a big factor , with Houston winning that battle , 21 - 11 . The Pacers ( 8 - 6 ) were led by Victor Oladipo , as he tallied 22 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic accrued 20 points , six rebounds , six assists and three steals . Thaddeus Young and Darren Collison scored 13 points apiece . Domantas Sabonis led the bench with 11 points , six rebounds and two assists . The Rockets ( 5 - 7 ) got a gem out of James Harden , as he collected 40 points , seven rebounds and nine assists . Chris Paul totaled 26 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Clint Capela totaled 18 points and seven boards on 8 - of - 9 shooting . P.J . Tucker finished with 12 points and five rebounds . Houston returns to action on Tuesday , as they travel to face the Denver Nuggets . As for Indiana , they do n't play again until Friday , when they play host to the Miami Heat .

The Houston Rockets defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 112 - 109 , at Toyota_Center on Tuesday afternoon . The Christmas Day showdown opened as tightly contested as expected , with the two teams deadlocked at 22 after one quarter . However , the Thunder ( 21 - 12 ) created some important distance in the second and took a 60 - 52 lead into halftime . The light went on for the Rockets ( 18 - 15 ) coming out of intermission , however , leading to a 61 - point second half that allowed them to hold off a strong push by OKC . Ultimately , a James Harden floater with 20 seconds remaining gave Houston some valuable space after the visitors had closed to within 110 - 108 . As expected , each team 's star - studded starting five provided the bulk of the production , with the Thunder and Rockets benches generating just 20 and 19 points , respectively . Paul George led the way for the Thunder with a 28 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three steals . Austin Rivers led the Houston second unit with 10 points . The Thunder next pay a visit to the Phoenix Suns on Friday night , while the Rockets remain home and tangle with the Boston Celtics on Thursday evening .

The Mavericks ( 26 - 30 ) were unable to make any further inroads into their deficit when it was all said and done , as the hosts had actually added two points to their advantage by game 's end . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 109 - 95 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The Spurs ( 6 - 2 ) came into the day not knowing if they 'd have to tangle with All-Star Anthony Davis ( elbow ) who was highly questionable due to the injury that had already cost him three of the previous four games . As it turned out , the big man was healthy enough to suit up , but it hardly seemed to matter during the first half . San_Antonio built a seemingly commanding 58 - 39 halftime lead over the Pelicans ( 4 - 5 ) , but the visitors would regroup at intermission . New_Orleans bounced back to outscore their hosts by a 56 - 51 margin in the second half , but it ultimately was n't close to enough . Both teams shot in excess of 46 percent , although Davis was still clearly not at 100 percent while scoring a modest 17 points over 40 minutes . Jrue Holiday led the way for the Pelicans with 29 points , a total he supplemented with eight assists and four rebounds . Bryn Forbes ( seven points ) and Rudy Gay ( six points ) had quiet nights as starters . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 96 - 89 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The game got out to an interesting start , as the Spurs led , 17 - 8 , six and a half minutes in , but then did not score for the next five minutes , as the Rockets caught up and managed to close the quarter with a 21 - 20 advantage . The game stayed close through the second , but the Spurs managed to pull back ahead , taking a 52 - 50 lead into halftime . The Spurs kept the momentum in the third , as they pulled ahead by seven halfway through the quarter , but the Rockets rallied back again , to make it a one - point game , as they trailed , 72 - 71 , heading into the final frame . The fourth quarter featured more back - and - forth action , as the Spurs led , 86 - 85 , with just over three minutes left . The Spurs held on and closed the game , as they outscored the Rockets 10 - 4 in the final minutes , to earn the impressive home win . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 27 points , 10 rebounds , one assist and one block , in 35 minutes . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers 131 - 118 on Sunday at AT & T Center . The final score did not depict the back and forth nature of this battle as the Spurs were able to pull away early in the fourth quarter with big time scores from Rudy Gay , DeMar DeRozan and LaMarcus Aldridge . The game itself had over 10 ties and nearly 20 lead changes , with the all - star back court of Damian Lillard and CJ McCollum firing on all cylinders trying to match the Spurs all - stars in the process . Portland ( 13 - 10 ) entered the fourth quarter down 97 - 90 , but McCollum drained a three pointer right out the gate to pull within four . Rudy Gay answered with his vintage mid - range jumper and that was the nature of the final period . Anytime the Blazers pulled within the reach , the Spurs ( 11 - 12 ) answered immediately and did damage in the paint , which led to easy free throws . DeRozan finished with 36 points , eight rebounds , six assists and two steals . Aldridge contributed 29 points and eight boards . Derrick White found a clutch rhythm off the bench and knocked down 4 - of - 7 from the field on his way to 10 points , while Patty Mills added 15 points in 25 minutes . Lillard led all scorers with 37 points , to go with 10 assists and a pair of steals . McCollum added 24 points and Al-Farouq Aminu pitched in 20 points and nine boards . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Blazers visit the Dallas Mavericks , while the Spurs visit the Utah Jazz .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 111 - 105 , at AT & T Center on Monday . The Spurs ( 42 - 29 ) continue to roll , as despite playing their third game in four nights , the team managed to post a wire - to - wire victory over the NBA 's best team . DeMar DeRozan led the way with a terrific all - around performance , recording a game - high 26 points , nine rebounds and eight assists across 38 minutes . His 25th and 26th points were the most important , as they came on a heavily contested jumper over Klay Thompson with just over a minute left that put the Spurs up six , and up for good . LaMarcus Aldridge was close behind with a double - double of 23 points and 13 rebounds on 8 - of - 12 shooting , while Rudy Gay came off the bench to score 17 points . As for the Warriors ( 47 - 22 ) , it was a night to forget for their star backcourt , with Steph Curry and Thompson going a combined 14 - of - 43 from the field Monday night . Curry still managed to finish with a team - high 25 points thanks to making six threes , and he added seven rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Meanwhile , Thompson still hit four threes and finished with 14 points in 38 minutes . Kevin Durant did n't hit a single shot from behind the arc , going 0 - of - 4 , but he still went 9 - of - 18 from the field and finished with 24 points . As a team , the Warriors shot a respectable 47 percent from the floor , but their lack of aggression resulted in few trips to the free throw line , and that may have cost them the victory , as they were just 10 - of - 12 from the stripe while the Spurs were 19 - of - 22 .

The Lakers found their first win of the season against one of the leagues youngest teams in the Suns . A close first quarter that saw the Lakers end with a two point lead was overshadowed by an explosive 44 points in the second quarter . Javale McGree was at the heart of the action in that period , as he finished dunks ( unlike his failed dunk in the first quarter , quickly shared on social media ) and got to the free throw line in the twenty point rout to end the half . Phoenix ( 1 - 3 ) played from behind for the majority of the game , however , they saw a strong outing from their No . 1 overall pick DeAndre Ayton . Matters looked grim for the Celtics ( 7 - 4 ) for the majority of the night , as they surprisingly fell behind , 32 - 13 , after one quarter . However , a 17 - 4 run by Boston over a 3:23 period late in the fourth quarter left them within one point of Phoenix . Following a pair of clutch T.J. Warren free throws , the Celtics were able to get the ball into the hands of Marcus Morris , who burned one of his old franchises with a three - pointer with 1 seconds on the clock . The visitors then took control in overtime , snapping a 109 - 109 tie with a 70 run over the final 2:5 of the extra period . Kyrie Irving keyed the Celtics with 39 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block . He also provided the assist on Morris ' game - tying three . Harris was as dominant as ever on Monday , leading all scorers with 33 points and grabbing eight rebounds . The Phoenix Suns defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 99 - 89 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Thursday evening . Phoenix ( 5 - 24 ) entered Thursday 's nationally - televised game amidst turbulence on and off the court . The Suns had dropped 10 straight games and had declined to play Trevor Ariza in their most recent game as they attempt to find a trade destination for him . Rumors had also begun to swirl that team owner Robert Sarver was threatening to relocate the team to Seattle or Las Vegas , prompting outrage from many Suns fans . On Thursday , though , the team got good news , as Sarver publicly promised to keep the team in Phoenix and the Suns earned their first win in over three weeks . The Suns saw a strong shooting night from beyond the arc , knocking down 10 three - pointers . Dallas ( 15 - 13 ) , meanwhile , shot a dismal 5 - of - 33 from beyond the arc in one of its coldest nights of the season . T.J. Warren led Phoenix with 30 points , shooting 11 - of - 17 from the field in the win . Trevor Ariza also saw the court again , where he scored 13 points and grabbed eight rebounds . Josh Jackson added 14 points but shot just 5 - of - 17 from the field in doing so . Dallas , meanwhile , scored only 89 points , as none of its players scored more than 15 in the loss . Rookie wing Luka Doncic scored 13 points to go with five rebounds and six assists . Veteran big man DeAndre Jordan also had a nice night , scoring 14 points and pulling down 16 rebounds despite the loss . Phoenix will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday , while Dallas will see the Sacramento Kings on Sunday .
