They kept it up in the second , where they outscored the Suns by 11 , to take a 72 - 49 lead into halftime . The Suns came out with a purpose in the third and managed to outscore the visitors by six in the quarter , to cut the deficit to 17 by the start of the fourth . They kept up the effort in the fourth quarter and managed to make it a four - point game with just 13 seconds left . However , the Sixers hung on to earn their second straight win . Joel Embiid led the 76ers with a monstrous performance , tallying 42 points , 18 rebounds , three steals , two blocks and two assists , in 36 minutes . Ben Simmons followed up with 29 points , six assists , three rebounds and one block , while J.J. Redick added 27 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . The Sixers shot 54 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin Booker led the Suns with 37 points , eight assists and two rebounds , in 35 minutes . Deandre Ayton tallied 18 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Josh Jackson chipped in 16 points , six rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Suns shot 45 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range . The Suns ( 9 - 30 ) will look to avoid a fifth straight loss as they play host to the Clippers on Friday . The 76ers ( 25 - 14 ) play host to the Mavericks on Saturday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 98 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Thursday . It was a close contest through the first 24 minutes , with the Suns ( 17 - 56 ) taking a narrow two - point lead into halftime , but from that point on , it was all Pistons ( 37 - 34 ) . More specifically , the fourth quarter was all Detroit , as the team wasted no time rattling off a 17 - 2 run over the course of four minutes to put the game away . It was a complete team effort from the Pistons , with seven different players scoring in double figures Thursday night . Wayne Ellington led the way with a team - high 23 points after the sharp - shooter went 6 - of - 10 from behind the arc . Blake Griffin put together yet another terrific all - around performance with 17 points , seven rebounds and eight assists in 31 minutes while Andre Drummond posted a monster double - double of 16 points and 19 rebounds . Luke Kennard matched Drummond 's 16 points in 25 minutes off the bench . As for the Suns , it was their second straight loss and fourth in five games . They shot a decent percentage from the field Thursday , going 48 percent from the field , but they committed a staggering 19 turnovers . That , combined with giving up 19 offensive rebounds , led to Detroit getting 17 more shooting possessions . Devin Booker lead the way with a game - high 26 points , while DeAndre Ayton posted 20 points and eight rebounds . Mikal Bridges and Richaun Holmes were the only other Suns players to reach double figures , scoring 13 and 10 points , respectively .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 122 - 113 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Monday evening . A 14 - 4 run to start the fourth quarter helped Phoenix ( 18 - 60 ) snap its six - game losing streak . The Suns had established an early double - digit lead thanks to a 40 - point second quarter , but the late run helped seal the much - needed win for the last place squad . Cleveland ( 19 - 59 ) battled back to make it a single - digit game again , but Phoenix had plenty of breathing room as it made its way to the final buzzer . As a unit , Phoenix shot over 54 percent from the floor in the win . After a slough of big scoring nights , Devin Booker impressed once again , this time with his passing prowess . Booker recorded a 25 - point , 13 - assist double - double to lead his team to victory . Josh Jackson recorded a double - double as well , grabbing 10 rebounds while scoring 19 points . Jackson also amassed a career - high five blocks in Monday 's win . Cleveland saw big nights from its own young guards . Rookie point guard Colin Sexton continued his dominant post All-Star play , scoring 21 points to lead the team . Off the bench , Jordan Clarkson poured in 20 points . The team also saw 12 rebounds and four assists from center Larry Nance Jr .. Cleveland will continue its road trip with a visit to Sacramento on Thursday . Phoenix , meanwhile , will see the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 131 - 120 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Sunday evening . With their surprisingly high - powered offensive performances over the first three games , the Kings ( 1 - 2 ) have seemingly caught the rest of the NBA off guard . The latest team to fall victim to their high - scoring prowess was the Thunder ( 0 - 3 ) , which failed to notch their first win of the season despite the debut of Russell Westbrook ( knee ) . The perennial All-Star unexpectedly logged 35 minutes despite not having had the benefit of a training camp or preseason and racked up 35 points , 12 rebounds and eight assists . However , Sacramento saw every member of their first unit post double - digit scoring totals and shot a blistering 55 percent overall , including 46 percent from three - point range . In contrast , the majority of OKC 'S offense ran through Westbrook and Paul George , and as a team , they only mustered a 23 percent success rate from behind the arc . Iman Shumpert drew the start and led the Kings with 26 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , three rebounds , three steals and two blocks . De'Aaron Fox supplied 22 points , 10 assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Buddy Hield pitched in 17 points , five boards and two assists . Willie Cauley-Stein and Marvin Bagley III generated matching 13 - point tallies from the first unit and bench , respectively . Each also brought down seven rebounds . Nemanja Bjelica totaled 12 points , five rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block . George followed Westbrook with 29 points , six rebounds , two assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder still logged 32 minutes despite Westbrook 's return and posted 14 points , eight assists , four rebounds and one steal . Hamidou Diallo registered 11 points , two assists , a rebound and two steals . Adams managed 10 points , 14 rebounds , three blocks and two steals . The Kings remain on the road and next tangle with the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday evening , while the Thunder try again for their first win against the Boston Celtics at home on Thursday evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 101 - 95 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Thursday night . The Celtics ( 3 - 2 ) will surely feel happy following this win on the road , as they had to come from behind to defeat a Thunder ( 0 - 4 ) team that crumbled in the second half and wasted a huge lead in the final 24 minutes of action . The Thunder went up by 16 points ( 50 - 34 ) in the first half of action , but Boston turned things around and a huge 40 - 23 win in the third quarter gave them a one - point lead leading into the fourth quarter . The Thunder tried to come back , but Boston closed things out in the final seconds and the win put them one game over .500 , while the Thunder remain winless after their first four games . Jayson Tatum was Boston 's top scorer since he finished with 24 points and six rebounds , while Al Horford ( 19 points and nine rebounds ) and Kyrie Irving ( 15 points , five rebounds and five assists ) also logged double - figure points the Celtics . Marcus Morris had a double - double coming off the bench with 21 points and 10 boards , but Gordon Hayward disappointed since he only scored five points in 23 minutes of action . As expected , Paul George and Russell Westbrook led the way for the winless Thunder ; the former Indiana Pacers star contributed with 22 points and eight rebounds , while the star point guard came close to a triple - double thanks to 13 points , 15 rebounds and eight assists , but also committed five turnovers and five fouls . Dennis Schroder had 10 points with six assists off the bench , while Steven Adams added 12 points with six rebounds .

The Thunder ( 1 - 4 ) approached the contest with Steven Adams as a late scratch and Russell Westbrook uncertain to play due to shoulder soreness . However , the perennial All-Star did end up taking the court , posting 23 points , nine rebounds , seven assists and four steals . The Suns ( 1 - 5 ) made some noise in the fourth quarter , but it was after the game was essentially decided . The Thunder drained 51 percent of its shots and also goaded the visitors into 22 turnovers , both keys to victory . Elie Okobo and T.J. Warren co - led the Suns with matching 18 - point tallies off the bench . Okobo added eight assists and five rebounds over 31 minutes , while Warren also supplied eight boards and one block . The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 116 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Monday evening . The Thunder ( 5 - 4 ) came into the contest looking to build on the significant momentum they 'd begun generating after an 0 - 4 start , but they knew they 'd be facing a Pelicans ( 4 - 6 ) squad at full strength . Anthony Davis was announced as active for the game shortly before tip - off , although OKC did n't seem the least bit bothered on their way to building a 36 - 28 first - half lead . It would prove to be a game of alternating advantages , however , as New_Orleans came back to forge a 63 - 62 halftime edge . The home squad did come out of intermission with the hot hand , and the 100 - 86 edge they carried into the final 12 minutes would hold up when the visitors closed out the game with a 30 - point fourth quarter . Turnovers were key , as the Pelicans gave the ball up on 20 occasions while only taking it away 12 times from the Thunder . OKC notably pulled out the victory despite losing Russell Westbrook to a sprained left ankle in the second half . Julius Randle led the Pelicans with 26 points off the bench , and he added eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and two blocks . Jrue Holiday followed with a 22 - point , 14 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and one block . Davis provided 20 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one block . Nikola Mirotic generated a 16 - point , 16 - rebound double - double . Paul George paced the Thunder with 23 points , a total he supplemented with eight assists , six rebounds and four steals . Dennis Schroder followed with a bench - leading 22 points and also contributed three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Steven Adams went for 18 points , eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Westbrook delivered 17 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal before exiting . Jerami Grant finished with 13 points , six rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . The Pelicans head back home and face the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday night , while the Thunder pay a visit to the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday evening as well .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 124 - 109 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Friday . While the first quarter was competitive , Oklahoma_City dominated from there . In fact , they rode a 38 - 20 second quarter to victory , as Atlanta never got the game within a 10 - point margin in the second half . The shooting disparity was the difference , with the Thunder connecting on 52 percent from the field , 44 percent from three - point range and 93 percent from the free - throw line . The Hawks hit just 45 percent from the field , 31 percent from long range and 60 percent from the charity stripe . Rim protection was also critical , with Oklahoma_City out - blocking Atlanta , 7 - 3 . The Hawks ( 5 - 18 ) were led by John Collins , as he totaled 19 points and 11 rebounds . Tauren Prince amassed 15 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Trae Young went just 4 - of - 15 from the field to accrue nine points , four rebounds and eight assists . Alex Len was huge off the bench , providing 19 points and five boards . The Thunder ( 14 - 7 ) got a near triple - double from Russell Westbrook , as he collected 23 points , nine rebounds and 10 assists . Alex Abrines hit seven three - pointers to finish with 21 points . Paul George tallied 20 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Steven Adams scored just six points but still provided 13 points , three assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder hurt his old team , as he led the bench with 18 points , three rebounds , eight assists and two blocks . Nerlens Noel also played well off the bench , generating 14 points , seven rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Both teams are off until Monday when Atlanta plays host to the Golden_State Warriors and Oklahoma_City welcomes the Detroit Pistons to Chesapeake_Energy_Arena .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Utah Jazz , 122 - 113 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Monday . The final score certainly indicates that the game was a lot closer than it actually was , as the Thunder ( 17 - 8 ) were in full control from start to finish en route to their fifth win in the last six games . After jumping out to an early lead , Oklahoma_City never looked back and took a 24 - point lead into the fourth quarter . While the visiting Jazz ( 13 - 15 ) had a big final period and tried to make a push , they never had a legit chance to win Monday 's game . Paul George 's impressive stretch continued , as the swingman scored a game - high 31 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting from the field in just 30 minutes . Russell Westbrook struggled mightily from the field , going just 4 - of - 18 and scoring 12 points , but 11 rebounds and 10 assists gave the point guard yet another triple - double . Dennis Schroder , however , made up for Westbrook 's struggles in a big way , coming off the bench to score 23 points in 30 minutes . As for the Jazz , this was their second straight loss as the team 's up - and - down season continues . They had six different players score in double figures , but Donovan Mitchell scored just 19 points to lead Utah in scoring . Rudy Gobert added a double - double of 13 points and 14 rebounds , but for the most part , Utah 's starters were a no - show Monday night . As a team , the Jazz shot a solid 51 percent from the field , but they could n't get anything going from behind the arc , going just 8 - of - 29 from long range .

The two teams were back at it just 48 hours after their double - overtime classic in San_Antonio , and it was the winners of that contest , the Spurs ( 25 - 19 ) , which looked like the more rested team to open the game . The visitors took 60 - 51 halftime lead and appeared to be on their way to a second straight defeat of the Thunder ( 26 - 16 ) . However , OKC found their stride in the third quarter , erasing their deficit and building a six - point advantage heading into the final 12 minutes . The home squad then managed to hold off the Spurs during the fourth quarter to extract a measure of revenge in the form of the 10 - point win . The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 138 - 128 , in overtime at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Thursday . It was a close finish in regulation , as Russell Westbrook knocked down three last - second free - throws to tie the game at 122 . Overtime , however , was a different story , as the Lakers ( 25 - 21 ) took off on a 16 - 6 run . Sophomore Lonzo Ball kickstarted the run by winning a jump ball and knocking down a deep three - pointer . OKC ( 26 - 18 ) , meanwhile , struggled to find offense late in the game . Westbrook could not buy a basket throughout , finishing the night shooting just 7 - of - 30 . LA won its second straight despite the absence of LeBron James ( groin ) . Sophomore forward Kyle Kuzma continued to excel , leading the team with 34 points . LA saw strong play from the entirety of its young core , as Brandon Ingram notched a team - high 11 assists while Ball added another 10 assists and 18 points . OKC , meanwhile , saw a triple - double from Westbrook despite his poor shooting night . The former MVP tallied 26 points , 13 assists , and 10 rebounds . Steven Adams added a 17 - point , 17 - rebound double - double , while Paul George led the team with 27 points . The loss dropped the Thunder to 1 - 5 in its last six . On Saturday , the Lakers will visit Houston while the Thunder will travel to Philadelphia .

Nevertheless , the Pels came out swinging versus the Thunder ( 30 - 18 ) , battling them to a 28 - 28 draw through the first 12 minutes . The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 132 - 122 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Tuesday . There were 10 ties and 12 lead changes in this tightly - contested game , as a 36 - 23 third quarter grabbed Oklahoma_City their win . The shooting disparity was critical , with the Thunder shooting 50 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range while holding the Magic to 47 percent from the field and 30 percent from long range . Rebounding was also huge , with Oklahoma_City winning that battle , 49 - 40 . Oklahoma_City did most of their damage down low , outscoring Orlando in the paint , 58 - 38 . The Magic ( 22 - 31 ) were led by Terrence Ross , as he provided 26 points , five rebounds and three steals off the bench . Evan Fournier led the starters with 25 points . five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Aaron Gordon collected 18 points , six rebounds , 10 assists and three steals . The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 148 - 147 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Friday . In this potential playoff preview , it took two overtime sessions to determine a winner . Paul George played the hero , as he hit a game - winning floater with 1 seconds left to capture the win for the Thunder . The number of swings was unbelievable , as there were 21 ties and 23 lead changes in this game , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . Defense was key for the Thunder , as they recorded 13 steals while winning the turnover differential , 20 - 7 . That allowed Oklahoma_City to win the points off turnover battle , 30 - 10 . The Jazz ( 32 - 25 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he tallied 38 points , four rebounds and five assists . Rudy Gobert collected 26 points , 16 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Derrick Favors totaled 24 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and three blocks while Jae Crowder led the bench with 20 points , eight rebounds and three assists . The Thunder ( 37 - 20 ) got a gem from George , as he accumulated 45 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Russell Westbrook finished with 43 points , 15 rebounds and eight assists . Jerami Grant amassed 18 points , four rebounds , two steals and three blocks . Steven Adams accrued 16 points , 10 rebounds . three assists and five steals . Both teams will have to play the second half of a back - to - back set on Saturday , with Utah playing host to the Dallas Mavericks and Oklahoma_City welcoming the Sacramento Kings to OKC .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 131 - 123 , at Target_Center on Friday evening . The first quarter was a back - and - forth affair , with both the Timberwolves ( 1 - 1 ) and Cavaliers ( 0 - 2 ) finding the net often while scoring a combined 62 points . Minnesota created distance by outscoring Cleveland , 39 - 24 , in the second period , leading to a comfortable 71 - 54 halftime advantage . However , Cleveland stayed on the attack , shaving eight points off their deficit with a 41 - point explosion coming out of intermission . The visitors got as close as 127 - 123 with 47 seconds remaining following a Cedi Osman three - pointer , but Jimmy Butler accounted for the final four points with a pullup jumper and a pair of free throws to seal the win . Kevin Love paced the Cavaliers with a 25 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists and one block . Osman finished with 22 points , eight assists and one steal . Jordan Clarkson contributed a bench - leading 19 points and supplemented them with four assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Tristan Thompson generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . First-round pick Collin Sexton matched Thompson 's scoring total in 23 minutes off the bench . Butler led the Timberwolves with a game - high 33 points . He also managed seven rebounds , three assists , four steals and two blocks . Andrew Wiggins supplied 22 points , three boards , two assists and three steals . Taj Gibson ( 13 points , eight rebounds , two assists ) and Karl-Anthony Towns ( 12 points , nine rebounds , two assists , four blocks ) provided important complementary production on the starting five . Derrick Rose led the bench with 12 points , eight assists and four rebounds . The Cavaliers next tangle with the Hawks in a Sunday evening home contest , while the Timberwolves are back in action Saturday night against the Dallas Mavericks at American_Airlines_Center .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 124 - 120 , at Target_Center on Monday evening . The two teams squared off in front of a packed house , with Minnesota fans getting their fist look at LeBron James and the new - look Lakers . Those in attendance were treated to a tight , back - and - forth game . From the second quarter until the final four minutes of regulation , neither team led by more than five points . That changed in the final minutes , as the Wolves answered a lay - up from Rajon Rondo with an 110 run . Six of those points came from All-Star wing Jimmy Butler , who knocked down consecutive three - pointers . Minnesota was able to grab a nine - point lead , which provided the cushion necessary to stave off a last - minute comeback effort from Los_Angeles . Butler led Minnesota ( 3 - 4 ) with 32 points , which he paired with six rebounds and four assists . Butler delivered at the right time , knocking down four three - pointers in the fourth quarter to help fuel Minnesota 's late push . The veteran wing was 6 - of - 7 from three - point range on the night . All-Star big man Karl-Anthony Towns added another 25 points and also led all players with 16 rebounds . Towns also delivered four blocks in the win . For the Lakers ( 2 - 5 ) , LeBron James delivered a characteristically dominant performance . James scored 29 points , grabbed 10 rebounds , and dished out seven assists . Like Butler , the bulk of James ' production came late , as he scored 12 of his 29 points in the fourth quarter . James , however , committed a costly turnover with under a minute remaining and his team down two , losing the ball into the backcourt and allowing Minnesota to seal the win . Also of note for the Lakers was the performance of Lonzo Ball . The highly - touted sophomore saw 24 minutes of play time but managed only four points , one rebound , and one assist , continuing what has been a lackluster second season thus far . On Wednesday , Los_Angeles will host the Dallas Mavericks while Minnesota will take on the Utah Jazz .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 120 - 113 , at Target_Center on Monday evening . The Timberwolves ( 5 - 9 ) entered the contest looking to put together a successful opening chapter to the post - Jimmy Butler era . They would get help with the return to action of Jeff Teague , who 'd missed seven games with a knee injury . Additionally , they also saw Andrew Wiggins overcome a questionable designation due to a quadriceps injury to also suit up , giving Minnesota a full starting five . However , the Nets ( 6 - 8 ) were more than game , forging a 31 - 30 first - quarter lead before the home squad pulled ahead and enjoyed a seven - point halftime advantage . The second half would be just as tightly contested , but the T-Wolves would outscore the Nets by a 63 - 60 margin over the final two periods to seal the win . A gruesome ankle injury suffered by the Nets ' Caris LeVert certainly hurt the visitors ' chances , and the emerging wing had to exit the court in a wheelchair . Shooting also made a key difference , as Minnesota posted a 52 percent success rate , including 44 percent from three - point range . In turn , they limited Brooklyn to 40 percent shooting , which was key to them securing a win despite committing 23 turnovers . D'Angelo Russell paced the Nets with 31 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , two rebounds and two steals . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson posted 14 points , six rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block . Spencer Dinwiddie matched RHJ 's scoring total off the bench and added three assists and one steal . DeMarre Carroll provided 11 points , five rebounds and two assists . LeVert pitched in 10 points , five rebounds and four assists over 17 minutes before his injury . Joe Harris and Jared Dudley generated matching eight - point tallies . Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves with 25 points , and he added 21 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . However , he also committed a game - high 10 turnovers . Teague excelled in his return , posting a 24 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included one rebound and three steals . Derrick Rose delivered 23 points , six assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Taj Gibson managed a near double - double of 17 points , nine rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Wiggins totaled 13 points , six boards , three assists , one steal and one block . The Nets head back home and await a visit from the Miami Heat on Wednesday evening , while the Timberwolves remain home and take on the New_Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night as well .

The Grizzlies ( 10 - 5 ) seem to be leaving their awful 2017 - 18 season in the rear view as they delivered another strong effort to defeat the Timberwolves ( 7 - 10 ) , putting themselves near the top of the Western_Conference echelon and sitting five games over the .500 mark while also ending Minnesota 's three - game winning streak . The T'Wolves jumped to a three - point lead after the first quarter ( 20 - 17 ) , but Memphis would flip the script in the subsequent two quarters , winning them 30 - 23 and 28 - 19 , respectively . The final quarter saw Minnesota put up a fight , but it was n't enough and Memphis ended cruising their way towards a rather comfortable 13 - point win away from home . Mike Conley came one assist shy of a double - double thanks to 18 points and nine assists , while Jaren Jackson Jr. ended with 13 points despite playing only 19 minutes . The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves in overtime , 123 - 120 , at Target_Center on Friday . While there were only three ties in the first three quarters , it took an extra session to determine a winner in this tightly - contested game . In fact , there were four ties and seven lead changes in the fourth quarter and overtime alone , as it came down to the final shot . Atlanta ended the game strong though , finishing on an 8 - 3 run to take control . Defensive rebounding was critical for the Hawks , as they won that battle , 41 - 31 . Atlanta 's three - point shooting was also huge , as they connected on 16 - of - 35 while Minnesota hit just 11 - of - 32 . Free-throw shooting was the Timberwolves downfall , as they hit just 21 - of - 38 . The Hawks ( 10 - 24 ) were led by Kent Bazemore , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals before fouling out . John Collins also fouled out , as he finished with 21 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . DeWayne Dedmon amassed 19 points and 13 boards while Trae Young accumulated 16 points , four rebounds and 11 assists . The Timberwolves ( 16 - 19 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he tallied 31 points , 19 rebounds , five assists and three blocks on 10 - of - 17 shooting . Robert Covington accrued 28 points , seven rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Derrick Rose collected 25 points , three rebounds and nine assists . Andrew Wiggins amassed 16 points , six rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Atlanta has a quick turnaround , as they play host to the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday . As for Minnesota , they travel to South Beach to play the Miami Heat on Sunday for their next outing .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Orlando Magic , 120 - 103 , at Target_Center on Friday evening . The Magic ( 17 - 21 ) may have caught the host Timberwolves ( 18 - 21 ) a bit by surprise early , as they ambushed them out of the gates to the tune of a 40 - 31 first - quarter lead . That seemed to serve as a wake - up call for Minnesota , however , as they would go on to outscore their visitors by an 89 - 63 margin the rest of the way . Despite the double - digit margin of victory , the T-Wolves clearly dominated in only one area , that being rebounding - - they won the battle of the boards over Orlando by a 54 - 35 margin . Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic with 22 points , adding seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Evan Fournier followed with 21 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Terrence Ross followed with a bench - leading 13 points and supplemented them with two rebounds and one assist . Jonathan Isaac and Aaron Gordon turned in 10 points and three rebounds apiece , with Gordon also dishing out six assists . Karl-Anthony Towns paced the Timberwolves with a 29 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Jeff Teague managed 23 points , 10 assists , two rebounds and one steal . Andrew Wiggins poured in 16 points . Taj Gibson generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Anthony Tolliver led the second unit with 11 points and also offered four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Dario Saric contributed 10 points . The Magic remain on the road and visit the Los_Angeles Clippers on Sunday afternoon , while the Timberwolves remain home and host the Los_Angeles Lakers on Sunday afternoon as well .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 116 - 114 , at Target_Center on Sunday . While Minnesota came into this game as a sizable favorite , it was n't decided until the final shot . In fact , Derrick Rose hit a fadeaway jumper with 1 seconds left to break a tied game , as T.J. Warren missed a three at the buzzer to give Minnesota their victory . There were eight ties and 14 lead changes in total , as neither club led by more than 11 points . Rebounding was big for the Timberwolves , as they outrebounded the Suns , 44 - 39 . Free-throw shooting was also critical , with Minnesota connecting on 32 - of - 40 and Phoenix hitting 22 - of - 32 . The Suns ( 11 - 37 ) were led by Warren , as he finished with 21 points , four rebounds and two steals . Devin Booker accumulated 18 points , six rebounds and six assists . Dragan Bender started in the absence of DeAndre Ayton ( ankle ) , as he amassed 12 points and 10 rebounds . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 18 points , eight rebounds and two steals . The Timberwolves ( 22 - 24 ) were led by Rose , as he provided 32 points , four rebounds and three assists off the bench . Karl-Anthony Towns led the starters with 30 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and four steals . Taj Gibson totaled 17 points and five rebounds while Jeff Teague tallied four points , five rebounds and eight assists . These teams will have a rematch on Tuesday for their next outing , as that game will be played in Phoenix .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Sacramento Kings , 112 - 105 , at Target_Center on Monday . In their first home game since the All-Star break , the Timberwolves came out very flat . After the first 12 minutes , the Kings led the lethargic Wolves 30 - 19 and looked to be in full control of the game . Then , Karl-Anthony Towns , who had missed the last two games due to a concussion he sustained in a car accident , decided it was time to take over . Towns was the catalyst behind a 20 - 1 run for Minnesota , and the team would end up taking a 10 - point lead into halftime . After trailing by double - digits for majority of the second half , Sacramento did make one final push in the fourth quarter and reduce the deficit to four , but that was as close as the Kings would get . Towns was a force down low in his return to the floor , posting a game - high 34 points , 21 rebounds , five assists and two blocks despite playing just 31 minutes due to foul trouble . Every point was needed from Towns too , as he did n't have much support other than Derrick Rose 's 20 points off the bench and starting point guard Tyus Jones ' 16 points . Minnesota had to do most of its work inside , as nobody except Towns could get it going from deep , with the team going a very poor 8 - of - 31 ( 26 percent ) from behind the arc . As for the Kings , Marvin Bagley continues to impress in his rookie season , as he went head - to - head with Towns on the offensive end . Bagley finished with a team - high 25 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting to go along with 11 rebounds and a pair of blocks . De'Aaron Fox was close behind with 23 points of his own , but it was n't a very efficient night for the point guard , as he shot just 8 - of - 24 from the floor . Buddy Hield and Corey Brewer were the only other Kings players to score in double figures with 18 and 12 points , respectively .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 131 - 120 , at Target_Center on Tuesday evening . A blisteringly hot first half put Minnesota ( 30 - 34 ) in the driver 's seat for the rest of the game . The Timberwolves opened up a big lead in the second quarter , where they poured in 41 points as a team . The Thunder ( 39 - 25 ) , meanwhile , had a hard time keeping up despite the return of All-Star forward Paul George . Minnesota 's offense was wildly efficient , shooting 53 percent from the floor and a solid 11 - of - 22 from three - point range . Karl-Anthony Towns paved the way to victory for the Timberwolves with 41 points and 14 rebounds . Towns shot an impressive 15 - of - 27 from the field in the win . His strong play was complemented by another double - double from Jeff Teague , who finished with 16 points and 12 assists on the night . The win snapped a three - game losing streak for Minnesota . Oklahoma_City , meanwhile , was led by 38 points and 13 rebounds from former MVP Russell Westbrook . Westbrook shot a stellar 15 - of - 28 from the field , but it was not enough to get the job done . Paul George , returning from a two - game absence with shoulder soreness , scored 25 points but shot just 8 - of - 25 in the tough loss . The Timberwolves will take to the road to visit Detroit on Thursday . Meanwhile , the Thunder next suit up on Friday in Portland .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 122 - 111 , at Target_Center on Tuesday evening . The Clippers ( 45 - 30 ) deployed one of the best strategies for winning on the road - - they got out to a sizable lead early . Los_Angeles forged a 42 - 23 lead through the first 12 minutes and held a 75 - 55 halftime advantage . The Timberwolves ( 33 - 41 ) did manage to put a nine - point dent in their deficit overall during the second half , but that was n't nearly enough to overtake Los_Angeles . As their final point tally implies , the visitors shot extremely well , draining 54 percent of their attempts , including 50 percent from three - point range . Danilo Gallinari paced the Clippers with a 25 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . Lou Williams followed with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Montrezl Harrell delivered 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Garrett Temple supplied 15 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Patrick Beverley and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander contributed 11 and 10 points , respectively . Tyus Jones managed 13 points , eight assists and two rebounds . Josh Okogie and Jerryd Bayless managed nine points apiece . The Clippers remain on the road and next visit the Milwaukee Bucks on Thursday evening , while the Timberwolves remain home to tangle with the Golden_State Warriors on Friday night .

In fact , Stephen Curry hit a game - tying three with 0 seconds left in OT but they fouled Minnesota on the inbound in the following possession . That allowed Karl-Anthony Towns to nail the game - winning free - throw , who then missed the second free - throw intentionally to run out the clock . There were nine ties and 12 lead changes in total , as Minnesota never trailed in the OT . Rebounding was the clear - cut difference , with the Timberwolves outrebounding the Warriors , 59 - 45 . Their bench also came up big , outscoring Golden_State 's bench , 52 - 25 . The Warriors ( 51 - 24 ) were led by Stephen Curry , as he went 11 - of - 19 from long range to tally 37 points , three rebounds , five assists and two steals . Kevin Durant finished with 23 points , 12 rebounds , seven assists and two blocks . Klay Thompson amassed 20 points , two rebounds and five assists . DeMarcus Cousins accrued 16 points and nine boards . The Timberwolves ( 34 - 41 ) were led by Andrew Wiggins , as he accumulated 24 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Josh Okogie amassed 21 points , five rebounds and four steals . Karl-Anthony Towns accumulated 15 points , 13 rebounds and seven assists . Gorgui Dieng was huge off the bench , providing 14 points and 10 boards . Minnesota suits up again on Saturday , as they play host to the Philadelphia 76ers . As for Golden_State , they return to action on Sunday against the Charlotte Hornets .

The Thunder ( 47 - 33 ) came into the game looking to build some positive momentum ahead of the postseason after a recent extended stretch of sub - par play . Minnesota continued coming on in the third , outscoring the visitors by a 37 - 33 margin in the third to carry a slim two - point advantage into the final period . The Thunder then found their stride again , opening the fourth quarter on a 14 - 2 run over the first 3:57 to regain a lead they would n't relinquish . The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 121 - 108 , at Moda_Center on Saturday evening . The hard - fought contest fittingly began with a 22 - 22 deadlock over the first 12 minutes . However , the Trail_Blazers ( 20 ) outscored the Spurs ( 1 - 1 ) by a 75 - 60 margin over the second and third quarters to gain distance , and they then held serve over the final 12 minutes to post the double - digit victory . Shooting was a key to the win , with Portland draining an impressive 54 percent of their attempts and San_Antonio managing a 42 percent success rate from the field . As customary , a significant portion of the Blazers offense flowed through their backcourt , as the star duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum combining for 53 points on identical 9 - for - 15 shooting efforts . DeMar DeRozan paced the Spurs with 28 points , a total he supplemented with nine assists , three rebounds and two steals . Bryn Forbes was a distant second with 17 points and added three assists and two rebounds . LaMarcus Aldridge and Rudy Gay contributed matching 12 - point tallies , with the veteran duo also hauling in eight and seven rebounds , respectively . Davis Bertans ( 11 points ) and Paul Gasol ( 10 points ) were productive off the bench . Lillard 's 29 points led the Trail_Blazers , and he also contributed nine assists and two rebounds . McCollum followed with 24 points and a pair of assists and rebounds apiece . Jusuf Nurkic offered 12 points , eight rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Al-Farouq Aminu went for 10 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . Zach Collins led the bench with 11 points . The Spurs remain on their West Coast swing and next face the Lakers on Monday night , while the Trail_Blazers remain home and tangle with the Washington Wizards on Monday evening as well .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 116 - 105 , at Moda_Center on Thursday . The Trail_Blazers ( 9 - 3 ) continue to play great basketball , as they have now won five of their last six games . As it typically does , Thursday 's win started with the production from the team 's backcourt . Damian Lillard led the way for the home team , scoring a game - high 25 points , but he struggled a bit from the field , shooting just 11 - of - 25 . Additionally , in what may be the most surprising stat of the night , Lillard did not attempt a single free throw in in 35 minutes of play . C.J . McCollum was n't too far behind Lillard , scoring 23 points and grabbing seven rebounds in 35 minutes of his own . Jusuf Nurkic had another efficient night , but he fell one rebound short of a double - double with 16 points and nine boards in just 23 minutes . As a team , while Portland did not shoot particularly well from the field ( 41 percent ) , the team made the most of its trips to the charity stripe , hitting 26 - of - 28 free throws Thursday night . As for the Clippers ( 6 - 5 ) , their loss put an end to a two - game winning streak . The main difference for Los_Angeles in the loss was their inability to close out defensive possessions , as they allowed the Trail_Blazers to get 14 offensive rebounds and they took eight more shots as a result . Lou Williams and Danilo Gallinari led the way for the Clippers on Thursday as each dropped 20 points . It was a rough night shooting the ball for Tobias Harris , who has emerged as the team 's No . 1 option on offense this season , but he still managed to finish with a double - double of 15 points and 11 rebounds in 37 minutes . Rookie Shai Gilgeous-Alexander continues to impress in his first NBA season , scoring 19 points in 35 minutes as the starting point guard .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 113 - 112 , at Moda_Center on Friday . While Denver led for nearly every second of this game , it was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , the Nuggets led by 15 points at the half thanks to a 38 - 26 first quarter . The Trail_Blazers then responded by outscoring Denver in the second half , 59 - 45 . That math adds up to Portland losing by a single point , as C.J . McCollum missed a baseline jumper to win the game at the buzzer . The Nuggets ended up leading for 47 minutes of this game , as the Blazers largest lead was one - point in the first quarter for less than a minute . Ball movement was key for Denver , as they out - assisted Portland , 28 - 19 , while committing three fewer turnovers . Three-point shooting was also critical , with the Nuggets connecting on 14 - of - 30 while the Trail_Blazers hit just 6 - of - 22 . The Nuggets ( 14 - 7 ) were led by Gary Harris , as he tallied 27 points , three rebounds and three assists . He technically hit the game - winner too , as he hit a three with 14 seconds left to break a tied game . Nikola Jokic collected 15 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Paul Millsap finished with 22 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and four steals . Monte Morris played well off the bench , providing 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . Jusuf Nurkic accrued 17 points , 11 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Damian Lillard went just 6 - of - 16 from the field but finished with 15 points and eight assists . On deck for Portland is a road matchup against the struggling San_Antonio Spurs on Sunday . As for Denver , they 're off until Monday when they travel to Canada to play the Toronto Raptors .
The Trail_Blazers ( 14 - 11 ) were seemingly set up for success Thursday , considering they were back on their home floor and facing a significantly short - handed Suns ( 4 - 21 ) squad . Both Devin Booker ( hamstring ) and T.J. Warren ( ankle ) were out for Phoenix , while first overall pick Deandre Ayton was bumped to the second unit in favor of Richaun Holmes . The disparity between the two clubs was evident from the opening tip , as Portland jumped out to a jaw - dropping 34 - 9 first - quarter lead . The Blazers ultimately built a 62 - 41 halftime advantage and cruised through the second half as well . As the final score implies , they won the battle in the majority of categories handily , including a significant 56 - 41 edge in the rebounding department . The Portland Trail_Blazers blew out the Utah Jazz , 132 - 105 , at Moda_Center on Wednesday evening . The Jazz ( 29 - 22 ) entered Wednesday 's matchup with a full head of steam , having won nine of their last ten games . Utah had blown Portland ( 32 - 20 ) out in their first two meetings before giving up a narrow 104 - 109 loss to the Blazers last week . On Wednesday , however , Utah looked like a different team than the one that had confidently handled Portland earlier in the season . The Blazers got off to a blisteringly hot start , scoring 45 first - quarter points . C.J . McCollum helped fuel the team 's impressive offensive night , pouring in 21 points in the first . From there , everything seemed to go Portland 's way . Portland went on a 170 run early in the third quarter to help secure the win , allowing McCollum and the other starters to hit the bench early . Damian Lillard finished the game as the leading scorer , notching 36 points to go along with 11 assists and eight rebounds . McCollum added another 30 points , including three three - pointers . Star center Jusuf Nurkic ( knee ) was a late scratch for the Trail_Blazers , allowing Meyers Leonard to slide into the starting lineup . In Nurkic 's stead , Leonard tallied 16 points and four assists . Utah saw double - digit scoring from all five starters , but it was not enough to get the job done . The Jazz allowed Portland to hit 16 three - pointers and knock down over 53 percent of its shots . Utah simply could not keep up , hitting just 45 percent of its field goal attempts . The Jazz will take the floor again on Friday , when they host the Houston Rockets . Portland , meanwhile , has nearly a week off before hosting the Miami Heat on Tuesday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 118 - 108 , at Moda_Center on Tuesday evening . Tuesday 's contest was shaping up to be a close one until the third quarter , when Dwyane Wade turned back the clock to help Miami ( 25 - 27 ) pull away . The future Hall of Famer scored eight points in the last four minutes of the quarter , extending the Heat 's lead to as much as 15 . The Trail_Blazers ( 32 - 21 ) were unable to come back despite a valiant effort early in the fourth from Jake Layman and the second unit . Wade finished the win with 22 points and nine rebounds . While Wade anchored the second unit , the starters relied heavily on Hassan Whiteside . The star big man finished with a team - high 28 points on 11 - of - 12 shooting and also grabbed four steals and two blocks . As a whole , the Heat shot a whopping 54 percent from the floor , despite hitting only seven three - pointers . Portland , meanwhile , saw a game - high 33 points from C.J . McCollum . McCollum 's strong night helped to partially offset a poor shooting performance from Damian Lillard , who went just 5 - of - 15 from the field in the loss . Off the bench , Jake Layman pitched in another 25 points and eight rebounds . Portland will suit up again on Thursday as the Trail_Blazers play host to the San_Antonio Spurs . Miami , meanwhile , will continue its West Coast road trip with a visit to Sacramento on Friday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder took down the Portland Trail_Blazers , 129 - 121 , in an overtime thriller at Moda_Center on Thursday . Portland ( 39 - 26 ) and OKC ( 40 - 25 ) entered the game tied for third in the Western_Conference , making it a key game for both teams . Thursday 's matchup lived up to its potential with a wild overtime finish . Regulation finished in memorable fashion , with Portland narrowly succeeding in forcing OT . Oklahoma_City took the lead when , with only 13 seconds left , Terrance Ferguson scored on a put - back layup after a collision between Paul George and Jusuf Nurkic . Tensions began to flare after the referees declined to review the incident . With tempers still running high , Nurkic drew a foul with 4 seconds remaining in regulation , but immediately picked up a technical foul after another dust - up with George . The tech was his second of the game , leading to an ejection . With Nurkic unable to shoot his free - throws , the Thunder elected to have Portland 's Skal Labissiere take the shots in his stead . Labissiere missed both shots , but Markieff Morris committed a loose ball foul that sent Al-Faroq Aminu to the line to tie the game and send it to overtime . Overtime , though , proved to be less exhilarating as the Thunder quickly began to run away with the game . Russell Westbrook scored eight of the team 's overtime points , including three on free - throws . OKC was able to exploit Nurkic 's absence and attack the rim with success in OT . Westbrook finished with a team - high 37 points . Fellow All-Star Paul George also had a big contribution , scoring 32 points while grabbing 14 rebounds . For Portland , star point guard Damian Lillard delivered a season - high 51 points . Lillard was wildly efficient , shooting 15 - of - 28 from the field and 18 - of - 20 at the free - throw line . However , it was not enough to pick up the win , as the Trail_Blazers shot just 39 percent overall from the field en route to the late - season loss . The Thunder will visit Los_Angeles to take on the Clippers on Friday , while Portland will play host to the Phoenix Suns on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 131 - 121 , at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday . The Warriors ( 8 - 1 ) managed to survive a track meet in the Bay Area on Wednesday , and they earned their sixth straight victory in the process . Steph Curry was , yet again , sensational , scoring a game - high 37 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting from behind the arc and 12 - of - 20 shooting overall . He also dished out a game - high nine assists , barely edging out teammates Kevin Durant and Draymond Green , who each recorded eight . Durant finished with 24 points , while Green posted a very impressive stat line of 16 points , 14 rebounds and eight assists in 34 minutes . As a team , the Warriors consistently found ways to get open looks from three , and it paid off , as they shot 16 - of - 32 ( 50 percent ) from long range . As for the Pelicans ( 4 - 3 ) , they put up a good fight , but were unable to close the gap over the course of the second half . Jrue Holiday was the driving force behind the team 's offense Wednesday night , as he scored a team - high 28 points to go along with nine assists in 42 minutes . It was a rough night , however , for superstar Anthony Davis , who did n't appear to be 100 percent healthy after missing the previous game with an elbow injury . Davis had just 17 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting and 12 rebounds in 41 minutes . Nikola Mirotic and E'Twaun Moore did an adequate job picking up the slack , scoring 26 and 21 points respectively . Up next , the Warriors will remain home to play the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Pelicans will head to Portland on Thursday to take on the Trail_Blazers .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 129 - 127 , at Oracle_Arena on Sunday . There were 20 ties and 13 lead changes in this game , as it was n't decided until the final shot . In fact , Avery Bradley recorded a dunk with 10 seconds left to tie the game but Stephen Curry countered that by hitting one of his patented lay - ups with 0 seconds left to win the game . Los_Angeles lost this game despite having the best three - point shooting game of the season , as they connected on 18 - of - 23 from long range . The key for the Warriors was free - throw shooting , as they hit 31 - of - 36 while the Clippers connected on 23 - of - 29 . Defense was also critical , with Golden_State picking up nine steals and eight blocks while Los_Angeles had just one apiece . Offensive rebounding was also decisive , with the Warriors winning that battle , 15 - 5 . The Clippers ( 19 - 14 ) were led by Tobias Harris , as he tallied 32 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Danilo Gallinari amassed 25 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Lou Williams was huge off the bench , as he provided 25 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Montrezl Harrell also played well off the bench , amassing 13 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Warriors ( 23 - 11 ) were led by Stephen Curry , as he collected 42 points , six rebounds and two assists . Kevin Durant accumulated 35 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Draymond Green finished with 14 points , four rebounds , six assists and five steals . Kevon Looney led their bench with 10 points and seven boards . On deck for Golden_State is a Christmas Day showdown against the Los_Angeles Lakers on Tuesday . As for the Clippers , they return to action on Wednesday when they play host to the Sacramento Kings .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Golden_State Warriors , 127 - 101 , on Christmas Day at Oracle_Arena . It was a marquee matchup between two of the Western_Conference 's top teams on Christmas . Ultimately , however , it was not the Warriors ' ( 23 - 12 ) night , as the team shot just 41 percent en route to a blowout loss . Struggles compounded for Golden_State , as each of the team 's four active All-Stars performed poorly in the loss . The team saw a dismal final quarter , culminating in Draymond Green fouling out with only four points scored on the night . It was a big win for the Lakers , who now sit at fourth in the Western_Conference standings . All did not go as hoped for Los_Angeles ( 20 - 14 ) , though , as superstar LeBron James exited the game in the third quarter with a left groin strain . James did not return to action , though his team saw plenty of success in his absence . LA , without LeBron on the court , outscored Golden_State 36 - 19 in the fourth quarter . LA saw a true team effort as it took down the defending champions . Seven players scored in double digits for the Lakers , and the team tallied 27 total assists . Kyle Kuzma led the team in scoring with 19 points , while veteran point guard Rajon Rondo delivered 15 points and 10 assists in just 23 minutes of action . Golden_State , meanwhile , was led by a season - best 23 points from Andre Iguodala . Iduodala 's vintage performance was not enough to help his team , though , as the Warriors shot just 41 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . It was a particularly poor showing for Klay Thompson and Draymond Green , who combined to shoot just 4 - of - 14 while committing six turnovers on the night . Next on the agenda for the Lakers is a visit to Sacramento on Thursday . Golden_State , meanwhile , will gear up to host the Portland Trail_Blazers later this week .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Golden_State Warriors , 135 - 134 , at Oracle_Arena on Thursday evening . The Warriors got out to a great start at home with a 34 - 22 lead after one quarter and expanded their lead to 70 - 53 by halftime . The Rockets turned it up in the third quarter and outscored the Warriors by 11 , to cut the deficit to six at the start of the fourth . They kept the pressure on through the fourth and managed to tie the game in the final second of regulation thanks to pure heroics from James Harden . The Rockets scored the first points in OT , but the Warriors battled back and held a two - point lead with five seconds remaining . However , Harden had more magic left in his bag , as he drilled a seemingly impossible game - winning three - pointer over two Warriors defenders to steal the win on the road . Harden led the Rockets with 44 points , 15 assists , 10 rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 44 minutes . Clint Capela followed up with 29 points , 21 rebounds , two steals , one assist and one block , while Austin Rivers added 18 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal . The Rockets shot 46 percent from the field , including 21 - of - 54 from long range . Meanwhile , Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 35 points , six assists and three rebounds , in 40 minutes . Kevin Durant finished with 26 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one block , while Klay Thompson tallied 26 points , five rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks . The Warriors shot 38 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 37 from long range . The Warriors ( 25 - 14 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Saturday . The Rockets ( 22 - 15 ) will look for their eighth straight win as they take on the Trail_Blazers in Portland on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 147 - 140 , at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday . On the second game of a back - to - back , the Warriors ( 31 - 14 ) came out sluggish and seemed to be a bit hungover from their throttling of the Nuggets on Tuesday night . They fell behind early to the visiting , and surging , Pelicans ( 21 - 24 ) , who opened up a lead as large as 16 points in the third quarter and appeared to be pulling away . Then , Steph Curry happened . The two - time MVP hit seven threes in the third period on his way to scoring 23 points and leading a furious comeback that had the Warriors miraculously up by one point heading into the final 12 minutes . From there , while the Pelicans kept fighting , it was business as usual for the defending champions , as Curry and company were n't going to let it slip away at that point . Curry finished with a game - high 41 points while shooting 9 - of - 17 from three , while Kevin Durant added 30 points and 15 assists . As a team , Golden_State shot a ridiculous 24 - of - 49 ( 49 percent ) from three in the winning effort . The Pelicans , on the other hand , were even more impressive with their arial assault , as they shot a scorching 19 - of - 37 ( 51 percent ) from the field , but it would n't be enough . Anthony Davis led the way as usual with 30 points , 18 rebounds and seven assists in 41 minutes , while Nikola Mirotic was close behind with 29 points in 29 minutes off the bench . New_Orleans ' third frontcourt star , Julius Randle , shot just 6 - of - 8 from the field , but still managed to finish with 23 points in 22 minutes .

The Sixers rallied ahead early in the second and kept it close through the quarter , but the Warriors regained control and brought a 60 - 53 lead into halftime . The 76ers came out on fire in the third and outscored the Warriors 42 - 26 in the quarter , to take a 95 - 86 lead into the final frame . Things slowed down in the fourth , as the teams matched each other with 18 points , while the 76ers managed to hover around a double - digit lead , en route to their second straight win . The Golden_State Warriors took down the Miami Heat , 120 - 118 , in a down - to - the - wire tilt at Oracle_Arena on Sunday . Miami ( 25 - 29 ) caught Golden_State ( 40 - 15 ) off guard , jumping out to a 26 - 7 lead in the first quarter thanks to a flurry of perimeter offense . The Heat saw three quick three - pointers from Josh Richardson , who had the hot hand all night as he scored 37 points . Hassan Whiteside also contributed early for Miami , scoring six points off of offensive rebounds in the first quarter . However , the defending champs fought back in characteristic fashion . The Warriors delivered a classic third - quarter thrashing , pouring in 36 points to erase Miami 's lead . Golden_State held onto the lead thanks to a number of crunch - time shots from Kevin Durant , who led all scorers with 39 points . The All-Star backcourt of Klay Thompson and Steph Curry also impressed in the win , pitching in 54 combined points for the Warriors . Draymond Green took on a playmaking role in the Golden_State offense , dishing out a season - high 14 assists on the night . It was a quiet night on offense for DeMarcus Cousins , who scored just seven points while pulling down only three rebounds . Cousins was a disruptive force defensively , though , logging three blocks and two steals . The Heat saw 24 points from Dion Waiters , who shot 9 - of - 19 from the field . It was also a big night for Justise Winslow , who poured in 22 points to go with six rebounds and four assists . Next on the agenda for Miami is a trip to Denver , where they will play the second half of a back - to - back on Monday . Golden_State , meanwhile , is set to host the Utah Jazz on Tuesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Utah Jazz , 115 - 108 , at Oracle_Arena on Tuesday evening . Utah ( 32 - 25 ) seemed ready to test the Warriors ' ( 41 - 15 ) dominance , holding a lead until late in the fourth quarter . The Jazz 's top - five defense shined in the loss , limiting Golden_State 's high - powered offense to 81 points through three quarters . However , Utah was unable to hold onto the game late , as Golden_State poured in 34 fourth - quarter points to earn the victory . Steph Curry , who finished with 24 points , helped to seal the win in the final five minutes , knocking down a pull - up three - pointer and an ensuing layup to put Golden_State up 10 . Kevin Durant was the game 's high scorer with 28 points . Durant also tallied seven assists in the win . Klay Thompson scored another 22 points , while DeMarcus Cousins contributed 12 points , 10 rebounds , and five assists . The Warriors shot over 49 percent from the field and knocked down 13 three - pointers . The Jazz were led by 25 points from sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell , who shot a dismal 10 - of - 29 from the field . Outside of Mitchell , Utah was remarkably efficient . The Jazz finished shooting over 47 percent from the field . Rudy Gobert had a double - double , finishing with 13 points and 16 rebounds . The Jazz will have two days of rest before enjoying the All-Star break , while Golden_State will travel to Portland to tangle with the Trail_Blazers on Wednesday .

However , the Wizards came right back with an 11 - 4 run , to cut the deficit to just three , heading into halftime . The Wizards continued their push into the third quarter , where they squeezed ahead and held a three - point lead with 5:27 to go in the quarter . The Raptors turned it around again as they closed the quarter on a 20 - 9 run , to take a 90 - 82 advantage into the final frame . The Raptors pushed their lead to 13 , midway through the fourth , but the Wizards were not done yet , as they made it a two - point game with just 38 seconds left . The Wizards ( 6 - 11 ) came into the contest with controversy swirling around them , given recent rumors that no current player is untouchable in a trade and plenty of rumblings about infighting among some of the team 's stars . Therefore , when the Clippers ( 11 - 6 ) opened up a 40 - 21 first - quarter lead , it was n't likely to much of anyone 's surprise and normally would have set the tone for a blowout win for the visitors . That was n't to be Tuesday , however , as Washington clawed back by outscoring Los_Angeles , 65 - 55 , in the middle periods . That allowed them to enter the final 12 minutes with a 95 - 86 lead , one that they 'd preserve by showing some impressive killer instinct while outpacing their visitors by a 39 - 23 fourth - quarter margin . The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Washington Wizards , 119 - 112 , at Capital_One_Arena on Saturday evening . The Pacers got out to a strong start on the road , as they pulled ahead with an eight - point lead after one quarter . They kept up the intensity through the second , where they outscored the Wizards by seven , to take a 15 - point lead by halftime . The Wizards picked it up in the third quarter , as they managed to cut into the deficit , so as to trail by nine heading into the fourth . They kept fighting in the fourth and cut the lead to just four points with 3:30 to go in the contest . However , the Pacers maintained focus and closed strong to secure their second straight win . This marks the fourth straight loss for the Wizards . Thaddeus Young led the Pacers with 22 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 32 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic followed up with 18 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Darren Collison tallied 15 points six rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Pacers shot 57 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 25 from deep . Meanwhile , Bradley Beal led the Wizards with 35 points , six assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 41 minutes . Thomas Bryant followed up with 23 points , 12 rebounds , four assists , three blocks and two steals , while Jabari Parker chipped in 12 points , four rebounds , two steals and a block . The Wizard shot 53 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 35 from long range . The Wizards ( 24 - 36 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nets in Brooklyn on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 40 - 20 ) take on the Pistons in Detroit on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 132 - 123 , at Capital_One_Arena on Wednesday night . The Wizards ( 27 - 37 ) dug themselves an early hole , allowing the visiting Mavericks ( 27 - 37 ) to take a 43 - 33 first - quarter lead . Washington then clamped down enough on defense in the second to erase their deficit and actually head into intermission with a four - point advantage . After essentially matching Dallas bucket for bucket in the third , the home squad sealed the victory by finishing on a 16 - 8 run over the final 3:8 after the visitors had closed to within one . Luka Doncic led the way for the Mavericks with 31 points , adding 11 rebounds , seven assists and four steals . Dwight Powell contributed a 26 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Justin Jackson followed with a bench - leading 18 points and supplemented them with five boards and one assist . Tim Hardaway , Jr. supplied 17 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Jalen Brunson pitched in 11 points , eight assists , one rebound and one steal , while Dorian Finney-Smith turned in 10 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one block . Bradley Beal paced the Wizards with 30 points and supplemented them with eight assists and seven rebounds . Trevor Ariza compiled 22 points , six boards and three assists . Jabari Parker furnished 20 points , nine rebounds and three assists across 28 minutes on the second unit . Jeff Green poured in 16 points , while Tomas Satoransky generated a 14 - point , 11 - assist double - double and also pulled down eight rebounds . Bobby Portis managed 12 points and eight rebounds while drawing the start . The Mavericks next pay a visit to the Orlando Magic on Friday night , while the Wizards also hit the road and tangle with the Charlotte Hornets on Friday evening as well .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 135 - 128 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday night . The Wizards ( 30 - 40 ) have developed a reputation for plenty of offense and very little defense , while the visiting Grizzlies ( 28 - 42 ) are essentially known for being their diametric opposite . The first half of that narrative held true Saturday , while the second portion was completely disproven , at least for one night . Memphis exploded for 71 first - half points , but they also were uncharacteristically generous in yielding 69 to Washington . Neither team showed the slightest hint of fatigue following intermission , but the hosts were just a bit better defensively while outscoring the visitors by a 66 - 57 margin in the third and fourth quarters . As the final score implies , each squad shot particularly well , draining over 50 percent of their respective attempts . Mike Conley paced the Grizzlies with 28 points , adding 12 assists and three rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas furnished 22 points , eight boards , three assists and one block . Avery Bradley poured in 21 points and also posted five assists and two rebounds . Chandler Parsons delivered 16 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal . Joakim Noah turned in 15 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one block . Bradley Beal led the Wizards with 40 points and complemented them with seven assists , five rebounds and two steals . Jabari Parker generated a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Bobby Portis collected 18 points , six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Jeff Green totaled 15 points , three assists and one rebound . Tomas Satoransky overcame a head injury to start and contribute 15 points , seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block . Thomas Bryant tallied 10 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . The Grizzlies head back home and take on the Houston Rockets on Wednesday night , while the Wizards remain home and take on the Utah Jazz on Monday evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Washington Wizards , 116 - 110 , at Capital_One_Arena on Tuesday . The Celtics ( 49 - 33 ) and the Wizards ( 32 - 50 ) both played their regular - season finale although both clubs had different objectives in mind - - while the Celtics had already clinched a playoff berth and are vying for home - field advantage in the first round of the postseason , Washington has been eliminated from quite a while and only wanted this season to come to an end . But despite the difference on both team 's approach , this turned out to be a very competitive contest . The Wizards managed to jump to a 14 - point lead in the first quarter ( 39 - 25 ) but Boston responded with a 38 - 25 second quarter so the Wizards only had a one - point lead at the break . It seemed Washington would break free once again following a 31 - 26 third quarter , but Boston won the final 12 minutes by an expressive 27 - 15 and that notched them the win . The Celtics rested several starters for this game and Terry Rozier was the top scorer since he finished with 21 points , four rebounds and four assists . Semi Ojeleye had 17 points , four boards and three assists . Jaylen Brown contributed with 15 points but also filled the stat sheet with three steals , three rebounds and two assists . Tomas Satoransky led the way for the Wizards with 19 points , while Bradley Beal delivered 16 points , five boards and four assists . Thomas Bryant had 14 points with six rebounds , and ended with an impressive 22 in 17 minutes . Bobby Portis had 11 points , while Devin Robinson contributed 14 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench .

The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 105 - 103 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Saturday evening . The battle of two evenly matched teams was as good as expected , as neither club gave an inch through four quarters . A see - saw first half saw the 76ers ( 3 - 3 ) enter halftime holding a slim 63 - 62 advantage . Ultimately , a standout defensive effort by Philadelphia that saw them limit the Hornets ( 3 - 4 ) to 18 points in the final period helped key the hard - fought win . Both teams scuffled from the field with Charlotte 's 39 percent success rate only slightly exceeding the Sixers ' 38 percent figure . However , the home squad enjoyed a strong rebounding advantage , winning the battle of the boards by a 56 - 48 margin . Kemba Walker paced the Hornets with a game - high 37 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal . Miles Bridges followed with a bench - leading 14 points , a total he supplemented with two rebounds and one steal . Cody Zeller produced 12 points , six boards and one steal , while Jeremy Lamb matched his point total and added three rebounds and one assist . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 113 - 92 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Monday night . The 76ers ( 4 - 3 ) kept their undefeated run at home alive with a convincing win over the Hawks ( 2 - 4 ) , as Atlanta fought hard but ultimately did n't have enough in them to battle with Philadelphia . In fact , Atlanta won the first quarter 25 - 20 , but Philadelphia evened things up with a 27 - 22 second quarter that kept the score tied at 47 after the first two quarters . Philadelphia showed a bit of their playoff form last season with an impressive 31 - 13 third quarter , and they later closed things out with a 35 - 32 fourth quarter . Without a doubt , it was a strong showing from the Sixers and now they move up to 40 at home . Ben Simmons was the star of the game for Philadelphia and he came one assist short of a triple - double thanks to a 21 - point , 12 - rebound , nine - assist stat line , while Joel Embiid registered 10 points , six rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Redick ( 14 ) , Mike Muscala ( 14 ) and Landry Shamet ( 13 ) . However , the Clippers came out strong in the third , as they kicked off the quarter with an 11 - 4 run , to cut the gap to eight . They kept battling and managed to trim the deficit to just four points , as they trailed 90 - 86 heading into the final frame . Despite the Clippers ' strong push , the Sixers kept it together and managed to push their lead back to 11 , less two minutes into the quarter . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 109 - 99 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Saturday . Wire-to-wire wins are rare in today 's NBA but that 's just what the Sixers did here . In fact , Philly led by 24 points at times , as a 22 - point halftime lead was too much for the Clippers to overcome . Three-point shooting was key to victory , with Philly hitting 9 - of - 29 of their three 's while holding Detroit to just 5 - of - 30 from long range . The free - throw shooting was also critical , as the Pistons connected on just 28 - of - 41 while the Sixers hit 44 - of - 51 . Defense really carried Philly too , as they forced 17 turnovers from Detroit while holding them to under 40 percent from the field . The Pistons ( 4 - 4 ) had just one starter reach double figures in scoring , as Blake Griffin continued his magical season . In fact , he finished with 38 points , 13 rebounds , six assists and two steals on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Andre Drummond totaled eight points and nine boards . Langston Galloway led the bench with 13 points . The Sixers ( 6 - 4 ) got a spectacular performance out of Joel Embiid , as he tallied 39 points , 17 rebounds and two blocks on 10 - of - 18 from the field . Ben Simmons was second among starters , collecting nine points , five rebounds , five assists and five steals . J.J. Redick led the bench with 16 points and four assists . On deck for Philly is a road matchup versus the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday . As for Detroit , they host the Miami Heat on Monday for their next outing .

The 76ers ( 8 - 5 ) found themselves at the scene of the majority of their successes Friday , as they 'd come into the contest with a perfect 60 record at home . To their credit , the Hornets ( 6 - 6 ) would n't go away , chipping away at their deficit until overcoming it in the fourth quarter . However after holding a five - point lead as late as the 1:18 mark of the final period , Charlotte allowed Philadelphia a 7 - 2 run at the end of regulation to force overtime . In a tightly contested extra period , a free throw apiece from Ben Simmons and Joel Embiid in the closing seconds helped create just enough cushion for the win . The Sixers were able to eradicate their deficit in convincing fashion in the third and entered the final 12 minutes with a 92 - 86 edge . That would prove to be enough , although the Suns got as close 117 - 114 with 6 seconds remaining after a Mikal Bridges three - pointer . Redick poured in 17 points and added four rebounds and three assists . Jimmy Butler contributed 16 points , three rebounds , one assist and two steals . The Sixers did not look back from there , as they used a quick , 90 , run to create some separation , and held on to take a , 38 - 29 , lead into the second quarter . The game slowed down in the second , as the Sixers and Pistons matched each other with 18 points in the quarter . Things picked up again in the third , where the Sixers held their nine - point lead for most of the quarter , until the Pistons finally made a run to cut the deficit to three , with under two minutes remaining . However , the 76ers charged back with a , 11 - 3 , run to bring a , 87 - 76 , lead into the final frame . The Pistons kept fighting and cut the gap to six early in the quarter , but the home team responded one final time , pushing the lead to 17 points with three minutes left in the contest . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 127 - 124 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Wednesday . The game was certainly not as close as the final score suggests , as the Nets were in control for nearly all of Wednesday 's contest before the 76ers ' second unit , led by rookie Landry Shamet scoring 10 points in the final minute of the game , made a late push but ultimately just ran out of time . The main reason Brooklyn found itself in full control of the outing was the stellar play of Spencer Dinwiddie , who scored a career - high 39 points in just 30 minutes off the bench . The point guard shot 4 - of - 6 from three and a11 - of - 18 from the field overall , but he did most of his damage from the free throw line , where he was 13 - of - 14 . It was the fifth time this season the breakout 25 - year - old scored at least 25 points in a game . As for the rest of the Nets , Allen Crabbe was the high scorer out of the starters , posting 20 points while shooting 50 percent from the field . Joe Harris was 2 - of - 3 from behind the arc en route to scoring 14 points , while rookie Rodions Kurucs scored 13 points off the bench . As a team , the Nets were on fire from behind the arc , going 14 - of - 28 from deep . The 76ers had to play Wednesday 's game without star guard Jimmy Butler ( groin ) , and their star players certainly picked up some of the slack . Joel Embiid was a force down low , postig another massive double - double of 33 points and 17 rebounds in 38 minutes , while Ben Simmons had a terrific all - around performance with 22 points , eight rebounds , seven assists , four steals and two blocks . Lastly , Furkan Korkmaz , who started in Butler 's absence , scored 18 points for the second straight night . Offensive production , however , was n't the problem , as the 127 points the team gave up was the most Philadelphia allowed in nearly a month .
