Joel Embiid turned in a 17 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , four blocks and one steal . J.J. Redick matched Embiid 's scoring , while James Ennis III managed 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one block . Tobias Harris and Boban Marjanovic contributed matching 11 - point tallies while also hauling in nine and five rebounds , respectively . The Cavaliers remain on the road and take on the Orlando Magic on Thursday night , while the 76ers remain home and face off with the Sacramento Kings on Friday evening .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 123 - 114 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Friday . While Philadelphia led for the majority of this game , it was close throughout . In fact , there were eight ties and seven lead changes in total , as the Sixers never led by more than 13 points . The Sixers did most of their damage in the first and third quarters , outscoring the Kings , 70 - 60 . Philadelphia ended up shooting 51 percent from the field and 89 percent from the free - throw line . They also outrebounded the Kings on the defensive end , 39 - 30 . The Kings ( 33 - 35 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , as he tallied 16 points , six rebounds and three assists . De'Aaron Fox finished with 16 points , two rebounds and six assists . Buddy Hield totaled 14 points and five rebounds while Willie Cauley-Stein generated 13 points , seven rebounds and two assists . The Sixers ( 44 - 25 ) were led by Jimmy Butler , as he collected 22 points , six rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Joel Embiid finished with 21 points , 17 rebounds , three assists and four blocks . J.J. Redick totaled 19 points and four assists while Tobias Harris accumulated 19 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Philadelphia traveling to face the dangerous Milwaukee Bucks and Sacramento playing host to the Chicago Bulls .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 118 - 115 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Wednesday evening . The Celtics got out to a good start at home , with a 39 - 30 lead after one quarter . They stayed in control and pushed their lead to 15 , mid way through the second , before they settled on an 11 - point lead by halftime . The 76ers came out stronger in the third and managed to tie the score at 82 , with four minutes left in the quarter . However , the Celtics rallied to take a five - point lead by the end of the quarter . They quickly pushed their lead to nine , early in the fourth , but the Sixers kept fighting and overtook the lead , 109 - 7 , with three minutes to go . The Celtics were scrambling and managed to tie it up one more time , nonetheless , they could not claim and advantage , as the 76ers came up clutch down the stretch , to earn their sixth straight win . Joel Embiid led the Sixers with 37 points , 22 rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block , in 41 minutes . Jimmy Butler followed up with 22 points , four rebounds , and two assists , while Tobias Harris tallied 21 points , eight rebounds and three assists . The 76ers shot 38 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 33 from deep . Meanwhile , Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 36 points , nine rebounds , four assists and a block , in 35 minutes . Al Horford added 22 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal , while Terry Rozier chipped in 20 points , six rebounds and one assist , off the bench . The Celtics shot 47 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 32 from long range . The Celtics ( 43 - 29 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Hornets in Charlotte on Saturday . The 76ers ( 47 - 25 ) take on the Hawks in Atlanta , on Saturday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 123 - 110 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Thursday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for the Sixers , it was as close as it gets . In fact , Philly held the lead for the final 45 minutes , as a 38 - 23 first quarter allowed them to take control for the final three quarters . In fact , Brooklyn never got the game within five points from there and never got within a nine - point margin in the fourth quarter . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Sixers hitting 12 - of - 25 and the Nets connecting on just 11 - of - 32 . Philly 's defense was also huge , as they recorded 10 steals to Brooklyn 's four while winning the turnover differential , 15 - 9 . The Nets ( 38 - 38 ) were led by Joe Harris , as he tallied 22 points and three rebounds . D'Angelo Russell went just 6 - of - 19 from the field to finish with 13 points , four rebounds , eight assists and seven turnovers . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson was huge off the bench , providing 19 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Caris LeVert accumulated 18 points , four rebounds and three assists off the bench as well . The Sixers ( 48 - 27 ) were led by Joel Embiid , as he collected 39 points , 13 rebounds , six assists and three steals . J.J. Redick amassed 18 points , three rebounds and three assists . Ben Simmons accrued 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists while Tobias Harris totaled six points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Brooklyn playing host to the Boston Celtics and Philly traveling to face the injury - riddled Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 128 - 122 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Thursday . These teams have played competitively all season long and this game was no different . In fact , there were nine ties in this game with neither team ever attaining a double - digit lead . Milwaukee made the run that mattered most , as they finished the game on a 15 - 4 run after trailing by five points with less than three minutes remaining . Rebounding was key for Milwaukee , as they outrebounded Philly , 50 - 43 . Getting to the free - throw line was huge as well , with the Bucks connecting on 32 - of - 43 while the Sixers hit just 14 - of - 18 . The Bucks dominated scoring down low too , outscoring the Sixers in the paint , 48 - 28 . The Bucks ( 59 - 20 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 45 points , 13 rebounds , six assists and five blocks . Eric Bledsoe played just two minutes , as he got ejected for throwing the ball at Joel Embiid . Khris Middleton finished with 22 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals . George Hill led the bench with 20 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Sixers ( 49 - 30 ) were led by Joel Embiid , as he collected 34 points , 13 rebounds , 13 assists , two steals and three blocks . J.J. Redick totaled 29 points , two rebounds and three assists . Ben Simmons accrued six points , four rebounds and 13 assists . Mike Scott totaled 22 points and three boards while Tobias Harris generated 13 points , nine rebounds and three assists . On deck for Milwaukee is a home matchup versus the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday . Philly also returns to action on Saturday , as they travel to face the Chicago Bulls .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 118 - 101 , at Fiserv_Forum on Friday evening . The Pacers jumped out to a quick 80 lead , but the Bucks answered back with a 13 - 2 run to take the upper hand . The Bucks did not look back from there , as they pushed the lead to nine before settling on a 30 - 25 lead heading into the second . They kept their foot on the gas and quickly pushed their lead to 11 , and although the Pacers made a push , the Bucks maintained their cushion and took a 62 - 53 lead into halftime . The third quarter once again belonged to Milwaukee , as the Buck outscored the Pacers 31 - 23 in the quarter , to take a 93 - 76 lead into the final frame . The Pacers battled hard but the Bucks matched them point for point in the fourth , to walk away with their second straight win . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee , with 26 points , 15 rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block , in 31 minutes . Khris Middleton followed up with 23 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Malcolm Brogdon tallied 15 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals . The Bucks shot 47 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 47 from long range . Meanwhile , Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 25 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block , in 31 minutes . Doug McDermott chipped in 14 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , in 20 minutes off the bench , while Myles Turner added 11 points , four rebounds and one block . The Pacers shot 44 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 18 from long range . The Pacers ( 1 - 1 ) will be right back in action as they play host to the Nets on Saturday . The Bucks ( 20 ) play host to the Knicks on Monday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the New_York Knicks , 124 - 113 , at Fiserv_Forum on Monday night . The Bucks ( 30 ) and the Knicks ( 1 - 3 ) delivered an intense game in the second half , as Milwaukee looked totally in control of the game in the first half ( 71 - 52 ) but the Knicks flipped the script and a 35 - 17 third - quarter gave Milwaukee a one - point advantage heading into the final 12 minutes of action . At one point the game was tied at 100 - 100 , but the Bucks pulled away late for good and ended winning by a relatively comfortable margin thanks to good execution on offense and an improvement on the defensive end down the stretch . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the best player for the Bucks and once again filled the stat sheet admirably with 31 points , 15 rebounds , four assists and two blocks , but he was n't the only Milwaukee player who stood out offensively . Khris Middleton contributed with 30 points and seven rebounds , while Eric Bledsoe chipped in with a double - double with 16 points and 13 assists . Brook Lopez added 13 points with four rebounds . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the way for the Knicks with 24 points but he only shot 10 - of - 23 from the field and 3 - of - 9 from three - point range . Enes Kanter contributed with a double - double of 14 points and 13 rebounds , while Trey Burke had 19 points , five boards and four assists . Mario Hezonja had a strong game off the bench with 18 points , four rebounds , three assists and two blocks .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 108 , at Fiserv_Forum on Wednesday . The hot start of the regular season from the Bucks ( 40 ) hit a bump in the road in Wednesday 's first quarter , as Milwaukee scored just 22 points in the first 12 minutes and found itself down by 12 points to the visiting 76ers ( 2 - 3 ) . The Bucks ' struggles , however , would end there , as they would go on to score 49 points in the second quarter and took a seven - point lead into the locker room . They 'd never let go of that lead thanks in large part to the stellar play from Giannis Antetokounmpo , who finished with a triple - double of a game - high 32 points , 18 rebounds and 10 assists in 37 minutes . Khris Middleton added 25 points of his own on 6 - of - 18 shooting from the field , while starting center Brook Lopez made five three - pointers in one quarter on his way to scoring 21 points in 32 minutes . As a team , it was n't a great shooting performance for the Bucks , who hit just 30 percent of their threes and shot 41 percent from the field overall , but they managed to make a living at the free throw line and shot a very impressive 28 - of - 30 from the charity strip Wednesday night . For the 76ers , Joel Embiid had another monster night , posting 30 points , 19 rebounds and six assists in 36 minutes , but he shot just 9 - of - 24 from the field . Fellow young star Ben Simmons also did n't shoot great , going just 6 - of - 15 , but he still managed to post a triple - double of 14 points , 13 rebounds and 11 assists in his return from a back injury . Overall , it was just a poor shooting night from the 76ers , as while 32 percent from behind the arc is a decent mark , they hit just 41 percent of their shots overall and 70 percent of their attempts from the free throw line en route to their second straight loss .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Orlando Magic , 113 - 91 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Saturday evening . The Bucks ( 60 ) started their quest to keep preserve their perfect record strong , building a 65 - 51 halftime lead . They essentially then put the game away in the third quarter , tacking on another 28 points while limiting the Magic ( 2 - 4 ) to just 17 . That sealed Milwaukee 's fourth home win of the season , one in which they limited Orlando to 33 percent shooting while draining 50 percent of their own attempts . Additionally , the home squad was once again dominant on the boards , winning the rebounding battle by a 57 - 42 margin . Nikola Vucevic paced the Magic with 16 points , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . D.J . Augustin produced 11 points , four assists and one rebound . Evan Fournier managed 10 points and one assist . Jonathon Simmons matched Fournier 's scoring total to lead the bench . Aaron Gordon shot just 3 - for - 15 on his way to a nine - point , five - rebound effort . Giannis Antetokunmpo 's 21 points led the Bucks . He added seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Khris Middleton turned in 18 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . Malcolm Brogdon went for 16 points , four boards and two assists . Donte DiVincenzo led the bench with 15 points and also hauled in three rebounds . Brook Lopez generated 11 points . The Magic head back home to face the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night , while the Bucks remain home for a Monday ninght showdown against the Toronto Raptors .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 124 - 109 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Monday evening . The Bucks and the Raptors each entered the contest with 60 records , making it the first time in NBA history for such an occurrence . Unfortunately , both team 's star players were sidelined from the contest , as Giannis Antetokounmpo sat out on concussion protocol , while Kawhi Leonard sat out for rest , as it was the first night of a back - to - back for Toronto . The first quarter was tight , resulting in the Bucks taking a 30 - 29 lead into the second . They took control in the second quarter , outscoring the Raptors by eight , to take a 62 - 53 lead into the half . The Bucks continued to build on their lead through the third quarter , pushing the gap to 15 heading into the fourth . The Raptors could not get their shots to fall in the fourth and took their first loss of the season , while the Bucks remain the only undefeated team in the league . Ersan Ilyasova led the Bucks with 19 points , 10 rebounds and two assists , in 23 minutes of action . Malcolm Brogdon and Eric Bledsoe tallied 17 points each , while Khris Middleton finished with 14 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals . The Bucks shot 49 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 45 from long range . Meanwhile , Serge Ibaka led the Raptors with 30 points on 12 - of - 21 shooting , in 28 minutes . Pascal Siakam followed up with 22 points , eight rebounds , four steals , two assists and one block , while Jonas Valanciunas was the only other player to score in double digits , with 10 points . Kyle Lowry tallied nine points , 15 assists , six rebounds , two steals and two blocks , in 34 minutes . The Raptors shot 39 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 44 from long range . The Raptors ( 6 - 1 ) will be right back in action as they play host to the 76ers on Tuesday . The Bucks ( 70 ) take on the Celtics in Boston on Thursday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 143 - 100 , at Fiserve Forum on Wednesday evening . The Bucks ( 13 - 4 ) had recently pledged to start playing sharper basketball from the opening quarter , in order to eliminate some of the last - minute comebacks that had somewhat become their trademark in recent games . They can consider Wednesday 's effort mission accomplished in that regard , as the Milwaukee built a commanding 72 - 50 halftime lead . That would prove to be more than enough , as the home squad rained down another 71 points on the Trail_Blazers ( 12 - 6 ) , who were a bit road weary after having already played four away games over the previous seven days coming into Wednesday . Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum paced the Trail_Blazers with matching 22 - point tallies . Lillard added five assists and four rebounds , while McCollum provided a rebound , an assist and two steals . Jusuf Nurkic was the only other double - digit scorer with 16 points , and he also hauled in six boards . Al-Farouq Aminu totaled just four points but added nine rebounds , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 33 points and also contributed 16 rebounds , nine assists and three steals . Khris Middleton followed with 21 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals . Eric Bledsoe and Malcolm Brogdon generated matching 16 - point efforts . Christian Wood and Thon Maker both chipped in 11 points off the bench , while pulling down five and eight rebounds , respectively . The Trail_Blazers will remain on the road for one more game , facing off with the Golden_State Warriors on Friday . The Bucks remain home and welcome the Phoenix Suns on Friday evening as well .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 116 - 114 , at Fiserv_Forum on Friday evening . The Suns ( 4 - 14 ) came into Saturday 's contest still seeking their first road win of the season , and facing quite the uphill battle versus a Bucks ( 13 - 5 ) squad that had only dropped one home game . However , Phoenix made a statement by taking a 64 - 61 halftime lead , and they proved it was n't a fluke by essentially hanging with Milwaukee basket for basket in the second half . The game was deadlocked at 114 - 114 when Jamal Crawford drained 17 - foot jumper with 1 seconds remaining to give the Suns an upset win . Devin Booker led the way with 29 points , a total he supplemented with seven assists , four rebounds and three steals . T.J. Warren provided 19 points , five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Deandre Ayton managed 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Trevor Ariza totaled 13 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Richaun Holmes led the bench with 12 points , Josh Jackson and Crawford each pitched in 11 points . Giannis Antetokounmpo paced the Bucks with 35 points and added 10 rebounds , three assists and one steal . Malcolm Brogdon totaled 22 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Khris Middleton collected 15 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Eric Bledsoe filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , seven assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Ersan Ilyasova led the bench with nine points , four rebounds and three assists . The Suns next pay a visit to the Detroit Pistons on Sunday afternoon , while the Bucks remain home and take on the San_Antonio Spurs in a Saturday night showdown .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 135 - 129 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Saturday evening . The game got out to a very competitive start , as the Bucks outscored the Spurs , 37 - 36 , in the first quarter . The back and forth battle continued through the second , this time with the Spurs taking the advantage , as they outscored the Bucks by two in the quarter , to take a 68 - 67 lead into halftime . The Spurs came out strong in the third , while the Bucks did not fall too far behind . However , the Spurs kept the pressure on and pushed their lead to seven , heading into the fourth . They stayed on top to start the fourth , quickly pushing their lead to 10 , but the Bucks did not give up , as they made it a two - point game within just a couple of minutes . The Bucks reclaimed the lead for the first time in the quarter , with 3:13 to go . They went on to outscore the Spurs , 14 - 9 , in the final minutes to secure the solid home win . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 34 points , 18 rebounds , eight assists , two steals and one block , in 38 minutes . Khris Middleton tallied 21 points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 20 points , 10 assists , four rebounds and two steals . The bucks shot 57 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 39 from long range . Meanwhile , DeMar DeRozan led San_Antonio with 34 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes . Bryn Forbes followed up with 18 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal , while Davis Bertans chipped in 17 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Spurs ( 9 - 10 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Monday . The Bucks ( 14 - 5 ) take on the Hornets in Charlotte on Monday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 116 - 113 , at Fiserv_Forum on Wednesday night . The Bucks ( 15 - 6 ) came in with a sparkling 10 - 2 home record , but with a feisty divisional rival on tap . The Bulls ( 5 - 17 ) made it clear they were n't fazed by Milwaukee 's home - floor dominance in the first quarter , taking a quick 40 - 30 lead . The home squad had erased that advantage by halftime , but the game remained hotly contested into the closing seconds . Khris Middleton then drained a 27 - foot three - point jumper with 5 seconds remaining to snap a 113 - 113 tie , and Justin Holiday 's desperation game - tying attempt with a second left could n't find the net . Jabari Parker and Zach LaVine paced the Bulls with matching 24 - point efforts . They added eight and nine rebounds , respectively . Ryan Arcidiacono netted 22 points and also supplied five rebounds , four assists and five steals . Robin Lopez led the bench with 17 points and also hauled in five rebounds . Holiday finished with eight points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with a 36 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists , two steals and one block . Malcolm Brogdon poured in 24 points and added six assists , five rebounds and one block . Middleton delivered 17 points , six rebounds and four assists . Brook Lopez totaled 12 points , five boards , two assists and two blocks . The Bulls next head to Motown , where they 'll battle the Detroit Pistons on Friday night . The Bucks next take on the New_York Knicks in the Big Apple on Saturday afternoon .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Detroit Pistons , 115 - 92 , at Fiserv_Forum on Wednesday evening . The Bucks ( 16 - 7 ) came in well - rested , last having taken the court Saturday . That energy was evident in the first half , as Milwaukee had forged a 56 - 45 lead over the Pistons ( 13 - 9 ) by intermission . The home squad would keep the pressure on in the second half , compiling another 59 points while limiting Detroit to 47 . The Bucks put on a stellar offensive show , holding the visitors to 36 percent shooting and forcing 20 turnovers . Blake Griffin 's 31 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , four assists and one block , led the Pistons . Reggie Jackson provided 15 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one steal . Andre Drummond continued a string of quiet games with 10 points , eight boards , one assist and one steal . No other Detroit player hit double digits in the scoring column , with Zaza Pachuilia coming the closest with eight points off the bench . Eric Bledsoe paced the Bucks with 27 points , adding four assists , three rebounds and four steals . Giannis Antetokounmpo managed 15 points , eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Malcolm Brogdon poured in 14 points and also supplied six rebounds and two assists . Tony Snell drew a start for Khris Middleton ( personal ) and netted 11 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two steals . Thon Maker and Sterling Brown delivered matching 11 - point tallies off the bench . The Pistons head back home and tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday night , while the Bucks remain home for a Friday night showdown against the Golden_State Warriors .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 105 - 95 , at Fiserv_Forum on Friday evening . The Warriors ( 18 - 9 ) were looking for a little retribution after having been walloped by the Bucks back on Nov. 8 in their one previous meeting . This time they had the advantage of attacking the Bucks ( 16 - 8 ) with a fully healthy Stephen Curry , who 'd exited that contest with a groin injury that would ultimately force him to miss the subsequent 11 games . Golden_State forged a 57 - 51 halftime lead , but the game was ultimately won on defense in the fourth quarter . The visitors held Milwaukee to just 19 points over the final 12 minutes , a fitting finish to a strong effort on that end of the floor overall . The Warriors limited their hosts to 39 percent shooting , including 18 percent from three - point range , while also forcing 18 turnovers . Curry and Klay Thompson paced the Warriors with matching 20 - point tallies . Curry added eight assists , four rebounds and one steal , while Thompson supplied six assists , five rebounds , four steals and two blocks . Andre Iguodala turned in 15 points , eight boards , two assists , one steal and one block . Kevin Durant struggled through a 3 - for - 14 shooting night to finish with a modest 11 points , but he added eight boards , six assists and one steal . Giannis Antetokoumpo led the Bucks with a 22 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , two steals and two blocks . Malcolm Brogdon followed with 15 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Brook Lopez and Eric Bledsoe generated matching 14 - point contributions . Khris Middleton posted 10 points , eight rebounds and one steal , although he drained only four of 14 attempts . The Warriors head back home to take on the Minnesota Timberwolves on Monday night , while the Bucks pay a visit to the Toronto Raptors on on Sunday evening .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 123 - 115 , at Fiserv_Forum on Wednesday . The Bucks came into Wednesday 's contest down several key bench players , but some unexpected names showed up when the team needed them to and the home team was able to hold off an undermanned New_Orleans squad . Giannis Antetokounmpo still led the way for Milwaukee , posting 25 points , eight rebounds and eight assists in 34 minutes . With the other starters being less effective , however , the second unit stepped up in a major way , as Milwaukee got 49 points from its bench . Tony Snell and newcomer George Hill led the way with 13 and 11 points , respectively , but the surprise performance of the night came from D.J . Wilson , who had the best game of his short career as a Buck with nine points and 10 rebounds . As for the Pelicans , they were without Julius Randle and Nikola Mirotic due to ankle injuries , and they lost Anthony Davis to an illness for all of the second quarter and some of the third . But , despite being without their three key frontcourt players , they still managed to keep the game close and even had the lead going into halftime . This was thanks in large part to the performance out of Jahlil Okafor , who came off the bench in Davis ' absence to score an impressive 17 points in just 13 minutes . Okafor shot 6 - of - 8 from the field and 5 - of - 7 from the free throw line . Even though he played just 29 minutes , Davis still managed to finish with a game - high 27 points and 11 rebounds , while Jrue Holiday finished with 25 points and 12 assists .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 112 - 96 , at Fiserv_Forum on Thursday Milwaukee came into this game as a sizable favorite and this 16 - point victory show just why , The Bucks did all their damage after the first quarter , as they won each of the final three quarters by at least five points apiece . That allowed them to hold the lead for the entirety of the second half while leading by at least five points for the final 16 minutes of action . Milwaukee 's defense was critical , as they held New_York to 37 percent shooting while winning the defensive rebounding differential , 46 - 33 . The Bucks did a ton of damage down low on the offensive end too , outscoring the Knicks in the paint , 52 - 28 . The Knicks ( 9 - 27 ) got a rare start from Luke Kornet , as he led the team with 23 points , three rebounds and five assists . Noah Vonleh accrued 15 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Emmanuel Mudiay finished with 13 points , three rebounds and six assists . Kevin Knox amassed 12 points and six boards . The Bucks ( 24 - 10 ) were led by Giannis Antetokoumpo , as he accumulated 31 points , 14 rebounds , eight assists and four blocks . Khris Middleton broke his shooting slump by totaling 25 points , six rebounds and five assists . Brook Lopez generated 17 points and three boards while D.J . Wilson led the bench with 10 points , 14 rebounds and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Milwaukee playing host to the Brooklyn Nets and New_York traveling to Salt_Lake_City to face the Utah Jazz .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 129 - 115 , at Fiserv_Forum on Saturday afternoon . The Bucks ( 25 - 10 ) already had a sizable advantage going into the contest given their past body of work on their home floor this season . However , the news that D'Angelo Russell would be rested for Saturday 's game brightened their prospects even further . The disparity between the two clubs was vividly illustrated in the first half , as Milwaukee jumped out to a 71 - 52 halftime lead . The Nets ( 17 - 21 ) were much more competitive in the second half , but Giannis Antetokounmpo 's 31 - point , 10 - rebound , 10 - assist triple - double spearheaded the home squad 's efforts and helped keep Brooklyn at bay . Shabazz Napier paced the Nets off the bench in Russell 's absence , posting 32 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal . Kenneth Faried followed with a 21 - point , 10 - rebound double - double in 27 minutes off the bench after Rondae Hollis-Jefferson left the game with an adductor strain after logging just three minutes . DeMarre Carroll furnished 18 points . five rebounds and four assists . Joe Harris poured in 15 points , while Spencer Dinwiddie drew the start in Russell 's place and provided 10 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Khris Middleton was right behind Antetokounmpo with 29 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal . Brook Lopez registered 24 points , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Malcolm Brogdon managed 18 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal . D.J . Wilson pitched in seven points , seven rebounds and one assist . The Nets head back home and next take the court on Wednesday night against the New_Orleans Pelicans . The Bucks remain home and tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday evening .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Detroit Pistons , 121 - 98 , at Fiserv_Forum on Tuesday evening . The Bucks ( 26 - 10 ) apparently made a fast start one of their primary New Year 's resolutions , as they came out of the gates hot and prepared to defend home court . Milwaukee raced out to a 68 - 52 halftime lead over the Pistons ( 16 - 19 ) , essentially setting the tone for what would be a comfortable home victory . The Bucks exerted their will on both ends of the floor , draining 60 percent of their shots while limiting Detroit to a 38 percent success rate from the floor . All five members of the home squad 's first unit scored in double digits and shot at least 50 percent . Blake Griffin was the one bright spot for the Pistons , leading the way with 29 points and adding nine rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Reggie Jackson mustered 19 points and three assists . Andre Drummond followed with 15 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two steals . Khyri Thomas led the bench with 13 points , while Reggie Bullock managed just six points on 2 - for - 8 shooting . Brook Lopez paced the Bucks with 25 points , supplementing them with three rebounds and two blocks . Khris Middleton tallied 22 points , five rebounds and two assists . Eric Bledsoe furnished 18 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Giannis Antetokounmpo delivered 15 points , eight boards , seven assists , three blocks and one steal . Malcolm Brogdon posted 13 points , five assists and four rebounds . The Pistons remain on the road and take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday evening , while the Bucks remain home and tangle with the Atlanta Hawks on Friday night .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 123 - 116 , at Fiserv_Forum on Saturday night . The Raptors ( 29 - 12 ) found themselves in a precarious position after the first 12 minutes , as the home - dominant Bucks ( 27 - 11 ) raced out to a 34 - 27 first - quarter lead . However , Toronto impressively outscored Milwaukee by a 64 - 48 margin over the second and third quarters , which gave them a 91 - 82 advantage heading into the final period . The home squad battled back to knot the game at 98 with 7:10 remaining before the Raptors finished the game on a 25 - 18 run . Kawhi Leonard and Pascal Siakam co - led the Raptors with matching 30 - point efforts . Leonard added six rebounds , six assists and five steals , while Siakam supplied four rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Serge Ibaka posted 25 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Fred VanVleet managed 21 points , eight assists , five rebounds and one block . Danny Green poured in 12 points , brought down nine boards , recorded one steal and tallied one block . Giannis Antetokounmpo paced the Bucks with a 43 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . Malcolm Brogdon tallied 15 points , five assists , three rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Eric Bledsoe and Khris Middleton totaled 14 points apiece while also dishing out eight and nine assists , respectively . George Hill and Sterling Brown pitched in 11 points each . The Raptors head back home to take on the Indiana Pacers on Sunday evening , while the Bucks remain home to face the Utah Jazz on Monday night .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 124 - 86 , at Fiserv_Forum on Tuesday . While there were three ties and three lead changes in the opening quarter , that was the only time this game was competitive . In fact , Milwaukee won all four individual quarters by at least six points apiece , as a 39 - 22 second quarter allowed the Bucks to lead by at least 19 points for the entirety of the second half . Milwaukee ended up having seven players reach double figures in scoring while Miami had just two players reach that threshold . The Bucks ended up shooting 50 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range while holding the Heat to 42 percent from the field and 24 percent from long range . Milwaukee out - rebounded Miami , 53 - 43 , while out - assisting them , 35 - 27 . They did that while winning the turnover differential , 17 - 7 . The Heat ( 21 - 21 ) were led by Hassan Whiteside , as he amassed 19 points and eight boards . Justise Winslow accumulated 19 points , five rebounds , five assists and two blocks . No other Miami player reached double figures in scoring , as the other three starters combined for just 10 points . Dwyane Wade led the bench with nine points , three rebounds and four assists . The Bucks ( 31 - 12 ) got a triple - double from Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he collected 12 points , 10 rebounds , 10 assists and three steals . Eric Bledsoe led the team in scoring , tallying 17 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Sterling Brown led the bench with 11 points and six assists . On deck for Milwaukee is a road matchup versus the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday . As for Miami , they return to action on Friday when they travel to face the Detroit Pistons .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 116 - 106 , at Fiserv_Forum on Tuesday . After opening up an early nine - point lead , the Bucks ( 34 - 12 ) struggled mightily in the second quarter and only put up 22 points . As a result , they entered halftime down two points against one of the NBA 's worth road teams . It did n't take long for Milwaukee to regain control of the game , however , as the team went on to win the third quarter by 10 points and managed to hold off the Mavericks ( 20 - 26 ) from that point on . Giannis Antetokounmpo had yet another stellar all - around performance in the win , posting 31 points , 15 rebounds and five assists in 36 minutes . Eric Bledsoe struggled from behind the arc , going just 1 - of - 7 from deep , but he was efficient inside and finished with 21 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting from the field . All five Bucks starters ended up reach double figures in points , with Malcolm Brogdon scoring 18 points , Brook Lopez adding 16 and Khris Middleton topping things off with 13 points of his own . The starting unit ended up scoring 100 of the team 's 116 points Monday . As for the Mavericks , they failed to put up an efficient enough performance to keep up with the high - powered Bucks . As a team , they shot just 41 percent from the field overall and went just 10 - of - 17 from the free throw line . Rookie Luka Doncic led the way for the team again , posting a triple - double of 18 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists in 33 minutes , while another rookie , Jalen Brunson , was close behind him with 16 points and five assists in 30 minutes . DeAndre Jordan and Wesley Matthews each added 15 points , while Harrison Barnes struggled mightily , going 5 - of - 14 from the field for just 8 points .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 108 - 99 , at Fiserv_Forum on Friday . While Charlotte led for the majority of this game , Milwaukee rode a 32 - 12 fourth quarter to a comeback victory . In fact , Milwaukee only led for a single minute before that fourth quarter , as the nine - point final margin was easily their largest lead of the game . Turnovers really killed Charlotte , as they lost that battle , 17 - 11 . Milwaukee 's defense was also critical , as they held Charlotte to 40 percent from the field , 26 percent from three - point range and 68 percent from the free - throw line . The Hornets ( 23 - 25 ) were led by Nicolas Batum , as he tallied 19 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jeremy Lamb totaled 16 points and four rebounds . Marvin Williams amassed 13 points , eight rebounds and two assists while Kemba Walker collected 10 points , eight rebounds and five assists before leaving due to a neck injury . The Bucks ( 35 - 12 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he accumulated 34 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks . Malcolm Brogdon generated 19 points and five rebounds . Eric Bledsoe finished with 18 points , four rebounds and three assists while Khris Middleton accrued 15 points , five rebounds and four assists . On deck for Milwaukee is a road matchup versus the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Sunday . As for Charlotte , they play host to the New_York Knicks on Monday for their next fixture .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 103 - 83 , at Fiserv_Forum on Saturday night . The game got out to a tight start , as the Magic led the Bucks by one , heading into the second . The Magic kept up the strong play , and outscored the hosts by nine in the second quarter , to take a 10 - point lead into halftime . The Magic continued to play with the edge , as they held the lead through the entire third quarter , and expanded their lead to 15 , by the start of the final frame . The Magic held on through the fourth and managed to earn themselves an impressive 20 - point lead against the top team in the East . Jonathan Isaac led the Magic with 17 points , six rebounds and two blocks , in 31 minutes . Nikola Vucevic tallied 15 points , 17 rebounds , five assists and one block , while Terrence Ross finished with 15 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Magic shot 47 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Eric Bledsoe led the Bucks with 19 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . Khris Middleton added 11 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and a steal , while Malcolm Brogdon tallied 14 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . The Bucks shot 33 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 35 from long range . The Bucks ( 41 - 14 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Monday . The Magic ( 24 - 32 ) take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Sunday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 98 - 97 , at Fiserv_Forum on Thursday evening . The Celtics got out to a solid start on the road , with a 22 - 20 lead after one quarter . The Bucks answered in the second , where they outscored the visitors by eight , to take a 53 - 47 lead into halftime . The contest slowed down again in the third quarter , where they Celtics outscored the Bucks 21 - 19 , cutting the deficit to just four points by the start of the fourth . The Bucks held the lead through most of the fourth , until the Celtics snagged a one - point lead with 2:48 to go . However , the Bucks came up huge down the stretch , capped off by a clutch three - pointer from Khris Middleton to seal the Bucks ' third straight win . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 30 points , 13 rebounds , six assists , two blocks and a steal , in 36 minutes . Khris Middleton followed up with 15 points , 13 rebounds , four assists and a steal , while Malcolm Brogdon tallied 15 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal . The Bucks shot 42 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 39 from long range . Meanwhile , Al Horford led the Celtics with 21 points , 17 rebounds , five assists , three blocks and two steals , in 37 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 22 points , five assists , two steals , two blocks and a rebound , while Jayson Tatum added 17 points , 10 rebounds , two steals , a block and an assist . The Celtics shot 38 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 40 from deep . The Celtics ( 37 - 22 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Saturday . The Bucks ( 44 - 14 ) play host to the Timberwolves on Saturday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 131 - 114 , at Fiserv_Forum on Saturday evening . The Hornets got out to a great start on the road , as they put together a 32 - 24 lead after one quarter . They pushed their lead to 14 mid way through the second , but the Bucks rallied back to make it a four - point game by halftime . The second half started out well contested , as the score was tied at 73 halfway though the quarter . However , the Bucks closed the quarter by outscoring the Hornets 21 - 14 , to take a seven - point lead into the final frame . They kept pushing to start the fourth and quickly built a double - digit lead . The Bucks held on the rest of the way to become the first team to achieve 50 wins this season . This also marks the second win in a row for Milwaukee . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 26 points , 13 rebounds , six assists and one block , in 29 minutes . Brook Lopez followed up with 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Malcolm Brogdon and Nikola Mirotic added 18 points each . The Bucks shot 49 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 44 from deep . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 25 points , four assists , three rebounds and one block , in 31 minutes . Frank Kaminsky followed up with 16 points , four assists and one rebound , in 21 minutes off the bench . Nicolas Batum finished with 14 points , eight rebounds and four assists . The Hornets shot 47 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 39 from deep . The Hornets ( 30 - 36 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Monday . The Bucks ( 50 - 16 ) will be right back in action , as they head to San_Antonio to take on the Spurs on Sunday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 130 - 125 , at Fiserv_Forum on Sunday . In a battle between two of the Eastern_Conference elite , Philly came away with their biggest win of the season . In fact , they led for all but a few minutes , as they led 62 - 53 at the half and never relinquished the lead from there . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Sixers hitting 15 - of - 32 and Milwaukee connecting on just 16 - of - 50 . Rebounding was also critical for Philadelphia , as they outrebounded Milwaukee , 54 - 45 . The Sixers ( 45 - 25 ) got a gem from Joel Embiid , as he collected 40 points , 15 rebounds , six assists and three steals . Jimmy Butler accrued 27 points , six rebounds , three assists and three steals . J.J. Redick amassed 19 points , one steal and one block . Tobias Harris finished with 12 points , seven rebounds and four assists . The Bucks ( 52 - 18 ) got a masterpiece from Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he accumulated 52 points , 16 rebounds and seven assists . Khris Middleton totaled 19 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Brook Lopez amassed 14 points , four rebounds and four blocks . Eric Bledsoe generated 12 points , five rebounds , six assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Milwaukee playing host to the struggling Los_Angeles Lakers and Philadelphia traveling to face the Charlotte Hornets .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 115 - 101 , at Fiserv_Forum on Tuesday evening . Both teams announced prior to the game that their respective elite - level stars would sit , with Giannis Antetokounmpo nursing an ankle injury and LeBron James simply being given the night off for rest purposes . Even with those two absences essentially negating the other , the difference in talent between the two clubs was too much for the Lakers ( 31 - 40 ) to overcome . The Bucks ( 53 - 18 ) jumped out to an 11 - point first - quarter lead and that Los_Angeles did whittle down to three by halftime . However , the home squad reasserted its dominance in the third period by extending their advantage back out to 15 , allowing them to comfortably cruise to victory during a low - scoring final period . The visitors did a poor job with both shooting and ball security , draining only 38 percent of their attempts while giving the ball away on 19 occasions . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope paced the Lakers with 35 points , adding three rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Kyle Kuzma supplied 17 points , five boards , three assists and one steal . Rajon Rondo and Reggie Bullock pitched in matching 13 - point tallies , with Rondo also dishing out 10 assists and pulling down six rebounds . JaVale McGee mustered six points but hauled in 11 boards . As is usually the case when Antetokoumpo sits , Khris Middleton led the way for the Bucks with 30 points , adding 10 rebounds , five assists and one steal . Brook Lopez tallied 28 points , nine rebounds , three assists , four blocks and three steals . Nikola Mirotic registered 23 points , six rebounds and one assist . Eric Bledsoe managed 14 points , eight boards , seven assists and four steals . Patrick Connaughton finished with 13 points , eight rebounds and four assists off the bench . The Lakers head back home to face the Brooklyn Nets on Friday night , while the Bucks pay a visit to the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday evening .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 127 - 105 , at Fiserv_Forum on Sunday . Milwaukee came into this game as a sizable favorite and a wire - to - wire win here shows just why . In fact , Milwaukee either won or tied all four individual quarters , as a 68 - 55 first half was too much for Cleveland to overcome . Rim protection was key for the Bucks , as they won the defensive rebounding battle , 41 - 32 , while out - blocking the Cavaliers , 7 - 1 . Milwaukee ended up shooting 55 percent from the field while holding Cleveland to just 43 percent shooting . The Cavaliers ( 19 - 55 ) were led by Kevin Love , as he tallied 20 points , 19 rebounds and three assists . Collin Sexton totaled 18 points and five rebounds . Larry Nance Jr. started and accumulated 13 points , three rebounds , six assists and three steals . Jordan Clarkson led the bench with 19 points , three rebounds and four assists . The Bucks ( 55 - 19 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he collected 26 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and four blocks . Khris Middleton accrued 17 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Eric Bledsoe amassed 12 points , five rebounds , seven assists and two steals while George Hill led the bench with 17 points . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Cleveland playing host to the Boston Celtics and Milwaukee welcoming the Houston Rockets to Fiserv_Forum .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 115 - 107 , at Fiserv_Forum on Sunday evening . The Bucks got out to a good start at home , with a 28 - 21 lead after one quarter . They stayed in control in the second and pushed their lead to 15 , with five minutes left in the quarter , while the Hawks managed to trim it to a nine - point deficit by halftime . The Bucks retained control through the third , with a double - digit lead most of the way , until they took a 13 - point lead into the fourth . The Hawks kept fighting and chipped away though the quarter , and managed to make it a three - point game with four minutes left . However , the Bucks outscored the visitors , 16 - 11 , down the stretch , to secure their 60th win of the season . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 30 points , nine rebounds , three assists , three blocks and one steal , in 24 minutes . Khris Middleton followed up with 21 points , five rebounds , three assists and a block , while Sterling Brown and D.J . Wilson tallied 10 points each . The Bucks shot 44 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 41 from deep . Meanwhile , Alex Len led the Hawks with 33 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two blocks , in 34 minutes . DeAndre ' Bembry added 13 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Kent Bazemore added 12 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Hawks shot 40 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 45 from deep . The Hawks ( 29 - 52 ) play host to the Pacers on Wednesday . The Bucks ( 60 - 21 ) play host to the Thunder on Wednesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Chicago Bulls , 149 - 124 , at United_Center on Monday night . Things looked grim from the opening tip for the Bulls ( 2 - 5 ) , which saw the Warriors ( 7 - 1 ) put up 12 quick points before three minutes were off the clock . It was all downhill from there , with one Klay Thompson largely responsible for their night of misery . Mired in a rather ordinary start , by his standards , to the new season , Thompson exploded for a trademark 52 - point performance that included an NBA-record 14 made three - pointers . Golden_State had compiled an eye - popping 92 points by intermission , making the second half a foregone conclusion . As the final score and Thompson 's final line both implied , the visitors shot extremely well , draining 55 percent of their attempts , including 53 percent from distance . Thompson added five rebounds and one steal to his game - high scoring haul . Stephen Curry was overshadowed for a change , but he still posted a solid 23 points eight rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block . Alfonzo McKinnie saw extended playing time off the bench and parlayed it into a 19 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . Quinn Cook collected 16 points , two rebounds and one assist . Kevin Durant generated 14 points and handed out eight assists in 28 minutes . Zach LaVine and Andrew Blakeney co - led the Bulls with matching 21 - point tallies . Rookie Wendell Carter , Jr. followed with 18 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Cameron Payne went for 15 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block . Jabari Parker matched Payne 's scoring total off the bench and also hauled in nine rebounds , dished out six assists and recorded one block . The Warriors return home and face off with the New_Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night , while the Bulls host the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday evening as well .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 108 - 107 , in overtime at United_Center on Wednesday . While these teams are on the opposite spectrum of wins and losses , it took an extra session to determine a winner . Denver ended regulation strong , as they went on an 8 - 2 run across the final three minutes to send the game into overtime . Despite the fact that Denver did n't score in the final 2:10 of overtime , Paul Millsap hit a putback with 0 seconds left to take the lead and win the game . That marked the 16th lead change of the game , as there were also 11 ties . Rebounding really carried Denver , as they outrebounded Chicago , 56 - 43 . The Nuggets dominated down low through scoring as well , as they won the points in the paint battle , 62 - 40 . The Nuggets ( 6 - 1 ) got a near triple - double out of Nikola Jokic , as he collected 22 points , 12 rebounds , nine assists , two steals and three blocks . Millsap finished with 19 points , six rebounds and three blocks to go along with his game - winner . Gary Harris accrued 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . Trey Lyles was huge off the bench , providing nine points , 10 rebounds and three assists . The Bulls ( 2 - 6 ) were led by Zach LaVine , as he accumulated 28 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Wendell Carter Jr. totaled 25 points , eight rebounds , five assists , three steals and three blocks . Justin Holiday amassed 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . Antonio Blakeney led the bench with 15 points and three boards . On deck for Denver is a road matchup versus the Cleveland Cavaliers on Thursday . As for Chicago , they return to action on Friday when they play host to the Indiana Pacers .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 96 - 88 , at United_Center on Saturday evening . Despite a strong start from the Rockets , the Bulls kept it together and managed to pull ahead with a 28 - 27 lead after one . The second quarter was very similar , in that Houston started out strong and kept up a consistent attack , however , the Bulls were able to stay focused and once again outscore Houston by one in the quarter , to take a 56 - 54 lead into halftime . The third quarter started out very slow , with the Rockets outscoring the Bulls just 6 - 3 , halfway through the quarter . The Rockets were able to pull themselves together , and outscored the Bulls 15 - 4 through the second half of the quarter , to take a 75 - 63 lead into the final frame . The Rockets pushed their lead to 17 early in the fourth and were able to ride it out from there . This marks the second win in a row for the Rockets , while the Bulls took their fourth straight loss . James Harden led the way for Houston with 25 points , seven assists , four steals and one rebound , in 33 minutes . Clint Capela was solid , with 12 points , 12 rebounds , two blocks , one assist and one rebound , while Carmelo Anthony tallied 17 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , in 32 minutes off the bench . The Rockets shot 43 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 42 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 21 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 38 minutes . Wendell Carter Jr. had a big night with 14 points , 13 rebounds , four blocks , two steals and one assist , while Jabari Parker added 15 points , three rebounds and one steal . The Bulls shot 39 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 24 from long range . The Bulls ( 2 - 8 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Knicks in New_York on Monday . The Rockets ( 3 - 5 ) head to Indiana to take on the Pacers on Monday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 103 - 98 , at United_Center on Monday evening . The Mavericks ( 5 - 8 ) seem to be turning their season around following a negative start and now they have won three of their last four ; that 's quite an impressive achievement considering they began the year with a 2 - 7 record . Dallas jumped ahead 25 - 20 after the first quarter , and they further increased their lead to 56 - 49 at the break . The Bulls ( 4 - 10 ) fought back and made it things closer with a 26 - 22 win in the third quarter , to make it a three - point game entering the final 12 minutes of action . But the Mavs closed things out and with a 25 - 23 win in the fourth , they cruised their way towards a huge win that also represented Dallas ' first W on the road during the 2018 - 19 season . Six Dallas players scored in double - digits in this game , including three players coming off the bench . Harrison Barnes led the way with 23 points , five rebounds and four steals , while young guards Dennis Smith Jr. and Luka Doncic contributed with 11 points each ; Doncic also chipped in with six rebounds and three assists . J.J. Barea had 14 points off the bench , while Maximilian Kleber ( 12 points ) and Dwight Powell ( 11 points ) looked solid off the bench as well . Zach LaVine was the best player for the Bulls since he finished with 26 points , five rebounds , five assists and four steals . Justin Holiday contributed with 14 points , and Jabari Parker added 16 points , six rebounds and two assists for the losing cause . Wendell Carter Jr. only scored seven points , but chipped in with 10 rebounds and two blocks .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Chicago Bulls , 122 - 83 , at United_Center on Saturday evening . The Raptors ( 12 - 4 ) came into the contest likely smarting from their overtime loss to the Boston Celtics on Friday night , a game in which they blew a fourth - quarter lead . Toronto also came into Saturday 's game short - handed , as they were without Kawhi Leonard ( rest ) , OG Anunoby ( wrist ) and C.J . Miles ( groin ) . However , the visitors set the tone early by jumping out to a 57 - 44 halftime lead . They then put any doubts about the outcome to rest in a dominant third period in which they racked up 32 points while limiting the Bulls ( 4 - 13 ) to just 12 . Kyle Lowry eventually exited the game for the Raptors with victory firmly in hand during the second half , as he was hampered by a sore ankle . The game was a turnover fest , with Toronto actually outpacing Chicago in that department , 24 - 23 . However , the Raptors drained 54 percent of their attempts while holding the Bulls to a 35 percent figure . Fred VanVleet drew the start for Leonard and led the Raptors with 18 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Danny Green turned in 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Serge Ibaka produced 16 points , four rebounds , one assist , four blocks and two steals . Pascal Siakam collected 12 points , eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Lowry finished with eight points , eight assists , seven rebounds and three steals in 29 minutes before his exit . The Bulls had only three double - digit scorers , with Antonio Blakeney leading the way with 13 points off the bench . Jabari Parker and Justin Holiday followed with matching 12 - point efforts . Parker added six rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Holiday had four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Chandler Hutchinson and Robin Lopez posted nine points apiece on the second unit . The Raptors remain on the road and visit the Orlando Magic on Tuesday evening , while the Bulls remain home and take on the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday night .
The Miami Heat defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 103 - 96 , at United_Center on Friday evening . The Bulls got out to a good start at home , with an early 10 - 4 lead , but the Heat came back to take a 28 - 26 lead into the second . The Heat continued their push into the second quarter , where they outscored the Bulls 32 - 13 , to take a convincing 60 - 39 lead by halftime . However , the Bulls were not finished , as they came out strong in the third and carried on to outscore the Heat , 30 - 18 , in the quarter , to cut the deficit to nine entering the fourth quarter . They continued the push and cut the gap to just four points , but the Heat were able to keep the edge and regain a double - digit lead , en route to the much - needed win , ending a three - game slide . Josh Richardson led the way for Miami with 27 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , three assists , two rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 33 minutes . Hassan Whiteside finished with 18 points , 10 rebounds , four blocks , one assist and one steal , while Bam Adebayo added 14 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and one block , in 26 minutes . The Heat shot 42 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Justin Holiday led the Bulls with 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , 13 rebounds , three steals , two assists and one block , in 39 minutes . Jabari Parker followed up with 23 points , 10 rebounds , one assist , one block and one steal , while Zach LaVine added 24 points , nine assists , four rebounds and one block . The Bulls ( 5 - 14 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Saturday . The Heat ( 7 - 11 ) head to Toronto to take on the Raptors on Sunday .

The Bulls ( 6 - 20 ) kept the Thunder ( 16 - 7 ) on their heels throughout the first half on their way to compiling an impressive 70 points . They 'd see their eight - point halftime advantage evaporate in the third quarter , however , as Oklahoma_City outscored them by a 29 - 17 margin . That set up an exciting final 12 minutes , one that saw Chicago claw their way back to outscore the visitors by six and notch the hard - fought win when Lauri Markkanen hit a game - winning layup with 5 seconds remaining . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with a 22 - point , 17 - rebound , 13 - assist triple - double that also included four steals . Steven Adams generated a 21 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two steals and a block . Paul George managed 19 points , five assists , four rebounds and three steals . The Thunder heads back home to take on the Utah Jazz on Monday night , while the Bulls remain home to take on the Boston Celtics on Saturday evening .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 96 - 93 , at United_Center on Wednesday . While these teams have been struggling for most of the season , this was one of the most competitive games of the year . In fact , there were 21 ties and 23 lead changes in total , as neither club led by more than seven points . Brooklyn made the final run that mattered most though , as they finished the game on a 7 - 2 spurt across the final three minutes . Defensive rebounding was huge for the Nets , as they won that battle , 38 - 30 . Free-throw shooting was also imperative , with Brooklyn hitting 20 - of - 25 and Chicago connecting on 7 - of - 10 . The Bulls ( 7 - 25 ) were led by Kris Dunn , as he collected 24 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals . Bobby Portis recorded a double - double off the bench , amassing 16 points and 11 boards . Justin Holiday went just 2 - of - 10 from the field but still totaled five points , three rebounds , three assists and two blocks . The Nets ( 15 - 18 ) have now won seven - straight games , as they 're arguably the hottest team in the league . Spencer Dinwiddie was their best player , as he provided 27 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals off the bench . Jarrett Allen led their starters with 16 points , 12 rebounds and three assists . D'Angelo Russell accrued 13 points , three rebounds and three assists . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Chicago playing host to the Orlando Magic and Brooklyn welcoming the Indiana Pacers to The Big Apple .

Minnesota won this game in wire - to - wire fashion , as a 29 - 18 first quarter really set the tone . They followed that up with a 31 - 19 second quarter , as the T'Wolves led by 31 points at times in the second half . Their defense was the difference , as they held the Bulls to 41 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . Minnesota connected on 50 percent from the field and 34 percent from long range . Rebounding was also a big factor , with Minnesota outrebounding Chicago , 52 - 45 . The Orlando Magic defeated the Chicago Bulls,112-84 , at United_Center on Wednesday . It did n't take long for this game to get out of hand , as the Magic ( 17 - 20 ) opened up a 16 - point lead in the first quarter and did n't look back . They continued to pile it on from there behind the stellar play of their starting frontcourt . Nikola Vucevic played just 26 minutes in the outing , but he still managed to post 22 points and and 12 rebounds on 10 - of - 15 shooting from the field . Close behind was Aaron Gordon , who had a terrific all - around performance , scoring 18 points to go along with seven rebounds and nine assists in 37 minutes . As a team , the Magic managed to take advantage of a poor defense effort from the home team , shooting 42 percent from three and a scorching 58 percent from the field overall . As for the Bulls ( 10 - 28 ) , this was their second straight loss and the second straight game they failed to score at least 90 points . It was another miserable shooting night for Chicago , as while they managed to shoot a decent mark from three ( 35 percent ) , they hit just seven shots from deep and still shot just 42 percent from the field overall . Zach LaVine was the lead scorer with only 16 points , while Lauri Markkanen and Kris Dunn scored just 14 points each . What hurt the Bulls immensely was getting absolutely nothing out of starting center Wendell Carter Jr. , as the rookie shot 0 - of - 5 from the field and posted zero points and one rebound in just 13 minutes .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 104 - 101 , at United_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Cavaliers ( 10 - 41 ) finally reached the double - digit win mark in a tough contest on the road against the Bulls ( 11 - 39 ) , as both struggling sides locked horns but ended delivering a tightly - contested affair that was only decided in the final minutes . Chicago won the first quarter by a two - point margin ( 29 - 27 ) and they held that lead at half time ( 53 - 51 ) , but Cleveland turned things around . They won the remaining two quarters by slim margins as well ( 28 - 26 and 25 - 22 , respectively ) to walk away with a huge win away from home . Five Cleveland players reached the 10 - point mark in this game and their best scorer was Jordan Clarkson , who came off the bench to finish with 18 points , seven rebounds and six assists in only 22 minutes of action . Matthew Dellavedova also chipped in with 16 points and five assists in 22 minutes off the bench . As for the starters , Alec Burks had 18 points , Rodney Hood chipped in with 17 , and Cedi Osman added 17 points with eight boards . Only four Chicago players scored in double digits and all of them were part of the starting lineup . The top scorer was Lauri Markkanen , as he contributed 21 points and 15 rebounds to the losing cause . Zach LaVine posted an oddly - similar stat line since he finished with 17 points and 12 boards . Wayne Selden had 15 points , and Robin Lopez added 16 points .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 125 - 120 , at United_Center on Wednesday . This was a tale of two halves , as Chicago dominated the first half but New_Orleans prevailed in the second half . In fact , the Bulls led for the entirety of the first half while the Pelicans led for the final 16 minutes of action . A 27 - 17 third quarter really made the difference , as Chicago could n't recover from that . Rebounding was key for New_Orleans , as they outrebounded Chicago , 46 - 36 . The shooting disparity was also key , with the Pelicans shooting 53 percent from the field and the Bulls hitting 49 percent of their shots . They also outscored Chicago in the paint , 60 - 50 , while outscoring their bench , 63 - 27 . The Pelicans ( 24 - 31 ) were led by Julius Randle , as he provided 31 points , seven rebounds and three assists off the bench . Kris Dunn collected 18 points , four rebounds , eight assists and two steals while Robin Lopez generated 11 points , three rebounds and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Friday , with New_Orleans playing host to the Minnesota Timberwolves and Chicago traveling to face the surging Brooklyn Nets .

These teams made a huge move at the trade deadline on Thursday , as many of those pieces were huge factors here . Washington got the better of Chicago thanks to a 42 - 29 second quarter , as the Wizards led by at least six points for the entirety of the second half . The Wizards offense was unstoppable , as they shot 58 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range while holding Chicago to 50 percent from the field and 25 percent from long range . Much of that can be attributed to ball movement , with the Wizards out - assisting the Bulls , 38 - 28 . Bench production was also critical , with Washington outscoring Chicago 's bench , 64 - 38 . The Wizards ( 24 - 32 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 31 points , two rebounds , four assists and four steals . Trevor Ariza accumulated 19 points , four rebounds and four assists . Bobby Portis also played well off the bench , amassing 10 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 112 - 99 , at United_Center on Monday . Milwaukee came into this game as a sizable favorite and they won in workman - like fashion . In fact , they won or tied all four individual quarters , as a 62 - 50 second half really put separation between the two teams . That allowed Milwaukee to hold the lead for the final three quarters , as the Bucks finished the game on a 12 - 2 run to cap off the victory . The shooting disparity was key , with the Bucks shooting 48 percent from the field while holding the Bulls to 39 percent shooting . Rim protection was also critical , with Milwaukee out - blocking Chicago , 7 - 2 . In addition , the Bucks outrebounded the Bulls on the defensive end , 44 - 36 . The Bucks ( 42 - 14 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 29 points , 17 rebounds , eight assists and three blocks . Eric Bledsoe accrued 19 points , two assists and two steals . Malcolm Brogdon accrued 17 points , six rebounds and three assists while Khris Middleton collected 16 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . The Bulls ( 13 - 44 ) were led by Zach LaVine , as he accumulated 27 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Lauri Markkanen amassed 20 points , 17 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Otto Porter totaled 18 points , seven rebounds and four assists while Robin Lopez finished with 17 points and four boards . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Chicago playing host to the Memphis Grizzlies and Milwaukee traveling to face the resurgent Indiana Pacers .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 122 - 110 , at United_Center on Wednesday evening . The hometown Bulls ( 14 - 44 ) got off to a surprisingly fast start against the typically defensive - minded Grizzlies ( 23 - 36 ) , racking up 67 first - half points . However , given Chicago 's defensive vulnerability , Memphis essentially kept pace , and the hosts ' lead was only five at intermission . The Bulls kept coming in the third by adding another four points to their advantage , and a 13 - 7 run over the first 3:4 of the final period gave them the cushion they 'd need for the double - digit home win . Chicago shot especially well and dominated on the boards , draining 56 percent of its attempts while outrebounding the visitors by a 47 - 31 margin . Avery Bradley put together a second straight productive outing by pacing the Grizzlies with 15 points . He added five assists , one rebound and one steal . Jaren Jackson , Jr. , Mike Conley , Jonas Valanciunas and Delon Wright generated a quartet of 12 - point tallies . Bruno Caboclo and Joakim Noah had eight points apiece , with the former also supplying five rebounds and two assists , and the latter totaling three boards , three dimes and two blocks . Otto Porter , Jr. paced the Bulls with a career - high 37 points and supplemented them with 10 rebounds , two assists and one block . Robin Lopez furnished 25 points , five rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Lauri Markkanen generated a 21 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and one steal . Zach LaVine delivered 15 points , seven assists and six rebounds . Cristiano Felicio led the bench with eight points . Ryan Arcidiacono drew the start for Kris Dunn ( back ) and mustered just two points but also dished out 11 assists , hauled in six rebounds and recorded a steal . The Grizzlies are now off until Feb. 22 , when they 'll host the Los_Angeles Clippers . The Bulls return to action that same night with a road matchup against the Orlando Magic .

That allowed the Bucks to lead for the entirety of the second half , as Chicago never got it within a six - point margin in the third or fourth quarter . Rim protection was key for the Bucks , as they doubled up the Bulls in blocks , 6 - 3 . Fastbreak scoring was also huge , with Milwaukee winning that battle , 15 - 5 . The Bucks bench was also decisive , as they outscored the Bulls , 42 - 24 The Bucks ( 46 - 14 ) had to play without Giannis Antetounmpo ( knee soreness ) but this game was no problem . The Pistons ( 33 - 31 ) got themselves into a first - half hole , falling behind by a 66 - 49 halftime margin . The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 133 - 111 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Sunday evening . This marked the first home game of the season for the Cavaliers , who started off with two tough road losses . The Cavs came out strong in quarter one , as they led 13 - 7 at the mid - way point and pushed it to a 10 - point , 34 - 24 , lead heading into the second . However , the Hawks came to life in the second quarter , led by Trae Young , to outscore Cleveland , 40 - 26 , in the frame and take a , 64 - 60 , lead into halftime . The Hawks stayed on top through the third and held a six - point lead heading into the fourth . They kicked it to yet another gear in the fourth , where they jumped to a 17 - point lead mid way through the quarter . The Cavs could not keep up and were soon down by 20 , en route to their third straight loss to start the season . Trae Young showed out with 35 points , 11 assists , two rebounds and one steal , in the best game of his young career . Alex Len was solid in the middle , with 16 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and four blocks , while Kent Bazemore tallied 23 points , five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . The Hawks shot 49 percent from the field , including 22 - of - 47 from long range . Jordan Clarkson was the high - point man for Cleveland , with 19 points , on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 23 minutes off the bench . Kevin Love had a solid night with 16 points , 17 rebounds , three assists and one steal , while George Hill tallied 16 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting . The Cavs shot 46 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 27 from long range . The Cavs ( 0 - 3 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nets on Wednesday . The Hawks ( 1 - 2 ) play host to the Mavericks on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 102 - 86 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Wednesday night . The Nets ( 2 - 2 ) and the Cavaliers ( 0 - 4 ) both entered this game with losing records , but it was clear from tip - off which team had it going tonight , and which had n't it . Brooklyn jumped ahead with a 24 - 17 first - quarter lead , but the Cavaliers answered quickly with a 28 - 21 second quarter that evened things up 45 - 45 at the break . However , Brooklyn broke free in the third quarter and they never looked back after winning the third period with a huge 38 - 17 score . Cleveland would won the final 12 minutes by a 24 - 19 score , but it was too late for them . Brooklyn closed things out with ease and got back to .500 , while the Cavs are still looking for their first win in their second post - LeBron era . All of the five Brooklyn starters scored in double digits . D'Angelo Russell led the way with an 18 - point , eight - assist effort , while Joe Harris chipped in with 16 points and six rebounds . Jared Dudley added 12 points , while both Caris LaVert and Jarrett Allen filled their respective stat sheets . LaVert finished with 10 points , six rebounds and four assists , while the center added 10 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Kevin Love ended being Cleveland 's best player after finishing with 14 points and 11 rebounds across 28 minutes , and Rodney Hood added 10 points . Cedi Osman had eight points with six rebounds , but the biggest contributions came off the bench : Jordan Clarkson had 14 points , while the rookie Collin Sexton finished with 14 points of his own .
