The Utah Jazz defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 117 - 91 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Friday night . The Cavaliers ( 8 - 30 ) came out ready to defend home court , as they forged a 49 - 48 halftime lead after a tightly contested first 24 minutes . However , the Jazz ( 18 - 20 ) appeared to get a halftime wake - up call , as they not only erased their slim deficit during the third , they built a 10 - point advantage heading into the final period . Their barrage of offense continued then , with Utah outscoring Cleveland by a 36 - 20 margin over the final 12 minutes to seal the comfortable road win . The visitors outshot their hosts by a 51 percent to 39 percent spread , and they won the battle of the boards by a 47 - 39 margin . Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Jazz with 18 points and added five assists and three rebounds . Jae Crowder had a bench - leading 16 points and also supplied five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Ricky Rubio posted 15 points , five assists and four rebounds . Joe Ingles and Rudy Gobert had 12 points apiece and also hauled in seven and nine rebounds , respectively . Derrick Favors and Kyle Korver contributed 10 points apiece . Alec Burks paced the Cavaliers with 17 points , adding three rebounds , two assists and one block . Collin Sexton managed 13 points , three assists , one rebound and one steal . Rodney Hood and Jordan Clarkson had 12 points each . Larry Nance , Jr. turned in 10 points , nine rebounds , one assist and two steals . Cedi Osman and Tristan Thompson generated eight points apiece , with Thompson notably pulling down 12 rebounds as well . The Jazz next pay a visit to the Detroit Pistons on Saturday night , while the Cavaliers remain home to face the New_Orleans Pelicans on Saturday evening as well .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 133 - 98 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Saturday evening . The Pelicans ( 18 - 22 ) have n't exactly had much success on the road this season , so it was n't completely surprising to see the Cavaliers ( 8 - 31 ) mostly hang with them in the first half . However , New_Orleans then separated in the third quarter , extending a 61 - 52 halftime lead by 17 points to essentially seal the win . As the final score implied , the visitors enjoyed big advantages in multiple categories . Two of the most prominent were shooting and rebounding - - the Pelicans drained 58 percent while limiting Cleveland to a 41 percent success rate , and they won the battle of the boards , 44 - 34 . Julius Randle and Jrue Holiday led the Pelicans with matching 22 - point tallies . Randle notably added 12 rebounds , eight assists and one steal . Anthony Davis provided 20 points , 10 rebounds , three assists , four steals and two blocks . Darius Miller led the bench with 14 points , while Elfrid Payton tallied 13 . Jahlil Okafor and E'Twaun Moore generated 10 points apiece . Jordan Clarkson paced the Cavaliers with 23 points and added four rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Collin Sexton and Jalen Jones pitched in 15 points apiece . Cedi Osman supplied 13 points , five assists , one rebound and three steals . Tristan Thompson managed a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and one block . The Pelicans head back home to face the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday night , while the Cavaliers remain home to tangle with the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday evening .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 104 - 88 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Monday afternoon . The Bulls ( 11 - 36 ) and the Cavaliers ( 9 - 39 ) have been two of the worst teams in the entire Association this season and in this battle of struggling teams , the one with the better record - by a slim margin - came out on top with little to no problems . Chicago quickly jumped to a decent lead following the first quarter since they were up 31 - 18 following the first 12 minutes of action , and they would never let that lead slip away . Cleveland showed some signs of life when they won the second quarter by a seven - point differential ( 24 - 17 ) , but Chicago would close the door on a potential comeback when they won the remaining two quarters by 28 - 25 and 28 - 21 , respectively . Zach LaVine was the top scorer for the Bulls since he finished with 25 points while shooting 9 - 16 from the field . Lauri Markkanen chipped in with 13 points while adding eight rebounds , and Kris Dunn filled the stat sheet admirably since he finished with 13 points , nine assists , four rebounds and two steals . Bobby Portis ( 15 points ) and Jabari Parker ( 10 points ) also reached double - digit scoring while coming off the bench . Rookie point guard Collin Sexton led the way for the Cavaliers since he finished with 18 points and three rebounds , but did n't deliver a single assist during the entire contest . Ante Zizic looked productive , as the big man chipped in with 13 points and nine rebounds in 28 minutes . Jordan Clarkson had 12 points , five rebounds and four assists off the bench . Cameron Payne had 11 points as well .
The Miami Heat defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 100 - 94 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Friday evening . The Heat ( 23 - 24 ) took the Cavaliers ' ( 9 - 41 ) best punch in the first half , as Cleveland jumped out to a 53 - 48 halftime lead . However , Miami established its dominance in the third , erasing their slim deficit and building a 10 - point advantage heading into the final period . The home squad chipped away and got within the final margin of victory courtesy of an Alec Burks three - pointer with 3 seconds remaining , but it was a case of too little , too late . The Heat benefited from a 48 - 42 rebounding advantage and a 35 - point contribution from their second unit . Justise Winslow led the Heat with 27 points , adding seven rebounds , two assists and one block . Hassan Whiteside posted a 14 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Derrick Jones , Jr. generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double of his own . Dwyane Wade tallied 13 points , six boards and three assists . Josh Richardson produced 10 points and four assists . Tyler Johnson supplied nine points , six assists , two rebounds and two steals . Cedi Osman paced the Cavaliers with 29 points and supplemented them with four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Burks and Collin Sexton turned in matching 13 - point tallies while pulling down seven and two rebounds , respectively . Ante Zizic furnished 11 points , nine rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Rodney Hood registered 10 points , four assists and three rebounds . The Heat remain on the road and tangle with the New_York Knicks on Sunday night , while the Cavaliers make the short trip to the Windy City to face the Chicago Bulls on Sunday afternoon .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Washington Wizards , 116 - 113 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Tuesday . The Cavaliers ( 11 - 41 ) were coming off a win over the Chicago Bulls and now they 're riding a two - game winning streak following another solid performance against a Wizards ( 21 - 29 ) team that once again struggled on the defensive end of the court . The Cavaliers dominated the game as soon as it began , though , as they jumped ahead to a first - quarter lead since they were up 26 - 24 following the first 12 minutes of action . Cleveland did n't slow things down and after winning the second quarter ( 27 - 23 ) , they pulled away for good in the third quarter with an impressive 35 - 22 effort . Washington would end up winning the final quarter and at one point they made it a close game down the stretch . However , things were already decided and the Cavaliers ended securing a huge win at home . For the second consecutive game , Jordan Clarkson was Cleveland 's best player since he finished with 28 points and five rebounds while coming off the bench and playing only 29 minutes . Cedi Osman chipped in with 26 points and seven assists , while Collin Sexton ( 12 points ) and Ante Zizic ( 12 points , 12 rebounds ) also contributed nicely . Larry Nance Jr. chipped in with a double - double ( 13 points , 11 rebounds ) off the bench . Bradley Beal was the best player for the Wizards since he finished with 31 points and seven assists , but the rest of the team was n't able to play at his standard . Trevor Ariza had 13 points , but filled the stat sheet nicely since he also added five rebounds and five assists . Otto Porter Jr. and Gary Payton II both contributed 11 points coming off the bench , while Jordan McRae finished with 15 points .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 111 - 98 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Saturday . In a game between two crippled teams , Dallas was able to prevail thanks to a 40 - 31 first quarter . What really put the game away was a 25 - 18 fourth quarter , as the Mavericks held a double - digit lead for the final eight minutes . Defensive rebounding was huge for Dallas , as they won that battle , 41 - 33 . Three-point shooting was also key , with the Mavericks hitting 16 - of - 39 and the Cavaliers connecting on just 4 - of - 23 . Dallas ended up shooting 48 percent from the field while holding Cleveland to 40 percent shooting . The Boston Celtics defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 103 - 96 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Tuesday . The Celtics ( 35 - 19 ) were heavy favorites entering this game against a lowly Cavaliers ( 11 - 43 ) team , but the difference on both teams ' records did not show up during most of the contest . In fact , Cleveland jumped ahead to a 30 - 28 lead in the first quarter , but Boston turned things around in the second half and a 31 - 21 lead gave them an eight - point advantage ( 59 - 51 ) heading into the break . Cleveland showed a will to turn things around and won the third quarter by a 28 - 26 score , but Boston held on in the final 12 minutes of action . The Celtics won the final quarter by a tight 18 - 17 score , but it was more than enough to give them a huge win on the road . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 107 - 104 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Monday . In a battle between the two worst teams in the NBA , it came down to the final shot . In fact , Dennis Smith Jr. missed a game - tying three - pointer at the buzzer to capture the win for Cleveland . It was actually a wire - to - wire win for the Cavaliers , as a 63 - 48 first half was too much for the Knicks to overcome . Rebounding was critical for Cleveland , as they outrebounded New_York , 56 - 46 . Free-throw shooting was also huge , with the Cavaliers hitting 17 - of - 19 and the Knicks connecting on just 13 - of - 20 . The Knicks ( 10 - 46 ) were led by Kadeem Allen , as he provided 25 points , three rebounds and six assists off the bench . Kevin Knox led the starters with 13 points , six rebounds and three assists . DeAndre Jordan accrued 12 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Dennis Smith Jr. collected 20 points , four assists , three steals and two blocks . Kevin Love totaled 14 points and nine boards in 15 first - half minutes . Jordan Clarkson led the bench with 15 points and six boards . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with New_York welcoming the Philadelphia 76ers to MSG and Cleveland playing host to the Brooklyn Nets .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers in triple overtime , 148 - 139 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Nets ( 30 - 29 ) and Cavaliers ( 12 - 46 ) had both been involved in their fair share of shootouts this season , but what unfolded Wednesday ended up being on another level altogether . Most of regulation hinted at what was to come in the latter stages , as the game was a back - and - forth affair for the majority of the first four quarters . Cleveland had pulled ahead by as much as five points with under four minutes to go in the final period before Brooklyn fought back and ultimately sent the game into the first overtime on a D'Angelo Russell driving layup with 1:1 remaining . Collin Sexton returned the favor for the hosts at the end of the first extra period with 3 seconds left to force a sixth quarter . At the end of the second overtime , it was DeMarre Carroll making up for missing a floater at the end of regulation by hitting a 26 - foot step back jumper at the buzzer to knot the score back up at 128 . The visitors finally got the best of the exhausted Cavs in the third overtime , outscoring them by a 20 - 11 margin and finishing on a 7 - 2 run over the final 1:5 to secure the win . Russell overcame a forgettable start to lead the way for the Nets with 36 points . He added eight assists and seven rebounds . Joe Harris netted 25 points and also contributed four rebounds and two assists . Carroll offered 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson delivered 17 points , five rebounds and one steal . Allen Crabbe supplied 14 points and seven boards , while Caris LeVert turned in 12 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one block . Jarrett Allen and Shabazz Napier had matching 10 - point tallies while also compiling 12 rebounds and seven assists , respectively . Jordan Clarkson paced the Cavaliers with 42 points and complemented them with eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Sexton managed 24 points , six boards and five assists . Marquese Chriss registered 23 points , seven boards , one assist and two steals . Cedi Osman returned from injury to offer 13 points , five rebounds and three assists . Larry Nance , Jr. mustered eight points and 14 rebounds . The Nets are now off until Feb. 21 , when they 'll host the Portland Trail_Blazers . The Cavaliers return to action that same evening and host the Phoenix Suns .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 123 - 110 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Monday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a great start on the road , as they built a 29 - 18 lead through one quarter . They kept the pressure on through the second , where they outscored the Cavs by 12 , to take a 71 - 48 lead by halftime . However , the Cavs were not ready to call it quits , as they rallied in the third quarter , outscoring the visitors 36 - 17 , to make it a four - point game heading into the fourth . The Cavs stuck with it and were within three points of the Blazers with 4:30 left in the contest , but the Trail_Blazers closed on an 18 - 8 run , to seal their fourth straight win . C.J . McCollum led Portland with 35 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Damian Lillard followed up with 21 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two blocks , while Jusuf Nurkic tallied 15 points , eight rebounds and four assists . The Trail_Blazers shot 56 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Cedi Osman led the Cavs with 27 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 32 minutes . Kevin Love tallied 18 points , 12 rebounds and one assist , while Jordan Clarkson added 19 points , five rebounds two assists and a steal , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Cavs shot 42 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 34 from deep . The Cavaliers ( 14 - 47 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Knicks in New_York on Thursday . The Trail_Blazers ( 37 - 23 ) take on the Celtics in Boston on Wednesday .

The Cavaliers offense was unstoppable , as they shot 58 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The Boston Celtics defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 105 - 87 , at TD_Garden on Tuesday . The fact that Boston held the lead for over 40 minutes of this game shows just how dominant they were , as they maintained the lead for the final three quarters . In fact , the Celtics led by at least nine points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Defense was critical for Boston , as they held Philly to just 39 percent from the field and 19 percent from three - point range while forcing 16 turnovers . Free-throw shooting was also a killer for the Sixers , as they connected on just 14 - of - 24 from the charity stripe . Three-point shooting was also a decisive stat , with Boston hitting 11 - of - 37 and Philadelphia connecting on just 5 - of - 26 . Bench production was huge as well , with the Celtics winning that battle , 44 - 26 . The Sixers ( 0 - 1 ) got a near triple - double out of Ben Simmons , as he collected 19 points , 15 rebounds , eight assists , four steals and two blocks . Joel Embiid was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 23 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . J.J. Redick led the bench with 16 points and two boards . The Celtics ( 10 ) were led by Jayson Tatum , as he tallied 23 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Jaylen Brown amassed 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . Kyrie Irving struggled mightily , as he went just 2 - of - 14 from the field to accrue seven points , four rebounds and seven assists . Marcus Morris was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , 10 boards and two steals . On deck for Philly is a home matchup versus the Chicago Bulls on Thursday . As for the Celtics , they travel north of the border to play the Toronto Raptors on Friday for their next fixture .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Boston Celtics , 93 - 90 , at TD_Garden on Monday . After losing 14 of their previous 15 games in Boston , Orlando picked up their biggest win of the season on Monday . In fact , this was a wire - to - wire win for the Magic , as a 28 - 19 first quarter was too much for the Celtics to overcome . Defense was critical for Orlando , as they held Boston to just 40 percent from the field and 23 percent from three - point range while winning the turnover differential , 12 - 9 . Ball movement was also huge for the Magic , out - assisting Boston , 28 - 21 . The Magic ( 2 - 2 ) got another spectacular performance out of Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 24 points , 12 rebounds and three steals on 11 - of - 18 from the field . The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 117 - 113 , at TD_Garden on Thursday to earn their fourth straight win . Three-point shooting was the story of the night for the Celtics ( 6 - 2 ) , who knocked down a massive 24 three - pointers in the win . All five Celtics starters knocked down multiple three - pointers , including Semi Ojeleye , who started in place of the injured Jaylen Brown . Milwaukee ( 7 - 1 ) , though , was not ready to let the historic shooting night best them , launching a comeback effort late in the game . The Bucks held Boston scoreless for the final three minutes of the game , but were unable to complete the double - digit comeback with so little time left on the clock . The matchup was the first meeting between the two teams since the Celtics knocked Milwaukee out in seven games in the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs last season . In keeping with that series , the Bucks ' Khris Middleton came alive late , knocking down multiple late three - pointers to breathe life into the Bucks ' comeback . It was not enough to make up for his lackluster start , though , as Middleton finished just 6 - of - 18 from the field on the night . Giannis Antetokounmpo , in typical fashion , led the Bucks with 33 points and grabbed 11 rebounds . Kyrie Irving led the victorious Celtics with 28 points , including 6 - of - 12 shooting from three - point range . After averaging just 14 points per game in his first six contests this season , Irving has come alive with 61 total points in the Celtics ' last two games . Al Horford added 18 points , including four three - pointers , and eight assists from the center position . The win was the Celtics ' fourth in a row after a disappointing 2 - 2 start for a team fresh off a conference finals appearance . Next up for the Celtics is a trip to Indiana on Saturday . Milwaukee , meanwhile , will host the Sacramento Kings on Sunday afternoon .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Chicago Bulls , 111 - 82 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday night . The Celtics ( 8 - 6 ) got off to a slow start against the Bulls ( 4 - 11 ) and they lost the first quarter 24 - 19 , perhaps showing that their loss to the Portland Trail Blazers was n't entirely on the rear view . However , they looked dominant in the second quarter and won 32 - 11 , establishing a huge advantage that they would never relinquish . Boston then won the remaining two quarters ( 26 - 24 and 34 - 23 , respectively ) , and sealed the deal comfortably . Despite the slow start , it was a huge win for the Celtics as it will certainly allow them to gain momentum going forward . The Celtics showcased their balanced offense once again , as all of their starters scored in double digits but no player reached the 20 - point mark . Jaylen Brown was the team 's top scorer with 18 points and six rebounds , while Kyrie Irving filled the stat sheet thanks to 17 points , seven assists , six rebounds and two steals . Jayson Tatum had 14 points and six boards , Gordon Hayward chipped in with 11 points , four assists and four rebounds , and Al Horford delivered 10 points with eight boards . Shaquille Harrison led the way for the Bulls with 16 points coming off the bench . Jabari Parker had 14 points with five rebounds , and talented rookie Wendell Carter Jr. contributed 11 points and seven rebounds . Zach LaVine filled the stat sheet , as he finished with 10 points , nine rebounds and four assists .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 123 - 116 , at TD_Garden on Friday . There were 11 ties and nine lead changes in this competitive matchup , as it took an overtime session to determine a winner . Boston dominated that extra session , outscoring Toronto , 16 - 9 . In fact , the Celtics never trailed in overtime , despite the fact that the Raptors held the lead for the majority of the second half . Boston ended up shooting 53 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range while holding Toronto to 43 percent from the field and 28 percent from long range . The Raptors ( 12 - 4 ) were led by Kawhi Leonard , as he tallied 31 points , 15 rebounds , four assists and three steals . Serge Ibaka amassed 21 points and four rebounds . Pascal Siakam collected 16 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Kyle Lowry finished with 14 points , two rebounds , seven assists and two steals . The Celtics ( 9 - 6 ) got a spectacular performance out of Kyrie Irving , as he accumulated 43 points , two rebounds , 11 assists and three steals . Jayson Tatum totaled 21 points , seven rebounds and two steals . Gordon Hayward had one of his best games of the season , finishing with 15 points , five rebounds , five assists and four steals . Both teams will have to play the second half of a back - to - back set on Saturday , with Toronto traveling to face the Chicago Bulls and Boston playing host to the Utah Jazz .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Boston Celtics , 98 - 86 , at TD_Garden on Saturday night . The Jazz ( 8 - 8 ) had battled inconsistency since the start of the season , but they managed one of their more complete performance in a difficult road environment . Utah got a combined 48 points from their starting backcourt duo of Ricky Rubio and Donovan Mitchell and held the Celtics ( 9 - 7 ) to 38 percent shooting , including an unsightly 15 percent from three - point range . The third quarter was the launching pad to the win , as Utah held Boston to just 17 points . Mitchell spearheaded the Jazz with a game - high 28 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block . Rubio tallied 20 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals . Rudy Gobert totaled 12 points , nine boards , three assists , two steals and one block . Derrick Favors generated matching 10 - point efforts from the starting five and bench . They pulled down eight and seven rebounds , respectively . Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 20 points and added eight rebounds , one assist and two steals . Jayson Tatum was the only other double - digit scorer for Boston with 10 points , and he added seven rebounds . Al Horford filled out the stat sheet with nine points , six rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Guerschon Yabusele led the bench with nine points of his own . The Jazz next visit the Indiana Pacers on Monday evening , while the Celtics hit the road as well and face the Charlotte Hornets on Monday night .
The New_York Knicks defeated the host Boston Celtics , 117 - 109 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Celtics got out to a slow start at home , as they only tallied 18 points in the first quarter , while they allowed the Knicks 26 points . The Knicks kept up the momentum in the second , and pushed their lead to 26 late in the quarter , before settling on a 65 - 49 lead at halftime . The Celtics came out battling in the third , but the Knicks would not budge , as they carried a 15 - point lead into the final frame . The Celtics kept fighting and almost completed the comeback , as they made it a four - point game with one minute remaining . However , the Knicks executed down the stretch in order to secure the impressive road win and end a six - game losing streak . Trey Burke led the Knicks with 29 points , 11 assists , six rebounds and two steals , in 31 minutes . Tim Hardaway Jr. followed up with 21 points , four rebounds , four assists , while Noah Vonleh tallied 16 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . The Knicks shot 49 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 22 points , 13 assists , six rebounds , three steals and one block , in 36 minutes . Al Horford followed up with 19 points , seven rebounds , five assists , three blocks and one steal , while Marcus Morris finished with 21 points , eight rebounds , four assists and one steal . The Celtics shot 39 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 33 from deep . The Celtics ( 9 - 9 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Friday . The Knicks ( 5 - 14 ) play host to the Pelicans on Friday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 128 - 95 , at TD_Garden on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 12 - 10 ) came into the contest the recipients of plenty of heat due to what was considered a disappointing record based on the lofty expectations they came into the season with . The first half was more tightly contested than was likely expected , as Boston only held a relatively modest 10 - point halftime lead over the Cavaliers ( 4 - 17 ) . However , they exerted their superiority in the third quarter , racking up 39 points while limiting Cleveland to 20 . That essentially sealed the win , as the Celtics were essentially able to take their foot off the proverbial gas over the final 12 minutes . The home team 's play stood out on both ends of the floor , as they kept the Cavs to 42 percent shooting while draining 55 percent of their attempts , including 52 percent of their 29 tries from three - point range . Jordan Clarkson led the Cavaliers off the bench with 16 points , adding one rebound . Rookie Collin Sexton followed with 15 points and also provided four boards and four assists . Alec Burks was solid in his Cleveland debut with 14 points . Tristan Thompson posted a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double , while Rodney Hood poured in 10 points . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 29 points and also supplied four rebounds and four assists . Marcus Morris registered 15 points , four rebounds and one assist . Gordon Hayward delivered a bench - leading 14 points , along with four rebounds and four assists . Jayson Tatum turned in 13 points and four rebounds , while Marcus Smart drew another start for Jaylen Brown ( back ) and filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , seven assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block . The Cavaliers head back home to face the Raptors on Saturday night , while the Celtics pay a visit to the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday night as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the New_York Knicks , 128 - 100 , at TD_Garden on Thursday . The hot play of the Celtics ( 14 - 10 ) continued Thursday night , as the dominating win in New_York gave the team their fourth straight victory . It was a wire - to - wire victory for Boston after they opened up an eight - point lead in the first quarter and never looking back before piling it on in the final stretch . It was a complete team effort too , with seven different players scoring in double figures . Kyrie Irving led the way with a team - high 22 points to go along with four rebounds and eight assists across 30 minutes , while Al Horford posted a double - double of 19 points and 12 rebounds . Jaylen Brown provided crucial minutes off the bench as he works his way back from injury , scoring 21 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting in just 25 minutes as a reserve . In the end , it was a very efficient offensive showcase from the Celtics , as they shot 53 percent from the field and dished out 32 assists to just nine turnovers . As for the Knicks ( 8 - 18 ) , they dropped their second straight game and have lost four of their last five . It was a miserable night on both ends for the home team , but their performance on offense was especially porous . New_York shot just 40 percent from the field , making it impossible to keep up with the Celtics , who seemed to be getting whatever shots they wanted Thursday . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the way once again for the Knicks with 22 points while shooting 6 - of - 13 from behind the arc . Emanuel Mudiay shot just 5 - of - 15 from the field , but still managed to finish with 17 points , while Enes Kanter posted yet another double - double of 14 points and 11 rebounds .
The Boston Celtics defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 113 - 100 , at TD_Garden on Monday night . The Celtics ( 16 - 10 ) came into the game fielding something akin to a preseason roster , considering Kyrie Irving ( shoulder ) , Al Horford ( knee ) and Gordon Hayward ( illness ) were all out of action . They let their deep roster do what it 's intended to do , however , jumping out a 28 - 21 first - quarter lead and remaining consistent throughout all four quarters . Boston held off any designs of a Pelicans ( 14 - 15 ) comeback in the final 12 minutes by outscoring their visitors , 30 - 28 . New_Orleans suffered a key injury during the game , as Nikola Mirotic exited the contest with an ankle injury after logging just seven minutes . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 41 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists and four steals . Julius Randle provided 20 points as the only other double - digit scorer on New_Orleans . Tim Frazier mustered eight points and dished out 10 assists . Jrue Holiday could only compile seven points on 3 - for - 10 shooting . He added six assists , one rebound and three steals . Marcus Morris paced the Celtics with 31 points , adding four rebounds and four assists . Jayson Tatum registered 21 points , six boards , one assist and one block . Jaylen Brown poured in 19 points and also supplied seven rebounds , three assists and one block . Semi Ojeyele totaled 11 points and six rebounds . Terry Rozier filled in for Irving and collected 10 points , seven rebounds , six assists and two steals . The Pelicans head back home to take on the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday night , while the Celtics hit the road and take on the Washington Wizards on Wednesday evening as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 129 - 108 , at TD_Garden on Friday . This marks Boston 's eighth - straight win , as they won this game in dominating fashion . A 42 - 19 first quarter really set the tone , as the Celtics never trailed from there . In addition , Boston led by at least 10 points for the entirety of the second half and by at least 20 for the whole of the fourth quarter . The Celtics ended up shooting 48 percent from the field , 49 percent from three - point range and 90 percent from the free - throw line while holding the Hawks to 42 percent from the field , 42 percent from long range and 63 percent from the charity stripe . Boston did a ton of damage down low too , outscoring Atlanta in the paint , 48 - 32 . The Hawks ( 6 - 22 ) were led by Kevin Huerter , as he tallied 19 points , two rebounds , three assists and three steals . Kent Bazemore amassed 13 points , three rebounds , seven assists and two steals . John Collins totaled 11 points and 14 boards . Alex Len and Vince Carter both reached double figures in scoring off the bench . The Celtics ( 18 - 10 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he collected 24 points , five rebounds , five assists and four steals . Jayson Tatum accrued 22 points , three rebounds and two steals . Marcus Morris generated 20 points and six boards . Gordon Hayward led the bench with 19 points and five assists . On deck for Boston is a road matchup versus the Detroit Pistons on Saturday . As for Atlanta , they 're off until Sunday when they travel to face the Brooklyn Nets .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Boston Celtics , 111 - 103 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Suns ( 8 - 24 ) came into the contest with an unsightly road record that had seen them notch just two wins in 15 tries . That futility , combined with the 37 - 26 first - quarter lead forged by the Celtics ( 18 - 12 ) , did n't seem to bode well for Phoenix 's chances . However , they began to claw back in the second period , which left their halftime deficit a very manageable 62 - 59 . The third quarter was the turning point , with Phoenix outscoring its hosts by a 27 - 18 margin and taking an 86 - 80 advantage that they would n't relinquish into the final 12 minutes . The visitors surprisingly won the rebounding battle by a 56 - 37 margin , with the fact Aron Baynes exited the game with what turned out to be a broken hand certainly playing a part . Celtics tormentor Devin Booker paced the Suns with 25 points and added eight assists , five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Deandre Ayton was a big reason for Phoenix 's success down low , posting a 23 - point , 18 - rebound double - double . T.J. Warren offered 21 points , five rebounds , one assist and two steals . Kelly Oubre , Jr. enjoyed a successful team debut with 13 points , six rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Josh Jackson went for 11 points , five boards , two assists , one steal and one block . Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 29 points and also tallied 10 assists , five rebounds , four steals and one block . Jayson Tatum followed with 18 points , eight boards , four blocks and one steal . Marcus Smart and Terry Rozier turned in matching 12 - point tallies , with Smart notably adding five assists , four rebounds and four steals . Gordon Hayward delivered 10 points , five rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal . The Suns remain on the road and visit the Washington Wizards on Saturday night , while the Celtics remain home and take on the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday evening .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Boston Celtics , 120 - 107 , at TD_Garden on Friday . It 's rare to see a team go into TD_Garden and dominate the Celtics but that was the case here for the Bucks . In fact , a 35 - 22 first quarter really set the tone , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 minutes of action . What makes that even more bizarre is the fact that Boston started the game with a 10 - 1 lead , as the Bucks scored the next 16 points after that and never relinquished the lead . Milwaukee ended up shooting 51 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range while holding Boston to 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range . Defensive rebounding was also critical , with the Bucks winning that battle , 44 - 27 . The Bucks ( 22 - 9 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 30 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Khris Middleton accrued 21 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Eric Bledsoe accumulated 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . Malcolm Brogdon finished with 10 points , nine rebounds and four assists . The Celtics ( 18 - 13 ) were led by Jaylen Brown , as he provided 21 points , seven rebounds , two assists and four steals off the bench . Jayson Tatum led the starters with 20 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Kyrie Irving collected 15 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . No other player had more than five rebounds or four assists . On deck for Boston is a home matchup versus the Charlotte Hornets on Sunday . As for Milwaukee , they play again on Saturday , as they travel to South Beach to play the Miami Heat .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 119 - 103 , at TD_Garden on Sunday . While Boston came into this matchup losing three - straight , they prevailed here in wire - to - wire fashion . In fact , a 39 - 21 second quarter really set the tone , as they led by at least eight points for the final 30 minutes of action . The shooting disparity was critical , with the Celtics hitting 50 percent from the field , 33 percent from three - point range and 80 percent from the free - throw line while holding the Hornets to 43 percent from the field , 23 percent from long range and 73 percent from the charity stripe . Boston also outrebounded Charlotte , 47 - 37 and out - assisted them , 30 - 24 . The Hornets ( 16 - 16 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 21 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals . Jeremy Lamb totaled 14 points , three rebounds and five assists . Wily Hernangomez led the bench with 19 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Malik Monk also dropped 13 points off the bench . The Celtics ( 19 - 13 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he collected 25 points , four rebounds and five assists on 9 - of - 12 from the field . Jayson Tatum amassed 17 points and five boards . Al Horford returned from a seven - game absence to accrue 10 points , six rebounds and five assists in 19 minutes . Terry Rozier played well off the bench , providing nine points , six rebounds and six assists . Boston will return to action on Tuesday , as they play host to the Philadelphia 76ers on Christmas Day . As for Charlotte , they 're off until Wednesday when they travel to face the Brooklyn Nets .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers in overtime , 121 - 114 , at TD_Garden on Tuesday . In a Christmas Day showdown between the Eastern_Conference elite , it took an overtime session to determine a winner . In fact , there were nine ties and nine lead changes in total , as neither club led by more than 11 points . Boston ended the overtime strong , scoring the final nine points of the game across the last two minutes . Turnovers really decided this game , as Boston forced Philly to commit 19 turnovers while the Celtics committed just nine on their end . That allowed them to win the points off turnover differential , 22 - 5 . The Celtics also did a ton of damage down low , outscoring the Sixers in the paint , 50 - 30 . The Sixers ( 22 - 13 ) were led by Joel Embiid , as he tallied 34 points , 16 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Jimmy Butler finished with 24 points , five rebounds , four assists and three steals . Ben Simmons fell just shy of a triple - double , collecting 11 points , 14 rebounds and eight assists . J.J. Redick totaled 17 points and three boards while Wilson Chandler amassed 15 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Celtics ( 20 - 13 ) got a gem from Kyrie Irving , as he accumulated 40 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Marcus Morris generated 23 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jayson Tatum accrued 23 points , 10 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Al Horford scored just four points but provided nine rebounds and five assists . Both teams return to action on Thursday , with Boston traveling to play the Houston Rockets and Philly facing the Utah Jazz on the road as well .

Their defense was critical , as they held the Mavericks to 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . Ball movement definitely played a factor in that , with Boston out - assisting Dallas , 35 - 16 . The Celtics three - point shooting was also big , as they connected on 21 - of - 45 from long range . The Boston Celtics defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 116 - 95 , at TD_Garden on Monday night . The Celtics ( 24 - 15 ) came into the contest the much more well - rested team , considering they 'd last played Friday . In contrast , the Nets ( 20 - 22 ) were playing their third game in four nights , and the disparity seemed evident right from the opening tip . Boston established a 34 - 22 first - quarter lead and continued piling on from that point forward . The home squad outscored Brooklyn by a 60 - 50 margin in the second half and shot an impressive 50 percent overall while eliciting 23 turnovers . Rodions Kurucs led the way for the Nets with 24 points , adding a rebound and an assist . Spencer Dinwiddie followed with 15 points and also posted two rebounds and one assist . Kenneth Faried generated a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Eric Davis delivered 11 points , nine rebounds and two steals . Shabazz Napier supplied 10 points , six assists , five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Treveon Graham tallied nine points . Horford notably also brought down nine rebounds , while Smart dished out seven assists . Daniel Theis totaled 11 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Terry Rozier poured in 10 points and also had four rebounds and four assists . The Nets head back home to take on the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night , while the Celtics remain home and take on the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday evening as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Indiana Pacers , 135 - 108 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday night . The Celtics ( 25 - 15 ) played one of their best games of the season at home against the Pacers ( 27 - 14 ) , as they were the better side from tip - off until the final whistle . This was absolutely reflected on the score since the Celtics won every single quarter and managed to look dominant even on garbage time . Boston quickly jumped to a 29 - 23 lead after the first 12 minutes of action , and they never looked back after that . The remaining three quarters ended 39 - 30 , 37 - 27 and 30 - 28 for Boston , showing they were absolutely no match for Indiana . At least for these 48 minutes . The Celtics had seven players scoring in double digits in this game and there 's no doubt Jaylen Brown caught the eye of everyone with his impressive 22 - point performance coming off the bench . Marcus Morris also delivered 22 points , while Jayson Tatum chipped in with 20 points and Kyrie Irving had 12 points . Gordon Hayward had 14 points and both Terry Rozier and Daniel Theis had 12 - all three coming off the bench . Domantas Sabonis once again got the start and looked surprisingly productive since he finished with 20 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Victor Oladipo chipped in with 17 points , while Thaddeus Young had 10 points and eight rebounds . Kyle O'Quinn looked productive coming off the bench since he finished with 11 points , five rebounds and three assists . Tyreke Evans added 15 points .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Toronto Raptors , 117 - 108 , at TD Bank Arena on Wednesday evening . The Celtics ( 26 - 18 ) came into the contest looking to put an end to the perpetual underachieving they 've been guilty of this season . A victory over a quality division rival like the Raptors ( 33 - 13 ) certainly would be a step in the right direction , yet things did n't exactly start off on the right foot in the first quarter . Toronto outscored Boston by a 36 - 30 margin over the first 12 minutes , but the home squad roared back to forge a 64 - 53 lead by halftime . True to form , however , the Raptors clawed back in the third , and they led by a 104 - 100 margin as late as the 4:22 mark of the final period . The Celtics then finished on a 17 - 4 run over the final 3:54 to eradicate that deficit and nearly notch a double - digit win . Kawhi Leonard paced the Raptors with 33 points , adding four rebounds , two assists and four steals . Serge Ibaka turned in 22 points and 10 rebounds . Danny Green managed 15 points , six rebounds and one assist . Greg Monroe and Norman Powell generated matching 11 - point tallies , with Monroe also notably bringing in nine rebounds . Kyle Lowry mustered 10 points , seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block . Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 27 points , supplementing them with a career - high 18 assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Al Horford managed 24 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Gordon Hayward delivered 18 points , five assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Jayson Tatum generated a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . The Raptors head back home to take the Phoenix Suns on Thursday night , while the Celtics remain home and tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 122 - 116 , at TD_Garden on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 27 - 18 ) have n't been exactly been the most consistent team in the NBA this season , but at least they 've been mostly reliable on their home court . Boston owned a 16 - 5 record at TD_Garden coming into Friday , and accordingly , they got off to a fast start against the Grizzlies ( 19 - 26 ) by forging a 35 - 24 first - quarter lead . However , Memphis flipped the script in the second to the extent they entered halftime with a 62 - 58 advantage . The home squad then responded by eliminating their deficit in the third and carrying a five - point edge into the final period . The visitors would get as close as 106 - 104 with 4:53 remaining , but the Celtics never relinquished the lead and hung on . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies with 26 points , adding four assists . Jaren Jackson , Jr. totaled 23 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Shelvin Mack tallied 15 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . Justin Holiday supplied 14 points , six rebounds , two assists and four steals . JaMychal Green and Omri Casspi managed matching 12 - point tallies while providing two and four rebounds , respectively . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 38 points , adding 11 assists , seven rebounds and one block . Marcus Smart went for 20 points , six boards , three assists , three steals and one block . Al Horford posted 18 points , three rebounds and one assist . Jaylen Brown led the bench with 12 points while also registering six boards , one assist and two steals . Terry Rozier generated 10 points , four dimes and one rebound . The Grizzlies remain on the road and take on the Toronto Raptors on Saturday night , while the Celtics hit the road and visit the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday evening as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 107 - 99 , at TD_Garden on Monday evening . The Celtics got out to a great start at home , with a 33 - 23 lead after one quarter . However , the visitors picked it up in the second , where they outscored the Celtics by 10 , to tie it up at 50 by halftime . The Celtics came out strong in the third , as they outscored the Heat 37 - 18 in the quarter , to take a 19 - point lead heading into the final frame . The Heat did not give up and put together a strong fourth quarter , where they outscored the Celtics by 11 points . However , it was not enough , as the Celtics held on for their fourth straight win . Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 26 points , 10 assists , eight steals , three rebounds and one block , in 34 minutes . Al Horford tallied 16 points , 12 rebounds , four assists , three blocks and one steal , while Jayson Tatum added 19 points , six rebounds and one assist . The Celtics shot 49 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Derrick Jones Jr. led the heat with 18 points , nine rebounds , one steal and one block , in 28 minutes off the bench . Dion Waiters added 18 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 25 minutes off the bench , while Josh Richardson finished with 11 points , four steals , three assists and one rebound . The Heat shot 42 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 35 from long range . The Heat ( 22 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Clippers on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 29 - 18 ) play host to the Cavs on Wednesday .

In fact , there were 14 ties and 21 lead changes in this game , as neither club attained a double - digit lead . Defensive rebounding was huge for the Warriors , as they won that battle , 42 - 34 . Golden_State ended up shooting 45 percent from the field while holding Boston to 41 percent shooting . Free-throw shooting was also huge , with the Warriors connecting on 29 - of - 34 and the Celtics hitting 14 - of - 15 . The Warriors ( 35 - 14 ) were led by Kevin Durant , as he collected 33 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Stephen Curry accumulated 24 points , three rebounds and three assists . Klay Thompson amassed 21 points , three rebounds and two assists . Draymond Green tallied five points , 11 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Al Horford finished with 22 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Jayson Tatum totaled 20 points , five rebounds and three assists . Marcus Smart generated 12 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 104 , at TD_Garden on Monday evening . Despite missing Kyrie Irving ( hip ) , the Celtics got out to a good start at home , with a 32 - 26 lead after one quarter . The Nets managed to tie it up mid way through the second , but the Celtics kept the edge and rallied back ahead , to take a 10 - point lead into halftime . The Nets came out strong once again in the third quarter , and outscored the Celtics by nine in the period , to cut the deficit to one , heading into the final frame . However , the Celtics quickly reclaimed the lead , and pushed their advantage back to double digits by the halfway - point in the quarter . They were able to cruise to the finish from there , earning their 20th home win of the season . Marcus Smart led the Celtics with 21 points , seven assists , five steals , two rebounds and two blocks , in 32 minutes . Jaylen Brown added 21 points , six rebounds and two assists , in 31 minutes off the bench , while Al Horford finished with 14 points , 11 rebounds , six blocks , five assists and one steal . The Celtics shot 45 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 42 from long range . Meanwhile , D'Angelo Russell led the Nets with 25 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting , four assists , three steals and two rebounds , in 23 minutes . Shabazz Napier followed up with 20 points , five assists , two steals and two rebounds , in 26 minutes off the bench , while Rondae Hollis-Jefferson added 14 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks . The Nets shot 38 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 34 from long range . The Nets ( 27 - 24 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Bulls on Tuesday . The Celtics ( 31 - 19 ) play host to the Hornets on Wednesday .

Boston also shot 56 percent from the field and 87 percent from the free - throw line while holding Charlotte to 44 percent from the field and 43 percent from the charity stripe . The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the host Boston Celtics , 129 - 128 , at TD_Garden on Thursday . While Boston led by 18 points in the second quarter , Los_Angeles made this game competitive thanks to a 42 - 27 third quarter . The Celtics then led for the majority of the fourth quarter but the Lakers took a one - point lead with 19 seconds remaining . Kyrie Irving then responded by hitting a floater with 11 seconds left to re - take the lead but Rajon Rondo hit a game - winning jumper at the buzzer to capture the win . Free-throw shooting nearly killed the Lakers , as they hit 7 - of - 18 while the Celtics went a perfect 20 - of - 20 . Los_Angeles ' other shooting was on point though , as they shot 52 percent from the field and 54 percent from three - point range . The Lakers ( 28 - 27 ) got a triple - double from LeBron James , as he collected 28 points , 12 rebounds , 12 assists and three steals . Kyle Kuzma amassed 25 points , five rebounds and two assists . Rondo finished with 17 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists . JaVale McGee totaled 17 points and eight boards . The Celtics ( 35 - 20 ) were led by Irving , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Jayson Tatum accrued 22 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Daniel Theis led the bench with 20 points , six rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Terry Rozier provided 19 points , four rebounds and six assists off the bench as well . On deck for Boston is a home matchup versus the Los_Angeles Clippers on Saturday . As for Los_Angeles , they travel to face the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday for their next fixture .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Boston Celtics , 123 - 112 , at TD_Garden on Saturday . When Boston led 43 - 20 after the first quarter , this game looked nearly over but Los_Angeles had other ideas . The key point was the Kyrie Irving ( knee ) injury at the end of the second quarter , as the Clippers ended up outscoring the Celtics in the second half , 70 - 38 . In addition , Los_Angeles ended the game on a 17 - 7 run to gain separation . Ball movement was key for the Clippers , as they out - assisted the Celtics , 28 - 22 . Los_Angeles ended up shooting 48 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range while Boston shot 42 percent from the field and 35 percent from long range . The Clippers ( 31 - 26 ) were led by Danilo Gallinari , as he tallied 19 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander accrued 14 points , four rebounds , five assists and two steals . Patrick Beverley collected 12 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Montrezl Harrell led the bench with 21 points , six rebounds and two assists . Landry Shamet dropped 17 points off the bench in his debut . The Celtics ( 35 - 21 ) were led by Gordon Hayward , as he provided 19 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench . Irving finished with 14 points and two assists before departing due to a non - contact knee injury . Jayson Tatum led the starters with 16 points and eight boards . Terry Rozier also played well off the bench , accumulating 16 points , five rebounds and three assists . On deck for Los_Angeles is a road matchup versus the struggling Minnesota Timberwolves on Monday . As for Boston , they travel to face the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Detroit Pistons , 118 - 110 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 37 - 21 ) did n't get off to a good start against the Pistons ( 26 - 30 ) , as Detroit still carried the momentum of their four - game winning streak to jump ahead 29 - 28 after the first quarter . However , Boston picked themselves up from the ground in the second quarter and they finished the first half up by five points ( 57 - 52 ) following a 29 - 23 second quarter . The Celtics pulled away for good in the third quarter since they dominated the third quarter ( 34 - 20 ) and they entered the final 12 minutes of action up 91 - 72 . Detroit tried to turn things around in the final quarter and they actually won the final 12 minutes rather comfortably , 38 - 27 , but it was n't enough and the Celtics closed things out for good . Even if they ended suffering a bit more than expected . Boston featured a very balanced attack since they had six players scoring in double figures , led by second - year phenom Jayson Tatum who finished with 19 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Gordon Hayward added 18 points but he also contributed eight assists and five rebounds . Marcus Smart had 16 points with five assists , and Al Horford came close to a triple - double thanks to a 17 - points , 14 - rebound , eight - assist stat line . Blake Griffin led the way for the Pistons since he finished with 32 points , eight rebounds and five assists , but it was n't enough for the Motor City franchise . Andre Drummond had 21 points with 17 rebounds , but also added four steals . Reggie Jackson finished with 18 points , and Luke Kennard added 11 . Wayne Ellington chipped in with 13 points in 33 minutes coming off the bench .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 115 - 104 , at TD_Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Rockets got out to a strong start on the road , with a 33 - 23 lead after one quarter . They kept up the momentum in the second , and outscored the Celtics by 12 , to take a 22 - point lead into halftime . The Celtics picked up the pace in the third , but could not cut into the difference , as they only matched Houston for 35 points each in the quarter , so as to still trail by 22 , entering the fourth . The Celtics rallied to start the fourth , and cut the deficit to 11 , with seven minutes left in the contest . However , the Rockets would not let them within striking distance , as they held strong for their fifth straight win . James Harden led the Rockets with 42 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two steals , and one block , in 38 minutes . Eric Gordon followed up with 32 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal , while , Chris Paul tallied 15 points , 12 assists , six rebounds , three steals and one block . The Rockets shot 48 percent from the field , including 21 - of - 51 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 24 points , nine rebounds and six assists , in 35 minutes . Al Horford followed up with 19 points , six rebounds and two assists , while Marcus Smart chipped in 18 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . The Celtics shot 48 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 28 from deep . The Celtics ( 38 - 26 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Tuesday . The Rockets ( 38 - 25 ) take on the Raptors in Toronto on Tuesday .

The Celtics managed to stay in control through the four , and held on for their fourth win in their last five games . The Boston Celtics defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 129 - 120 , at TD_Garden on Saturday afternoon . The Celtics ( 43 - 27 ) looked ready to roll for the rare Saturday afternoon tip , racking up 43 first - quarter points versus the defensively challenged Hawks ( 24 - 46 ) . However , Atlanta kept pace by scoring 36 of their own , and they refused to go away despite Boston totaling 105 points through only three quarters . Atlanta remained competitive despite entering the final period with a 13 - point deficit , coming all the way back to knot the game at 112 at the 5:53 mark of the fourth quarter . However , the home squad made a final push , finishing the game on a 17 - 8 run to seal the win . Trae Young paced the Hawks with 26 points , adding four rebounds , four assists and two steals . John Collins followed with a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , one steal and one block . Taurean Prince furnished 17 points , four boards , two assists and two blocks . Vince Carter poured in 16 points off the bench . Kent Bazemore totaled 12 points , four assists and one rebound . The Hawks remain on the road and take on the Orlando Magic on Sunday evening , while the Celtics remain home and face the Denver Nuggets on Monday night .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Boston Celtics , 114 - 105 , at TD_Garden on Monday . There were 11 lead changes in this game , as Denver rode a big fourth quarter to victory . In fact , the Nuggets outscored the Celtics , 34 - 25 , in the fourth quarter , as they achieved a game - high 12 - point lead in the final minutes . Rebounding was the difference for the Nuggets , as they outrebounded the Celtics , 51 - 37 . Denver also shot 49 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range while holding Boston to 42 percent from the field and 31 percent from long range . Denver also won the fastbreak points battle , 18 - 7 and the points in the paint differential , 46 - 38 . The Nuggets ( 47 - 22 ) were led by Nikola Jokic , as he tallied 21 points , 13 rebounds , seven assists , two steals and three blocks . Will Barton accrued 20 points , four rebounds and two assists . Gary Harris amassed 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . Paul Millsap finished with 12 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Boston Celtics , 115 - 96 , at TD_Garden on Sunday night . The Spurs ( 43 - 31 ) came into the contest looking to get back on the winning track and keep a hold of their currently slotting as the eighth seed in the Western_Conference , but they knew they figured on an uphill battle against the home - court Celtics ( 43 - 31 ) . However , San_Antonio helped itself with an early 31 - 24 lead after one quarter , and they 'd managed to build a 10 - point cushion heading into the final period . Boston was unable to ever mount a series comeback at that point , with the visitors outscoring them by the same 31 - 24 margin they had in the first . The Celtics ' biggest issue was having no answer for LaMarcus Aldridge , who trampled them for 48 points , 13 rebounds and six assists over 37 minutes . DeMar DeRozan was a distant second to Aldridge , generating 16 points , 11 assists and two blocks . Patty Mills was the only other double - digit Spurs scorer , pouring in 12 points off the bench while also dishing out four assists and recording one rebound . Jakob Poeltl mustered six points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . The starting backcourt of Derrick White and Bryn Forbes posted matching four - point tallies . Marcus Smart led the Celtics with 14 points , adding four rebounds and one assist . Marcus Morris and Gordon Hayward provided 13 points each while hauling in six and 10 rebounds , respectively . Kyrie Irving contributed a 11 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds , two steals and one block . Daniel Theis led the second unit with 11 points , seven boards , one assist and one block . The Spurs remain on the road and next visit the Charlotte Hornets on Tuesday evening , while the Celtics travel to Cleveland and tangle with the Cavaliers on Tuesday night as well .

The Orlando Magic defeated the host Boston Celtics , 116 - 108 , at TD_Garden on Sunday . This win secured a playoff berth for the Orlando Magic , as it may end up being their biggest victory of the season . The third quarter was key for Orlando , as they outscored Boston , 35 - 26 while holding the lead for the whole of the fourth quarter . It was close throughout , as there were 11 ties and 18 lead changes in total . The Magic were perfect at the free - throw line , as they connected on 22 - of - 22 while the Celtics hit 12 - of - 14 . Orlando did most of their damage down low , outrebounding Boston , 45 - 39 and winning the points in the paint battle , 54 - 44 . The Magic also outscored the Celtics in transition points , 17 - 9 . The Denver Nuggets defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers 107 - 98 at Staples_Center on Wednesday . The Nuggets entered the 2018 - 2019 season with a chip on their shoulder following a ninth place finish in the Western_Conference one year ago , and they returned with nearly an identical starting lineup . Denver ( 10 ) controlled the first half and led by as many as 11 points in the second quarter , but Los_Angeles ( 0 - 1 ) was able to keep clawing back into the game behind energetic defensive play from Montrezl Harrell and the tandem scoring efforts of Danilo Gallinari and Tobias Harris . Boban Marjanovic was an all around force inside the paint during the second half , earning a handful of MVP chants at the free throw line after putting down multiple and - 1 dunks that did not require the 7 ' 4 inch Center to jump . The effort would have been the highlight of the night , if not for a costly Avery Bradley turnover that saw the Clippers offseason signing put his back heel on the out of bounds line with the game tied at 95 - 95 with 1:34 remaining in the fourth quarter . The following possession , Gary Harris knocked down a mid range jumper to take a two point lead . Lou Williams lost his handle when the Clippers tried to answer , and Harris found his way to the free throw line where he sank both charity stripe shots and effectively put the game to an end . Nikola Jokic led the Nuggets in scoring with 21 points and added eight rebounds and five assists , while Harris finished with 20 points , three boards and two assists . Will Barton aided the starters with three treys on his way to 19 points , while Paul Millsap struggled with just 11 points on a 1 - of - 7 night from the floor . Boban matched his 18 minutes with 18 points off the bench , a needed effort after the Clippers starters combined for just 43 points , with Patrick Beverley failing to score a single basket . Next up , the Clippers travel to Oklahoma_City to take on the Thunder on Friday , while the Nuggets host their home opener against the Suns on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 108 - 92 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . Facing an OKC squad that was once again missing Russell Westbrook ( knee ) , the Clippers ( 1 - 1 ) jumped out to a quick 27 - 20 lead . The Thunder ( 0 - 2 ) clawed back to shave five points off the deficit by halftime . They remained hot coming out of intermission and carried a 77 - 71 advantage heading into the final period . However , Los_Angeles ambushed the visitors on both ends of the floor over the final 12 minutes , going on a decisive 37 - 15 run in the fourth quarter . As is often the case , shooting was the difference in the game , as the Thunder managed to drain just 36 percent of their attempts , including 21 percent from three - point range . In turn , the Clippers shot a solid 44 percent , a tally that featured a 42 percent success rate from distance . Paul George paced the Thunder with 20 points , although he went 7 - for - 27 from the field . He added eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Steven Adams generated a 17 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included one steal . Raymond Felton followed with a bench - leading 12 points and also supplied four rebounds , three assists and one block . Alex Abrines poured in 10 points and supplemented them with two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Dennis Schroder scuffled while filling in for Westbrook , totaling eight points on 2 - for - 15 shooting while dishing out eight assists and hauling in a pair of rebounds . Danilo Gallinari and Tobias Harris led the Clippers with matching 26 - point efforts . Gallinari added five boards and one assist , while Harris registered 10 rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Lou Williams lead the second unit with 17 points . Boban Marjanovic had his second strong performance off the bench to open the season , posting 13 points and five rebounds . Starting center Marcin Gortat mustered four points but also brought down 12 rebounds and handed out one assist . The Thunder next take the court Sunday evening versus the Sacramento Kings , while the Clippers do battle with the Houston Rockets at home that same night .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Houston Rockets 115 - 112 at Staples_Center on Sunday . An eventful weekend for the Rockets as back - to - back games against both Los_Angeles teams resulted in a split , but the some hungover damage came on Chris Paul 's end after being suspended for two games following a fight with Rajon Rondo of the Lakers on Saturday . The suspension was handed down Sunday afternoon leaving Paul out of the Rockets ( 1 - 2 ) lineup . The matchup on Sunday resulted in the Clippers getting off to a strong start by taking a 29 - 24 lead into the second quarter . Tobias Harris and Danilo Gallianari continued their productive scoring effort amongst the starters , where they combined for 43 points on 16 - of - 34 shooting . The Rockets would not go away in the second quarter , where James Harden found his stroke from behind the arc and orchestrated Clint Capela into some easy layups . The momentum shifted back in Los_Angeles favor for the majority of the second half , specifically the waning minutes of the third quarter where they built a nine point lead . Los_Angeles had little issue in the final period until the final two minutes . After a Montrezl Harrell layup with 1:43 remaining , James Harden single handedly brought the Rockets back within one possession after a quick two point jumper , followed up by an and - 1 from behind the arc . Harden missed the 22 - footer at the buzzer a possession later and the Clippers escaped with their second win of the season . Harden led all scorers with 31 points on 11 - of - 26 shooting , while Eric Gordon and Clint Capela pitched in 21 points and 23 points , respectively . Carmelo Anthony still looks to adjust to his bench role and finished with nine points and six rebounds across27 minutes . Harrell was the bench leader for the Clippers and posted a double - double with 17 points and 10 rebounds in the win . Next up , the Clippers will play their first road game of the season when they visit the New_Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday , while the Rockets return home to face the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 120 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . Minnesota ( 4 - 7 ) has been in a rough patch recently , and the Clippers ( 6 - 4 ) made sure to capitalize . Los_Angeles held its opponent to just 5 - of - 22 shooting from three - point range , allowing it to take a lead thanks to its own stellar 14 - of - 31 night from deep . The Clippers also outperformed Minnesota on the boards , grabbing 12 offensive rebounds while holding the Wolves to only eight . The loss for Minnesota was the team 's third straight , and it comes at an inopportune time for the team , as rumors continue to swirl around All-Star Jimmy Butler 's trade demand . Three Clippers scored at least 20 points in the team 's win . Forwards Tobias Harris and Danilo Gallinari scored 22 apiece to lead the team , while star guard Lou Williams delivered 20 points and six assists . Big man Boban Marjanovic scored 10 points and had eight rebounds in only 17 minutes on the floor . Minnesota , meanwhile , saw 20 points from Butler in the loss . All-Star big man Karl-Anthony Towns scored another 20 and also blocked four shots . Veteran point guard Derrick Rose led the Wolves with 21 points , coming a week after he delivered a career - high 50 point performance . Rose shot 8 - of - 20 from the field and dished out four assists in Monday 's loss . The Timberwolves will attempt to snap their losing streak with a visit to the Los_Angeles Lakers on Wednesday . The Clippers , meanwhile , travel to Portland to face the Trail_Blazers on Thurdsay .

The Clippers also outshot the Bucks from the field and from three - point range . The Clippers bench played a huge factor too , outscoring the Bucks bench , 52 - 27 . Los_Angeles also did a good job of cleaning up the glass , winning the defensive rebounding differential , 44 - 37 . The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Golden_State Warriors , 121 - 116 , in overtime at Staples_Center on Monday . The Warriors ( 11 - 3 ) were without league - leading scorer Steph Curry ( groin ) , but still managed to hang with the Clippers until the very end . It was shaping up to be an easy win for the Clippers ( 8 - 5 ) in the fourth quarter , as the team held a 12 - point lead with just five minutes remaining . The Warriors , though , clawed back in signature fashion , tying the game on a Klay Thompson three - pointer with 86 seconds remaining . Golden_State 's momentum did not carry over to OT , though , as the Clippers were able to earn the win behind the strong play of big man Montrezl Harrell . Warriors superstar Kevin Durant fouled out with two minutes remaining in overtime , leaving the Warriors without both Curry and Durant to try to close the game on LA 's home court . Harrell led the Clippers with 23 points and four blocks in the win . He was nearly matched by Lou Williams , who scored 22 points . Williams , though , shot just 5 - of - 18 from the field , struggling to find the basket for much of the fourth quarter . Rookie point guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored another 18 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting . For Golden_State , Durant led the way with a triple - double . The former MVP scored 33 points , grabbed 11 rebounds , and dished out 10 assists in the loss . Thompson also had a big night , scoring 31 points despite his team being unable to secure the win . Both teams will return to action on Thursday , with the Warriors visiting the struggling Houston Rockets and the Clippers hosting the San_Antonio Spurs .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies in overtime , 112 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Friday . There were 15 ties and 13 lead changes in this competitive game , as neither club ever led by more than eight points . In fact , the Grizzlies trailed by five points heading into the fourth quarter , as they started that quarter on a 14 - 3 run to take their largest lead . The Clippers did bounce back though , as they hit three free - throws with one second left in regulation to send the game into overtime . Los_Angeles made the final run that mattered most , as they finished the game on a 14 - 6 run in the extra session . The biggest factor for the Clippers was the turnover differential , as they committed just 10 turnovers while forcing 16 from the Grizzlies . Free-throw shooting was also critical , with Los_Angeles hitting 24 - of - 27 and Memphis connecting on 14 - of - 18 . The Clippers bench was huge as well , outscoring the Grizzlies , 53 - 24 . The Grizzlies ( 12 - 6 ) got a sparkling performance out of Marc Gasol , as he collected 27 points , 13 rebounds and seven assists . Mike Conley fouled out in regulation but still finished with 19 points , three rebounds and 11 assists . Jaren Jackson Jr. amassed 20 points , seven rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Kyle Anderson accrued 11 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Clippers ( 12 - 6 ) were led by Montrezl Harrell , as he provided 22 points , 11 rebounds and two blocks off the bench . Danilo Gallinari led the starters with 20 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Tobias Harris totaled 12 points , seven rebounds and four assists while Lou Williams generated 16 points and six assists off the bench . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Memphis playing host to the New_York Knicks and Los_Angeles traveling to face the Portland Trail_Blazers .
