The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 123 - 99 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . Toronto played this game without Kawhi Leonard ( hip ) but Los_Angeles is the team who came out flat . In fact , the Raptors started the game with a 36 - 23 first quarter , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . The third quarter solidified their domination , with Toronto outscoring Los_Angeles , 33 - 17 . The Raptors offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 52 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range , despite missing seven of their final nine shots with the reserves in . They did that while dominating the assist - to - turnover ratio , with Toronto out - assisting Los_Angeles , 34 - 25 , while winning the turnover differential , 16 - 7 . That allowed Toronto to outscore Los_Angeles in points off turnovers , 24 - 5 . The Raptors also won the fastbreak scoring differential , 28 - 4 , while outscoring the Clippers in the paint , 54 - 44 . The Raptors ( 22 - 7 ) were led by Serge Ibaka , as he tallied 25 points , nine rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Kyle Lowry accrued 21 points , five rebounds and seven assists on 8 - of - 13 from the field . Pascal Siakam amassed 13 points , three rebounds and five assists . Fred VanVleet got a rare start and finished with five points , six rebounds and 14 assists . Jonas Valanciunas was a huge spark off the bench , generating 16 points , five rebounds and two steals in 18 minutes . The Clippers ( 17 - 10 ) highest - scoring starter was Danilo Gallinari , as he finished with 11 points , five rebounds and two assists . Tobias Harris totaled just 10 points and three rebounds . Both those players went 4 - of - 10 from the field . Marcin Gortat accumulated seven points , four rebounds and four assists . Tyrone Wallace was their best player , as he provided 15 points , four rebounds and six assists off the bench . Boban Marjanvoic also played plenty of garbage time , collecting 18 points and seven rebounds off the pine . On deck for Toronto is another road matchup versus the Golden_State Warriors on Wednesday . As for Los_Angeles , they return to action on Thursday when they travel to face the San_Antonio Spurs .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 131 - 127 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . Monday 's contest saw two of the premier teams in the Western_Conference go head - to - head , and the game did not disappoint . Portland ( 17 - 13 ) squeaked by LA ( 17 - 13 ) in the game 's final minute thanks to clutch play from its stars . While the Trail_Blazers had led by double - digits in the fourth quarter , the Clippers quickly caught up in the final five minutes of action . LA took a bit of a blow after big man Montrezl Harrell was assessed a flagrant foul and ejected for elbowing Portland 's Jusuf Nurkic with just over seven minutes left in the fourth quarter . Still , the Clippers fought back , carried by a career night from star forward Tobias Harris . Harris led his team with 39 points , a new career high . Portland , however , answered back , as Damian Lillard hit a handful of clutch shots down the stretch and scored 39 points of his own . It was C.J . McCollum , though , that hit the dagger for the Blazers , knocking down a step - back jumper to make it a two - possession game with 27 seconds remaining . Lillard shot 11 - of - 20 from the field , including 6 - of - 7 from three - point range , en route to his big night . 21 of Lillard 's points came in the third quarter , as he simply could not miss in the second half . McCollum , meanwhile , added another 27 points in the win . Nurkic scored 20 as well , adding seven rebounds and two blocks . Harris 's 39 points led all Clippers scorers and set a new career - high for the budding star . He added 11 rebounds on the night . The Clippers , who remain without star guard Lou Williams ( hamstring ) , saw 24 points from rookie point guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander . Harrell had 15 points as well prior to his ejection . Portland will host the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday , while LA will see the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday evening .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 125 - 121 , at Staples_Center on Thursday evening . The Clippers got out to a good start at home , as they emerged from a hard - fought first quarter with a 30 - 27 lead . They built with momentum in the second , where they outscored the visitors by eight in the quarter , to take a 65 - 54 lead into halftime . The Mavericks came out strong in the second half and chipped away at the deficit through the third , but still trailed by eight heading into the final frame . The Mavs kept pressing and tied it up at 90 early in the fourth , and led 105 - 102 at the halfway point in the quarter . However , the Clippers pulled ahead with a four - point lead with 2:37 left in the contest and were able to hold the edge from there , to end a four - game losing streak . Danilo Gallinari led the Clippers with 32 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks , in 33 minutes . Lou Williams returned to action after missing sometime with a hamstring injury , to finish with 26 points , eight assists , two steals and one rebound , in 23 minutes off the bench . Montrezl Harrell added 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks , in 28 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Luka Doncic led the Mavs with 32 points , five assists , four rebounds and four steals , in 31 minutes . J.J. Barea added 19 points , eight assists and three rebounds , in 27 minutes off the bench , while DeAndre Jordan tallied 11 points , 22 rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 32 minutes . The Mavs ( 15 - 15 ) take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Saturday . The Clippers ( 18 - 13 ) play host to the Nuggets on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 127 - 118 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday evening . It was shaping up to be an easy wire - to - wire win for the Clippers ( 20 - 14 ) , who never trailed over the course of the game . Strong bench play helped the Clippers maintain their early lead , as the second unit scored 57 points in total . Things became complicated in the fourth quarter , though , as Sacramento ( 18 - 16 ) launched a last - minute comeback effort to trim the lead to as little as three points . Once again , LA 's bench players came up big , as Lou Williams knocked down a clutch shot with a minute remaining to extend his team 's lead back to five points . Montrezl Harrell , meanwhile , sealed the win with a game - clinching block on the other end of the floor . The block was Harrell 's fifth of the night in only 27 minutes of action . Williams was LA 's leading scorer with 24 points , including 4 - of - 5 shooting from three - point range . Harrell added 22 more points and nine rebounds to go along with his strong rim protection . All five Clippers starters scored in double digits , and the team as a whole shot 50 percent and knocked down 12 three - pointers . Sacramento , meanwhile , saw a team - best 19 points from De'Aaron Fox . Fox also tallied nine assists and six rebounds . It was an off night for his back court partner , Buddy Hield , though . Hield shot just 4 - of - 18 from the floor en route to only 11 points , well below his season average of 20 . Sacramento will host the Los_Angeles Lakers on Thursday , while the Clippers will see the Lakers in LA on Friday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 106 - 96 , at Staples_Center on Sunday . While Orlando led 28 - 18 after the first quarter , Los_Angeles dominated from there . In fact , they won each of the final three quarters by at least five points apiece , as a 17 - 2 run in the middle of the fourth quarter really put the game away for the Clippers . Los_Angeles defense was stifling in this victory , as they held Orlando to 37 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . That was also evident in the turnover differential , with the Clippers winning that battle , 12 - 7 . Los_Angeles also did a ton of work down low , outscoring Orlando in the paint , 52 - 38 . The Magic ( 17 - 22 ) got a spectacular performance from Nikola Vucevic , as he collected 16 points , 24 rebounds , eight assists and two blocks . Aaron Gordon amassed 17 points and five boards . Evan Fournier finished with 12 points , three rebounds and two assists . Mo Bamba played well off the bench , totaling eight points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . The Clippers ( 23 - 16 ) were led by Tobias Harris , as he tallied 28 points , nine rebounds and two assists against his former team . Danilo Gallinari accrued 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Marcin Gortat generated eight points , 10 rebounds and six assists . Lou Williams led the bench with 17 points , four rebounds and four assists . Orlando will continue their west coast trip on Monday , as they play the Sacramento Kings . As for Los_Angeles , they play host to the Charlotte Hornets on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 112 , at Staples_Center on Monday . Things started to look dicey for the Clippers ( 34 - 28 ) in the fourth quarter , as a pair of free - throws from Mavericks rookie Jalen Brunson brought Dallas to within two . Veteran guard Lou Williams , though , helped give LA some breathing room , knocking down a deep three to answer and following it with a quick assist to Montrezl Harrell . That put the Clippers up by seven , and LA was able to hang on comfortably until the final buzzer . Dallas ( 26 - 34 ) had some costly turnovers late in the game , including a pair from Luka Doncic , who lost possession nine times in total . It was another big night for Clippers big man Montrezl Harrell . Harrell , who set a career - high with 30 points last Friday , bested himself once again with 32 on Monday . The big man shot a staggering 14 - of - 17 from the field and finished with five assists . Williams , meanwhile , notched a double - double with 21 points , 10 assists , and no turnovers . For the Mavericks , Doncic tallied his fourth career triple - double despite committing nine turnovers . The rookie sensation led the team with 28 points . Dwight Powell added another 24 , which he complemented with two blocks and two steals on the defensive end . On Wednesday , Dallas will host the Indiana Pacers while the Clippers will make a visit to Utah .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the New_York Knicks , 128 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Sunday afternoon . Perhaps it was sluggishness brought about by the cross - country travel , but the Knicks ( 13 - 50 ) came out of the gates looking nothing like the team that had been much more competitive in recent games . The Clippers ( 36 - 29 ) were able to build an 18 - point first quarter lead that they had doubled up by halftime . With coach Doc Rivers letting his bench getting plenty of run in the second half , New_York was much more competitive , but the outcome was naturally never in doubt . One of the visitors ' biggest struggles came on the shooting front , as they drained just 40 percent of their attempts , including 38 percent from three - point range . Noah Vonleh and Damyean Dotson paced the Knicks with matching 17 - point tallies , with Vonleh notably adding 12 rebounds . New_York 's second unit managed a trio of 16 - point performances , with Emmanuel Mudiay , Allonzo Trier and MItchell Robinson all reaching the mark . Robinson also pulled down 13 rebounds and recorded another four blocks . Dennis Smith , Jr. turned in eight points , six assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Landry Shamet paced the Clippers with 21 points , adding three rebounds . Danilo Gallinari supplied 20 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Montrezl Harrell and Lou Williams furnished 18 points apiece while posting five rebounds and six assists , respectively . JaMychal Green finished with 16 points , four rebounds and one block . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander tallied 15 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Knicks remain on their Western_Conference swing and face the Sacramento Kings on Monday night , while the Clippers remain home but will serve as the visitors against the Los_Angeles Lakers on Monday evening .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 118 - 110 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The Clippers got out to a good start at home , as they led for almost the entire first quarter , and took a 36 - 32 lead into the second . The score stayed close to start the second , with the Clippers leading by four at the halfway point . However , they rallied from there to build a 12 - point lead by halftime . The Thunder came out strong in the third and chipped away at the deficit , until they made it just a four - point game entering the final frame . The Thunder kept fighting and managed to tie it up at 101 , with three minutes to go . However , Lou Williams came up clutch down the stretch , as he closed out a 40 - point performance to lead the Clippers to their fourth straight win . Williams led the Clippers with 40 points , seven rebounds , five assists and four steals , in 34 minutes . Danilo Gallinari followed up with 34 points , six rebounds and two assists , while Ivica Zubac chipped in 14 points , seven rebounds , two blocks , one steal and one assist . The Clippers shot 45 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 25 from deep . Meanwhile , Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with 32 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and one block , in 31 minutes . Paul George tallied 15 points , six rebounds and one assist , while Dennis Schroder added 15 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Thunder shot 40 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 44 from long range . The Thunder ( 40 - 26 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Jazz in Utah on Monday . The Clippers ( 38 - 29 ) play host to the Celtics on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers blew out the Boston Celtics , 140 - 115 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . Boston ( 41 - 27 ) entered Monday 's tilt on the heels of three straight wins , but quickly fell behind against the Clippers ( 39 - 29 ) . Los_Angeles had one of its best offensive nights of the season , knocking down seemingly everything from every spot on the floor . The Clippers shot over 60 percent from the floor and saw seven double - digit scoring performances en route to the win . LA 's big night was headlined by 34 points off the bench for sixth man Lou Williams . With his 29th point , Williams passed Dell Curry as the all - time leader in bench points in NBA history . Williams finished the historic night shooting 14 - of - 21 and added five assists . The Clippers saw another 25 points from Danilo Gallinari , who shot 9 - of - 12 from the floor and 4 - of - 5 from three - point range . As a team , LA went an impressive 13 - of - 28 from beyond the arc . Boston , meanwhile , had a relatively strong offensive performance itself . Terry Rozier led the team with 23 points off the bench , while Jaylen Brown pitched in 22 . Nine of Brown 's points came in the third quarter , where he knocked down three consecutive three - pointers . Overall , though , Boston could not keep up with LA 's up - tempo offense , as the Celtics shot just 48 percent from the floor . Los_Angeles will host the Portland Trail_Blazers on Tuesday , while Boston will return home to face off with the Sacramento Kings on Thursday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 125 - 104 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . The hosting Clippers ( 39 - 30 ) , who entered Tuesday 's contest as winners of five in a row , maintained control of the game for all of the first half and majority of the third quarter before the Trail_Blazers ( 41 - 26 ) managed to head into the final period with a one - point edge . Then , a Los_Angeles team that was playing the second game of a back - to - back set appear to run out of gas , as Portland dominated the final period , 40 - 20 , and walked away with a key victory with the playoffs not - so - far away . The Blazers pulled away on the back of C.J . McCollum , who after starting the game 0 - of - 7 from the field and scoring just five points in the first half , went on to score 30 points over the final 24 minutes for a game - high of 35 points in 35 minutes . He shot an impressive 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc and 12 - of - 21 from the field overall . With McCollum 's shouldering much of the team 's offensive workload , fellow backcourt star Damian Lillard took a backseat , but he still finished with 20 points and 12 assists across 34 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic added 20 points of his own to go along with 12 rebounds in just 25 minutes . As for the Clippers , Tuesday 's defeat ended up being their first home loss since they dropped a game to the Lakers back on Jan. 31 , so it was the end of an impressive run . After scoring a total of 74 points over his last two games , Lou Williams failed to bring the same offensive firepower Tuesday night , going just 5 - of - 16 from the field and scoring 18 points thanks to multiple trips to the free throw line . Montrezl Harrell wound up leading the team in scoring , posting a double - double of 22 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . As a team , Los_Angeles shot an efficient 9 - of - 15 from behind the arc , but they only made to threes in the second half as they watched Portland pull away .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 128 - 121 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The Bulls got out to a good start at home , with a 34 - 29 lead after one quarter . The Clippers applied some pressure in the second but could not make a dent in the deficit , as the Bulls took a six - point lead into halftime . However , the Clippers came out with a purpose in the third , where they outscored the visitors by 24 , to take an 18 - point lead into the final frame . The Bulls were not done , as they rallied through the fourth , outscoring the Clippers 37 - 26 , however , it was not enough to pull ahead , as the Clippers held on four their fourth win in their last five home games . Danilo Gallinari led the Clippers with 27 points , seven rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , in 34 minutes . Montrezl Harrell followed up with 26 points , five rebounds , three blocks , two assists and one steal , while Shai Gilgeous-Alexander added 17 points seven rebounds , seven assists , three steals and one block . Meanwhile , Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 31 points , seven rebounds and seven assists , in 38 minutes . Robin Lopez followed up with 22 points , eight rebounds , three assists , three blocks and a steal , while Kris Dunn added 14 points , five rebounds , three assists and one block . The Bulls shot 52 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 21 from long range . The Bulls ( 19 - 51 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Sunday . The Clippers ( 40 - 30 ) play host to the Nets on Sunday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers edge out the Brooklyn Nets , 119 - 116 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . After picking up steam with a 37 - point second quarter , it seemed that the Clippers ( 41 - 30 ) had all but wrapped up the win after going up by 10 late in the fourth . The Nets ( 36 - 36 ) , though , did not go down without a fight , going on a quick 100 run to tie the game with just 5 seconds remaining . Brooklyn was able to force the tie on an uncontested dunk from center Jarrett Allen , who broke free after the Clippers attempted to trap Brooklyn point guard D'Angelo Russell . Clippers ' sixth man Lou Williams , though , quickly erased his team 's mistake with a game - winning three - pointer on the other end . The buzzer - beater came from well beyond the arc and capped off a 25 - point night for Williams . In what has become a trend for the Clippers , their bench contributed to the win in a big way . LA saw 58 combined points from its second unit in the win , including another 20 - point performance from big man Montrezl Harrell . Veteran forward Danilo Gallinari led the starters with 21 points and a game - high 11 rebounds . Brooklyn , meanwhile , was led by an impressive performance from Russell . The All-Star contributed 32 points and 10 assists in the narrow loss . His play was complemented by strong play from DeMarre Carroll , who finished with 19 points and seven rebounds off the bench . The Nets will continue their road trip with a visit to Sacramento on Tuesday . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , will play host to the Indiana Pacers .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 115 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for the Clippers , they held the lead for the final 46 minutes . It was a 25 - 16 first quarter that really set the tone , as a 34 - 26 third quarter was simply too much for Indiana to overcome . Turnovers were the difference in the game , with Los_Angeles winning that battle , 20 - 13 . That allowed the Clippers to win the points off turnover differential , 22 - 9 . Los_Angeles also did a ton of damage through transition , outscoring Indiana in fastbreak scoring , 19 - 6 . The Pacers ( 44 - 28 ) were led by Bojan Bogdanovic , as he tallied 19 points , five rebounds and two assists . Myles Turner finished with 11 points , five rebounds , two assists and five blocks . Tyreke Evans was huge off the bench , providing 19 points , eight rebounds and seven assists . Domantas Sabonis also played well off the bench , amassing 13 points , 16 rebounds and six assists . The Clippers ( 42 - 30 ) were led by Danilo Gallinari , as he collected 24 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander totaled 17 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Montrezl Harrell led the bench with 20 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Lou Williams amassed 11 points and nine assists off the bench as well . The Pacers will continue their West Coast road trip on Thursday , as they travel to face the Golden_State Warriors . As for the Clippers , they return to action on Friday in a road matchup versus the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Los Angles Clippers defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 132 - 108 , at Staples_Center on Saturday . Los_Angeles came into this matchup as a monster favorite and they showed why in this dominating victory . They did most of their damage in the second and fourth quarters , outscoring the Cavaliers , 75 - 48 . The shooting disparity was incredible , with Los_Angeles shooting 62 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range while holding Cleveland to 45 percent from the field and 13 percent from long range . Rim protection was critical as well , with the Clippers winning the defensive rebounding battle , 35 - 22 , while out - blocking them , 50 . Los_Angeles also out - assisted Cleveland , 33 - 18 . The Cavaliers ( 19 - 58 ) were led by Collin Sexton , as he tallied 21 points , three rebounds and three assists . Cedi Osman accrued 19 points , five rebounds , three assists and four steals . Tristan Thompson amassed 10 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Jordan Clarkson led the bench with 26 points on 11 - of - 16 from the field . The Clippers ( 46 - 31 ) were led by Shai Gilgeous-Alexander , as he tallied 22 points , two rebounds and eight assists . JaMychal Green totaled 18 points and 10 boards as a starter . Montrezl Harrell led the bench with 23 points , six rebounds and two assists . Lou Williams also played well off the bench , providing 18 points and six assists . Los_Angeles has to play again on Sunday , as they play host to the Memphis Grizzlies . As for Cleveland , they return to action on Monday against the Phoenix Suns .
The Los_Angeles Clippers beat the Memphis Grizzlies , 113 - 96 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . The Clippers ( 47 - 31 ) jumped out to a quick 13 - 3 lead to start the game . That run set the tone , as LA led for 47 of the 48 minutes of gameplay . Memphis ( 31 - 46 ) struggled to find offense after missing all of its three - point attempts in the first quarter . LA was able to keep the foot on the gas pedal throughout due to strong play from its second unit . The Clippers ' bench combined for 64 points in the win . Danilo Gallinari scored a game - high 27 to lead the Clippers . Gallinari also grabbed a season - high 15 rebounds . Off the bench , Montrezl Harrell contributed 20 points , while Lou Williams poured in another 17 . After Sunday 's blowout , the Clippers have picked up nine wins in their last 11 games . They currently share fifth place in the Western_Conference with the Utah Jazz . Memphis , meanwhile , shot only 38 percent from the floor in the loss . Although the team struggled , Delon Wright turned in a nice performance . Wright finished with 20 points , eight rebounds , four assists , and three steals in 35 minutes of action . Memphis remains out of the Western_Conference playoff picture and is currently sitting in 11th place in the West . Los_Angeles will host the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while Memphis will travel to Portland to take on the Trail_Blazers
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 122 - 117 , at Staples_Center on Friday . In a battle of Los_Angeles , it took 14 ties and 14 lead changes to determine a winner . In addition , neither team ever led by more than 12 points , as it came down to the final seconds . The Lakers rode a monster second half to victory , outscoring the Clippers , 61 - 50 . Offensive rebounding was key for the Lakers , as they outrebounded the Clippers , 14 - 7 . Three-point shooting was also critical , with the Lakers hitting 14 - of - 32 and the Clippers connecting on just 10 - of - 29 from long range . The Lakers ( 36 - 44 ) got a career performance from Alex Caruso , as he tallied 32 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and two steals . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope totaled 25 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . JaVale McGee amassed 18 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks while Rajon Rondo collected 15 points , six rebounds and 12 assists . The Clippers ( 47 - 33 ) were led by Danilo Gallinari , as he finished with 27 points , six rebounds , eight assists , three steals and two blocks . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander generated 20 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Lou Williams led the bench with 18 points , four rebounds and eight assists while Montrezl Harrell totaled 14 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with the Lakers playing host to the Utah Jazz and the Clippers traveling as big underdogs to face the Golden_State Warriors .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Utah Jazz , 143 - 137 , at Staples_Center in the final game of the 2018 - 19 NBA regular season on Wednesday . The two teams kept the season going a little longer , as Wednesday 's tightly - contested game ended in overtime . Both teams exercised caution with their key players in anticipation of the playoffs . For Utah ( 50 - 32 ) , regular starters Donovan Mitchell , Rudy Gobert , and Derrick Favors sat out the game for rest . Los_Angeles ( 48 - 34 ) , on the other hand , simply held all of its players to under 30 minutes on the court . The Clippers secured the win thanks to a strong OT period which featured six points from rookie guard Jerome Robinson . The Clippers saw 24 points from Montrezl Harrell to lead the team . Ivica Zubac recorded the team 's only double - double , notching 11 rebounds to go with 22 points . The Clips also saw 15 points from veteran Lou Williams . For Utah , rookie Grayson Allen scored a whopping 40 points . Allen clearly had the green light on Wednesday , as he attempted a game - high 30 field goals in the loss . Utah also saw 24 points from Georges Niang . Both teams will be heading to the playoffs . Los_Angeles will face the Golden State Warriors in the first round , while Utah will match up against the fourth - seeded Houston Rockets .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 131 - 117 , at FedEx Forum on Friday evening . The Grizzlies ( 1 - 1 ) shed their defensive - minded reputation in decisive fashion for their first win of the season , shooting 54 percent from the field , including 50 percent from three - point range . Memphis saw six players hit double digits in the scoring column , including 2018 first - round pick Jaren Jackson , Jr. , who produced a bench - leading 24 points . The home squad set the tone with a 77 - point first half , allowing them to still notch a comfortable win despite the Hawks ( 0 - 2 ) outscoring them by a 56 - 54 margin in the second half . Taurean Prince paced the Hawks with 28 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , three assists and three steals . Rookie Trae Young followed with 20 points and added nine assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . DeAndre ' Bembry and Miles Plumlee co - led the bench with matching 12 - point tallies . Alex Len drew another start at center and finished with nine points , four rebounds and two assists . Garrett Temple led the Grizzlies with a game - high 30 points and also posted four rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Jackson added seven boards , two assists , two blocks and one steal to his aforementioned scoring total . Mike Conley provided a 16 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds . Marc Gasol shook off the back injury he entered the game with to muster 13 points , seven rebounds and five assists . The Hawks now head to Cleveland , where they 'll take on the Cavaliers in a Sunday evening showdown . The Grizzlies are back in action Monday , when they 'll take on the Utah Jazz in a road matchup .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 107 - 95 , at FedEx Forum on Tuesday . There was only one tie and one lead change in this matchup , as Memphis controlled the game throughout the second half . In fact , the Grizzlies led by 19 points at times in the second half , as the Grizzlies started the third quarter on an 18 - 1 run while finishing the game on a 21 - 13 spurt . Defense was key for Memphis , as they forced 20 turnovers from Washington , thanks to 16 recorded steals . Bench production was also huge for the Grizzlies , as they outscored the Wizards bench , 40 - 30 . Much of Memphis ' offense came down low , as they outscored Washington in the paint , 44 - 30 . The Wizards ( 1 - 6 ) were led by John Wall , as he collected 22 points , five rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Bradley Beal finished with 17 points , three rebounds , seven assists , two steals and three blocks . Those two did combine for 13 turnovers though . Otto Porter Jr. amassed 15 points , six rebounds and three assists . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 16 points , two boards and two steals . The Grizzlies ( 4 - 2 ) got an all - around gem out of Marc Gasol , as he accumulated 19 points , five rebounds , six assists and five steals . Garrett Temple led the team in scoring , generating 20 points and seven boards . Mike Conley accrued 19 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Kyle Anderson scored just five points but provided 11 rebounds , three assists and four steals . Shelvin Mack scored 14 points and handed out eight dimes , with almost all of that production coming in the second half . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Memphis traveling to play the Utah Jazz and Washington playing host to the Oklahoma_City Thunder .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Denver Nuggets , 89 - 87 , at FedExForum on Wednesday . The Grizzlies managed to win Wednesday 's game by making sure the game was played at their style , which is in a slow , grind - it - out fashion . Despite falling behind early , Memphis managed to chip away and take a lead at halftime thanks to a 28 - 18 second quarter . From there , the score went back and forth , but some timely shots from Mike Conley and Marc Gasol helped ice the game for the home team . Conley struggled for the most part , scoring just four points on 2 - of - 9 shooting , but one of those shots was a timely floater that put the team up four late . Gasol , on the other hand posted a double - double of 20 points , including the game - winning free throws , and 12 rebounds in 36 minutes . The most impressive performance , however , may have come from rookie Jaren Jackson Jr. , who has had a stellar start to his first NBA season . Jackson terrific on offense with 20 points and seven rebounds in 33 minutes , but he was even better on the defensive end , where he recorded three steals and three blocked shots . As for the Nuggets , the loss put an end to their five - game winning streak , and it came on the back of a very poor defensive effort . As a team , the Nuggets shot just 25 percent from behind the arc and 39 percent from the field overall . Star big man Nikola Jokic hardly made a contribution to those percentages , as he attempted just one shot in 26 minutes , and it was the final shot of the game , which was a potential game - winning three . Jokic finished with just four points thanks to a pair of trips to the free throw line . Gary Harris led the team in scoring with 20 points , while Jamal Murray shot a poor 6 - of - 21 from the field en route to scoring 15 points in 37 minutes .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 112 - 106 , in overtime at FedEx Forum on Saturday evening . The 76ers ( 8 - 6 ) had played far from their best on the road in the early going of the season , but they came out of the gates seemingly determined to change that Saturday . Philadelphia forged a 63 - 50 halftime advantage over the Grizzlies ( 7 - 4 ) , who had n't lost in their first four games on their home floor . However , Memphis bounced back with its trademark defense in the second half , limiting the Sixers to 17 points in the third quarter and 22 in the fourth . That gave them enough to chip away at their double - digit deficit , and a Garrett Temple 24 - foot three - pointer with 40 seconds remaining knotted the game at 102 - 102 . With both Joel Embiid and Marc Gasol missing potential game - winning shots , the contest went into overtime . In the extra period , Conley scored the final four points with a floating jumper and a pair of free throws to clinch the hard - fought win . J.J. Redick led the way for the Sixers with 20 points , and he added one assist . Ben Simmons followed with an 18 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and one block . T.J. McConnell filled out the stat sheet off the bench with 16 points , seven assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Embiid generated a 14 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , one steal and one block . Markelle Fultz matched Embiid 's scoring total . Temple poured in 17 points , while Shelvin Mack and MarShon Brooks tallied 12 and 11 points , respectively . The Sixers next pay a visit to the Miami Heat on Monday , while the Grizzlies remain home and take on the Utah Jazz on Monday evening as well .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 96 - 88 , at FedEx Forum on Monday evening . The Jazz got out to a great start on the road , as they led , 13 - 2 , halfway through the first quarter . However , the Grizzlies did eventually wake up and managed to trail just , 20 - 16 , heading into the second . The Grizzlies stayed with it in the second , outscoring the Jazz , 27 - 20 , to take a , 43 - 40 , lead into halftime . The Grizz were able to hang on to the edge to start the third , but the Jazz made a push , as they closed the quarter on an , 18 - 7 run , to claim a 74 - 69 advantage , entering the final frame . The Jazz stayed in control from there , as they did not let the Grizzlies get closer than a two - point deficit , before they pushed the lead back up to 10 in the final minutes . This marks the third straight win for the Jazz , as well as their fifth road win of the season . Joe Ingles led Utah with 19 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Rudy Gobert followed up with 15 points , 16 rebounds , three blocks and two assists , while Derrick Favors and Donovan Mitchell chipped in 12 points each . The Jazz ( 7 - 6 ) take on the Mavericks in Dallas on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 98 - 88 , at FedEx Forum on Monday evening . The Grizzlies ( 11 - 5 ) have gotten off to a strong start this season thanks in large part to the return to health of star point guard Mike Conley , and they 've been especially dominant at home . That much was evident again Monday , as Memphis utilized a final - quarter defensive push to limit the Mavericks ( 7 - 9 ) to just 14 points over the final 12 minutes . As has often been the case this season , Conley 's efforts were key to the victory , as he led all scorers with 28 points . The Grizzlies also limited Dallas to just 34 percent shooting . The Knicks turned the tide in the third quarter , as they poured in 35 points in the quarter , to form a seven - point , 78 - 71 , lead heading into the final frame . The Grizzlies came out with a purpose in the fourth and managed to tie it up at 89 with about four minutes left . They then grabbed a one - point lead , but the Knicks would not back down , as they rallied again , starting with an and - one dunk from Emmanuel Mudiay , followed by 6 - of - 6 free - throw shooting , which clinched the impressive road win . This marks the third straight win of the Knicks , and the second straight loss for the Grizzlies . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 92 - 83 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . While there were only three ties and three lead changes in this game , it was tight until a late run by the Grizzlies . In fact , Memphis scored 13 unanswered points in the final five minutes , as that turned a one - point lead into a 14 - point margin with 80 seconds remaining . Portland did score the final five points to cut it to a single - digit margin but that 130 run was simply too much to overcome . The Grizzlies defense was critical , as they held the Blazers to 37 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range . Memphis also dominated down low , winning the rebounding differential . 51 - 44 , while outscoring Portland in the paint , 40 - 28 . Bench production was also huge for the Grizzlies , as they outscored the Trail_Blazers bench , 38 - 15 . The Trail_Blazers ( 15 - 13 ) got a season - high 40 points from C.J . McCollum , as he also provided five rebounds and two assists on 16 - of - 27 from the field . Damian Lillard went just 4 - of - 18 from the field to amass 14 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jusuf Nurkic scored just two points on 1 - of - 15 shooting but accrued 10 rebounds , two steals and three blocks . Marc Gasol accumulated nine points , seven rebounds , five assists and six blocks . Kyle Anderson led the team in rebounding , grabbing 12 boards . MarShon Brooks and JaMychal Green both reached double figures in scoring off the bench , combining for 25 points . Both teams play home games on Friday for their next outing , with Memphis welcoming the Miami Heat and Portland playing host to the Toronto Raptors .

A 32 - 19 first quarter really set the tone for the Grizzlies , as the T'Wolves simply could n't recover from that . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 114 - 104 , at FedEx Forum on Friday evening . The Grizzlies ( 27 - 40 ) came into Friday 's contest in the midst of a modest late - season surge , as they 'd won three of their previous five games . They got things started off on the right foot against the playoff - contending Jazz ( 37 - 28 ) , building a 60 - 53 halftime lead . While Utah managed to put a two - point dent into their deficit during the third period , Memphis sealed the win with a 30 - point tally in the fourth quarter . The home squad was especially sharp from the field , draining 51 percent of its attempts , including 41 percent of its three - point tries . Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Jazz with 38 points , adding five assists , four rebounds and one block . Joe Ingles supplied 14 points , seven assists , six rebounds and one block . Kyle Korver poured in 13 points and added five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jae Crowder generated an 11 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . Royce O'Neale posted ten points , while Rudy Gobert managed nine points , seven rebounds , one assist , five blocks and one steal . Mike Conley paced the Grizzlies with a 28 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included three rebounds and two steals . Jonas Valanciunas followed with 27 points , supplementing them with seven boards and two assists . Ivan Rabb contributed 15 points and six rebounds . Delon Wright registered 11 points , six rebounds and five assists . Justin Holiday ( eight points ) , Joakim Noah ( seven points ) and Avery Bradley ( seven points ) all made more modest contributions . The Jazz heads back home to face the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Monday night , while the Grizzlies remain home and tangle with the Orlando Magic on Sunday evening .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Orlando Magic , 105 - 97 , at FedEx Forum on Sunday evening . The Grizzlies ( 28 - 40 ) came out of the gates hot , building a 26 - 17 lead through the first 12 minutes . However , the resilient Magic ( 31 - 37 ) erased all but one point from that advantage during the second period . The second half would mostly be a back - and - forth affair , but Memphis would ultimately finish on a 21 - 6 run over the final 5:3 of the contest to wipe out a seven - point deficit and nearly pull off a double - digit victory . As the final score implies , the game was mostly a defensive struggle , with the Grizzlies only managing a 42 percent success rate from the field and Orlando draining just 36 percent of its attempts . Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic with 26 points , adding 10 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Terrence Ross followed with 15 points and supplemented them with five rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . Aaron Gordon collected 13 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Jonathan Isaac furnished 10 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . Mike Conley paced the Grizzlies with 26 points , supplementing them with eight assists , five rebounds and one steal . Avery Bradley registered 21 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . C.J . Miles poured in 13 points . Jonas Valanciunas totaled 12 points , eight rebounds , three assists , four blocks and one steal . Joakim Noah and Delon Wright had matching 10 - point contributions off the bench while pulling down six and five rebounds , respectively . The Magic remain on the road and face off with the Washington Wizards on Wednesday evening , while the Grizzlies pay a visit to the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 126 - 125 , in overtime , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies got out to a great start at home , as they burst out of the gates to outscore the visitors , 38 - 25 , in the first quarter . They kept the pressure on and pushed their lead to 18 , five minutes into the second quarter , but the Rockets woke up a bit and managed to make it a 10 - point game by halftime . The Grizzlies came out strong again in the third quarter and ran away with a double - digit lead , and a 19 - point lead heading into the final frame . However , the Rockets were not finished , as they mounted a ridiculous rally through the fourth , outscoring the Grizzlies by 19 , capped off by three free throws from James Harden to send the game to overtime . The Grizzlies got a good start in extra time and by five with 29 seconds to go , until James Harden struck with a five quick points to tie it up with 15 seconds on the clock . The Grizzlies were saved by Jonas Valanciunas , who was fouled on a put back attempt and sunk 1 - of - 2 free throws , for the win with 0 seconds on the clock . Valanciunas had a huge night with 33 points , 15 rebounds and one assist , in 36 minutes . Mike Conley led the team with 35 points , eight assists and five rebounds , in 42 minutes , while Bruno Caboclo was efficient with 15 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , seven assists and three rebounds , in 41 minutes . Meanwhile , James Harden led the Rockets with 57 points , eight assists , seven rebounds , two steals and two blocks , in 46 minutes . Chris Paul followed up with 18 points , seven points , seven rebounds and a steal . The Rockets ( 45 - 27 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Spurs on Friday . The Grizzlies ( 29 - 42 ) take on the Magic in Orlando on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies in overtime , 129 - 127 , at FedEx Forum on Sunday . This game was full of swings , as it took an overtime session to determine a winner . While Dallas scored the first seven points in OT , Memphis responded with a 9 - 2 run to tie it up with 90 seconds remaining . The Mavericks then scored five unanswered points and held the lead for those final 90 seconds . There ended up being 12 ties and 15 lead changes in total , as it stayed within a seven - point margin for the final 20 minutes of action . The statistics were unbelievably even , with these clubs finishing within two of one another in rebounds , assists , steals , blocks and turnovers . The key for Dallas was scoring in the paint , as they won that battle , 60 - 44 . Bench production was also critical for the Mavericks , as they outscored the Grizzlies bench , 83 - 35 The Mavericks ( 31 - 48 ) were led by Trey Burke , as he provided 24 points , two rebounds and five assists off the bench , Justin Jackson led the starters with 16 points . Jalen Brunson accrued 12 points and 10 assists while Salah Mejri amassed 19 points , nine rebounds , three assists and four blocks off the bench . The Grizzlies ( 32 - 47 ) were led by Justin Holiday , as he tallied 30 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Delon Wright picked up his second - straight triple - double , accumulating 20 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists . Bruno Caboclo totaled 13 points , 17 rebounds and four assists . Both these teams return to action on Tuesday , with Dallas playing host to the struggling Phoenix Suns and Memphis traveling to face the Detroit Pistons .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 146 - 115 , at State_Farm_Arena on Thursday evening . The Kings ( 6 - 3 ) may just be for real . One of the Western_Conference 's bottom dwellers last season , Sacramento is thriving due to the notable improvement of several of their young players and a major uptick in pace . Both factors were on prominent display Thursday , as the Kings managed to outscore the Hawks ( 2 - 6 ) by a 69 - 64 margin in a first - half track meet before pulling away in the third quarter . The visitors exploded for 46 points coming out of intermission while limiting Atlanta to 23 , which made the final 12 minutes a formality . The Kings drained a stellar 54 percent of their attempts from the field , including 40 percent from three - point range . De'Aaron Fox led the way for Sacramento with a 31 - point , 15 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double that also included one steal . Buddy Hield was right behind him with 27 points and added six assists , five rebounds , two steals and one block . Nemanja Bjelica provided 19 points , while frontcourt mate Willie Cauley-Stein went for 12 points and six rebounds . Marvin Bagley III logged extended playing time off the bench and supplied 18 points , five rebounds and one steal over 24 minutes . Jeremy Lin paced the Hawks with 23 points in 23 minutes off the bench . Trae Young registered a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , although he also committed a game - high eight turnovers . Kent Bazemore matched Young 's scoring total and also hauled in three rebounds , dished out three assists , recorded one steal and posted one block . De'Andre Bembry tallied 13 points , while Alex Len totaled 11 points and six rebounds . The Kings next pay a visit to the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday afternoon , while the Hawks remain home and tangle with the Miami Heat on Saturday night .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 123 - 118 , at State_Farm_Arena on Saturday evening . Both teams started out on fire , but the Hawks took it to another level as they dropped 41 in the first quarter , to take a 41 - 31 lead after one . The fast pace kept up through the second . The Hawks held a 10 - point lead with four minutes left in the quarter , but the Heat closed the quarter strong to cut the deficit to six by halftime . The Hawks did not let up in the third , as they quickly regained a double - digit lead , to go up by 14 halfway through the quarter , before they settled on a 102 - 93 lead heading into the final frame . The Heat kept up the fight in the fourth , and clawed their way back , to take a 111 - 110 lead halfway through the quarter . However , the Hawks responded with a couple quick buckets to get back on top . The Hawks did not look back from there , managing to stay one step ahead down the stretch . This marks the end of a four - game slide for Atlanta , while it is Miami 's third straight loss . Trae Young led the way for the Hawks with 24 points , 15 assists , five rebounds and one block , in 31 minutes . Taurean Prince followed up with 15 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Dewayne Dedmon added 15 points , seven rebounds and two blocks , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Hawks shot 52 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 32 from long range . Meanwhile , Miami was missing Goran Dragic ( foot ) . Josh Richardson led the Heat with 32 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting , in 37 minutes . Justise Winslow tallied 15 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks , in 36 minutes . The Heat shot 48 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 40 from long range . The Heat ( 3 - 5 ) will look to bounce back as they head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Monday . The Hawks ( 3 - 6 ) head to Charlotte to take on the Hornets on Tuesday .
The New_York Knicks defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 112 - 107 , at State_Farm_Arena on Wednesday . While New_York held the lead for the final 20 minutes of this game , it came down to the wire . In fact , a 35 - 18 third quarter gave the Knicks that big lead , as Atlanta got it down to a four - point margin in the final minute . That was the closest the game got though , despite the fact that there were 10 ties and 12 lead changes in total . Defense was critical for the Knicks , as they held the Hawks to 40 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range while forcing 17 turnovers . Getting to the free - throw line was also huge for New_York , as they went 33 - of - 47 from the charity stripe while Atlanta attempted just 29 free - throws . The Knicks ( 4 - 8 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he went 16 - of - 20 from the free - throw line to finish with 34 points , three assists and three steals . Frank Ntilikina amassed 13 points , three rebounds and three assists . Noah Vonleh totaled 11 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Enes Kanter led the bench with 17 points and 11 boards . The Hawks ( 3 - 8 ) were led by Omari Spellman , as he collected 18 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Kent Bazemore accrued 16 points , seven rebounds , and three assists . Trae Young tallied 15 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Taurean Prince led the bench with 16 points , two rebounds and three assists . On deck for Atlanta is another home matchup versus the Detroit Pistons on Friday . As for New_York , they travel north of the border to play the Toronto Raptors on Saturday for their next outing .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 127 - 119 , at State_Farm_Arena on Monday . There were 10 ties and 10 lead changes in this game , as the Clippers won in comeback fashion . In fact , Los_Angeles outscored Atlanta , 38 - 23 , in the fourth quarter , as they turned a 15 - point third quarter deficit into an eight - point victory . Los_Angeles did most of their damage at the free - throw line , hitting 37 - of - 47 while Atlanta connected on just 17 - of - 19 . The Clippers bench was also a huge factor , as they had four players reach double figures in scoring , combining for 73 points . The Clippers ( 11 - 5 ) leading scorer came off the bench , with Montrezl Harrell providing 25 points , 11 rebounds , five steals and two blocks . Tobias Harris led the starters with 24 points , eight rebounds and two blocks . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander totaled 16 points and two rebounds . Mike Scott amassed 18 points and seven boards off the bench while Lou Williams finished with 16 points , seven rebounds and 11 assists . The Hawks ( 3 - 14 ) were led by Trae Young , as he accumulated 25 points , three rebounds and 17 assists . Tauren Prince totaled 21 points , four rebounds and two steals . Alex Len and Dewayne Dedmon each recorded 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - doubles . John Collins led the bench with 18 points , three rebounds and six assists in 20 minutes of action . On deck for the Clippers is a road matchup versus the Washington Wizards on Tuesday . As for Atlanta , they play host to the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday for their next outing .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 124 - 108 , at State_Farm_Arena on Wednesday . Toronto came into this game as a big favorite and a wire - to - wire victory justifies that fact . To further that point , the Raptors won all four individual quarters , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . Rebounding was the difference for Toronto , as they outrebounded Atlanta , 55 - 34 . The Raptors ended up shooting 53 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range while out - assisting the Hawks , 33 - 24 . Toronto did a ton of damage down low too , outscoring Atlanta in the paint , 64 - 54 . The Raptors ( 15 - 4 ) got a triple - double out of Kyle Lowry , as he collected 21 points , 12 rebounds and 17 assists . Jonas Valanciunas got a rare start and totaled 21 points and 13 boards on 9 - of - 12 from the field . Pascal Siakam finished with 22 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Serge Ibaka played well off the bench , providing 19 points and nine boards on 8 - of - 11 shooting . The Hawks ( 3 - 15 ) had just one starter reach double figures in scoring . as Taurean Prince led them with 12 points and three assists . Jeremy Lin was their best player , as he led the bench with 26 points on 11 - of - 13 from the field . Vince Carter and Kevin Huerter also reached double figures in scoring off the bench , as Carter reached 25,0 career points for his career with a dunk in the final minute . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Atlanta playing host to the Boston Celtics and Toronto welcoming the Washington Wizards to Canada .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 114 - 96 , at TD Garden on Friday . Boston came into this game as a sizable favorite and an 18 - point victory shows why . In fact , they won this game in wire - to - wire fashion , as a 45 - 23 first quarter really set the tone for the Celtics . In addition , the Hawks never got the game within a 15 - point after that opening quarter . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Boston connecting on 13 - of - 40 while Atlanta hit just 6 - of - 35 . Much of that was attributed to the assist - to - turnover differential , with the Celtics recording nine more assists than Atlanta while committing four fewer turnovers . The Celtics starters really dominated , outscoring the Hawks starters , 61 - 30 . The Hawks ( 3 - 16 ) had just one starter reach double figures in scoring , as John Collins totaled 16 points and seven boards on 7 - of - 8 from the field . Four bench players reached double figures , as Jeremy Lin lead the team with 19 points , five rebounds , 10 assists and three steals . DeAndre ' Bembry also played well off the bench , providing 13 points , seven rebounds , four assists and four blocks . The Celtics ( 10 - 9 ) were led by Aron Baynes , as he amassed 16 points , nine rebounds and four assists in a rare start for Al Horford . Kyrie Irving finished with 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Terry Rozier led the bench with 12 points , three rebounds and three assists while Gordon Hayward accrued 11 points , five rebounds , four assists and two blocks . On deck for Boston is a road matchup versus the Dallas Mavericks on Saturday . As for Atlanta , they play host to the Charlotte Hornets on Sunday for their next fixture .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 124 - 123 , at State_Farm_Arena on Sunday . There were five lead changes in the final five minutes of this game , as it was n't decided until the final shot . In fact , Kent Bazemore hit a game - winning lay - up with four seconds left , as John Collins swatted away a Kemba Walker shot at the buzzer to seal the win . There were 11 ties and nine lead changes in total , as neither club led by more than 13 points . The shooting disparity was key , with the Hawks connecting on 53 percent of their shots while holding the Hornets to just 44 percent from the field . Much of that was attributed to the fact that Atlanta recorded a season - high 34 assists . Rim protection was also key , with Atlanta out - blocking Charlotte , 9 - 4 . The Hawks also dominated down low , outscoring the Hornets in the paint , 58 - 28 . The Hornets ( 9 - 10 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he accumulated 22 points , five rebounds and nine assists . Marvin Williams totaled 20 points and 13 boards . Nicolas Batum finished with 14 points , four rebounds and five assists . Malik Monk was huge off the bench , accruing 26 points and two boards on 7 - of - 11 from three - point range . The Hawks ( 4 - 16 ) came into this game in the midst of a 10 - game losing streak , as this thrilling victory snapped that ugly stretch . John Collins was the player of the game , as he collected 23 points , 11 rebounds and four assists on 11 - of - 16 shooting . Trae Young tallied 18 points , two rebounds , five assists and two steals . Taurean Prince scored 16 points while Kent Bazemore led the bench with 20 points , four rebounds and five assists on 9 - of - 11 from the field . DeAndre ' Bembry also played well off the bench , providing 16 points , six rebounds and six assists . On deck for Atlanta is a road matchup with the Miami Heat on Tuesday . As for Charlotte , they play host to the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday in a rematch .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 128 - 111 , at State_Farm_Arena on Monday . Golden_State came into this game as a sizable favorite and a wire - to - wire win shows just why . In fact , a 34 - 17 first quarter really set the tone , as Atlanta never got the game within a seven - point margin from there . In addition , the Warriors led by at least 15 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Golden_State 's offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 59 percent from the field and 54 percent from three - point range while out - assisting the Hawks , 33 - 23 . The Hawks shot 49 percent from the field and went just 5 - of - 26 from three - point range . Rim protection was also huge , with Golden_State doubling up Atlanta in blocks , 8 - 4 . The Warriors ( 16 - 9 ) were led by Stephen Curry , as he collected 30 points , three rebounds , two assists and two blocks on 10 - of - 17 from the field . Kevin Durant finished with 28 points , five rebounds , eight assists and two steals on 10 - of - 13 shooting . Klay Thompson totaled 27 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Kevon Looney amassed 14 points , three rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Jonas Jerebko led the bench with 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Hawks ( 5 - 19 ) got a double - double from John Collins , as he accrued 24 points , 11 rebounds and two assists on 11 - of - 14 from the field . Trae Young picked up 20 points and three assists but committed seven turnovers and went 0 - of - 5 from long range . Dewayne Dedmon generated six points , 10 rebounds and four steals . Jeremy Lin led the bench with 14 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Golden_State traveling to face the Cleveland Cavaliers and Atlanta playing host to the Washington Wizards .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 106 - 98 , at State_Farm_Arena on Saturday . Denver came into this game as a sizable favorite but Atlant had other ideas . Despite the fact that the Hawks trailed by 10 points after the first quarter , they dominated the middle quarters . The third quarter was critical , with Atlanta outscoring Denver , 35 - 21 . There was actually a 32 - point swing in this game , as Atlanta turned a 15 - point first quarter deficit into a 17 - point lead early in the fourth . The Hawks defense came up big , as they held the Nuggets to 37 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . Rim protection was also huge , with Atlanta recording 11 blocks and Denver picking up just four . In addition , the Hawks outscored the Nuggets in fastbreak points , 24 - 10 . The Nuggets ( 17 - 9 ) had to play this game without Paul Millsap ( toe ) and Gary Harris ( hip ) , as they obviously did n't have enough in the tank to compete . Nikola Jokic did all he could , as he tallied 24 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists . Juancho Hernangomes amassed 17 points and 10 boards . Malik Beasley led the bench with 19 points and two steals while Monte ' Morris provided 10 points , two rebounds , seven assists and five steals . The Hawks ( 6 - 20 ) got a career - high scoring performance from John Collins , as he collected 30 points , 12 rebounds and five assists . No other starter reached double figures in scoring , although Dewayne Dedmon did finish with six points , 11 rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . DeAndre ' Bembry led the bench with 18 points , three rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Kent Bazemore stuffed the stat sheet , accumulating seven points , six rebounds , eight assists , three steals and two blocks . On deck for Denver is a home matchup versus the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday . As for Atlanta , they 're off until Wednesday when they travel to face the Dallas Mavericks .

It was a 35 - 24 first quarter that really set the tone though , as Atlanta led for over 40 minutes of this game . Rebounding was key for the Hawks , as they outrebounded the Wizards , 49 - 37 . Free-throw shooting was also critical , with the Hawks connecting on 32 - of - 39 and the Wizards hitting just 25 - of - 36 . The 13 steals recorded by the Pacers was huge as well , as the Hawks picked up just eight . The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 106 - 82 , at State_Farm_Arena on Sunday evening . The Hawks got out to a good start at home , as they took a 23 - 16 lead after one quarter . The Heat managed to cut into the deficit , as they outscored the Hawks by six in the second quarter . However , the Hawks came out on fire in the third and put the game almost out of reach , as the outscored the Heat 41 - 21 , to take a 79 - 58 lead into the final frame . The Hawks kept their advantage through the fourth and cruised to the impressive home win . Trae Young led the Hawks with 19 points , two rebounds and two assists , in 30 minutes . DeAndre ' Bembry followed up with 17 points , two rebounds and two assists , while John Collins tallied 13 points , 13 rebounds and one block . The Hawks shot 47 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 24 from long range . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 133 - 114 , at State_Farm_Arena on Sunday . When you have the best offense in the league play the worst defense , a 133 - point outing like this becomes something you expect . Not only did Milwaukee score at least 29 points in each quarter , but they also won all four individual quarters en route to their easy victory . The Bucks offense was unstoppable all day , as they connected on 53 percent of their shots while recording 28 assists . Rebounding was dominated by Atlanta , as they won that battle , 54 - 39 . The assist - to - turnover differential allowed Milwaukee 's offense to thrive , as they recorded 28 assists to 14 turnovers while forcing Atlanta to commit 24 turnovers to 19 assists . The 13 steals recorded by Milwaukee played a huge factor in that , as Atlanta had just three on their end . The Bucks ( 30 - 12 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he collected 33 points , six rebounds , four assists and three steals . Eric Bledsoe finished with 24 points , two rebounds , 10 assists and two steals on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Khris Middleton totaled 17 points , 11 rebounds and four assists while Malcolm Brogdon accrued 14 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . The Hawks ( 13 - 30 ) were led by Trae Young , as he tallied 26 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . DeAndre ' Bembry amassed 18 points and seven boards . John Collins finished with 13 points , 11 rebounds and four assists while Alex Len led the bench with 12 points and eight rebounds . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Milwaukee playing host to the surging Miami Heat and Atlanta welcoming the Oklahoma_City Thunder to State_Farm_Arena .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 142 - 126 , at State_Farm_Arena on Tuesday . While Oklahoma_City came into this game owning one of the best defenses in the NBA , they allowed a season - worst 142 points here , which also marked a season - best for Atlanta . It was close throughout though , as there were 16 ties and 11 lead changes in total . The Hawks did almost all of their damage in the second and fourth quarters , outscoring the Thunder , 90 - 56 . Atlanta ended up shooting an incredible 62 percent from the field and 49 percent from three - point range . Ball movement played a huge part in that , as they out - assisted Oklahoma_City , 36 - 22 . Bench production was also big , with the Hawks bench outscoring the Thunder 's bench , 49 - 30 . The Thunder ( 26 - 17 ) were led by Russell Westbrook , as he collected 31 points , six rebounds , 11 assists and five steals . Paul George tallied 24 points , eight rebounds , three assists and five steals . Jerami Grant totaled 21 points , five rebounds , three steals and two blocks while Dennis Schroder led the bench with 21 points , three rebounds and six assists . The Boston Celtics defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 113 - 105 , at State_Farm_Arena on Saturday night . The Celtics ( 28 - 18 ) have struggled on the road all season , and they got off to a typically lackluster start versus the Hawks ( 14 - 31 ) on Saturday as well . Down 36 - 28 after one quarter , Boston battled back to cut their deficit to seven by halftime . After chipping another point off Atlanta 's lead in the third , the visitors went on to outscore their hosts by a 30 - 16 margin in the final period to secure the road win . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 32 points , adding five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Jayson Tatum turned in 19 points , five rebounds , two assists , three blocks and one steal . Jaylen Brown followed with a bench - leading 14 points , supplementing that total with four rebounds , two assists and three steals . Al Horford delivered 13 points , nine boards and two blocks . Terry Rozier managed nine points , 11 rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block in 29 minutes off the bench . Marcus Morris generated eight points on 3 - for - 10 shooting . He added seven boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Kyle Huerter led the Hawks with 18 points and also offered seven assists , four rebounds and three steals . Tre Young contributed 16 points , seven assists , one rebound and one steal . John Collins and Alex Len pitched in matching 15 - point tallies while hauling in 11 and six rebounds , respectively . DeAndre ' Bembry registered 10 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Celtics head back home and taken on the Miami Heat on Monday evening , while the Hawks remain home and face the Orlando Magic on Monday afternoon .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 124 - 108 , at State_Farm_Arena on Sunday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , as the Magic led 26 - 25 after one quarter . The Magic picked it up in the second quarter , where they outscored the Hawks by 14 , to take a 15 - point lead into halftime . They kept up the momentum into the third quarter , where they outscored the hosts by nine , to push their lead to 24 , entering the final frame . The Hawks put up a fight in the fourth , as they outscored the Magic by eight in the quarter , but could not make the push they needed , as they fell to their third straight loss . This marks the third win in a row for Orlando . Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 19 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and one block , in 28 minutes . Terrence Ross followed up with 18 points , six rebounds and two assists , in 23 minutes off the bench , while Evan Fournier tallied 17 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Magic shot 47 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , John Collins led the Hawks with 15 points , four rebounds , two assists and a block , in 24 minutes . The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 117 - 113 , at State_Farm_Arena on Tuesday . In a battle between two of the fastest paced teams in the league , this ended up being a barnburner . Atlanta did almost all their damage in the first and third quarters , outscoring Los_Angeles , 73 - 58 . While the Hawks did n't dominate any statistic , they won the field goal percentage , three - point percentage , free - throw shooting , rebounds and assists differentials all by slim margins . Atlanta 's bench did come up big though , as they outscored Los_Angeles ' bench , 39 - 26 . Despite the high score , neither team cracked 43 percent from the field or 40 percent from long range . The Lakers ( 28 - 29 ) got a monster triple - double from LeBron James , as he tallied 28 points , 11 rebounds , 16 assists and three steals . Brandon Ingram totaled 19 points and six boards . Kyle Kuzma amassed 19 points and five boards while Rajon Rondo and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope provided 13 points apiece to lead the bench . The Hawks ( 19 - 38 ) were led by Trae Young , as he collected 22 points , six rebounds and 14 assists . John Collins matched those 22 points , adding eight rebounds and three assists to his tally . Taurean Prince accrued 17 points and six rebounds while Vince Carter led the bench with 11 points , five rebounds and three assists . That marked the Lakers final game before the break , as they 'll be off until February 21 when they play host to the Houston Rockets . As for Atlanta , they play host to the New_York Knicks on Thursday for their final game before the break .

The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Atlanta Hawks in quadruple - overtime , 168 - 161 , at State_Farm_Arena on Friday . This is undoubtedly the longest game of the 2018 - 19 season , as it took four overtimes to determine a winner . The end of regulation was most exciting , as Trae Young hit a three - pointer with two seconds left to take break a tied game . Otto Porter then hit three free - throws with 1 seconds left to send the game into all of these overtimes . Chicago then responded big time in the fourth overtime , outscoring Atlanta , 13 - 6 . There were 17 ties and 22 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 13 points . Free-throw shooting was the critical difference , with the Bulls connecting on 35 - of - 48 and the Hawks hitting 17 - of - 25 . Three-point shooting was also huge , with Chicago hitting 21 - of - 48 and Atlanta connecting on just 22 - of - 60 . The Bulls ( 18 - 45 ) got a near triple - double from Zach LaVine , as he tallied 47 points , nine rebounds , nine assists and three steals . Otto Porter accumulated 31 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Lauri Markkanen totaled 31 points , 17 rebounds , two assists and two blocks while Robin Lopez amassed 11 points , 11 rebounds and three blocks . The Hawks ( 21 - 41 ) got a career performance from Trae Young , as he tallied 49 points , eight rebounds and 16 assists . Taurean Prince finished with 17 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals . Dewayne Dedmon accrued 14 points , 12 rebounds and four blocks . Alex Len led the bench with 24 points and 10 rebounds . Both these teams will be off until Sunday , as they ironically have a rematch in Chicago .

That left them just a point short at the final buzzer , but Miami 's bench generated 43 points to help spearhead the rally . Ultimately , the Heat won both the rebounding battle by a 49 - 40 margin and slightly out - shot Charlotte , 46 percent to 44 percent . Kemba Walker led the way with a game - high 39 points , a total he supplemented with seven assists and five rebounds . Finally , the Wizards broke out in the fourth quarter , as they started off with a quick 9 - 1 run , to take a six - point lead just two minutes into the quarter .
