The Brooklyn Nets took down the Miami Heat , 104 - 92 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Tuesday evening . Last week , Brooklyn ( 8 - 10 ) took a loss to Miami ( 6 - 11 ) on its home court . On Tuesday , the Nets evened the score , stealing one from the Heat in Miami . While the Heat entered the fourth quarter with the lead , Brooklyn was able to quickly jump ahead , going on a 90 run to take the lead in the first three minutes of the fourth quarter . After returning from a timeout , point guard D'Angelo Russell returned to the floor , delivering an electric performance to close out the game . Eight of Russell 's 20 points came in the fourth quarter , including two jumpers in under 20 seconds , which helped push the Brooklyn lead to six . The win snapped Brooklyn out of a bit of a cold streak , as the team had dropped four of its previous five contests . Russell led the Nets with 20 points ; he also added nine rebounds , six assists , and four steals . Big man Jarrett Allen , meanwhile , scored 13 points to go with 14 rebounds and two blocks . Both Russell and Allen have stepped up in recent games , as the team continues to cope with the absence of breakout star Caris LeVert ( ankle ) . Miami 's offense simply could not get things going , as the team shot just 36 percent from the field . Star center Hassan Whiteside did everything he could to make up for his team 's poor shooting , grabbing 11 offensive rebounds to finish with a whopping 23 total boards . Even a 20 - 20 night from Whiteside could not win it for the Heat , though , as the team went just 7 - of - 32 from three - point range in a night they will hope to soon forget . Veteran star Dwyane Wade made his return to action after missing nearly two weeks due to the birth of his child . He scored five points in 13 minutes off the bench . The Nets face the second half of a back - to - back on Wednesday , as they will visit the Mavericks in Dallas . Miami , meanwhile , will regroup on Friday to face off against the Bulls .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Miami Heat , 115 - 113 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Tuesday night . The Hawks ( 5 - 16 ) entered this game as the team with fewer wins in the entire Association , while the Heat ( 7 - 13 ) ranked dead last in home wins , with only three over the course of the season thus far . But in this matchup of struggling teams , Atlanta came through and managed to survive Miami 's furious comeback attempt in the fourth quarter . Miami jumped to a 38 - 35 lead after the first quarter , but Atlanta responded with a 33 - 14 second quarter that proved to be decisive . Miami won the third quarter by a two - point margin ( 34 - 32 ) and the final one by a 12 - point differential ( 27 - 15 ) , but it was n't enough and a late free throw sealed the deal for Atlanta . Josh Richardson had the chance to win it for the Heat , but missed his three - point attempt with 1 seconds left on the clock . Taurean Prince converted the decisive free throw late in the fourth quarter , but also led Atlanta offensively with an 18 - point , five - rebound performance . Rookie sensation Trae Young continues to lit it up for the Hawks and finished with 17 points , 10 assists and five rebounds . John Collins contributed 16 points , and Omari Spellman added 14 points in 20 minutes off the bench . Kent Bazemore chipped in with 12 points . As it has been the trend for the Heat this season , Richardson once again led the team in scoring with 22 points , but also added eight rebounds , four assists and five steals . Hassan Whiteside had 11 points with 10 rebounds , and Wayne Ellington added 15 points , five rebounds , and five steals . Dwyane Wade ( 18 points ) , Bam Adebayo ( 12 points ) and Justise Winslow ( 11 points ) thrived off the bench .
The Miami Heat defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 106 - 101 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Friday evening . The Heat ( 8 - 13 ) arguably played their best quarter of basketball of the season over the first 12 minutes of the contest , exiting the period with a 37 - 17 lead . They still held a 20 - point lead at halftime , but the Pelicans ( 11 - 12 ) refused to go quietly . New_Orleans cut their deficit down to six entering the final quarter , and they 'd continue to threaten throughout . The Pels were as close as 103 - 100 with 1:12 remaining , but Miami managed to hold on for only their fourth home win of the campaign . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 41 points and added nine rebounds , two assists , one steal and four blocks . Jrue Holiday supplied 21 points , eight assists , four rebounds and one block . Nikola Mirotic registered 15 points and four boards . Julius Randle managed eight points , 10 rebounds , two assists and one block . E'Twaun Moore posted six points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal across 26 minutes before exiting late in the game with a foot injury . Josh Richardson paced the Heat with 20 points , a total he supplemented with two rebounds , one assist , three steals and one block . Dwyane Wade totaled 18 points , six assists and five rebounds . Kelly Olynyk contributed 13 points , seven boards , two assists and two steals . Hassan Whiteside delivered 12 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Rodney McGruder collected 11 points , five boards , one assist and two steals . The Pelicans next head to Charlotte to tangle with the Hornets on Sunday afternoon , while the Heat remain home and take on the Utah Jazz on Sunday evening .
The Miami Heat defeated the Utah Jazz , 102 - 100 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Sunday evening . The Heat ( 9 - 13 ) came into the contest looking to build a little momentum , as they 'd struggled to string wins together in the early portion of the season . Things looked to be headed in the wrong direction early against the Jazz ( 11 - 13 ) , as Utah jumped out to a 35 - 27 first - quarter lead . Miami was able to claw back and reduce their deficit to 55 - 53 by intermission . The game ultimately came down to the final seconds , with Donovan Mitchell 's misfire on a 24 - foot three - point jumper with 1 seconds remaining sealing the win for the home squad . The Heat was able to escape with a victory despite shooting just 40 percent overall . Ricky Rubio paced the Jazz with 23 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , five rebounds and one steal . Jae Crowder drew the start and produced 19 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Donovan Mitchell managed 18 points despite shooting just 8 - for - 24 , and he added five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Rudy Gobert generated a 12 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , three blocks and one steal . Joe Ingles supplied 11 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Hassan Whiteside led the Heat with a 23 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three blocks and one steal . Kelly Olynyk contributed 16 points and eight rebounds , while Josh Richardson matched his scoring total and added four assists and three rebounds . Dwyane Wade poured in 15 points and also registered eight assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Wayne Ellington turned in 12 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Jazz head back home to take on the San_Antonio Spurs on Tuesday evening , while the Heat remains home and tangles with the Orlando Magic on Tuesday night as well .
The Miami Heat defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 101 - 99 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Thursday . While there were only two ties and five lead changes in this game , it was full of swings . In fact , Houston led for the entirety of the first half thanks to a 33 - 21 first quarter but Miami led for the majority of the second half . That can be attributed to the Heat outscoring the Rockets , 61 - 43 , in the second and third quarters . Houston then went on a 12 - 2 run at the beginning of the fourth to make it close , as it stayed within a five - point margin for the final eight minutes . Miami was able to prevail though , as Eric Gordon missed a three - pointer at the buzzer that would have won the game . The Heat 's defense was the difference , as they held the Rockets to 35 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . They also controlled the boards , outrebounding Houston , 62 - 41 . Much of that came on the offensive end , with Miami winning that battle , 20 - 9 . That allowed the Heat to win the points in the paint differential , 52 - 20 . The Rockets ( 16 - 15 ) were led by James Harden , as he collected 35 points , six rebounds , 12 assists and two steals . Eric Gordon totaled 20 points , three rebounds and three assists . P.J . Tucker totaled 14 points and seven boards while Clint Capela led the team with 14 rebounds . Chris Paul played just 12 minutes , as he departed in the second quarter due to a hamstring injury . The Heat ( 14 - 16 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he accumulated 22 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Tyler Johnson tallied 19 points , four rebounds and two blocks . James Johnson accrued 11 points , five rebounds and three assists while Hassan Whiteside generated nine points , 17 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Derrick Jones Jr. led the bench with 15 points , eight rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Houston welcoming the San_Antonio Spurs to Toyota_Center and Miami remaining home to face the Milwaukee Bucks .

The Heat ( 15 - 16 ) came into the contest on a bit of a surge , having won seven of their prior 10 games after a rough start to the season . They seemed to set a dominant tone early against the Bucks ( 22 - 10 ) , jumping out to a 21 - 8 lead during the first 12 minutes . However , Milwaukee turned the tables on their hosts in the second with a 30 - 16 advantage , allowing them a slim 38 - 37 halftime edge . Miami came out of intermission a focused bunch , and their 35 - point third quarter proved to be pivotal to their win . The Heat did allow a 16 - point fourth - quarter lead to be whittled down to just one point with 2:42 remaining , but they finished the game on a 12 - 6 run to secure victory . Khris Middleton led the way for the Bucks with 18 points and added seven rebounds , four assists and two steals . Eric Bledsoe produced 17 points , six assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Heat kept their foot on the gas in the second , where they outscored the visitors by six , to push their lead to 58 - 44 by halftime . The Heat led by as many as 17 points early in the third , but the Raptors kept fighting and put together a great quarter , where they outscored the Heat by 16 , to take a two - point lead into the final frame . The score stayed tight through the fourth , with Miami holding a two - possession lead with 2:27 to go , but the Raptors came up clutch with a couple of threes and some solid defense to earn an impressive road win , and end the Heat 's five - game winning streak . But the Nuggets turned things around in the final two quarters and after winning both in the second half ( 27 - 24 and 27 - 23 , respectively ) they ended clinching a huge win against a tough opponent . The Pacers ( 32 - 19 ) came into the contest with a stellar record , but it likely felt like anything but after looking nothing like themselves over the prior four games . Their uncharacteristic slide was prompted by Victor Oladipo 's season - ending knee injury , and it certainly has n't helped that backup Tyreke Evans succumbed to a back injury recently as well due to a traffic accident . When the Heat ( 24 - 27 ) jumped out to a 27 - 21 first - quarter lead , it must have therefore felt like more of the same for Indiana , but they bounced back to outscore their hosts by a 63 - 50 margin during the middle periods . Both teams then impressively shut the other down during the final 12 minutes , with only 22 combined points being scored . That was enough for the visitors to escape with the narrow win , one that came about in large part to the 23 turnovers they forced . The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Miami Heat , 125 - 104 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Sunday . Miami had a great chance to win here against a shorthanded Toronto club but the Raptors won in dominating fashion . In fact , they held the lead for the final 44 minutes , as a 68 - 54 first half really set the tone . In fact , the Raptors held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as a 34 - 25 fourth quarter was the dagger . Defensive rebounding was big , with the Raptors winning that battle , 38 - 27 . Rim protection was also huge , with Toronto recording eight blocks and Miami failing to record a block . The Raptors ended up shooting 57 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range . The Raptors ( 48 - 17 ) were led by Kyle Lowry , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists . Pascal Siakam accrued 20 points , five rebounds and five assists . Goran Dragic paced the Heat with 19 points and complemented them with four assists and two rebounds . Dwyane Wade collected 17 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one block . Bam Adebayo totaled 16 points , nine boards , one assist , two steals and one block . Dion Waiters poured in 12 points and added four rebounds and three assists . Josh Richardson managed to drain just two of 17 attempts while generating seven points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . The Hornets head back home to take on the Philadephia 76ers on Tuesday evening , while the Heat pays a visit to the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Monday night .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Miami Heat , 104 - 99 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Tuesday . The Heat ( 36 - 38 ) and the Magic ( 37 - 38 ) knew this game would be big thanks to its play - off implications , and there 's no question it lived up to the hype . In a night that was marked by Chris Bosh 's jersey - retirement ceremony , the Heat looked motivated and jumped ahead in the first quarter thanks to a 32 - 18 lead that made fans think this would be an easy contest . However , Orlando came from behind and won the subsequent two quarters by five and fifteen points each while limiting the Heat to less than 20 points in both of them ( 24 - 19 and 34 - 19 , respectively ) . Miami won the final quarter 29 - 28 , but it was too late to mount a comeback and Orlando stole a huge win on the road . One that now puts them in the driver seat for a playoff berth with only seven games left on their schedule . As it has been the trend all season long , Nikola Vucevic carried the Magic 's offense since he finished with an impressive performance of 24 points , 16 rebounds and five assists . D.J . Augustin had 17 points with seven assists , and Jonathan Isaac contributed 19 points with six boards . Aaron Gordon had a double - double of 14 points with 10 boards , and Evan Fournier chipped in with 11 points . Terrence Ross had 10 points off the bench . Dion Waiters was the best player for the Heat since he finished with 26 points , and he was well flanked by Dwyane Wade who contributed with 22 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Josh Richardson had 17 points with six assists , and Hassan Whiteside contributed 10 points and `` only `` two rebounds off the bench . No other Heat player scored in double figures in this match .
The Miami Heat defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 105 - 99 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Thursday evening . The Mavs got out to a good start on the road , as the held a three - point lead after one quarter . The Mavs kept it up in the second , outscoring the home team by seven , to take a 10 - point lead into halftime . The Heat came out strong in the third quarter and managed to tie it up at 64 , just four minutes into the quarter . However , the Mavs gathered themselves though , and were able to reclaim a seven - point lead heading into the final frame . The Heat had another thing in mind to start the fourth , as they rallied to take a one - point lead five minutes into the quarter . The Heat kept the pressure on and outscored the visitors by 13 in the quarter , to earn a crucial win in their hunt for the playoffs . Goran Dragic led the Heat with 23 points , 12 rebounds , 11 assists , a steal and a block , in 37 minutes . Bam Adebayo added 11 points , 16 rebounds and three assists , while Dion Waiters finished with 17 points , two rebounds and an assist . The Heat shot 44 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 30 from deep . Meanwhile , all five starters scored in double digits for Dallas , led by Luka Doncic , who finished with 19 points , eight rebounds and seven assists , in 30 minutes . Justin Jackson added 14 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Jalen Brunson and Dirk Nowitzki added 13 points each . The Mavericks shot 40 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 47 from deep . The Mavs ( 29 - 46 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Thunder in OKC on Sunday . The Heat ( 37 - 38 ) take on the Knicks in New_York on Saturday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Miami Heat , 112 - 102 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Wednesday night . The Celtics ( 47 - 32 ) had gotten all they could handle from the Heat ( 38 - 40 ) when they 'd met at TD Garden on Monday night , so another see - saw battle was expected . Sure enough , Miami jumped out to a 31 - 29 lead through the first 12 minutes before finding themselves down by four at halftime . While the home squad kept it competitive in the third and shaved a couple of points off their deficit , a clutch 12 - 6 run over the final 3:56 sealed the victory for Boston . Gordon Hayward led the way for the Celtics with 25 points , adding eight rebounds , five assists and one block . Kyrie Irving totaled 23 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal . Al Horford contributed 21 points , eight rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Jayson Tatum poured in 16 points and also supplied seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Aron Baynes generated a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks and one steal . Dion Waiters paced the Heat with 21 points , complementing them with five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Hassan Whiteside followed with an 18 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included one block . Dwyane Wade totaled 17 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Bam Adebayo finished with 12 points , 12 rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal . Goran Dragic managed 11 points , five assists , two rebounds and one steal . Kelly Olynyk tallied 10 points . The Celtics next visit the Indiana Pacers on Friday night , while the Heat tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on the road on Friday evening as well .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 113 - 112 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday evening . The visiting Bucks got out to an explosive start and amassed a 36 - 23 lead through the first quarter . The Hornets tightened up in the second , as they matched the Bucks , scoring 31 points in the quarter . Still , the Bucks led 67 - 54 at halftime . The Hornets came out much better in the second half , and went on a 14 - 8 run to end the third quarter , cutting the gap to just 10 heading into the final frame . The Hornets kept the pressure on and managed to tie the game at 101 , just halfway through the fourth quarter . The Bucks were able to take back a small advantage for most of the final minutes , but the Hornets were not done , as they managed to take a one - point lead after a clutch three from Malik Monk and a couple of free throws from Kemba Walker . Despite the Hornets ' strong fight , the Bucks took the final edge as Giannis Antetokounmpo gave the Bucks their winning points at the foul line in the dying seconds . Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 25 points , 18 rebounds , eight assists and one block , in 34 minutes . Khris Middleton followed up with 19 points , nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , while Eric Bledsoe tallied 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and one block . The Bucks shot 49 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker put the Hornets on his back , with 41 points on 15 - of - 29 shooting , four assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 38 minutes . Malik Monk followed up with 18 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting , in 33 minutes off the bench . The Hornets ( 0 - 1 ) will look to get back on track as they take on the Magic , in Orlando , on Friday . The Bucks ( 10 ) host the Pacers on Friday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 125 - 113 , at Spectrum_Center on Tuesday . This was a dominating victory for Charlotte , as they held the lead for all but a few minutes in the first half . In fact , the Hornets led by 10 points at the half and by 19 points headed into the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was one of the only major differences in the stat sheet , with Charlotte connecting on 54 percent of their shots while holding Miami to just 47 percent from the field . Defensive rebounding was also key , with the Hornets winning that battle , 31 - 24 . Transition offense was also a big factor , with Charlotte outscoring Miami , 17 - 5 , in fastbreak points . The Heat ( 3 - 4 ) were led by Hassan Whiteside , as he collected 16 points , 12 rebounds and two blocks . Josh Richardson accrued 15 points , two rebounds and three assists . Kelly Olynyk finished with 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Dwyane Wade led the bench with 19 points and four assists . The Hornets ( 4 - 4 ) highest - scorer came off the bench , as Tony Parker led the team with 24 points and 11 assists . Malik Monk also played well off the bench , dropping 20 points . Nicolas Batum led the starters with 20 points and seven boards . Kemba Walker accumulated 19 points , four rebounds and eight assists . On deck for Charlotte is a home matchup versus the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Thursday . As for Miami , they 're off until Saturday when they travel to play the Atlanta Hawks .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 111 - 107 , at Spectrum_Center on Thursday evening . The Thunder jumped out to a quick 60 lead . The Hornets answered back and pulled ahead , 19 - 16 , however , the Thunder closed the quarter strong , to take a 24 - 22 lead into the second . The Hornets reclaimed the advantage early in the second and held the lead for nearly the entire quarter , aside from a few points where it was tied . The Hornets outscored the Thunder 26 - 20 in the second , to take a 48 - 44 lead into halftime . The Hornets carried the momentum into the third and pushed their lead to 18 , just three minutes into the quarter . Nonetheless , the Thunder pushed back , tying the Hornets with 29 points each in the quarter , resulting in a four - point lead for Charlotte heading into the fourth . The Hornets played tough , but the Thunder were able to tie it up at 88 , just a couple minutes into the quarter . It remained a one - or - two possession game , until the Thunder pulled ahead in the final minutes thanks to a couple clutch plays by Russell Westbrook . This marks the third straight win for the Thunder , and the second home loss of the season for the Hornets . Russell Westbrook led OKC with 29 points , 10 assists , eight rebounds and three steals , in 37 minutes . Alex Abrines followed up with 25 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , in 30 minutes off the bench , while Dennis Schroder added 21 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Thunder shot 43 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 37 from deep . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 21 points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal , in 31 minutes , while Tony Parker added 17 points off the bench . The Hornets shot 41 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 41 from downtown . The Hornets ( 4 - 5 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Cavs on Saturday . The Thunder ( 3 - 4 ) take on the Wizards in Washington on Friday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 117 - 112 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday . There were nine ties and 18 lead changes in this competitive game , as it was n't decided until the final minutes . Charlotte 's defense was huge , as Boston missed seven of their final eight shots . The Hornets won in comeback fashion , outscoring the Celtics , 33 - 25 , in the fourth quarter . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Charlotte hitting 15 - of - 41 while Boston connected on just 9 - of - 32 . Boston actually dominated many of the statistics , winning the assists , turnovers , steals . blocks . fastbreak points and points in the paint differentials . The Celtics ( 9 - 8 ) got a double - double out of Kyrie Irving , as he collected 27 points , five rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . Jayson Tatum amassed 18 points , six rebounds and two assists . Al Horford accrued 10 points , three rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Marcus Smart and Daniel Theis both reached double figures in scoring off of the bench . The Hornets ( 8 - 8 ) got another gem out of Kemba Walker , as he tallied 43 points , four rebounds and five assists . Jeremy Lamb totaled 18 points and six boards . Nicolas Batum finished with nine points and eight rebounds . Wily Hernangomez was a nice spark off the bench , as he provided 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Charlotte playing host to the Indiana Pacers and Boston welcoming the New_York Knicks to Beantown .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 127 - 109 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . This was a dominating performance from Charlotte , as they held the lead for the entirety of the second half . The third quarter was key , with the Hornets winning it , 37 - 24 . In fact , Charlotte led by at least 15 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter thanks to that monster third . The Hornets offense was unstoppable , as they went 45 - of - 80 from the field and 18 - of - 29 from three - point range . Charlotte also won the rebounding , assists , steals and turnover differentials as well . The Pacers ( 11 - 7 ) had to play this game without Victor Oladipo ( knee ) , as they really struggled without their best player . Bojan Bogdanovic led the team in scoring in his absence , totaling 20 points , three rebounds and four assists . Thaddeus Young accrued 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . Tyreke Evans started for Oladipo and amassed 12 points , three rebounds and three assists . Domantas Sabonis provided 15 points and six rebounds on 7 - of - 8 shooting to lead the bench . The Hornets ( 9 - 8 ) were led by Jeremy Lamb , as he accumulated 21 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Kemba Walker collected 16 points , two rebounds and 11 assists . Dwayne Bacon was huge off the bench , generating 18 points , six rebounds and three assists . Frank Kaminsky and Malik Monk also reached double figures in scoring off the bench . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Indiana playing host to the San_Antonio Spurs and Charlotte traveling to play the Oklahoma_City Thunder .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 108 - 94 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 11 - 10 ) once again got themselves above the .500 mark with a solid performance at home , leaving no chance for Atlanta ( 5 - 17 ) to earn their third - consecutive win . The Hawks started strong , however , and got themselves on top following the first quarter thanks to a 28 - 24 score . The hosts answered quickly , and restored their lead to the point that the first half finished with a six - point lead for Charlotte ( 55 - 49 ) thanks to a 31 - 21 second quarter . The Hornets would also win the final two quarters , 31 - 26 and 22 - 19 respectively , as they closed things out with ease . It ended being a comfortable for Charlotte since they were vastly superior during the final 36 minutes of action . Four of five starters for Charlotte scored in double digits but surprisingly , Kemba Walker was n't the team 's leading scorer despite contributing with a strong line of 19 points , four rebounds , four steals and three assists . The distinction fell on Jeremy Lamb 's shoulder , as the shooting guard finished the game with 22 points and five boards . Cody Zeller also had 19 points , while Nicolas Batum chipped in with 13 points and six boards . Trae Young was the leading scorer for the Hawks with 18 points , but his shooting woes continued ( 7 - 19 FG , 3 - 9 3PT ) and he also committed five turnovers against only four assists . Taurean Prince added 12 points , while Kevin Huerter chipped in with 12 points , five rebounds , and four assists . John Collins only had nine points , but also added 10 rebounds and four assists .

That led to Utah shooting 54 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range while holding Charlotte to 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . The Jazz won despite being dominated down low , as they were outscored in the paint , 70 - 42 . The final scoreline makes this game look closer than it actually was , as this was a dominating effort from New_Orleans . In fact , they held the lead for the final 30 minutes of play , as a 36 - 26 second quarter really made the difference . In addition , the Pelicans held a double - digit lead for the final 10 minutes , as they led by 21 points midway through the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was critical , with New_Orleans hitting 51 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range while holding Charlotte to 43 percent from the field and 28 percent from long range . The Pelicans also won the defensive rebounding differential . 41 - 30 . The Pelicans starters really dominated throughout , outscoring the Hornets starters , 81 - 42 . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 108 - 107 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . While there were only five ties and eight leads changes in this game , it was n't decided until the final shot . Jeremy Lamb played the hero , as he hit a game - winning jumper with 0 seconds left to break a tied game . Charlotte actually won this game in comeback fashion , as a 26 - 14 fourth quarter allowed them to overcome a double - digit deficit . Free-throw shooting was the only noticeable difference for the Hornets , as they connected on 29 - of - 37 while the Pistons hit just 14 - of - 21 . Detroit dominated many of the statistics , winning the field goal percentage , rebounds , assists and block differentials . Turnovers really killed the Pistons though , as they committed 14 of them while forcing just seven from the Hornets . The Pistons ( 13 - 13 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he tallied 26 points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . Reggie Jackson finished with 18 points and two assists . The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 128 - 100 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday night . The Lakers ( 18 - 11 ) have made tremendous strides since the beginning of the season , but they 've remained a somewhat inconsistent road squad . That much had been evident in a Thursday night loss to the Rockets , one in which Los_Angeles appeared to lose composure after a fourth - quarter technical . They were out for redemption Saturday against a tired Hornets ( 14 - 15 ) squad , one that had just dropped a 126 - 124 overtime decision to the Knicks on Friday night . The first half remained tightly contested , with the visitors forging a modest 57 - 50 lead . However , they completely pulled away in the third quarter , racking up 40 points while limiting their hosts to 17 . As the final score implied , the Lakers held sizable advantages in most categories , including shooting ( 53 percent to 42 percent ) and rebounding ( 52 - 38 ) . LeBron James led the Lakers with a 24 - point , 12 - rebound , 11 - assist triple - double that also included one steal . JaVale McGee overcame an illness to suit up and offer 19 points , six rebounds , three blocks and one steal . Lonzo Ball also posted a triple - double , supplying 16 points , 10 rebounds , 10 assists , five steals and one block . Kyle Kuzma produced 14 points , while Sviatoslav Mykhailiuk ( 12 points ) , Lance Stephenson ( 11 points ) and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope ( 11 points ) were all contributors off the bench . Malik Monk paced the Hornets off the bench with 19 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds and one assist . Miles Bridges posted 17 points , three rebounds and two blocks . Jeremy Lamb poured in 12 points and added five boards . Willy Hernangomez collected 11 points , six rebounds and one assist . Kemba Walker mustered just four points on 2 - for - 13 shooting . The Lakers remain on the road and face the Washington Wizards on Sunday evening , while the Hornets remain home and face the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday night .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 100 - 87 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday evening . The Hornets ( 17 - 17 ) have been a much better team at home all season , and the Friday 's first quarter served as a good example as to why . Charlotte jumped out to a 33 - 17 first - quarter lead that gave them the cushion they 'd eventually need for a double - digit home victory . The Nets ( 17 - 20 ) did manage to shave eight points off their deficit over the middle periods , but the home squad put any thoughts of a comeback by repeatedly pulling away in the fourth quarter when Brooklyn got to within five points on multiple occasions , the last coming with 4:15 remaining . As the final score implied , it was a strong defensive effort for the Hornets , which limited the visitors to 40 percent shooting , including a meager 15 percent from three - point range . D'Angelo Russell paced the Nets with 33 points and added four rebounds , two assists and one block . DeMarre Carroll followed with a bench - leading 15 points and also supplied eight rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Shabazz Napier collected 11 points and one assist . Jarrett Allen tabulated eight points , 10 rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Rodions Kurucs , Joe Harris and Rondae Hollis-Jefferson all underwhelmed with contributions of five , four and two points , respectively . Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 29 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Jeremy Lamb and Tony Parker turned in 19 points apiece , with Lamb notably adding five boards and three assists . Cody Zeller managed a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured four assists , four blocks and one steal . Nicolas Batum ( five points ) and Marvin Williams ( six points ) did n't do much on the scoreboard , but they pulled down nine and eight rebounds , respectively . The Nets remain on the road and are right back in action Saturday afternoon versus the Milwaukee Bucks , while the Hornets also travel and take on the Washington Wizards on Saturday night .

The Hornets ( 18 - 18 ) have been an appreciably better home team all season , and Monday 's comfortable double - digit victory was just the latest example . The Magic ( 16 - 20 ) actually jumped out to a 70 lead to start the game , but that would essentially turn out to be the highlight of their night . Charlotte roared back to take a 36 - 23 lead by the end of the first quarter , and they held a 63 - 53 edge at intermission . However , the home squad would put any doubts to rest in the third , adding eight more points to their advantage and scoring 62 points overall in the second half . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 122 - 84 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . The Mavericks ( 18 - 19 ) looked as if they were the only team on the court tonight , as the Hornets ( 18 - 19 ) looked brutally overmatched from start to finish , and did n't find answers for their Western_Conference opponent . Things got so bad that Dallas already jumped to a 16 - point lead in the first quarter ( 42 - 26 ) and they never looked back from there . The Mavs won each quarter individually ( 23 - 15 , 29 - 24 and 28 - 19 , respectively ) and cruised their way towards one of the biggest wins of the 2018/19 NBA season thus far . Five Dallas players scored in double - digits , but things were balanced since no player reached the 20 - point mark , and every single player that stepped on the court registered at least two points . Luka Doncic led the way with 18 points , 10 rebounds and four assists , while Dennis Smith Jr. chipped in with 18 points and seven assists . Harrison Barnes had 17 points , Wesley Matthews added 11 , and Dwight Powell contributed 15 points and eight rebounds off the bench . The Hornets only had four players scoring over 10 points and their top scorer , as it has been the case during the entire year , was Kemba Walker , who only had 11 points on 4 - 14 from the field . Devonte ' Graham and Marvin Williams each delivered 10 points , while Bismack Biyombo had 10 points and seven boards coming off the bench .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 114 - 95 , at Spectrum_Center on Thursday . A 43 - 25 second quarter really decided this game , as that allowed Charlotte to hold the lead for the entirety of the second half . In fact , the Hornets led by at least seven points for the final two quarters , as a 39 - 13 run at the end of the second quarter really decided this game . Getting to the free - throw line was the difference in the game , with Charlotte connecting on 25 - of - 29 and Sacramento hitting just 6 - of - 13 . The Hornets also did a ton of damage down low , outscoring the Kings in the paint , 52 - 38 . In addition , Charlotte 's bench outscored Sacramento 's bench , 60 - 42 . The Kings ( 23 - 22 ) were led by Buddy Hield as he amassed 24 points and two steals . De'Aaron Fox accrued 10 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Bogdan Bogdanovic led the bench with 17 points and two assists . Marvin Bagley also played well off the bench , collecting 15 points and eight boards . The Hornets ( 21 - 23 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds and five assists . Marvin Williams totaled 10 points , five rebounds , two assists and three steals . Wily Hernangomez was huge off the bench , providing 11 points and 16 rebounds . Tony Parker , Miles Bridges and Michel Kidd-Gilchrist all reached double figures in scoring off the bench as well . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Sacramento traveling to face the struggling Detroit Pistons and Charlotte playing host to the Phoenix Suns .

This was a dominating effort from the Hornets , as they won this game in wire - to - wire fashion . They did most of their damage in the first and third quarters , outscoring the Suns , 77 - 52 . Charlotte actually led by at least eight points for the final 42 minutes , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 20 minutes of action . Charlotte 's offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 55 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range while recording 31 assists . The rebounding differential was decisive too , with the Hornets winning that battle , 53 - 26 . The Suns ( 11 - 36 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he tallied 32 points , two rebounds and 11 assists . Charlotte took control in the second half , outscoring Chicago , 74 - 58 . Both offenses were on point , as they each connected on 52 percent of their shots . Charlotte 's starters really dominated this game , as they had four starters score at least 13 points while Chicago had only two starters score more than seven points .
