The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 117 - 115 , at Spectrum_Center on Tuesday . The Clippers ( 30 - 25 ) and the Hornets ( 26 - 27 ) played a back - and - forth game that was decided with less than five seconds left in the final quarter . The Clippers jumped to a 26 - 25 lead in the first quarter , but Charlotte stormed back in both the second and third quarters ; they won 33 - 27 in the second and 34 - 31 in the third , so they were up by eight points entering the final 12 minutes of action . However , Los_Angeles did n't give up and they flipped the script during the final 12 minutes of action . A 33 - 23 win gave them the win , headlined by a game - winning , mid - range jumped from Tobias Harris with only 4 seconds left on the clock . Harris was the best player in this game and aside from hitting the game - winning shot , he finished the contest with 34 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Patrick Beverley had a solid performance as well and ended with 15 points , six rebounds and three assists . Montrezl Harrell delivered 16 points and 10 rebounds , while Lou Williams shone off the bench with a stellar 31 - point , six - assist performance . Kemba Walker was the best player for the Hornets in this game as he finished with 32 points , nine assists and five boards . Jeremy Lamb had a strong performance as well since he contributed 22 points , four boards and three steals . Marvin Williams chipped in with 13 points with seven boards , while Malik Monk looked solid off the bench as he ended with 12 points in 14 minutes of action .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 123 - 110 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday . This was a tale of two halves , as Charlotte took control in the second half . In fact , the Wizards got out to a big lead thanks to a 38 - 27 first quarter but the Hornets took control because of a 38 - 22 second quarter . That allowed them to hold the lead for the entirety of the second half , despite the fact that Washington led for the majority of the first half . Rebounding was key for the Hornets , as they outrebounded the Wizards , 53 - 43 . Charlotte ended up shooting 48 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range while holding Washington to 43 percent from the field and 26 percent from long range . The Wizards ( 24 - 35 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 46 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Jeff Green amassed 16 points , two rebounds and three assists . Tomas Satoransky collected 15 points , three rebounds and four assists while Bobby Portis led the bench with 12 points , 12 rebounds and four steals . The Hornets ( 28 - 30 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he accrued 27 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . Nicolas Batum totaled 20 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Miles Bridges finished with 14 points , six rebounds and three steals while Jeremy Lamb led the bench with 16 points , six rebounds and four steals . Both teams return to action on Saturday in the second half of a back - to - back set , with Washington playing host to the Indiana Pacers and Charlotte welcoming the Brooklyn Nets .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 117 - 115 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday evening . The Nets got out to a great start on the road , as the took a 34 - 20 lead after one quarter . The Hornets tightened it up in the second , and managed to outscore the visitors by one in the quarter , to make it a 13 - point deficit at halftime . The Hornets stayed determined in the third quarter , as they chipped away , until they trailed by just six points entering the fourth quarter . The Hornets kept up the momentum to start the fourth and managed to take a four - point lead by the mid - way point in the quarter . They held on to the lead until the Nets made a huge run in the final minutes , fueled by 12 straight points from D'Angelo Russell , which ultimately sealed the win for the visitors . Russell led the Nets with 40 points , seven assists , two steals , a block and a rebound , in 35 minutes . Joe Harris followed up with 19 points , four assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block , while Jarrett Allen added 11 points , 11 rebounds , three blocks and two assists . The Nets shot 46 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 43 from long range . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 32 points , three assists , two steals and one rebound , in 40 minutes . Tony Parker followed up with 21 points , five rebounds , five assists and one block , while Nicolas Batum added 14 points , four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . The Hornets shot 45 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 35 from long range . The Hornets ( 28 - 31 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Warriors on Monday . The Nets ( 31 - 30 ) play host to the Spurs on Monday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 118 - 113 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday evening . The Rockets ( 36 - 25 ) got off to an impressive start in the interconference battle , racking up 41 first - quarter points on their way to an eight - point lead through the first 12 minutes . However , the hometown Hornets ( 28 - 33 ) made a statement in the second by eradicating their deficit and building a seven - point halftime lead . Houston would get the best of their hosts on both ends of the floor during the second half , however , outscoring Charlotte by a 56 - 44 margin over the final two quarters . After falling behind by a 98 - 95 margin early in the final period , the Rockets finished on a 23 - 15 run over the final 9:20 . James Harden paced the Rockets with 30 points , adding seven assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block . Clint Capela generated a 23 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Chris Paul managed 17 points , 10 assists , four rebounds and two steals . Gerald Green and P.J . Tucker contributed matching 15 - point tallies while hauling in five and two rebounds , respectively . Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 35 points , supplementing them with four rebounds , four assists and five steals . Jeremy Lamb furnished 18 points , 14 rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . Nicolas Batum delivered 17 points , six rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks . Cody Zeller turned in 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Marvin Williams pitched in 12 points , six boards and three assists . The Rockets head back home to face the Miami Heat on Thursday night , while the Hornets pay a visit to the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening .
The Miami Heat defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 91 - 84 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday evening . The Heat ( 30 - 34 ) entered this game on quite a run since they were coming off three wins in their previous four games , and they did nothing to stop their impressive streak of results since they had little problems to defeat the Hornets ( 29 - 35 ) on their own court . Miami quickly jumped to a 29 - 18 lead in the first quarter and while Charlotte would get closer , they would never complete a potential comeback . The first half ended with a 43 - 43 score thanks to a 25 - 14 run for the Hornets , but Miami would run away with the game after winning both the third ( 18 - 15 ) and the fourth ( 30 - 26 ) quarters . Kelly Olynyk was the top scorer for the Heat since he finished with 22 points and 11 rebounds . Josh Richardson had 13 points , and Bam Adebayo contributed on both ends of the court since he finished with 10 points , five rebounds , two steals and two blocks . But if it 's about filling the stat sheet , then Dwyane Wade deserves credit after posting a stat line of eight points , six assists , four rebounds and two steals . Only three Charlotte players topped the 10 - point mark and as it has been a trend during the entire season , Kemba Walker led the way for the Hornets since he finished with 20 points and seven assists in 37 minutes . Cody Zeller contributed on both ends of the floor , and produced a double - double of 10 points with 10 rebounds . Frank Kaminsky thrived off the bench with 20 points in only 23 minutes .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 112 - 111 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday This game was close throughout , as neither club ever led by more than 11 points . In fact , there were 11 ties and 14 lead changes in total , as Charlotte scored the final four points in the final 2:19 to win the game . The key for the Hornets was their rebounding , as they outrebounded the Wizards , 52 - 45 . Three-point shooting was also huge , with Charlotte connecting on 14 - of - 41 and Washington hitting just 9 - of - 27 . They also won the turnover differential , 14 - 12 . The Wizards ( 27 - 38 ) were led by Bobby Portis , as he collected 23 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Bradley Beal went just 4 - of - 21 from the field to amass 15 points , four rebounds , seven assists and five steals . Tomas Satoransky generated 11 points , nine rebounds and six assists while Jabari Parker led the bench with 15 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Hornets ( 30 - 35 ) were led by Marvin Williams , as he tallied 30 points , seven rebounds and two blocks on 10 - of - 16 from the field . Kemba Walker finished with 18 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals . Nicolas Batum amassed 10 points , eight rebounds and five assists while Jeremy Lamb led the bench with 19 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and three blocks . This is the front end of a back - to - back for both these teams , with Washington traveling to face the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday and Charlotte playing the Milwaukee Bucks on the road as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 118 - 114 , at Spectrum_Center on Tuesday evening . The 76ers ( 46 - 25 ) likely figured they 'd be in for a wire - to - wire battle against the increasingly desperate Hornets ( 31 - 39 ) , which were in desperate need of a win to stay alive for the eighth seed in the Eastern_Conference . Philadelphia was also resting Joel Embiid for the contest , which made their challenge that much greater , and Charlotte had lost the prior three meetings between the teams by a combined total of just six points . True to form , the contest was a back - and - forth - affair until the closing seconds , when Nicolas Batum missed a tip - in that would have tied it at 116 with approximately one second remaining and Tobias Harris drained a pair of subsequent free throws for the win . Ben Simmons led the way in Embiid 's absence with 28 points , adding eight rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal . J.J. Redick followed with a 27 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists . Jimmy Butler provided 23 points , nine assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block . Tobias Harris generated a 22 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . James Ennis III led the second unit with 14 points . Jeremy Lamb paced the Hornets with 26 points and also contributed 11 rebounds and three assists . Kemba Walker turned in 21 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Frank Kaminsky pitched in 14 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block . Dwayne Bacon managed 13 points and three boards . Nicolas Batum supplied nine points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Miles Bridges furnished eight points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals . The 76ers return home to face the Boston Celtics on Wednesday evening , while the Hornets remain home to tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Thursday night .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Boston Celtics , 124 - 117 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday evening . The Hornets ( 33 - 39 ) are in must - win mode each time they take the court for the balance of the season , but they appeared to be outmatched early in Saturday 's game . Charlotte fell behind by a 35 - 29 margin at the end of one quarter , but they bounced back to erase all but one point of their deficit by halftime . The Celtics ( 43 - 30 ) appeared to regain control in the third by extending their advantage out to nine points . However , Charlotte fired on all cylinders from the 7:43 mark of the fourth onward , as they finished the contest on an eye - popping 30 - 5 run from that point . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Celtics with 31 points , adding seven rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jaylen Brown poured in 29 points and added four rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal . Marcus Morris produced 15 points , nine rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Jayson Tatum and Terry Rozier generated matching 12 - point tallies , with Tatum also hauling in six boards and dishing out four assists . Kemba Walker paced the Hornets with 36 points , supplementing them with 11 rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Miles Bridges furnished 20 points , seven rebounds , three assists and three steals . Marvin Williams and Malik Monk tallied 13 points each . Dwayne Bacon delivered 11 points , five rebounds , three assists and one block . The Celtics head back home to face the San_Antonio Spurs on Sunday night , while the Hornets pay a visit to the Toronto Raptors on Sunday evening as well .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the San_Antonio Spurs at Spectrum_Center on Tuesday evening . In a game that required overtime to find a winner , the Hornets ( 35 - 39 ) and the Spurs ( 43 - 32 ) played a back - and - forth encounter that did show an interesting pattern : the Spurs were always coming from behind on the score . Charlotte won the first quarter 29 - 23 , but the Spurs turned things around and secured a 36 - 26 win in the second , going up by four at the break . The Hornets would get the lead back after the third ( 27 - 21 ) but the differential was only two points , and the Spurs erased in the fourth ( 26 - 24 ) so both teams needed to play five extra minutes to decide which team will take home the win . The Hornets looked impressive in OT and a 19 - 10 lead was enough to secure the victory . Undoubtedly , Kemba Walker was the biggest star of the game since he came just one rebound short of a triple - double thanks to a 38 - points , 11 - assist , nine - rebound performance . Dwayne Bacon contributed 24 points in 36 minutes , and Miles Bridges filled the stat sheet thanks to 10 points , five rebounds and three assists . Frank Kaminsky chipped in with a double - double off the bench ( 15 points , 10 rebounds ) . LaMarcus Aldridge was the best player for the Spurs since he finished with 20 points and 15 rebounds , but the top scorer was DeMar DeRozan , who had 30 points , eight boards and four assists . Bryn Forbes chipped in with 16 points , while two bench players eclipsed the 15 - point mark : Rudy Gay had 16 points with nine rebounds , and Marco Belinelli had 17 points and 10 boards .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 113 - 111 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday . There were three lead changes in the final minute of this game , as it came down to the wire . In fact , there were 17 lead changes in total , with Jeremy Lamb playing the hero . Lamb actually hit a game - winning three - pointer with four seconds left to snatch the win for Charlotte . The Hornets defense was critical , as they tripled up the Raptors in steals , 6 - 2 while winning the turnover differential , 14 - 6 . Charlotte 's bench was also decisive , as they outscored Toronto bench , 59 - 38 The Raptors ( 56 - 24 ) were led by Kawhi Leonard , as he tallied 29 points , six rebounds and four assists . Kyle Lowry accrued 16 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . Pascal Siakam amassed 14 points , five rebounds and three assists . Serge Ibaka was huge off the bench , providing 20 points and 12 rebounds . The Hornets ( 37 - 42 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he collected 29 points , six rebounds and eight assists on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Jeremy Lamb led the bench with 22 points , five rebounds , four assists and three steals . Frank Kaminsky also played well off the bench , amassing 22 points , 13 rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Sunday against playoff hopefuls , with Toronto playing host to the hungry Miami Heat and Charlotte traveling to face the Detroit Pistons .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 122 - 114 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . This game had a lot on the line in terms of the Eastern_Conference playoffs , as this Orlando victory knocked Charlotte out of the playoffs . The Magic dominated throughout , as they held the lead for the final three quarters . Orlando 's offense was on point , as they shot 55 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was also big for the Magic , as they outrebounded the Hornets , 39 - 32 . The Magic ( 42 - 40 ) were led by Aaron Gordon , as he collected 27 points , seven rebounds and three assists . D.J . Augustin totaled 18 points and four boards . Evan Fournier accumulated 14 points , two rebounds and three assists . Terrence Ross was probably their best player , as he provided 35 points and six rebounds off the bench . The Hornets ( 39 - 43 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 43 points , two rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Miles Bridges accrued 18 points , five rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Jeremy Lamb led the bench with 22 points , eight rebounds and two assists while Dwayne Bacon generated 12 points , two rebounds and two assists . This loss knocked the Hornets out of playoff contention . As for Orlando , they landed the seven - seed in the east and will travel to face the Toronto Raptors in the opening round .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Utah Jazz , 92 - 84 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday evening . The first quarter started out with some back and forth action but slowed down to set the pace for the rest of the low - scoring game . The Jazz led , 22 - 19 , after one quarter and looked solid on their home court . However , the Grizzlies started the second quarter on a 60 run to take the lead . They controlled the game for most of the quarter and closed strong to take a , 47 - 46 , lead into halftime . The Grizzlies kept up their momentum in the third , as they started the quarter on with an 11 - 4 run , and held on to take a , 70 - 63 , lead heading into the final frame . The Jazz were not able to get it together and trailed by ten or more for much of the fourth quarter . On the other hand , the Grizzlies earned their second straight win in impressive fashion . Mike Conley led the Grizzlies with 23 points , seven rebounds , four assists and three steals , in 35 minutes of action . Marc Gasol also had a big night with 18 points , 13 rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . Shelvin Mack added 12 points , while Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 11 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Grizzlies shot 37 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 28 from deep . Jae Crowder was the high - point man for the Jazz with 15 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting , in 29 minutes off the bench . Donovan Mitchell tallied 14 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals , while Rudy Gobert finished with 11 points , 12 rebounds , two blocks , one assist and one steal . The Jazz shot 35 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 32 from long range . The Jazz ( 1 - 2 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 2 - 1 ) head to Sacramento to face the Kings on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 110 - 100 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening . The contest set up as a grind - it - out battle between two defensive - minded teams , especially with Donovan Mitchell ( hamstring ) out for the Jazz ( 4 - 4 ) . It ultimately played out according to script , with Utah jumping out to an early 31 - 29 first - quarter lead , an advantage they extended to 60 - 53 by halftime . However , the third quarter was pivotal , as Memphis outscored their hosts by a 30 - 18 margin . They then held on in the final 12 minutes , adding five more points to their edge and holding the Jazz to just five points over the final 3 ; 38 . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies with a game - high 28 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , five assists and one steal . Shelvin Mack led the bench with 19 points and added six rebounds and three assists . Marc Gasol generated a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , four steals and one block . Jaren Jackson , Jr. supplied 13 points . Garrett Temple registered 12 points , four rebounds and two steals . Ricky Rubio paced the Jazz with 22 points and he added 11 assists , two rebounds and one steal . Joe Ingles managed 19 points , three rebounds , two assists , one block and one steal . Jae Crowder totaled 18 points and six rebounds . Derrick Favors posted 12 points , six rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Rudy Gobert mustered nine points but also hauled in 16 rebounds . The Grizzlies next pay a visit to the Phoenix Suns on Sunday evening , while the Jazz visit the Denver Nuggets on Saturday night .
The visiting Toronto Raptors took down the Utah Jazz , 124 - 111 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday evening . Toronto ( 10 - 1 ) was facing an uphill battle , playing in the second half of a back - to - back and missing superstar forward Kawhi Leonard ( ankle ) . None of that seemed to matter , though , as the Raptors jumped out to a convincing lead from the get - go . Spurred by 57 percent team shooting , the Raptors delivered one of their best offensive nights of the season . Five different Toronto players scored 16 or more points , including four of the team 's starting five . All in all , it was a tough night for the Jazz ( 4 - 6 ) , whose normally strong defense seemed powerless to stop the red - hot Raptors . Utah did not help its case by failing to capitalize on its opportunities at the free - throw line , where the team shot an unfortunate 27 - of - 41 clip . All-Star Kyle Lowry continued his early - season tear , scoring 17 points to go with 11 assists in the win . Lowry is averaging a league - best 11 assists per game this season , well above his career high of 7 . Big man Serge Ibaka added another 17 points in a strong follow - up to his career - high 34 points on Sunday evening . Ibaka was a perfect 8 - of - 8 from the field after starting Sunday 's game shooting 14 - of - 14 . The Jazz , meanwhile , were nowhere near as fortunate offensively . Sharpshooting wing Joe Ingles had an off night , going just 3 - of - 13 from the field . The team shot just 44 percent from the field as a whole . Sixth man Alec Burks led the team with 22 points off the bench . On Wednesday , Utah will host the Dallas Mavericks , while the Raptors will travel to Sacramento to take on the Kings .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 117 - 102 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Jazz got out to a blistering start , as they poured in 30 points in the first quarter , while holding the Mavs to just 18 . They kept the pressure on in the second and pushed the lead to 21 , just five minutes into the quarter . The Mavs had no answer , as they went on to trail , 68 - 45 , at halftime . Mavericks managed to make a push in the third , including a 12 - 6 run , that cut the gap to 16 , halfway through the quarter . However , they would not get any closer than that in the quarter , as the Jazz led 99 - 83 entering the fourth . The Jazz did not give up though , as they picked it up again to start the fourth , cutting the gap to nine , just three minutes in . Despite the Mavericks ' effort , the Jazz would not give it up that easily , as they held on to earn their first home win of the season . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 23 points , seven assists , five rebounds and two steals , in 32 minutes . Rudy Gobert followed up with 17 points , 10 rebounds , four blocks , two assists and one steal , while Ricky Rubio tallied 10 points , 12 assists , five rebounds and three steals . The Jazz shot 49 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Luka Doncic led the Mavs with 24 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , six rebounds and two assists , in 35 minutes . Harrison Barnes followed up with 14 points and five rebounds , in 35 minutes , while Wesley Matthews chipped in 13 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal . The Mavericks shot 40 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 24 from long range . The Mavs ( 3 - 8 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Thunder on Saturday . The Jazz ( 5 - 6 ) play host to the Celtics on Friday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 123 - 115 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening . The first quarter started out close with the Jazz taking the early two - point advantage heading into the second . The Jazz stayed strong in the second and managed to take 58 - 51 lead into halftime . The Celtics could not find the answer in the third , as the Jazz quickly pushed their lead to 12 . The Jazz held on to their lead through the quarter , as they outscored the Celtics 35 - 29 in the quarter to take a 93 - 80 lead into the final frame . The Celtics made a push in the fourth , as they made it a five - point game with three minutes to go . However , Jae Crowder , the former Celtics player , came up huge down the stretch with a dunk and a three - pointer , to help the Jazz hold on for their second straight win . Joe Ingles led the Jazz with 27 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting , seven assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block , in 35 minutes . Donovan Mitchell followed up with 21 points on 5 - of - 14 shooting , five assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 33 minutes , while Jae Crowder added 20 points , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 56 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Terry Rozier led the way for the Celtics with 22 points , six rebounds and three assists , in 36 minutes . Jayson Tatum tallied 21 points , four assists , three rebounds and five steals , in 36 minutes , while Marcus Smart finished with 13 points , 10 assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 33 minutes off the bench . The Celtics shot 44 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 43 from long range . The Celtics ( 7 - 5 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Trail_Blazers in Portland on Sunday . The Jazz ( 6 - 6 ) head to Memphis to take on the Grizzlies on Monday .
The visiting Indiana Pacers blew out the Utah Jazz , 121 - 88 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday evening . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pacers ( 12 - 8 ) , who succeeded despite the absence of star guard Victor Oladipo ( knee ) . With Oladipo sidelined , the Pacers scored by committee , as seven players scored in double figures in the win . It was an altogether brilliant offensive night for Indiana , as the team shot 58 percent from the field and 9 - of - 18 from three - point range . The Jazz ( 9 - 12 ) , meanwhile , were missing their own star guard , as Donovan Mitchell sat out due to a rib contusion . Making up for Mitchell 's missing offense , however , did not prove easy for Utah . The team shot just 42 percent from the field in the loss . Doug McDermott scored a team - high 21 points off the bench for Indiana . Big man Domantas Sabonis had a double - double , finishing with 13 points and 10 rebounds . Point guard Darren Collison was just two points shy of another double - double , scoring eight points to go with 10 assists . The win snapped a quick two - game losing streak for the Pacers , who now sit at fourth place in the Eastern_Conference . The Jazz , meanwhile , saw only three double - digit scoring performances . Derrick Favors was the team 's leading scorer , despite putting up only 13 points . Joe Ingles scored another 10 points and also had a season - high five steals . The Pacers will travel to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Tuesday , while the Jazz will kick off a road trip with a visit to Brooklyn on Wednesday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the San_Antonio Spurs 139 - 105 at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday . The Jazz knocked down 20 three pointers as part of a 61 percent night as a unit from behind the arc and handed the Spurs a crushing defeat that was over late in the first quarter . The Spurs were unable to mount any comeback attempt as six Jazz players knocked down two - plus three pointers . All five Jazz ( 12 - 13 ) starters finished in double figures , and the bench went eight players deep . Quinn Snyder rotated the minutes across the 13 players with 10 of them getting at least 15 minutes of action . Kyle Korver has been a welcome edition after the trade that sent Alec Burks and a pair of picks to the Cavs , and was ever efficient in his 15 minutes where he scored 15 points on 3 - of - 4 shooting from deep . Donovan Mitchell went on to lead all scorers with 20 points . The Spurs ( 11 - 13 ) were unable to stop the barrage of three pointers , although they shot a respectable 49 percent from the floor . Jacob Poetl had the standout performance for San_Antonio and finished with 20 points and seven rebounds on 9 - of - 11 shooting in just 19 minutes of action . DeMar DeRozan only logged 24 minutes , while LaMarcus Aldridge registered just 22 minutes . Both players combined for 32 points . Next up , the Spurs play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Los_Angeles Lakers on Wednesday , while the Jazz host the Houston Rockets on Thursday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Miami Heat , 111 - 84 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday . It was a much - needed win for the Jazz ( 14 - 15 ) , who put together a dominant effort after losing back - to - back games to the Spurs and Thunder . Utah jumped out to an early lead and won the first quarter by a ridiculous 25 - point margin . From there , they never looked back and continued to take advantage of a struggling Miami team . Donovan Mitchell led the way with a game - high 21 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , while Derrick Favors came off the bench to drop 17 points and eight rebounds in just 19 minutes . Rudy Gobert added another double - double to his season total , putting up 10 points and 11 rebounds . Wednesday night , however , was not about Utah 's offensive output . Rather , it was about the team 's defensive effort , which has been missing all season . The Jazz forced the Heat ( 11 - 16 ) into shooting just 38 percent from the field and the 84 points Miami scored was the lowest amount a team has scored on Utah this season . It 's worth noting , however , that offensive struggles are nothing new for this Heat team , as they are the 22nd best scoring team in the NBA , and Wednesday night was no different . Not only did Miami shoot under 40 percent from the field , but visiting team was 14 - of - 24 ( 58 percent ) from the free throw line . Rodney McGruder led the way scoring for Miami with 16 points on 4 - of - 5 shooting from downtown , while Kelly Olynyk posted 14 points and eight rebounds in 28 minutes off the bench . Josh Richard was the only other Heat player to reach double figures with his 11 points .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 108 - 103 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Jazz were solid from the start , as they took a 24 - 21 lead after one . They held tight as the Warriors pushed through the second quarter , and managed to retain a one - point lead at halftime . The score stayed close during the third , while the Jazz came up with the edge once again , to push their lead to four at the start of the fourth quarter . The home team stayed focused down the stretch , as they pushed their lead to 10 early in the fourth , and despite the Warriors cutting the deficit to two , the Jazz would not relinquish the lead , and held on two end a two - game slide . Joe Ingles led the Jazz with 20 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , three rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 34 minutes . Rudy Gobert tallied 17 points , 15 rebounds , four blocks and one assist , while Jae Crowder tallied 18 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and one steal , off the bench . Donovan Mitchell finished with 17 points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block . Meanwhile , Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 32 points , three rebounds , three assists , three steals and a block , in 37 minutes . Kevin Durant tallied 30 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one block , in 36 minutes . Draymond Green finished with eight points , 12 rebounds , two steals and one assist . The Warriors shot 40 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 31 from deep . The Warriors ( 21 - 11 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Mavericks on Saturday . The Jazz ( 15 - 17 ) take on the Trail_Blazers in Portland on Friday .
The Utah Jazz took down the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 117 - 96 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday evening . Tuesday 's clash was the final of five Christmas-Day games around the league , and the Jazz ( 17 - 18 ) made quick work of it , jumping out to a double - digit lead in the first half . After leading by just two points with four minutes remaining in the second quarter , Utah went on a quick run to build a 12 - point run by halftime . Utah thrived thanks to its strong defensive effort , headlined by seven blocks from star center Rudy Gobert . Damian Lillard managed to score 16 first - half points to lead the Trail_Blazers ( 19 - 15 ) , but the rest of the team shot just 26 - of - 68 in the blowout loss . Gobert 's dominance extended beyond simply protecting the rim , as the 7 - foot center scored 18 points and grabbed a team - high 14 rebounds in the win . Utah saw seven double - digit scoring performances on Tuesday , including 15 points off the bench for Dante Exum and a team - high 19 points for sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell . Portland , meanwhile , shot just 39 percent from the field despite Lillard 's best efforts . The superstar point guard shot 9 - of - 21 en route to a team - high 20 points . His teammates , though , could not match his scoring output , as no other Portland player scored more than 12 points in Tuesday 's loss . The Trail_Blazers will take to the road for a visit to Golden_State on Thursday . Utah , meanwhile , will see a visit from the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers 113 - 95 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening . The Jazz got out to a solid start at home with a 32 - 26 lead after one quarter . They doubled down on the pressure in the second , as they outscored the visitors 30 - 15 in the quarter , to take a 62 - 41 lead by halftime . The Lakers picked it up in the third and managed to trim the deficit to 15 points , entering the final frame . However , the Jazz had other plans , as they held strong through the fourth quarter , to earn their second straight win . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 33 points on 14 - of - 24 shooting , nine assists , four rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 32 minutes . Derrick Favors finished with 15 points , 13 rebounds , one assist and one block , while Rudy Gobert added 12 points , 18 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . The Jazz shot 40 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 42 from deep . Michael Beasley led the Lakers with 17 points on 6 - of - 15 shooting , three rebounds , two steals , one assist and block , in 17 minutes off the bench . Brandon Ingram followed up with 15 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , five rebounds and one block , while Kyle Kuzma tallied 11 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Lakers shot 36 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 27 from long range . The Lakers ( 23 - 20 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Cavs on Sunday . The Jazz ( 22 - 21 ) play host to the Bulls on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 110 - 102 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . The Jazz got out to a great start at home , with a 10 - point lead after one quarter . However , the Bulls fought back in the second , where they outscored the Jazz by 12 , to take a two - point lead into halftime . The action went back - and - forth through the third , with the Jazz outscoring the visitors by one , to bring the deficit to one point at the start of the fourth . The Jazz were able to take control midway through the quarter and held on to earn their third straight win . This marks the seventh straight loss for the Bulls . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 34 points on 11 - of - 24 shooting , six rebounds , six assists and two blocks , in 37 minutes . Rudy Robert finished with 15 points , 16 rebounds , eight assists , two blocks and one steal , while Joe Ingles finished with 16 points , four assists and two rebounds . The Jazz shot 42 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 45 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 21 points on 7 - of - 21 shooting , three rebounds , three steals , one assist and one block , in 29 minutes . Lauri Markkanen followed up with 16 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting , five rebounds , two blocks and one assist , while Chandler Hutchison , Wayne Selden and Jabari Parker chipped in 11 points each . The Bulls ( 10 - 33 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Lakers in L.A. on Tuesday . The Jazz ( 23 - 21 ) play host to the Pistons on Monday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 100 - 94 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday . While there were only four ties and eight lead changes in this game , it came down to the wire . It was a defensive struggle throughout , as neither club cracked 40 percent shooting . That 's really indicative by the second half , as there were just 82 combined points . Utah ended the game strong , as they trailed 80 - 75 with nine minutes remaining and finished the game on a 25 - 14 run . Rebounding was the difference for the Jazz , as they outrebounded the Pistons , 55 - 38 . Getting to the free - throw line was also huge , with Utah hitting 26 - of - 36 and Detroit connecting on just 13 - of - 16 from the charity stripe . The Pistons ( 18 - 24 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he tallied 19 points , four rebounds and four assists . Andre Drummond collected 15 points , 13 rebounds and three steals . Reggie Jackson accrued 11 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals while Reggie Bullock amassed 11 points , two boards and two steals . The Jazz ( 24 - 21 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he accumulated 28 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Rudy Gobert was a presence , as he totaled 19 points , 25 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Joe Ingles generated 13 points , four rebounds and eight assists while Kyle Korver led the bench with 19 points . Both teams return to action on Wednesday against struggling opponents , with Detroit playing host to the Orlando Magic and Utah traveling to face the Los_Angeles Clippers .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 115 - 99 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday . Utah came into this game as a sizable favorite and this final scoreline shows just why . In fact , the Jazz led by nine points after the first quarter , by 24 points at the half , and by 33 points heading into the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was key , with Utah connecting on 52 percent from the field , 35 percent from three - point range and 93 percent from the free - throw line while Cleveland hit just 41 percent from the field , 29 percent from long range and 77 percent from the charity stripe . The Jazz also out - rebounded the Cavaliers , 48 - 37 , while out - assisting them , 33 - 16 . Utah did a ton of their damage down low , outscoring Cleveland in the paint , 60 - 44 . The Cavaliers ( 9 - 37 ) were led by Ante Zizic , as he amassed 15 points and 10 rebounds . Collin Sexton accrued 15 points , four rebounds and two assists . Cameron Payne led the bench with 14 points , four rebounds and three assists . Jordan Clarkson also played well off the bench , providing 13 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Jazz ( 26 - 21 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he tallied 24 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Rudy Gobert collected 19 points , 15 rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Royce O'Neale accumulated 16 points , 11 rebounds and five assists while Derrick Favors amassed 12 points and 10 boards . On deck for Cleveland is a road matchup versus the Denver Nuggets on Saturday . As for Utah , they return to action on Monday when they play host to the Portland Trail_Blazers .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Utah Jazz , 109 - 104 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday evening . Portland ( 29 - 19 ) seemed to have things locked up in the fourth after leading by double - digits late in the game . Utah ( 26 - 22 ) , however , was not ready to go down without a fight . After trailing by 11 with four minutes remaining , Donovan Mitchell scored Utah 's last 14 points and helped cut the deficit to as little as four . Mitchell 's scoring outburst was not enough , however , as Portland was able to hold off a three - pointer from Joe Ingles on Utah 's final possession to help seal the win . Damian Lillard was uncharacteristically cold in crunch time , missing two last - minute shots and a free - throw in the final 30 seconds . It ultimately did not matter , though , and Lillard still delivered a memorable performance . The All-Star point guard led Portland with 26 points , eight rebounds , and eight assists . The Trail_Blazers also got a gem from Jusuf Nurkic , who finished with 22 points , six assists , and five blocked shots . The win was Portland 's seventh in its last nine games . For Utah , Mitchell contributed a game - high 36 points . He shot 12 - of - 28 from the floor and 10 - of - 12 from the free - throw line while adding seven rebounds and five assists . Rudy Gobert added 10 points , 13 rebounds , and four blocked shots in the loss . The Trail_Blazers will visit the Oklahoma_City Thunder for another in - division matchup on Tuesday . Utah , meanwhile , will see Denver on Wednesday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Denver Nuggets , 114 - 108 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday . After scoring 36 points , including his team 's last 14 , on Monday , Donovan Mitchell followed up with a team - high 35 points in Wednesday 's win . The sophomore guard played a crucial role in the Jazz ( 27 - 22 ) offense , knocking down six of the team 's season - high 19 three - pointers . The win was Utah 's seventh in its last eight games . Denver ( 31 - 15 ) , however , did not go down without a fight . Superstar Nikola Jokic kept the team afloat with a dominant performance , scoring 28 points to go with 21 rebounds and seven assists . It was not enough for the win , though , as Denver shot just 8 - of - 27 from beyond the arc . The Jazz also saw strong play from Joe Ingles , who had eight assists and knocked down four three - pointers . Ingles finished with 14 points . Reigning Defensive Player of the Year Rudy Gobert could do little to stop Jokic , but he made his presence felt , blocking three shots and grabbing 10 rebounds . Off the bench , Will Barton delivered an impressive 22 points and nine rebounds for Denver . Save for Jokic and Barton , however , it was not the team 's best night . Veteran All-Star Paul Millsap struggled to make anything happen , going 1 - of - 8 from the floor for just two points . On Friday , Denver will host the Phoenix Suns while Utah will see the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 106 - 102 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening . The Jazz got out to a strong start at home , with a 31 - 24 lead after one quarter . The Timberwolves tightened up in the second , but could not make a dent in the lead , as they matched the Jazz for 21 points each in the quarter . The Jazz came out on fire in the third quarter , where they outscored the visitors by 14 , to take a 21 - point lead into the final frame . However , the Timberwolves rallied hard in the fourth , outscoring the Jazz 33 - 16 in the quarter , but despite their best shot , it was not enough , as the Jazz held on for their second straight win . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 24 points on 7 - of - 24 shooting , 11 assists , seven rebounds , one block and one steal , in 38 minutes . Rudy Gobert followed up with 18 points , 16 rebounds , four blocks , two assists and two steals , while Kyle Korver chipped in 16 points , five rebounds and two assists , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 39 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 41 from long range . Meanwhile , Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves with 33 points , 10 rebounds , four assists , three blocks and one steal , in 28 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 21 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , while Jerryd Bayless added 11 points , eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . The T-Wolves shot 42 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from deep . The Jazz ( 28 - 22 ) and the Timberwolves ( 24 - 25 ) will have a rematch in Minnesota on Sunday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Utah Jazz , 125 - 98 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . The Rockets got out to a good start on the road , as they held a 31 - 27 advantage after one quarter . The Jazz battled back to take a slight edge for the early part of the second , but the Rockets took over in the final six minutes before half and earned a 63 - 50 lead by halftime . The Rockets carried the momentum into the second half , where they outscored the Jazz by nine , to take a 22 - point lead into the final frame . The Rockets outscored the Jazz 34 - 29 in the fourth to snap a two - game losing streak . James Harden led the Rockets with 43 points on 12 - of - 22 shooting , 12 rebounds , six steals , five assists and four blocks , in 39 minutes . Gerald Green came up large off the bench , with 25 points , four rebounds , an assist and a block , while Kenneth Faried finished with 16 points , 12 rebounds and one block . The Rockets shot 46 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 39 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz , with 26 points , nine assists , six rebounds and one steal , in 36 minutes . Rudy Gobert finished with 10 points , 13 rebounds , two blocks , one assist and one steal , while Royce O'Neale added 10 points , six rebounds , off the bench . The Jazz shot just 36 percent from the field , and 11 - of - 41 from long range , as they allowed the Rockets to earn 15 steals against them . The Jazz ( 30 - 24 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Suns on Wednesday , after the Rockets ( 30 - 22 ) take on the Suns in Phoenix on Monday .

The kept the momentum as they pushed their lead to double digits early in the second , and held to take a 10 - point lead into halftime . The Suns came out strong in the third and made it a five - point game , however , the Jazz pulled back ahead to take a 79 - 71 lead into the final frame . The Jazz went off in the fourth , where they outscored the visitors by 20 , to solidify their 17th home win of the season . This marks the 12th straight loss for Phoenix . The Utah Jazz defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 125 - 105 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday afternoon . The Jazz ( 32 - 24 ) were already running hot coming into the conference showdown , and their chances of extending their strong stretch of play were already higher coming in due to the confirmed absence of Rudy Gay with an ankle issue . However the Spurs ( 32 - 26 ) were competitive early , building a 24 - 23 first - quarter advantage . The game began turning in the second , when Utah was able to wipe out their tiny deficit and build a 14 - point halftime lead . The visitors shaved three points off the advantage in the third , but the hosts put any thoughts of a full - fledged comeback to rest by going on a 39 - 30 run over the final 12 minutes . The rebounding advantage for the Jazz was particularly pronounced , as they won the battle of the boards by a 52 - 36 margin . DeMar DeRozan paced the Spurs with 23 points , adding five assists , two rebounds and one steal . LaMarcus Aldridge generated a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one block . Patty Mills supplied 14 points , five assists and four rebounds . Davis Bertans and Marco Belinelli had matching 11 - point contributions . Jakob Poeltl drew the start at center and furnished eight points , seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 23 points , supplementing them with five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Rudy Gobert posted a 21 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and two blocks . Royce O'Neale mustered 17 points , five rebounds and one assist . Ricky Rubio churned out 16 points , six rebounds and six assists . Derrick Favors and Joe Ingles provided 11 points apiece , with Favors also notably hauling down 10 rebounds . The Spurs next pay a visit to the Memphis Grizzlies on Tuesday night , while the Jazz tangle with the Golden_State Warriors at Oracle_Arena on that same evening .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 125 - 109 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday . While this game remained competitive throughout , a late run by Utah helped them capture a lopsided victory . In fact , the Jazz went on a 21 - 7 run in the guts of the fourth quarter to take a 17 - point lead with five minutes remaining . While it was n't a wire - to - wire win , Utah held the lead for the final three quarters . Rebounding was key for the Jazz , as they outrebounded the Mavericks , 53 - 42 . Free-throw shooting was also critical , with Utah connecting on 29 - of - 33 and Dallas hitting just 14 - of - 18 . The Mavericks ( 26 - 33 ) had to play without Luka Doncic ( ankle ) yet again , as they were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , who tallied 21 points , five rebounds and four assists . Dirk Nowitzki got a rare start and totaled 15 points and two boards . Jalen Brunson accrued 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Trey Burke led the bench with 20 points , seven rebounds and three assists . The Jazz ( 33 - 26 ) were led by Ricky Rubio , as he collected 25 points , four rebounds and five assists . The Utah Jazz defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 111 - 105 , on Wednesday at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena . The Jazz ( 34 - 26 ) , uncharacteristically , got off to a slow start on their home floor Wednesday night , but thanks to a commanding second - half performance where they outscored Los_Angeles by 13 points , Utah was able to nab its fourth straight home victory . It was another monster night for Donovan Mitchell , who scored a game - high 32 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting to go along with four rebounds and four assists in 36 minutes . Rudy Gobert also added another double - double to his season total , posting 20 points and 13 rebounds on top of four blocked shots . Six Jazz players , including all five of the starters , managed to score in double figures in what was a complete team comeback effort . As for the Clippers ( 34 - 29 ) , it was fairly surprising how they were able to keep the score close in Wednesday 's game given how poorly they shot the ball from the floor . Los_Angeles shot a miserable 5 - of - 26 ( 19 percent ) from behind the arc and 39 percent from the field overall . What ended up keeping them in the contest was their excellent free throw shooting , as the team made 26 of its 30 attempts from the charity stripe . The veterans would lead the way scoring for the Clippers , with Danilo Gallinari and Lou Williams each pouring in 18 points , but like the rest of their teammates , they did most of the damage at the free throw line . The two combined to shoot a miserable 8 - of - 32 from the field but were 19 - of - 21 from the line .

The Bucks jumped out to a 16 - 3 lead just four minutes into the game contest , however , the Jazz rallied back to make it a three - point game by the end of the first quarter . The Bucks came out strong in the third , tying it up at 55 , just minutes into the quarter . They pushed on to lead for the rest of the quarter , outscoring the Jazz by 12 , to take a five - point lead into the fourth . The Bucks pushed their lead to 17 , early in the fourth , but the Jazz battled back , to tie it up at 97 , with four minutes left . The Jazz kept it up down the stretch and held on to earn their fourth straight win . The Pelicans tightened it up in the second , but could not make a dent in the deficit , as they only matched the Jazz for points in the quarter , and trailed by nine at halftime . The Pelicans came out strong in the third and made it a two - point game with just under five minutes left in the quarter , but the Jazz pushed their lead back to six points by the end of the quarter . The Jazz carried the momentum into the fourth , where they pushed their lead to 14 , within the first four minutes . However , the Pelicans rallied and managed to take a 106 - 105 lead , with four minutes left in the contest . The Pelicans did not look back from there , as they outscored they held the advantage the rest of the way , to close out their third straight win . The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Utah Jazz , 98 - 89 , on Monday at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena The Thunder ( 41 - 26 ) were simply not going to be denied on the final game of their four - game road trip Monday night . They threw punches early in one of the hardest arena to earn a win , and the team never looked back after opening up a 13 - point lead in the first 24 minutes . And on a night where Oklahoma_City was n't getting much going offensively , it turned to its defense to carry them through all 48 minutes . MVP candidate Paul George optimized that , as while he shot just 2 - of - 8 from the field and failed to hit a three , he recorded three steals and a blocked shot . George finished with 14 points and 11 rebounds , but it was the point guards who shined offensively for the Thunder on Monday night . Russell Westbrook score 23 points to go along with 11 rebounds and eight assists , while Dennis Schroder came off the bench to score a team - high 24 points on top of seven rebounds and three assists . As for the Jazz ( 37 - 29 ) , with Monday 's loss , they have now dropped two straight home games after rattling five wins in a row on their home floor . They still hold an impressive 21 - 12 record at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena , but it was the first time since Oct. 22 , the second and third games of the regular season , that Utah dropped two games in a row at home . It was just an overall forgettable night for the Jazz , who shot a miserable 36 percent from the field . Donovan Mitchell scored a game - high 25 points but shot just 8 - of - 22 from the floor . Royce O'Neal added 17 points and eight rebounds , while Rudy Gobert posted a double - double of 15 points and 12 rebounds to go along with two blocks . Utah 's bench accounted for just 22 points Monday night .
The Utah Jazz took down the Minnesota Timberwolves , 120 - 100 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Thursday evening . The Jazz ( 39 - 29 ) cruised to victory on Thursday , continuing its strong play from its win over Phoenix on Wednesday . Utah maintained strong efficiency , shooting over 49 percent from the floor and knocking down 13 three - pointers . Minnesota ( 32 - 37 ) could not keep up , shooting a dismal 5 - of - 24 from three - point range in the loss . Utah 's hard - nosed defense also kept Minnesota at bay in the paint . The Jazz combined to block eight shots in Thursday 's win . Donovan Mitchell scored a team - high 24 points in the win . Mitchell 's strong play was complemented by double - doubles from big men Rudy Gobert and Derrick Favors . Gobert finished with 10 points and 13 rebounds , while Favors shot 8 - of - 12 for 17 points and 11 boards . Minnesota , meanwhile , saw a lone bright spot in the strong play of big man Karl-Anthony Towns . Towns , who had been averaging 35 points per game since the All-Star break , came up big once again , scoring 26 points and grabbing 12 rebounds . He was the only Minnesota player to score more than 14 points , with Andrew Wiggins shooting a suboptimal 6 - of - 17 from the floor . Utah will host the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday , while the Timberwolves next suit up in Houston on Sunday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Phoenix Suns at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Jazz ( 44 - 30 ) began separating after building a modest 26 - 21 first - quarter lead , as they held a 19 - point edge by halftime . While the Suns ( 17 - 58 ) were able to make a five - point dent in their deficit during the third , Utah left no doubt as to the outcome by outscoring Phoenix , 37 - 18 , over the final 12 minutes . Of their multiple statistical advantages , the home squad enjoyed the biggest in the scoring column , as they posted a 56 percent success rate while limiting the visitors to 41 percent shooting . However , Devin Booker had an eye - popping final line for the Suns , scoring 59 of the team 's 92 points while adding four rebounds , four assists and one steal . No other Suns player even scored in double digits , with Deandre Ayton coming closest with nine points and adding seven rebounds , two steals and one block . Troy Daniels compiled seven points , five rebounds and one steal . Jimmer Fredette furnished six points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Dragan Bender and Elie Okobo each posted four points . Rudy Gobert paced the Jazz with a 27 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . The Utah Jazz cruised past the Los_Angeles Lakers , 115 - 100 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday . It was a clean victory for the Jazz ( 45 - 30 ) , who led for the entire game after scoring the first basket . Utah shot an efficient 49 percent from the field in the win while limiting Los_Angeles ( 33 - 41 ) to just 38 percent from the floor . The Lakers , who were without LeBron James ( rest ) , struggled to find any signs of life offensively . The team shot just 9 - of - 27 from beyond the arc and 70 percent at the free - throw line in the loss . Rudy Gobert was the top scorer for Utah with 22 points . Gobert also tallied 11 rebounds and three blocks . Joe Ingles scored an additional 11 points for the Jazz while tallying a season - high 14 assists . Ingles ' strong facilitation helped Utah rack up 33 team assists by the night 's end . The Lakers were led by 21 points from sophomore guard Kyle Kuzma . JaVale McGee recorded his fifth straight double - double with 16 points , 13 rebounds , and two blocks . However , the two strong games were not enough to mask some other poor performances for the Lakers . Rajon Rondo shot just 1 - of - 11 en route to three points , while Lance Stephenson added 10 points on only 3 - of - 11 shooting . Utah will host the Washington Wizards on Friday , while Los_Angeles will see the Charlotte Hornets .

The contest got out to a high - scoring start , but the Jazz were up to the test , as they took a 39 - 30 lead after one quarter . The Jazz stayed in control through the second , and while the Wizards managed to make it a four - point game with two minutes left in the quarter , the Jazz rallied to push their lead back to eight by halftime . The Wizards came out strong in the third began chipping away at the deficit . They outscored the Jazz by six in the quarter , to trail by just two going into the final frame . The Jazz got out to a good start in the fourth and pushed their lead back to nine . However , the Wizards mounted a run and tied it up at 110 , with 4:41 to go . The Wizards kept it close , as it was tied at 116 , with 2:20 left , but the Jazz pulled ahead one last time and managed to hold on for their fourth straight win . The Utah Jazz defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 111 - 102 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday night . The Jazz ( 47 - 30 ) looked like they were on their way to cakewalk win in the first half , as they carried a 52 - 39 lead into intermission . Utah showed no signs of slowing in the third , as they added another two points to their advantage by outscoring the Hornets ( 35 - 42 ) by a 27 - 25 margin during the period . Charlotte put up plenty of points after the game was essentially out of reach , leading to a final score that belied the home squad 's dominance . Kemba Walker was essentially a one - man wrecking crew for the Hornets , leading the way with 47 points and adding five rebounds and three assists . Jeremy Lamb was a distant second with 23 points , and he supplemented them with four rebounds and one steal . Willy Hernangomez totaled 15 points , eight boards , two assists , three steals and one block . No other Charlotte player scored in double digits , and both Marvin Williams and Miles Bridges curiously turned in scoreless , five - rebound efforts . Donovan Mitchell paced the Jazz with 25 points , adding five assists , three rebounds and four steals . Ricky Rubio generated a 20 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included two assists . Rudy Gobert churned out an 18 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and three blocks . Joe Ingles and Thabo Sefolosha netted 15 and 14 points , respectively . The Hornets next pay a visit to the New_Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night , while the Jazz tangle with the Phoenix Suns in a road matchup on Wednesday evening as well .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Sacramento Kings , 119 - 98 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday night . The playoff - bound Jazz ( 49 - 30 ) essentially sealed their 12th win in the last 13 games with a 70 - point first half . Utah was playing just as well on the opposite side of the floor , limiting the Kings ( 39 - 41 ) to 44 points . While Utah 's offense was more subdued in the second half while the reserves saw heavy minutes , the cushion they 'd already built up led to an easy win . The Jazz did see Ricky Rubio exit the game after logging just five minutes due to a quadriceps bruise . Buddy Hield led the way for the Kings with 17 points , adding three rebounds and one steal . Marvin Bagley III generated a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Yogi Ferrell matched Bagley 's scoring total and dished out five assists . Nemanja Bjelica and Bogdan Bogdanovic posted 10 points apiece . Donovan Mitchell and Grayson Allen co - led the Jazz with matching 23 - point tallies . Mitchell also dished out nine assists and five rebounds . Rudy Gobert contributed a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , four blocks and three steals . Joe Ingles poured in 17 points as well and added seven assists , four rebounds and one steal . The Kings head back home to take on the Pelicans on Sunday night , while the Jazz pay a visit to the Los_Angeles Lakers on Sunday evening as well .
The visiting Utah Jazz defeated the Sacramento Kings at Golden_1_Center , 123 - 117 , on Wednesday evening . Sacramento ( 0 - 1 ) started the season opener in dominant fashion , beginning the game on an 18 - 4 run . Utah ( 10 ) quickly answered back , though , cutting the deficit to just four points by the end of the first quarter . It soon became Utah 's game to lose , as the trio of Donovan Mitchell , Rudy Gobert , and Joe Ingles helped the Jazz rack up 68 points by halftime . Utah 's efficiency was a contributing factor in their strong offensive play , as the team shot over 51 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range . Mitchell was the game 's top scorer , finishing with 24 points on 8 - of - 21 shooting . He did , though , commit five turnovers on the night . Ingles , meanwhile , scored 22 points and shot 9 - of - 12 from the field . He added four steals on the defensive end . Of course , the story of the night on the defensive end was Rudy Gobert . The reigning Defensive Player of the Year finished the game with 15 rebounds and blocked three shots . On Sacramento 's side , all eyes were on second overall pick Marvin Bagley , who made his NBA debut in the game . Despite his status as a top pick , Bagley came off the bench and played only 12 minutes in his first appearance . He made the most of those minutes , though , scoring six points and grabbing five rebounds . Center Willie Cauley-Stein scored a team - high 23 points in 38 minutes of play . The former Kentucky star also dished out four assists and blocked two shots . Sophomore point guard De'Aaron Fox added 21 points and dished out seven assists as well . On Friday , the Kings will visit New_Orleans while Utah will host the defending champion Golden_State Warriors .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 97 - 92 , at Golden_1_Center on Wednesday evening . Things got interesting towards the end of the game , as Memphis was able to trim a double - digit lead down to just five by the end of regulation . It wound up being too little and too late for the Grizzlies ( 2 - 2 ) , though , as the team was unable to mount a full comeback by the time the clock expired . Perhaps the bigger loss for Memphis , however , was an injury to All-Star center Marc Gasol . The veteran big man suffered a shoulder injury that sent him to the locker room in the fourth quarter . He did not return , and the extent of the injury remains to be determined . Sacramento ( 2 - 3 ) , meanwhile , saw strong production from its young players in the win . De'Aaron Fox contributed 21 points , eight rebounds , and six assists . Fox had one of the night 's biggest highlights with an emphatic breakaway slam . His backcourt partner , Buddy Hield , led the team with 23 points . Sacramento also saw strong play from its young big men . Willie Cauley-Stein scored 15 points to go with 10 rebounds , five of which came on offense . For the Grizzlies , veteran point guard Mike Conley led the team with 27 points . He added six rebounds and five assists . Before exiting with his injury , Gasol had notched 10 points as well as nine rebounds and three blocks , both team highs . The 33 - year - old center entered Wednesday 's game averaging 15 points and 9 rebounds per game . Next on the schedule for the Kings is a matchup with the Washington Wizards on Friday . Memphis , meanwhile , hosts the Phoenix Suns and reigning number one pick DeAndre Ayton on Saturday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 121 - 110 , at Golden_1_Center on Friday evening . The Timberwolves got out to a strong start on the road and managed to take a two - point lead into the second quarter . The score stayed closed through the second , while the Kings outscored the Timberwolves by four in the quarter , to take a 63 - 61 lead into halftime . The Kings got out ot a good start in the third and quickly pushed their lead to eight . They hung on and outscored the Timberwolves in the quarter , to expand their lead to 92 - 81 , heading into the final frame . The Kings kept up the momentum in the fourth , as they pushed their lead to 12 mid way through the quarter . However , the Timberwolves were not done , as they battled back to make it a two - point game with three minutes to go . The Kings made one final push with an impressive 13 - 4 run to close the game and earn their win third home win of the season . Willie Cauley-Stein led the Kings with 25 points , five rebounds and one assist , in 28 minutes . Iman Shumpert added 17 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal , while De'Aaron Fox tallied 16 points , 10 assists , four rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 33 minutes . The kings shot 45 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 32 from long range . Meanwhile , Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves with 39 points , 19 rebounds , one assist and one block , in 39 minutes . Derrick Rose followed up with 21 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal , while Jimmy Butler added 13 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and two steals , in 41 minutes . The Timberwolves shot 42 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 25 from deep . The Timberwolves ( 4 - 9 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nets on Monday . The Kings ( 7 - 5 ) play host to the Lakers on Saturday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 104 - 99 , at Golden_1_Center on Monday evening . It was the fourth and final game in a home stand for the Kings ( 8 - 6 ) , who got back on track after going 1 - 2 in their last three outings . Bolstered by six double - digit scoring performances , Sacramento continued its unexpectedly hot start to the season by holding on to the narrow win . The Kings entered the fourth quarter leading by only one point , but managed to push the lead to seven within the final minute of regulation to escape against a tough San_Antonio squad . Bogdan Bogdanovic led Sacramento with 22 points in only 24 minutes of action . Center Willie Cauley-Stein finished with a double - double , tallying 13 points and 13 rebounds . Point guard De'Aaron Fox also impressed , scoring 19 points including a game - clinching jumper with 17 seconds remaining . San_Antonio ( 7 - 5 ) , meanwhile , struggled to control the ball in the loss . The Spurs committed 15 turnovers , contributing largely to a 20 - 9 Sacramento advantage in fast - break points . Still , San_Antonio kept the game close thanks to strong performances from its stars . DeMar DeRozan led the team with 23 points and eight assists , while LaMarcus Aldridge finished with a whopping 18 rebounds and three blocks . The Spurs will continue on the road , traveling to Phoenix on Wednesday . The Kings , meanwhile , embark on a road trip of their own , visiting Memphis on Thursday followed by a trip to Houston on Friday .

The Jazz ( 9 - 11 ) came into the contest seeking some redemption after having been embarrassed on multiple occasions over the last several games . They saved their best for the fourth quarter , however , when they put the game away by compiling 42 points . The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 133 - 121 , at Golden_1_Center on Thursday . LA ( 15 - 6 ) cruised to its ninth win in ten games on Thursday , shooting over 55 percent from the floor en route to a comfortable win . Six Clippers players scored in double digits in the game , and the team dished out 25 assists while committing only 10 turnovers . Sacramento ( 10 - 11 ) , on the other hand , fell behind with its lesser offensive play . The Kings hit only seven three - pointers and , despite scoring 121 points , could not match the Clippers ' high degree of scoring efficiency . Strong front court play has been a hallmark of the Clippers ' success thus far . This was the case again on Thursday , as Tobias Harris and Montrezl Harrell combined for 52 points on 19 - of - 27 shooting . Forward Danilo Gallinari pitched in another 14 points and came away with three steals on the defensive end . Sacramento , meanwhile , saw another big game from rookie big man Marvin Bagley . Bagley posted a double - double , tallying 18 points and 10 rebounds . Bogdan Bogdanovic was the team 's top scorer , pouring in 26 points . Next up for Sacramento is a visit from the Indiana Pacers on Saturday . The Clippers , meanwhile , will travel to Dallas to face DeAndre Jordan and the Mavericks on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 111 - 110 , at Golden_1_Center on Saturday evening . The Pacers got out to a good start on the road , with an , 18 - 13 , lead mid way through the first quarter , and held on to take a , 30 - 26 , lead into the second . The Kings were ready to strike in the second , as they quickly grabbed a three - point lead . They managed to outscore the Pacers , 32 - 30 , through the quarter , but trailed , 60 - 58 , at halftime . Neither team would concede an inch in the third , as they both came out strong and matched each other for 31 points each , so that the Pacers led , 91 - 89 , entering the final frame . The back - and - forth contest continued right down to the wire , with the Pacers again up by two , this time with just 22 seconds left on the clock . However , the Kings fought until the buzzer , as they were able to earn the game - winning basket in the final seconds , thanks to a put - back jam by Willie Cauley-Stein . The win ends a three - game slide for the Kings , and marks the second straight loss for Indiana . Bogdan Bogdanovic led the Kings with 20 points , six assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 31 minutes off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein came up huge with 17 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Buddy Hield added 18 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Kings shot 45 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Bojan Bogdanovic led the Pacers with 27 points , three rebounds and two steals , in 37 minutes . Darren Collison tallied 11 points , 12 assists , six steals and four rebounds , while Myles Turner finished with 14 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and three blocks . The Pacers ( 13 - 10 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Bulls on Tuesday . The Kings ( 11 - 11 ) take on the Suns in Phoenix on Tuesday .

It was the highest - scoring game of the season for the Kings ( 15 - 12 ) , whose strong offensive play was a product of seven different double - digit scoring performances . The Kings carried the momentum into the fourth , and pulled ahead to a 112 - 105 lead four minutes into the quarter . They held their lead and pushed it to 10 , with three minutes left in the contest . However , the Warriors flipped the switch and closed the game on a 17 - 2 run , to sink the feisty home team . Paul George , Russell Westbrook , and Steven Adams each delivered an impressive importance , with George dropping 43 points to lead the Thunder to victory . 13 of those points came in the fourth quarter , where OKC managed to take control of the game . After building its lead to 10 points late in the third quarter , a quick start to the final period helped the Thunder push past the Kings ( 16 - 15 ) . George added 12 rebounds and seven assists in his season - best night . Westbrook , meanwhile , recorded a triple - double , scoring 19 points to go with 11 rebounds and a whopping 17 assists . He also extended his league lead in steals , grabbing six in total . Steven Adams , meanwhile , set a new season high in rebounding , finishing with 23 on the night . Nine of those rebounds came on the offensive end . For Sacramento , De'Aaron Fox continued his breakout season with 28 points and 12 assists . Buddy Hield , meanwhile , scored a season - high 37 points in the loss . The team had its share of shooting struggles , knocking down just 43 percent of its shots and 22 - of - 33 attempts from the free - throw line . The Thunder will visit Utah on Saturday , while Sacramento will host the Memphis Kings on Friday .

The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Sacramento Kings in overtime , 113 - 108 , at Golden One Center on Tuesday . There were 10 ties and nine lead changes in this game , as it took an overtime session to determine a winner . This was a true tale of two halves , as Portland led by 14 at the half , with Sacramento responding with a 53 - 39 second half to force overtime . With that said , Portland finished regulation on an 11 - 2 run across the final three minutes to get the game into the extra session . The Kings could n't get anything going in overtime after that choke , as they went just 1 - of - 11 from the field . Rim protection was the difference for the Trail_Blazers , as they won the defensive rebounding differential , 46 - 39 while out - blocking the Kings , 10 - 4 . Free-throw shooting was also huge , with Portland connecting on 26 - of - 30 and Sacramento hitting just 9 - of - 12 . The Trail_Blazers ( 22 - 16 ) got one of Jusuf Nurkic 's best performances of his career , as he collected 24 points , 23 rebounds , seven assists , five steals and five blocks . Damian Lillard led the team in scoring , tallying 25 points , six rebounds and six assists . Al-Farouq Aminu totaled 13 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two blocks while Seth Curry led the bench with 18 points and three steals . The Kings ( 19 - 18 ) were led by Buddy Hield , as he accrued 27 points , five rebounds and four assists . Nemanja Bjelica amassed 14 points , 16 rebounds and two assists . Bogdan Bogdanovic led their bench with 19 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . On deck for Sacramento is another home game against the Denver Nuggets on Thursday . As for Portland , they play host to the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Friday for their next outing .

The Sacramento Kings defeated the Detroit Pistons , 112 - 102 , at Golden_1_Center on Thursday . The Kings ( 21 - 21 ) made light work of the visiting team Thursday night and have now won two of their last three games . They opened up a 13 - point lead in the first quarter and continued to build on their lead before a late run by the Pistons ( 17 - 23 ) made the final margin a tad smaller . Seven different Kings players managed to score in double figures , with Buddy Hield leading the way with a game - high 18 points . Frontcourt up - and - comers Willie Cauley-Stein and Harry Giles each added 14 points , while Iman Shumpert poured in 13 in just 22 minutes . As a team , it was a very impressive shooting night from the Kings , with the team hitting 41 percent of its three - point attempts and shooting 51 percent from the field overall . As for the Pistons , it was their second loss in as many nights and their fourth loss in a row overall . They were without star forward Blake Griffin ( rest ) on Thursday night , and their struggles without him were evident . Stanley Johnson came off the bench to be the team 's high scorer with just 16 points , while Reggie Bullock and rookie Bruce Brown added 15 points . Andre Drummond was the only other player to reach double figures for Detroit , scoring 12 points and grabbing 11 rebounds . Overall , it was a really poor shooting night for the Pistons , as they shot 29 percent from behind the arc and a miserable 43 percent from the field . They have now lost seven of their last eight games and continue to fall further out of the playoff picture .
