The Sacramento Kings defeated the New_York Knicks , 118 - 108 , at Golden_1_Center on Monday . It was essentially a wire - to - wire victory for the Kings , as they jumped out to a nine - point lead early and never let go . In doing so , Sacramento put an end to a three - game losing streak . Buddy Hield was again terrific in the winning effort , shooting 9 - of - 18 from the field on his way to scoring a team - high 28 points in addition to six rebounds and seven assists across 35 minutes . Harrison Barnes was close behind , shooting 7 - of - 13 from the field en route to a double - double of 22 points and 10 rebounds . Meanwhile , Harry Giles continues to show impressive flashes , as he posted 17 points and seven rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench Monday . As for the Knicks , it was their third straight loss after they surprisingly rattled off two straight victories . They did , however , get a very impressive performance from rookie guard Allonzo Trier , as the former Arizona standout came off the bench to score a game - high 29 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting from the floor on top of eight rebounds . And while Trier was getting to the free throw line at will , he was n't able to convert at a high level , going just 10 - of - 15 ( 67 percent ) from the free throw line . This was a problem for the team as a whole Monday night , and may have cost the Knicks ' a chance at the victory , with New_York shooting 18 - of - 28 ( 64 percent ) from the charity stripe .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 129 - 102 , at Golden_1_Center on Sunday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , with the Kings taking a one - point lead after one quarter . The Kings turned it up in the second , where they outscored the Bulls by 15 , to take a 56 - 40 lead into halftime . They kept up the heat in the third , as they poured in 43 points , 12 more than the visitors , giving the Kings a 28 - point lead heading into the final frame . The Kings pushed their lead to 30 , mid way though the fourth . The Hawks kept fighting but could not stop the Kings from ending a three - game slide . De'Aaron Fox led the Kings with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 25 minutes . Buddy Hield followed up with 16 points , four assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block , while Harrison Barnes chipped in 15 points , two rebounds and one assist . The Kings shot 52 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 18 points , three rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block , in 29 minutes . Lauri Markkanen added 11 points , three rebounds , two assists and a block , while Shaquille Harrison chipped in 11 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 19 minutes off the bench . The Bulls ( 19 - 52 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Suns in Phoenix on Monday . The Kings ( 34 - 35 ) play host to the Nets on Tuesday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 116 - 100 , at Golden_1_Center on Thursday evening . The Mavericks ( 28 - 44 ) saw their offensive woes continue on Thursday , as the team shot a dismal 39 percent en route to the double - digit loss . While Dallas hung tight in the first half , Sacramento ( 35 - 36 ) delivered a strong 63 second - half points to secure the victory . Buddy Hield set the tone with his game - high 29 points , which included seven of Sacramento 's 13 made three - pointers . The loss drops Dallas to just 2 - 13 since the All-Star break , while Sacramento now sits 6 games back from the final spot in the Western_Conference playoffs . Marvin Bagley III also impressed for the Kings , finishing with 22 points and 12 rebounds off the bench . The rookie star shot 8 - of - 16 and blocked four shots in the compelling win . Bagley and Hield were two of the five Sacramento players to score in double figures in Thursday 's tilt . Dallas 's own rookie star , Luka Doncic , did not fare nearly as well . The Rookie of the Year hopeful shot just 4 - of - 19 from the field and 3 - of - 5 from the free - throw line on Thursday . Doncic did , however , make an impact with his rebounding , as he grabbed 10 boards despite the poor offensive showing . Justin Jackson led the way for the Mavs with 19 points . The Mavericks will remain in California to take on the Golden_State Warriors on Saturday . The Kings , meanwhile , will gear up for a tilt with the last - place Phoenix Suns .
The visiting Houston Rockets blew out the Sacramento Kings , 130 - 105 , at Golden_1_Center on Tuesday . Houston ( 50 - 28 ) wasted no time on Tuesday , jumping out to a double - digit lead in the first quarter . The Rockets ' offense was characteristically dominant , knocking down 26 three - pointers while shooting 49 percent from the field . The Rockets led for the remainder of regulation , as Sacramento ( 38 - 40 ) was unable to cut the deficit by more than a few possessions at a time . The Kings finished the game shooting 43 percent while making only seven three - pointers . Reigning MVP James Harden headlined the win with 36 points for the Rockets . The big scoring night came on the heels of a 50 - point triple - double in Houston 's last contest . Harden also dished out 10 assists on Tuesday . The win broke a tie for third place in the Western_Conference and moved Houston ahead of the Portland Trail Blazers . The Kings , meanwhile , saw 20 points from shooting guard Buddy Hield . Hield 's four three - pointers led the team . Off the bench , Marvin Bagley III contributed 19 points and eight rebounds . The loss keeps the Kings in ninth place , where they will likely finish the season after having been mathematically eliminated from playoff contention earlier this week . The Rockets will visit the Los_Angeles Clippers on Wednesday . Sacramento , meanwhile , will gear up for a tilt with the Cavaliers on Thursday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Phoenix Suns , 117 - 104 , on Thursday at Golden_1_Center . It was a wire - to - wire victory for the Kings ( 39 - 40 ) on Thursday , who jumped out to an early lead and maintained it for the entire game besides the 14 seconds in the second quarter when it was tied . The Cavaliers ( 19 - 60 ) did an adequate job of keeping it within striking distance for most of the contest , but Sacramento was ultimately able to pull away in the final five minutes . Buddy Hield had it going from downtown throughout the contest , going 5 - of - 11 from deep on his way to a game - high 23 points in 29 minutes , while Bogdan Bogdanovic came off the bench to hit four threes of his own on his way to 18 points in 28 reserve minutes . Point guard De'Aaron Fox did most of his work from inside the arc Thursday night and finished with a double - double of 16 points and 10 assists . It was a very fluid and efficient offensive game for the Kings as a whole , as they dished out 28 assists to just six turnovers on the night . The Cavaliers , on the other hand , struggled mightily to take care of the basketball , turning it over 20 times , which matched their assist total for the night . Jordan Clarkson came off the bench to lead the team in scoring with 22 points , while rookie Colin Sexton was close behind with 19 points of his own in 23 minutes . With Kevin Love ( shoulder ) and Tristan Thompson ( rest ) both sidelined for the contest , Larry Nance and Ante Zizic were both called upon to play heavier doses of minutes , and they both shined in expanded roles . Nance posted a double - double with 11 points and a game - high 16 rebounds , while Zizic managed to record 14 points and 10 rebounds himself .
The Boston Celtics defeated the New_York Knicks , 103 - 101 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday evening . The Celtics ( 2 - 1 ) looked ready to put a tough loss to the division - rival Raptors behind them early in Saturday 's contest , as they punished the Knicks ( 1 - 2 ) to the tune of a 31 - 18 advantage through the first 12 minutes . However , New_York turned the tables right on their visitors in the second , almost flipping that margin to head into halftime with a very manageable 50 - 48 deficit . They managed to claw back from the seven - point deficit they entered the final period with , getting within 101 - 100 with 10 seconds left following a Trey Burke driving dunk . However , a pair of clutch Jayson Tatum free throws proved just enough to hold off the feisty hosts . Tatum led the way for the Celtics with 24 points , a total he supplemented with 14 rebounds and two steals . Kyrie Irving and Marcus Morris followed with matching 16 - point tallies . Irving added five assists , one rebound and two steals , while Morris supplied six boards and two assists . Aron Baynes contributed 10 points and five rebounds while drawing the start for Gordon Hayward ( rest ) , but he exited the game after logging just 12 minutes due to a hamstring injury . Terry Rozier turned 10 points of his own in 23 minutes . Al Horford mustered eight points , hauled in 10 rebounds , dished out three assists , recorded one steal and posted one block . Tim Hardaway , Jr. paced the Knicks with 24 points and also pitched in three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Enes Kanter continued the strong start to his season with a 17 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two steals . Allonzo Trier turned in 15 points in 25 minutes off the bench . Burke was just short of a double - double with 11 points , nine assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Celtics head back home and await a Monday night visit from the Miami Heat , while the Knicks face off with the Bucks in Milwaukee on that same evening .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host New_York Knicks , 128 - 100 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Friday . The 28 - point final margin is unfair for the Knicks , as this game was close until the final 10 minutes . In fact , there were 10 ties and nine lead changes in total , as a 47 - 16 fourth quarter in advantage of the Warriors made this look like a blowout . Golden_State ended up shooting 59 percent from the field and 49 percent from long range while holding New_York to just 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover differential was a big part of that , with the Warriors recording nine more assists than the Knicks while committing five fewer turnovers . The Warriors ( 5 - 1 ) got a spectacular performance out of Kevin Durant , as he scored 25 of his 41 points in the fourth quarter . He also added nine rebounds and five assists to his line on 17 - of - 24 shooting . Stephen Curry tallied 29 points , four rebounds and two assists . Draymond Green accumulated 18 points , four rebounds , six assists and three steals . Klay Thompson amassed 12 points , four rebounds and three assists . The Knicks ( 1 - 5 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he accrued 24 points , two rebounds and four assists . Frank Ntilikina scored a season - high 17 points , as he received his first start at point guard . Trey Burke led the bench with 15 points , two rebounds and two assists . Enes Kanter was also moved to the bench , as he provided eight points and 13 rebounds . On deck for Golden_State is a road matchup versus the Boston Celtics on Sunday . As for New_York , they 're off until Monday when they play host to the Brooklyn Nets .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 115 - 96 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday night . The Knicks ( 2 - 5 ) and the Nets ( 2 - 5 ) now have the same record and it happened thanks to a strong performance from the Knicks , as they dominated the game right from tip - off and were constantly increasing their lead as the game progressed . Brooklyn and New_York were tied at 26 following the first quarter , but that would be the only occasion where both sides would be matched . The Knicks won the three subsequent quarters ( 26 - 18 , 33 - 23 and 30 - 29 , respectively ) and ended winning comfortably against their crosstown rivals . Tim Hardaway was the best player for the Knicks since he finished with 25 points , eight assists and five rebounds , while Frank Ntilikina contributed with 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . Mitchell Robinson had 11 points in only 15 minutes , and Damyean Dotson chipped in with 10 points . Three bench players topped the 10 - point mark as well : Enes Kanter ( 15 points and 15 rebounds ) , Mario Hezonja ( 11 points ) and Allonzo Trier ( 12 points ) . D'Angelo Russell ( 13 points ) and Joe Harris ( 11 points ) were the only two Nets players that cracked the 10 - point mark while starting the game ; others such as Caris LeVert ( four points ) and Jarrett Allen ( seven points , six boards ) were not up to the required standards . The two leading scorers for Brooklyn came off the bench , as Spencer Dinwiddie contributed with 17 points and Rondae Hollis-Jefferson added 16 points . Shabazz Napier had 12 points .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host New_York Knicks , 107 - 101 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . The majority of the first quarter was close , back - and - forth action , with multiple ties and lead changes , with the Pacers emerging with a 28 - 25 lead heading into the second . The Pacers maintained a slight edge through most of the second , however , the Knicks never let it get out of sight . New_York closed the quarter strong , to claim a two - point lead heading into halftime . The third quarter was more of the same , as neither team could create any real separation . Nonetheless , the Knicks outscored the Pacers by two in the quarter , to take an 81 - 77 lead into the final frame . The Pacers kept fighting , while the Knicks held them off for most of the quarter . However , the Pacers turned it up a notch in crunch time , where they outscored the Knicks , 12 - 4 , in the final minutes to walk away with their third road win of the season . Domantas Sabonis led the Pacers with 30 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks , in 21 minutes off the bench . Victor Oladipo followed up with 24 points , six rebounds , two steals , one assist and one block , in 32 minutes . Thaddeus Young tallied 13 points , 10 rebounds , five steals , three blocks and one assist . The Pacers shot 54 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , Tim Hardaway Jr. tallied 37 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting , to lead the Knicks . Noah Vonleh followed up with 14 points , 10 rebounds , four assists , three blocks and two steals , while Alonzo Trier chipped in 14 points , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Knicks shot 43 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 25 from deep . The Knicks ( 2 - 6 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Mavericks in Dallas on Friday . The Pacers ( 5 - 3 ) take on the Bulls in Chicago on Friday .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 114 - 109 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Friday evening . The Pelicans got out to a good start on the road , as they built a 34 - 28 advantage after one quarter . The Knicks kept up the fight and answered back in the second , by outscoring the Pelicans by five points in the quarter , so that they trailed by one , 60 - 59 , at halftime . The Pelicans came out strong in the third and quickly pushed their lead to seven , but the Knicks stayed with it , so as to trail by just three points , heading into the final frame . The Pelicans held the advantage to start the fourth and even pushed their lead to 101 - 92 , with six minutes left in the contest . However , the Knicks mounted a 16 - 2 run , to take a five - point advantage with 34 seconds left . The Knicks were able to hang on for their second straight win . Emmanuel Mudiay came up huge for New_York with 27 points , seven rebounds , four steals and two assists , in 28 minutes of action . Alonzo Trier also had a big night , with 25 points , eight rebounds and four assists , in 34 minutes off the bench . Enes Kanter finished with 17 points , 12 rebounds , three blocks , two assists and one steal , while Noah Vonleh added 14 points , 11 rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Jrue Holiday followed up with 22 points , eight assists , five rebounds and three steals , while Nikola Mirotic chipped in 19 points nine rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . The Pelicans shot 40 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 28 from deep . The Pelicans ( 10 - 9 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Wizards in Washington on Saturday . The Knicks ( 6 - 14 ) head to Memphis to take on the Grizzlies on Sunday .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks in overtime , 136 - 134 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday . While Milwaukee led for the majority of this game , it took an extra session to determine a winner . In fact , New_York finished regulation on a 14 - 5 run to send the game into overtime . There were three ties and three lead changes in the overtime alone , as neither club led by more than three points . The Knicks defense was critical late , as they forced the Bucks to miss their final five shots , with all of those to either tie or take the lead . Three-point shooting was also huge , with New_York hitting 20 - of - 34 and Milwaukee connecting on just 18 - of - 42 . The Knicks also connected on 53 percent from the field while holding Milwaukee to 49 percent shooting . The Bucks ( 16 - 6 ) got another gem out of Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he collected 33 points , 19 rebounds , seven assists , three steals and two blocks . Eric Bledsoe accrued 27 points . five rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Malcolm Brogdon finished with 22 points , six rebounds and four assists . Brook Lopez totaled 13 points and nine boards but missed two free throws in the final seconds that would have tied the game . The Knicks ( 7 - 17 ) got a career - best 26 points from Kevin Knox , as he did that damage off the bench . Emmanual Mudiay led the starters with 28 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Tin Hardaway Jr. amassed 21 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Damyean Dotson was also a huge spark off the bench , providing 21 points and five boards . On deck for New_York is a home matchup versus the Washington Wizards on Monday . As for Milwaukee , they 're off until Wednesday when they play host to the Detroit Pistons .

The two teams came into the contest dealing with their respective share of struggles , and it was the hometown Knicks ( 8 - 17 ) that seemed more prepared to wage battle in the first half . New_York had forged a 61 - 52 lead by intermission , but they saw that quickly wiped away in a disastrous third quarter . The Wizards ( 10 - 14 ) outscored their hosts by a 34 - 19 margin during that period , allowing them to go into the final 12 minutes with a six - point edge . New_York would eventually go on a 120 run to close the gap to 107 - 104 with 35 seconds remaining , but a 26 - foot John Wall three - point jumper with 12 seconds left helped seal the win for the visitors . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards with 27 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , seven assists , two steals and one block . Kelly Oubre , Jr. provided 21 points , five rebounds , one assist , three blocks and one steal . Wall generated an 18 - point , 15 - assist double - double . Noah Vonleh tallied 11 points , eight boards , one assist and one block . The Wizards remain on the road and head south to face the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night , while the Knicks pay a visit to the Boston Celtics on Wednesday evening as well .

However , Milwaukee began to assert itself with a strong 26 - point second quarter , leading to a slim 48 - 46 halftime lead . The third quarter was the pivotal period , however , as the visitors pulled away for good by adding 14 points to their advantage . New_York acquitted itself well on the boards with a 58 - 50 rebounding advantage , but the Bucks ' 45 percent success rate from the floor was markedly better than their hosts ' 36 percent figure . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New_York Knicks , 108 - 105 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Sunday . The 76ers ( 28 - 16 ) and the Knicks ( 10 - 33 ) played a surprisingly close contest at The Big Apple and the hosts came quite close to send the game into overtime , but Philadelphia survived when a last - second three - point jumper from Emmanuel Mudiay did n't go in . The 76ers got off to a better start , though , leading 36 - 24 after the first quarter and extending the gap to 16 points at the break following a 30 - 26 second quarter . But the Knicks flipped the script admirably in the third , edging their rivals 32 - 17 and making it a one - point game heading into the fourth . Their rally fell short , however , and Philly ended winning the game on Joel Embiid 's return to the starting lineup . Joel Embiid finished with 26 points and eight rebounds during 32 minutes , but the star of the game for the Sixers was Ben Simmons . The Australian phenom might have fallen short of a triple - double , but he still posted a strong stat line of 20 points , 22 rebounds and nine assists . J.J. Redick also added 22 points , and Jimmy Butler chipped in with 16 points and eight boards . T.J. McConnell had six points and four assists off the bench . Emmanuel Mudiay might have missed the game - tying three - point shot at the end of regulation , but still had a decent game with 19 points , four assists and four rebounds . The best player for the Knicks was Kevin Knox , however , since he finished with 31 points , seven rebounds , and two steals across 44 minutes of action . Luke Kornet thrived off the bench and chipped in with 23 points , five assists and five rebounds .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the New_York Knicks , 127 - 109 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday afternoon . The Thunder ( 28 - 18 ) and the Knicks ( 10 - 35 ) opened the MLK-Day-slate on the NBA this Monday , but this was a one - sided game as soon as the ball started rolling . The Thunder destroyed the Knicks in the first quarter and quickly jumped to a 34 - 16 lead following the first 12 minutes of action . As expected , they never relinquished that lead but they never gave New_York a chance to mount a comeback , either . OKC won both the second ( 33 - 31 ) and third quarters ( 36 - 35 ) , so the final 12 minutes of action , where the Knicks won 27 - 24 , were not going to change the outcome of the game . A silver lining for the Knicks is that the final three quarters were quite tight , but it 's impossible to hide the fact that the Thunder always played with a huge lead on their favor . Russell Westbrook came close to register a triple - double thanks to 17 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists , while Paul George contributed with 31 points , four rebounds and four assists to the winning cause . Jerami Grant chipped in with 16 points and six boards , while Steven Adams added 10 points , seven boards and three dimes . Dennis Schroder had 17 points coming off the bench . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the way for the Knicks since he finished with 23 points in 27 minutes of action while shooting 7 - 14 from the field . Emmanuel Mudiay added 14 points , while Noah Vonleh contributed 10 points and five boards to the losing cause . Allonzo Trier had a strong effort off the bench thanks to 16 points , eight assists , and six rebounds . Enes Kanter had 11 points .
The Houston Rockets defeated the New_York Knicks , 114 - 110 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday . Wednesday night 's outing in New_York City ended up being a thriller highlighted by career performances for each team . The Rockets ( 27 - 20 ) held a six - point lead with a minute to go and appeared to be well on their way to ending things , but then a 70 run by the Knicks over the next 30 seconds put the home team up by one . Ultimately , an Eric Gordon three - pointer put the Rockets up three with just over nine seconds remaining , and that was followed by a James Harden steal and dunk that ended the game . That dunk gave Harden 61 points , which is tied for the most points scored by a visiting player in Madison_Square_Garden , and he also recorded 15 rebounds , four assists and five steals . Eric Gordon added 20 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting from the field , and the new Rocket , Kenneth Faried , scored 11 points to make him the third and final Houston player to reach double figures . As for the Knicks ( 10 - 36 ) , they were lead by a career - best performance from rookie Allonzo Trier , who scored 31 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting in 33 minutes off the bench . He hit a go - ahead layup with just 20 seconds to go , but Gordon 's three ended up ruining the point guard 's chances at being the hero Wednesday night . Four other New_York players scored in double figures , but none scored higher than Emmanuel Mudiay 's 14 points in 28 minutes . Ultimately what killed the Knicks ' chances was their inability to take care of the ball , as the team committed 18 turnovers to recording just 15 assists , so it was fitting that the game ended on a Houston steal .
The Miami Heat defeated the host New_York Knicks , 106 - 97 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , with the Knicks holding a one - point lead after one quarter . The Knicks kept up the solid play through the second , and outscored the visitors by five points in the quarter , to take a 58 - 52 lead into halftime . However , the Heat came out on fire in the third , as they outscored the Knicks 29 - 12 in the quarter , to claim an 11 - point lead by the start of the fourth quarter . The Knicks battled through the fourth , but it was not enough to make up for the deficit accumulated through the third . The Heat held on to earn their second straight win , while this marks the ninth straight loss for the Knicks . Wayne Ellington led the Heat with 19 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting and one rebound , in 30 minutes . Dwyane Wade tallied 15 points , 10 assists , five rebounds and one steal , while Hassan Whiteside finished with 13 points , 16 rebounds , three blocks and two assists . The Heat shot 46 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 33 from long range . Meanwhile , Tim Hardaway Jr. led the Knicks with 22 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting , six rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 30 minutes . Trey Burke followed up with 16 points , two assists and one rebound , while Damyean Dotson added 14 points , four assists , two steals , one block and one rebound . The Knicks shot 43 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 26 from long range . The Knicks ( 10 - 38 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Hornets in Charlotte on Monday . The Heat ( 24 - 24 ) play host to the Bulls on Wednesday .

Boston came into this game as a sizable favorite against this shorthanded New_York squad and this 14 - point victory shows why . In fact , the Celtics held the lead for the entirety of the second half , as a 33 - 26 fourth quarter really put things to bed . The Celtics defense was critical , as they recorded 11 steals and seven blocks while the Knicks picked up just two steals and two blocks . That was evident in the turnover differential , with Boston winning that battle , 17 - 7 . The Celtics ( 33 - 19 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he tallied 23 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Marcus Morris amassed 18 points , five rebounds and two steals . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the New_York Knicks , 96 - 84 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 33 ) were pretty shorthanded entering this game , but they managed to leave the injuries behind and did n't have many problems to defeat this new - look Knicks ( 10 - 42 ) that do n't have Kristaps Porzingis anymore . New_York grabbed the lead in the first quarter , however , and they jumped to a 22 - 19 lead following the first 12 minutes of action , but Memphis turned things around with a 23 - 19 second quarter that saw them up by one at the break ( 42 - 41 ) . They pulled ahead for good in the third quarter ( 32 - 21 ) and entered the fourth up by 12 points , and since the fourth quarter ended 22 - 22 , the Grizzlies won this game rather comfortably . The duo of Mike Conley and Marc Gasol lifted Memphis here ; while the point - guard had 25 points , eight rebounds and seven assists , the Spanish center delivered a strong effort thanks to 24 points , nine rebounds , and five assists . Jaren Jackson Jr. had 16 points with seven boards , while Justin Holiday had 19 points . They did most of the heavy lifting in this one , as Memphis ' entire bench combined for only 12 points between six players . Despite a poor shooting performance , Kevin Knox was the top scorer for the Knicks since he finished with 17 points , while DeAndre Jordan had a strong double - double of 12 points and 12 rebounds . Mario Hezonja had 14 points and eight rebounds coming off the bench , while Luke Kornet chipped in with 11 points . Dennis Smith Jr. only had eight points while shooting 3 - 9 from the field .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the New_York Knicks , 105 - 92 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday night . The Pistons ( 24 - 29 ) were playing their third game in four nights Tuesday , but they were riding high following a strong double - digit win against the Nuggets on Monday . With Detroit 's front - line players having the luxury of logging minutes in the 20s due to that lopsided win , the Pistons came out of the gates running hot , racking up 63 first - half points against the Knicks ( 10 - 43 ) . The third quarter then turned into an unexpected defensive struggle , but Detroit found its shooting stroke again over the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Blake Griffin led the way for the Pistons , posting 29 points and supplementing them with eight assist and six rebounds . Reggie Jackson and Reggie Bullock provided matching 19 - point tallies while contributing seven assists and seven rebounds , respectively . Andre Drummond generated a 17 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included five blocks . Dennis Smith , Jr. paced the Knicks in only his second game with the club , collecting 25 points and dishing out six assists . He also hauled in five rebounds . Mitchell Robinson posted a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . Kevin Knox managed 11 points and seven boards . Wesley Matthews drew his first start in a New_York uniform and totaled nine points , five assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Deandre Jordan turned in eight points , eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Pistons and Knicks now face off again in the second game of the home - and - home set on Friday evening .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New_York Knicks , 126 - 111 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . The 76ers ( 37 - 21 ) were up against the wall following a disappointing home loss to the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night , one after which they had to travel to the Big Apple for their date with the spiraling Knicks ( 10 - 47 ) . Philadelphia put any thoughts of potential sluggishness to rest early , however , racking up 71 first - half points on their way to a 16 - point halftime advantage . While New_York was able to shave seven points off their deficit in the third quarter , the visitors kept up their pace throughout the final period to secure the 15 - point win . It was a successful night on both ends of the floor for the Sixers , as they shot 54 percent while limiting their hosts to a 40 percent success rate . Joel Embiid led the way for the 76ers with 26 points , adding 14 rebounds , three assists and one block . Tobias Harris checked in right behind him with 25 points , six rebounds and three assists . Ben Simmons delivered 18 points , seven assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . J.J. Redick poured in 15 points , supplementing them with three boards and two assists . Jimmy Butler finished with 13 points , eight assists , seven rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Boban Marjanovic collected 10 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one block . The Knicks bench did most of the heavy lifting , combining for 74 points . Allonzo Trier led the way with 19 points and also posted four rebounds and four assists . Damyean Dotson totaled 16 points , three assists and two rebounds . Mitchell Robinson generated a 14 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , four blocks and two steals . Dennis Smith , Jr. and Kadeem Allen furnished 13 points apiece . Deandre Jordan contributed 12 points , seven assists and five boards . The 76ers are now off until Feb. 21 , when they 'll host the Miami Heat . The Knicks are right back in action Thursday night in a road tilt versus the Atlanta Hawks .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host New_York Knicks , 115 - 104 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Friday . While there were nine lead changes in the opening 15 minutes , that was the only time the Knicks had a chance . In fact , the Timberwolves rode a 37 - 25 second quarter to victory , as they held the lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . The assist - to - turnover ratio was critical , with Minnesota recording 22 assists to 13 turnovers while New_York committed 20 turnovers to just 15 assists . The Timberwolves ended up shooting 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range while holding the Knicks to 42 percent from the field and 38 percent from long range . The Timberwolves ( 28 - 30 ) had to play without Karl-Anthony Towns ( concussion ) , as they were led by Derrick Rose with 20 points , two rebounds , three assists and three steals off the bench . Taj Gibson led the starters with 19 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jeff Teague amassed 12 points and 11 assists . The Knicks ( 11 - 48 ) were led by Damyean Dotson , as he tallied 20 points , three rebounds and three assists with 18 of those coming in the first quarter . Kevin Knox totaled 18 points and seven boards . DeAndre Jordan accumulated 16 points , 19 rebounds and two blocks while Allonzo Trier led the bench with 20 points and three rebounds . On deck for Minnesota is a road matchup versus the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday . As for New_York , they return to action on Sunday when they host the San_Antonio Spurs .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 130 - 118 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Sunday evening . The Knicks got out to a solid start at home , as they led for most of the first quarter and took 30 - 26 lead into the second . They maintained the upper hand through the second , where they managed to build a double - digit lead , before settling on a 62 - 53 lead at halftime . The Knicks came out strong in the third and pushed their lead to 20 , before the Spurs battled back to make it an 11 - point game heading into the fourth . The Spurs could barely cut the deficit to single digits through the fourth , as the Knicks held on to break an 18 - game home losing streak . This marks the second straight loss for the Spurs . Damyean Dotson led the Knicks with 27 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. followed up with 19 points , 13 assists , six rebounds and two steals , while Kevin Knox tallied 19 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and a block . The Knicks shot 51 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , DeMar DeRozan led the Spurs with 32 points , nine rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block , in 32 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge followed up with 18 points , three rebounds , two blocks and an assist , while Bryn Forbes chipped in 15 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Spurs shot 45 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 24 from long range . The Spurs ( 33 - 28 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nets in Brooklyn on Monday . The Knicks ( 12 - 48 ) play host to the Magic on Tuesday .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 108 - 103 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday . After going 18 - straight games without a home win , this gives New_York their second - straight victory at MSG in as many games . The benches undoubtedly decided this game , with New_York 's bench outscoring Orlando 's bench , 75 - 7 . In fact , New_York 's bench played the majority of the second half , as they had no starter reach double figures in scoring . They won this game in comeback fashion too , outscoring the Magic , 30 - 13 , in the fourth quarter . Getting to the free - throw line was huge , with the Knicks connecting on 25 - of - 32 and the Magic hitting 14 - of - 20 . Defense was also key , with New_York recording 11 steals while winning the turnover differential , 16 - 10 . The Magic ( 28 - 34 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 26 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and three blocks . Aaron Gordon finished with 26 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Jonathan Isaac amassed 16 points , six rebounds and three blocks . Evan Fournier accrued 15 points , five rebounds , eight assists and three steals while D.J . Augustin accrued 13 points , five rebounds and six assists . The Knicks ( 13 - 48 ) had no starter reach double figures in scoring , as Dennis Smith Jr. led them with nine points , two rebounds and three assists . Emmanuel Mudiay led the bench with 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Mitchell Robinson was the team 's best player , as he finished with 17 points , 14 rebounds , three steals and six blocks . Both teams return to action on Thursday , with Orlando playing host to the Golden_State Warriors and New_York welcoming the Cleveland Cavaliers to MSG .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host New_York Knicks , 125=118 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Thursday . In a battle between two of the worst teams in the league , this game came down to the wire . In fact , there were nine ties and 13 lead changes in total , with neither club leading by more than 14 points . Cleveland won in comeback fashion , as they finished the game on a 16 - 3 run to cap off a 40 - 21 fourth quarter . Free-throw shooting was the difference for the Cavaliers , as they connected on 29 - of - 36 while the Knicks hit just 15 - of - 23 . Cleveland ended up shooting 51 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range while holding New_York to 48 percent from the field and 34 percent from long range . The Cavaliers ( 14 - 48 ) were led by Kevin Love , as he tallied 26 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Collin Sexton accrued 22 points , three rebounds and three assists . Cedi Osman collected 21 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Jordan Clarkson led the bench with 22 points and two boards . The Knicks ( 14 - 48 ) were led by Allonzo Trier , as he dropped 22 points off the bench . Noah Vonleh led the starters with 16 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Dennis Smith Jr. accumulated 16 points , two rebounds and eight assists . Emmanuel Mudiay , Henry Ellenson and Mitchell Robinson all reached double figures in scoring off the bench as well . On deck for Cleveland is a home matchup versus the Detroit Pistons on Saturday . As for New_York , they travel to face the Los_Angeles Clippers on Sunday for their next fixture .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 124 - 123 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Knicks ( 13 - 57 ) got out to a rousing start , racking up 41 first - quarter points against a defensively sluggish Lakers ( 31 - 39 ) squad that may have been struggling with its body clock . Los_Angeles seemingly woke up in the second quarter , however , erasing the entirety of their deficit and forging a three - point halftime lead . The back - and - forth nature of the game persisted in the second half , but the visitors appeared to be on their way to a win after opening up a seven - point advantage with two minutes remaining . That 's when New_York made one final push , finishing on an 80 run that was punctuated with game - tying and go - ahead throws by Emmanuel Mudiay at the 22 - second mark of the fourth quarter . The Lakers ' last chance at a win went by the wayside when Mario Hezonja stuffed LeBron James ' 13 - footer with 2 seconds remaining . James led the way for the Lakers with 33 points , adding eight assists , six rebounds and one block . Kyle Kuzma managed 18 points , eight assists and one steal . Reggie Bullock poured in 14 points . JaVale McGee and Johnathan Williams contributed matching 12 - point , seven - rebound tallies . Alex Caruso matched their scoring total and added three rebounds , two assists , five steals and three blocks . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope pitched in 11 points and four rebounds . Mudiay paced the Knicks with 28 points , complementing them with eight assists , two rebounds and one block . Dewayne Dotson poured in 25 points and added six boards and one assist . Kevin Knox delivered 19 points , six boards , one assist and one steal . Hezonja managed 17 points , eight boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Deandre Jordan generated a 15 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that included seven assists , two steals and one block . The Lakers pay a visit to the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday evening , while the Knicks pay a visit to the New_York Knicks on Monday night .

The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host New_York Knicks , 124 - 113 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Sunday . While Los_Angeles came into this game as a sizable favorite , it was close throughout . In fact , there were nine ties and 10 lead changes in total . With that said , the Clippers led throughout , holding the lead for all but a few minutes . Turnovers were the difference in the game , with the Clippers forcing 14 turnovers from the Knicks while committing just eight on their end . Three-point shooting was also critical , with Los_Angeles hitting 15 - of - 35 and New_York connecting on 9 - of - 33 . The Clippers ( 44 - 30 ) were led by Lou Williams , as he provided 29 points , three rebounds , seven assists and two steals off the bench . The Miami Heat defeated the New_York Knicks , 101 - 92 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday night . The Heat ( 38 - 38 ) came into the contest with no shortage of motivation , considering they needed every win they could get to hold off the Orlando Magic for the eighth seed in the Eastern_Conference . In contrast , no one would have exactly blamed the Knicks ( 14 - 62 ) for lack of motivation , considering they 'd been reduced to playing spoiler months ago . However , it was New_York who jumped out to a surprising 61 - 55 halftime lead , putting on an offensive clinic in the first half . It was a completely different story coming out of intermission , however , with Miami buckling down and ultimately limiting their hosts to a meager 31 points over the final two periods . Meanwhile , the Heat found enough offense to overcome their deficit and pull away in the latter stages of the fourth . Dion Waiters led the Heat with 28 points , adding six assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block . Hassan Whiteside generated a 17 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one steal and one block . Dwyane Wade posted 16 points , seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Kelly Olynyk totaled 12 points , 11 rebounds , one assist and one steal . Bam Adebayo finished with eight points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Emmanuel Mudiay led the Knicks with 24 points , adding five rebounds and four assists . Luke Kornet delivered 17 points , eight boards , three assists , three steals and three blocks . Kevin Knox managed 16 points , one rebound and one steal . Dennis Smith , Jr. tallied 12 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Mitchell Robinson furnished nine points , 14 rebounds , four blocks and three steals . The Heat remain on the road and take on the Boston Celtics on Monday night , while the Knicks remain at home to take on the Chicago Bulls on Monday evening as well .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 113 - 105 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday evening . The Knicks got out to a great start at home , as they took a 37 - 19 lead after one quarter . The Bulls tightened up in the second but could not make much progress , as they managed to outscore the hosts by one point in the quarter , only to trail by 17 at halftime . The Bulls kept fighting in the third , but the Knicks kept a comfortable cushion , and managed to carry a 14 - point lead into the final frame . The visitors kept chipping away in the fourth , and made it just a five - point game with eight minutes to go . However , the Knicks made a final rally to push back ahead by double - digits , and were able to cruise to the finish . This marks the end of a six - game losing streak for the Knicks , and the fifth straight loss for the Bulls . Luke Kornet led the Knicks with 24 points , six rebounds , three blocks and an assist , in 28 minutes . Kevin Knox followed up with 19 points , nine rebounds , three assists and a block , while Damyean Dotson added 18 points , six rebounds , six assists , a steal and a block . The Knicks ( 15 - 62 ) take on the Magic in Orlando on Wednesday .

However , the Knicks rallied in the fourth and made it a two - point game half way through the quarter .
