The Houston Rockets defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 125 - 115 , at Staples_Center on Saturday evening . Whether there 's such a thing as an early - season `` must win `` is debatable , but the Rockets ( 1 - 1 ) came into Saturday 's contest with a certain sense of urgency . Houston had gotten embarrassed by a 131 - 112 score on their home court in their regular - season opener , as the New Orleans Pelicans came in and delivered a thorough beating . The Rockets ( 1 - 1 ) seemed intent on avoiding a repeat despite a raucous road crowd that turned out for LeBron James ' home debut . The visitors jumped out to a 66 - 62 halftime edge , but they could n't shake the Lakers ( 0 - 2 ) in the third and entered the final period holding a slim one - point edge . However , a 10 - 3 run over the final 23 seconds finally sealed the hard - fought win . The Rockets ' work on the boards was key , as they out - rebounded the hosts by a 54 - 44 margin . A pivotal development was the ejection of Rajon Rondo . Brandon Ingram and Chris Paul with just over four minutes remaining in the fourth quarter after a melee ensued following a James Harden drive to the basket . Harden led all scorers with 36 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block . Paul posted a 28 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds and a steal . Clint Capela managed a 19 - point , 12 - rebound double - double . Gerald Green led the second unit with 13 points and also posted two rebounds and one steal . Carmelo Anthony totaled seven points , 10 rebounds , one assist and one steal in 29 minutes off the bench . James paced the Lakers with 24 points and added five rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block . JaVale McGee was next with 16 points , six rebounds , two assists and five blocks . Lonzo Ball saw a boost in playing time , tallying 26 minutes and producing 14 points , six rebounds and four assists . Rondo contributed a 13 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds and two steals . Ingram registered 12 points , four boards , one steal and one block . Josh Hart and Kyle Kuzma had matching 11 - point efforts off the bench . The Lakers remain home and take on the San_Antonio Spurs in a Monday evening showdown , while the Rockets remain in the city and retake the Staples_Center floor versus the Los_Angeles Clippers on Sunday evening .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 121 - 114 , at Staples_Center on Thursday evening . With the game coming down to the wire , the Lakers ( 2 - 3 ) got hot at the right time . With under 80 seconds left , LA went on a quick 50 run to pull away . Sophomore point guard Lonzo Ball started things off with a clutch three - pointer to put the Lakers up five , which was followed by a steal and breakaway dunk from Kyle Kuzma to seal the win . Los_Angeles was led by a triple - double from LeBron James , who scored 28 points to go with 11 assists and 11 rebounds . Kuzma added 22 points , two of which came on his game - clinching dunk . The Lakers also saw a breakout contribution from JaVale McGee , who scored 21 points and grabbed seven rebounds in 31 minutes of action . Denver , meanwhile , saw continued excellence from star center Nikola Jokic . Jokic led the team with 24 points and grabbed 11 rebounds . Third-year point guard Jamal Murray added 22 points and 10 rebounds . As a whole , the Nuggets struggled to find their shot from three - point range in the loss . Denver shot just 6 - of - 23 from beyond the arc . On Saturday , the Lakers will travel to San_Antonio to take on the Spurs . The Nuggets , meanwhile , have the weekend off before hosting Anthony Davis and the Pelicans on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 114,113 in a close game at Staples_Center on Wednesday . It looked as though it would be an easy win for Los_Angeles ( 3 - 5 ) , as the team held a double - digit lead through much of the second half . Dallas ( 2 - 6 ) , though , mounted an epic comeback effort , cutting the lead to six with 92 seconds of game time remaining . The Mavericks continued to whittle away at the deficit , cutting the lead to just one point on a Harrison Barnes three - pointer with 24 seconds remaining . Dallas finally tied the game on a Luka Doncic floater with only seven seconds left . With only seven seconds left , Los_Angeles had one possession to try to take the lead and avoid overtime . Superstar forward LeBron James took matters into his own hands and drew a foul , but missed the first of his two free - throws with just two seconds remaining . On his second try , though , James knocked down the decisive free - throw , giving LA the one - point edge and the win . James led the Lakers with 29 points in the win . He added six assists and five rebounds . Veteran center JaVale McGee was also a key contributor in the win . McGee finished with 16 points and 15 rebounds in 34 minutes of action . As a team , the Lakers ' offense was outstanding . LA shot 51 percent from the field and 10 - of - 17 from three - point range . For the Mavericks , Wesley Matthews led the way with 21 points . Harrison Barnes added another 19 points in the loss . Rookie sensation Luka Doncic continued his strong start to the season , tallying 14 points to go with seven assists and five rebounds . Doncic entered Wednesday 's matchup averaging 20 points and 4 assists per game . Next up for Dallas is a visit from the New_York Knicks on Friday . The Lakers , meanwhile , will travel to Portland to take on the Trail_Blazers on Saturday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 121 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . Despite missing Kawhi Leonard ( ankle ) , the Raptors jumped out to a quick 10 - 4 start , and carried on to outscore the Lakers by a whopping 25 points in the first quarter , as they took a 42 - 17 lead into the second . The Raptors did not let up as they held at least a 20 - point lead for almost the entire second quarter . The Lakers kept fighting but could not make a dent in the colossal margin , as they still trailed by 21 heading into the final frame . The Raptors cruised to their third straight win and improved to 3 - 1 on the road , while this marked the end of a two - game win streak for the Lakers , and also their third home loss of the season . Serge Ibaka led the Raptors with 34 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 29 minutes of action . Kyle Lowry had an amazing night , with 21 points , 15 assists , six rebounds , two steals and one block , in 33 minutes . Pascal Siakam tallied 16 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Danny Green added 15 points . The Raptors shot 50 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyle Kuzma led the Lakers with 24 points , five rebounds and two assists , in 31 minutes . LeBron James tallied 18 points , six assists , two rebounds and one block , while Lonzo Ball chipped in 12 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 23 minutes . The Lakers shot 46 percent from the field , including , 6 - of - 24 from long range . The Lakers ( 4 - 6 ) will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Timberwolves on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 9 - 1 ) head to Utah to take on the Jazz on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 107 - 106 , in a last - second thriller at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . LeBron James won his team the game after almost giving it up , scoring the go - ahead basket on a put - back dunk with 15 seconds remaining after going 0 - of - 2 at the free - throw line . Atlanta , meanwhile , had the opportunity to answer on the final possession , putting the ball in the hands of rookie point guard Trae Young . Young drove to the basket and put up a lay - up as time expired , but was blocked by veteran center Tyson Chandler to end the game . In addition to his game - winning dunk , James led the Lakers ( 7 - 6 ) with 26 points . He added seven rebounds and four assists in the winning effort . Kyle Kuzma scored another 18 points and pulled down eight rebounds . The Lakers also enjoyed strong defense from their platoon of big men , as JaVale McGee and Tyson Chandler combined for six blocks on the night . LA is now 30 since signing Chandler as a free agent last week . Atlanta ( 3 - 10 ) found itself on the losing side once again , despite a number of stellar performances . Young had a team - high 12 assists while also scoring 20 points . Taurean Prince led the team with 23 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Big man Alex Len also posted a double - double , finishing with 17 points and 11 rebounds . The Hawks will continue their West Coast road trip with a visit to Golden_State on Tuesday . LA , meanwhile , will host the Portland Trail_Blazers on Wednesday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 126 - 117 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a great start on the road , and led 33 - 26 after one quarter . The Lakers turned the tables in the second , as they poured in 33 points , and held the Blazers to 22 , taking a 59 - 55 lead into halftime . The third quarter remained competitive , however the Lakers kept the advantage by outscoring Portland by four , to push their lead to eight , heading into the final frame . The Lakers kept their foot on the gas , as they pushed the lead to 15 , midway through the fourth . The Trail_Blazers kept battling , but would only get as close as the nine - point margin , by which they lost . LeBron James led the charge for the Lakers with 44 points , 10 rebounds , nine assists , three blocks and one steal , in 36 minutes . JaVale McGee followed up with 20 points on 9 - of - 12 shooting , in 23 minutes . Brandon Ingram finished with 17 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal , while Lonzo Ball tallied 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and a steal . The Lakers shot 47 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 32 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 31 points , 11 assists , eight rebounds and one block , in 37 minutes . C.J . McCollum followed up with 23 points , four assists , two steals and one rebound , in 35 minutes , while Jusuf Nurkic tallied 21 points , 14 rebounds , four blocks , three steals and one assist . The Trail_Blazers shot 44 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 33 from long range . The Trail_Blazers ( 10 - 4 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Friday . The Lakers ( 8 - 6 ) take on the Magic in Orlando on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Utah Jazz , 90 - 83 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The first half was a hard - fought defensive battle unlike any other for the Lakers ( 11 - 7 ) thus far this season , as the two teams entered halftime deadlocked at 38 - 38 . However , Los_Angeles began to figure out the Jazz ( 8 - 11 ) in the third quarter while putting up 26 points , and they matched that total in the fourth to garner the victory . Despite Utah 's defensive reputation , it was the home squad that was more effective on that end of the floor , limiting Utah to 39 percent shooting , including just 17 percent from three - point range . The Jazz was significantly hurt by the Donovan Mitchell 's first - half exit from the game due to a rib injury . Alec Burks led the Jazz with 17 points and added five rebounds and one steal . Joe Ingles provided 16 points , eight boards and five assists . Rudy Gobert supplied 13 points , seven rebounds , one steal and one block . Derrick Favors delivered 10 points , four assists and three rebounds . Ricky Rubio generated just seven points on 3 - for - 12 shooting . Brandon Ingram paced the Lakers with 24 points , six rebounds and two steals . LeBron James managed 22 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists , two steals and one block . JaVale McGee compiled 12 points , four rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Kyle Kuzma tallied nine points , six rebounds and two steals . Lonzo Ball matched Kuzma 's scoring and also brought down 10 rebounds . The Jazz remain on the road and in California , next paying a visit to the Sacramento Kings on Sunday night . The Lakers remain home and tangle with the Orlando Magic on Sunday afternoon .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 114 - 103 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The Mavericks got out to a great start on the road , with a 17 - 6 lead , just four minutes into the quarter . They kept up the momentum and build a , 32 - 22 , lead by the end of the quarter . The Mavs pushed their lead to 15 early in the second , but the Lakers were able to get on track and outscore the visitors , 23 - 13 , through the rest of the quarter , to cut the deficit to just two points by halftime . The Lakers picked up where they left off in the third , as they took the lead within the first few minutes , and went on to outscore the Mavs , 25 - 17 , in the quarter , to take a , 78 - 75 , lead heading into the final frame . They stayed on point in the fourth , and used a 15 - 3 run to push their lead to 16 , with four minutes left , which was enough to cruise to the finish line , for their second straight win . LeBron James led the Lakers with 28 points , five rebounds , four assists and one block , in 31 minutes . Brandon Ingram followed up with 19 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Kyle Kuzma tallied 15 points , 12 rebounds and six assists , in 36 minutes . The Lakers shot 49 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 29 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 34 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. finished with 13 points , three rebounds and three assists , while Luka Doncic had a rough shooting night , going 2 - of - 13 from the field , for six points , but still contributed six rebounds , five assists , three steals and two blocks . The Mavs ( 10 - 10 ) will look to get back on track as they play host to the Clippers on Sunday . The Lakers ( 13 - 9 ) play host to the Suns on Sunday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 96 , at Staples_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Lakers ( 14 - 9 ) have been on a roll of late , and clinched a third - straight win while winning eight of their last 11 contests with another dominant performance ; this time , they bounced back from a poor performance in the first quarter to destroy the Suns ( 4 - 19 ) . Phoenix started strong and finished the first quarter up by 10 points ( 31 - 21 ) , but the Lakers bounced back and a 40 - 15 win during the second quarter saw them up by 15 points at half time . Los_Angeles won the remaining two quarters as well , 34 - 28 and 25 - 22 , respectively . They showed composure and did n't have much problems to defeat one of the worst teams in The Association in front of their own crowd . Six Lakers players scored in double digits in this one and Kyle Kuzma paced the offense with a 23 - point , eight - rebound performance . LeBron James delivered another strong outing , and finished with 22 points , eight assists , and six rebounds . Brandon Ingram contributed with 15 points , and JaVale McGee chipped in with 14 points and eight boards . Michael Beasley added 14 points coming off the bench . The Suns had a balanced performance in this game since they had five players scoring in double digits , but no played topped the 15 - point mark . Richaun Holmes led the way with 15 points off the bench , while Josh Jackson and Trevor Ariza each added 13 points . Rookie DeAndre Ayton had a strong double - double of 10 points with 10 rebounds . Devin Booker , who was questionable , only scored six points in 17 minutes of action .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the San_Antonio Spurs , 121 - 113 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday evening . LeBron James scored 42 points to help the Lakers launch a fourth - quarter comeback in Wednesday 's win . The Lakers ( 15 - 9 ) trailed by three heading into the fourth quarter , but scored 43 points in the final period to pull ahead . Much of this scoring outburst was concentrated in the final two minutes of action , as James hit multiple deep three - pointers to help his team start on a run . The Spurs ( 11 - 14 ) , meanwhile , struggled to find their shot at the end of the game , and paid the price with the loss . James added five rebounds and six assists in the win . Kyle Kuzma scored another 22 points for the Lakers , adding nine rebounds and five assists as well . Lonzo Ball finished the night with 14 points and nine assists . As a team , LA shot 48 percent from the field and hit 14 three - pointers . They also racked up 21 total assists . For the Spurs , DeMar DeRozan led the way with 32 points . Fellow veteran Rudy Gay was not far behind , tallying a season - high 31 points in the narrow loss . LaMarcus Aldridge scored 21 points and added another nine rebounds . It was a poor shooting night for the Spurs , who hit just 26 percent of their three - point attempts . The two teams will rematch in San_Antonio on Friday night .
The Los_Angeles Lakers escaped with a win over the visiting Miami Heat , 108 - 105 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . It was a hotly anticipated contest , as it likely marked the last time that LeBron James and Dwyane Wade , two friends and future Hall of Famers , would face each other . With Wade expected to retire at the end of the season , the Los_Angeles crowd offered him a warm welcome . Unfortunately for Wade and the Heat ( 11 - 15 ) , they were unable to steal the game from LeBron and the Lakers ( 17 - 10 ) , who overcame a halftime deficit to win their sixth game in their last seven outings . Things got off to a mediocre start for the Lakers , as the team missed out on some early transition opportunities , including a missed layup for sophomore guard Lonzo Ball . Still , behind a near triple - double from James , the Lakers earned the win . LeBron scored 28 points to go with nine rebounds and 12 assists . Kyle Kuzma was the team 's leading scorer , complementing James ' strong offensive output with an additional 33 points . Wade earned a double - double in what was likely his last game at Staples_Center . He finished with 15 points and 10 assists off the bench . His 6 - of - 19 shooting night , though , was emblematic of his team 's shaky overall offensive night . The Heat hit just 44 percent of its shots from the field in the loss and committed 17 turnovers . The Heat will visit Utah on Wednesday , while the Lakers travel to Houston to clash with the Rockets on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 112 - 104 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The contest got out to a very competitive start , as both teams went back - and - forth through the first , until they ended the quarter tied at 34 . The Lakers finally created some separation in the second , and emerged with a four - point lead at halftime . Both teams came out strong in the second half , but the Lakers were once again able to come out of the quarter with a slight advantage , as they pushed their lead to six , heading into the final frame . The fourth quarter did not feature much scoring , but was intense nonetheless , as the Pelicans cut the deficit to three at the halfway point in the quarter . However , the Lakers answered by using an 80 over the next two minutes , to push their lead to 11 , with 5:26 to go . The Lakers were able to hold on from there to earn end a two - game slide . LeBron James led the Lakers with 22 points , 14 assists , 12 rebounds and two steals , in 38 minutes . Kyle Kuzma tallied 23 points , three rebounds , one assist and a steal , while Brandon Ingram finished with 18 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a steal . The Lakers shot 47 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 32 from long range . Meanwhile , Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 30 points , 20 rebounds , five assists and one block , in 39 minutes . Jrue Holiday tallied 18 points , 10 assists , six rebounds and three blocks , while Julius Randle added 21 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one block . The Pelicans shot 43 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from deep . The Pelicans ( 15 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Sunday . The Lakers ( 19 - 13 ) play host to the Grizzlies on Sunday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 107 - 99 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . The Lakers started out well but the Grizzlies closed the first quarter on a 14 - 2 run , to take a 26 - 20 lead into the second . The Lakers battled back and the teams traded the lead a couple times in the quarter , before the Grizzlies emerged with a 50 - 46 lead at halftime . The Grizzlies stayed in front for most of the third quarter , until the Lakers made a push to take a three - point lead entering the fourth . The battle continued through the fourth until the Grizzlies used a 14 - 8 run in the final few minutes to secure the road win and end a five - game losing streak . Jaren Jackson Jr. led the Grizzlies with 27 points , nine rebounds and one assist , in 30 minutes . Mike Conley tallied 17 points , eight assists , two steals and one rebound , while Marc Gasol finished with 17 points , nine rebounds , eight assists and one block , in 31 minutes . The Grizzlies shot 47 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , LeBron James led the Lakers with 22 points , 14 rebounds , seven assists , a steal and a block , in 35 minutes . Brandon Ingram followed up with 20 points , four rebounds and three assists , while Ivica Zubac tallied 19 points , four rebounds , four blocks and one assist . The Lakers shot 49 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 30 from long range . The Lakers ( 19 - 14 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Christmas Day . The Grizzlies ( 17 - 16 ) play host to the Cavaliers on Wednesday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Sacramento Kings , 121 - 114 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . Sunday was the third straight game in which the Lakers ( 21 - 16 ) were without superstar forward LeBron James , who is recovering from a groin injury . LA had dropped its first two games without James , but strong play from its young stars helped the team earn a win on Sunday . Though the Kings ( 19 - 17 ) led for much of the fourth quarter , strong late - game play from LA 's Brandon Ingram helped to turn the tides . With under four minutes remaining , Ingram personally went on a 70 run , knocking down a three - pointer that gave the Lakers the lead . After a few late misses from Sacramento 's De'Aaron Fox , LA was able to clinch the win on a pair of free - throws from Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . Caldwell-Pope was LA 's leading scorer , providing 26 points off the bench . Ingram added another 21 points in total and also dished out nine assists . Sophomore guard Josh Hart also delivered a gem , scoring 22 points and grabbing seven rebounds . Sacramento , meanwhile , saw another strong all - around night from De'Aaron Fox . Though Fox missed a pair of crucial late - game shots , he still shot 12 - of - 19 on the night and scored 26 points . Fox continued to excel as a facilitator , dishing out three assists . Buddy Hield and Bogdan Bogdanovic each scored another 21 points . Sacramento will host the Portland Trail_Blazers on Tuesday , while LA will see the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday .
The visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 107 - 100 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday evening . Neither team had led by more than six with 5:13 remaining in the fourth quarter . That changed , though , as OKC ( 24 - 13 ) brought Paul George and Steven Adams back in to close out the game . George quickly ended an 0 - of - 10 stretch for the Thunder , knocking down two straight shots and finishing with nine in the fourth quarter . After a late play in which LA 's Tyson Chandler was assessed a Flagrant 1 for striking Terrence Ferguson in the face on a blocked shot , George iced the game by knocking down a pair of free - throws on behalf of the injured Ferguson . LA ( 21 - 17 ) , meanwhile , dealt with an in - game injury of its own , as star forward Kyle Kuzma exited the game with a lower back contusion . For the Thunder , George led the way with 37 points and three steals . Former MVP Russell Westbrook , meanwhile , continued his shooting struggles , going just 3 - of - 20 from the field . That did not stop the star point guard from having an impact , though , as he still notched a triple - double , including a team - high 16 rebounds . LA , meanwhile , took its third loss in four games without LeBron James . James continues to be sidelined after sustaining a groin injury during a game at Golden State in late December . Brandon Ingram took on a lead role in LA 's absence with James on the bench , scoring 17 points and taking a team - high 21 shots . Ingram , however , shot just 8 - of - 21 and committed four turnovers in the loss . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the Lakers with 25 points . On Friday , the Thunder will continue on the road with a visit to Portland . LA , meanwhile , will host the New_York Knicks at Staples_Center .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 119 - 112 , at Staples_Center on Friday night . Both teams took turns dominating the other at different points , but it was the Knicks ( 10 - 29 ) who were productive at the most important juncture to ensure the win . New_York outscored the Lakers ( 21 - 18 ) by a 33 - 20 margin in the fourth quarter to put the finishing touches on a rare road win . Prior to that , they 'd also opened the game with a big 39 - 25 lead over the first 12 minutes . Los_Angeles battled back to win the middle periods , 64 - 47 , which left them with a 92 - 86 advantage heading into the final period before the visitors ' late surge . Tim Hardaway , Jr. paced the Knicks with 22 points , adding six rebounds and two assists . Enes Kanter generated a 16 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and three blocks . Trey Burke matched Kanter 's scoring total . Emmanuel Mudiay supplied 15 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Kevin Knox turned in 14 points , five boards , one assist and one steal . Dewayne Dotson registered 11 points , three assists , two rebounds and four steals . Mario Hezonja posted 10 points . Brandon Ingram led the Lakers with 21 points , nine rebounds , three assists and one steal . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope managed 19 points , six boards and three assists . JaVale McGee furnished 18 points , nine boards , one assist and one block . Lonzo Ball filled out the stat sheet with 17 points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Ivica Zubac delivered 10 points , six rebounds , two assists and one block . The Knicks remain on the road and take on the Portland Trail_Blazers on Sunday night , while the Lakers pay a visit to the Minnesota Timberwolves on Sunday afternoon .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 120 - 105 , at Staples_Center on Thursday . It was a slow start for the visiting Timberwolves ( 24 - 24 ) on Thursday , as they went into the locker room at half time trailing a Lakers ( 25 - 24 ) team that was without both LeBron James ( groin ) and Lonzo Ball ( ankle ) . However , after taking a narrow league into the final period , Minnesota poured it on the home team over the final 12 minutes , winning the fourth quarter , 36 - 23 , and leaving no doubt . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for Minnesota with yet another double - double of 27 points and 12 rebounds in 31 minutes , while Andrew Wiggins was close behind with 23 points of his own on top of eight rebounds in 37 minutes . Additionally , with Jeff Teague ( foot ) out of the lineup , Jared Bayless saw 30 minutes at point guard off the bench and put together an impressive performance , as he finished with 16 points and eight rebounds in 30 minutes as a reserve . As for the Lakers , the loss was their third in a row as they continue to slid out of the playoff picture without James . All five starters scored in double figures , with Brandon Ingram 's 20 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting leading the way , but the team as a whole could n't buy a shot from behind the arc ( shooting 29 percent ) or take care of the basketball ( 19 turnovers ) . Kyle Kuzma , who was been a reliable offensive option as of late , really struggled to get anything going on that end of the floor , as he shot 0 - of - 4 from three and 4 - of - 12 overall en route to scoring just 10 points in 28 minutes . With this win , Minnesota took a 2 - 1 lead in the season series between these two teams .
The Los_Angeles Lakers blew out the Phoenix Suns , 116 - 102 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . The win snapped a three - game losing streak for the Lakers ( 26 - 24 ) while extending Phoenix 's ( 11 - 41 ) to eight games . After what had been a neck - and - neck game on Monday , Los_Angeles pulled ahead late in the third quarter and never looked back . Phoenix committed costly turnovers on consecutive possessions to end the third quarter , allowing LA to maintain its momentum and a double - digit lead heading into the fourth quarter . The Lakers were led by a career night from Ivica Zubac , who had 24 points , 16 rebounds , and four blocks . The young center made the most of his extra touches with LeBron James , Kyle Kuzma , and Lonzo Ball all sidelined by injuries . Veteran point guard Rajon Rondo , who recently returned from his own injury , dished out 11 assists . Phoenix also had a large slate of injuries , with T.J. Warren , DeAndre Ayton , and De'Anthony Melton all missing Monday 's tilt . Devin Booker led the team with 21 points , while Kelly Oubre , Jr. added another 17 . On Tuesday , the Suns will visit San_Antonio while LA will host the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Philadelphia 76ers blew out the Los_Angeles Lakers , 121 - 105 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . It was smooth sailing for Philadelphia ( 33 - 18 ) , as the team led wire - to - wire . The Sixers led by 19 by the end of the first quarter , thanks to 11 points in the period from Ben Simmons . While LA ( 26 - 25 ) closed the gap to as little as eight points , the Sixers were able to hold a relatively comfortable lead for the duration of play . Philly did have a scary moment , though , when star big man Joel Embiid took a spill attempting to convert an alley - oop finish in the early fourth quarter . Embiid appeared to aggravate his back and exited for the locker room , though he returned to the bench to see the end of the game . He had 28 points and 11 rebounds before exiting . Simmons finished the game with 19 points , eight rebounds , and six assists for the Sixers , while Jimmy Butler scored another 20 points . The duo also combined for eight steals , contributing to the whopping 15 steals recorded by Philly as a team . The Lakers , again without LeBron James ( groin ) , saw a career - high 36 points from Brandon Ingram . Ingram shot a wildly efficient 16 - of - 20 from the field and dished out five assists . Unfortunately for LA , Ingram was the only Lakers starter to record more than 12 points . JaVale McGee led the second unit with 17 off the bench . The 76ers will continue their road trip with a visit to the Warriors at Oracle_Arena on Thursday . The Lakers , meanwhile , are due for a crosstown game against the Clippers on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers came back from a 19 - point deficit to defeat the Houston Rockets , 111 - 106 , at Staples_Center on Thursday evening . The Rockets ( 33 - 25 ) seemed like a lock to start the second half of the season off with a win after they took a 19 - point third quarter lead . LeBron James and the Lakers ( 29 - 29 ) , however , rallied to come back and even their record at .500 . The Lakers were able to turn the tide in the final minutes after a few big shots from James . Perhaps equally important , though , was the foul trouble experienced by Houston . Reigning MVP James Harden committed three offensive fouls in the fourth quarter to foul out , while fellow All-Star Chris Paul fouled out in the final minute of action as well . LA capitalized on its opportunities at the free - throw line , shooting 27 - of - 33 . LeBron led Los_Angeles with 29 points . He added 11 rebounds to secure the double - double . Forward Brandon Ingram added another 27 points and 13 rebounds , while Kyle Kuzma put up 18 more to help put the team over the top . For the Rockets , Harden led the way with 30 points , preserving his historic streak of 32 straight games with at least 30 points . Chris Paul , meanwhile , flirted with a triple - double , totaling 23 points , 10 rebounds , and nine assists . In his return from a finger injury , big man Clint Capela notched 12 points and 11 rebounds . On Saturday , the Lakers will travel to New_Orleans while the Rockets will visit Golden_State .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 131 - 120 , at Staples_Center on Friday night . The contest got out to a competitive start , with the Bucks taking a one - point lead after on quarter . The Lakers picked it up in the second where they outscored the visitors by seven , to take a 65 - 59 lead into halftime . The Lakers kept up the momentum to start the third , as they built a 12 - point lead by the halfway mark in the quarter . However , the Bucks rallied back to trail by just one , heading into the fourth . The score stayed tight though the fourth , with a couple of lead changes before sitting tied at 118 , with 2:25 to go . Back-to-back threes from Malcolm Brogdon and Eric Bledsoe put the game out of reach , as the Bucks held on to earn clinch a playoff spot with their seventh straight win . Eric Bledsoe led the Bucks with 31 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting , nine rebounds , five assists and one block , in 30 minutes . Malcolm Brogdon followed up with 21 points , four assists and two rebounds , while Giannis Antetokounmpo added 16 points , 15 rebounds , six assists and three blocks . The Bucks shot 52 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 40 from long range . Meanwhile , LeBron James led the Lakers with 31 points , 10 assists , seven rebounds and one steal , in 38 minutes . Brandon Ingram finished with 31 points , eight rebounds , two assists and a block , while Rajon Rondo added 20 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and two steals . The Lakers shot 48 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 40 from deep . The Lakers ( 30 - 32 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Suns on Saturday . The Bucks ( 48 - 14 ) will be right back in action , as they take on the Jazz in Utah no Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los_Angeles Lakers , 115 - 99 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday evening . Things got off to a hot start for the Nuggets ( 43 - 21 ) , who built a double - digit lead in the first quarter and led for the entirety of regulation . Denver was able to exploit two of the Lakers ' ( 30 - 35 ) biggest weaknesses , holding LA to seven three - pointers and taking an 18 - 5 advantage on the offensive glass . The Lakers nearly clawed back in the early fourth quarter , when a layup from Alex Caruso was able to trim the deficit to only two points . However , Denver 's Gary Harris scored on four of the next five possessions to help take the Nuggets ' lead back to double figures . Harris shot 8 - of - 11 to finish with 19 points in the win . The Nuggets ' leading scorer was veteran wing Will Barton , who tallied 23 points . Nikola Jokic also delivered a gem , finishing with 12 points , 17 rebounds , and eight assists . The win snapped a three - game losing streak for the Nuggets , who are now just one game out of first place in the Western_Conference . LA , meanwhile , was led by 31 points and seven assists from LeBron James . James made history on Wednesday as he passed Michael Jordan for fourth on the all - time scoring list . However , the milestone was overshadowed by another loss for the Lakers , who have now dropped four in a row . LA currently sits 6 games out of the playoff picture with only 17 games remaining before the postseason . The Nuggets will visit Golden_State on Friday to make a push for the top spot in the West . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , will play host to the Boston Celtics on Saturday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 120 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Saturday . Boston came into this game as a sizable favorite , as they added to Los_Angeles ' struggles here . The Celtics did most of their damage in the middle quarters , outscoring the Lakers , 68 - 52 , in the second and third quarters . That allowed Boston to lead by at least five points for the entirety of the second half . Three-point shooting was key , with Boston hitting 14 - of - 38 while holding Los_Angeles to 5 - of - 27 . The Celtics ( 41 - 26 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he accumulated 30 points , seven rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Marcus Morris generated 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Marcus Smart amassed 16 points , two rebounds , five assists and two steals while Gordon Hayward led the bench with 15 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Lakers ( 30 - 36 ) got a triple - double from LeBron James , as he tallied 30 points , 10 rebounds and 12 assists . Moritz Wagner set career - highs with 22 points , six rebounds and three assists . Rajon Rondo accrued four points , six rebounds and nine assists . Johnathan Williams led the bench with 18 points and 10 boards . Boston returns to action on Monday , when they travel to face the Los_Angeles Clippers . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 111 - 106 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , with the lead changing hands a few times , before the Lakers managed to take a three - point lead into the second . The Lakers held the lead for most of the quarter , but the Nets rallied back to take a one - point lead by halftime . The Nets came out strong in the third and pushed their lead to nine by the halfway point , but the Lakers tightened it up to make it a five - point game heading into the fourth . The Lakers did not give up and took the lead early in the fourth . The teams traded the lead through the quarter , until the Nets pulled ahead for one last time , as they held the advantage for the final four minutes , to earn their second straight win . With the loss , the Lakers are officially eliminated from playoff contention . Joe Harris was the high - point man for Brooklyn , with 26 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , in 31 minutes . D'Angelo Russell finished with 21 points , 13 assists , three steals and two rebounds , while Jarrett Allen added 13 points , 11 rebounds and one block . The Nets shot 40 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 42 from deep . Meanwhile , JaVale McGee led the Lakers with 33 points , 20 rebounds , six blocks and one steal , in 34 minutes . LeBron James followed up with 25 points , 14 assists , nine rebounds , one steal and one block , while Kyle Kuzma tallied 18 points , five rebounds and one block . The Lakers ( 31 - 41 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Kings on Sunday . The Nets ( 38 - 36 ) take on the Trail_Blazers in Portland on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers blew out the Washington Wizards , 124 - 106 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . The Lakers ( 33 - 41 ) earned a second straight win for the first time since the All-Star Break on Tuesday . The team distanced itself from its recent struggles with a strong offensive night , shooting 54 percent from the floor in the win . LA led from the first quarter onwards , capitalizing on a weak shooting night by the Wizards ( 30 - 45 ) . Washington could not get anything to fall on Tuesday , shooting 43 percent from the field and 6 - of - 32 from beyond the arc . LeBron James scored 23 points for the Lakers while dishing out a team - high 14 assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the scoring charge for LA , pouring in 29 points in the blowout win . JaVale McGee also continued his career - best tear , scoring 20 points while grabbing 15 rebounds and blocking four shots . For the Wizards , Bradley Beal scored a game - high 32 points . The rest of Washington 's starting five combined for just 27 points , though , as the team struggled to find reliable offense . Off the bench , Jabari Parker contributed 18 points . Both teams will face the second half of a back - to - back on Wednesday , with the Lakers visiting Utah and the Wizards traveling to Phoenix .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 129 - 115 , at Staples_Center on Friday evening . The contest got out to a high - scoring start , as the Hornets led for most of the first quarter , and took a 35 - 33 lead into the second . The Lakers kept up the pace in the second , while the visitors slowed down , as the Lakers outscored the Hornets by 12 in the quarter , to take a 10 - point lead into halftime . Both squads came out firing again in the third , as they matched each other for 32 points each in the quarter , with the Lakers taking a 101 - 91 lead into the final frame . The Lakers pushed their lead to 15 mid way through the quarter and easily held on for the home win . The loss marks the end of a four - game winning streak for the Hornets . The Lakers had three players top 20 points , led by LeBron James , who tallied 27 points , nine assists and three rebounds , in 31 minutes . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope followed up with 25 points , four rebounds , four assists and a steal , while Kyle Kuzma added 20 points , three rebounds and an assist . Rajon Rondo put on a show , as he dished 17 assists , with only one turnover , and nabbed five steals . Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 24 points , six assists , two rebounds and a steal , in 37 minutes . Dwayne Bacon followed up with 21 points , three rebounds , two assists and a steal , while Miles Bridges added 17 points , five assists , three rebounds and a steal , in 33 minutes . The Hornets ( 35 - 40 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Sunday . The Lakers ( 34 - 42 ) take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Sunday .
The Golden_State Warriors blew out the Los_Angeles Lakers , 108 - 90 , at Staples_Center on Thursday evening . The Warriors ( 54 - 24 ) wasted no time on Thursday , building a 27 - point lead by the end of the first quarter . The team poured in 18 three - pointers on the night to help preserve a comfortable lead throughout . The Lakers ( 35 - 44 ) closed the gap a bit in the fourth quarter , but it was far too little and too late for LA to stage a comeback . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Warriors with 21 points and 10 rebounds . Two-time MVP Steph Curry had a rare off night , shooting just 1 - of - 9 for seven points . It did not seem to matter , though , as Golden_State still saw five players score in double digits en route to the blowout win . Quinn Cook added 18 points off the bench . The Lakers were led by Jonathan Williams ' 17 points and 13 rebounds off the bench . The team was operating on limited capacity , as LeBron James ( rest ) and most of the Lakers ' young core were not active on Thursday . Rookie big man Mo Wagner was the top - scoring Lakers starter with 13 points . Both teams will suit up again on Friday , with the Lakers facing the Clippers and the Warriors hosting the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 104 - 101 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday . In the opener for both of these Florida teams , it was n't decided until the final seconds . There were numerous mistakes at the end of this game though , as there were three missed free - throws and two combined turnovers between the two teams in the final 30 seconds . Orlando was able to escape though , despite the fact that Miami ended the game on an 8 - 3 run . It was competitive throughout , as there were seven ties and 13 lead changes in total . The assist - to - turnover ratio was critical for the Magic , as they recorded four more assists than the Heat while committing four fewer turnovers . The Heat ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Goran Dragic , as he tallied 26 points , four rebounds and four assists . Josh Richardson accrued 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Hassan Whiteside amassed 12 points , 18 boards and two blocks . Dwyane Wade was a nice spark off the bench , providing nine points , 11 rebounds and two assists . The Magic ( 10 ) got a gem out of Aaron Gordon , as he collected 26 points , 16 rebounds and two assists . Evan Fournier finished with 13 points , two rebounds and five assists . Nikola Vucevic accumulated 12 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Mo Bamba led the bench with 13 points , seven boards and two blocks . Miami has to play a dreaded second half of a back - to - back on Thursday , as they travel to play the Washington Wizards . As for Orlando , they host the Charlotte Hornets on Friday for their next outing .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Orlando Magic , 128 - 114 , at Amway_Center on Thursday . This was an impressive performance from Portland , as they pulled out a wire - to - wire win . They did most of their damage in the first and fourth quarters , outscoring Orlando , 70 - 52 . Both offenses were unstoppable , with Portland connecting on 55 percent of their shots while Orlando hit 50 percent from the field . The key for the Trail_Blazers was the play of their backcourt , as they got a combined 63 points from their two starting guards while the Magic got just 26 points from their two backcourt players . The Trail_Blazers ( 3 - 1 ) got a season - high 41 points out of Damian Lillard , as he also provided seven rebounds and six assists . C.J . McCollum accrued 22 points , two rebounds and two assists . Jusuf Nurkic finished with 18 points , 10 boards and two blocks . Zach Collins was huge off the bench , totaling 17 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Magic ( 2 - 3 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 24 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Evan Fournier accumulated 17 points , three rebounds and six assists . Aaron Gordon finished with 17 points , four rebounds and two assists . Terrence Ross was a nice spark off the bench , providing 21 points , four rebounds and two assists . Both teams play road games on Saturday for their next outing , with Portland playing the Miami Heat and Orlando traveling to play the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Orlando Magic , 120 - 95 , at Amway_Center on Friday . It 's rare to see a home team dominated so thoroughly in the NBA but that was , unfortunately , the case for the Magic here . The Clippers really made their mark in the second quarter , outscoring Orlando , 35 - 22 . The Magic never got the game within an eight - point margin from there , as the Clippers led by at least 13 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Los_Angeles connecting on 13 - of - 26 from long range while holding Orlando to just 4 - of - 17 . Rebounding was also huge , with the Clippers outrebounding the Magic , 50 - 40 . Bench production was also critical , with Los_Angeles winning that battle , 65 - 35 . The Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) got a vintage performance from Lou Williams off the bench , as he provided 26 points , three rebounds and three assists . Tobias Harris led the starters with 21 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Boban Marjanovic got a rare start and accrued 10 points , 11 rebounds and two assists . Montrezl Harrell also played well off the bench , totaling 10 points , 12 boards and three blocks . The Magic ( 2 - 6 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 22 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Evan Fournier finished with 19 points , three rebounds , four assists and three steals . D.J . Augustin was the only other Orlando player in double figures , as he collected 13 points , five rebounds and three assists . On deck for Orlando is a road matchup versus the San_Antonio Spurs on Sunday . As for Los_Angeles , they 're off until Monday when they play host to the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Orlando Magic , 103 - 96 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday . This was truly a battle of four quarters , as each individual quarter was decided by at least five points . Detroit did their damage in the second and fourth quarters , outscoring Orlando , 57 - 36 . The swings are evident by the fact that there were eight ties and nine lead changes in total . Rebounding was the difference for the Pistons , as they outrebounded the Magic , 50 - 40 . The 13 steals recorded by Detroit marked a season - high , as they forced 20 turnovers from the Magic . Free-throw shooting was also critical , as Orlando hit just 7 - of - 8 from the charity stripe while Detroit connected on 18 - of - 20 . The Pistons ( 5 - 5 ) got another monster double - double out of Andre Drummond , as he tallied 23 points , 19 rebounds , two assists and three steals on 10 - of - 16 shooting . Blake Griffin finished with 20 points , five rebounds and three assists . Reggie Jackson totaled 15 points and four assists . Stanley Johnson led the bench with 13 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Magic ( 4 - 7 ) were led by Evan Fournier , as he collected 27 points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals on 12 - of - 19 shooting . D.J . Augustin accumulated 16 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Aaron Gordon amassed 15 points , 10 rebounds and six assists . Terrence Ross led the bench with 15 points and four boards . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Orlando playing host to the struggling Washington Wizards and Detroit traveling to face the Atlanta Hawks .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 117 - 108 , at Amway_Center on Friday . While Washington led for the majority of the first quarter , Orlando never relinquished the lead from there . In fact , the Magic led by 15 points at the half , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of this game . Orlando 's offense was on point , as they connected on 51 percent from the field , 42 percent from three - point range and 84 percent from the free - throw line . Rim protection was also key , with the Magic doubling up the Wizards in blocks , 6 - 3 . The Wizards ( 2 - 9 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals . John Wall accrued 19 points , seven rebounds , 12 assists and two steals . Dwight Howard amassed 12 points and six boards . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 19 points , four rebounds and two steals . The Magic ( 5 - 7 ) got a double - double out of Nikola Vucevic , as he collected 21 points , 14 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Aaron Gordon totaled 20 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Evan Fournier finished with 15 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals . Mo Bamba , Terrence Ross and Jerian Grant all reached double figures in scoring off of the bench . On deck for Washington is a road matchup versus the Miami Heat on Saturday . As for Orlando , they travel to The Big Apple to play the New_York Knicks on Sunday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 130 - 117 , at Amway_Center on Saturday . While Los_Angeles held the lead for the first 15 minutes of this game , Orlando dominated from there . In fact , the Magic outscored the Lakers , 75 - 50 in the second and third quarters . In addition , Orlando held a double - digit lead for the final 20 minutes of this game . The Magic ended up shooting 54 percent from the field while holding the Lakers to 48 percent shooting . Ball movement was also critical , with Orlando out - assisting Los_Angeles , 28 - 22 . The Lakers ( 8 - 7 ) were led by LeBron James , as he tallied 22 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Brandon Ingram totaled 17 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Lonzo Ball failed to score but provided five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Lance Stephenson led the bench with 19 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Magic ( 8 - 8 ) got a monster double - double out of Nikola Vucevic , as he accrued 36 points , 13 rebounds and two steals on 15 - of - 23 from the field . D.J . Augustin amassed 22 points and seven assists . Evan Fournier finished with 15 points , five rebounds and four assists . Jonathan Simmons was a huge spark off the bench , providing 12 points , five rebounds and six assists . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Orlando playing host to the New_York Knicks and Los_Angeles traveling to Florida the Miami Heat on the road .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Orlando Magic , 93 - 91 , at Amway_Center on Tuesday . The Raptors ( 14 - 4 ) and the Magic ( 9 - 9 ) played a tight encounter on Tuesday , as this game was decided on a last - second bucket by Danny Green with only 0 seconds remaining after several back - and - forth buckets down the stretch . Toronto jumped ahead in the game with a 29 - 17 lead after the first quarter , but Orlando flipped the script in the subsequent two quarters : 20 - 18 in the second , and 38 - 26 in the third one . As such , the Magic entered the final 12 minutes of action with a two - point lead . But Toronto once again showed their ability to close games down , and ended winning after a 20 - 16 fourth quarter , and Green 's jumper following an assist from Kyle Lowry . It was a thrilling end for a tight encounter that was decided down to the wire . Four Toronto players scored in double digits , and all nine players that saw action scored at least four points . Kawhi Leonard led the way with 18 points and six rebounds , while Pascal Siakam contributed with 15 points and nine boards . Green not only scored the game - winning shot , but he ended with 13 points . Serge Ibaka chipped in with 14 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Evan Fournier was the highest - scorer in the game since he finished with 27 points , four assists , and three rebounds . Aaron Gordon scored 16 points with nine rebounds and three blocks , and Nikola Vucevic posted a strong double - double of 14 points , 17 boards and four assists . No other player scored in double digits , but Jonathan Isaac ( nine points , five boards ) and Mo Bamba ( seven points , five rebounds ) contributed off the bench .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Orlando Magic , 124 - 118 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Nuggets got out to a good start on the road , as they built a 22 - 10 lead early on , however the home team battled back to cut the deficit to just three points by the end of the quarter . The Magic continued their push early in the second , where they tied it up at 33 . The second quarter was tight the whole way , as the Magic outscored the Nuggets , 26 - 25 , in the quarter . The teams played to a standstill through the third , as they poured in 32 points each . The Magic trailed by two to start the fourth , but fought hard , swapping the lead back - and - forth with the Nuggets . The Magic trailed by three with just a few seconds left in regulation , when Terrence Ross hit a clutch three to send the game to overtime . Unfortunately for the home team , the Nuggets took control in overtime , where they outscored the Magic , 12 - 6 , to earn their seventh straight win . Jamal Murray led the Nuggets with 31 points , eight assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 46 minutes . Paul Millsap came up big with 18 points , eight rebound and two assists , while Nikola Jokic tallied 12 points , 13 assists , eight point and one steal . The Nuggets shot 54 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 24 points , 15 rebounds and four assists , in 37 minutes . Evan Fournier tallied 26 points , eight rebounds , four assists and one block , while Aaron Gordon tallied 19 points , six rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . The Magic shot 47 percent from the field , including 20 - of - 49 from long range . The Magic ( 12 - 13 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Pacers on Friday . The Nuggets ( 17 - 7 ) take on the Hornets in Charlotte on Friday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Chicago Bulls , 97 - 91 , in Mexico_City , at Mexico_City_Arena on Thursday evening . The Bulls took the lead early on , but the Magic were able to keep it close , as they trailed 26 - 24 at the end of the quarter . The Magic picked up the momentum in the second , and built a 10 - point lead by the halfway mark of the quarter . They held no to take a 51 - 46 lead at the half . The Bulls came out tough in the third , but the Magic did not back down , and maintained a 77 - 71 lead to start the final frame . The Bulls started off the quarter strong again , this time taking the lead , as they pulled ahead 81 - 77 with 7:23 left in the contest . The Magic grinded it out down the stretch , as they held a one - point lead for almost two minutes down the stretch , allowing them to come up clutch on the offensive end , thanks to a couple of timely buckets by Nikola Vucevic . Vucevic led the Magic with 26 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block , in 32 minutes . D.J . Augustin followed up with 15 points , seven rebounds and two assists , while Evan Fournier and Jonathan Isaac added 10 points each . The Magic shot 42 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 33 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 23 points , five assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 40 minutes . Justin Holiday followed up with 18 points , five rebounds , three steals and two assists , while Bobby Portis chipped in 15 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 21 minutes off the bench . The Bulls ( 6 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Spurs in San_Antonio on Saturday . The Magic ( 13 - 15 ) play host to the Jazz on Saturday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Utah Jazz , 96 - 89 , in Mexico_City on Saturday afternoon . The Magic ( 14 - 15 ) and Jazz ( 14 - 16 ) engaged in a tightly contested first half , with Utah holding a slim two - point halftime advantage . They managed to add another two points to their lead in the third quarter , but Orlando won the shootout that unfolded over the final 12 minutes . The Magic managed to outscore the Jazz by a 41 - 30 margin in the fourth period , with their 47 percent shooting helping them overcome 22 turnovers . Donovan Mitchell spearheaded the Jazz with 24 points . Derrick Favors mustered 21 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Ricky Rubio generated 15 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Rudy Gobert totaled only six points but hauled in 13 rebounds and dished out two assists , recorded two steals and managed two blocks . Evan Fournier paced the Magic with 24 points , supplementing them with seven rebounds and one steal . Terrence Ross produced a bench - leading 19 points . Nikola Vucevic turned in 15 points , 19 rebounds , five assists and two blocks . D.J . Augustin supplied 11 points , five assists and two rebounds . Aaron Gordon managed a modest eight points and added three assists , two rebounds and one steal . The Jazz next pay a visit to the Houston Rockets on Monday night , while the Magic head back home to take on the San_Antonio Spurs on Wednesday evening .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Orlando Magic , 122 - 120 , in overtime at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Suns ( 9 - 26 ) have been showing plenty of improvement as the calendar year winds down , and that was certainly on display in what was only Phoenix 's fourth road win of the campaign . The Suns bounced back from a 32 - 26 first - quarter deficit to forge a 62 - 53 halftime lead . While the Magic ( 14 - 19 ) eventually came all the way back and sent the game into the extra period with three free throws by D.J . Augustin , the visitors played suffocating defense in overtime to limit Orlando to a jaw - dropping two points . Meanwhile , T.J. Warren was able to muster all four points for the Suns to seal the win . Devin Booker paced the Suns with 35 points , a total he supplemented with eight assists , seven rebounds , two steals and one block . Warren finished with 24 points , four rebounds and two steals . Kelly Oubre , Jr. managed a bench - leading 19 points . Josh Jackson tallied 10 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals . Deandre Ayton compiled eight points , 12 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Augustin led the Magic with 27 points and added six assists , two rebounds and three steals . Nikola Vucevic posted a 22 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two steals . Terrence Ross followed with 18 points , two rebounds , one assist and two steals . Evan Fournier poured in 16 points and also netted five assists and four rebounds . Aaron Gordon compiled 11 points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Jonathan Isaac and Jonathon Simmons contributed 11 points apiece . The Suns head back home to take on the OKC Thunder on Friday night , while the Magic remain home and tangle with the Toronto Raptors on Friday evening as well .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 116 - 87 , at Amway_Center on Friday . While Toronto came into this game as the favorite , Orlando looked like the far better team on this night . They did almost all of their damage in the middle quarters , outscoring the Raptors , 67 - 34 , in the second and third quarters . The Magic played some elite defense , as they held the Raptors to 30 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was also critical , with Orlando outrebounding Toronto , 60 - 41 . They also dominated through ball movement , out - assisting the Raptors , 29 - 18 . The Raptors ( 26 - 11 ) were led by Kawhi Leonard , as he totaled 21 points and six boards . Serge Ibaka finished with 17 points , eight rebounds , three assists and four blocks . Fred VanVleet was the only other player in double figures , as he dropped 11 points . Pascal Siakam went just 1 - of - 8 from the field to provide four points and four rebounds . The Magic ( 15 - 19 ) got one of the best games of the season from Nikola Vucevic , as he collected 30 points , 20 rebounds and eight assists on 12 - of - 17 shooting . D.J . Augustin amassed 17 points and six assists . Aaron Gordon tallied nine points , nine rebounds and four assists while Terrence Ross led the bench with 14 points and four rebounds . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Toronto playing host to the Chicago Bulls and Orlando welcoming the struggling Detroit Pistons to Amway_Center .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 107 , at Amway_Center on Sunday . The Magic ( 16 - 19 ) and the Pistons ( 16 - 18 ) engaged in quite a battle this Sunday , in the game that opened Sunday 's slate in The Association , but Orlando 's first - quarter lead in the initial first 12 minutes got the job done for them . Orlando jumped to a 10 - point lead in the first quarter and despite Detroit 's efforts to crawl back into the game , the Magic never looked back . The remaining three quarter ended 38 - 31 , 24 - 23 ( both for Detroit ) and 24 - 24 . So Orlando won by a slim two - point margin , but it was more than enough . Nine out of 10 Orlando players scored in this game , but four starters scored over 10 points and three finished with 20 or more points . The best player for Orlando , as it has been the case during most of the season , was Nikola Vucevic who finished with 22 points , 11 rebounds and four assists , while Aaron Gordon posted a similar stat line of 22 points , 10 boards and four assists . The top scorer for Orlando was D. J. Augustin , who had 26 points and eight assists , while Evan Fournier had 13 points . Derroit had a balanced offensive output with six players topping the 10 - point mark , although none had more than 16 points in total . Luke Kennard was the Pistons ' top scorer with 16 points , while Reggie Bullock scored 15 points . Blake Griffin had 15 points too , but he added five assists and two boards . Andre Drummond had a strong double - double of 14 points and 15 boards . Reggie Jackson filled the stat sheet with 11 points , five rebounds and four assists
The Orlando Magic defeated the Houston Rockets , 116 - 109 , at Amway_Center on Sunday evening . The Magic ( 19 - 24 ) found themselves in an early hole against a surging Rockets ( 24 - 18 ) squad , falling behind by a 26 - 18 margin after 12 minutes . The light went on for Orlando at that point , however , as they chipped away over the middle periods by outscoring Houston , 68 - 62 . However , they fell behind by as much as 10 again in the fourth quarter before finishing the game on a momentous 26 - 9 run from the 7:54 mark on . James Harden paced the Rockets with a 38 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included nine rebounds and four steals . Austin Rivers provided 25 points , two assists , one rebound and one steal . Clint Capela generated a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double and added three assists . Danuel House , Jr. tallied 14 points , two assists and one rebound . P.J . Tucker collected eight points , eight rebounds and two steals . Aaron Gordon and Nikola Vucevic co - led the Magic with 22 - point contributions . Gordon added eight rebounds , five assists and two steals , while Vucevic supplied nine boards , six assists and one steal . Evan Fournier poured in 19 points and also mustered five rebounds and two assists . Terrence Ross registered 17 points to lead the bench , supplementing them with four rebounds , two assists and one steal . D.J . Augustin checked in with a full line of nine points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . The Rockets head back home to take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday night , while the Magic pay a visit to the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday evening .

Three-point shooting was the difference , with the Nets hitting 19 - of - 46 and the Magic connecting on just 10 - of - 26 . Brooklyn 's bench was also huge , as they outscored Orlando 's bench , 52 - 34 . The Wizards ( 21 - 27 ) looked to be firmly in control during a first half in which they forged a 50 - 38 advantage . However , the Magic ( 20 - 29 ) put up more of a fight in the second half , clawing all the way back to take a 91 - 89 lead with 1:37 remaining before allowing the visitors to finish the game on a 60 run .
