The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Orlando Magic , 126 - 117 , at Amway_Center on Tuesday evening . The Thunder ( 32 - 18 ) got an early message from the home - court Magic ( 20 - 31 ) that they 'd be in a for a wire - to - wire battle , as Orlando jumped up to a 35 - 32 first - quarter lead . However , OKC bounced back in the second to forge a 69 - 63 edge by halftime . In a testament to the back - and - forth nature of the contest , the hosts would reclaim the advantage by a slim three - point margin heading into the fourth quarter before the visitors outscored them , 35 - 23 , to claim the victory . The short - handed Thunder , which were down Steven Adams ( ankle ) , were outrebounded , 53 - 43 , but they drained 54 percent of their attempts while limiting the Magic to a 43 percent success rate . Paul George paced the Thunder with 37 points , adding six rebounds , four assists and three steals . Russell Westbrook followed with a 23 - point , 14 - rebound , 14 - assist triple - double that also included one block . Dennis Schroder generated 21 points , four assists , three rebounds and one block . Jerami Grant finished with 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist and three steals . Nerlens Noel drew the start for Adams and produced 12 points , seven boards , one assist , five blocks and one steal . Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 27 points and also hauled in 11 rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal . Evan Fournier posted 17 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Aaron Gordon and Terrance Ross turned in matching 16 point tallies while hauling in nine and six rebounds , respectively . Jonathan Isaac and D.J . Augustin poured in 11 points apiece . Isaac notably brought down eight rebounds , while Augustin dished out five assists . The Thunder next visit the Miami Heat on Friday night , while the Magic remain home and tangle with the Indiana Pacers on Thursday evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 107 - 100 , at Amway_Center on Thursday . While Orlando led for the majority of this game , it took 10 ties to determine a winner . The fourth quarter really made the difference for the Magic , as they outscored the Pacers , 38 - 27 . Three-point shooting was key , with the Magic connecting on 11 - of - 25 and the Pacers hitting just 4 - of - 19 . Bench production was also huge , with Orlando winning that battle , 40 - 16 . Rebounding was also decisive for the Magic , as they out - rebounded the Pacers , 48 - 42 . The Pacers ( 33 - 18 ) were led by Myles Turner , as he amassed 27 points and seven rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic tallied 21 points , four rebounds and two assists . Thaddeus Young finished with 16 points , 10 rebounds and four assists while Darren Collison accrued 16 points , four rebounds and 10 assists . No other Indiana player had more than five points . The Magic ( 21 - 31 ) starters were led by D.J . Augustin , as he totaled 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Nikola Vucevic accumulated 17 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Jonathan Isaac collected 13 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and two blocks while Terrence Ross led the bench with 30 points , four rebounds and three steals . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Orlando playing host to the surging Brooklyn Nets and Indiana traveling to South Beach to face the Miami Heat .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 102 - 89 , at Amway_Center on Saturday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Brooklyn victory but Orlando won this game in dominating fashion . A 34 - 22 third quarter really made the difference , as the Magic led by at least five points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Defense was key for Orlando , as they recorded 11 steals and seven blocks while Brooklyn picked up just six steals and two blocks . In addition , the Magic held the Nets to 37 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . The Nets ( 29 - 25 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he totaled 23 points and six assists . No other starter reached double figures , as Shabazz Napier led the bench with 15 points , two rebounds and three assists . Ed Davis picked up a double - double off the bench , amassing 11 points , 16 rebounds and three assists . The Magic ( 22 - 31 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he collected 24 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Evan Fournier totaled 16 points , three rebounds and four assists . Jonathan Isaac accumulated 10 points , 12 rebounds , three steals and three blocks while D.J . Augustin finished with 12 points , three rebounds , eight assists and two steals . On deck for Brooklyn is a home matchup versus the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday . As for Orlando , they travel to face the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 122 - 112 , at Amway_Center on Thursday evening . The Magic ( 23 - 32 ) have n't had much reason to smile lately , and they 'd also been particularly inept offensively at home this season . Both of those trends were eradicated for at least one night against the defensively challenged Timberwolves ( 25 - 29 ) , which saw Orlando outscore them by a 70 - 54 margin over the second and third quarters to take a commanding lead into the final period . While Minnesota was able to play more competitively in the fourth quarter , they never got close enough to threaten . As the final score implies , the Magic were particularly successful shooting - wise , draining an impressive 54 percent of their attempts . Karl-Anthony Towns paced the Timberwolves with 27 points , adding 11 rebounds and five assists . Andrew Wiggins supplied 23 points , nine rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks . Dario Saric managed 17 points and eight boards . Josh Okogie and Isaiah Canaan generated matching 13 - point tallies while also posting four rebounds and six assists , respectively . Taj Gibson turned in 10 points , four rebounds and one steal . Terrence Ross led the Magic with 32 points in 31 minutes off the bench and also provided five rebounds and one assist . Nikola Vucevic registered 21 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Aaron Gordon compiled 19 points , six rebounds , five assists and one block . Jonathan Isaac contributed nine points , six rebounds , two assists , three blocks and two steals . The Timberwolves remain on the road and are right back in action versus the Pelicans on Friday night , while the Magic also travel and face the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets,127-89 , at Amway_Center on Thursday . With Charlotte hosting the all - star game this weekend , it was clear they checked out before this finale . In fact , the Magic led 71 - 36 at the half , as the Hornets could never get the game within a 25 - point margin in the second half . The shooting disparity was embarrassing for Charlotte , as they shot 35 percent from the field and 13 percent from three - point range while Orlando connected on 52 percent from the field and 44 percent from long range . Ball movement played a huge factor in that , with the Magic out - assisting the Hornets , 32 - 18 . Orlando also on the defensive rebounding battle , 42 - 32 . The Hornets ( 27 - 30 ) were led by Malik Monk , as he provided 15 points , four rebounds and two assists off the bench . Jeremy Lamb led the starters with 14 points , four rebounds and two assists . Cody Zeller finished with 13 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kemba Walker went just 4 - of - 20 from the field to total 10 points and three assists . The Magic ( 27 - 32 ) were led by Terrence Ross , as he provided 21 points and two assists off the bench . Nikola Vucevic led the starters with 17 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Jonathan Isaac amassed 16 points and six boards while Aaron Gordon accrued 10 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Evan Fournier tallied 12 points , three rebounds , six assists and two steals . Both teams return to action next Friday , with Charlotte playing host to the Washington Wizards and Orlando welcoming the Chicago Bulls to Amway_Center .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Orlando Magic , 110 - 109 , at Amway_Center on Friday evening . The Bulls ( 15 - 44 ) came into the contest looking to build on the rare double - digit win that they 'd notched in the last game prior to the All-Star break , but they were slightly overmatched in the first half by the even hotter Magic ( 27 - 33 ) . Orlando had rattled off a 7 - 1 record in their last eight games prior to the week - long pause in the season , and they forged a slim 53 - 51 halftime advantage . However , Chicago erased that deficit and built up a seven - point lead entering the final period , giving them a strong opportunity for a rare road win . The hosts battled back in defense of home court and even held a one - point edge with just 2 seconds remaining , but an Aaron Gordon shooting foul against Lauri Markkanen allowed the latter to the opportunity to drain a pair of game - winning free throws . Markkanen led the way for the Bulls with 25 points , adding 11 rebounds , two assists and one steal . Zach LaVine followed with 22 points , six assists , four rebounds and two steals . Robin Lopez supplied 18 points , six boards , one assist and three steals . Otto Porter , Jr. furnished 17 points , five boards , four assists , one steal and one block . Kris Dunn registered eight points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Evan Fournier paced the Magic with 22 points and complemented them with five assists and three rebounds . Nikola Vucevic generated a 19 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , two steals and two blocks . Gordon produced 17 points , five rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Terrence Ross poured in 15 points and also hauled in seven rebounds and dished out one assist . D.J . Augustin contributed 14 points , five boards and five dimes . Isaiah Briscoe delivered 10 points , three assists and two rebounds . The Bulls head back home to take on the Boston Celtics on Saturday night , while the Magic hit the road and tangle with the Toronto Raptors on Sunday afternoon .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 103 - 96 , at Amway_Center on Thursday evening . The Magic ( 29 - 34 ) caught a break of sorts when Kevin Durant was ruled out for rest earlier in the day , but they were still naturally facing an intimidating challenge in the defending champion Warriors ( 43 - 19 ) . Orlando forged a 59 - 51 halftime lead , yet it would be tale of two quarters in the second half . Golden_State came roaring out of intermission to wipe out their deficit and build a 10 - point lead going into the fourth quarter . However , Orlando was up to the task , turning the tables during the final period by outscoring the visitors , 33 - 15 , to secure victory . While the Magic prevailed in the battle of the boards by a 53 - 47 margin , the fact they held the Warriors to 40 percent shooting may have been their most impressive accomplishment . Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors in Durant 's absence , posting 33 points and adding eight rebounds and six assists . DeMarcus Cousins and Klay Thompson generated matching 21 - point tallies , with Cousins notably hauling in 11 rebounds . Draymond Green contributed five points , six rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Alfonzo McKinnie drew the start for Durant but mustered just four points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 22 points , adding 15 rebounds , three assists and one block . Terrence Ross poured in 16 points and also supplied five assists , four rebounds and one steal . D.J . Augustin turned in 14 points , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Nikola Vucevic and Jonathan Isaac generated matching 12 - point tallies , with the former also hauling in 13 rebounds , dishing out six assists and recording three blocks . The Warriors next pay a visit to the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday night , while the Magic travel to meeting the Indiana Pacers on Saturday evening as well .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 101 - 91 , at Amway_Center on Sunday evening . The Magic got out to a good start at home , as they got out to an early 11 - 4 lead , before taking a 28 - 25 advantage into the second . The Magic pushed their lead back to double digits early in the second and held on until they took a 56 - 46 lead into halftime . The Magic stayed strong in the third , as they held the lead for the whole quarter , however , the Hawks trimmed the deficit to seven by the start of the fourth . The Hawks kept fighting but could not make any progress , as the Magic held on for their second straight win . Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 27 points , 20 rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 34 minutes . Aaron Gordon followed up with 22 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Wes Iwundu chipped in 14 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and one steal . The Magic shot 39 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , Trae Young led the Hawks with 20 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 32 minutes . Dewayne Dedmon added 10 points , 14 rebounds , two assists and two steals , while John Collins chipped in 10 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . The Hawks shot 41 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 35 from deep . The Hawks ( 24 - 47 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Rockets on Tuesday . The Magic ( 33 - 38 ) play host to the Pelicans on Wednesday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 119 - 96 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday . It 's rare to see a game essentially over at the half but that was the case here . In fact , Orlando led by 14 points after the first quarter , by 22 at the half and by 31 points heading into the fourth quarter . That 's domination at its finest , as Orlando won this game in wire - to - wire fashion . The Magic 's defense was the difference in the game , as they held the Pelicans to 37 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range while outrebounding them , 65 - 49 . Orlando also out - blocked the Pelicans , 10 - 2 . The Pelicans ( 31 - 43 ) were led by Stanley Johnson , as he provided 18 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals off the bench . Ian Clark tallied 17 points , five rebounds and four assists off the bench as well . Frank Jackson was the only starter in double figures , as he amassed 14 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Magic ( 34 - 38 ) were led by Evan Fournier , as he tallied 22 points , five rebounds and three assists . Aaron Gordon finished with 20 points , seven rebounds , six assists and two steals . Nikola Vucevic collected 15 points , 17 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Terrence Ross led the bench with 19 points and three boards . On deck for Orlando is a home matchup versus the Memphis Grizzles on Friday . As for New_Orleans , they 're off until Friday when they play host to the Houston Rockets .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies in overtime , 123 - 119 , at Amway_Center on Friday . While Memphis either tied or held the lead for the entirety of regulation , Orlando prevailed in overtime . In fact , the Magic rode a 29 - 15 fourth quarter to tie the game and then outscored the Grizzlies in overtime , 13 - 9 . The overtime was extremely competitive , as there were seven lead changes before the Magic finished the game on a 6 - 1 run . Free-throw shooting was the difference in the game , with Orlando connecting on 21 - of - 27 and Memphis hitting just 10 - of - 21 . The Grizzlies ( 29 - 43 ) were led by Tyler Dorsey , as he provided a career - high 29 point to go along with three rebounds and nine assists . Jonas Valanciunas also had a career game , as he tallied 23 points , 24 rebounds , three assists and four blocks . Justin Holiday amassed 22 points and four boards . Delon Wright accrued 12 points , seven rebounds and eight assists while Chandler Parsons led the bench with 17 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Magic ( 35 - 38 ) were led by Evan Fournier , as he accumulated 27 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Nikola Vucevic finished with 25 points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . D.J . Augustin generated 20 points , six rebounds and eight assists while Terrence Ross led the bench with 31 points on 8 - of - 12 from long range . Memphis will have to play again on Saturday , as they play host to the Minnesota Timberwolves . As for Orlando , they 're off until Monday when they play host to the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 119 - 98 , at Amway_Center on Monday . While there were 10 ties and 23 lead changes in the first 30 minutes of this game . , Orlando dominated the second half . In fact , the Magic outscored the Sixers , 63 - 38 , in the second half , holding a double - digit lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Turnovers were the difference in the game , with Orland winning that battle , 15 - 7 . That allowed them to win the points off turnover differential , 23 - 12 . The Magic also out - assisted the Sixers , 28 - 20 and won the fastbreak scoring differential , 17 - 4 . The Sixers ( 47 - 27 ) were led by Joel Embiid , as he tallied 20 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Tobias Harris accrued 15 points , four rebounds and three assists . Jimmy Butler collected 13 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Shake Milton was the only other player in double figures , as he led the bench with 13 points . The Magic ( 36 - 38 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 28 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Evan Fournier accumulated 24 points , seven assists and two steals . Aaron Gordon totaled 12 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals . Michael Carter-Williams led the bench with 15 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Orlando has to play again on Tuesday , as they travel to face the Miami Heat . As for Philadelphia , they return to action on Thursday when they play host to the Brooklyn Nets .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 149 - 113 , at Amway_Center on Friday evening . The Magic got out to a great start at home , with a 42 - 18 lead after one quarter . They kept their foot on the gas in the second , while the Hawks managed to scored 30 points in the quarter , the Magic outscored them by nine , to take a 33 - point into the halftime . The Hawks picked it up in the third but only managed to match the 32 points that the Magic scored in the quarter . The Magic stayed on top through the fourth and were able to cruise to their second straight win . Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 25 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 29 minutes . Evan Fournier tallied 25 points , four rebounds and one assist , while Terrence Ross added 25 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Magic shot 61 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 36 from deep . Meanwhile , Trae Young led the Hawks with 22 points , seven rebounds , six assists and three steals , in 27 minutes . John Collins added 20 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal , while DeAndre ' Bembry tallied 14 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and three rebounds . The Hawks shot 44 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 39 from long range . The Hawks ( 29 - 51 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Sunday . The Magic ( 40 - 40 ) take on the Celtics on Sunday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 140 - 136 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday evening . The tone for what would turn out to be a scoreboard - busting affair was set in the first quarter , with the two clubs combining for 83 points during the period . The Mavericks ( 1 - 1 ) tightened up enough on defense during the second period to erase an eight - point deficit and send the contest into intermission deadlocked at 69 - 69 . Both teams essentially matched each other basket for basket in the third , and the Timberwolves ( 1 - 2 ) entered the final quarter with a slim two - point lead . However , Dallas saved their best for last , putting up a game - high 43 points in the fourth quarter . Dennis Smith , Jr. scored the final three points on free throws after Minnesota had gotten to within a point after a pair of Karl-Anthony Towns buckets from the charity stripe with 4 seconds left . Towns led the way for Minnesota with 31 points and added five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Derrick Rose followed with a bench - leading 28 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block . Jeff Teague just missed out on a double - double with 22 points , nine assists , two rebounds and one steal . Andrew Wiggins poured in 19 points and also supplied three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Taj Gibson 's contributions included nine points and six boards , while first - round pick Josh Okogie pitched in six points , five boards , two assists and one steal while filling in for Jimmy Butler ( rest ) . Dallas ' first - rounder Luka Doncic made significantly more noise , leading the Mavericks with 26 points . He also posted six rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . DeAndre Jordan posted a 22 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , five blocks and two steals . Dennis Smith , Jr. , Wesley Matthews and Dwight Powell turned in a trio of 19 - point tallies , the latter doing so off the bench . J.J. Barea was productive off the second unit as well , pitching in a 12 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included a rebound and two steals . The Timberwolves head back home for a Monday night showdown with the Indiana Pacers , while the Mavericks remain home and face the Chicago Bulls on that same evening .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 115 - 109 , at American_Airlines_Center on Monday evening . The visiting Bulls ( 0 - 3 ) impressively jumped out to a 61 - 59 halftime lead , with some red - hot shooting from Zach LaVine helping lead the way . However , it was the Mavericks ( 2 - 1 ) which made a statement in the second half , keeping their new - look offense humming while buckling down on the other end of the floor to outscore the visitors by a 56 - 48 margin . Chicago was still markedly better shooting - wise , draining 51 percent of their attempts , including 56 percent from three - point range . However , Dallas countered with a 41 - 34 edge on the boards and by committing four fewer turnovers . LaVine tallied a game - high 34 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Jabari Parker followed with a bench - leading 20 points and added three rebounds , an assist and a steal . Justin Holiday poured in 16 points , while Bobby Portis contributed 12 points , eight rebounds and two blocks in another start at power forward . Kris Dunn went for nine points , seven assists and four rebounds in his season debut . Wesley Matthews ' 20 points paced the Mavericks . He added four assists , two rebounds and two steals . Luka Doncic provided 19 points , six assists , three rebounds and one steal . DeAndre Jordan posted an 18 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included one block . The forward trio of Dorian Finney-Smith , Dwight Powell and Maxi Kleber all generated 12 - point contributions . Finney-Smith and Kleber also brought down four rebounds each , while Powell had four boards and four assists . The Bulls head back home to face the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday evening , while the Mavericks hit the road and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night as well .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 118 - 106 , at American_Airlines_Center on Friday evening . The Knicks ( 3 - 6 ) impressively came out of the gates strong , taking a 33 - 27 first - quarter lead . However , the Mavericks ( 2 - 7 ) were able to climb all the way back and carry a slim three - point lead into halftime . The light went on for New_York at intermission , however , as they compiled 33 points while limiting their hosts to 18 in the third period . That proved enough to help carry them to victory , as did their 55 percent success rate from the field and 18 - 12 turnover advantage . Allonzo Trier paced the Knicks with 23 points in 24 minutes off the bench . Tim Hardaway , Jr. supplied 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Mitchell Robinson and Enes Kanter posted matching 13 - point tallies . Robinson added 10 rebounds , while Kanter hauled down five . Dewayne Dotson and Mario Hezonja each provided 11 points , with the former also supplying eight rebounds . Dennis Smith , Jr. led the Mavericks with 23 points and also posted two rebounds . Dorian Finney-Smith followed with a bench - leading 19 points and seven rebounds . He added two assists and two steals . Luka Doncic managed 18 points , nine rebounds , six assists and one steal . Harrison Barnes turned in 14 points , two assists and one rebound . The Knicks remain on the road and pay a visit to the Washington Wizards on Sunday evening , while the Mavericks remain home and also tangle with the Wizards in their next game , which unfolds Tuesday night .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 119 - 100 , at American_Airlines_Center on Tuesday , In a battle between two struggling teams , Dallas prevailed with a dominating win . In fact , they led for all but one minute , as they held a double - digit lead for over half of this fixture . The Mavericks ended the game strong , finishing on a 20 - 7 run . Aside from a 29 - 17 third quarter in advantage of the Wizards , the Mavericks ended up outscoring them by 31 points in the other three quarters . Rebounding was the difference for Dallas , as they outrebounded Washington , 49 - 33 . Three-point shooting was also key , with the Mavericks hitting 15 - of - 34 from long range and the Wizards connecting on just 11 - of - 35 . Free-throw shooting was also critical , as Dallas connected on 26 - of - 27 while Washington hit just 15 - of - 20 . The Wizards ( 2 - 8 ) were led by John Wall , as he tallied 24 points , four rebounds , 10 assists and three steals . Bradley Beal finished with 19 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Otto Porter Jr. accrued 19 points , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Dwight Howard amassed eight points and 11 boards . The Mavericks ( 3 - 7 ) were led by Luka Doncic , as he accumulated 23 points , six rebounds and three assists . Wesley Matthews totaled 22 points and two boards . Harrison Barnes had his best game of the year , generating 19 points , 14 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Dennis Smith Jr. finished with 19 points , four rebounds and seven assists . On deck for Dallas is road matchup versus the Utah Jazz on Wednesday . As for Washington , they 're off until Friday when they travel to face the Orlando Magic .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 118 - 68 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday evening . The Jazz got out to a good start on the road , with a 15 - 10 lead halfway into the first quarter . However , the Mavericks rallied back to take a 30 - 24 lead into the second . The Jazz came back to start the second and tied the game at 34 , just a couple minutes into the quarter , but the Mavericks turned it up a notch , once again , to build a 58 - 46 by halftime . The Mavs did not look back from there as they held the Jazz to just 22 points for the entire third and fourth quarter , while they poured in 60 points , to pull off the wild , 50 - point victory . This marks the third straight win for the Mavs , and the end of a three - game win streak for Jazz . Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 19 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , four rebounds and two assists , in 26 minutes . Luka Doncic had a solid night , with 13 points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block , in 25 minutes . DeAndre Jordan finished with four points , 10 rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 22 minutes . The Mavericks shot 58 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , Ricky Rubio was the high - point man for the Jazz , with 11 points , along with four steals , three rebounds and three assists , in 24 minutes . Donovan Mitchell tallied 10 points , three rebounds and three assists , while Rudy Gobert added 10 points , 10 rebounds , three steals and two assists , in 25 minutes . They shot 31 percent from the field , including a poor 6 - of - 35 from long range . The Jazz ( 7 - 7 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the 76ers in Philadelphia on Friday . The Mavericks ( 6 - 8 ) play host to the Warriors on Saturday .

After a tightly contested first quarter , the Mavericks ( 8 - 9 ) built some cushion by outscoring the Nets ( 8 - 11 ) by a 27 - 18 margin during the second period . However , Brooklyn battled back in the third , and they entered the final 12 minutes with a 85 - 81 deficit . After multiple ties , Brooklyn was down just two points as late as the 4:3 mark of the fourth quarter before Dallas finished the game with a 16 - 12 run that was enough to hold off the visitors . Allen Crabbe returned to the starting lineup for the Nets and led the way with 27 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Spencer Dinwiddie came off the bench to supply 19 points , seven assists , two rebounds and one steal . D'Angelo Russell and Ed Davis each pitched in 17 points . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Boston Celtics , 113 - 104 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday evening . The Mavericks ( 9 - 9 ) came into the contest having notched seven of their eight victories on the season on their home floor , and with two full days of rest since their most recent contest . In contrast , the Celtics ( 10 - 10 ) had lost in six of their 11 road tilts prior to Saturday , and were playing their fourth game in six nights . All of those trends surfaced as the game wore on , with Dallas holding an 87 - 82 lead by the end of three quarters . They then remained similarly ahead during the final 12 minutes , adding another four points to their advantage for the nine - point victory . Both teams were fairly even across the stat sheet , but the home squad benefited from a 40 - point effort from their bench . Jayson Tatum paced the Celtics with 21 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . Kyrie Irving delivered 19 points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and one block . Marcus Smart matched Irving 's scoring total off the bench and also contributed two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Jaylen Brown turned in 16 points and five boards , while Marcus Morris supplied 13 points . Harrison Barnes and J.J. Barea co - led the Mavericks with matching 20 - point efforts . Barnes added three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , while Barea provided eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . Luka Doncic registered 15 points , eight assists , three steals and one block . Wesley Matthews matched Doncic 's scoring total in his return from a hamstring injury . DeAndre Jordan managed a 14 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . The Celtics remain on the road and tangle with the New_Orleans Pelicans on Monday night , while the Mavericks make the short trip to take on the in - state rival Houston Rockets on Wednesday evening .
The Dallas Mavericks took down the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 114 - 110 , on Sunday evening at American_Airlines_Center . The Clippers ( 15 - 7 ) trailed from the second quarter until the final minute , and were forced to fight an uphill battle in the fourth quarter . A late run helped push LA to tie the game at 107 - 107 . From there , however , Dallas ( 11 - 10 ) controlled the game . After a tip - in put Dallas up two , DeAndre Jordan helped the Mavericks secure the win by stealing the ball from Lou Williams and hitting a clutch free - throw . Dennis Smith , Jr. finished the game by blocking a shot from Tobias Harris with under 10 seconds remaining , at which point Smith hit a pair of free - throws to seal the victory . Jordan finished the game with 16 points and a season - high 22 rebounds . He added three assists , a steal , and a block . Harrison Barnes led all scorers in the game with 30 points , which came on 11 - of - 28 shooting . Veteran point guard J.J. Barea scored another 24 points . For LA , Montrezl Harrell led the team with 23 points . The big man 's breakout season continued , as he shot 11 - of - 15 and grabbed 10 rebounds in the loss . Lou Williams added 21 points and eight assists . One of the biggest problems for LA proved to be rebounding . While the Clippers grabbed only eight offensive boards , the Mavericks secured 17 . The Clippers will visit New_Orleans on Monday evening . Dallas , on the other hand , will remain at home and host the Portland Trail_Blazers on Tuesday .

The Mavericks ( 12 - 10 ) came into the contest with an impressive track record on their home floor , having notched nine wins in 11 tries . They looked to make it 10 of 12 on Wednesday , and they made an immediate statement by taking a 34 - 20 first - quarter lead . The Trail_Blazers ( 13 - 11 ) managed to claw back and get as close as 105 - 99 with 1:20 remaining following a Damian Lillard tip shot , but Dallas would finish the game on a 6 - 3 run to seal the victory . Lillard paced the Blazers with 33 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block . C.J . McCollum poured in 18 points and also provided four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Evan Turner led the Portland bench with 13 points and also managed five rebounds , four assists and one block . Barea and Devin Harris pitched in matching nine - point tallies . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 107 - 104 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday . When Houston led 100 - 92 with four minutes remaining , it looked like the game was in hand but Dallas had other ideas . In fact , the Mavericks finished the game on a 15 - 4 run , as Luka Doncic scored 11 - straight points in that span to capture the win . It was a competitive game throughout , as there were 16 ties and 26 lead changes in total , with neither team attaining a double - digit lead . Rebounding was key for Dallas , as they out - rebounded Houston , 44 - 36 . The Mavericks ended up shooting 49 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range while holding the Rockets to 45 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . The Rockets ( 11 - 14 ) were led by James Harden , as he tallied 35 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Chris Paul finished with 23 points , two rebounds and eight assists . Clint Capela amassed 12 points and 13 boards . Eric Gordon led the bench with 12 points but no other player on the roster scored more than 10 points . The Mavericks ( 13 - 11 ) were led by Luka Doncic , as he collected 21 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Wesley Matthews matched those 21 points , adding three rebounds and three assists to his tally . DeAndre Jordan had a monster double - double , as he totaled 12 points , 20 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Dorian Finney-Smith , Harrison Barnes and Jalen Brunson scored 14 points apiece . On deck for Dallas is a home matchup versus the Orlando Magic on Monday . As for Houston , they play host to the Portland Trail_Blazers on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 114 - 107 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday evening . The Mavs got out to a good start , with an early 12 - 5 lead , and held the advantage through the first quarter . The Hawks cut the deficit to just one , but the Mavs answered to take a 28 - 26 lead into the second . The Hawks took the lead early in the second with a quick 6 - 2 run . The teams stayed within one possession of each other through the rest of the quarter , with the Hawks taking a 52 - 51 lead into halftime . The Hawks stayed strong to start the third , and led 63 - 57 with seven minutes to go . However , the Mavs closed the quarter strong and took a 81 - 78 lead into the final frame . The Mavs carried the momentum into the fourth , and pushed their lead to 10 in the first minutes . They did not let up , as they pushed to a 15 - point advantage with 3:23 left in the contest . However , the Hawks gave the home steam a scare , with an 11 - 1 run , to cut the deficit to just five points , with 40 seconds left . The Mavs were able to seal their third straight win with clutch free throw shooting down the stretch . Luka Doncic had a huge night for Dallas , with 24 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block , in 34 minutes . Harrison Barnes tallied 25 points , three rebounds and one steal , while DeAndre Jordan finished with 11 points , 11 rebounds and two assists . The Mavs shot 47 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Trae Young led the Hawks with 24 points , 10 assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . John Collins added 20 points , 17 rebounds , one assists and one block , while Kent Bazemore finished with 22 points , five rebounds , two steals and one assist . The Hawks ( 6 - 21 ) head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Friday . The Mavericks ( 15 - 11 ) take on the Suns in Phoenix on Thursday .

The Kings got out to a good start on the road as they outscored the Mavs 34 - 31 through the first quarter . The Mavs kept it close through the second , where they matched the visitors with 27 points each in the quarter . The Kings held a 61 - 58 lead at halftime and carried the momentum into the second half , as they outscored the Mavs by seven in the third quarter to expand their lead to 10 by the start of the fourth . The home team did not give up and fought until the end , as they outscored the Kings by three in the quarter , but could not make up the difference in the end . De  Aaron Fox led the Kings with 28 points , three rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block , in 33 minutes . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 119 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday evening . The Mavs got out to a good start at home as they battled through a competitive first quarter to emerge with a 33 - 30 lead heading into the second . The contest stayed close through the second , as the Pelicans and Mavericks tallied 34 points each in the quarter , resulting in a three - point lead for the home team at halftime . The Pelicans came out strong in the third and managed to turn the tables by outscoring the Mavericks by seven in the quarter to take a 94 - 90 lead heading into the final frame . However , the Mavericks chipped away through the fourth and managed to tie the game at 105 with six minutes left in the game . The two teams treaded buckets down the stretch and the score was tied at 119 with 30 seconds left . The Mavericks were able to capitalize as Luka Doncic hit three out of four free throws in the final seconds to secure their 14th home win of the season . Doncic led the Mavs with 21 points , 10 assists , nine rebounds and one steal , in 31 minutes . DeAndre Jordan followed up with 20 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and one block , while J.J. Barea added 18 points , seven assists , five rebounds and one steal . The Mavs shot 48 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 32 points , 18 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , in 34 minutes . Jrue Holiday followed up with 25 points , six assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block , while Julius Randle chipped in 23 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . The Pelicans ( 15 - 20 ) will look to avoid a sixth straight loss as they play host to the Mavs on Friday . The Mavericks ( 16 - 17 ) next contest will be Friday in New_Orleans .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 107 - 97 , at American_Airlines_Center on Monday evening . The home team got out to a strong start , with a 33 - 25 lead after one quarter . The Mavs kept the momentum through the second and pushed their lead to 67 - 54 by halftime . However , the Lakers turned up the defense in the second half and outscored the Mavericks 32 - 13 in the third quarter , to take an 86 - 80 lead by the start of the fourth . The Lakers kept the upper hand in the fourth , as they pushed to a 14 - point lead minutes into the quarter and held on for the much - needed win . Brandon Ingram led the Lakers with 29 points on 12 - of - 21 shooting , six assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 37 minutes . Lonzo Ball followed up with 21 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals , while Josh Hart tallied 14 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and five steals . The Lakers shot 44 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 28 from long range . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 102 - 101 , at American_Airlines_Center on Sunday . The Mavericks ( 26 - 29 ) and the Trail_Blazers ( 33 - 22 ) played a thrilling game that seemed to be headed towards one direction , but Dallas flipped the script incredibly during the final 12 minutes of action to secure a huge win . In fact , Dallas won the first quarter by a one - point margin ( 25 - 24 ) , but Portland responded winning both the second ( 33 - 22 ) and third ( 35 - 31 ) quarters , so they were up by 14 points entering the final frame . It seemed as if the Trail_Blazers were ready to secure the win , but Dallas came out of nowhere to flip the script and win the game thanks to an impressive fourth quarter , where they allowed just nine points while scoring 24 . Luka Doncic was the best player for the Mavericks since he finished with 28 points , nine rebounds and six assists , while Tim Hardaway Jr. chipped in with 24 points , four rebounds and three assists . Dorian Finney-Smith had 11 points with six boards , while Dwight Powell contributed with 13 points coming off the bench . Dirk Nowitzki came off the bench and played 13 minutes , but only had three points and three rebounds . Only three Portland players topped the 10 - point mark and as expected , most of the heavy lifting in this game was done by their Big Three . Damian Lillard led the way with 30 points , but he also added five assists , three rebounds and steals but also committed five turnovers . Jusuf Nurkic posted a strong double - double of 18 points and 10 boards , while C.J . McCollum had 14 points , five boards and five assists .
The Miami Heat defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 101 , on Wednesday at American_Airlines_Center . After keeping it close through the first two quarters Wednesday night , the Heat ( 26 - 30 ) kicked it up a notch in the third period and outscored the home team 32 - 16 over the next 12 minutes . That gave them a 15 - point lead that they never let go of , and Miami now goes into the All-Star break with a little momentum after dropping three straight games . Dwyane Wade came off the bench to put on an incredible performance in the arena he won a championship in 13 years ago , scoring a game - high 22 points in just 22 minutes thanks to a 9 - of - 14 shooting display from the field . Dion Waiters was close behind , scoring 20 points in 31 minutes . Seven Heat players in total scored in double figures as the team put together a very strong offensive performance , shooting 40 percent from three and 54 percent from the field overall . As for the Mavericks ( 26 - 31 ) , they struggled to find the same success , shooting just 29 percent from behind the arc and a very poor 39 percent from the field . Rookie sensation Luka Doncic put together a solid overall offensive performance , posting 18 points , 12 rebounds and nine assists 33 minutes , but he struggled to get into any sort of rhythm offensively , shooting just 5 - of - 17 from the field . Tim Hardaway led the team in scoring with 20 points , but Dirk Nowitzki and Maxi Kleber were the only other Dallas players to reach double figures Wednesday night , scoring 12 and 11 points , respectively .

The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Indiana Pacers , 110 - 101 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday . The contest was neck - and - neck through the first 36 minutes , as the teams exchanged blows and leads en route to the Mavericks leading by a single point heading into the final period . From there , Dallas managed to pull away thanks to extraordinary shooting from downtown , as eight of the team 's nine field goals it made in the fourth quarter were from three , with a pair of 30 - footers from rookie sensation Luka Doncic in the final two minutes sealing the deal . The Mavericks leaned heavily on Doncic and the team 's starting backcourt , with Doncic , Tim Hardaway and Jalen Brunson combining to score 70 of the team 's 110 points Wednesday night . Doncic led the way with a game - high 26 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting from the floor , while fellow rookie Jalen Brunson added 24 points of his own on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Hardaway rounded out the trio with 20 points in 36 minutes . Thanks to their impressive shooting display in the final quarter , Dallas finished shooting a scorching 43 percent from behind the arc in the winning effort . As for the Pacers , while they managed to keep pace with the home team for most of the game , they just did n't have the jump shooting to keep up with them over the final stretch . Bojan Bogdanovic , the team 's best deep threat , his just one three pointer , but he still managed to finish with a team - high 22 points . Wesley Matthews was close behind with 20 points of his own , while Myles Turner and Thaddeus Young were the only other Pacers to reach double figures , scoring 13 and 11 points , respectively .

The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 129 - 125 , at American_Airlines_Center on Monday . The chances of the Pelicans putting an end to their six - game losing streak were looking bleak late Monday night when the team was down four points with just over 10 seconds remaining . However , with an Elfrid Payton three followed by a Kenrich Williams steal and a dunk from Julius Randle , the team was up one point with five seconds left . Williams , however , fouled rookie Luka Doncic on the next possession , which resulted in one free throw and overtime . From there , however , were able to build their lead to seven in the extra period and lock up the victory . Julius Randle was once again dominant for New_Orleans , scoring a game - high 30 points to go along with nine rebounds and four assists in 34 minutes . Meanwhile , thanks to the overtime period , Elfrid Payton was able to notch his fifth consecutive triple - double , posting 19 points , 10 rebounds and 11 assists . Frank Jackson had an impressive outing , matching Payton 's 19 points , while Anthony Davis played just 21 minutes but still managed to score 20 points . As for the Mavericks , Doncic led the way with a massive triple - double of his own , recording 29 points , 13 rebounds and 10 assists in 39 minutes . He did n't , however , have the most efficient shooting performance , going 1 - of - 7 from three and 10 - of - 27 from the floor overall . Tim Hardaway Jr. added 21 points of his own , while Dwight Powell and Jalen Brunson scored 16 and 14 points , respectively . Dallas could n't get anything going from the outside Monday night , shooting a pretty poor 9 - of - 35 ( 26 percent ) from behind the arc .

That allowed them to withstand Brooklyn 's best quarter , as they tallied 35 points in the fourth . Miami leveraged six double - digit scoring efforts and 54 percent shooting to secure victory . D'Angelo Russell shot just 6 - for - 18 on his way to 12 points . Joe Harris pitched in 11 points , five rebounds and three assists , while Jared Dudley generated 10 points , five rebounds , one steal and one block . The Heat remain on the road and next visit the Indiana Pacers on Friday night , while the Nets visit the Washington Wizards that same evening .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 102 , at Barclay 's Center on Friday . While there were four ties and five lead changes in the first half , Minnesota dominated from there . In fact , they led by at least four points for the final 20 minutes of action . They did most of their damage in the second and third quarters , outscoring Brooklyn , 67 - 46 . The Timberwolves defense was critical , as they held the Nets to 42 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . In addition , Minnesota recorded 15 steals and won the turnover differential , 18 - 7 . The Timberwolves also won the points in the paint battle , 52 - 36 , and outscored the Nets , 16 - 5 , in fastbreak points . The Timberwolves ( 8 - 11 ) best player came off the bench , as Derrick Rose provided 25 points , two rebounds and three assists on 11 - of - 17 from the field . Karl-Anthony Towns led the starters with 21 points and nine boards . Taj Gibson amassed 16 points , 11 rebounds and three assists while Jeff Teague tallied 15 points , two rebounds and nine assists . The Nets ( 8 - 12 ) were led by Joe Harris , as he collected 18 points , six rebounds and four assists . , Jarrett Allen totaled 12 points and four boards . Spencer Dinwiddie led the bench with 18 points , three rebounds and eight assists . DeMarre Carroll also played well off the bench , generating 13 points , seven rebounds and two assists . On deck for Minnesota is a home matchup versus the Chicago Bulls on Saturday . As for Brooklyn , they play host to the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday for their next outing .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 127 - 125 , at Barclay 's Center on Sunday . While Brooklyn held the lead for over 45 minutes of this game , Philly recaptured the lead when it mattered most . In fact , the Sixers finished the game on a 22 - 7 run , as they capped off their win with Jimmy Butler dagger . Butler hit a step - back three - pointer with 0 seconds left to turn a one - point deficit into a two - point victory . The assist - to - turnover differential really carried the Sixers , as they out - assisted the Nets , 28 - 19 while committing seven fewer turnovers . Brooklyn dominated offensively though , as they connected on 57 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range . The nine steals recorded by Philly was huge , as Brooklyn recorded just two on their end . The Sixers ( 14 - 8 ) not only got a game - winner from Jimmy Butler , but he also provided 34 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and four steals . Joel Embiid finished with 32 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and two blocks . J.J. Redick amassed 15 points , four rebounds and two assists . Ben Simmons accrued 13 points , five rebounds , nine assists , three steals and two blocks . Landry Shamet led the bench with 16 points . The Nets ( 8 - 13 ) got a spectacular performance from D'Angelo Russell , as he tallied 38 points , eight rebounds and eight assists on 16 - of - 28 shooting . Jarrett Allen totaled 17 points and 10 boards . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson finished with 13 points and six boards . Spencer Dinwiddie led the bench with 31 points , three rebounds and five assists on 11 - of - 15 from the field . Both these teams return to action on Wednesday , with Brooklyn playing host to the Utah Jazz and Philly welcoming the New_York Knicks to Wells_Fargo_Center .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 101 - 91 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday night . The Jazz ( 10 - 12 ) came into the contest looking for any type of reprieve from a forgettable stretch where they 'd dropped six of eight games . Despite their unsightly record , the Nets ( 8 - 14 ) had played several quality teams tough already this season , so it promised to be an uphill battle for Utah . Sure enough , the two clubs essentially matched each other basket for basket in the first half , and the visitors entered the halftime locker room with a slim 43 - 42 advantage . They saw that get erased and then some during the third period , which put the Jazz at a 78 - 70 deficit entering the final 12 minutes . However , they locked up the much - needed road victory with a dominant 31 - 13 advantage during the fourth quarter , capping off a strong defensive effort in which they limited Brooklyn to 35 percent shooting . Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Jazz with 29 points and supplemented the total with five rebounds , one assist and four steals . Rudy Gobert took advantage of one of the most appealing matchups for centers in the NBA by generating a 23 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , four blocks and one steal . Royce O'Neal moved back to the bench with Mitchell back in action and led the reserves with 13 points and four rebounds . Raul Neto poured in 11 points , while Derrick Favors mustered nine points and 10 rebounds . Ricky Rubio notably went 0 - for - 9 from the field on his way to a six - point tally . Spencer Dinwiddie paced the Nets with 18 points in 22 minutes off the bench , adding three rebounds and two blocks . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson , Jarrett Allen and D'Angelo Russell all contributed 14 - point efforts . Hollis-Jefferson and Allen made theirs double - doubles with 11 and 10 rebounds , respectively . Shabazz Napier pitched in 10 points in 16 minutes off the bench . The Jazz next pay a visit to the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night , while the Nets remain home to tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies on that same evening .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Brooklyn Nets in double overtime , 131 - 125 , at Barclays_Center on Friday night . The Grizzlies ( 13 - 8 ) and Nets ( 8 - 15 ) engaged in an epic battle , one that did n't seem headed toward the eventual final score through three quarters . Memphis held a modest 85 - 80 lead heading into the final 12 minutes , but they needed a Jaren Jackson three - pointer with 16 seconds left in regulation to knot the game at 111 - 111 and send it into overtime . The first extra period ended in a 117 - 117 deadlock thanks to Mike Conley 's 10 - foot driving floating jump shot with 10 seconds remaining . Memphis finally pulled away in the second overtime by scoring the last seven points over the final 2:32 , six which came from Conley . Conley led the way for the Grizzlies with a career - high 37 points , a total he supplemented with 10 assists , five rebounds and one block . Jackson registered 36 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Marc Gasol contributed a 15 - point , 15 - rebound double - double . Garrett Temple tallied 13 points . JaMychal Green pitched in 11 points and four rebounds off the bench . D'Angelo Russell paced the Nets with 26 points and added eight assists , one rebound , three steals and one block . DeMarre Carroll led the bench with 21 points and also posted 12 rebounds , one assist and one steal in 39 minutes off the bench . Jarrett Allen generated a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , one steal and one block.Spencer Dinwiddie and Rondae Hollis-Jefferson had matching 15 - point tallies as well . The Grizzlies remain on the road and pay a visit to the 76ers on Sunday evening , while the Nets travel to the Nation 's Capital and face the Wizards on Saturday night .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 99 - 97 , at Barclays_Center on Monday evening . The contest got out to a very competitive start with multiple lead changes . The Nets used a 9 - 1 run to create some separation mid way though the quarter , however , the Cavaliers battled back to take a one - point , 30 - 29 , lead to start the second . The Cavs carried the momentum , as they stayed one step ahead through the entire quarter , and pushed their lead to 56 - 50 by halftime . The Cavs came out strong in the second half and pushed their lead to 10 , within the first couple of minutes . Nonetheless , the Nets kept fighting and cut the deficit to four , 80 - 76 , entering the fourth . The Cavs pulled ahead to start the quarter , and held a decent cushion until about the three - minute mark , when the Nets began creeping back . The Nets managed to tie it up at 97 , with 18 seconds on the clock . However , the Cavs ' newest addition , Alec Burks stepped up in the clutch and threw - down a game - winning dunk . Jordan Clarkson led the Cavaliers with 20 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 28 minutes off the bench . Tristan Thompson followed up with 19 points , 14 rebounds , two assists and two blocks , while Collin Sexton tallied 15 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting . Alec Burks added 13 points seven rebounds and one assists , in 28 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , D'Angelo Russell led the Nets with 30 points , eight rebounds , six assists and two steals , in 32 minutes . Spencer Dinwiddie followed up with 18 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal , while Shabazz Napier chipped in 10 points , four rebounds and two assists off the bench . The Nets ( 8 - 17 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Thunder on Wednesday . The Cavs ( 5 - 18 ) play host to the Warriors on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors in overtime , 106 - 105 , at Barclay 's Center on Friday . While Brooklyn led for the majority of the first half , it took an overtime session to determine a winner . The second half was extremely competitive , as there were 10 ties and 12 lead changes , with neither club leading by more than five points . Brooklyn played some stifling defense at the end of overtime , as they held Toronto scoreless for the final 100 seconds , forcing them to miss their final four shots . Rebounding was the difference for the Nets , as they outrebounded the Raptors , 60 - 41 . Brooklyn also played well defensively throughout , holding Toronto to 39 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . The Raptors ( 21 - 6 ) were led by Kawhi Leonard , as he collected 32 points , three rebounds , four assists and four steals . Jonas Valanciunas finished with 24 points and eight boards . Pascal Siakam finished with 16 points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Kyle Lowry went just 1 - of - 8 from the field but still led the team with 11 assists . The Nets ( 9 - 18 ) got a gem from D'Angelo Russell , as he tallied 29 points , five rebounds and five assists . Spencer Dinwiddie was huge off the bench , providing 17 points , two rebounds and eight assists . Jarrett Allen amassed 12 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks while Rondae Hollis-Jefferson totaled 11 points , four rebounds and two assists . Ed Davis scored just one point but provided 15 rebounds off the bench to lead the team . On deck for Brooklyn is a road matchup versus the New_York Knicks on Saturday . As for Toronto , they return to action on Sunday , when they host the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 125 - 118 , at Barclay 's Center on Friday . In a battle between two struggling teams , Brooklyn prevailed with a victory . The second quarter really set the tone , with Brooklyn outscoring Washington , 43 - 28 . That allowed the Wizards to lead for the entirety of the second half . Free-throw shooting was the difference in the game , with the Nets connecting on 26 - of - 31 and the Wizards hitting just 9 - of - 16 . Rebounding was also critical , with Washington outrebounding Brooklyn , 46 - 25 . Both offenses were on point , with both clubs hitting over 50 percent of their shots . The Wizards ( 11 - 18 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 31 points and nine assists . John Wall totaled 17 points and 13 assists . Markieff Morris led the bench with 15 points , three rebounds and two assists . Austin Rivers played his final game as a Wizard and provided 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . The Nets ( 12 - 18 ) just signed Spencer Dinwiddie to an extension yesterday and he rewarded his organization by leading the team with 27 points , four rebounds and six assists off the bench . Joe Harris led the starters with 19 points , two rebounds and six assists . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson accrued 15 points , nine rebounds and six assists . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Brooklyn welcoming the Atlanta Hawks to The Big Apple and Washington playing host to the Los_Angeles Lakers .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 115 - 110 , at Barclays_Center on Tuesday evening . The Nets ( 14 - 18 ) started the game off with in the same impressive form that had netted them a five - game winning streak coming in . Brooklyn jumped out to a 62 - 57 halftime lead over the Lakers ( 18 - 13 ) , and they did n't let up after intermission . The home squad matched Los_Angeles basket for basket in the second half , holding off the visitors after they got as close as 113 - 110 with 17 seconds remaining . The shooting was impressive for both clubs , but the Nets were just a bit better with a 48 percent success rate overall , including 41 percent from three - point range . LeBron James led the way for the Lakers with 36 points , supplementing them with 13 rebounds , eight assists , one block and one steal . Lonzo Ball turned in 23 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kyle Kuzma posted a 22 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . Josh Hart and Tyson Chandler both started but provided just six and five points , respectively . Spencer Dinwiddie registered 18 points , six assists and one rebound . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson turned in 17 points and added eight rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jared Dudley and DeMarre Carroll generated matching 13 - point tallies and hauled in five and three rebounds , respectively . The Lakers remain on the road and tangle with the Pelicans on Friday night , while the Nets are right back in action Wednesday night on the road against the Chicago Bulls .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 106 , at Barclay 's Center on Friday . There were some major swings in this game , as it took seven ties and seven lead changes to determine a winner . In fact , Brooklyn overcame a 15 - point second quarter deficit to lead late in the fourth quarter but Indiana finished the game on a 14 - 3 run to prevail with a victory . The Pacers offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 54 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range while holding the Nets to 46 percent shooting . Indiana 's defense was also huge , as they recorded 10 steals and eight blocks while winning the turnover differential , 20 - 11 . In addition , the Pacers outscored the Nets , 48 - 32 , in paint points . The Pacers ( 21 - 12 ) were led by Victor Oladipo , as he tallied 26 points , nine rebounds , six assists and two steals . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 134 - 132 , in double overtime at Barclays_Center on Wednesday night . The Nets ( 17 - 19 ) did n't let a 29 - 22 first - quarter deficit deter them , as they turned the tables on the Hornets ( 16 - 17 ) in the second quarter to take a 56 - 51 lead into intermission . Ultimately , the game went into overtime after a wild sequence in the closing seconds of regulation when Spencer Dinwiddie made three free throws after being fouled by Jeremy Lamb with 6 seconds remaining to knot the game at 113 - 113 , and both Kemba Walker and DeMarre Carroll subsequently drained a free throw apiece , although the latter missed a second one that would have likely handed Brooklyn the win . In the second overtime , Malik Monk lost the ball with 7 seconds remaining , leading to a game - winning layup by Joe Harris with 3 seconds left . Walker paced the Hornets with 35 points and added six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Lamb posted 31 points , six boards , three assists and two steals . Marvin Williams generated a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks and one steal . Nicolas Batum turned in 13 points , three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Tony Parker led the bench with 10 points . Dinwiddie paced the Nets with 37 points , a total he supplemented with 11 assists and two rebounds . Harris scored a season - high 27 points and also provided six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson contributed a 16 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and three blocks . D'Angelo Russell matched Hollis-Jefferson 's scoring and also tallied four assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Rodions Kurucs pitched in a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , three steals and one block . Carroll delivered 12 points overall . The Hornets and Nets face off and do it all over again in the second game of the home - and - home series in Charlotte on Friday night .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 126 - 121 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday . The Nets ( 18 - 21 ) and the Pelicans ( 17 - 22 ) entered this game with the exact same record and fans that wanted a back - and - forth , tight contest were not disappointed . Brooklyn jumped to a 10 - point lead after the first quarter ( 39 - 29 ) , and they extended that lead during both the second ( 34 - 29 ) and third ( 32 - 29 ) quarters , so they entered into the final 12 minutes of action with a huge 18 - point lead . However , New_Orleans woke up in the final 12 minutes , but they fell short . Their 34 - 21 had them at the brink of pulling an impressive comeback , but they fell short and the Nets ended winning the game in front of their fans . Surprisingly , seven of the nine Brooklyn players that saw action managed to score in double figures . The top scorer was D'Angelo Russell , who had 22 points with 13 assists , while Joe Harris added 21 points . DeMarre Carroll had 19 points off the bench , and Spencer Dinwiddie contributed 18 points and four assists despite not starting . Jarrett Allen and Rodions Kurucs each had 10 points . The Pelicans ' starting lineup did the heavy lifting in this one , since the bench only managed to score five points ( in total ) while shooting 2 - 7 combined . Anthony Davis was their top scorer with 34 points , 26 rebounds and four assists , while Elfrid Payton chipped in with 25 points and seven assists . Jrue Holiday had 20 points , Julius Randle chipped in with 21 , and E'Twaun Moore delivered 16 points .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 116 - 100 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday night . The Hawks ( 12 - 29 ) managed to jump ahead in this game and led by an astonishing 15 - point margin ( 38 - 23 ) following the first quarter , but that would be everything they do as the Nets ( 21 - 22 ) bounced back and quickly gained control of the contest . Brooklyn trimmed the deficit to just six points by halftime thanks to a 28 - 19 second quarter , and they would never look back in the second half . They won the remaining two quarters comfortably ( 35 - 23 and 30 - 20 , respectively ) and ended cruising their way towards a 16 - point victory that extended their current run to four wins in their last five games . Meanwhile , Atlanta have now dropped five of their last six games . Seven Brooklyn players scored in double digits in this game , led by D'Angelo Russell who finished with 23 points , four assists and three rebounds . Joe Harris delivered 16 points , while Jarrett Allen and Rodions Kurucs each chipped in with 11 . DeMarre Carroll contributed 17 points off the bench , while Spencer Dinwiddie ( 16 points , five assists , four rebounds ) and Shabazz Napier ( 11 points ) also had good games while coming off the second unit . The best player for the Hawks was John Collins , who ended with 30 points and 14 rebounds . Trae Young had 17 points with seven assists , but he went 6 - 15 from the field and only 2 - 9 from three - point range . Kevin Huerter added 14 points and 10 boards , and Jeremy Lin played very well off the bench : 16 points , five rebounds , three assists and three steals .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Boston Celtics , 109 - 102 , at Barclays_Center on Monday . The Nets ( 22 - 23 ) have been quite inconsistent over the current 2018 - 19 NBA season , but they managed to deliver an impressive performance while facing one of the top teams in the Eastern_Conference such as the Celtics ( 25 - 18 ) . Brooklyn quickly jumped ahead to a 27 - 25 lead in the first quarter , but Boston kept things close and the first half ended with a 46 - 45 edge for the hosts . Brooklyn would jump through a huge 44 - 21 after the third quarter , which gave them a 24 - point edge heading into the final 12 minutes and even though Boston would cut the deficit in the final quarter ( 36 - 19 ) , the Nets ended winning the game by a rather comfortable seven - point advantage . Undoubtedly , D'Angelo Russell was the biggest scoring threat for the Nets since he finished with 34 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Jarrett Allen had an impressive performance on both ends of the floor , as he chipped in with 19 points , 12 rebounds and four blocks . Rodions Kurucs had 19 points , while Joe Harris added 13 points , eight boards and three assists . DeMarre Carroll added 10 points off the bench . Only three Boston players ended scoring with more than 10 points , and second - year player Jayson Tatum led the way with an impressive 34 - point performance , but he also contributed five rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Jaylen Brown had 22 points , but he also chipped in with six rebounds and two steals . Brad Wanamaker had a solid outing off the bench , with 13 points , four assists and three boards .

The shooting disparity was critical as well , with the Nets shooting 50 percent from the field and 83 percent from the free - throw line while holding the Kings to 42 percent from the field and 55 percent from the free - throw line . They did a ton of their damage down low , outscoring Sacramento in the paint , 62 - 46 . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 101 - 85 , at Barclays_Center on Monday evening . The Nets ( 32 - 30 ) have n't exactly made their bones on the defensive end this season , but that ended up being their unlikely meal ticket Monday versus the sluggish Spurs ( 33 - 29 ) . Brooklyn jumped out to an early 28 - 20 first - quarter lead , and they were even stingier in the second quarter while holding San_Antonio to just 18 points during the period . The hosts then piled on eight points to a 14 - point halftime edge during the third quarter , essentially sealing the win . While the Nets ' 43 percent success rate from the floor was n't particularly sharp , it looked stellar next to the 36 percent figure they held the Spurs to . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 26 points , adding 10 rebounds , one assist and three blocks . DeMar DeRozan registered 23 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Rudy Gay turned in 13 points and three rebounds . Derrick White provided seven points , six rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block . D'Angelo Russell paced the Nets with 23 points and complemented them with eight assists , seven rebounds , one steal and one block . Joe Harris and Caris LeVert generated matching 15 - point tallies , with the latter notably adding seven assists , five rebounds and one block . Jarrett Allen mustered nine points , eight rebounds , one steal and one block . Allen Crabbe had eight points , while DeMarre Carroll collected seven points , 12 rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Spurs head back home to face the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday evening , while the Nets remain home to tangle with the Washington Wizards on Wednesday night .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 123 - 112 , at Barclays_Center on Friday evening . The Hornets ( 29 - 33 ) and the Nets ( 32 - 32 ) had already engaged in a couple of entertaining back - and - forth battles this season , but Brooklyn had come out on top in both by a combined four points . Charlotte seemed intent on not allowing that to happen again , as they built a 68 - 50 halftime lead on the strength of a 37 - point second quarter . The visitors kept the foot on the gas in the second half as well , closing out the impressive road win by scoring another 55 points over the third and fourth periods . Both teams shot over 50 percent in the high - scoring affair . Kemba Walker paced the Hornets with 25 points , adding seven assists , four rebounds and four steals . Jeremy Lamb poured in 22 points and added a rebound and a block . Nicolas Batum turned in 17 points , six boards , five assists and one block . Frank Kaminsky managed 15 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Cody Zeller and Tony Parker generated matching 12 - point tallies while posting nine rebounds and five assists , respectively . Marvin Williams collected 11 points , eight boards and two assists . D'Angelo Russell led the Nets with 22 points and also dished out nine assists . DeMarre Carroll contributed 20 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Spencer Dinwiddie furnished 15 points , four assists and one steal . Caris LeVert delivered 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one block . Jarrett Allen mustered 10 points , two rebounds , two assists and one block . The Hornets head back home to take on the Portland Trail_Blazers on Sunday afternoon , while the Nets pay a visit to the Miami Heat on Saturday night .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 127 - 88 , at Barclays_Center on Monday evening . The Nets ( 33 - 33 ) came into Monday 's contest not only trying to get their record back up to .500 , but to snap a three - game losing streak as well . After some back and forth over the first several minutes , Brooklyn hit its stride and never looked back . The home squad had built a 65 - 47 halftime lead over the Mavericks ( 27 - 36 ) , and by adding another eight points to their advantage in the third quarter , they essentially sealed the victory . A deflated Dallas team scored just 15 points in the fourth quarter and shot 36 percent , including 27 percent from three - point range . Dwight Powell led the way for the Mavericks with 20 points , adding six rebounds and six assists . Luka Doncic followed with 16 points and supplemented them with six rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Jalen Brunson supplied 10 points , three rebounds and one assist . Tim Hardaway , Jr. offered just seven points on 3 - for - 11 shooting , while Dirk Nowitzki was just 2 - for - 13 on his way to four points . Maxi Kleber led the bench with eight points and also generated five rebounds , four assists and one block . DeMarre Carroll paced the Nets with 22 points and complemented them with five boards and four assists . Rodions Kurucs drew the start for Treveon Graham ( back ) and furnished 19 points , six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Caris LeVert delivered 18 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie registered 16 points , five assists , two rebounds and two steals . D'Angelo Russell pitched in a 13 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds and two steals . Joe Harris poured in 11 points . The Mavericks remain on the road and tangle with the Washington Wizards on Wednesday night , while the Nets remain home to tangle with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday evening as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 103 - 75 , at Barclay 's Center on Monday . Despite the fact that Detroit was scorching - hot headed into this matchup , Brooklyn thoroughly dominated them here . A 27 - 19 first quarter really set the tone , as a 34 - 16 second quarter put the nail in the coffin . In fact , Brooklyn led by at least 18 points for the entirety of the second half . Defensive rebounding was critical , with the Nets winning that battle , 48 - 32 . Brooklyn had their best defensive game of the season , holding Detroit to 28 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range . The Pistons ( 34 - 32 ) were led by Andre Drummond , as he collected 13 points , 20 rebounds and three assists . Blake Griffin accumulated 10 points , seven rebounds and six assists . No other player reached double figures in scoring , five rebounds or four assists . In addition , no player shot higher than 50 percent from the field . The Nets ( 36 - 33 ) were led by Spencer Dinwiddie , as he provided 19 points , two rebounds and two assists off the bench . Allen Crabbe led the starters with 14 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Rodions Kurucs amassed 13 points , two rebounds and three steals while D'Angelo Russell finished with 11 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Detroit traveling to face the Miami Heat and Brooklyn playing the Oklahoma_City Thunder on the road as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 110 - 96 , at Barclay 's Center on Saturday . Boston played this game without Kyrie Irving and Al Horford for resting purposes and it clearly hampered them in this ugly loss . The Nets did all their damage in the second and third quarters , outscoring the Celtics , 65 - 49 . That allowed them to hold a double - digit lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . While Brooklyn did n't dominate any statistic , they won almost all of them . In fact , the Nets won the rebounding , assisting , turnovers and field goal percentage disparities . Their biggest differential was the turnover battle , winning that 15 - 12 . The Celtics ( 45 - 32 ) were led by Gordon Hayward , as he provided 19 points , six rebounds and three assists off the bench . Daniel Theis also played well off the bench , tallying 16 points , four rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Marcus Morris was the only starter in double figures , as he amassed 16 points and five boards . The Nets ( 39 - 38 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he collected 29 points , three rebounds , 10 assists and two steals . Joe Harris totaled 13 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Caris Levert was huge off the bench , generating 15 points , two rebounds and four steals . Jarrett Allen finished with 10 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Boston playing host to the Miami Heat and Brooklyn welcoming the top - seeded Milwaukee Bucks to Barclay 's Center .
