The Bucks ( 58 - 20 ) came into the contest short - handed , even with Giannis Antetokoumpo suiting up despite an ankle issue . Milwaukee was still missing Khris Middleton ( groin ) and Nikola Mirotic ( thumb ) , but that hardly seemed to matter once the game got going . The visitors held a modest 59 - 54 advantage at halftime , but the Nets ( 39 - 39 ) clawed back to cut their deficit to two heading into the fourth quarter . In a high - scoring fourth quarter , Brooklyn would get as close as 123 - 117 with 2:26 remaining , but the Bucks would finish on an 8 - 4 run to seal the win . The home squad had a particularly poor night with respect to ball security , committing 23 turnovers . Eric Bledsoe led the way for the Bucks with 29 points , adding seven assists , five rebounds , five steals and two blocks . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 113 - 94 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . This game secured the six - seed for the Brooklyn Nets , as they won in dominating fashion . A 32 - 23 first quarter really set the tone , as a 31 - 24 second quarter was too much for Miami to overcome . In fact , the Nets held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Nets hitting 21 - of - 58 and the Heat connecting on just 8 - of - 41 . Offensive rebounding was also critical , with Brooklyn winning that battle , 20 - 8 . The Heat ( 39 - 43 ) were led by Dwyane Wade , as he tallied 25 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists in the final NBA game of his career . Udonis Haslem started and totaled 12 points , 11 rebounds and two assists . Duncan Robinson led the bench with 15 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Nets ( 42 - 40 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he accrued 21 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Rodions Kurucs totaled 15 points , nine rebounds and two steals . Jarrett Allen scored just one point but led the team with 14 rebounds . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson provided 10 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and three steals off the bench . Shabazz Napier amassed 20 points , five rebounds and five assists off the bench as well . Brooklyn has earned themselves a playoff berth , landing the six - seed in the east . That means they 'll travel to face the Philadelphia 76ers in the opening round , with those teams splitting their four - game season series .

Denver put their stamp on the decisive victory by outscoring the visitors , 27 - 12 , in the final 12 minutes . The home squad was especially effective on defense , limiting Phoenix to 38 percent shooting while also eliciting 19 turnovers . Warren was next with a bench - leading 16 points , a total he complemented with three rebounds , one assist and one block . The Denver Nuggets defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 100 - 98 , at Pepsi_Center on Sunday night . Both teams came undefeated into this game but against all odds , it would be the Nuggets ( 30 ) who kept their streak alive thanks to a couple of magnificent plays down the stretch . The Warriors ( 2 - 1 ) never gave up and tried to send the game to overtime in the final seconds , but a key behind - the - back block from Juan Hernangomez sealed the win for a Denver team that kept the opposition under 100 points for the third straight game . It was a back - and - forth game from start to finish , but the Nuggets came out on top once it was all said and done . Gary Harris was the leading scorer for the Nuggets since he finished the contest with 28 points while shooting 11 - of - 20 from the field and 4 - of - 7 from the free - throw line . Nikola Jokic once again filled the stat sheet and delivered another impressive performance , finishing with 23 points , 11 rebounds and six assists . Miles Plumlee added 11 points off the bench . Jamal Murray struggled , however , finishing with just three points while going 0 - for - 9 from the field . Stephen Curry paved the way for the Warriors with a 30 - point , six - assist performance , while Kevin Durant also had a decent game since he finished with 20 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists , but only shot 7 - of - 19 from the field . Klay Thompson added 15 points , and Kevon Looney chipped in with 10 points and six boards off the bench .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Sacramento Kings , 126 - 112 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday evening . The Nuggets ( 40 ) had made quite the statement with a 100 - 98 victory over the world champion Golden State Warriors on Sunday night , but on paper , they had an even bigger defensive challenge on their hands Tuesday . The Kings ( 1 - 3 ) came into the contest scoring the second - highest points per game ( 126 ) , with several of their key young pieces excelling early in the new season . However , Denver was the team that came out of the gates hot , jumping out to a 68 - 55 halftime lead . They did n't take their foot off the gas coming out of intermission , either , as they tacked another 11 points to their advantage with a 37 - point third - quarter haul . That left them in the driver 's seat for a comfortable victory , Marvin Bagley III led the Kings with 20 points , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds , three assists and five blocks . Justin Jackson was strong off the bench as well , posting 17 points , three rebounds , three assists and a block . Frank Mason III turned in a full line of 14 points , seven assists , five rebounds and one steal . Nikola Jokic pitched in a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and one steal . Trey Lyles contributed 12 points , five rebounds , three assists and one block . The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 116 - 111 , at Pepsi_Center on Monday . Anthony Davis was sidelined on Monday due to an elbow injury , but that did not stop New_Orleans ( 4 - 2 ) from putting up a strong fight in the loss . After Denver ( 5 - 1 ) led by as much as 18 in the third quarter , the Pelicans clawed back through the third and fourth , eventually cutting the lead to as little as three . Ultimately , though , Denver 's strong offense got the best of the Pelicans . The Nuggets hit 11 three - pointers and dished out 28 assists in the win . 10 of those dimes were dished out by Nikola Jokic , who narrowly missed out on a triple - double on Monday . The star big man finished with 12 points , 10 assists , and nine rebounds , continuing his strong third - year campaign . The Nuggets ' backcourt of Gary Harris and Jamal Murray scored 23 points each and combined to shoot 17 - of - 35 on the night . New_Orleans , meanwhile , saw offseason acquisition Julius Randle step up in Davis 's absence . Randle scored 24 points to lead all scorers , and also finished with eight rebounds and six assists . Starting power forward Nikola Mirotic added another 17 points , 10 rebounds , and three steals . The team will look to continue its strong offensive production when Davis returns from his injury . On Wednesday , the Nuggets will visit Chicago while the Pelicans will travel to Golden_State .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Utah Jazz , 103 - 88 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday evening . The two division rivals came into the contest pretty evenly matched despite the two - win difference in their records . The first half bore that out , as the Nuggets ( 7 - 1 ) only held a slim 47 - 46 edge at intermission . However , the Jazz ( 4 - 5 ) managed to separate some in the third , erasing their deficit and building a five - point lead going into the final 12 minutes . Then everything went downhill for the visitors , as they saw star two - guard Donovan Mitchell have to be helped off the court due to an ankle injury and were outscored by a 35 - 15 margin to close out the game . Mitchell did manage to return after getting his ankle taped , but it was a case of too little too late . Jae Crowder led the Jazz off the bench with 21 points in 32 minutes . Mitchell paced the first unit with 16 points despite missing some time , and he added five rebounds , two assists and five steals . The Nets got out to a strong start on the road , as they outscored the Nuggets by 10 in the first , to take a 34 - 24 lead into the second quarter . The game tightened up in the second , but the Nuggets could not make much of a dent in the lead , as they trailed 55 - 47 at the half . The Nuggets came out strong in the third and managed to tie it up at 65 , halfway though the quarter , however , the Nets picked it up again , and pulled ahead by six , heading into the fourth . The Nuggets tightened things up early in the quarter , and the two teams fought it out down the stretch , tied at 102 , with three minutes left . The game went down to the wire , with a tie game and the Nets ' ball with 22 seconds left . Caris LeVert came up as the hero , as he drained a jumper to seal the win with 0 seconds left . This marks the third straight win for the Nets and the second straight loss for the Nuggets . LeVert finished with 17 points , five assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block , in 31 minutes , while D'Angelo Russell led the Nets with 23 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 26 minutes . The third quarter was pivotal , as the visitors gained 10 points worth of separation on the Nuggets ( 9 - 5 ) . Then , the Rockets managed to match Denver basket for basket during the final 12 minutes , leading to a surprising double - digit victory . Both teams shot particularly well , but Houston 's 55 percent success rate slightly edged the home squad 's 50 percent figure . The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 138 - 93 , at Pepsi_Center on Thursday evening . The Nuggets went straight to work , as they kicked the game off with a 130 run , through the four minutes of the quarter . They went on to outscore the Hawks , 35 - 23 , in the first quarter . The Hawks picked it up to start the second , and cut the deficit to nine , however the Nuggets kept up the pace and managed to increase their lead to 73 - 57 by halftime . Denver remained relentless , as the Nuggets outscored the Hawks by 20 in the third quarter , to put the game entirely out of reach , with a 36 - point deficit heading into the fourth . The win marks the end of a four - game skid for the Nuggets , and also the sixth straight loss for Atlanta . Seven players scored in double digits for the Nuggets , led by Juancho Hernangomez , who tallied 25 points , nine rebounds , one assists and one steal , in 31 minutes . Garry Harris followed up with 18 points , four assists , three rebounds and two blocks , while Paul Millsap finished with 18 points , nine rebounds , five assists , four steals and two blocks . The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los_Angeles Lakers , 117 - 85 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday evening . It was a strong night for Denver ( 14 - 7 ) on the defensive end , who held LA ( 11 - 9 ) to just 40 percent shooting on the night . The Nuggets entered Tuesday 's contest boasting the fourth - highest defensive rating in the league , and they showed why on Tuesday . Denver limited LA to just five three - pointers on 32 attempts in the game . It was also a strong night on the offensive end for the Nuggets , who shot 49 percent from the field in the win . Six Denver players scored in double digits in the win . Jamal Murray and Paul Millsap each scored 20 points to lead Denver in scoring . Malik Beasley scored 18 points off the bench on 7 - of - 12 shooting . As a team , Denver hit 14 of its 15 free - throws and knocked down eight three - pointers . For the Lakers , Kyle Kuzma led the way with 21 points . It was a rare off night for LeBron James , who shot just 5 - of - 15 for 14 points to go with seven rebounds and two assists . The Lakers as a team struggled on the glass , grabbing just eight offensive rebounds while allowing 15 offensive rebounds for Denver . Los_Angeles will host the Indiana Pacers on Thursday , while the Nuggets will visit Portland on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets took down the Toronto Raptors , 95 - 86 , at Pepsi_Center on Sunday evening . Sunday 's contest saw the current leader in each conference square off , as the Nuggets ( 20 - 9 ) managed to hold onto the top spot in the West by defeating the league - best Raptors ( 23 - 9 ) . Both teams were far from full strength , as the Raptors were missing Kyle Lowry ( thigh ) , Fred VanVleet ( back ) , and Paskal ( back ) , while the Nuggets continue to be without All-Star big man Paul Millsap ( toe ) , shooting guard Gary Harris ( hip ) , or sixth man Will Barton ( hip ) . Despite the long injury report from both squads , Sunday 's contest still offered plenty of star power , as Kawhi Leonard and Nikola Jokic each delivered big performances in the marquee matchup . A stagnant fourth quarter wound up costing Toronto , as the Raptors simply went cold from beyond the arc late in the game . The Raptors could not buy a bucket down the stretch , going just 1 - of - 12 from three - point range in the fourth quarter . Toronto wound up scoring only 14 points as a team in the fourth . Just as the Raptors were struggling with their shot , though , Denver 's Jamal Murray found his . Murray scored 15 of his 19 points in the fourth , single - handedly outscoring Toronto in the closing quarter . Murray finished the game with 19 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting , including three three - pointers . Nikola Jokic led the team with 26 points , also adding eight rebounds and four assists . It was a generally stagnant night for Denver offensively , as the team shot just 42 percent from the field and finished with only 21 assists . However , strong defensive play and a poor shooting night from Toronto helped put the Nuggets over the top . Kawhi Leonard led his Raptors with 29 points and 13 rebounds . The superstar forward shot 12 - of - 20 , but his team still failed to put together a solid effort on offense . Toronto finished shooting 41 percent from the field and just 7 - of - 34 from beyond the arc . Only three Raptors players scored in double digits in the loss . The Nuggets will remain in Denver to host the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday . Toronto , meanwhile , will return home for a clash with the red - hot Indiana Pacers on Wednesday evening .
The Denver Nuggets took down the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 123 - 116 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday evening . Denver ( 21 - 9 ) brought its win streak to four games by taking down Dallas ( 15 - 14 ) on Tuesday . While the game was a back - and - forth affair for much of regulation , the Nuggets began to swing momentum in their favor with a big 140 run late in the third quarter . Despite missing multiple starters , including Gary Harris ( hip ) and Paul Millsap ( toe ) , Denver was electric offensively , shooting 56 percent from the field in the win . When the team 's shots were n't falling , Denver did an excellent job cleaning the glass , finishing with a 12 - 6 advantage on the offensive boards . Seven Nuggets players scored in double digits to contribute to the win . Superstar big man Nikola Jokic continued his impressive 2018 - 19 campaign , scoring 32 points to go with 16 rebounds . Jokic 's six offensive boards matched Dallas 's team total , and the seven - footer also made an impact defensively , tallying three steals and a block . Third-year guard Jamal Murray , meanwhile , also helped set the tone offensively . Murray notched a career - high 15 assists , 13 of which came in the first half . He added 22 points to give him his second double - double of the season . For Dallas , on the other hand , rookie sensation Luka Doncic recorded a double - double of his own . The 19 - year - old wing dished out 12 assists and scored 23 points , aided by a solid 10 - of - 12 night at the free - throw line . Harrison Barnes , meanwhile , led the Mavs with 30 points , though he did not record an assist on the night . Despite the two wings ' best efforts , the Mavericks shot just 46 percent from the field , as Dallas proved unable to match the Nuggets blistering shooting splits . The Mavericks will hope to remain above .500 as they visit the Clippers at Staples_Center on Thursday . Denver , meanwhile , will have three days off before making its own visit to LA to take on the Clippers on Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 102 - 99 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday . While Denver led for 47 minutes of this 48 - minute game , it came down to the final shot . In fact , San_Antonio missed a free - throw in the final 30 seconds that would have tied the game , as they made a mess of the final possession by not even getting off a three - point shot in the final 10 seconds . Free-throw shooting was the difference for the Nuggets , with Denver connecting on 14 - of - 17 and San_Antonio hitting just 11 - of - 20 . Rebounding was also critical , with the Nuggets outrebounding the Spurs , 53 - 38 . The Nuggets won despite being dominated in the turnover differential , with the Spurs winning that , 21 - 10 . The Spurs ( 19 - 17 ) were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds , three assists and three steals . DeMar DeRozan accrued 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . Derrick White returned home and collected 10 points , six rebounds , three assists and six steals . Byrn Forbes was the only other Spur in double figures , scoring 13 points . The Nuggets ( 22 - 11 ) were led by Jamal Murray , as he tallied 31 points , six rebounds and three assists . Nikola Jokic totaled 21 points , nine rebounds and nine assists . Mason Plumlee scored just three points but led the team with 13 rebounds . Malik Beasley was huge off the bench , providing 21 points and three rebounds . On deck for Denver is a road matchup versus the Phoenix Suns on Saturday . As for San_Antonio , they also return to action on Saturday , traveling to face the Los_Angeles Clippers .

There were nine ties and 10 lead changes in the first three quarters of this game , as Denver took control in the fourth quarter . In fact , the Nuggets outscored the Knicks , 33 - 24 , in the fourth , despite the fact that neither club led by more than 10 points . Rebounding was huge for the Nuggets , as they won that battle , 53 - 43 . Ball movement was also critical , with Denver out - assisting New_York , 36 - 28 . The Nuggets bench was also key , as they outscored the Knicks bench , 59 - 35 . The Knicks ( 9 - 29 ) were led by Luke Kornet , as he totaled 19 points and six boards . Emmanuel Mudiay made his return to Denver and accrued 15 points , three rebounds , nine assists and two steals . The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 121 - 100 , at Pepsi_Center on Thursday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for Denver , it was as dominating as it gets . In fact , the Nuggets rode a 37 - 25 first quarter to their victory , as they led by at least five points for the final three quarters . The Nuggets continued that momentum in the second half , holding a double - digit lead for the final 20 minutes of action . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Denver outrebounding Los_Angeles , 53 - 38 . The shooting disparity was also critical , with the Nuggets shooting 51 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range while the Clippers hit just 44 percent from the field and 25 percent from long range . Much of that can be attributed to the fact that Denver out - assisted Los_Angeles , 29 - 21 . The Clippers ( 24 - 17 ) were led by Lou Williams , as he provided 19 points and five assists off the bench . Tobias Harris led the starters with 18 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Danilo Gallinari matched those 18 points , adding three rebounds and four assists to his tally . Montrezl Harrell amassed 16 points and six boards off the bench as well . The Denver Nuggets took down the Portland Trail_Blazers , 116 - 113 , at Pepsi_Center on Sunday evening . A 40 - point night from Nikola Jokic propelled Denver ( 29 - 13 ) to another win on Sunday , allowing the Nuggets to hold first place in the Western_Conference . Jokic capped off his season - high night with a pair of free - throws to make it a two - possession game with only 55 seconds remaining . Portland ( 26 - 18 ) , however , answered back with a jump shot from C.J . McCollum . Still , the Nuggets managed to hold on to the lead until the final buzzer . Denver was aided by a wildly efficient offensive performance , as the team shot 56 percent from the field . In addition to his team - high scoring performance , Jokic recorded 10 rebounds and eight assists . The big man shot 15 - of - 23 from the floor en route to his big night . Jamal Murray added an additional 24 points and four rebounds . As a team , Denver totaled nine three - pointers and shot 17 - of - 20 from the free - throw line . Portland , meanwhile , saw a strong night from its own superstar . Damian Lillard dropped 26 points and dished out seven assists . The team as a whole , though , struggled to match Denver 's offensive output . The Blazers shot only 45 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The Trail_Blazers will visit Sacramento on Monday evening , while Denver will host the Golden_State Warriors on Tuesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 135 - 105 , on Thursday at Pepsi_Center . It appears as though the Nuggets ( 30 - 14 ) had some pent up anger and energy after they laid an egg at home Tuesday against the Warriors . While the Bulls ( 10 - 35 ) jumped out to a two - point after the first 12 minutes , it was all Denver after that . The Nuggets went on to outscore the Bulls in the second and third quarters by a total of 32 points , and it ended up being smooth sailing for the home team . Seven players scored in double figures for them and 11 of the 12 players who saw the floor scored at least three points . Jamal Murray led the way , shooting 7 - of - 11 from behind the arc en route to scoring a team - high 25 points in 29 minutes , while likely All-Star Nikola Jokic posted a double - double of 18 points and 11 rebounds to go along with eight assists in 25 minutes . Gary Harris made his return after a five - game absence due to a hamstring injury , and while he played just 19 minutes as a reserve , he still managed to score 14 points . As for the Bulls , it was their eighth loss in a row as their record continues to tank . It was n't a horrible offensive night for Chicago , as they shot 36 percent from behind the arc and 47 percent from the field overall , but they had no answer for the Nuggets on defense . The 135 points they gave up was the second highest opponent total this season for Chicago , with the 146 points they gave up to Golden State last week serving as the highest . Lauri Markkanen did score a game - high 27 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting to go along with 10 rebounds in just 25 minutes , but the other four Bulls starters would combine to score just 36 minutes . Robin Lopez and Jabari Parker were both solid off the bench , however , scoring 17 and 15 points , respectively .

The Denver Nuggets bested the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 121 - 112 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday . Denver ( 42 - 18 ) got the best of OKC ( 38 - 22 ) despite a close first half . The Nuggets pulled away , though , with a quick run at the close of the second quarter to take a double - digit lead . Denver was spearheaded by superstar Nikola Jokic , who recorded 19 points and seven assists in the first half . Jokic went on to lead all scorers in the game with 36 points . He also finished with 10 assists . Strong three - point shooting proved crucial to Denver 's success . The Utah Jazz bested the Denver Nuggets , 111 - 104 at Pepsi_Center on Thursday evening . A dominant second quarter helped Utah ( 35 - 26 ) take control of the game . The Jazz were sparked by a quick 12 - 3 run fueled by three - pointers from Kyle Korver and Thabo Sefolosha . Denver ( 42 - 19 ) , thanks to strong play from its big men , was able to corral the growing deficit and keep the Nuggets ' hopes alive . However , a late 100 run in the fourth quarter proved to be the difference , as Utah expanded its lead to a game - high 18 . Despite a valiant comeback which saw the Nuggets trim the lead to as little as three in the final 90 seconds , Utah was able to hold onto its early advantage and finish with the win . Rudy Gobert was the X-factor for Utah in the win , as his four blocks led all players . Gobert 's defense was crucial in limiting Denver 's Nikola Jokic , who shot just 5 - of - 15 on the night . Veteran sharpshooter Kyle Korver helped provide a spark for the Jazz , pitching in 22 points off the bench . Donovan Mitchell led all scorers with 24 . Denver , meanwhile , saw 21 points each from Will Barton and Jamal Murray . Still , it was a slow offensive night for the team , as Denver finished shooting just 41 percent from the floor and 7 - of - 24 from three - point range . Jokic had a particularly disappointing night , committing five turnovers on top of his poor shooting . On Saturday , Denver will look to bounce back as it hosts the New_Orleans Pelicans , while Utah will see a visit from the Milwaukee Bucks .

The Denver Nuggets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 100 - 99 , in a last - minute thriller at Pepsi_Center on Thursday . Everything seemed poised to go the Mavericks ' ( 27 - 40 ) way after a strong third quarter left Dallas with a double - digit lead . Denver ( 44 - 22 ) , however , managed to put together a defensive masterpiece in the fourth to eke out the win . The Mavericks were limited to just 10 points in the fourth quarter , which culminated in a wild back - and - forth finish . Rookie sensation Luka Doncic put the Mavericks up by one point on a dunk with just 6 seconds remaining . He was fouled on the play , but missed the free - throw , allowing Denver a final possession to take the lead . The Nuggets did that , winning the game on a buzzer - beating floater from star center Nikola Jokic . Jokic flirted with a triple - double , finishing with 11 points , 14 rebounds , and eight assists . He was not particularly aggressive offensively , shooting just 3 - of - 8 on the night . Veteran Paul Millsap took the lead instead , shooting 14 - of - 19 from the field en route to a season - high 33 points . Doncic nearly had a triple - double of his own , finishing with 24 points , 11 rebounds , and nine assists . The rookie star continued to struggle at the free - throw line , though , going just 3 - of - 7 at the stripe . Fellow rookie guard Jalen Brunson also had a memorable game , finishing with 20 points . Both teams will take the floor again on Saturday , with Denver hosting the Indiana Pacers and Dallas seeing a visit from the Cleveland Cavaliers .

The Denver Nuggets defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 113 - 85 , at Pepsi_Center on Wednesday . It did not take long for Wednesday 's outing to get out of hand , as just over a minute into the game with the Nuggets ( 52 - 26 ) up 60 , Gregg Popovich got hit with double technical fouls and was ejected . From there , the Spurs ( 45 - 34 ) did n't exactly play inspired basketball , and after keeping it close for one quarter , Denver opened things up in the second period and never looked back . The Nuggets were dominant on both ends of the floor , but their defensive effort is what really stood out , as they did n't allow San_Antonio to score more than 24 points in a quarter . Offensively , Nikola Jokic led the way with a game - high 20 points , and he almost notched yet another triple - double with 11 rebounds and nine assists across 29 minutes . Malik Beasley and Monte Morris were close behind , with each scoring 19 points in expanded roles off the bench thanks to the blowout nature of the contest . Overall , it was a very efficient offensive performance for the Nuggets , who shot a scorching 54 percent from the field with 41 of their 47 field goals coming off assists . As for San_Antonio , it was a night to forget with Popovich setting the tone early . LaMarcus Aldridge and Lonnie Walker IV were the team 's leading scorers with just 16 points a piece , and DeMar DeRozan and Davis Bertan were the only other players to score in double figures with each scoring 11 . 85 points is tied for the team 's lowest point total of the season , and it came as a result of horrendous shooting . The Spurs shot a miserable 18 percent on 27 three - point attempts and made just 38 percent of their total field goals . The loss also dropped the Spurs back into the No . 8 seed in the Western_Conference .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 99 - 95 , on Wednesday at Pepsi_Center . Despite still having something to play for Wednesday night , the Nuggets played 45 minutes of lifeless basketball in their regular season finale . With just over three minutes remaining in the game , Denver found itself down by 11 points and on the verge of wasting a prime opportunity to avoid the Houston Rockets , the team 's kryptonite all season , in a potential second - round matchup . Then , something clicked . From that point on , the visiting Timberwolves , who were without All-Star center Karl-Anthony Towns due to injury , failed to score a single point as the Nuggets rattled off a 120 run that was capped off by a Jamal Murray three to take the lead . In the end , Denver would close the game on a 150 run and lock up the No . 2 seed in the Western_Conference . Murray finished with a quality all - around game , posting 17 points , eight rebounds and seven assists across 35 minutes , but it was Nikola Jokic who once again led the way for this Denver team , scoring a game - high 29 points to go along with 14 rebounds . As for the Timberwolves , they finish the season with three straight loses and end up a dreadful 11 - 30 on the road . With Towns out of the lineup , Andrew Wiggins led the way scoring for Minnesota with 25 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting . Cam Reynolds came off the bench to scoring career - high 19 points in 26 minutes as reserve , while Gorgui Dieng recorded 18 points and 11 rebounds in his spot start .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 111 - 83 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday on the regular - season opener for both teams . The Grizzlies ( 0 - 1 ) entered the game as clear underdogs after mustering a 22 - 60 record in the 2017 - 18 campaign , but with one key component back in their lineup . Star point guard Mike Conley was back to full health after missing the last 70 games of the prior season with a heel injury , providing Memphis with much - needed scoring punch . However , the end result Wednesday was highly reminiscent of last season 's failures , as the Pacers ( 10 ) rode a 27 - 16 first - quarter advantage to a comfortable win . Indiana extended its lead to 56 - 39 by halftime , and they ultimately tacked on another 55 points in the second half . The home squad saw seven players hit double digits in the scoring column - - including four from the second unit - - while enjoying a 57 percent - 30 percent edge in shooting . Marc Gasol led the way for the Grizzlies with 13 points , adding six rebounds , three assists and three steals . Garrett Temple finished with 12 points , two assists and one block . Conley shot 3 - for - 11 on his way to 11 points , which he supplemented with three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Rookie Jaren Jackson , Jr. paced the second unit with 10 points and also hauled in five boards , dished out one assist , recorded three steals and posted one block . JaMychal Green and MarShon Brooks generated matching nine - point tallies ; the former added seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , while the latter compiled two rebounds and one assist . Bojan Bogdanovic paced Indiana with 19 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds . Victor Oladipo totaled 16 points , five rebounds and five assists . Tyreke Evans co - led the bench with 14 points and also supplied six assists and four rebounds . Domantas Sabonis matched his scoring total and also contributed a game - high 15 rebounds and two assists . Doug McDermott poured in 12 points in 24 minutes off the bench , while Cory Joseph pitched in 11 off the second unit as well . Thaddeus Young tallied 10 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one block . The Grizzlies next face the Atlanta Hawks in Memphis ' home opener on Friday , while the Pacers head to Milwaukee to tangle with the Pacers on Friday evening as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 132 - 112 , at Bankers Lief Fieldhouse on Saturday evening . The Pacers ( 2 - 1 ) started and finished fast , which was key to what eventually turned out to be a comfortable victory . Indiana racked up an impressive 67 first - half points , but the Nets ( 1 - 2 ) kept the pressure on by tallying 58 of their own . The visitors continued to hang tough in the third , but the home squad finally pulled away by posting their best point total ( 37 ) of any quarter in the final period . As the combined point total implied , both teams shot very well . The Nets drained 48 percent of their attempts , while the Pacers generated a 55 percent success rate from the field . Joe Harris and Caris LeVert led the Nets with matching 19 - point efforts . Harris added three assists , two rebounds and one block , while LeVert hauled in four boards , dished out three assists , recorded two steals and managed one block . Spencer Dinwiddie supplied 13 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal . Rodions Kurucs and D'Angelo Russell registered matching 12 - point tallies , while Allen Crabbe totaled 10 points and three rebounds in 25 minutes off the bench . Victor Oladipo paced the Pacers with 25 points and also contributed seven rebounds , three assists and four steals . Kyle O'Quinn managed 16 points , eight rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 15 points and brought in two rebounds , while Tyreke Evans matched Bogdanovic 's scoring total and also pitched in three rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block . Myles Turner ( 14 points , eight rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block ) , Darren Collison ( 13 points , three assists , two rebounds , one steal ) and Thaddeus Young ( 10 points , two boards , two assists , two steals ) rounded out the starting five 's productive night . The Nets remain on the road and next take the floor versus the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday night , while the Pacers head to Minnesota and take on the Timberwolves in a Monday evening matchup .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Indiana Pacers , 103 - 93 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Monday . It 's rare to see a bench dominate a game so thoroughly but that was the case here for Portland . In fact , they had four bench players reach double - figures in scoring , as they outscored Indiana 's bench , 54 - 15 . Rebounding was also a huge factor , with the Trail_Blazers winning that battle , 50 - 35 . Portland ended up shooting 49 percent from the field and 94 percent from the free - throw line while holding Indiana to just 41 percent from the field and 65 percent from the charity stripe . The Trail_Blazers ( 4 - 2 ) were led by C.J . McCollum , as he tallied 17 points and six rebounds . Damian Lillard finished with 16 points and two assists . Al-Farouq Aminu totaled 11 points and 10 boards . Zach Collins led the bench with 17 points , three rebounds and three assists . Caleb Swanigan provided 11 points and 10 boards off the bench as well . The Pacers ( 4 - 3 ) got a near triple - double out of Victor Oladipo , as he collected 21 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Darren Collison accrued 17 points , two rebounds , six assists and two steals . Myles Turner totaled 10 points , nine rebounds and three blocks while Thaddeus Young generated 16 points , four rebounds and two steals . On deck for Portland is a road matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Tuesday . As for Indiana , they travel to play the New_York Knicks on Wednesday for their next outing .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 102 - 101 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Saturday evening . The Pacers jumped out to a quick 70 lead , but the Celtics came roaring back with a 28 - 11 run , to take control with a 28 - 18 lead heading into the second quarter . The Pacers got back on track in the second , as they chipped away at the deficit , eventually outscoring the Celtics by 10 in the quarter , to tie the game at 45 by halftime . Both teams came out strong in the third , trading buckets , with no one gaining more than a two - possession lead , until they matched each other with 27 points each in the quarter . The contest stayed close right down to the wire , and after multiple lead changes and ties , the Pacers emerged with the one - point win thanks to a clutch three - pointer from Victor Oladipo , with just four second left . This marks the third straight win for the Pacers and the end of a four - game win streak for the Celtics . Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 24 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 36 minutes . Tyreke Evans followed up with 17 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench , while Bojan Bogdanovic added 16 points , three rebounds , three steals and one assist , in 23 minutes . The Pacers shot 41 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 33 from long range . Meanwhile , Marcus Morris led the way for the Celtics with 23 points , six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 32 minutes off the bench . Kyrie Irving tallied 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and one block , while Al Horford and Jayson Tatum chipped in 14 points each . The Celtics shot 43 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 46 from long range . The Celtics ( 6 - 3 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nuggets in Denver on Monday . The Pacers ( 7 - 3 ) play host to the Rockets on Monday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 100 - 94 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . The 76ers ( 7 - 5 ) came into Wednesday looking to redeem themselves from a rather unexpected 122 - 97 loss to the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday night . They got off to a strong start against a hot Pacers ( 7 - 5 ) squad , jumping out to an early 13 - 12 lead over the first 4:29 . However , Indiana had knotted the game at 50 - 50 by halftime , only to see Philadelphia open up their lead back up by seven points in the third period . The visitors were then essentially able to match the home squad basket for basket in the final 12 minutes , sealing the victory . The Sixers played particularly impressive defense , limiting the Pacers to 39 percent shooting , including 26 percent from three - point range . Joel Embiid led the Sixers with a 20 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three blocks and one steal . Dario Saric managed 18 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Ben Simmons provided a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists and two blocks . Robert Covington turned in 13 points , four rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks . Landry Shamet ( 12 points ) and J.J. Redick ( 10 points ) were both productive off the bench . Victor Oladipo paced the Pacers with a game - high 36 points and added seven assists , six rebounds , three blocks and two steals . Domantas Sabonis followed with a bench - leading 16 points and also hauled in 11 rebounds , three assists and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic registered 13 points , five rebounds , one assist and one steal . Cory Joseph went for nine points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals in 31 minutes off the second unit . The Sixers head back home and take on the Charlotte Hornets on Friday evening , while the Pacers pay a visit to the Miami Heat that same night .

The Spurs ( 9 - 9 ) jumped out to a 54 - 45 halftime lead and kept up their steady offensive performance in the second half to notch a much - needed road victory . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 96 - 90 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 14 - 10 ) and the Bulls ( 5 - 20 ) engaged on a tight ball on Indiana 's home , but the hosts ended securing the win thanks to a solid performance in the second half . Indiana jumped to a 23 - 21 lead in the first quarter , but Chicago stormed back to secure a two - point lead at half time ( 45 - 43 ) . Indiana would storm back in the third quarter , and a 27 - 22 lead saw them jump to a three - point advantage . The Bulls tried to fight back , but Indiana won the final 12 minutes of action by a 26 - 23 score . It was closer than expected , but the Pacers ended getting the job done . Even though the nine Pacers that saw action scored points , only four players scored in double digits . Darren Collison led the way with 23 points , eight rebounds and three assists , while Myles Turner contributed with 18 points , 11 rebounds , five blocks and three rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic delivered 14 points and six rebounds , while Tyreke Evans filled the stat sheet thanks to 10 points , three rebounds , and two assists . Six Bulls players scored in double digits and Lauri Markkannen led the way thanks to 21 points , 10 rebounds , and two steals . Justin Holiday contributed 15 points , six rebounds and three assists , while Zach LaVine came close to a double - double thanks to 13 points and nine assists . Wendell Carter Jr. had 12 points and 13 rebounds . Jabari Parker had 12 points and eight rebounds coming off the bench .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Washington Wizards , 109 - 101 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 17 - 10 ) received an early wake - up call from the short - handed Wizards ( 11 - 16 ) in the first quarter , as they fell behind by a 33 - 29 margin . The light seemed to go on at that point , as Indiana exploded for 30 points over the ensuing 12 minutes while limiting Washington to 17 . That gave them enough cushion to overcome some second - half surges by the visitors and emerge with the hard - fought victory . Indiana won despite turning the ball over on 23 occasions , with their big advantages in shooting ( 54 percent - 42 percent ) and rebounding ( 50 - 34 ) integral to their success . Bradley Beal stepped up in the absence of John Wall ( heel ) and led the Wizards with 30 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block . Kelly Oubre , Jr. followed with 23 points , adding five rebounds , one assist , three steals and one block . Austin Rivers totaled 13 points , four assists . three rebounds and one steal . Thomas Bryant contributed 10 points , three rebounds and two rebounds . Myles Turner led the Pacers with a 26 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , five blocks and one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 22 points and also posted seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Tyreke Evans supplied 18 points , six rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Thaddeus Young managed a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double , while Darren Collison mustered 10 points and dished out 17 assists . The Wizards head back home to tangle with the Boston Celtics on Wednesday evening , while the Pacers remain home for a divisional showdown with the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday night as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 113 - 97 , at Bankers Life Field House on Wednesday evening . It was a good night for the Pacers as they finally got Victor Oladipo back in the lineup , and also grabbed their fifth straight win . The Pacers jumped out to a quick 8 - 2 lead , and pushed their advantage to 22 - 9 , mid way though the first quarter . They held on to take a 29 - 23 lead into the second . The Pacers kept the pressure on the visitors , as they pushed their lead to 16 halfway through the second . They outscored the Bucks 29 - 20 in the quarter , to take a 58 - 43 lead by halftime . The Bucks came out stronger in the third quarter , but could not cut into the deficit , as they still trailed by 15 entering the final frame . The Pacers held their lead through the fourth , hardly letting the Bucks within reach , as they cruised to their 10th home win of the season . Thaddeus Young led the Pacers with 25 points , 11 rebounds , five steals , four assists and one block , in 33 minutes . Myles Turner followed up with 23 points , seven rebounds , four assists and three blocks , while Oladipo finished with 12 points , 10 rebounds , and six assists , in 29 minutes . The Pacers shot 48 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Eric Bledsoe led the Bucks with 26 points , six assists , two steals , one block and one rebound , in 33 minutes . Brook Lopez tallied 15 points , five rebounds , four blocks , one assists and one steal , while Giannis Antetokounmpo added 12 points , 10 rebounds and seven assists , in 31 minutes . The Bucks ( 18 - 9 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Cavs in Cleveland on Friday . The Pacers ( 18 - 10 ) take on the 76ers in Philadelphia on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 110 - 99 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday . It 's rare to see a game with 10 ties and 11 lead changes finish in a double - digit spread but that was the case here . All those swings happened in the first three quarters , as Indiana held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . In addition , the Pacers won all four individual quarters . Indiana 's defense was critical , as they held New_York to 41 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . The Pacers connected on 46 percent from the field and 35 percent from long range while out - assisting the Knicks , 28 - 21 . Indiana 's bench came up big too , outscoring New_York 's bench , 35 - 20 . The Knicks ( 9 - 22 ) were led by Enes Kanter , as he totaled 20 points and 15 rebounds on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Tim Hardaway Jr. finished with 19 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals . Emmanuel Mudiay amassed 18 points and six assists . Kevin Knox generated 15 points , four rebounds and two steals . The Pacers ( 20 - 10 ) got a vintage performance from Victor Oladipo , as he collected 26 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and five steals . Myles Turner tallied 24 points , six rebounds and two blocks . Bojan Bogdanovic accumulated 12 points , four rebounds and three assists while Domantas Sabonis led the bench with 13 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . On deck for New_York is a home matchup versus the Phoenix Suns on Monday . As for Indiana , they return to action on Tuesday when they play host to the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 116 - 108 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday afternoon . The Pacers ( 25 - 12 ) were heavy favorites entering this game against the Hawks ( 11 - 25 ) , and they made sure they would make that happen right from tip - off . Indiana quickly jumped to a 33 - 25 lead following the first quarter , but the Hawks showed some signs of life in the second quarter and made it a three - point game ( 63 - 60 ) at the half . The Pacers decided they did n't want to suffer any sort of scare , though , and pulled away for good in the third quarter ( 34 - 21 ) that made it 97 - 81 . Such differential was impossible for Atlanta to turn around and despite the fact they they won the final quarter 27 - 19 , it was n't enough and Indiana won comfortably . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Pacers since he finished with 22 points , seven assists , four rebounds and four steals . Myles Turner contributed with 20 points , eight rebounds and four assists , while Domantas Sabonis chipped in with 20 points coming off the bench . Bojan Bogdanovic added 16 points , four rebounds and three assists , while Darren Collison had 12 points , six assists , four boards and two steals . Tyreke Evans also contributed with 10 points . John Collins and Kevin Huerter both led the way for the Hawks with 22 points , although they were only two of four players that managed to score in double digits for the Hawks . Alex Len contributed with 19 points and seven rebounds , while rookie point guard Trae Young chipped in with 16 points , seven assists , four rebounds and three steals .

The Pacers got out to a great start at home , with a 34 - 26 lead after one quarter . However , the Pacers put the finishing touches on the contest in the final frame , as they outscored the Hornets by 13 in the quarter , to cruise to their second straight win . The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 110 - 106 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday . While Indiana led for 47 minutes of this 48 - minute game . it came down the wire . In fact , the Raptors overcame a 12 - point halftime deficit to make it a two - point game with a few minutes remaining . They simply could n't recapture the lead or tie though , as Indiana hit some free throws late to seal the win . The Pacers defense was key , as they held the Raptors to 41 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . They also recorded six steals and seven blocks while Toronto picked up just two steals and five blocks . The Raptors ( 36 - 14 ) were led by Serge Ibaka , as he tallied 23 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Kyle Lowry finished with 20 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Pascal Siakam accrued 16 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Fred VanVleet started again and provided 14 points , two rebounds and three assists . The Pacers ( 32 - 15 ) were led by Thaddeus Young , as he collected 23 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . The big story is Victor Oladipo though , as he was carted off with what appeared to be a serious knee injury . Darren Collison totaled 17 points , four rebounds and eight assists while Myles Turner amassed 13 points , 10 rebounds and four blocks . Toronto returns to action on Friday , as they travel to face the Houston Rockets . Indiana 's next game will be on Saturday , as they play the Memphis Grizzlies on the road .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Indiana Pacers , 132 - 100 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 32 - 17 ) came into Monday 's contest with a stellar record at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse and numbers that corroborated a standing as the stingiest home defense in the NBA . However , that reputation has been earned with the likes of Victor Oladipo ( knee ) in the lineup , and the star two - guard naturally was n't available Monday . Moreover , valued backup Tyreke Evans , Oladipo 's replacement moving forward in the wake of the latter 's season - ending injury , was also out versus the Warriors ( 36 - 14 ) due to a back issue . That left Indiana woefully short of firepower on both ends of the floor , which quickly became during a first quarter in which they fell behind by a 40 - 22 margin . Although the home squad managed to be more competitive in the second period , the game was already essentially decided . Among its multiple advantages on the stat sheet , two of the most significant in Golden_State 's favor came in shooting percentage ( 54 to 43 ) and rebounding ( 48 - 38 ) . Stephen Curry paced the Warriors with 26 points , adding six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Demarcus Cousins supplied 22 points , six boards and four assists . Kevin Durant and Klay Thompson contributed matching 16 - point tallies , with Durant also notably dishing out seven assists . Kevon Looney generated 15 points , five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Myles Turner led the Pacers with 16 points , adding six rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks . Bojan Bogdanovic posted 15 points , three rebounds and two assists . Darren Collison contributed 13 points and eight assists . Aaron Holiday poured in 12 points and also furnished four assists and two rebounds . Thaddeus Young finished with 11 points , seven boards and four assists . The Warriors head back home to face the Philadelphia 76ers on Thursday night , while the Pacers travel to face the Washington Wizards on Wednesday evening .

In a battle between two of the best teams in the Eastern_Conference , this game came down to the wire . In fact , there were nine lead changes in this game , as neither team led by more than 10 points in the second half . Milwaukee ended the game strong , as they went on an 110 run with 4:45 remaining to make it a nine - point margin with one minute remaining . Rebounding was key for Milwaukee , as they outrebounded Indiana , 52 - 43 . They also dominated through scoring down low , outscoring the Pacers in the paint , 58 - 32 .
