The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 126 - 111 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Friday . While New_Orleans led by 20 points in the second quarter , they allowed Indiana to win in comeback fashion . In fact , the Pacers outscored the Pelicans , 68 - 40 , in the second half . Indiana 's defense was critical , as they won the turnover differential , 18 - 11 while doubling them up in steals , 10 - 5 . Three-point shooting was also decisive , with Indiana hitting 14 - of - 32 and New_Orleans connecting on just 8 - of - 27 . The Pelicans really struggled at the free - throw line , hitting just 17 - of - 30 . The Pelicans ( 26 - 34 ) were led by Cheick Diallo , as he provided 16 points and 18 rebounds off their bench . Anthony Davis led the starters , as he amassed 15 points , eight rebounds and four assists in just 19 minutes . Julius Randle accumulated 15 points , four rebounds and two assists while Jrue Holiday finished with 14 points , seven rebounds and four assists . The Pacers ( 39 - 20 ) were led by Wesley Matthews , as he amassed 24 points and two boards . Bojan Bogdanovic accrued 20 points , five rebounds and two assists . Thaddeus Young totaled 16 points , seven rebounds and four steals while Darren Collison generated 10 points and 12 assists . Domantas Sabonis led the bench with 18 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . Both teams have to play again on Saturday , with New_Orleans playing host to the Los_Angeles Lakers and Indiana traveling to face the Washington Wizards .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 122 - 115 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . The Timberwolves ( 29 - 33 ) entered this game against the Pacers ( 41 - 22 ) in a good run of form with four wins in their last six games , and it showed since they quickly got themselves on top by nine points after the first quarter ( 35 - 26 ) . However , the Pacers would flip the script in the second quarter and they got in the driver seat by halftime thanks to a huge 38 - 25 period that gave them a 64 - 60 lead . Minnesota made things tighter since they won the third quarter 30 - 28 , and as a result , this was a two - point game heading into the final 12 minutes of action . Indiana did n't let the game slip away , however , and a 30 - 25 score in the fourth quarter sealed the deal in their favor . Bojan Bogdanovic continues to be one of the best players for Indiana in recent weeks and he carried the ballclub in this one , finishing with 37 points to go along with seven rebounds and four assists . Thaddeus Young filled the stat sheet admirably and finished with 15 points , five assists , five rebounds and three steals , while Wesley Matthews added 12 points . T.J . Leaf looked impressive coming off the bench as he contributed 18 points in 22 minutes of action . Karl-Anthony Towns was the scorer in this game as he had 42 points to go along with 17 rebounds and four assists . Jeff Teague had 13 points , six rebounds and five assists , but also had five turnovers and committed five fouls . Andrew Wiggins chipped in with 11 points , but shot 4 - 14 from the field . Anthony Tolliver ( 13 points ) and Taj Gibson ( 12 points , nine rebounds ) had solid efforts off the bench , though .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 105 - 96 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 42 - 23 ) were undoubtedly the better team on paper against a struggling Bulls ( 18 - 47 ) and they did everything they could to showcase that difference right from tip - off . Indiana quickly jumped to a 27 - 17 lead in the first half , and they would never relinquish that advantage within the end of each quarter . Chicago made things difficult , though , as they won both the second ( 25 - 22 ) and the third ( 33 - 28 ) quarters in order to made it a two - point game entering the final 12 minutes of action . But Indiana stepped it up a notch when it mattered the most and they won the final quarter by a seven - point margin ( 28 - 21 ) . Eventually , that sealed the deal and gave the Pacers a solid nine - point win in front of their fans . Most of the heavy lifting on Indiana 's offense was made by the starting lineup , as every single starter scored at least 10 points while the entire bench combined for just 25 points . Bojan Bogdanovic led the way with 27 points and six rebounds , while Darren Collison filled the stat sheet and contributed 22 points , four rebounds , two assists , and two steals . Thaddeus Young ( 11 points , 10 rebounds , six assists ) and Myles Turner ( 10 points , 11 rebounds , seven blocks ) filled their respective stat sheets admirably , and Wesley Matthews chipped in with 10 points as well . The Bulls were even worse ; not only their bench combined for a mere 23 points , but they only had three players topping the 10 - point mark . Zach LaVine led the way with 27 points , while Robin Lopez had 20 points with nine rebounds and Lauri Markkanen chipped in with 14 points and 13 rebounds of his own . Kris Dunn might have scored just five points , but added seven boards , five assists and two steals .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the New_York Knicks , 103 - 98 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Tuesday evening . The Pacers ( 43 - 25 ) got more than they likely bargained for from the Knicks ( 13 - 55 ) , which jumped out to a 29 - 27 first - quarter lead despite playing in their third game in the last four nights . While Indiana erased their deficit in the second , their halftime lead was a modest three points . However , the home squad came out of intermission playing well on both ends of the court , outscoring New_York by a 30 - 21 margin during the period and building enough cushion to withstand a late surge by the visitors in the fourth . Emmanuel Mudiay paced the Knicks with 21 points , adding four rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Dewayne Dotson furnished 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Kevin Knox supplied 16 points , five boards and one assist . Deandre Jordan delivered a 12 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included five assists . Noah Vonleh registered eight points , seven boards , three assists and two steals . Dennis Smith , Jr. only mustered seven points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal across 25 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic led the Pacers with 24 points , supplementing them with four rebounds and two assists . Darren Collison furnished 16 points , nine assists , five rebounds and three steals . Myles Turner collected 15 points , nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Wesley Matthews poured in 14 points , while Thaddeus Young and Domantas Sabonis turned in matching 10 - point contributions and hauled in six and seven rebounds , respectively . The Knicks remain on the road and next pay a visit to the San_Antonio Spurs on Friday night , while the Pacers remain home and tangle with the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Thursday evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Indiana Pacers , 121 - 116 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Saturday evening . The Magic ( 38 - 39 ) knew their only chance of regaining the eighth seed in the Eastern_Conference that they 'd had a brief hold of earlier in the week was to keep winning , but they had a substantial challenge in front of them in the form of the Pacers ( 45 - 32 ) . Nevertheless , Orlando took a 32 - 28 lead through the first 12 minutes before Indiana took a one - point lead into intermission . Ultimately , a 15 - 8 Magic run in the fourth quarter gave them some separation , and they managed to impressively hold off the home squad the rest of the way for the important road victory . Aaron Gordon led the Magic with a 23 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists and two steals . Nikola Vucevic posted 19 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Terrence Ross poured in 16 points to lead the bench . Jonathan Isaac furnished 14 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . D.J . Augustin contributed 11 points , 10 assists and four rebounds . Michael Carter-Williams and Khem Birch produced matching 10 - point , two - block tallies while dishing out five assists and bringing down four rebounds , respectively . Darren Collison led the way for the Pacers with 24 points , supplementing them with nine assists , three rebounds and one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic delivered 22 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Myles Turner generated a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Wesley Matthews totaled 13 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Thaddeus Young , Domantas Sabonis and Doug McDermott all pitched in 10 points , with Young and Sabonis posting six and five rebounds , respectively . The Magic next pay a visit to the Toronto Raptors on Monday night , while the Pacers remain home to take on the Detroit Pistons on Monday evening as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Indiana Pacers , 117 - 97 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Friday . This was a thorough domination for the Celtics , as a 34 - 20 second quarter buoyed them to victory . In fact , Boston held a double - digit lead for the final 18 minutes of action . Boston ended up shooting 52 percent from the field while holding the Pacers to 41 percent from the field . Free-throw shooting was also critical , with Boston hitting 14 - of - 16 and the Pacers connecting on just 11 - of - 19 . The Celtics ( 48 - 32 ) were led by Jayson Tatum , as he tallied 22 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three steals . Kyrie Irving totaled 17 points , three rebounds and six assists . Al Horford generated 11 points , seven rebounds and two assists while Aron Baynes amassed 11 points . 11 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Gordon Hayward went 9 - of - 9 from the field to lead the bench with 21 points . The Pacers ( 47 - 33 ) were led by Myles Turner , as he generated 15 points and seven rebounds . Thaddeus Young finished with 10 points , five rebounds and three assists . Cory Joseph started and accumulated seven points , four rebounds and eight assists . Domantas Sabonis led the bench with 12 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Indiana playing host to the struggling Brooklyn Nets and Boston welcoming the surging Orlando Magic to TD_Garden .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 117 - 115 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday evening . The Pelicans got out to a good start , but so did the Nets , as the two teams battled it out , with the Pelicans taking a 32 - 30 lead heading into the second . The Nets came out on fire in the second , as they took control with a 47 - 38 lead , just five minutes into the quarter . They carried on to outscore the Pelicans by 11 in the quarter , and take a 66 - 57 lead into halftime . The Pelicans came out strong in the third , but the Nets managed to keep a slight edge for most of the quarter . The Pelicans took the lead momentarily late in the quarter , but the Nets were able to reclaim a three - point lead by the end of the frame . The Nets stayed on top for most of the fourth quarter , but the Pelicans kept it close right down to the wire , setting the scene for a wild finish . The Pelicans closed the game on an impressive 90 run , including the winning jump shot by Jrue Holiday , with just two seconds left . Jrue Holiday led the way for New_Orleans with 26 points , five assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block , in 37 minutes . Anthony Davis tallied 18 points , 14 rebounds , five blocks , four steals and three assists , in 37 minutes . Elfrid Payton had a solid outing with 17 points , six assists and five rebounds . The Pelicans shot 45 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , D'Angelo Russell led the Nets with 24 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Caris LeVert followed up with 21 points , six rebounds and four assists . The Nets shot 44 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 40 from long range . The Nets ( 2 - 3 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Warriors on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 40 ) play host to the Jazz on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 132 - 111 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . While there were nine ties and seven lead changes in the first 15 minutes , that was the only time this game was competitive . In fact , Utah rode a 36 - 18 second quarter en route to a blowout , as New_Orleans trailed by at least eight points for the entirety of the second half . Utah ended up shooting 52 percent from the field while holding New_Orleans to just 42 percent shooting . Ball movement was a huge part of that , with the Jazz out - assisting the Pelicans , 32 - 22 . The Jazz ( 3 - 3 ) got a season - best performance out of Ricky Rubio , as he collected 28 points , six rebounds and 12 assists . Rudy Gobert finished with 25 points , 14 rebounds and four blocks on 11 - of - 13 from the field . Donovan Mitchell accrued 22 points , two rebounds and six assists . Derrick Favors totaled 10 points and seven boards . The Pelicans ( 4 - 1 ) were led by Nikola Mirotic , as he tallied 25 points and eight rebounds . Jrue Holiday totaled 18 points , two rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Julius Randle started for an injured Anthony Davis ( elbow ) , as he provided 12 points and three boards . On deck for Utah is a road matchup versus the Dallas Mavericks . As for New_Orleans , they return to action on Monday against the Denver Nuggets .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 107 - 98 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday evening . The game started out close , but the Pelicans made the first move to gain an advantage and held on to take a , 29 - 26 , lead into the second quarter . Despite a strong effort from the Bulls , the Pelicans pushed their lead to 10 by the halfway point of the quarter , and held on to carry an eight - point advantage into halftime . The Pelicans brought the energy in the third , kicking off the quarter with a 19 - 9 run , and pushing their lead to 18 , with five minutes left in the quarter . They settled on an , 85 - 72 , lead heading into the final frame . Nonetheless , the Bulls kept fighting , and cut the lead back to 10 , with seven minutes to go . They even managed to make it a six - point game with 3:35 to go , but the Pelicans would not let them any closer than that , as New_Orleans earned the much - needed win . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 32 points , 15 rebounds , seven assists , four blocks and one steal , in 37 minutes of action . Jrue Holiday followed up with 17 points , 10 rebounds , nine assists , two steals and two blocks , while Nikola Mirotic added nine points , 15 rebounds , one steal and one block . The Pelicans shot 45 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from deep . Meanwhile , Zach LaVine led Chicago with 22 points , five rebounds , four assists and one block , in 37 minutes . Wendell Carter Jr. came up large with 17 points , 11 rebounds , three blocks and a steal , while Jabari Parker tallied 20 points , 13 rebounds and three assists . The Bulls shot 40 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range . The Bulls ( 3 - 9 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Cavs on Saturday . The Pelicans ( 5 - 6 ) play host to the Suns on Saturday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 119 - 99 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . It 's rare to see a team win all four individual quarters but that was the case here for New_Orleans . That allowed them to win this game in wire - to - wire fashion , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of the second half . They did most of their damage in the first and fourth quarters , outscoring Phoenix , 61 - 43 . Rebounding was a huge factor , with the Pelicans outrebounding the Suns , 54 - 37 . Ball movement was also critical , with New_Orleans out - assisting Phoenix , 28 - 16 . That allowed the Pelicans to shoot 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range while holding the Suns to 41 percent from the field and 28 percent from long range . The Suns ( 2 - 10 ) were led by T.J. Warren , as he tallied 25 points , five rebounds , two assists and three blocks . DeAndre Ayton totaled 20 points and 12 boards on 9 - of - 12 shooting . Devin Booker finished with 12 points , seven assists and two steals . No other Suns player reached double figures in scoring or grabbed more than five rebounds . The Pelicans ( 6 - 6 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he collected 26 points , 13 rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Julius Randle amassed 22 points , 15 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Jrue Holiday accumulated 19 points , six rebounds , nine assists and three steals . E'Twaun Moore generated 17 points , two rebounds and two assists . Both teams play road games on Monday for their next outing , with Phoenix playing the Oklahoma_City Thunder and New_Orleans traveling north of the border to face the Toronto Raptors .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the New_York Knicks , 129 - 124 , at Smoothie King Arena on Friday evening . The Pelicans ( 8 - 7 ) looked woefully unprepared to start the game while falling behind by a 32 - 16 margin in the first quarter . However , the light seemingly came on at that point , as New_Orleans racked up 113 points over the final three periods . Nevertheless , the Knicks ( 4 - 12 ) still held a 119 - 116 lead as late as the 3:24 mark of the fourth quarter before the home squad was able to finish off the contest with a 13 - 5 run . A Julius Randle tip shot and a Jrue Holiday three - pointer gave the Pelicans some much - needed breathing room in the closing minute to help seal the win . New_Orleans held a big advantage on the boards , winning the rebounding battle by a 54 - 44 margin . Tim Hardaway , Jr. paced the Knicks with 30 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , two assists and two steals . Trey Burke turned in 24 points , one rebound , one assist , one steal and one block . Emmanuel Mudiay managed 19 points , six rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Allonzo Trier and Kevin Knox generated matching 11 - point tallies , with Trier adding five assists and Knox adding five rebounds . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with a 43 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , one steal and one block . Holiday pitched in 24 points , 10 assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . E'Twaun Moore poured in 13 points . Nikola Mirotic contributed 12 points , 10 rebounds , one assist and one block . Randle led the bench with 19 points and 11 rebounds . The Knicks remain on the road and head further south to take on the Orlando Magic on Sunday evening , while the Pelicans remain home and tangle with the Denver Nuggets on that same night .
The Boston Celtics defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 124 - 107 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday It 's been a tough stretch for the Celtics ( 11 - 10 ) here in late November , but they managed to pick up a marquee win against one of the NBA 's more talented teams after dropping four of their last five games . And it was n't just a win , it was a dominating win , as Boston opened up a 13 - point lead after the first quarter and never looked back . Kyrie Irving led the way with a team - high 26 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting on top of 10 assists and five steals in just 32 minutes . Al Horford and Jayson Tatum each dropped 20 points , while Marcus Morris , who started his second straight game , posted a double - double of 19 points and 11 assists . The high scoring performances from the team 's starters comes as a result of the Celtics having a rare hot shooting night , as Boston shot a scorching 19 - of - 39 ( 49 percent ) from behind the arc . The 124 points they scored Monday night was a season - high for the team . As for the Pelicans ( 10 - 11 ) , Monday 's loss drops them to under .500 for the first time in three weeks . It was also their fourth straight loss as the team 's odd season of streaks continues . Anthony Davis finished with a game - high 27 points to go along with 16 rebounds , five assists , three steals and three blocks across 37 minutes . Nikola Mirotic was close behind , going 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc en route to 25 points of his own . But , while the starting frontcourt did its job , the starting backcourt of Jrue Holiday and E'Twaun Moore flopped Monday night , combining for just 18 points on a combined 6 - of - 15 shooting . What really hurt the Pelicans was their inability to take care of the basketball , as they committed 22 turnovers to just 21 assists .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 132 - 106 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . The Pelicans ( 13 - 13 ) were without Nikola Mirotic ( illness ) for Wednesday 's game , but that did n't stop their offense from being the explosive force it is capable of being . They managed to open up a 16 - point lead in the first half and never looked back , as Anthony Davis and Julius Randle were no match for the Dallas frontcourt . Each finished with 27 points and shot a combined 21 - of - 36 ( 58 percent ) from the field , while Davis added 18 rebounds and Randle posted nine assists and four rebounds of his own . The sharpshooting of Davis and Randle was contagious too , as the Pelicans shot a scorching 59 percent from the three and 55 percent from the field overall . Jrue Holiday and E'Twaun Moore each added 17 points of their own Wednesday . As for the Mavericks ( 12 - 11 ) , the loss puts an end to a two - game winning streak , and it came without point guard Dennis Smith , who was out with a lingering wrist injury . As a result , rookie Luka Doncic got the start at point guard , but it was n't a great night for the young star . Doncic finished with just eight points on 2 - of - 8 shooting to go along with six assists and four rebounds in just 22 minutes . Harrison Barnes led the team with just 16 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting , while Wesley Matthews added 15 points of his own . J.J. Barea played just 18 minutes off the bench , but he still managed to finish with 14 points . As a team , Dallas simply just could not keep up with the hot - shooting Pelicans , as the Mavericks shot just 43 percent from the field Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 103 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday . While New_Orleans looked in control late in the fourth quarter , Memphis made a critical run that grabbed them a win . In fact , the Grizzlies ended the game on a 15 - 3 run , as that turned an eight - point deficit with five minutes remaining into a four - point victory . It was competitive throughout though , as there were 10 ties and 18 lead changes in total , with neither club ever attaining a double - digit lead . The assist - to - turnover differential was critical , with Memphis out - assisting New_Orleans , 30 - 25 , while winning the turnover differential , 18 - 11 . Three-point shooting was also huge , with the Grizzlies hitting 8 - of - 19 and the Pelicans connecting on just 7 - of - 29 . Memphis bench was huge as well , as they outscored New_Orleans bench , 53 - 11 . The Grizzlies ( 15 - 9 ) were led by JaMychal Green , as he provided 24 points , eight rebounds and two steals off the bench . Joakim Noah also played well off the bench , amassing 13 points , five rebounds and three assists . Kyle Anderson led the starters with 19 points , 11 rebounds , four assists , three steals and three blocks . Marc Gasol accrued 15 points , six rebounds and four assists while Mike Conley finished with nine points , three rebounds and 10 assists . The Pelicans ( 13 - 14 ) were led by Julius Randle , as he accumulated 26 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Anthony Davis collected 25 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , two steals and four blocks . Jrue Holiday accrued 20 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . New_Orleans had no bench player score more than four points . On deck for Memphis is a home matchup versus the Los_Angeles Lakers on Saturday . As for New_Orleans , they travel to play the Detroit Pistons on Sunday for their next outing .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 118 - 114 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday afternoon . The Thunder ( 17 - 9 ) came into the contest sporting a winning road record , and they demonstrated their ability to play well away from their home floor by taking a 28 - 25 first - quarter lead . Although the Pelicans ( 15 - 15 ) battled back to take a slim one - point halftime lead , OKC hung relatively close throughout the entirety of the second half and were just two points back of New_Orleans with 49 seconds remaining . However , a driving Russell Westbrook opted to kick the ball out to Alex Abrines behind the three - point line on what would be the Thunder 's final possession , and the latter 's shot could n't find the basket . The home squad 's biggest advantage came on the rebounding front , as they won the battle of the boards by a 56 - 39 margin . Paul George led the way for the Thunder with a 25 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , two steals and one block . Dennis Schroder followed with a bench - leading 24 points . Steven Adams and Westbrook turned in matching 20 - point , six - rebound tallies , with the latter also dishing out seven assists , recording four steals and posting two blocks . Jerami Grant and Terrence Ferguson contributed seven and six points , respectively . Anthony Davis paced the Pelicans with a 44 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and one block . Julius Randle delivered 22 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and one block . Jrue Holiday managed a 20 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included five rebounds and two steals . Darius Miller led the bench with 10 points . The Thunder remain on the road and take on the Denver Nuggets on Friday night , while the Pelicans remain home and take on the Miami Heat on Sunday evening .
The Miami Heat defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 102 - 96 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Sunday evening . Miami ( 13 - 16 ) cut it close in Sunday 's win , allowing New_Orleans to whittle a double - digit lead down to a two - possession game in the final minute . The Heat , however , profited from strong offensive rebounding to earn the hard - fought win . Behind a season - high 25 offensive boards , eight of which came from veteran Hassan Whiteside , the Heat came out on top of Sunday 's matchup . The Pelicans ( 15 - 16 ) were unable to crack the 100 - point mark despite hitting 13 three - pointers , due in large part to their struggles around the rim . New_Orleans finished the night shooting just 41 percent from the field . Whiteside recorded a double - double to help pave the way for his team 's win . The star big man finished with 17 points , 14 rebounds , and three blocks in total . Josh Richardson was the team 's top scorer , pouring in 22 points to go with four assists and three steals . The Pelicans saw strong play from their stars , but it was not enough to get the job done . Anthony Davis was as dominant as ever , finishing with 27 points , 12 rebounds , seven assists , four blocks , and three steals . Jrue Holiday complemented Davis 's play with 22 more points , and Julius Randle delivered a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Still , the Pelicans made just 35 shots as a team , ending the night with some of their most pedestrian offensive numbers of the season . Next on the agenda for New_Orleans is a visit to Milwaukee on Wednesday . The Heat , meanwhile , will have the next three days off before hosting the Houston Rockets on Thursday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 114 - 112 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday evening . The Mavs got out to a good start on the road and led the Pelicans 29 - 26 after one quarter . They upped the intensity in the second , where they outscored the home team by eight , to take a 66 - 55 lead by halftime . However , the Pelicans came to life in the third , where they outscored the Mavericks by nine to cut the deficit to just to , entering the fourth . The score stayed tight through the fourth , but ultimately the Mavericks could not contain Anthony Davis , who helped the Pelicans seal the much - needed win , ending a five - game losing streak . Davis led the Pelicans with 48 points , 17 rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks , in 42 minutes . Julius Randle followed up with 22 points , 12 rebounds and two assists , while Jrue Holiday tallied 18 points , eight assists , seven rebounds , two steals and one block , in 35 minutes . The Pelicans shot 46 percent from the field , including just 4 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Luka Doncic led the Mavericks with 34 points , on 10 - of - 16 shooting , three assists and two rebounds , in 33 minutes . Harrison Barnes added 21 points , five rebounds , two steals and one assist , while Dennis Smith Jr. finished with 14 points , four assists , two steals and one rebound . The Mavs ( 16 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Thunder on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 16 - 20 ) play host to the Rockets on Saturday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 108 - 104 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . A 30 - 20 first quarter really set the tone in this game for Houston , as they held the lead for over 40 minutes . With that said , there were seven ties and 10 lead changes , with most of those coming in the first quarter . Three-point shooting was huge , with the Rockets connecting on 16 - of - 46 while the Pelicans hit just 9 - of - 28 . Houston also did a ton of havoc in transition , winning the fastbreak scoring differential , 22 - 4 . The Rockets did a ton of damage in the paint too , outscoring the Pelicans , 56 - 32 . The Rockets ( 20 - 15 ) got another gem from James Harden , as he collected 41 points , nine rebounds , six assists , three steals and two blocks . Eric Gordon totaled 21 points , two rebounds and three assists . Danuel House Jr. amassed 15 points and four boards . Austin Rivers led the bench with 10 points , five rebounds and seven assists . The Pelicans ( 16 - 21 ) were led by Julius Randle , as he accrued 23 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Anthony Davis finished with 22 points , 11 rebounds and three steals . E'Twaun Moore generated 21 points and seven boards while Jrue Holiday accumulated 20 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Houston playing host to the Memphis Grizzlies and New_Orleans welcoming the struggling Minnesota Timberwolves to The Big Easy .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 123 - 114 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday . While New_Orleans led for the majority of this game , it was close until the final minutes . In fact , Minnesota rode a 38 - 25 third quarter to make it competitive but New_Orleans took control with a 35 - 25 fourth quarter . There were 11 ties and eight lead changes in total , as it was within a single - digit margin for the final 20 minutes of action . The Pelicans did outscore the T'Wolves by 12 points in the first half though too , as that third quarter was the only time Minnesota looked to be in this game . New_Orleans offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 52 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range while holding Minnesota to 46 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . Defensive rebounding was also big , with the Pelicans winning that battle , 33 - 27 . The Timberwolves ( 17 - 20 ) got another gem from Karl-Anthony Towns , as he collected 28 points , 17 rebounds , six assists and five blocks . Andrew Wiggins finished with 20 points , two rebounds and three assists . Tyus Jones started for Jeff Teague and Derrick Rose , as he accumulated 15 points , two rebounds and 13 assists . The Pelicans ( 17 - 21 ) have struggled mightily without Anthony Davis ( flu ) in his tenure but they got an important victory here . Julius Randle carried the load in his absence , as he led the team with 33 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Jrue Holiday accrued 26 points , four rebounds and nine assists . E'Twaun Moore totaled 17 points , two rebounds and three assists while Darius Miller led the bench with 21 points , three rebounds and three assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with New_Orleans traveling to face the Brooklyn Nets and Minnesota playing the Boston Celtics on the road as well .

The Pelicans got out to a good start on the road , with a 31 - 27 lead after one quarter . The Grizzlies pushed back through the second but still trailed by two , 53 - 51 , at halftime . The Pelicans came out strong in the third quarter , and outscored the Grizzlies by 11 , to take an 86 - 73 lead into the final frame . They held the momentum through the fourth and outscored the visitors by six points in the quarter , to secure their second straight win . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 36 points , 13 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and two steals , in 35 minutes . Julius Randle followed up with 15 points , nine rebounds and two assists , while Jrue Holiday finished with 13 points , six assists , four rebounds and four steals . The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 140 - 124 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday evening . The Cavaliers got out to a great start on the road , as the put together a 38 - 25 lead through the first quarter . The Pelicans answered in the second , where they outscored the Cavs 34 - 25 , to cut the deficit to just four by halftime . The Pelicans carried the momentum into the third quarter , where they outscored the visitors by 13 , to take a nine - point lead into the final frame . The Pelicans stayed in control through the fourth and held on for their third straight win . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 38 points , 13 rebounds , seven assists , four blocks and two steals , in 36 minutes . Jrue Holiday followed up with 18 points , seven rebounds , five assists and three steals , while Frank Jackson added 19 points , in 19 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans shot 55 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Jordan Clarkson led the Cavs with 21 points , four rebounds , three steals , three blocks and two assists , in 29 minutes off the bench . Alec Burks tallied 17 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting , while Matthew Dellavedova finished with 17 points , seven assists and four rebounds . The Cavaliers shot 48 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 30 from long range . The Cavs ( 8 - 34 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Friday . The Pelicans ( 20 - 22 ) take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Saturday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 98 - 94 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 21 - 26 ) , who came into Wednesday 's game having lost two contests in a row , took full advantage of a Pelicans team that was without their star player Anthony Davis . Detroit jumped on the home team from the very start , opening up a 10 - point lead in the first 24 minutes and never letting go of it . Blake Griffin took full advantage of Davis ' absence , scoring a game - high 37 points on 14 - of - 28 shooting to go along with nine rebounds and seven assists in 38 minutes . Only two other players scored in double figures for Detroit , with Reggie Jackson posting 17 points and Jon Leuer posting 15 , but it ended up being more than enough for the visiting team . As for the Pelicans , it was a real offensive struggle for them without their star , and they were unable to escape with a victory . Jrue Holiday shouldered the offensive load for New_Orleans , scoring a team - high 29 points on top of five rebounds and seven assists in 38 minutes . The Pelicans ' starting frontcourt did a solid job of producing in Davis ' absence , with Jahlil Okafor going 8 - of - 13 from the floor en route to posting 17 points and 10 rebounds and Julius Randle adding 13 points and 13 rebounds of his own . However , with the Pelicans shooting just 6 - of - 22 ( 27 percent ) from behind the arc and making just four of the nine free throws they attempted , they did n't give themselves much of a chance at victory Wednesday night .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 126 - 114 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday night . The Spurs ( 27 - 22 ) were seemingly catching a break against a short - handed Pelicans ( 22 - 27 ) squad , but that 's not exactly the way the game played out in the first half . New_Orleans trailed by only three at halftime despite being down Anthony Davis ( finger ) , Julius Randle ( ankle ) and Nikola Mirotic ( ankle ) . However , San_Antonio was able to add eight points to their advantage in the third quarter , giving them a lead they would n't relinquish . The visitors shot an impressive 52 percent , including 46 percent from three - point range , and enjoyed a 51 - 41 rebounding advantage . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with a 28 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists . Rudy Gay churned out 22 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Pau Gasol drew the start and managed 13 points , nine rebounds , four assists and one steal . Derrick White provided 12 points , four assists , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Bryn Forbes mustered 11 points , three assists and two rebounds . Quincy Pondexter led the bench with 10 points . Jrue Holiday paced the Pelicans with 29 points , adding seven rebounds , three assists and one block . Jahlil Okafor posted a 24 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included four blocks and one steal . Frank Jackson registered a bench - leading 15 points while also dishing out four assists , hauling in three rebounds and recording three steals . Darius Miller chipped in 11 points , three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Elfrid Payton , Solomon Hill and E'Twaun Moore totaled just 19 points between them . The Spurs head back home to face the Washington Wizards on Sunday evening , while the Pelicans travel to tangle with the Houston Rockets on Tuesday evening .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 105 - 99 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . New_Orleans came into this matchup with four starters missing , as they simply did n't have enough to compete with a potent Denver team . With that said , there were seven ties and four lead changes in total , as neither team led by more than 11 points . The third quarter was key for the Nuggets , as they outscored the Pelicans , 33 - 19 , and held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was huge , with the Nuggets shooting 47 percent from the field while holding the Pelicans to 42 percent shooting . The 10 steals recorded by Denver were decisive as well , as they won the turnover differential , 14 - 9 . The Nuggets also won the points in the paint battle , 62 - 42 . The Nuggets ( 35 - 15 ) were led by Malik Beasley , as he provided 22 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting off the bench . Nikola Jokic led the starters with 20 points , 13 rebounds , 10 assists , three steals and two blocks . Monte ' Morris started and totaled 20 points , seven rebounds , seven assists and two steals . The Pelicans ( 23 - 29 ) were led by Jrue Holiday , as he collected 22 points , six rebounds and six assists . Darius Miller accumulated 15 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Jahlil Okafor amassed 14 points and eight boards while Kenrich Williams led the bench with 21 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Nikola Mirotic , Anthony Davis , Julius Randle , Elfrid Payton and E'Twaun Moore all missed this game . On deck for Denver is a home matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Friday . As for New_Orleans , they return to action on Saturday in a road matchup versus the San_Antonio Spurs .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 109 - 107 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday evening . The Pacers got out to a solid start on the road , with a 25 - 20 lead after one quarter . The Pelicans battled through the second , but the visitors held the edge , to lead 53 - 50 by halftime . The Pacers kept the momentum in the third , where they built a 10 - point lead , before settling on an 83 - 74 lead heading into the final frame . The Pelicans made it interesting as they battled right down to the wire , however , the Pacers managed to stay one step ahead and held on for their 16th road win of the season . This marks the third straight loss for New_Orleans . Darren Collison led the Pacers with 22 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes . The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 122 - 117 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday . While Minnesota took an 18 - point lead thanks to a 35 - 22 first quarter , New_Orleans then responded with a 40 - 27 second quarter to make it competitive . In fact , New_Orleans held the lead for the final 20 minutes , despite the fact that it was within a seven - point margin for the final 15 minutes . All four ties and seven lead changes happened in the final minutes of the second quarter and the opening minutes of the third . The assist - to - turnover ratio was critical , with the Pelicans recording 27 assists to 11 turnovers while the Timberwolves committed 15 turnovers to 22 assists . Free-throw shooting was also huge , with New_Orleans hitting 27 - of - 28 and Minnesota connecting on 16 - of - 22 . The Timberwolves ( 25 - 30 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he tallied 32 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Andrew Wiggins accumulated 23 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and two blocks . Jeff Teague ( foot ) made his return from injury to lead the bench with 12 points , four rebounds and five assists . The Pelicans ( 25 - 31 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he provided 32 points , nine rebounds , two assists and three blocks on 11 - of - 15 shooting in just 25 minutes . In fact , Davis did n't play in the fourth quarter . Jrue Holiday collected 27 points , four rebounds , nine assists and three steals . Kenrich Williams totaled 19 points and six rebounds while Tim Frazier led the bench with 12 points , nine rebounds , eight assists and two steals . On deck for New_Orleans is a road matchup versus the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday . As for Minnesota , they play host to the Los_Angeles Clippers on Monday for their next fixture .
The Philadelphia 76ers took down the New_Orleans Pelicans , 111 - 110 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday evening . Though it was only a one - point win , Philadelphia ( 39 - 22 ) led from the first quarter onwards , holding as much as a 16 - point lead at points throughout . The Pelicans ( 27 - 35 ) clawed back with a strong fourth quarter in which they held the Sixers to only 18 points . New_Orleans , though could not pull off the comeback , particularly with star player Anthony Davis spending much of the game on the bench . Davis has seen his minutes limited significantly since news of his trade demand broke in early February ; on Monday , he logged only 20 minutes on the court . Tobias Harris played a crucial role in the Sixers ' win , leading all scorers with 29 points . Recently-acquired big man Boban Marjanovic also contributed significantly , logging a double - double . However , the night ended early for Marjanovic after he suffered a knee injury late in the game . He did not return to action . For the Pelicans , Jrue Holiday led the way with 22 points . Davis scored 18 despite his limited minutes . Elfrid Payton and Julius Randle each logged double - doubles , with Payton dishing 14 assists and Randle pulling down 14 rebounds . The Pelicans will visit the Los_Angeles Lakers on Wednesday , while the 76ers travel to OKC for a tilt with the Thunder on Thursday .

The Phoenix Suns defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 138 - 136 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . In a battle between two of the worst teams in the west , it took an overtime session to determine a winner and one of the craziest endings you 'll ever see . In fact , there were 10 ties and 15 lead changes in total , as it stayed within a five - point margin for the entirety of the fourth quarter and overtime . The ending was absolutely ridiculous , with Phoenix scoring five points in the final 2 seconds to turn a three - point deficit into a two - point victory . Josh Jackson hit a three - pointer to tie the game with 2,2 seconds left and then New_Orleans got called for a technical foul because they tried to call a timeout with none remaining . Devin Booker nailed the technical free - throw and that was the nail in the coffin . The Suns shooting was key , as they shot 51 percent from the field while holding the Pelicans to 46 percent from the field . Phoenix also outscored New_Orleans in the paint , 76 - 60 . The Suns ( 16 - 54 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he tallied 40 points , five rebounds and 12 assists . Kelly Oubre Jr. finished with 32 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Dragan Bender got a rare start and totaled 13 points and five boards . Josh Jackson led the bench with 19 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two blocks . The Pelicans ( 30 - 41 ) got a fourth - straight triple - double from Elfrid Payton , as he accumulated 16 points , 13 rebounds and 16 assists . Julius Randle led the team in scoring , amassing 21 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . Anthony Davis played 22 minutes and provided 15 points , 11 rebounds and three steals . Darius Miller , Cheick Diallo , Ian Clark and Jahlil Okafor each reach double figures in scoring off the bench . Both teams return to action on Monday against struggling teams , with Phoenix playing host to the Chicago Bulls and New_Orleans traveling to face the Dallas Mavericks .

The Atlanta Hawks defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 130 - 120 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Tuesday evening . The Hawks ( 27 - 48 ) have been coming on during the latter stages of the campaign , and their high - powered offense has been key . Such was the case again Tuesday , with Atlanta racking up 42 first - quarter points and compiling 70 by intermission . While they did n't quite keep up the same pace the rest of the way , the visitors scored the final four points after the Pelicans ( 31 - 45 ) had closed to 126 - 120 with 40 seconds remaining . Ball security especially a problem for New_Orleans , as they committed 24 turnovers . The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Sacramento Kings , 121 - 118 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Thursday . It was essentially a wire - to - wire victory for the Pelicans ( 32 - 45 ) , as while the Kings ( 37 - 38 ) managed to take back the lead a few times during Thursday 's contest , New_Orleans did a terrific job of closing out quarters in an effort to maintain their distance . Julius Randle was again sensational in the absence of Anthony Davis ( back ) , posting another double - double with 34 points and 11 rebounds across 31 minutes . Meanwhile , the newest Pelican , Christian Wood , continues to be productive since getting picked up by the team , as he came off the bench to post 25 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting and nine rebounds across 28 minutes . With Randle and Wood leading the way with efficient shots inside the paint , New_Orleans put together a stellar performance from the floor , shooting an impressive 49 - of - 96 ( 51 percent ) . For the Kings , they fall back below .500 with the loss , as they have been unable to put together a good stretch of games here as the regular season draws to an end . The starting backcourt of De'Aaron Fox and Buddy Hield was very effective in the losing effort , as Hield scored a team - high 27 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting while Fox posted a double - double of 25 points on 11 - of - 22 shooting and 12 assists in 37 minutes . The two , however , could n't get anything going from behind the arc , combining to go 2 - of - 11 from deep . But the poor shooting was n't necessarily contagious , as Sacramento still managed to go 10 - of - 23 ( 44 percent ) from behind the arc .

The Detroit Pistons defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 103 - 100 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Wednesday . It was n't a great start for the Pistons ( 10 ) on Wednesday , as they fell behind 13 - 4 early and were not able to take their first lead of the game until the 3:25 mark in the second quarter . From there , the team watched its lead grow to as much as 13 points in the third period , and while the Nets ( 0 - 1 ) made one final push , they were not able to complete the comeback on opening night . Wednesday 's win was all about frontcourt production for Detroit , with Blake Griffin and Andre Drummond leading the way . Griffin finished with a team - high 26 points ( 8 - 17 FG ) , eight rebounds and six assists across 34 minutes , while Drummond posted a monster double - double of 24 points and 20 rebounds in 32 minutes . Starting point guard Reggie Jackson was also a solid contributor in the scoring column , scoring 19 points in 35 minutes . For Brooklyn , it was 24 - year - old Caris LeVert who led the way , scoring a game - high 27 points ( 10 - 18 FG ) in 24 minutes . And while starting point guard D'Angelo Russell struggled in the season opener , scoring just eight points in 25 minutes , Spencer Dinwiddie came off the bench to put together a stellar all - around performance with 23 points ( 10 - 18 FG ) , six assists and four rebounds in 32 minutes . In the end , what killed the Nets was their poor performance from the outside , as the team shot a horrid 5 - of - 27 from three - point range Wednesday night .

The fact that this game went into overtime emphasizes just how competitive it was , as neither club ever led by more than 10 points . In addition , there were 12 ties and 25 lead changes in total , as there were nine lead changes alone in the final 10 minutes of action . The key for Detroit was scoring down low , as they won the points in the paint battle , 64 - 46 . The Detroit starters really dominated the Philly starters as well , outscoring them , 104 - 81 . The Boston Celtics defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 109 - 87 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Saturday evening . The Celtics took control mid way through the first quarter , where they amassed an 11 - point lead , and held on to lead , 30 - 21 , heading into the second . The Celtics did not let up , as they pushed their lead to 15 , half way through the second , while the Pistons struggled to keep up . The Celtics opened the third quarter with a quick bucket , which gave them a , 65 - 41 , lead , but the Pistons responded with a 9 - 5 run to cut the lead to 20 . The Pistons outscored the Celtics 26 - 21 in the third quarter , but it was not enough to make a significant dent in the deficit , as the Celtics led by 17 , entering the final frame . The Celtics were able to cruise to their third straight win , while the Pistons took their first loss of the season . Jaylen Brown led Boston with 19 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting , while Marcus Morris followed up with 18 points and eight rebounds , in 24 minutes off the bench . Gordon Hayward tallied 15 points , five rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 23 minutes . Daniel Theis had a solid night in 19 minutes off the bench , with 17 points , eight rebounds and one assist . The Celtics shot 45 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Andre Drummond led the Pistons with 18 points , eight rebounds , two blocks and one assist , in 29 minutes . Stanley Johnson followed up with 16 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Blake Griffin was quiet , with only seven points , six rebounds and three assists , in 30 minutes of action . The Pistons shot 36 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 37 from deep . The Pistons ( 4 - 1 ) will be looking for revenge as they take on the Celtics in Boston on Tuesday . The Celtics ( 4 - 2 ) also look ahead to the rematch on Tuesday .
The Miami Heat defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 120 - 115 , in overtime at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Monday . There were 14 ties and 26 lead changes in this competitive matchup , as it took an overtime session to determine a winner . Neither team could hit a shot late , as they combined to miss the final eight shots from the field in the extra session . Miami ended the game strong though , scoring the final seven points , with four of those coming at the free - throw line . The Heat did most of their damage defensively , as they recorded 10 steals and seven blocks while holding the Pistons to 41 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . Miami 's bench was also a huge factor , as they outscored Detroit 's bench , 44 - 25 . The Heat ( 4 - 5 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he tallied 27 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Goran Dragic finished with 21 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Bam Adebayo accrued 11 points , eight rebounds and three steals in a start for Hassan Whiteside ( knee ) . Dwyane Wade led the bench with 18 points while Kelly Olynyk provided 13 points , five rebounds and four assists off the bench as well . The Pistons ( 4 - 5 ) got a monster double - double out of Andre Drummond , as he collected 25 points . 24 rebounds and three assists . Reggie Jackson matched those 25 points , adding four rebounds and six assists to his tally . Blake Griffin amassed 24 points , 15 rebounds and seven assists before fouling out . Langston Galloway played well off the bench , providing 21 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Detroit traveling to play the Orlando Magic and Miami playing host to the San_Antonio Spurs .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Detroit Pistons , 113 - 103 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Hornets ( 7 - 6 ) and the Pistons ( 6 - 6 ) played what it seemed to be a tight encounter in the early going , but Charlotte pulled away for good in the second half to secure a huge win that puts them over .500 and , even though the season is quite young , it looks as if the Hornets can definitively contend for a playoff berth this season . Detroit jumped ahead to a 27 - 24 lead in the first quarter , but Charlotte stormed back to take a 51 - 49 lead at the break . From then , it was all Hornets since they won the remaining two quarters ( 32 - 26 and 30 - 28 , respectively ) to win the game comfortably by a 10 - point margin . Charlotte 's two point guards carried the team in this game , as both Kemba Walker and Tony Parker finished with 24 points each . The French came off the bench to add four assists and three boards , while Walker chipped in with eight assists and three boards of his own . Cody Zeller contributed with 14 points and six rebounds , and both Marvin Williams and Jeremy Lamb delivered 10 points . The latter , though , also added six rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Andre Drummond led the way for the Pistons and he filled the stat sheet admirably since he ended the game with 23 points , 22 rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks . Reggie Jackson contributed with 19 points and seven assists , while Langston Galloway added 10 points off the bench . Blake Griffin , however , only had 10 points while going 4 - of - 16 from the field , but added six rebounds and five assists .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 116 - 111 , in overtime at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Friday . These teams played a game that was decided by two points on Wednesday but this fixture was arguably even closer . In fact , there were 17 ties and 14 lead changes in total , as it took an overtime session to determine a winner . In addition , there were six ties and nine lead changes alone in the final three minutes of regulation and in the overtime . Detroit ended the game strong , finishing the matchup on a 15 - 8 run . Defense was critical for Detroit , as they held Houston to just 42 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . While the Pistons were less efficient at the free - throw line , they controlled the game there , going 29 - of - 40 while the Rockets went just 19 - of - 21 . Detroit also controlled the glass , winning the defensive rebounding battle , 35 - 27 . The Rockets ( 9 - 8 ) were led by James Harden , as he accrued 33 points , two rebounds and seven assists . Clint Capela totaled 29 points , 21 rebounds , two steals and three blocks on 14 - of - 21 from the field . Chris Paul accumulated 20 points , four rebounds and nine assists . Eric Gordon and P.J . Tucker scored 11 points apiece . The Pistons ( 9 - 7 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he tallied 28 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Andre Drummond collected 23 points , 20 rebounds , three steals and five blocks . Reggie Jackson came up huge at the end , as he scored 19 of his 21 points in the fourth quarter and overtime , as he also provided four rebounds and six assists . On deck for Houston is a road matchup versus the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday . As for Detroit , they play host to the Phoenix Suns on Sunday for their next fixture .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 115 - 108 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Tuesday . Detroit came into this game as a heavy favorite and the fact they held the lead for the entirety of the second half vindicates that notion . In fact , the Pistons led by at least five points for the final 30 minutes of action , as New_York simply could n't get the game close enough to compete . The Pistons defense was the difference , as they held the Knicks to 39 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Detroit ended up shooting 48 percent from the field while going 32 - of - 45 from the free - throw line . Transition offense was also key , with the Pistons winning the fastbreak scoring differential , 20 - 4 . Detroit also dominated down low , outscoring the Knicks in the paint , 56 - 38 . The Knicks ( 7 - 15 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he tallied 19 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Enes Kanter finished with 16 points , 14 rebounds and two assists . No other starter reached double figures in scoring . Allonzo Trier was huge off the bench , providing 24 points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . The Pistons ( 11 - 7 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he collected 30 points , four rebounds and five assists . Reggie Jackson accrued 21 points , three rebounds and four assists . Andre Drummond scored just six points but amassed 14 rebounds and two blocks . Stanley Johnson was a nice spark off the bench , accumulating 21 points , four rebounds and two assists . On deck for New_York is a road matchup versus the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday . As for Detroit , they return to action on Friday when they play host to the Chicago Bulls .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 107 - 88 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Friday . Detroit came into this matchup as a sizable favorite and a wire - to - wire win shows just why . A 34 - 21 first quarter really set the tone , as Chicago never got the game within a five - point margin from there . Detroit took care of the boards , winning the rebounding differential , 52 - 40 . Three-point shooting was also critical , with the Pistons hitting 13 - of - 34 while the Bulls connected on just 3 - of - 21 from long range . Detroit was also successful in transition , winning the fastbreak scoring differential , 11 - 2 . The Bulls ( 5 - 18 ) were led by Wendell Carter Jr. as he tallied 28 points , seven rebounds and three blocks on 11 - of - 18 from the field . Jabari Parker was the only other Bull in double figures , as he amassed 12 points and six boards . Zach LaVine went just 3 - of - 12 from the field but still finished with eight points and nine assists . The Pistons ( 12 - 7 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he accrued 20 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Reggie Jackson matched those 20 points , adding two assists to his tally . Andre Drummond collected 19 points , 20 rebounds , two assists , two steals and four blocks . Reggie Bullock totaled 13 points and six assists . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Chicago traveling to play the Houston Rockets and Detroit playing host to the Golden_State Warriors .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 111 - 102 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Saturday . It 's rare to see Golden_State playing from behind all game but that was the case here . In fact , a 30 - 22 second quarter really set the tone for Detroit , as they held the lead for the entirety of the second half . Three-point shooting killed the Warriors , as they connected on just 6 - of - 26 while the Pistons hit 12 - of - 35 . Detroit did most of their damage down low , outscoring Golden_State in the paint , 54 - 48 . The Pistons bench was also huge , as they outscored the Warriors bench , 42 - 11 . The Warriors ( 15 - 9 ) have now lost six straight road games , as that 's their worst stretch in a decade . Stephen Curry ( abductor ) did make his return to the lineup though , as he tallied 27 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kevin Durant finished with 28 points , six rebounds , seven assists and two blocks . Klay Thompson amassed 21 points and eight boards . All three of those players took at least 19 shots but none of them cracked 50 percent shooting . No other player on the roster reached double figures in scoring or recorded more than five rebounds or two assists . The Pistons ( 13 - 7 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he accrued 26 points , six rebounds and five assists . Andre Drummond collected 16 points , 19 rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Reggie Jackson totaled 17 points , two rebounds and five assists . Stanley Johnson was a huge spark off the bench , providing 19 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Both these teams return to action on Monday , with Golden_State traveling to face the Atlanta Hawks and Detroit playing host to the Oklahoma_City Thunder .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Detroit Pistons , 110 - 83 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Monday . The Thunder ( 15 - 7 ) had an impressive performance on both ends of the court , as they dominated the Pistons ( 13 - 8 ) from start to finish . OKC started strong and quickly jumped to a 26 - 17 lead in the first quarter , and they would never look back . A 24 - 23 second quarter gave the Thunder a 10 - point advantage into the break , but they would break free in the third quarter with an impressive 37 - 19 effort during the third quarter . The final 12 minutes of action saw Detroit coming on top 24 - 23 , but it would n't be enough . OKC had this game wrapped up by the end of the third quarter , and did n't have problems to close things out . Surprisingly , Steven Adams was the Thunder 's top scorer with 21 points and six rebounds . Russell Westbrook `` only `` scored 18 points , but he added six rebounds and six assists as well . Paul George filled the stat sheet admirably since he finished with 17 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Jerami Grant had 15 points , while Dennis Schroder delivered 12 points , nine rebounds and six assists off the bench . As it has been the case during the entire season , Blake Griffin was the best player for the Pistons since he finished with 20 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Andre Drummond had 13 points and also added six rebounds . Reggie Jackson only had 10 points while shooting 4 - 10 from the field . Jon Leuer contributed 12 points in nine only minutes coming off the bench .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 117 - 111 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Friday evening . The contest got out to a very competitive start , with multiple ties and lead changes through the first quarter , before the Sixers emerged with a , 28 - 27 , lead to start the second . However , the Pistons pulled away in the second quarter , as they closed the quarter on a 16 - 6 run to take a 12 - point lead into halftime . The 76ers came out on fire in the third quarter , as they held the Pistons to just five points through the first eight minutes of the quarter , while they poured in 22 points , to take a two - point lead with three minutes left in the quarter . The Pistons managed to get back on track though , and took a , 90 - 89 , lead into the final frame . The Pistons held on to their advantage through the first six minutes of the quarter , but the 76ers hung around and waited for their chance to pounce . They pulled ahead with 6:22 left in the contest , and did not look back from there , as they used a 100 run to take an eight - point lead with just three minutes left , and were able to hang on for their fifth road win of the season . Jimmy Butler led the way for the 76ers with 38 points , six rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block , in 38 minutes . Ben Simmons , J.J. Redick and Mike Muscala chipped in 18 points each to help the cause . The Sixers shot 49 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 32 from long range . Meanwhile , Blake Griffin led the Pistons with 31 points , 12 rebounds and six assists , in 37 minutes . Andre Drummond tallied 21 points , 10 rebounds , two steals and two blocks , while Langston Galloway chipped in 12 points , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Pistons ( 13 - 10 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Pelicans on Sunday . The 76ers ( 18 - 9 ) play host to the Pistons on Monday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Detroit Pistons , 116 - 108 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Pelicans ( 14 - 14 ) came out of the gates hot , outscoring the Pistons ( 13 - 11 ) by a 28 - 20 margin in the first 12 minutes . Detroit would pick up the pace offensively the rest of the way , but New_Orleans remained one step ahead , even while losing Anthony Davis for a time during the contest due to a hip injury . The dynamic duo of Jrue Holiday and Julius Randle picked up the slack by combining for 65 points , and the Pels finished with a stellar 53 percent success rate from the field overall . Holiday paced the Pelicans with 37 points , a total he complemented with five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Randle supplied 28 points , six rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Tim Frazier managed 14 points , eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . Nikola Mirotic led the bench with 12 points and added seven rebounds and two blocks . Blake Griffin led the Pistons with 35 points and supplemented them with five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Langston Galloway led the second unit with 24 points . Andre Drummond generated a 23 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . No other Detroit player hit double digits in the scoring column , and Reggie Jackson notably mustered just two points , seven assists and two steals over 26 minutes . The Pelicans next pay a visit to the Boston Celtics on Monday night , while the Pistons also hit the road and tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Monday evening as well .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Detroit Pistons , 107 - 104 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Monday . The Bucks ( 20 - 9 ) and the Pistons ( 14 - 14 ) are two of the playoff - contending teams in the Eastern_Conference , and this matchup certainly lived up to that hype since it was close and did n't have a clear winner right until the final buzzer . The Bucks had to come from behind in this one , though , as they fell 27 - 25 in the first quarter , but they bounced back with an impressive 30 - 16 edge during the subsequent 12 minutes to finish the first half up by 12 points ( 55 - 43 ) . Turns out that would be everything they would need to close things out - despite the fact Detroit won the final two quarters ( 34 - 26 and 27 - 26 , respectively ) , Milwaukee held on to the lead and won a tightly - contested affair . With this result , Detroit has now dropped seven of their last eight games , while Milwaukee has won seven of their past 12 . As it has been the case all season long , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with 32 points , 12 rebounds and five assists , but he received a lot of help today . Khris Middleton contributed 22 points and six assists , Eric Bledsoe added 17 points with nine assists , and Tony Snell chipped in with 12 points and six rebounds . Sterling Brown had nine points , three boards , three assists and three steals off the bench . Reggie Bullock was the top scorer for the Pistons in this game since he finished with 24 points , but it was Blake Griffin who stole the spotlight thanks to his `` quadruple `` - double of 19 points , 10 rebounds , 11 assists ... and 10 turnovers . Andre Drummond also had a double - double of 10 points and 14 boards . Stanley Johnson had 20 points off the bench .

It 's hard to believe that Detroit led 31 - 13 after the first quarter and lost this game , as this marked Utah 's biggest comeback of the season . A 35 - 22 second quarter got them right back into it , as they ended up outscoring the Pistons by 23 points across the final three quarters . Defense is what got the Jazz back into the game , as they recorded 11 steals and six blocks while holding the Pistons to under 40 percent from the field in those final three quarters . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Utah recording 24 assists to 12 turnovers while Detroit matched their 18 turnovers with 18 assists . The Jazz ( 20 - 20 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he tallied 26 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Ricky Rubio finished with 18 points , two rebounds and four assists . The Spurs ( 24 - 17 ) and the Pistons ( 17 - 21 ) were expected to play a back - and - forth game , and that 's what happened ... at least during the first half of action . Detroit jumped to a rather surprising 31 - 25 following the first quarter , but San_Antonio turned things around and a 34 - 20 advantage in the second quarter saw them go up by eight points ( 59 - 51 ) entering the break . The Spurs would dominate the second half completely , and they won the remaining two quarters , 25 - 22 and 35 - 34 respectively , as they ended cruising their way towards a comfortable win on the road . With the win , San_Antonio extended their positive run : they have won 13 of their last 16 games . As it has been the case during the entire season , DeMar DeRozan ( 26 points , nine assists , seven rebounds ) and LaMarcus Aldridge ( 25 points , six rebounds ) . They got help , though , since Derrick White contributed 17 points and Bryn Forbes registered 15 points . The bench provided a nice boost as well - Patty Mills chipped in with 13 points , while sharp - shooter Marco Belinelli had nine points in 21 minutes . Blake Griffin led the way for the Pistons despite the loss since he finished with 31 points and eight assists , flourishing in his primary ball - handler role . The Pistons ( 19 - 24 ) and the Magic ( 19 - 25 ) were expected to play an intense , down - to - the - wire contest , and they did n't disappoint since they needed an overtime period to find a winner . Orlando jumped to a 34 - 26 lead in the first , but Detroit rallied back and won the two subsequent quarters , 32 - 29 and 32 - 21 , to gain a six - point lead entering the fourth quarter . But a 25 - 19 lead for the Magic in the fourth extended the game towards an OT period ; the final five minutes of action , however , saw Detroit win 11 - 6 , so they secured a huge win in front of their crowd . Six Detroit players scored in double digits as Blake Griffin led the way with an impressive 30 - point effort , while Andre Drummond delivered a strong double - double of 14 points and 22 rebounds . The Detroit Pistons defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 93 - 89 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Thursday night . The Mavericks ( 23 - 28 ) had to have a bit of collective whiplash coming into Thursday 's contest , considering the amount of players the exited and entered the franchise , at least on paper , earlier in the day . In the wake of a blockbuster trade between Dallas and the Knicks that saw marquee names like Kristaps Porzingis , Tim Hardaway , Jr. , Dennis Smith , Jr. and DeAndre Jordan change uniforms , the Mavs took the court extremely short - handed . Their rotation was made even thinner by the notable absence of Luka Doncic ( ankle ) , so it was certainly a testament to their grit when they jumped out to a 49 - 45 halftime lead . The visitors looked like they might pull off a rather improbable upset over the Pistons ( 22 - 28 ) well into the fourth quarter before Detroit finished on an 18 - 11 run over the final 6:17 to secure the win . Harrison Barnes paced the Mavericks with 27 points , adding seven rebounds and four assists . Devin Harris supplied 15 points , four rebounds and three assists . Dwight Powell was the only other double - digit scorer for Dallas , turning in 10 points , five rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Jalen Brunson registered nine points , six assists and two rebounds . Dirk Nowitzki and Ryan Broekhoff generated matching seven - point tallies . Andre Drummond and Blake Griffin co - led the Pistons with 24 points , and they notably hauled in 20 and 10 rebounds , respectively . Reggie Jackson managed 17 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and two steals . Langston Galloway managed 11 points , three boards and one block . Reggie Bullock had just four points on 1 - for - 8 shooting . The Mavericks next pay a visit to the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday night , while the Pistons remain home and tangle with the Los_Angeles Clippers on Saturday afternoon as well .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 111 - 101 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Saturday . When Detroit led 40 - 22 after the first quarter , this game looked over but Los_Angeles had other ideas . In fact , they got back into the game thanks to a 29 - 22 third quarter and completed their epic comeback with an incredible 34 - 15 fourth quarter . The Clippers ended up shooting close to 60 percent in the second half while holding the Pistons to 38 percent from the field . Rebounding was critical for Los_Angeles , as they outrebounded Detroit , 47 - 38 . The Clippers bench also outscored the Pistons bench , 80 - 17 . The Clippers ( 29 - 24 ) were led by Lou Williams , as he scored 16 of their final 18 points , finishing with 39 points , three rebounds and nine assists off the bench . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander was the only starter in double figures , as he accrued 14 points , seven rebounds , five assists and three steals . Montrezl Harrell amassed 16 points and seven rebounds off the bench while Boban Marjanovic recorded a minimal 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double in 16 minutes . The Pistons ( 22 - 29 ) were led by Reggie Jackson , as he collected 29 points , two rebounds and seven assists . Blake Griffin tallied 24 points , 11 rebounds and six assists . Reggie Bullock totaled 19 points and four boards while Andre Drummond accumulated 12 points , 11 rebounds , two steals and three blocks . On deck for Los_Angeles is a road matchup versus the Toronto Raptors on Sunday . As for Detroit , they return to action on Monday when they play host to the Detroit Pistons .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Denver Nuggets , 129 - 103 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Monday . The Pistons ( 23 - 29 ) were coming off five losses in their previous seven matches , while the Nuggets ( 37 - 16 ) entered this game riding a six - game winning run , so it seemed Denver were the favorites on paper but things looked different after tip - off . Denver finished the first quarter leading by two points ( 36 - 34 ) , but they disappeared off the court during the remainder of the game . Detroit took full control of the contest thanks to a huge performance during the second quarter ( 34 - 19 ) , so they entered half - time up by 13 points ( 68 - 55 ) . Detroit would also win the subsequent two quarters ( 29 - 28 and 32 - 20 , respectively ) , and they secured a huge win in front of their crowd . One that could mean quite a morale boost going forward . Seven Detroit players scored in double digits in this one . Andre Drummond led the way with an impressive 27 - point , 12 - rebound performance , while Blake Griffin registered 17 points , seven rebounds , and four assists . Reggie Jackson had 14 points and Reggie Bullock added 11 , but the bench played a big role as well . Stanley Johnson had 21 points and seven rebounds , Langston Galloway chipped in with 18 points , and Luke Kennard added 14 points , four rebounds and four assists . The five starters for Denver scored in double digits , but the top scorer came off the bench since Trey Lyles had 20 points . Monte Morris had 18 points , while Nikola Jokic added 16 points , and Mason Plumlee contributed 15 points and 11 rebounds . Malik Beasley finished with 16 points , and Will Barton impressed with 10 points and seven assists .

A 29 - 20 third quarter was the nail in the coffin , as the Pistons led by at least five points for the final 16 minutes . Rebounding was the difference for Detroit , as they outrebounded Washington , 48 - 37 . They did damage scoring down low too , as the Pistons outscored the Wizards in the paint , 56 - 40 . Both offenses were on point , as they each shot above 50 percent from the field . The Wizards ( 24 - 33 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 32 points , six rebounds , 10 assists and two steals . Trevor Ariza accumulated 23 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Bobby Portis led the bench with 24 points , five rebounds and two steals . No other player scored more than 10 points . The Pistons ( 26 - 29 ) got a near triple - double from Blake Griffin , as he led the way with 31 points , nine rebounds and nine assists . Andre Drummond collected 32 points 17 rebounds and four steals . Reggie Jackson totaled 16 points and six assists . Luke Kennard led the bench with 15 points , three rebounds and two assists .
