The Detroit Pistons defeated the Indiana Pacers , 113 - 109 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Monday evening . The Pistons ( 29 - 30 ) and the Pacers ( 40 - 21 ) met this Monday but the game did n't happen as many would have expected . Despite the gap between both franchises ' records this season , Detroit started better and dominated the first quarter with no problems , quickly jumping to a 16 - point lead after the first 12 minutes ( 36 - 20 ) . Indiana answered with a 31 - 19 second quarter , so the Pistons were up by four at the break although they re - extended their lead with a 29 - 26 third period . Detroit entered the fourth quarter up by seven points so it was up grabs and even though Indiana won the final quarter 32 - 29 , the Pistons held on and secured a huge win . It was a very intense game , as evidenced by the fact that both Blake Griffin and Thaddeus Young were caught shoving opponents throughout the game . Andre Drummond led the Pistons offensively with 26 points and 16 rebounds , but Blake Griffin also had an impressive performance and finished with a triple - double thanks to 20 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists . Reggie Jackson and Wayne Ellington each had 14 points , although the injury - prone point guard also added five assists . Luke Kennard ( 19 points ) and Langston Galloway ( 13 points ) looked solid off the bench . Wesley Matthews had 14 points , and Thaddeus Young chipped in with 10 points and 12 rebounds . Domantas Sabonis delivered an impressive effort off the bench since he finished with 23 points and seven boards .

Detroit scored no fewer than 30 points in any of those quarters , and they were exemplary on both the shooting and turnover front . The Pistons drained 54 percent of their attempts - - including 42 percent of their three - point tries - - and only handed the ball to the visitors on five occasions . Leonard generated a 24 - point , 13 - rebound double - double while working in concert with star holdover Kyle Lowry , who posted a game - high 27 . The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 125 - 115 , at Air Canada Center on Sunday evening . It was a wire - to - wire win for Toronto ( 17 - 4 ) , as the Raptors shot 52 percent from the field in a commanding win . The Raptors ran away with the game in the third quarter , when they led by as much as 19 . Despite an early fourth quarter run by Miami ( 7 - 12 ) that cut the lead to just eight , Toronto was able to maintain a comfortable advantage until the final buzzer . Kawhi Leonard led Toronto with 29 points , 10 rebounds , and two steals . Paskal Siakim added 21 points as well as two steals and two blocks . All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry finished with a double - double , scoring 12 points and dishing out 10 assists . As a team , Toronto finished shooting 52 percent from the field and 80 percent from the free - throw line , in addition to hitting 11 three - pointers . Miami , meanwhile , saw incredible play from its second unit after its starters fell flat . Hassan Whiteside played just 12 minutes after picking up four personal fouls . This left plenty of play time for sophomore center Bam Adebayo , who had 21 rebounds and 16 points off the bench . Veteran star Dwyane Wade turned back the clock with a lights - out 35 - point performance to lead the second unit . On Tuesday , Miami will host the Atlanta Hawks , while the Raptors will visit Memphis .
The Los Angeles Clippers took down the New Orleans Pelicans , 129 - 126 , at Smoothie King Center on Monday evening . After falling by just four points on the road on Sunday , the Clippers ( 16 - 7 ) managed to come out on the winning end of a close game in New Orleans . Despite a career - best 37 points from Pelicans ' big man Julius Randle , LA was able to hang on to a narrow lead throughout the late fourth quarter . Both teams absolutely dominated on the interior , with the Clippers shooting 59 percent from the floor and New Orleans ( 12 - 13 ) shooting an admirable 53 percent . New Orleans also drained 13 three - pointers despite the loss . For the Clippers , Tobias Harris led the way with 27 points . Harris has been the unequivocal leader of this year 's Clippers squad , earning Western_Conference Player of the Month honors for October and November . In addition to Harris 's strong play , the team saw 20 points from breakout star Montrezl Harrell . Harrell has scored 20 or more points in six of his last eight games despite averaging just over 25 minutes per game over that stretch . New Orleans , meanwhile , saw a career night from Randle . His 37 points came on 15 - of - 24 shooting from the field , and he also pulled down seven rebounds . Jrue Holiday added a whopping 32 points and 14 assists , while Anthony Davis displayed his typical dominance , finishing with 23 points , 14 rebounds , six assists , three steals , and three blocks . Despite those strong performances , New Orleans could not match LA 's incredible offensive output . New Orleans will host the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday , while the Clippers will visit Memphis .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 113 - 102 , at Air Canada Center on Wednesday . In a battle between the Eastern_Conference elite , Toronto showed why they 're top dogs . They did most of their damage in the second and fourth quarters , outscoring Philadelphia , 65 - 45 . It was competitive throughout though , as there were eight ties and seven lead changes in total . The Raptors defense was key , as they recorded 12 steals while winning the turnover differential , 21 - 11 . Toronto did a ton of their havoc down low , outscoring the Sixers in the paint , 62 - 42 . The Sixers ( 17 - 9 ) were led by Jimmy Butler , as he totaled 38 points and 10 rebounds on 15 - of - 27 from the field . J.J. Redick amassed 25 points and four assists . Joel Embiid went just 5 - of - 17 from the field but still finished with 10 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Ben Simmons accrued eight points , 10 rebounds and 11 assists . The Raptors ( 21 - 5 ) got a gem from Kawhi Leonard , as he tallied 36 points , nine rebounds and five steals . Serge Ibaka finished with 18 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Jonas Valanciunas was a huge spark off the bench , providing 26 points , eight rebounds and two assists . No other player reached double figures in scoring . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Toronto traveling to face the Brooklyn Nets and Philadelphia playing the Detroit Pistons on the road as well .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 99 - 96 , at Scotiabank_Arena on Wednesday . While Indiana held the lead for 45 minutes of this game , it was n't decided until the final shot . In fact , the Pacers blew a 17 - point lead late in the third quarter , as Toronto responded with a 24 - 11 fourth quarter to complete their comeback win . Toronto 's defense was critical in that quarter , holding Indiana to 5 - of - 18 from the field while forcing seven turnovers . The Raptors defense was critical all night though , as they recorded 15 steals and 10 blocks while winning the turnover differential , 20 - 9 . Toronto also did a great job in the interior , outscoring Indiana in the paint , 56 - 44 . They won this game despite shooting 41 percent from the field and 23 percent from three - point range . The Pacers ( 20 - 11 ) were led by Victor Oladipo , as he tallied 20 points , two rebounds and four assists . Bojan Bogdanovic accrued 18 points , five rebounds and two steals . Myles Turner finished with 10 points , 14 rebounds and five blocks . Domantas Sabonis led the bench with 12 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . The Raptors ( 24 - 9 ) were led by Kawhi Leonard , as he collected 28 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and four steals . Pascal Siakam accumulated 17 points , seven rebounds , four assists and three steals . Greg Monroe made a spot start and amassed 13 points and eight rebounds . Fred VanVleet went just 4 - of - 17 from the field in a spot start but provided 11 points , two steals and three blocks with some great defense late . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Indiana traveling to face the surging Brooklyn Nets and Toronto playing host to the struggling Cleveland Cavaliers .

The Raptors ( 25 - 9 ) are clearly a superior team to the Cavaliers ( 8 - 25 ) when both squads are at full health , but Toronto came into Friday 's game without the trio of Kyle Lowry ( thigh ) , Danny Green ( knee ) and Serge Ibaka ( knee ) . As a result , the game was highly competitive through three - plus quarters , but the home squad closed out the last five minutes on a 20 - 9 run . As the elevated final score implies , both teams shot very well , but the Raptors were just a bit better with a 53 percent succcess rate from the field . The Cavaliers were paced by Jordan Clarkson , who compiled 20 points and added four rebounds , four assists and a block . In fact , neither club ever attained a double - digit lead , despite the fact that Toronto held the lead for the final 20 minutes of action . Offensive rebounding was huge for Toronto , as they won that battle , 17 - 7 . They also did a great job of protecting the rim , out - blocking the Bulls , 8 - 2 . Turnovers were also critical , with the Raptors forcing 18 turnovers from the Bulls , allowing them to take 12 more shots than Chicago , which happened to be Toronto 's turnover total . The Bulls ( 10 - 27 ) were led by Lauri Marrkanen , as he tallied 18 points , 10 rebounds and two steals . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Utah Jazz , 112 - 116 , at Scotiabank_Arena on Tuesday . The Raptors ( 28 - 11 ) and the Jazz ( 18 - 20 ) delivered a high - scoring game at the north of the border , but in the end Toronto ended winning the game since they did a better job of taking advantage of their momentum across all four quarters . In fact , the Raptors jumped ahead 26 - 24 in the first quarter , but Utah answered right back and a 29 - 25 second quarter gave them a two - point lead entering the break ( 53 - 51 ) . But the Raptors would pull away for good in the third quarter , where they won by a 12 - point margin ( 44 - 32 ) . Utah won the final quarter by four points ( 31 - 27 ) , but it would n't be enough and Toronto , who entered this game with a 7 - 7 record in their past 14 contests , secured a huge win in front of their crowd . Toronto 's offense relied on only three players in this game , but the bet paid off admirably . Kawhi Leonard paved the way with an impressive 45 - point , six - rebound performance , although Pascal Siakam did n't hide and finished the contest with 28 points and 10 rebounds . Norman Powell had a solid effort with 14 points coming off the bench , while Fred VanVleet filled the stat sheet admirably : eight points , five assists , and four rebounds . Utah 's biggest scoring threat came off the bench since Jae Crowder finished with 30 points ( 9 - 15 from the field ) . Derrick Favors had a solid outing as well since he chipped in with 21 points , nine boards and two blocks . Donovan Mitchell added 19 points with four rebounds and three assists , and Ricky Rubio contributed 14 points with eight assists . Gobert had 16 points and nine rebounds .
The Toronto Raptors took down the Indiana Pacers , 121 - 105 , at Scotiabank_Arena on Sunday evening . It was a contest between two of the Eastern_Conference 's top teams , as a win would have put Indiana ( 26 - 13 ) in first place for the first time since 2014 . Toronto ( 30 - 12 ) , however , delivered a memorable offensive performance , earning a win and becoming the first team in the NBA to reach 30 wins on the season . Despite the absence of superstar Kawhi Leonard ( rest ) , Toronto shot the lights out , knocking down 52 percent of its shots and hitting 17 three - pointers . Eight Raptors players scored in double figures in the comfortable win . Kyle Lowry dished out a team - high eight assists in his first game since returning from a back injury . Lowry also scored 12 points and grabbed three steals . Norman Powell led Toronto with 23 points , and every Raptors starter scored at least 12 in Sunday 's important win . For Indiana , Bojan Bogdonavic led the way with 21 points . Domantas Sabonis scored 16 points to go with 12 rebounds and six assists , and Victor Oladipo added another 16 . It was not enough , though , as the team hit just four three - pointers and shot only 45 percent as a team . On Tuesday , the Pacers will visit Cleveland while Toronto will host the Atlanta Hawks .

Anunoby and a dunk by Serge Ibaka to come back from a 101 - 98 deficit with 2:15 remaining . Earlier in the final period , the home squad had blown an 86 - 81 lead . Ball security was an issue for both clubs , with Atlanta guilty of a whopping 26 turnovers and the Raptors contributing 18 of their own . They 'd add another 13 points to their advantage in the third quarter , essentially sealing their win despite Brooklyn compiling 30 points in the final period . One of the Raptors ' biggest advantages on the stat sheet was in turnovers , as they forced 17 from the visitors . The score stayed close through the fourth , as the teams exchanged baskets . The score was tied at 109 with 13 seconds left , and the Raptors went to Pascal Siakam out of the timeout . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 120 - 105 , at Air Canada Centre on Tuesday . The Raptors ( 36 - 13 ) once again showed why they are one of the top teams in the NBA during the 2018 - 19 season , as they came from behind against a surprising Kings ( 24 - 24 ) that seemed eager to leave their recent ugly loss on the rear view . Sacramento quickly jumped ahead on the score and they were up by five ( 34 - 29 ) following the first quarter , something that seemed to surprise many fans in attendance . But the Raptors turned things around rather quickly and once they got in control of the game , they did n't slip it away . Toronto won the second quarter by nine points ( 31 - 22 ) so they went up by four ( 60 - 56 ) at the break , and later closed things out in the second half . The Raptors won the remaining two quarters , 28 - 22 and 32 - 27 respectively , as they ended cruising their way towards a relatively comfortable win . The Raptors had a balanced scoring output in this game since they had six players scoring in double figures , but none reaching the 20 - point threshold . The absence of Kawhi Leonard did n't impact the side and the guard duo of Fred VanVleet and Kyle Lowry led the way for Toronto since both had 19 points . In fact , Houston got out to a 22 - point lead thanks to a 32 - 18 second quarter but Toronto rode a 34 - 14 third quarter to make it competitive . The Rockets then responded with a 38 - 24 fourth quarter to take control , as they led by at least seven points for the final 10 minutes . Even with those major swings , there were five ties and 12 lead changes in total . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Rockets connecting on 15 - of - 34 and the Raptors hitting just 9 - of - 31 . Turnovers were also key , with Houston winning the turnover differential , 13 - 9 , thanks to out - stealing Toronto , 10 - 1 . That allowed them to win the points off turnover differential , 26 - 4 and the fastbreak scoring battle , 23 - 7 . The Rockets ( 39 - 25 ) were led by James Harden , as he finished with 33 points , three rebounds and three steals . The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Toronto Raptors , 116 - 109 , at Air Canada Centre on Friday night . The Thunder ( 43 - 30 ) were looking to avenge a 123 - 114 overtime loss to the Raptors ( 51 - 22 ) in the first game of the home - and home set on Wednesday , but things did n't exactly get off on the right foot in that regard . Toronto took a 29 - 22 lead through 12 minutes , and they 'd expanded their advantage to 10 points by intermission . However the light went on for OKC at halftime , as they erased the entirety of their deficit in the third quarter and forged a three - point lead going into the final period . The Raptors got as close as 108 - 104 with 2:18 remaining , but the visitors finished on an 8 - 5 run to seal the win . Poor ball security helped to the hosts in , as they were guilty of 20 turnovers . Paul George paced the Thunder with 28 points and complemented them with six rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block . Dennis Schroder followed with 26 points , adding seven assists , six boards and one block . Jerami Grant furnished 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . Russell Westbrook generated an 18 - point , 13 - assist , 12 - rebound triple - double that also included four steals and one block . Terrance Ferguson poured in 11 points , while Steven Adams totaled nine points , five rebounds , one assist , three blocks and two steals . Kawhi Leonard led the Raptors with 37 points while also supplying six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Pascal Siakam registered 25 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Danny Green poured in 19 points and added seven boards and one assist . Serge Ibaka totaled 11 points , six rebounds and two blocks . Fred VanVleet finished with eight points , five assists , two rebounds and one block . The Thunder remain on the road and take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday night . The Raptors remain home and face the Charlotte Hornets on Sunday evening .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 115 - 114 , at Scotiabank_Arena on Sunday evening . The Raptors got out to a good start at home with a 20 - 9 lead early on , but the Hornets rallied to make it a five - point game heading into the second quarter . The Hornets responded in the second and tied it up at 41 four minutes into the quarter . They kept pushing and took a 58 - 57 lead by halftime . The Hornets carried the momentum into the second half , as they outscored the Raptors by 11 in the third quarter , to take a 12 - point lead into the final frame . The Raptors rallied in the fourth and pulled ahead with a two - point lead in the final seconds , however , the Hornets managed to pull off a miracle , as Jeremy Lamb launched a halfcourt shot to steal a one - point win against one of the top teams in the league . Kawhi Leonard led the Raptors with 28 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks , in 34 minutes . Pascal Siakam followed up with 23 points , seven rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block , while Marc Gasol added 17 points , six assists , four rebounds , three blocks and one steal . The Raptors shot 58 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Dwayne Bacon led the Hornets with 20 points and three rebounds , in 33 minutes . Miles Bridges followed up with 16 points , six rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block , while Kemba Walker totaled 15 points , 13 assists , eight rebounds and four steals . The Hornets shot 44 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 41 from deep . The Raptors ( 51 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Bulls on Tuesday . The Hornets ( 34 - 39 ) play host to the Spurs on Tuesday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Orlando Magic , 121 - 109 , at Scotiabank_Arena on Monday night . The Magic ( 38 - 40 ) came into the contest in need of more wins , as they were half - game behind the eighth - seeded Miami Heat at the start of the night . Orlando certainly opened with a sense of urgency , taking a 36 - 29 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , that would essentially be the highlight of their night , as the Raptors ( 55 - 23 ) bounced back in the second to erase their deficit and take a 10 - point lead into halftime . That would prove to be all the cushion they needed , and Toronto would add another two advantage by the final buzzer . Evan Fournier led the way for the Magic with 21 points , adding four rebounds and four assists . Wesley Iwundu turned in 16 points , three boards and two assists . Nikola Vucevic generated a 13 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Khem Birch totaled 11 points , four boards , two assists and one block . D.J . Augustin and Michael Carter-Williams generated matching eight - point , six - assist tallies . Danny Green paced the Raptors with 29 points and complemented them with five rebounds , one assist , three blocks and two steals . Kawhi Leonard and Serge Ibaka produced 15 points apiece while hauling in six and seven rebounds , respectively . Marc Gasol furnished 13 points , four rebounds and four assists . Kyle Lowry delivered 12 points , seven assists , six rebounds , three steals and one block . The Magic return home and take on the New_York Knicks on Wednesday night , while the Raptors hit the road and pay a visit to the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening as well .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Houston Rockets , 131 - 112 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday evening . The Pelicans took control right from the start as they jumped to a quick 9 - 3 lead , and went on to push their lead to 35 - 29 after one quarter . They kept the pressure on through the second , where they outscored the Rockets , 36 - 25 , to build a 71 - 54 lead by halftime . The Rockets came out more prepared in the second half , but could only match the Pelicans with 30 points each through the third quarter . The Pelicans did not let up and maintained a healthy cushion through the final frame , lead by 20 with 3:46 to and cruising to the finish from there . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 32 points , 16 rebounds , eight assists , three steals and three blocks , in 39 minutes . Nikola Mirotic had himself a night , with 30 points , 10 rebounds and three assists , in 29 minutes of action . Elfrid Payton tallied a triple - double with 10 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists , along with a steal , while E'Twaun Moore added 21 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting . The Pelicans shot 53 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 25 from long range . Meanwhile , Eric Gordon was the high - point man for the Rockets , with 21 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , in 29 minutes off the bench . Chris Paul followed up with 19 points , six assists , five rebounds and two steals , while James Harden tallied 18 points , 10 assists , nine rebounds , three steals and one block . The Rockets shot 42 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 48 from long range . The Rockets ( 0 - 1 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Lakers in Los_Angeles on Saturday . The Pelicans ( 10 ) play host to the Kings on Friday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Houston Rockets , 100 - 89 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday evening . The game started out with both teams trading baskets , and the Rockets holding a slight edge for most of the first quarter before settling on a 29 - 24 lead heading into the second . The Jazz flipped the switch in the second , where they outscored Houston by 13 ; 28 - 25 , to take a 52 - 44 lead into halftime . The Jazz stayed strong in the third and held a 13 - point lead midway through the quarter . They managed to carry a 14 - point advantage into the fourth , where they did not let up . The Rockets made a push , cutting the gap to five , but the Jazz quickly reestablished their double - digit lead and cruised to an impressive win on the road . Donovan Mitchell had a massive night , with 38 points on 14 - of - 25 shooting , in 39 minutes . Rudy Gobert tallied 12 points , 13 rebounds , three blocks and two steals , while Joe Ingles added 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jae Crowder chipped in nine points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 32 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 44 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 29 from deep . Meanwhile , The Rockets fell again without Chris Paul , as Michael Carter-Williams finished with seven points on 3 - of - 7 shooting , two assists and one steal , in 20 minutes as Houston 's starting point guard . Carmelo Anthony tallied 22 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , along with seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , while James Harden led the Rockets with 29 points , seven assists , five rebounds and one steal . The Rockets shot 40 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 40 from long range . The Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) look ahead to Friday , when they play host to the Clippers . The Jazz ( 2 - 2 ) take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Houston Rockets , 133 - 113 , at Toyota_Center on Friday evening . The Rockets ' ( 1 - 4 ) season of misfortune continued Friday , as Chris Paul 's return from a suspension was negated by James Harden 's absence due to a Grade-1 hamstring strain suffered Wednesday against the Jazz . Despite their short - handed roster , Houston did start the game off strong , trailing by just a point after the first 12 minutes . However , their deficit had grown to nine by halftime , and even though they managed to get as close as 81 - 78 with 3:39 remaining in the third quarter , the game got away from them after that point . The Clippers ( 3 - 2 ) poured it on the rest of the way , outscoring their hosts by a 52 - 35 margin . Los_Angeles enjoyed a sizable shooting advantage , draining 54 percent of their attempts ( including 52 percent from three - point range ) while limiting the Rockets to a 39 percent success rate . Montrezl Harrell paced the Clippers while logging 28 minutes off the bench , posting 30 points , six rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks . Lou Williams followed with 23 points , three assists and one rebound . Danilo Gallinari supplied 16 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Tobias Harris managed a near double - double with 15 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one block . Avery Bradley had his first solid offensive performance of the season with 14 points . With James Ennis sidelined , Carmelo Anthony drew the start and led the Rockets with 24 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Gerald Green followed with a bench - leading 19 points and added five rebounds and one assist . Clint Capela managed a 14 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , two steals and one block . Paul totaled 12 points , eight assists , six rebounds and two steals . P.J . Tucker matched Paul 's scoring total and also hauled in six rebounds , dished out three assists , recorded three steals and posted one block . Eric Gordon logged a start at two - guard in Harden 's stead , going for 10 points , four rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . The Clippers head back home to take on the Washington Wizards on Sunday evening , while the Rockets remain home and take on the Portland Trail_Blazers on Tuesday night .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Houston Rockets , 104 - 85 , at Toyota_Center on Tuesday evening . The Trail_Blazers ( 5 - 2 ) were playing their fourth game in six nights Tuesday , while the Rockets ( 1 - 5 ) were coming in on three days ' rest . Moreover , Houston was seemingly motivated to put on a better showing in front of their home crowd after failing to score a victory in front of them during their first three tries this season . However , all of those intangibles went out the window from the opening tip onward , as Portland grew their 19 - 15 first - quarter lead into a 51 - 36 advantage by intermission . Any hopes of a second - half resurgence were promptly dashed during the third period , when the visitors added another eight points to their edge . That made the final 12 minutes a foregone conclusion , as Portland coasted to a comfortable 19 - point victory . The Blazers ' biggest advantage came in the shooting category , as they drained 48 percent of their buckets while limiting the home squad to a 32 percent success rate . Jusuf Nurkic and Damian Lillard led the way for the Trail_Blazers with matching 22 - point tallies . Nurkic added 10 rebounds among his other contributions , while Lillard counted seven assists as part of his final line . C.J . McCollum followed closely behind with 19 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . Nik Stauskas served as the only other double - digit scorer for the visiting team , totaling 10 points in 24 minutes off the bench . Jake Layman and Al-Farouq Aminu rounded out the starting five with seven - and five - point contributions , respectively . Chris Paul paced the Rockets with 17 points , nine assists , five rebounds and two steals . Clint Capela generated a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double - double . Eric Gordon poured in 12 points but only shot 4 - for - 18 . He also hauled in six boards . Gary Clark produced a bench - leading 11 points . Carmelo Anthony mustered eight points on 2 - for - 12 shooting and added four rebounds , two blocks and one steal . The Trail_Blazers head back home and tangle with the New_Orleans Pelicans on Thursday evening , while the Rockets pay a visit to the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 107 - 86 , at Toyota_Center on Thursday . It 's rare to see the Warriors offense struggle so immensely , as this was easily their lowest point total of the season . In fact , the Rockets held the Warriors to just 32 - of - 76 from the field and 4 - of - 18 from three - point range while winning the turnover differential , 16 - 5 . The decisive stretch was in the fourth quarter , as Houston scored 21 unanswered points after Golden_State hit the opening bucket of the quarter . The Rockets were in control before that though , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 20 minutes of play . The Warriors ( 12 - 4 ) starters combined for just 40 points , as Kevin Durant led the way with 20 points , five rebounds and two assists . Klay Thompson finished with 10 points . three rebounds and two blocks . Draymond Green failed to score , as he committed five turnovers while also providing five rebounds and five assists . Kevon Looney led the bench with 12 points and five rebounds . This is the first game since 2013 that the Warriors starters did not hit a three - pointer . The Rockets ( 7 - 7 ) were led by James Harden , as he tallied 27 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Chris Paul accrued 10 points , five rebounds , seven assists , three steals and two blocks . James Ennis III amassed 19 points and five boards . Eric Gordon led the bench with 17 points and three assists . Clint Capela totaled 10 points and 10 boards en route to a double - double . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Golden_State traveling to face the Dallas Mavericks and Houston playing host to the Sacramento Kings .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 126 - 124 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday . While there were eight ties and seven lead changes in the first 25 minutes , Houston controlled the game from there . In fact , a 37 - 26 third quarter allowed the Rockets to hold the lead for the remainder of the game . Houston had one of their best shooting games of the season , as they connected on 56 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Rim protection was also key , with the Rockets winning the defensive rebounding battle , 31 - 22 , and out - blocking the Pistons , 7 - 1 . The Pistons ( 8 - 7 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he accumulated 37 points . 11 rebounds and four assists . Andre Drummond amassed 20 points and 11 boards on 8 - of - 12 shooting . Langston Galloway led the bench with 13 points , two rebounds and one assist . Ish Smith also played well off the bench , providing 11 points , two rebounds and four assists . The Rockets ( 9 - 7 ) got another gem out of James Harden , as he collected 43 points . seven rebounds , nine assists and four steals , going 19 - of - 19 from the free - throw line . Clint Capela recorded a monster double - double , as he totaled 27 points , 15 rebounds and four blocks on 12 - of - 14 from the field . Chris Paul finished with 20 points , two rebounds and seven assists . These teams will have a rematch on Friday for their next outing , with Detroit playing host .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Houston Rockets , 128 - 108 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday . A 36 - 28 first quarter really set the tone for Dallas in this game , as they never trailed across the final three quarters . In fact , they led by at least five points for the final three quarters , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 10 minutes of action . It was a team effort from the Mavericks , as they had 11 players score at least six points while the Rockets had just five players score more than five points . The shooting disparity really decided things , with Dallas connecting on 54 percent from the field , 50 percent from three - point range and 79 percent from the free - throw line while holding Houston to 46 percent from the field , 29 percent from long range and 65 percent from the charity stripe . The Mavericks ( 10 - 9 ) were led by Luke Doncic , as he tallied 20 points , six rebounds and two assists . DeAndre Jordan accumulated 13 points , seven rebounds and two blocks . Dennis Smith Jr. generated 10 points , five rebounds , five assists and four steals . Devin Harris led the bench with 20 points , four assists and two blocks . J.J. Barea also played well off the bench , as he provided 13 points , three rebounds and 12 assists . The Rockets ( 9 - 11 ) got another monster triple - double from James Harden , as he collected 25 points , 11 rebounds , 17 assists and six steals . James Ennis III finished with 18 points and three boards . Eric Gordon accrued 17 points , three assists and two blocks while Clint Capela totaled 18 points , eight rebounds and two blocks . Danuel House led their bench with 18 points . No other player on the roster had more than five points , four rebounds or two assists . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Houston traveling to play the San_Antonio Spurs and Dallas facing the Los_Angeles Lakers on the road as well .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 121 - 105 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday evening . The Rockets did not mess around , as they got straight to business , outscoring the Bulls , 38 - 22 , in the first quarter . The Bulls picked it up in the second , where they cut the gap to 11 points halfway through the quarter , and outscored the Rockets by six points in the quarter , to trail , 56 - 46 , at halftime . The Bulls kept it up in the third , as they quickly cut the deficit to just four points , however , the Rockets pulled ahead again , to take an 87 - 75 lead by the end of the third . The Bulls managed to get the lead back to single digits in the fourth , but the Rockets would not give them much to work with , as they held on to earn their second straight win . James Harden led the Rockets with 30 points , seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block , in 30 minutes . Chris Paul had a solid outing , with 12 points , 13 assists , three rebounds and two steals , while Clint Capela tallied 18 points , 15 rebounds and one block . The Rockets shot 49 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 41 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 29 points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks , in 34 minutes . Jabari Parker added 21 points , 12 rebounds , two assists , one steal and a block , while Justin Holiday added 11 points , four steals , three rebounds , one assist and one block . Lauri Markkanen made his season debut with 10 points in 25 minutes off the bench . The Bulls ( 5 - 19 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Pacers in Indiana on Tuesday . The Rockets ( 11 - 11 ) take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Monday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 111 - 103 , at Toyota_Center on Tuesday night . The Rockets ( 12 - 14 ) and the Blazers ( 15 - 12 ) played a tightly - contested affair , but Houston came through with an impressive performance during the second half . Despite the fact Portland jumped ahead in the first quarter to a 29 - 27 lead and finished the first half up by three points ( 54 - 51 ) , the Rockets turned things around in the final 24 minutes of action . Houston began to flip the script in the third quarter ( 30 - 24 ) so they were up by three entering the final 12 minutes of action , and they closed things out with a 30 - 25 fourth quarter . Undoubtedly , the final two quarters proved to be key for the Rockets ' turnaround . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 29 points and four assists in 32 minutes , but the biggest star of the game for Houston was Chris Paul since the veteran point guard finished with a triple - double of 11 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists . Eric Gordon had 14 points , while Clint Capela delivered 13 points and seven rebounds . Gerald Green added 13 points coming off the bench . Damian Lillard was the highest scorer in the game with 34 points , but only shot 12 - 25 from the field . C. J. McCollum did a good job as well since he finished with 22 points , while adding four assists and three rebounds . Jusuf Nurkic had 15 points , 10 rebounds , and four assists . Al-Farouq Aminu had a solid outing as well , since he finished with 10 points and 15 rebounds .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 102 - 97 , at Toyota_Center on Monday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start that set the tone for the entire game , as the home squad emerged with a two - point lead after one quarter . The Rockets took over in the second , where they held the Jazz to just 14 points and outscored them by 11 points in the quarter . Still , the Jazz came out strong in the third and managed to cut the deficit to 10 heading into the fourth . They kept fighting right down to the wire , and used an 11 - 2 run late in the fourth to make it a two - point game with 3:44 remaining . However , James Harden and Chris Paul showed no mercy as they stepped up in the clutch to help seal a big win for Houston . Harden led the Rockets with 47 points , six rebounds , five assists and five steals , in 40 minutes of action . Paul finished with 11 points , nine assists , four steals and three rebounds , while Clint Capela tallied five points , 16 rebounds , five blocks and three steals , in 34 minutes . The Rockets shot 37 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 23 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three steals , in 39 minutes . Rudy Gobert tallied 18 points , 13 rebounds , four assists , three blocks and one steal , while Jae Crowder finished with 14 points , 10 rebounds and one assist . The Jazz shot 39 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 35 from long range . The Jazz ( 14 - 17 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Warriors on Wednesday . The Rockets ( 15 - 14 ) play host to the Wizards on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Washington Wizards , 136 - 118 , on Wednesday at Toyota_Center . The Rockets ( 16 - 14 ) continue to roll , as Wednesday 's victory was their fifth in a row . And James Harden , unsurprisingly , continues to be the catalyst behind the team 's resurgence . Harden shot 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc and finished with a game - high 35 points and nine assists in 34 minutes . Chris Paul added 21 points and eight assists of his own , while Clint Capela posted a double - double of 20 points and 12 rebounds in the blowout victory . It was a vintage performance from Houston , as the team was scorching hot from behind the arc while shooting a very high volume . The Rockets took an astounding 55 three - pointers Wednesday night and managed to make 26 of them ( 47 percent ) . The Wizards ( 12 - 20 ) , on the other hand , were effective shooting the ball , making 54 percent of their shots overall , but they simply were not able to make enough threes to keep up with the high - powered Houston offense . Bradley Beal had an impressive evening , going 10 - of - 17 from the field and finishing with a team - high 28 points in 39 minutes . His running mate in the backcourt , John Wall , posted a double - double of 18 points and 12 rebounds but went just 5 - of - 12 from the field . A pair of former Rockets helped keep Washington in Wednesday 's contest for as long as they good , with Trevor Ariza scoring 15 points in his return to Houston , while Sam Dekker came off the bench to score 15 points in 15 minutes for the Wizards .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Boston Celtics , 127 - 113 , at Toyota_Center on Thursday evening . The Rockets ( 19 - 15 ) looked like they might have an uphill battle earlier in the day , as James Harden was very questionable due to a calf bruise . However , their star guard managed to tough it out and suit up , and his ability to take the floor unsurprisingly proved to be the difference . Harden tallied a game - high 45 points and added six assists , two rebounds and one block across 39 minutes to lead Houston 's efforts . The home squad was particularly effective in the second half after forging a slim 57 - 55 halftime lead . The Rockets outscored the Celtics ( 20 - 14 ) by a 70 - 58 margin over the final 24 minutes to seal a relatively comfortable victory . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 23 points , a total he supplemented with 11 assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Marcus Morris posted 19 points , six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Jaylen Brown produced a bench - leading 18 points and added five boards . Al Horford contributed 15 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Marcus Smart provided 11 points , three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Clint Capela followed Harden with a 24 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included one block . Eric Gordon supplied 20 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Gerald Green and Austin Rivers generated matching 10 - point tallies off the bench and brought down five and four rebounds , respectively . The Celtics remain on the road and tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday night , while the Rockets also travel and face the New_Orleans Pelicans on Saturday evening as well .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 113 - 101 , at Toyota_Center on Monday evening . The Rockets ( 21 - 15 ) have done an especially impressive job defending their home floor after a rough start to their season , so it was n't exactly a surprise too see Houston jump out to a 27 - 18 first - quarter lead . That advantage was 61 - 38 by halftime , and although the Grizzlies ( 18 - 18 ) played much more competitively over the final two quarters , the cushion the home squad had built up was too large . The Rockets ' biggest advantages on the stat sheet came on the boards and the charity stripe , as they outrebounded Memphis by a 46 - 39 margin and shot 45 free throws - - 27 belonging to James Harden - - to the Grizzlies ' 30 . Kyle Anderson led the way for the Grizzlies with 20 points , a total he supplemented with five assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block . Mike Conley provided 19 points , six boards , five assists and one steal . JaMychal Green turned in 17 points , six boards , two assists , one steal and one block . Marc Gasol generated a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that included four assists , two steals and one block . Garrett Temple poured in 10 points . Harden paced the Rockets with a 43 - point , 13 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double that also included two steals . Clint Capela followed with a 19 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included a block . Gerald Green finished with 18 points and five rebounds to lead the bench in both categories . Danuel House , Jr. delivered 16 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . Austin Rivers drew the start for Eric Gordon ( knee ) and tallied 12 points . The Grizzlies head back home to take on the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Rockets travel to the Bay Area to take on the Golden_State Warriors on Thursday evening .

However , the Rockets ( 24 - 16 ) would take control for good in the second quarter , forging a 70 - 60 halftime lead . While Denver would shave three points off their deficit in the third , the outcome was n't in doubt . Houston enjoyed an excellent shooting night overall , draining 50 percent of its attempts , including 47 percent from three - point range . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Houston Rockets , 116 - 109 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday evening . Impressive as their record was coming in , the Bucks ( 29 - 11 ) were still facing a significant challenge in the form of the Rockets ( 23 - 17 ) on their home floor . Accordingly , it was Houston that forged a 61 - 54 halftime lead . However , Milwaukee proved their mettle as one of the best teams in either conference by outscoring their hosts by a 38 - 23 margin in the third quarter . The Rockets made one last push in the final minutes , getting as close as 109 - 106 with 2:37 remaining before the Bucks closed on a 7 - 3 run . As has often been the case , Milwaukee 's defense stood out , limiting red - hot Houston to 38 percent shooting while forcing 18 turnovers . Giannis Antetokounmpo paced the Bucks with 27 points , adding 21 rebounds , five assists and one steal . Malcolm Brogdon followed with 24 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Khris Middleton turned in 15 points , four assists , three rebounds and three steals . Sterling Brown supplied 13 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Eric Bledsoe and Ersan Ilyasova generated matching 10 - point tallies , hauling in five and seven rebounds , respectively . James Harden led the Rockets with 42 points , supplementing them with 11 rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block . Clint Capela generated an 18 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and two blocks . Gerald Green poured in 16 points off the bench . Austin Rivers delivered 13 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . P.J . Tucker filled out the stat sheet with eight points , eight rebounds , seven assists , one steal and one block . The Bucks remain on the road and tangle with the Washington Wizards on Friday night , while the Rockets remain home to tangle with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday evening as well .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 141 - 113 , at Toyota_Center on Friday night . The Cavaliers ( 8 - 35 ) may have momentarily caught the Rockets ( 24 - 17 ) off guard to open the game , but the good times did n't last long . Cleveland saw an early 50 lead get wiped out in short order , with Houston building an insurmountable 77 - 49 lead by halftime . The home squad enjoyed advantages across the stat sheet , which included winning the battle of the boards by a 45 - 39 margin . Ante Zizic paced the Cavaliers with 18 points , adding eight rebounds and two steals . Cedi Osman supplied 15 points , three boards , one assist and one steal . Collin Sexton contributed 14 points , five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Alec Burks registered 13 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal . Jalen Jones and Jordan Clarkson generated matching 12 - point tallies . James Harden led the Rockets with a 43 - point , 12 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double that also included two steals and two blocks . Clint Capela offered 19 points , four rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Danuel House , Jr. pitched in 14 points , five rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Austin Rivers and Brandon Knight had matching 12 - point contributions . The Cavaliers remain on the road and take on the Los_Angeles Lakers on Sunday afternoon , while the Rockets pay a visit to the Orlando Magic on Sunday evening .
The Rockets ( 25 - 18 ) came into the contest even more short - handed than they 've recently been , as they found out earlier Monday that Clint Capela will miss multiple weeks with a thumb injury . When also factoring in the absences of Chris Paul ( hamstring ) and Eric Gordon ( knee ) , it seemed like James Harden was the last man standing for Houston going into the game . He offered a performance befitting such a designation , lighting up the Grizzlies ( 19 - 24 ) for 36 points in a first half in which he helped the Rockets overcome a 29 - 24 first - quarter deficit . Harden finished with 57 points overall , adding nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . The home squad turned the game around in the middle periods , as they outscored Memphis by a 63 - 41 margin over the second and third quarters . Mike Conley and Garrett Temple paced the Grizzlies with matching 14 - point tallies . Conley added seven rebounds , seven assists and one steal , while Temple finished with three boards and three assists . Jaren Jackson , Jr. mustered 12 points , six rebounds , one assist and three blocks . Omri Casspi matched Jackson 's scoring total off the bench and added three boards , two steals and one block . Shelvin Mack produced 10 points , seven assists and three rebounds . Rookie Jevon Carter drew the start for Kyle Anderson ( ankle ) and managed eight points , two assists , one rebound and one steal . Danuel House , Jr. was a distant second to Harden , producing 15 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Gerald Green followed with 14 points , six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Austin Rivers supplied 11 points , six assists and three steals . Gary Clark offered eight points , three points , one steal and one block . The Grizzlies next pay a visit to the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday night , while the Rockets remain home and tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Houston Rockets in overtime , 148 - 145 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday . There were five ties and 12 lead changes in this competitive game , as it took an overtime session to determine a winner . Houston actually blew an 11 - point lead with 2:30 remaining in regulation , as Brooklyn ended regulation on an 18 - 7 run in those last final three minutes . The Rockets then blew a seven - point lead with 1:30 left in the overtime , as the Nets scored 10 unanswered points to win the game . Brooklyn 's shooting was key , as they shot 52 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range while Houston hit just 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from long range . Ball movement played a huge factor in that , with the Nets out - assisting the Rockets , 29 - 18 . They also dominated the boards , winning the rebounding differential , 57 - 47 . The Nets ( 23 - 23 ) were led by Spencer Dinwiddie , as he provided 33 points , two rebounds and 10 assists off the bench . Treveon Graham led the starters with 21 points and five boards . Jarrett Allen had a career game , accumulating 20 points , 24 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Joe Harris totaled 17 points , four rebounds and seven assists . DeMarre Carroll amassed 22 points and five boards off the bench . The Rockets ( 25 - 19 ) got another spectacular effort from James Harden , as he led the way with 58 points , 10 rebounds and six assists . P.J . Tucker finished with 20 points , 10 rebounds and two steals . Eric Gordon re - injured his knee , as he generated 20 points , three rebounds and two assists in 21 minutes . Gerald Green led the bench with 15 points , five rebounds and two blocks . On deck for Brooklyn is a road matchup versus the Orlando Magic on Friday . As for Houston , they 're off until Saturday when they play host to the Los_Angeles Lakers .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 138 - 134 , in overtime , at Toyota_Center on Saturday evening . The Lakers got out to a great start on the road , with a 39 - 26 lead after on quarter . They kept the pressure on in the second , and pushed their lead to 64 - 46 by halftime . However , the Rockets were not done yet , as they came out on fire in the third , and outscored the visitors by 14 points , to trim the deficit to four points by the beginning of the fourth quarter . The Lakers managed to stay ahead through the fourth quarter and led by eight with 2:45 remaining . However , the Rockets used a 17 - 8 run , capped off by a last - second three by Eric Gordon , to send the game to overtime , tied at 120 . The Rockets took the first lead in OT and managed to stay a step ahead the rest of the way , as they held on for a huge home win . James Harden led the way for Houston with 48 points on 14 - of - 30 shooting , eight rebounds , six assists , four steals and one block , in 42 minutes . Eric Gordon followed up with 30 points , five rebounds and four assists , while James Ennis III added 18 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . Meanwhile , Kyle Kuzma led the Lakers with 32 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 43 minutes . In fact , a 33 - 20 first quarter was too much for Toronto to overcome , as they nearly overcame a 19 - point deficit in the fourth quarter . The Rockets defense was the difference , as they recorded 11 steals and five blocks while the Raptors recorded just four steals and one block . In addition , Houston won the turnover differential , 19 - 12 . Getting to the free - throw line was also critical , with Houston connecting on 29 - of - 33 and Toronto hitting 17 - of - 18 . The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Houston Rockets , 106 - 104 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday evening . Houston ( 42 - 26 ) nearly pulled off a memorable comeback , cutting the deficit to just one point after trailing by as much as 14 earlier in the fourth quarter . Golden_State ( 45 - 21 ) , though , was able to pull off the win despite the absence of star forward Kevin Durant ( ankle ) . Two-time MVP Steph Curry knocked down a pair of free - throws with 8 second remaining to make it a three - point game . The Warriors then sent Houston 's James Harden to the line in the final seconds , where he made a shot before missing the second free - throw and failing to secure the offensive board . The loss snapped a league - best nine - game winning streak for the Rockets . Klay Thompson was the game 's leading scorer with 30 points . Thompson shot 12 - of - 23 from the field and also knocked down five three - pointers . DeMarcus Cousins also delivered a strong showing , finishing with 27 points , eight rebounds , and seven assists . Curry was the third Warriors to eclipse 20 points , finishing with 24 in the much - needed win . Harden was Houston 's leading scorer with 29 points on the night . The MVP hopeful added 10 assists and three steals . Clint Capela also had a double - double , tallying 13 points and 13 rebounds . The two strong showings were not enough for the Rockets , though , as the team was sunk by its 29 percent three - point shooting . Houston will host the Phoenix Suns on Friday , while the Warriors will travel to Oklahoma_City on Saturday .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Timberwolves , 112 - 108 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday . It was certainly a new - look Spurs ( 10 ) squad Wednesday night , but it was still a positive result for Gregg Popovich and company . It was a back - and - forth affair for the entire 48 minutes , but ultimately , the newest Spur , DeMar DeRozan , came through with the go - ahead layup and a pair of free throws to seal the game away . DeRozan finished the contest with a game - high 28 points on 10 - of - 21 shooting to go along with four rebounds and four assists in 38 minutes , making for a very impressive San_Antonio debut . Fellow All-Star LaMarcus Aldridge was a monster on the boards Wednesday night , and his activity on the glass proved to be a major factor . Aldridge posted 21 points on a poor 7 - of - 23 shooting from the field , but he hauled in 19 rebounds ( eight offense ) , and the Spurs cashed in on 10 - second chance points on his rebounds alone . A big reason for the Timberwolves ( 0 - 1 ) giving up so many crucial rebounds was the fact that their best rebounder , All-Star Karl-Anthony Towns , only played 22 minutes due to foul trouble . The big man finished with just eight points ( 2 - 6 FG ) and nine rebounds in that time . Fortunately , his supporting cast did enough to keep Minnesota in the game . Jeff Teague poured in a team - high 27 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting from the field , while Jimmy Butler and Andrew Wiggins scored 23 and 20 points , respectively . Ultimately , Towns ' absence ended up being just too much for the team to overcome .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 113 - 108 , at AT & T Center on Monday evening . The Mavericks started out well , keeping it close and playing with the lead for most of the first quarter , however the Spurs managed to take a two - point edge into the second . The Spurs pushed their lead to nine mid way through the second quarter and then to 13 with about a minute left , before settling on a 53 - 45 lead at halftime . The Mavericks came out strong in the third and outscored the Spurs by six , to cut the deficit to just two points , entering the fourth quarter . Things got intense in the fourth , as the Mavericks would not go away . They took a one - point lead with 4:55 remaining , but the Spurs , led by DeMar DeRozan , went into clutch mode to keep grab the one - point lead with 39 seconds left . The Mavericks had a chance to win , as they were down by one , with Dennis Smith Jr. at the line for two shots . However , Smith Jr. only hit one , leaving the Spurs 2 seconds on the clock . DeRozan shook free for a clean look , but it went in and out . The game went to overtime , where DeRozan sealed it for San_Antonio with six points in the final two minutes . DeRozan led the Spurs with an impressive , 34 points on 12 - of - 21 shooting , nine assists , six rebounds and three steals , in 42 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge followed up with 20 points , while Rudy Gay added 15 points , 11 rebounds , six steals and four assists , in 40 minutes . The Spurs shot 46 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 20 from deep . Meanwhile , Luka Doncic had a big night with 31 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting , including 4 - of - 6 from downtown . Dennis Smith Jr. followed up with 22 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting . The Mavs shot 47 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 34 from long range . The Mavericks ( 2 - 5 ) go on to L.A. to challenge the Lakers on Wednesday . The Spurs ( 4 - 2 ) take on the Suns in Phoenix on Wednesday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 117 - 110 , at AT & T Center on Sunday evening . The Magic ( 3 - 6 ) came into the contest in the midst of a tailspin , as they 'd lost six of their previous seven games . However , they seemed like a different team from the start , as they took a 36 - 26 first - quarter lead . Even though the Spurs ( 6 - 3 ) regrouped to an extent in the second period , Orlando still took a 17 - point lead into the final 12 minutes , which gave them more than enough cushion to withstand a run by the home squad in the fourth quarter and escape with the win . The Magic drained 50 percent of their shots and turned the ball over just eight times , both keys to victory . Aaron Gordon led the way with 26 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds and one steal . D.J . Augustin supplied 18 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Terrance Ross managed 17 points , four assists and three rebounds . Evan Fournier turned in 16 points and dished out seven dimes . Nikola Vucevic provided 13 points , eight rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . DeMar DeRozan paced the Spurs with 25 points and added seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Patty Mills paced the bench with 16 points . Marco Belinelli followed with 15 points in 21 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge collected 14 points , six rebounds and three assists . Bryn Forbes tallied 13 points , two assists and a rebound . The Magic head back home to take on the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday night , while the Spurs pay a visit to the Miami Heat on Wednesday evening .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Golden_State Warriors 104 - 92 at AT & T Center on Sunday . The Spurs returned home and picked up a needed win to end the three game losing streak they carried into the contest , although the win will be overshadowed by the beat up Warriors lineup that was run in light of Stephen Curry ( groin ) and Draymond Green ( toe ) being sidelined . The Warriors announced that Curry will be reevaluated in a week and have struggled to find an offensive rhythm without the two - time MVP in the lineup . On Sunday , the firepower from behind the arc was lacking , which in turn kept the Warriors just out of the lead every quarter . The Warriors ( 12 - 6 ) shot 5 - of - 26 from three , and needed 51 points on 51 shots combined from Kevin Durant and Klay Thompson . One half of the splash brothers did hit a big time three with 3:38 remaining in the fourth quarter to pull the game within one point , but the Spurs ( 8 - 7 ) came back with seven unanswered points on the backs of DeMar DeRozan and LaMarcus Aldridge to put the game away . DeRozan had 20 points , six rebounds and nine assists on 8 - of - 19 shooting , while Aldridge posted 24 points , 18 rebounds and two blocks . The Warriors mixed in Damian Jones and Quinn Cook for 23 minutes and 29 minutes , respectively , to try and answer the subtraction of Curry and Green . Cook contributed 16 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , to go with eight rebounds and two assists . Next up , the Spurs go back on the road to take on the New_Orleans Pelicans on Monday , while the Warriors host the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 104 - 103 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 12 - 5 ) continue to be one of the biggest surprises of the NBA , as Wednesday 's victory in San_Antonio was their fifth straight , and they now boast the best record in the Western_Conference . The win did n't come easy , however , as a DeMar DeRozan jumper that put the Spurs ( 8 - 9 ) up one with 1 seconds ago appeared to have sealed the deal for the home team . Memphis managed to catch a break shortly after , though , as Marc Gasol drew a foul with under a second left and knocked down two game - winning free throws . Gasol finished with 20 points and 10 rebounds in 35 minutes , but it was point guard Mike Conley who led the way for the Grizzlies , as he scored a game - high 30 points to go along with nine assists in 35 minutes of his own . Gasol and Conley were the only Memphis starters to reach double figures , while JaMychal Green and Omri Casspi put up 12 and 11 points respectively off the bench . As for the Spurs , they were once again led by DeMar DeRozan , who briefly thought he was the hero with hardly any time remaining on the game clock . DeRozan finished with a team - high 24 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting in addition to five assists and five rebounds in 37 minutes . Rudy Gay added 21 points of his own on 7 - of - 10 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge struggled shooting from the field , going a brutal 6 - of - 20 , but he still managed to finish with a double - double of 19 points and 11 rebounds in 41 minutes .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 136 - 105 , at AT & T Center on Friday evening . The Rockets jumped out to a great start on the road , as they matched the Spurs with a 9 - 9 score after the first few minutes , before they outscored the home team , 30 - 12 , through the remainder of the quarter . The Rockets carried the momentum in to the second , where they pushed their lead to 25 , halfway through the quarter . The Spurs had no answer , as they trailed 70 - 47 , at halftime . The third quarter did not bring any better luck for San_Antonio , as the Rockets pushed their lead to 30 , and went on to outscore the Spurs , 40 - 27 , in the quarter , to take a , 110 - 74 , lead into the final frame . None of the Spurs ' starters played in the fourth , as they dropped their second game in a row . Clint Capela led the Rockets with 27 points , 12 rebounds , four blocks , one assist and a steal , in 29 minutes . Eric Gordon followed up with 26 points , three rebounds and two assists , in 25 minutes off the bench . James Harden finished with 23 points , 10 assists , seven rebounds and one block , in 27 minutes . The Rockets shot 50 percent from the field , including 22 - of - 54 from long range . Meanwhile , LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 20 points , six rebounds and two blocks , in 30 minutes . DeMar DeRozan followed up with 18 points , five assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 26 minutes , while Derrick White chipped in 11 points , nine assists and five rebounds , in 33 minutes off the bench . The Spurs shot 46 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 28 from deep . The Spurs ( 10 - 12 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Trail_Blazers on Sunday . The Rockets ( 10 - 11 ) play host to the Bulls on Saturday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 133 - 120 , at AT & T Center on Friday evening . The Lakers got out to a good start on the road , with an early . 9 - 2 , lead . The Spurs picked it up and brought the game to a tie at 22 , before the Lakers pulled ahead to lead , 36 - 32 , after one . The Lakers kept the edge while the Spurs matched them bucket - for - bucket , with 36 points each in the quarter , to bring the lead to , 72 - 68 , for the Lakers at halftime . The Spurs came out strong in the third quarter , and cut the deficit to just two , with 5:23 left in the quarter . However , the Lakers closed the quarter with a 17 - 9 run , to take a , 99 - 89 , lead into the fourth . Nonetheless , the Spurs were not about to back down , as they started the fourth on a 10 - 2 run , to cut the deficit to just two points . They kept pushing an tied it up at 112 , halfway through the quarter . The Spurs then used a quick 70 run , and did not look back from there , as clutch play , after clutch play sealed the much - needed win . For the Lakers , it marked the end of a four - game winning streak . DeMar DeRozan led the Spurs with 36 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and two blocks , in 36 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge , Patty Mills and Jakob Poeltl finished with 14 points each , while Davis Bertans , who came up huge in the clutch , finished with 13 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting from long range . Meanwhile , LeBron James led the Lakers with 35 points , 11 assists , eight rebounds and two steals , in 37 minutes . Kyle Kuzma followed up with 27 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Lonzo Ball tallied 13 points , 11 assists , four rebounds and one steal . The Lakers ( 15 - 10 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Saturday . The Spurs ( 12 - 14 ) play host to the Jazz on Sunday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 110 - 97 , at AT & T Center on Sunday evening . The Jazz got out to an early , 9 - 4 , lead , but the Spurs battled back to take a , 23 - 18 , lead by the end of the first quarter . The Spurs carried the momentum into the second , where they opening things up by pushing their lead to 12 , within the first four minutes of the quarter . They went on to outscore the visitors , 31 - 18 , in the quarter , to take a , 54 - 36 , lead by halftime . However , the Jazz responded in the third , as they chipped away at the deficit , cutting it to 10 , to trail , 82 - 72 , entering the final frame . The Jazz kept fighting and cut the gap to just five points , early in the fourth . However , the Spurs fired back , and quickly pushed the lead back to 10 . They kept their foot on the gas down the stretch and held on for their second straight win . This marked the end of a two - game winning streak for Utah . DeMar DeRozan led the Spurs with 26 points on 10 - of - 23 shooting , eight assists , six rebounds , two steals and one block , in 38 minutes . Rudy Gay also had a huge night , with 23 points , 15 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . LaMarcus Aldridge added 20 points , six rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The Spur shot 53 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 14 from deep . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 27 points , five rebounds , two steals , one assist and one block , in 35 minutes . Ricky Rubio tallied 26 points , three rebounds and two assists , while Rudy Gobert added 12 points , eight rebounds , seven assists , one steal and one block . The Jazz shot 44 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 29 from long range . The Jazz ( 13 - 14 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Thunder in OKC on Monday . The Spurs ( 13 - 14 ) play host to the Suns on Tuesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Phoenix Suns , 111 - 86 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday night . The Spurs ( 14 - 14 ) came into the contest looking to build on the impressive and much - needed defensive effort they 'd managed against the Utah Jazz in their most recent contest , a game in which they 'd surrendered just 97 points . They appeared to have a solid matchup against the Suns ( 4 - 24 ) , which were coming in after having played an overtime game versus the Clippers just one night prior . Accordingly , San_Antonio was able to jump out to a 29 - 20 lead after one quarter and held a solid 13 - point edge at intermission . They then put the game away for good in a third period during which they outscored their visitors by a 29 - 18 margin . The Spurs limited the Suns to 40 percent shooting , forced 17 turnovers and held them under 25 points in three of four quarters . T.J. Warren led the Suns with 23 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds and two assists . De'Anthony Melton started for Devin Booker ( hamstring ) once again and provided 17 points , seven rebounds , six assists and two steals . Deandre Ayton generated a 12 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and two blocks . Malik Bridges and Josh Jackson mustered just eight and seven points , respectively , in their starting assignments . Bryn Forbes paced the Spurs with 24 points , adding 11 rebounds , three assists and one steal . LaMarcus Aldridge totaled 18 points , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Dante Cunningham produced a bench - leading 14 points , to which he added three rebounds . Rudy Gay poured in 13 points and also registered four boards , two assists , two steals and one block . Marco Belinelli managed 11 points and three rebounds on the second unit . The Suns head back home to tangle with the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday night , while the Spurs remain home to take on the Los_Angeles Clippers on Thursday evening as well .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 125 - 87 , at AT & T Center on Thursday . While this was supposed to be a close game , San_Antonio dominated throughout . In fact , a 38 - 27 first quarter really set the tone , as they never trailed from there . The Spurs really put the game away in the second half , outscoring the Clippers , 59 - 30 . That allowed San_Antonio to hold a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , in addition to leading by at least 20 points for the whole of the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was critical , with San_Antonio connecting on 58 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range while holding Los_Angeles to 36 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . The Spurs also won the defensive rebounding differential , 40 - 29 . Rim protection was also huge , with San_Antonio out - blocking Los_Angeles , 7 - 1 . The Clippers ( 17 - 11 ) were led by Tobias Harris , as he tallied 17 points , five rebounds and two assists . Danilo Gallinari totaled 15 points , three rebounds and four assists . Avery Bradley accrued 15 points , three rebounds and three assists . Shai Gilegous-Alexander was the only other Clipper in double figures , as he collected 13 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Spurs ( 15 - 14 ) got a gem from LaMarcus Aldridge , as he went 12 - of - 14 from the field to finish with 27 points , four rebounds and two steals . Rudy Gay accumulated 21 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals on 8 - of - 10 shooting . DeMar DeRozan tallied 14 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Marco Belinelli and Patty Mills provided double figures in scoring off the bench . Both these teams return to action on Saturday , with Los_Angeles traveling to face the Oklahoma_City Thunder and San_Antonio playing host to the struggling Chicago Bulls .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 98 - 93 , at AT & T Center on Saturday . While there was only one tie and five lead changes in this game , it was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , Chicago overcame a 19 - point halftime deficit to win this game , as they outscored San_Antonio in the second half , 55 - 31 . The Bulls defense was key , as they held the Spurs to 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range while winning the turnover differential , 15 - 7 . Much of that was attributed to the steals , as the Bulls recorded 12 of them while the Spurs picked up just three steals . Chicago also outscored San_Antonio in the paint , 42 - 32 . The Bulls ( 7 - 23 ) got a season - best performance from Kris Dunn , as he collected 24 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . Lauri Markkanen amassed 23 points , seven rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Ryan Arcidiacono accrued 12 points , four rebounds , six assists and three steals . The Spurs ( 15 - 15 ) were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , as he totaled 29 points and 12 boards . DeMar DeRozan accumulated 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Rudy Gay finished with 12 points , six rebounds and four assists . Marco Belinelli was the only other player to score more than six points , as he led the bench with 17 points , four rebounds and two assists . On deck for San_Antonio is a home matchup versus the Philadelphia 76ers on Monday . As for Chicago , they travel to play the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Monday as well .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 96 , at AT & T Center on Monday evening . The 76ers got out to a good start on the road , as they took the lead early in the first and stayed ahead until they ended the first quarter with a 32 - 29 advantage . The Spurs flipped the switch in the second , as they took the lead three and a half minutes into the quarter and did not look back , as they outscored the visitors 31 - 17 in the quarter , to take a 60 - 49 lead at the half . The Spurs kept the pressure on the the third quarter , where they outscored the Sixers by 11 , to put the game mostly out of reach , with a 22 - point deficit heading into the fourth . They were able to keep strong to start the final frame cruised to the finish , to close their home stand with a 4 - 1 record . The Spurs had three player top 20 points , as Rudy Gay led the way with 21 points , six rebounds , three assists , one block and a steal , in 29 minutes . DeMar DeRozan tallied 20 points , seven assists and six rebounds , while LaMarcus Aldridge tallied 20 points , 10 rebounds , three blocks and two assists . The Spurs shot 56 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Ben Simmons led the 76ers with 16 points , six rebounds and six assists , in 29 minutes . J.J. Redick tallied 16 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal , while Joel Embiid finished with 13 points , 11 rebounds and five assists .
