The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 124 - 98 , at AT & T Center on Friday . San_Antonio thoroughly dominated Minnesota in this game , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . In fact , the Spurs won the first , third and fourth quarters by a total of 26 points , with all three being decided by eight points or more . Ball movement was the difference in the game , with San_Antonio recording 36 assists on 46 made baskets . The T'Wolves recorded just 19 assists while being outrebounded , 50 - 39 . That ball movement allowed the Spurs to shoot 53 percent from the field and 58 percent from three - point range while holding the Timberwolves to 40 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range . The Timberwolves ( 14 - 18 ) had just four players reach double figures in scoring , as Andrew Wiggins led the team with 15 points and six boards . Robert Covington accrued 13 points , seven rebounds and six steals . Karl-Anthony Towns totaled 13 points , six rebounds and four assists . Derrick Rose played just 15 minutes , as he left in the second quarter due to an ankle injury . The Spurs ( 18 - 15 ) were led by Bryn Forbes , as he tallied 22 points , four rebounds and seven assists . DeMar DeRozan accrued 12 points , five rebounds and eight assists . LaMarcus Aldridge finished with 10 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Marco Belinelli , Jakob Poeltl and Davis Bertans all reached double figures in scoring off the bench . On deck for San_Antonio is a road matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Saturday . As for Minnesota , they travel to play the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Sunday for their next outing .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Denver Nuggets , 111 - 103 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday evening . The game marked the second straight loss for the Nuggets ( 21 - 11 ) , who are still hanging onto first place in the Western_Conference standings . Wednesday 's game did n't help Denver 's case , though , as the team shot just 39 percent from the field in the loss . The Spurs ( 19 - 16 ) , meanwhile , continued to show improvement defensively after their early - season struggles . While San_Antonio entered the month of December ranked 29th in the league defensively , the team has turned things around , ranking in the top ten since the start of the month . On Wednesday , the Spurs ' revamped defense was on display , as the team held Denver to just 17 - of - 48 shooting from inside the arc . On offense , All-Stars DeMar DeRozan and LaMarcus Aldridge helped lead the charge for the Spurs . The duo scored 27 points each , shooting a combined 22 - of - 36 from the floor . San_Antonio also got 15 points and four assists out of point guard Bryn Forbes , who knocked down a pair of three - pointers in the win . For Denver , meanwhile , big man Nikola Jokic delivered an uncharacteristically poor game . The superstar center led his team with 10 assists , but also finished with only four points and four rebounds . To make matters worse , Jokic committed five turnovers in the loss . His struggles were nearly offset by the play of Juancho Hernangomez , who scored 27 points to lead the Nuggets on Wednesday . Unfortunately for Denver , Hernangomez 's contribution was not enough to secure the win . Denver will have a chance to even the score on Friday , as the two teams are set to rematch at Pepsi_Center .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 120 - 111 , at AT & T Center on Monday . While Boston led for 23 minutes of a 24 - minute first half , San_Antonio took control in the third quarter . In fact , the Spurs matched their first - half point total by outscoring Boston , 46 - 30 , in the third quarter . A 17 - 2 run in the middle of that quarter really made the difference , as they led by at least seven points for the final 16 minutes of play . Three-point shooting was critical , with the Spurs hitting 14 - of - 26 and the Celtics connecting on just 11 - of - 34 . San_Antonio 's starters did most of the damage , outscoring Boston 's starters , 84 - 62 . The Celtics ( 21 - 15 ) best player came off the bench , as Jaylen Brown led the team with 30 points , four rebounds , two assists and two blocks on 10 - of - 15 from the field . Marcus Morris led the starters with 18 points and four boards . Kyrie Irving accrued 16 points , three rebounds , eight assists and two steals while Jayson Tatum amassed 12 points and 11 boards . The Spurs ( 21 - 17 ) were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , as he tallied 32 points , nine rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Derrick White totaled 22 points , three rebounds , three assists and two blocks . DeMar DeRozan collected 13 points , seven rebounds and 11 assists while Davis Bertans led the bench with 17 points . On deck for Boston is a home matchup versus the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday . As for San_Antonio , they 're off until Thursday when they welcome Kawhi Leonard and the Toronto Raptors to AT & T Center .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Toronto Raptors , 125 - 107 , at AT & T Center on Thursday evening . Normally , a meeting between two above - average squads from opposite conferences would be a storyline in itself , but the excitement leading up to Thursday 's matchup was centered on the return of Kawhi Leonard to San_Antonio for the first time . However , the Spurs ( 22 - 17 ) made sure the spotlight was put right back on them during the first 12 minutes , as they made a statement with a 38 - 19 first - quarter lead . While the Raptors ( 28 - 12 ) naturally found their stride to an extent after that trouncing , they still trailed 67 - 51 at halftime . San_Antonio then sealed the victory by adding five more points to their advantage in the third quarter , leading to the comfortable double - digit victory . Leonard certainly was n't bad in his return performance - - team - leading 21 points , along with five assists , one rebound and two steals over 33 minutes - - but as the final score indicates , his efforts were nowhere near enough . Delon Wright was second behind Leonard with 15 points off the bench , and he added four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Serge Ibaka and Norman Powell had matching 14 - point tallies , with the former adding six rebounds , one assist and one steal , and the latter supplying three rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Fred VanVleet furnished 12 points , five boards and two assists . Greg Monroe matched VanVleet 's scoring total and also turned in six rebounds , one steal and one block . Pascal Siakam filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block . LaMarcus Aldridge paced the Spurs with 23 points and also dished out five assists and pulled in two rebounds . DeMar DeRozan managed 21 points , 14 rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . Bryn Forbes poured in 20 points , hauled in three boards , dished out three assists and recorded one steal . Derrick White continued his productive run with 19 points , four assists and one steal . Rudy Gay registered 13 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one steal . Patty Mills led the bench with 12 points . The Raptors remain on the road and next pay a Saturday night visit to the Milwaukee Bucks , while the Spurs remain home to face the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday evening .

The Wizards answered back in the second , where they outscored the Spurs by nine , to make it a one - point game by halftime . However , the Spurs reclaimed control in the third , as they outscored the visitors by 12 in the quarter , to take a 99 - 86 lead into the final frame . The Wizards kept fighting but could not make significant progress , as the Spurs held on for their second straight win . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 126 - 124 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday . It 's rare to see a team shoot 60 percent from the field and lose but that was the case here for the Suns . It stayed close throughout though , as there were 15 ties and seven lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . In fact , Rudy Gay played the hero , as he broke a tied game with a mid - range jumper at the buzzer to capture a win for the Spurs . San_Antonio simply had more chances than Phoenix , as they took 20 more shots than them . Much of that can be attributed to the offensive rebounding , with the Spurs winning that battle , 14 - 3 . The assist - to - turnover differential also played a factor in that , with the Spurs recording 30 assists to 11 turnovers and the Suns committing 18 turnovers to 26 assists . The Suns ( 11 - 42 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he tallied 38 points , five rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Mikal Bridges totaled 17 points , six rebounds , three assists and four steals . Josh Jackson accrued 14 points , six rebounds and five assists while Jamal Crawford led the bench with 22 points and seven assists . The Spurs ( 30 - 22 ) were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , as he accumulated 29 points , 14 rebounds and four assists . Davis Bertans amassed 18 points , five assists and four steals . Rudy Gay finished with 16 points , five rebounds and five assists . Derrick White generated 15 points , seven rebounds and three assists while Marco Belinelli led the bench with 17 points and five assists . On deck for San_Antonio is a home matchup versus the surging Brooklyn Nets on Thursday . As for Phoenix , they 're off until Saturday when they play host to the Atlanta Hawks .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 117 - 114 , at AT & T Center on Thursday . Over the course of the second and third quarters , the Spurs looked to be losing control of Thursday 's contest and ended up facing a deficit as large as seven in the final period . It was at that point that San_Antonio managed to go on a bit of a run , and the team was ultimately able to hold off Shabazz Napier from hitting a second three in the closing seconds that would have tied the game . Derrick White was sensational in the outing , scoring a game - high 26 points to go along with six assists in just 25 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge was close behind with yet another double - double of 20 points and 13 rebounds despite struggling from the field ( 5 - of - 13 ) . DeMar DeRozan also struggled shooting the ball in his first game back after a three - game absence due to knee soreness . The swingman shot just 5 - of - 16 from the field and finished with just 15 points , but he did grab 10 rebounds . As for the Nets , they missed out on what would have been a prime opportunity for a statement when , but they were just unable to hold on in the closing moments . They actually outshot the Spurs , but what really hurt them was the amount of points they left at the free throw line , going 19 - of - 29 from the charity stripe . D'Angelo Russell scored a team - high 25 points but did so on a fairly inefficient 10 - of - 26 shooting . He also added nine assists and five rebounds in the outing . Joe Harris , on the other hand , was very efficient in his shooting performance , going 7 - of - 10 from the field overall and 3 - of - 5 from three en route to scoring 18 points . DeMarre Carroll also came up with a solid outing off the bench , scoring 18 points in 27 minutes as a reserve .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 113 - 108 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The Spurs ( 32 - 22 ) set an early tone by building an 11 - point first quarter lead , and they ultimately entered the final period with a 16 - point advantage . Although the Pelicans ( 23 - 30 ) were able to get as close as 111 - 108 with 38 seconds remaining , a pair of DeMar DeRozan free throws with 3 seconds remaining sealed the win for San_Antonio . The hosts enjoyed a particularly sizable advantage on the boards , as they won the rebounding battle by a 50 - 42 margin . Frank Jackson led the way for the Pelicans with 25 points , adding two rebounds and two assists . Jrue Holiday and Ian Clark posted matching 15 - point contributions , with Holiday notably adding seven rebounds and dishing out four assists . Cheick Diallo furnished 13 points , eight rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Kenrich Williams delivered 12 points , eight boards and three assists . Darius Miller netted 11 points and two rebounds , one assist and one steal . LaMarcus Aldridge paced the Spurs with 25 points while also pulling down 14 rebounds , dishing out two assists and recording one steal . Rudy Gay pitched in 17 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal . Marco Belinelli matched Gay 's scoring total off the bench . DeRozan shot just 3 - for - 10 overall but finished with 13 points , six rebounds , five assists and one block . Patty Mills and Bryn Forbes had matching 12 - point tallies . The Pelicans head back home to face the Indiana Pacers on Monday night , while the Spurs pay a visit to the Sacramento Kings on Monday evening as well .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 105 - 93 , at AT & T Arena on Wednesday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , with a few lead changes in the first quarter , before the Spurs emerged with a 32 - 27 lead entering the second . The Spurs pushed their lead to 10 during the second , but the Pistons rallied back to take a one - point lead , before the Spurs regained the edge , with a three - point lead by halftime . The Spurs came out strong in the third and outscored the visitors by eight in the quarter , to take a 78 - 67 lead into the final frame . The Pistons kept fighting and made it a two - point game with just five minutes to go , but the Spurs were able to stay on top and close out the much - needed win , ending a three - game slide . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 24 points , five rebounds , three assists and two blocks , in 38 minutes . DeMar DeRozan followed up with 17 points , 13 rebounds , eight assists and two steals , while Marco Belinelli added 17 points and five rebounds off the bench . The Spurs shot 52 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 17 from deep . Meanwhile , Reggie Jackson led the Pistons with 22 points on 8 - of - 18 shooting , in 29 minutes . Blake Griffin tallied 17 points , seven rebounds and seven assists , while Andre Drummond finished with 10 points , 17 rebounds , four steals , one block and one assist . The Pistons shot 36 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 38 from long range . The Pistons ( 29 - 31 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Cavs in Cleveland on Saturday . The Spurs ( 34 - 29 ) play host to the Thunder on Saturday .

The Spurs got out to a great start at home , with a 38 - 25 lead after one quarter . The Thunder picked it up in the second , but could only knock the deficit down by four points , as they trailed by nine at halftime . The contest slowed down in the third , as both teams combined for only 35 points , however , it was the Spurs who played with the edge , as they outscored the visitors by five , to push their lead to 14 , entering the final frame . The Thunder kept fighting through the fourth but could not gain any ground , as the Spurs held on for their second straight win . The Thunder dropped their second in a row with out Paul George ( shoulder ) in the lineup , and their fourth straight overall . Rudy Gay followed up with 22 points , eight rebounds , one assists and one steal , in 26 minutes off the bench , while DeMar DeRozan added 18 points , seven assists and six rebounds . The Spurs ( 36 - 29 ) came out of the gates with uncommon ferocity , building a 36 - 17 first - quarter lead over the overwhelmed Nuggets ( 42 - 21 ) . While Denver recovered enough to put a nine - point dent into their deficit in the second , San_Antonio still entered the fourth quarter with a 16 - point advantage , but the visitors fought back to finish on a 34 - 17 run over the final 10:51 . Jamal Murray 's 28 - foot step back jumper with 50 seconds left got the Nuggets to within one , but Murray would subsequently miss two other attempts and Gary Harris would misfire on one as well over the remaining time to leave them just short of a successful comeback . jamal Murray led the Nuggets with 25 points , adding eight assists , two rebounds and one steal . The San_Antonio Spurs took down the Milwaukee Bucks , 121 - 114 , at AT & T Center on Sunday evening . San_Antonio ( 38 - 29 ) picked up its fifth straight win in impressive fashion on Sunday , besting the league - leading Bucks ( 50 - 17 ) . Milwaukee initially seemed poised to win in a blowout , hopping out to a 15 - point lead in the first quarter . However , the Spurs rallied back and had cut the deficit to only six points by halftime . In an unusual turn of events , San_Antonio was given another chance to regroup in the third quarter after the game was temporarily delayed by a bat flying around the court . The Spurs were able to take the lead by the end of the third quarter , thanks largely to strong play from DeMar DeRozan . San_Antonio sealed the win with a quick run at the beginning of the fourth in which it extended the lead to double digits . LaMarcus Aldridge was the leading scorer for the Spurs with 29 points . The veteran All-Star added 15 rebounds , two steals , and two blocks in the win . DeRozan , meanwhile , finished with 28 points and dished out a team - high six assists . Sunday 's win moved the Spurs into a tie for sixth in the Western_Conference . For Milwaukee , MVP hopeful Giannis Antetokounmpo tallied 27 points and 13 rebounds to lead the team . Eric Bledsoe scored another 21 points , while Brook Lopez chipped in an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . With the loss , the Bucks have now dropped three straight games on the road . The Bucks will continue their road trip with a visit to New_Orleans on Tuesday . The Spurs , meanwhile , will take a trip to Dallas to take on the Mavericks .

The contest got out to a competitive start , with the Spurs holding a two - point lead after a back - and - forth first quarter . The Spurs picked it up to start the second , as they built a double - digit lead , however , the Trail_Blazers rallied back to take a 50 - 48 lead by halftime . It stayed competitive , as the teams were never more than a couple possessions apart in the third , with the Trail_Blazers taking a four - point lead into the fourth . The Miami Heat defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 110 - 105 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday . Miami ( 35 - 36 ) came out firing Wednesday night , opening up a 15 - point lead at the end of the first half and building that up to 18 in the opening moments of the second . The Spurs , however , would n't go down without a fight and got within three points with just over a minute remaining . Thanks to a pair of stops , including a Dwyane Wade steal off DeMar DeRozan , Miami was able to escape with its third straight victory . Six Heat players scored in double figures Wednesday night , including all four players who came off the bench . Goran Dragic led the way with 22 points in just 22 minutes as a reserve thanks to an efficient 8 - of - 13 shooting performance . Dion Waiters had one of his best games since returning from injury , adding 18 points in 33 minutes , while Josh Richardson was close behind with 15 points of his own . The Heat have their hot shooting from downtown to thank for carrying them to victory , as the team shot 16 - of - 35 from behind the arc . As for the Spurs ( 42 - 30 ) , they also had an impressive night shooting the ball from three , going 14 - of - 34 from long range , but they simply dug themselves a hole that they could never completely get themselves out of . LaMarcus Aldridge , Marco Belinelli and Patty Mills each posted a team - high 17 points , while DeMar DeRozan was the next highest scorer with 16 . Rudy Gay added 15 points in 32 minutes off the bench , While Davis Bertans made three three - pointers on his way to 10 points .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 116 - 110 , at AT & T Center on Thursday evening . The Spurs ( 44 - 32 ) celebrated the career of Manu Ginobili on Thursday , as the team held a ceremony for the retirement of his jersey . San_Antonio nearly had the night spoiled , though , as it escaped a late challenge by the Cavaliers ( 19 - 57 ) , dealing Cleveland its fourth straight win . The Spurs benefited from a highly efficient offensive night , shooting 53 percent from the field in the win . Cleveland , however , countered with a tough challenge on the glass . The Cavaliers out - rebounded San_Antonio 49 - 33 despite coming up short . In the end , Patty Mills was able to seal the win for San_Antonio by sinking a three - pointer to make it a two - possession game with just 14 seconds remaining . The clinching shot gave Mills 11 points and five rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . All-Star guard DeMar DeRozan was the team 's leading scorer with 25 points on the night . The Spurs saw an additional 19 points from Bryn Forbes , who contributed three steals on the defensive end to round out his strong showing . With the win , San_Antonio is now just one win shy of clinching a playoff berth for the 22nd straight season . Cleveland , meanwhile , was led by 24 points from Colin Sexton . The performance brings Sexton 's average to 21 points per game since the All-Star Break . Star big man Kevin Love also excelled , tallying 18 points to go with eight rebounds . The Cavaliers will continue their road trip with a visit to the Los_Angeles Clippers on Saturday . San_Antonio , meanwhile , will host the Sacramento Kings on Sunday afternoon .

The home squad held a slim two - point lead at intermission , but Atlanta impressively wiped that out in third and entered the final period with a four - point advantage . However , a 17 - 12 run by the Spurs over the first 7:25 of the fourth quarter gave them a lead that they would n't relinquish the rest of the way . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 105 - 94 , on Wednesday at AT & T . For both these teams , it was the final game of the regular season , but most importantly , it was the final game for NBA legend Dirk Nowitzki . While he and the Mavericks came up well short of the Spurs on Wednesday night , Nowitzki did get plenty of shots up and managed to lead the team in scoring with 20 points on top of 10 rebounds . It was his only double - double of his final season . Nowitzki was only outdone by LaMarcus Aldridge , who put the finishing touches on a terrific , potentially All-NBA , 2018 - 19 season . Aldridge posted a game - high 34 points on 15 - of - 21 shooting from the floor to go along with 16 rebounds to lead the way for the Spurs in their 48th victory of the season . DeMar DeRozan added 19 points , five rebounds , four assists and three steals , while point guard Derrick White scored 14 points of his own . As a team , San_Antonio shot a decent 47 percent from the field . It was a strong close to the season for the Spurs , who won three games in a row and are now locked into the No . 7 seed in the Western_Conference standings , finishing one game behind the Thunder . They are expected to play the Nuggets in the first round .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 100 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . Wednesday was a big night for both franchises , as it not only marked the start of the 2018 - 19 season , but also the debut of each team 's highly - touted top - three draft pick . Number one pick DeAndre Ayton and third overall pick Luka Doncic both made big first impressions in the first game of their respective careers . Ayton helped his team earn a blowout win with a double - double , scoring 18 points and pulling down 10 rebounds in his debut . Doncic meanwhile , posted a respectable 10 points , eight rebounds , and six assists in his first taste of regular season NBA action . Phoenix ( 10 ) had many more positives to speak of beyond Ayton 's dominant debut . Star shooting guard Devin Booker scored a dominant 35 points to go with seven assists . Booker showed off his impressive scoring arsenal , notching his 33rd point with a step - back three - pointer on Dallas 's Dennis Smith , Jr. As a team , Phoenix saw one of its strongest offensive performances in recent memory , tying its season - high in assists from 2017 - 18 with 35 dimes . Dallas ( 0 - 1 ) , meanwhile , struggled a bit offensively , shooting only 43 percent as a team . In addition to Doncic 's NBA debut , Wednesday was also the Mavericks debut for All-Star center DeAndre Jordan . Jordan recorded a double - double in his first game in a Dallas uniform , finishing with 12 points and 11 rebounds . Dallas will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Suns will visit Denver .

Warren tried to fill in on the scoring gaps and contributed 21 points , while rookie Mikal Bridges registered 16 points in 27 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies got out to a good start on the road , holding the edge for most of the first quarter , to take a 28 - 21 lead heading into the second quarter . They stayed on top and pushed their lead to 10 , with three minutes left in the second , however , the Suns made a push to end the half , and cut the deficit to just four by halftime . The third quarter started out very close , until the Grizz managed to pull ahead by 10 , with five minutes to go . Again , the Suns closed the quarter with a run and made it a four - point game , heading into the final frame . The Grizzlies stayed in control though , as they built yet another 10 - point lead , early in the fourth . The Suns kept chipping away , and had it at a two - point game with just under five minutes remaining . It was a close finish , but Devin Booker led Phoenix in clutch , to outscore the Grizzlies 9 - 5 in the final few minutes , to walk away with the home win , and also end an ugly seven - game losing streak . Devin Booker led the Suns with 25 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting , and seven assists , in 34 minutes . Trevor Ariza followed up with 16 points , nine rebounds , five assists and two steals , while Mikal Bridges chipped in 14 points , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Suns shot 52 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 33 from long range . Meanwhile , Shelvin Mack was the high - point man for Memphis , with 21 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench . Dillon Brooks tallied 17 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , in 29 minutes off the bench , while Mike Conley and Marc Gasol both had quiet nights . The Suns ( 2 - 7 ) play host to the Nets on Tuesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 102 - 84 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday . The Nets ( 5 - 6 ) managed to make light work of the Suns on the road , as they essentially led Tuesday 's contest from start to finish . Caris LeVert put together another strong performance for Brooklyn , scoring a game - high 26 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting in 32 minutes . It was his third straight game with at least 20 points and his seventh such performance of the season . It was n't the prettiest of performances from the Nets , as they shot just 45 percent from the field and 25 percent from behind the arc , but five players scoring in double figures was enough for them to get it done Tuesday night . As for the Suns ( 2 - 8 ) , they just could n't get out of their own way . As a team , Phoenix committed 20 turnovers Tuesday , with the starting backcourt of Isaiah Canaan and Devin Booker accounting for seven of those . Booker did finish with a team - high 20 points , but he shot just 6 - of - 21 from the field . The struggles shooting the ball went far beyond beyond Booker , however , as the Suns as a whole shot a miserable 35 percent from the field . In fact , they did better shooting from behind the arc , where they hit 36 percent of their shots . The Suns have now lost eight of nine games since they won their season opener , and things are n't exactly looking up for the young squad in Phoenix .

It was a brilliant night for Phoenix ( 3 - 11 ) , a team that has not shown much brilliance early in the season . The Suns jumped out to an early lead and maintained it , thanks in large part to a 57 percent shooting night from the field . The Suns also hit a season - best 15 three - pointers . Meanwhile , everything seemed to be going wrong for the Spurs ' offense . In addition to shooting only 42 percent from the field , San_Antonio committed 19 turnovers in the loss . T.J. Warren led the Suns with 27 points in the win . Rookie big man DeAndre Ayton added a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . For the Spurs , All-Star guard DeMar DeRozan scored a team - high 24 points , including a perfect 10 - of - 10 night at the free - throw line . Fellow All-Star LaMarcus Aldridge , though , had a tough night . The veteran big man shot just 3 - of - 12 from the field en route to just six points . They outscored the Suns , 32 - 23 , in the quarter , to take a 79 - 65 lead into the final frame . The Suns put up a fight in the fourth , but ultimately could hardly make a dent in the deficit , as the Thunder cruised to their third straight win . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Phoenix Suns at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday . The Pacers set the pace early and maintained a 10 point lead for the majority of the second quarter , quietly answering the Suns comeback attempts early on . The momentum swung in favor the Suns late in the third quarter and carried through the rest of the game which finished with over 11 ties and lead changes and resulted in a wild finish capped off by Bojan Bogdanovi 's three pointer . Prior to Bogdanovic 's three , Devin Booker answered Myles Turner 's shot from behind the arc to keep a tie game . Booker was unable to answer a second time with the game on the line and the rest was finished at the charity stripe for Indiana ( 13 - 8 ) . The Suns ( 4 - 16 ) were led by T.J. Warren who finished with 25 points and seven rebounds , while Booker added 20 points on a rough 7 - of - 21 shooting . Booker pitched in eight assists to aid the poor shooting effort . The Pacers bench stood out while four starters finished in low double figures , as Damontis Sabonis Doug McDermott each poured in 21 points a piece . Sabonis added a big 16 rebounds in his all around dominant game in 23 minutes off the bench . Indiana was without Victor Oladipo who is still nursing a knee injury . The Suns will play the second game of a back - to - back tomorrow when they visit the Clippers , while the Pacers visit the Lakers on Thursday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 99 - 85 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday evening . The Suns got out to a good start at home , as they emerged with a , 25 - 21 , lead after a competitive first quarter . The Magic picked it up in the second quarter , as they pulled ahead after just a few minutes and went on to outscore the home team , 30 - 23 , in the quarter , to take a , 51 - 48 , lead by halftime . The Magic pushed their lead to seven early in the third quarter . The Suns hung around and managed to keep it close , in part thanks to a last - second jumper from Jamal Crawford to cut the deficit to just four points by end of the quarter . However , the Magic turned up the defense in the fourth , where they held the Suns to just 14 points , while they poured in 24 points , to earn the decisive , 14 - point victory . Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 25 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 31 minutes . Terrence Ross came up large with 21 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , in 30 minutes off the bench , while Aaron Gordon added 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . The Magic shot 48 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Deandre Ayton led the Suns with 19 points , six rebounds and two assists , in 31 minutes . Jamal Crawford followed up with 18 points , four assists and two rebounds , in 30 minutes off the bench , while Devin Booker ( toe ) did not play . The Suns ( 4 - 18 ) will look to get back on track as they take on the Lakers in Los_Angeles , on Sunday . The Magic ( 11 - 12 ) head to Miami to take on the Heat , on Tuesday .
The Sacramento Kings blew out the Phoenix Suns , 122 - 105 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday . Sacramento ( 12 - 11 ) blew the game wide open in the first quarter , jumping out to a 36 - 9 lead . The hot start made it a wire - to - wire win for the Kings , who shot 54 percent from the floor on the game . Phoenix ( 4 - 20 ) did manage to climb back somewhat , scoring 38 points in the fourth quarter . However , it was far too little too late , as the game still ended in a double - digit loss . The Kings hit 11 three - pointers in the win . Seven players scored in double digits for Sacramento , including Buddy Hield , who led the way with 20 points . De'Aaron Fox finished with 16 points and six assists , while Willie Cauley-Stein notched a team - high four steals . Rookie star Marvin Bagley III missed the contest with back soreness . Phoenix , meanwhile , saw a double - double from backup big man Richuan Holmes . Holmes recorded 10 points and 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes of action , but also fouled out in that time . DeAndre Ayton finished the game with 10 points and nine rebounds . Devin Booker did not play in Tuesday 's game after sustaining a hamstring injury in Phoenix 's previous contest . On Friday , the Kings will visit the Cavaliers in Cleveland . The Suns , meanwhile , will see Portland on Thursday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Phoenix Suns , 115 - 98 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday evening . The Heat ( 10 - 14 ) saw the Suns ( 4 - 22 ) likely give them more than they expected in a tight opening period , one that saw Phoenix edge them by a 36 - 34 margin . However , Miami began to exert its will in the second period , forging a 60 - 50 halftime advantage . The home squad would be unable to mount a truly formidable challenge in the second half , leading to a comfortable win for the visitors . Turnovers were a pivotal factor , with the Heat forcing 20 while only committing 12 of their own . Bam Adebayo filled in for Hassan Whiteside ( personal ) and paced the Heat with a 22 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Justise Winslow turned in 20 points , eight rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . Rodney McGruder supplied 14 points and five boards . Kelly Olynyk managed 13 points , four rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Tyler Johnson headed back to the bench with Goran Dragic ( knee ) returning to action and posted 12 points , five boards and three assists . Dragic furnished 11 points , 10 assists , one rebound and three steals . Troy Daniels led the Suns with 18 points and complemented them with four rebounds . Deandre Ayton mustered a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists . De'Anthony Melton and Mikal Bridges managed matching 12 - point tallies . Richaun Holmes contributed 11 points , four rebounds and two blocks . Trevor Ariza pitched in 10 points , seven rebounds and six assists . The Heat remain on the road and tangle with the Los_Angeles Clippers on Saturday night . The Suns are off until Monday evening , when they also take on the Clippers .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 107 - 99 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Saturday . There were nine ties and 17 lead changes in total , as Phoenix rode a big second half to victory . In fact , the Suns outscored the Timberwolves , 51 - 41 , in the second half . Defense carried Phoenix , as they held Minnesota to 41 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was also huge , with the Suns outrebounding the T'Wolves , 51 - 41 . Phoenix did a great job of controlling the paint too , outscoring Minnesota in the paint , 50 - 42 while out - blocking them , 7 - 4 . The Timberwolves ( 13 - 16 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he tallied 28 points , 12 rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Dario Saric started and accumulated 15 points , 11 rebounds and two assists . Andrew Wiggins generated 14 points , six rebounds and three assists while Jeff Teague double - doubled with 10 points and 11 assists . Derrick Rose led the bench with 25 points . The Suns ( 6 - 24 ) got Devin Booker back from his hamstring injury , as he led the team with 28 points , seven rebounds and seven assists on 10 - of - 16 from the field . T.J. Warren amassed 21 points and five boards . Deandre Ayton totaled 18 points , 12 rebounds and two assists . Mikal Bridges started and finished with 13 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and three blocks . On deck for Phoenix is a road matchup versus the New_York Knicks on Monday . Minnesota also returns on Monday , as they play host to the Sacramento Kings .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 118 - 102 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday evening . The Thunder got out to a great start on the road , as they built a 36 - 29 lead through the first quarter . The Suns picked it up in the second , outscoring the visitors by six , to cut the deficit to one by halftime . The Suns built on their momentum in the third , as they outscored the Thunder by four , to take a three - point lead at the end of the third . However , the Thunder flipped the switch in the fourth , outscoring the Suns 37 - 18 in the quarter to snap a two - game losing streak . Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with 40 points , 12 rebounds and eight assists , in 39 minutes of action . Dennis Schroder followed up with 20 points , six assists , four rebounds and two steals , while Steven Adams tallied 12 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and three steals . The Thunder shot 54 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin Booker led the Suns with 25 points , 10 assists , seven rebounds and three steals , in 32 minutes . T.J. Warren followed up with 19 points and two rebounds , while Deandre Ayton finished with 16 points , nine rebounds , three steals and one assist . The Suns shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 29 from long range . The Suns ( 9 - 27 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nuggets on Saturday . The Thunder ( 22 - 12 ) take on the Mavericks in Dallas on Sunday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 132 - 109 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Monday evening . The Warriors took the early advantage , with a 31 - 27 lead after one quarter . They turned up the heat in the second , where they outscored the Suns by 13 , to take a 69 - 52 lead by halftime . The Suns came out strong in the third quarter , but could not cut into the deficit , as they were outscored by four in the quarter , as the Warriors pushed their lead to 21 by the end of the quarter . The Warriors were able to cruise through the final quarter to secure their second straight win . Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 34 points , nine rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 31 minutes . Kevin Durant followed up with 25 points , four assists and two rebounds , while Klay Thompson added 15 points , five rebounds , one assist and one steal . Warren followed up with 24 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Devin Booker added 20 points , six assists , two rebounds and one steal . The Suns shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . The Suns ( 9 - 29 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the 76ers on Wednesday . The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 121 - 111 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday . The final scoreline makes this game look much closer than it actually was , as Los_Angeles were in control throughout . In fact , a 38 - 19 first quarter really set the tone , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 36 minutes of action . In addition , Los_Angeles led by 30 points at times in this game , as a late run by Pheonix made the final scoreline more respectable . Rebounding was critical for the Clippers , as they outrebounded the Suns , 43 - 25 . Both offenses were on point , as they both surpassed 50 percent from the field . Ball movement was huge for Los_Angeles , as they out - assisted Phoenix , 31 - 24 . The Clippers ( 22 - 16 ) were led by Danilo Gallinari , as he tallied 21 points , seven rebounds , six assists and two steals . Marcin Gortat had his best game of the year , totaling 18 points and 13 boards . Tobias Harris finished with 16 points , two rebounds and four steals . Lou Williams led the bench with 21 points , three rebounds and four assists while Patrick Beverley accrued 16 points , four rebounds and five assists . The Suns ( 9 - 31 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he collected 23 points , three rebounds and four assists . T.J. Warren amassed 20 points , two rebounds , two assists and four steals . Richaun Holmes led the bench with 16 points , four rebounds , two assists , three steals and three blocks . DeAndre Ayton took just three shots en route to four points and five rebounds . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Phoenix playing host to the Charlotte Hornets and Los_Angeles welcoming the Orlando Magic to Staples_Center .
The Charlotte Hornets took down the Phoenix Suns , 119 - 113 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Sunday evening . Charlotte ( 19 - 20 ) overcame its struggles on the road to earn a win in Phoenix , thanks in large part to its success at the free - throw line . Despite entering Sunday 's contest just 4 - 12 away from Charlotte , the Hornets made an impact against the Suns ( 9 - 32 ) by getting to the line 34 times . The Hornets drew 25 fouls and were altogether dominant around the rim , holding a 64 - 46 edge in points in the paint . Charlotte 's interior dominance helped it to overcome a lackluster shooting night , as the Hornets went just 7 - of - 25 from three - point range . Kemba Walker was the game 's high scorer with 29 points for the Hornets . Walker entered the contest averaging a career - best 25 points per game and is Charlotte 's leading scorer this season . The Hornets also saw a gem from veteran guard Tony Parker , who delivered 20 points off the bench . Parker added six assists in just 26 minutes of play . The Suns , meanwhile , saw a combined 45 points from the duo of T.J. Warren and Josh Jackson . The pair of young wings shot 18 - of - 30 from the field and accounted for over a third of Phoenix 's points . Rookie big man DeAndre Ayton also impressed , scoring 19 points to go with nine rebounds . However , the performances were not enough , as Phoenix saw double - digit disadvantages in both points off turnovers and points in the paint . Charlotte will continue its West Coast road trip with a game against the Clippers in LA on Tuesday . Phoenix , meanwhile , will host the Sacramento Kings .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 115 - 111 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday . Sacramento led by 19 points headed into halftime thanks to a 40 - 18 second quarter but fell apart in the second half . In fact , Phoenix rode a 33 - 14 third quarter to get back into the game , as they capped it off by scoring the final five points of the game to turn a one - point deficit into a four - point victory . It was competitive aside from those middle quarters though , as there were 18 lead changes in this game . The assist - to - turnover ratio was key , with Phoenix recording 31 assists to 19 turnovers while Sacramento picked up 26 assists to 25 turnovers . That was evident by the fact that the Suns recorded 18 steals and seven blocks . Phoenix also shot 51 percent from the field . The Kings ( 20 - 21 ) were led by De'Aaron Fox , as he tallied 24 points , three rebounds , five assists and three steals . Buddy Hield finished with 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . Willie Cauley-Stein accrued 15 points , seven rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks . Ben McLemore came off the bench to provide 20 points and three boards . The Suns ( 10 - 32 ) were led by Kelly Oubre Jr. as he accumulated 26 points , five rebounds , four assists and three steals off the bench . T.J. Warren led the starters with 21 points and four rebounds . DeAndre Ayton amassed 17 points and 12 boards while Josh Jackson totaled 13 points , four rebounds , five assists and three steals . On deck for Phoenix is a road matchup versus the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday . As for Sacramento , they return to action on Thursday when they play host to the Detroit Pistons .

Despite missing Devin Booker , the Suns got out to a good start at home , with a 31 - 23 lead after one quarter . The kept the momentum through the second , where they outscored the visitors by five points , to expand their lead to 60 - 47 by halftime . The Nuggets pulled themselves together for the third quarter , but could hardly make a dent in the deficit , as they only outscored the Suns by one point . The Nuggets did their best to chip away through the fourth , but it was not enough , as the shorthanded Suns held on for the major upset . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the Suns with 26 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 29 minutes off the bench . Deandre Ayton followed up with 22 points , 13 rebounds and three blocks , while Josh Jackson tallied 15 points , five assists , four rebounds , one block and one steal . The Suns shot 41 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Nikola Jokic led the Nuggets with 23 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and a block , in 33 minutes . Malik Beasley followed up with 21 points , one rebound and one assist , while Paul Millsap tallied 10 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . The Suns ( 11 - 33 ) take on the Pacers in Indiana on Tuesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves cruised past the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 91 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday . It was an emphatic victory for the Timberwolves ( 23 - 24 ) , who never let up after going on a big run in the second quarter . Phoenix ( 11 - 38 ) never led , but managed to tie the game early in the period . The Wolves quickly changed that , though , as 10 points in the quarter from Karl-Anthony Towns helped spark a run that gave Minnesota a 15 - point lead by halftime . The Timberwolves continued their domination in the second half , going on a quick run to start the third quarter and holding Phoenix to just 42 second - half points . Towns finished as Minnesota 's leading scorer with 25 points . His impact went far beyond the scoring column , however , as he added 18 rebounds and seven assists . The star big man 's play was complemented by the performance of Josh Okogie . The rookie point guard finished with 21 points , five rebounds , and five assists . Phoenix , meanwhile , saw a promising showing from sophomore wing Josh Jackson . Jackson helped tie the game up with a pair of free - throws in the second , which gave him two of his team - high 27 points . He added 10 rebounds and three blocks . Both teams will take the court again on Thursday , with Phoenix playing host to the Portland Trail_Blazers and the Timberwolves taking a trip to Los_Angeles to face the Lakers .

The contest got out to a competitive start , as the teams traded bucket through the first , with the Suns emerging with a 31 - 30 lead by the end of the quarter . The Trail_Blazers pulled ahead through the second , where they outscored the Suns by five , to take a 56 - 52 lead by halftime . The Trail_Blazers carried the momentum into the third , where they outscored the Suns by eight , to push their lead to 12 , heading into the final frame . The Suns kept battling , but could not trim the deficit through the fourth , as the Trail_Blazers cruised to their 30th win of the season . Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 24 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks , in 29 minutes . C.J . McCollum added 20 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Jake Layman finished with 20 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . The Trail_Blazers ( 30 - 20 ) play host to the Hawks on Saturday .

The Suns held the edge for most of the third quarter , where they led by as many as eight , before settling on a two - point advantaged to start the fourth . However , the Hawks were not done yet , as they rallied in the fourth to outscore the Suns by eight in the quarter , to earn ninth road win of the season . The Houston Rockets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 110 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Monday . The Rockets ( 31 - 22 ) were close to blowing their double - digit lead late in Monday night 's game , but they managed to put a halt to the home team 's late push and end their two - game losing streak . Even with Chris Paul back in the lineup , James Harden was explosive offensively yet again in the winning effort , scoring a game - high 44 points on 15 - of - 26 shooting from the field to go along with eight rebounds and six assists . Kenneth Faried also continues to be sensational as he helps fill the void left by the injured Clint Capela , posting yet another double - double of 17 points and 14 rebounds , seven of which were offensive . Chris Paul added 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and five steals in 33 minutes , while James Ennis ' 13 points made him the fourth and final Houston player to score in double figures . As for the Suns ( 11 - 44 ) , while they managed to keep the contest close , it was their 11th straight loss . They did , however , get some encouraging performances from some unlikely players Monday night . Josh Jackson led the way scoring with 25 points after he was not shy about putting up shots for Phoenix , going 11 - of - 23 from the field . Close behind was Kelly Oubre coming off the bench to score 23 points on a very efficient 9 - of - 13 shooting performance . Unfortunately , hot shooting was not a trend for the Suns , as the team hit just seven of their 25 attempts from behind the arc Monday ( 28 percent ) , led by Jackson and rookie Mikal Bridges shooting a combined 2 - of - 11 from deep . Other rookie DeAndre Ayton posted another double - double of 15 points and 11 rebounds , while Devin Booker added 19 points , seven rebounds and five assists .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Phoenix Suns , 117 - 107 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday night . The Warriors ( 39 - 15 ) likely got the inkling that things were n't going to be easy against the lowly Suns ( 11 - 46 ) , as they were surprisingly on the wrong end of a 31 - 26 score after one . Golden_State looked a lot more like its normal self in the second , leading to a 60 - 53 halftime lead . Phoenix was far from done , however , getting the best of the defending champs by a 10 - point margin in the third to take a lead into the fourth . The Warriors then took their game to its usual level , going on a 23 - 13 run over the final 6:57 to seal the win . Klay Thompson led the way with 25 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , two assists , three blocks and one steal . Kevin Durant turned in 21 points , eight rebounds and three assists . The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 114 - 105 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Monday . Phoenix shocked Milwaukee in their first meeting with a road victory and it appears they have their number with this impressive performance . Milwaukee actually led for the majority of this game , as Phoenix ended the game on a 23 - 7 run across the final five minutes to cap off a 38 - 23 fourth quarter . There were nine ties and seven lead changes alone in the second half , despite the fact that the Bucks led for over 40 minutes of this 48 - minute game . Rim protection was the difference for the Suns , as they recorded 10 blocks while the Bucks picked up just two . Pheonix 's defense was big all - around , as they held Milwaukee to 37 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range while connecting on 45 percent of their shots . The Bucks ( 48 - 15 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 21 points , 13 rebounds , six assists and three steals . Malcolm Brogdon finished with 19 points and seven boards . Eric Bledsoe accrued 15 points , five rebounds and five assists while Ersan Ilyasova provided a double - double off the bench . DeAndre Ayton totaled 19 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and three blocks while Josh Jackson led the bench with 16 points , four rebounds and two blocks . On deck for Phoenix is a home matchup versus the New_York Knicks on Wednesday . As for Milwaukee , they play host to the Indiana Pacers on Thursday for their next fixture .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the New_York Knicks , 107 - 96 , on Wednesday at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena . The Knicks ( 13 - 52 ) managed to get off to a good start , leading by six points after the first 12 minutes , but from that point , it was all Suns ( 15 - 51 ) , who won their third straight game . After two dominant quarters from Phoenix , the home team ended up taking an 18 - point lead into the final quarter . The Suns managed to pull away on the back of their young backcourt star , Devin Booker , who had a season - high 41 points on 14 - of - 23 shooting Wednesday night . He was one of five Phoenix players to score in double figures and led what was a terrific display from behind the arc for the team . Booker went 6 - of - 10 from downtown , and the team as a whole finished 12 - of - 29 ( 41 percent ) from three . As for the Knicks , it was their fourth straight loss after they pulled off a stretch where they won three of four games , and it came at the ends of a miserable offensive performance against a not - so - stingy Suns defense . As a team , New_York shot a serviceable 46 percent from the floor , but they were sloppy with the basketball , turning it over 21 times to just 17 assists . DeAndre Jordan led the way with a double - double of 17 points and 14 rebounds in just 25 minutes , while Noah Vonleh , Dennis Smith and Damyean Dotson each added 15 points . Allonzo Trier was the only other player to score in double figures with 12 points off the bench .
The Utah Jazz took down the Phoenix Suns , 114 - 97 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday . After allowing Phoenix ( 16 - 52 ) to cut the difference to a single possession , the Jazz ( 38 - 29 ) ran away with Wednesday 's game in the fourth quarter . Sophomore sensation Donovan Mitchell had seven points in 90 seconds to help seal the win for Utah late in the game . The biggest advantage for the Jazz came on the glass , where Utah held a 53 - 35 advantage over Phoenix . Utah also had a nice night shooting the ball , knocking down 12 three - pointers while limiting Phoenix to just seven . The star tandem of Mitchell and Rudy Gobert helped get the job done for the Jazz on Wednesday . Mitchell finished with a team - high 26 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting , including 4 - of - 6 from three - point range . Gobert , meanwhile , logged a double - double with 18 points and a whopping 20 rebounds . As a team , Utah shot over 46 percent and saw five double - digit scoring performances . For Phoenix , star shooting guard Devin Booker led the way with 27 points . Rookie big man DeAndre Ayton struggled to deal with Gobert 's defense , going just 1 - of - 9 for two points in the loss . As a team , Phoenix was not particularly active from three - point range , attempting just 19 shots from beyond the arc . Utah will face the second half of a back - to - back as it takes on the Timberwolves on Thursday . The Suns , meanwhile , will visit Houston on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Phoenix Suns , 116 - 101 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Monday evening . A hot start set the tone early for Chicago ( 20 - 51 ) , as the Bulls cruised to a clean victory after gaining a double - digit lead in the first quarter . 10 quick points from Kris Dunn contributed to a 34 - point first for Chicago , giving the team a 14 - point advantage by the end of the quarter . From there it was smooth sailing , as efficient play led the Bulls to shoot over 51 percent from the floor in the win . Phoenix ( 17 - 55 ) could not find an offensive groove , shooting just 7 - of - 26 from three - point range and a dismal 16 - of - 26 at the free - throw line . Robin Lopez led Chicago in what proved to be a big man duel on Monday . Lopez scored a team - high 24 points on 11 - of - 14 shooting in the win . The veteran 's strong play was complemented by stellar performances from Chicago 's young core . Zach LaVine and Lauri Markkanen notched 20 points apiece , with LaVine also dishing out seven assists . Dunn , meanwhile , finished with 14 points and two steals . Phoenix saw equally promising play from its young stars . Reigning first overall pick DeAndre Ayton was the game 's leading scorer with 25 points . Ayton also tallied 12 rebounds , three steals , and three blocks . Devin Booker also delivered a gem , scoring 25 points while dishing out seven assists . Ultimately , though , Phoenix 's uninspired offensive effort could not get the job done against Chicago 's efficient performance . Chicago will return home to host the Washington Wizards on Wednesday . The Suns meanwhile , will next suit up on Thursday , when they 're scheduled to take on the Detroit Pistons .
The Washington Wizards edged out the Phoenix Suns , 124 - 121 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday . For the second straight game , Phoenix ( 17 - 59 ) could not get the win despite a 50 - point night from Devin Booker . Booker shot 19 - of - 29 from the field and 9 - of - 10 at the free - throw line , but his strong play could not get the job done . Washington ( 31 - 45 ) was able to draw 28 fouls and get to the free - throw line 43 times , generating plenty of offense despite its poor 67 percent shooting night at the stripe . Thomas Bryant scored the last six points for Washington in the win , including a game - winning and - one with just 3 seconds remaining . He finished with 18 points and 19 rebounds . Bradley Beal and Jabari Parker led the Wizards in scoring with 28 points each . Parker was particularly impressive , grabbing 15 rebounds off the bench . The Wizards were able to dominate the glass all night , grabbing 15 offensive rebounds in total . Despite the team 's strong overall offensive play , ball movement still stagnated at points , as the team finished with just 18 total assists . Phoenix , meanwhile , saw little offense outside of Booker 's heroics . DeAndre Ayton had 14 points to go with 10 rebounds and two blocks . However , Booker was the undisputed story of the night , joining James Harden as only the second player this season to have multiple 50 - point games . Unfortunately for the Suns , both performances have come in a losing effort . The Wizards will visit Utah on Friday , while Phoenix will host the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 120 - 115 , Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Saturday evening . The Suns got out to a great start at home , with a 38 - 23 lead after one quarter . The Grizzlies picked it up in the second and managed to trim seven points off the deficit , to make it n eight - point game by halftime . The Grizzlies kept the pressure on in the third and pushed to make it a four - point game entering the fourth . The Suns could not keep up the Grizzlies  intensity down the stretch , as the Grizz closed with a 14 - 9 run to earn the impressive comeback win . This marks the sixth straight loss for Phoenix . Jonas Valanciunas led the Grizzlies with 34 points , 20 rebounds , five assists , two blocks and a steal , in 34 minutes . Mike Conley tallied 33 points , five assists , four rebounds and three steals , while justin Holiday chipped in 14 points two rebounds , two steals and a block . The Utah Jazz defeated the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 97 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday . Disaster struck early for the Suns ( 18 - 61 ) , as just eight minutes into Wednesday 's contest , Devin Booker came down awkwardly on his ankle and was forced to leave the contest . At that point , Phoenix managed to grab a lead and took a six - point advantage into the second quarter . From that point , however , the Suns had little - to - no chance without their star player , and the visiting Jazz ( 48 - 30 ) slowly started to pull away before piling it on the home team in the fourth quarter . Donovan Mitchell led the way scoring for the Jazz with a game - high 29 points in 35 minutes , but the most impressive performance of the evening may have come from swingman Joe Ingles . Ingles shot a scorching 6 - of - 8 from behind the arc and 10 - of - 13 overall from the field on his way to scoring 27 points to go along with five rebounds and eight assists across 35 minutes . Rudy Gobert added a double - double of 17 points and 13 rebounds to go along with five blocks , while Utah 's bench also came up in a big way Wednesday , scoring 41 points as a four - player unit . As a team , the Jazz were electric from behind the arc , shooting 16 - of - 32 ( 50 percent ) from long range . The Suns , without Booker , unsurprisingly could not find the same success after a strong start to Wednesday 's game . Booker looked to be on track for another strong offensive performance , scoring eight points in the first eight minutes , but the offense stalled as soon as he was forced to leave the game . The team hit just five of its 21 three - point attempts and shot 46 percent from the field overall . Richaun Holmes ended up leading the team in scoring with just 16 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , while Ellie Okobo was close behind with 15 points of his own . Phoenix has failed to score 100 points in four of its last 11 games , with three of those times coming against the Jazz .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans in overtime , 133 - 126 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday . While both these teams are well out of playoff contention , it took an overtime session to determine a winner in this tightly - contested game . Phoenix started the overtime on a 10 - 3 run and that was simply too much for the Pelicans to overcome . It took a big second half for the Suns to get into overtime , as they outscored the Pelicans , 52 - 41 . There ended up being 10 ties and six lead changes in total . The key for Phoenix was their defense , as they recorded 12 steals and 11 blocks while winning the turnover differential , 15 - 7 . The Pelicans ( 32 - 48 ) were led by Julius Randle , as he tallied 31 points , 14 rebounds and three assists . Ian Clark accrued 24 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Elfrid Payton accrued 14 points , five rebounds , 12 assists and two steals . Christian Wood led the bench with 17 points and five boards . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Phoenix traveling to face the surging Houston Rockets and New Orlena traveling to face the Sacramento Kings .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers 128 - 110 at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Tuesday . The Thunder came away with their second win of the season after surging in the second half behind a 39 point third quarter and 35 point fourth quarter . Before Russell Westbrook and Paul George found their rhythm ( combined for 64 points ) the Clippers played a defensively efficient first half and came away with a 13 point lead behind Tobias Harris and Danilo Gallinari . A bang - bang play highlighted the fourth quarter after the Thunder pulled away with a double digit lead as Patrick Beverley dove for a loose ball and collided with Westbrook 's knee . Both players came away talking as both benches cleared to keep the altercation from escalating to anything too serious . Billy Donovan , Westbrook and Beverley were all given technical fouls for the mess . Galliari led all Clippers scorers with 27 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting and a perfect 10 - of - 10 from the free throw line . Montrezl Harrell , who entered the matchup as one of the most efficient bench players to start the season , finished with 10 points and four rebounds in 22 minutes . Lou Williams led the bench with 17 points . The three ball was the key for the Thunder 's second half surge after they finished shooting 53 percent as a unit from behind the arc . Both teams take to the road on Thursday as the Thunder will face the Charlotte Hornets , while the Clippers will visit the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 98 - 80 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Thursday . Houston 's offense has been struggling all season long and this 80 - point nightmare is hopefully rock - bottom . It was a thorough domination from start to finish , as Oklahoma_City led by 10 points after the first quarter and by 20 points headed into the fourth quarter . In fact , the Thunder held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . They held the Rockets to just 38 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range while forcing 17 turnovers . Oklahoma_City also dominated the boards , outrebounding Houston , 52 - 37 . Getting to the charity stripe was also huge for the Thunder , as they connected on 17 - of - 24 of their free - throws while the Rockets hit just 7 - of - 10 . The Rockets ( 4 - 6 ) were led by James Harden , as he tallied 29 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three steals . Clint Capela totaled 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Chris Paul accrued 10 points , two rebounds , five assists and six steals . Carmelo Anthony had a nightmare game off the bench , scoring two points on 1 - of - 11 from the field . The Thunder ( 7 - 4 ) were led by Paul George , as he collected 20 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and six steals . Steven Adams amassed 19 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Dennis Schroder accumulated 14 points , six rebounds and five assists . Jerami Grant and Terrence Ferguson also reached double figures in scoring to cap off the starting five . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Houston traveling to face the San_Antonio Spurs and Oklahoma_City playing the Dallas Mavericks on the road as well .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 101 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Monday . It continues to , for the most part , be no Russell Westbrook no problem for the Thunder ( 8 - 5 ) , as Monday 's victory was their eighth in the last nine games . Paul George led the way once again in Westbrook 's absence , scoring a game - high 32 points on 11 - of - 19 shooting from the field to go along with eight rebounds and six assists in 36 minutes . Dennis Schroder also continues to perform admirably in place of the superstar point guard , as he recorded 20 points , five rebounds , nine assists and four steals in 36 minutes , but he shot a pretty poor 6 - of - 19 from the field . The Thunder utilized the three - point line to their advantage Monday and it ended up being the difference in the game , as the team shot a scorching 13 - of - 27 ( 48 percent ) from behind the arc . The Suns ( 2 - 11 ) , on the other hand , were miserable with their outside shooting , going just 7 - of - 26 ( 27 percent ) from three , which made is impossible for them to keep pace with the Thunder 's hot shooting . T.J Warren led the way for Phoenix , scoring a team - high 21 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting , while Devin Booker was close behind with 19 points of his own in 37 minutes . Booker 's performance was n't nearly as efficient however , with the shooting guard going 7 - of - 18 from the field . The game may have been a lot uglier for the Suns had the team 's bench not came through with the production they did , as the five reserves accounted for 38 points Monday night .

A fracas first ensued after Russell Westbrook shoved Kris Dunn after a play . Chicago 's Robin Lopez , who had to be held back by coaches and players during that incident , was then subsequently ejected later in the third quarter for throwing the ball at the Thunder 's Jerami Grant . The dynamic duo of Russell Westbrook and Paul George spearheaded the win , with the former contributing one of his trademark triple - doubles . The power forward tandem of Lauri Markkanen and Bobby Portis co - led the Bulls with 16 points . Markkanen notably added 15 rebounds . Westbrook stuffed the stat sheet with 13 points , 16 rebounds , 11 assists and five steals . Grant matched Westbrook 's scoring while adding two rebounds and one assist .
